name: Walk to stores/parks/downtown. Fenced yard/Pets OK
description:
Walk to town in ten minutes! Monthly rental includes utilities, wifi, linens and everything you'll need to make a home in downtown Asheville. Quiet and friendly neighborhood, one mile from the hospital or UNCA. Fenced private backyard and private deck. Private laundry room and lock up spot for your bike. Dedicated parking spot. Please contact me in advance if you want to bring your pet(s). I will not allow pets without prior disclosure. There is a security deposit required for all pets.

The space
True Asheville...artist styled apartment with a pet friendly fenced back yard and great neighbors all around. Stay here and easily walk downtown or through the wooded trails and botanical gardens at UNCA. Super convenient neighborhood to walk, bike, run or just stroll around and meet people....very local and friendly! Whole Foods, Trader Joe’s and lots of nearby coffee shops, restaurants and Asheville Yoga Center all within a four block radius.

Your sunny dow

name: Cottage! BonPaul + Sharky's Hostel
description:
The space
Private cottage located behind the main house at the Hostel in Historic West Asheville.

Self check-in starts at 3pm.

Cottage has full size bed, private kitchen and bathroom. Please note also, the shower is not huge. It will fit one person just fine.

Guests get full access to the hostel: book exchange, community computer, common areas with cool international travelers and all the cool restaurants, pubs and cafe's that West Asheville has within walking distance!

Guest access
Guests have solo access to the cottage, and access to the main house of the hostel.

Other things to note
Parking in our lot is limited. You can also park for free on the street.

name: Private Room "Ader" at BPS Hostel
description:
The space
Private Rooms at Bon Paul and Sharky's Hostel. Each Private room has a full size bed that sleeps two adults.

Self check-in starts at 3pm.

Guests have access to all hostel amenities: full kitchen and bathrooms, wifi and internet, common area and book exchange, and cool international travelers.

We are located in Historic West Asheville, walking distance to amazing restaurants, cafes and pubs, grocery, and Asheville's River Art's District.

Two private bathrooms are shared throughout the hostel.

We are a traveler's hostel and therefore CANNOT BOOK TO LOCALS.

name: Mixed Dorm "Top Bunk #1" at BPS Hostel
description:
This is a top bunk in the mixed dorm room

*Please note this is a co-ed dorm - we have another listing for female only

The space
Self check-in starts at 3pm. Instructions will be sent after booking.

Dorm bunks at Bon Paul and Sharky's Hostel. We have a co-ed dorm, as well as female only dorm. We have some off street parking behind the hostel and are located in a very safe neighborhood with plenty of free on-street parking. Our front porch is awesome, with a porch swing. Asheville public transit bus stop one block away.

Each room has 6 bunks and plenty of windows. Guests have access to all hostel amenities: full kitchen and bathrooms, wifi and internet, common area, book exchange, and cool international travelers. We are located in Historic West Asheville, walking distance to amazing restaurants, cafe's and pubs, grocery, and Asheville's River Art's District. Three private bathrooms are shared throughout the hostel. We are a t

name: Historic Grove Park
description:
Come enjoy the beautiful Grove Park neighborhood. Cozy bedroom and private bath in our old, historic home. Close to downtown, restaurants, bakeries and coffee shops. Enjoy a tasty breakfast on our pretty patio!

The space
Come enjoy our 1920's home in the historic Grove Park neighborhood. A queen-sized bed and full bath are ready for you. Enjoy a home cooked breakfast on our pretty patio!

Take a 10 minute walk to downtown Asheville from our safe and quiet neighborhood or a 5 minute walk to the Spa and the golf course at the Grove Park Inn.

Quick access from I-240 and easy parking.

A short distance to great restaurants, coffee shops, bars, handmade ice cream and grocery stores. Great local pizza and beer with $3 movies nearby. Visit Beer City USA's numerous micro-breweries.

Wi-Fi access. Please contact host before booking. Thanks!

Guest access
This is our private home and we reside here ful

name: Terrace Cottage
description:
Located in one of Asheville's oldest historic districts, walkable to UNC-Asheville, the Omni Grove Park Inn, restaurants, wine shops, markets, greenways, parks and more! Downtown is walkable on well-lit sidewalks (under 2 miles), a 5-min drive away.

The space
Experience a classic, private, Arts & Crafts-style guesthouse in our beautiful historic district close to the center of Asheville. All linens and other amenities including HDTV are provided so just bring your groceries.

The newly-installed UBIQUITI access point is your reliable connection for online meetings and networking.

The cottage is very private and comfortable, situated in a quiet location in our safe and friendly neighborhood. Nice walk to downtown along tree-lined streets with great markets and restaurants along the way. Walk to the university, botanical gardens, parks and greenways.

Enjoy a real cook's kitchen, tiled bathroom, sunny deck, closet storage, and lockin

name: Blue Gate West
description:
Due to the unfortunate circumstances the COVID-19 Pandemic has brought to our doorstep, plus the current uncertainty about renting our personal spaces, I find the need to prolong the availability until further notice.
I have very much enjoyed meeting people from many walks of life, sharing stories and experiences.
It’s sad and disconcerting that we have to be fearful of the very humans that previously brought light and interest into our lives.

The space
Hello, Welcome to Asheville, also known as the Paris of the South. My name is Susanne. My home is located in W. Asheville in a quiet neighborhood. The space has a one bedroom with queen size bed and a private adjoining bathroom. There is wifi, back terrace and yard to enjoy for reading or having a cup of coffee outside plus an enclosed yard to let your dog out for business. Please pick up. There is a container outside the back gate.
I am also within walking distance to downtown West Asheville

name: Asheville Dreamer's Cabin
description:
Hi there,
I am usually here half of each month cause I travel for my business. Please ask if need those dates. The cabin is very cozy but also provides privacy and separate baths.
Safe and close to downtown Asheville!
Annie

The space
This beautiful historic log cabin combines the serenity of the Great Smokey Mountains with the flair and soul of it's native New Orleanian owner. Ideally located to provide both privacy and convenience to all Asheville has to offer. Approximately five minutes to enchanting downtown Asheville, the Blue Ridge Pkwy., great hiking, waterfalls, the Folk Art Center, golfing, the Nature Center, the Biltmore estate and more.

Located in a quiet, safe area of East Asheville, all appliances and fully equipped kitchen, 1 TV, off street parking, cable and wifi , linens and towels. Just show up and relax !!

Guest access
Kitchen and common space are shared with owner.
Yard is not available

name: Private, peaceful, and free goat therapy
description:
We are a small community of like-minded progressives living in a quiet rural area right outside the city of Asheville. We have a lot of animals (miniature goats, ducks, 2 cats, 1 dog) and while you do not have to interact with them, if you love animals, you will enjoy it here! We enjoy our privacy and quiet and hope for like-minded guests to enjoy it with us! Come for the great hiking, the award winning restaurants and enjoy a little goat therapy too :)

The space
Contemporary studio apartment, suitable for one person or a couple (queen bed) Living Area with smart TV and wireless internet provided, bedroom area with very comfortable queen size bed (all linens provided), fully stocked kitchen large dorm size refrigerator and separate small freezer, bathroom with shower. 7 miles or 10 minutes from downtown Asheville in east Asheville. 5 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and awesome hiking spots. We are situated in a 3-home private eco-community in the mountains r

name: The Fern Street Apt near Biltmore
description:
The space
Welcome to "Fern Street on the Green," a well kept apartment in a quiet neighborhood in Asheville, NC near the Biltmore Estate. The charming apartment has its own entrance and is on the back lower ground level of a larger home – facing onto a large private greenway-wonderful for bird watching. There is a quiet tenant on the upper level. (Please note that there is an exterior stairway from the parking area to the apartment - well lit with handrail.)

Fernie is a monthly rental. See calendar.
The 500 sq foot Fern Street Apartment is located:
1 mile from Biltmore entrance on a quiet street
2 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway
3 miles to downtown Asheville
15 minutes from the Asheville airport
And within an easy drive of Warren Wilson College and Black Mountain

There is easy access to Interstate 40 and I-26.
Local bus service is only 2 blocks away.

We're only 1/4 mile from Biltmore Forest, a lovely co

name: Refocus Cottage - paradise
description:
Spring has sprung on the MEADOW, in the WOODS and along the CREEK, on this 3 1/2 acre bird sanctuary with visits from turkeys and the occasional bear. View it all with wine or coffee from the extensive decking above or the pavilion below. Take a book to one of the hammocks. This is a peaceful retreat just five miles to downtown Asheville and a short drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway for hiking and mountain vistas if you can tear yourself away from the fire pit, badminton, boccie ball, corn hole...

The space
REFOCUS COTTAGE is a sophisticated OPEN STUDIO- STYLE SPACE, uncluttered in its decor. It is in such a serene country setting you may not want to leave the FOUR ACRE property with creek, meadow, woods and fire pit, pavilion, horse shoes, badminton, boccie ball, bean bag toss, sky chair and hammocks. Its SPECTACULAR DECKING overlooking the meadow and woods makes it the loveliest of escapes for recharging, decompressing, writing, painting, photographing... When y

name: Athena's Loft:  Find yourself here!
description:
Sweet old-fashioned upstairs homestay space has private entrance, small (tiny) bathroom with a deep claw-foot tub. Microwave (no stove), sink, fridge, washer and dryer -- all on site/private. Eco-memory foam double-size bed & pull-out double futon sofa bed + a single futon bed. Wireless internet, NO TV. Off-street parking. Walk to great food, music, coffee+! Must love grandma's house, as this property is not updated with the latest appliances (see bathroom). Window AC and electric heat.

The space
Athena's Loft is the upstairs of our home, situated in our one-hundred-year-old bungalow, with hosts living downstairs. Hosts are on site for your Homestay home-away-from-home visit to Asheville. You have your own private entryway. The space includes private laundry and bathroom. Sink, microwave and fridge, coffee maker, electric tea kettle. No stove. Small bedroom area with full-size eco-memory foam bed and additional sleeping in the second room on the full-siz

name: Luxurious Mountain Guest Suite Apartment
description:
Escape to our beautifully furnished luxurious apartment Guest Suite ideally located in a private gated community in Keswick Hills, in south Asheville, NC for the most discriminating travelers.

The space
Private Guest Suite Features: King Size four poster bed, Gas Fireplace, Fully Equipped Gourmet Kitchen (Coffee, Tea, Stove, Oven, Microwave, Blender, Spices, Toaster Oven, Full Size Fridge, Dishwasher, etc.) Breakfast Nook for 2, Private Bathroom with Tiled Tub with plenty of towels, shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, etc. We do have Laundry available in the main house if needed, (but it is not in the apartment).


LOCATION!!! Staying at Keswick Hills, a private gated community in south Asheville, is for anyone interested in exploring Asheville while being only
9 miles from Downtown Asheville and close to nearby amenities in a quiet setting.


We also provide a list of recommendations and have available local tourist literature

name: Historic Arts and Craft Home
description:
This beautiful 1925's Art and Crafts home is located in the up and coming River Art District and 2 miles to Pack Square and Biltmore Estates. I have two rooms that are rented independently. King size bed.Beauty and simplicity. We have two bathrooms but the shower is shared.
I do have an indoor/outdoor cat. Her name is Lupita, short hair cat and spends most her her time outside. Due to the Delta variant, please vaccinated guest. We have homestay permit

The space
The mountain areas of Asheville NC are known for the many beautiful arts and crafts style homes that are so popular in this area. Our home is cozy and reflects the added care and detail that home builders of the past took great pains to incorporate in their one of kind homes. Our home was built in 1925 and has just gone thru a complete renovation. New electric, plumbing, kitchen, bathrooms, and all new appliances. While the renovations were extensive the goal was to keep the old fashion charm of th

name: 8 min Walk to DT AVL! Hip, Chic % Sparkling CLEAN
description:
***We are taking extra steps to make sure our place is thoroughly sanitized before guests AND wifi is fast and reliable**

Historic neighborhood--walking distance to downtown, and Trader Joe’s! Come enjoy our beautiful apartment and see what great things Asheville has to offer.

The space
Our place is bright, cheery and filled with charm! It’s the perfect launch pad for your Asheville adventures. Restaurants, bars, theaters, galleries, outdoor concerts and so much more are all within walking distance. You can't beat this spot! We are located on a quiet street in historic neighborhood, just 8 minutes walking distance to downtown. There’s also a greenway at the end of our street where you can enjoy 30-50 min of greenway walking!

We are also only a few blocks from Whole Foods, Trader Joe's and Harris Teeter. This is a fantastic, historic neighborhood adjacent to downtown. It is also the safest neighborhood that is next to downtown. Stroll p

name: Romantic, Moroccan-Influenced Cottage
description:
The artist/owner built cottage is a quiet sanctuary located 8 minutes from downtown, the Biltmore Estate, West Asheville shops, an incredible bakery and restaurants. Enjoy handmade pottery, local art, all cotton bedding and fresh eggs within this adorable Moroccan-influenced getaway.
The River Arts District, French Broad River and shops are within walking distance. The Admiral and Bull and Beggar are fantastic. Owl Bakery, Hole donuts, Whist, Flora and Ghan Shen are superb. The Walk and Taco Billy - casual dining. Enjoy!
This is a legal permitted homestay through the city of Asheville. #16-05429

name: Walk Downtown private bath peaceful
description:
Private room. King bed. Private full bathroom. Guest have use of Living room. I am following airbnb for COVID 19 cleaning guidelines. Due to COVID-19 Kitchen and W/D will be off-limits. Guest will check-in using keypad lock on front door. I will be here, but will try to keep our personal interactions to a minimum.

The space
This is a super convenient location, right on the edge of downtown's vibrant scene.
This historic home is large and comfortable with everything you need to cook or relax in a quiet environment just two blocks from downtown, Asheville Yoga center, or UNCA.

This bedroom is on the first floor and has a beautiful private full bath. There is a king size bed with a fantastic medium firm mattress, walk in closet with cabinets for your things and a desk for you to work at, if you need it. Living/Dinning room, kitchen and a large front porch on the same floor.

The house is set back from the street, surrounded by trees and

name: Urban Getaway - Perfect Location
description:
This apartment in a fully restored historical home is located in one of Asheville's loveliest neighborhoods. A short walk to Omni Grove Park Inn, a mile from downtown, a park two blocks away, walkable restaurants, all makes this apartment unique. Check out the reviews.

The space
A brand new, Energy Star, one bedroom separate apartment in a restored historical home. Loving care went into creating this warm and homey space. It is located on one of the nicest streets in Asheville. Brand new kitchen with modern appliances, large bathroom with claw foot tub, super-comfy bed. Comfy futon in living area. Lots of afternoon sun in bedroom. Check out the pictures and reviews.

Pretty outdoor space with table and chairs and a ping pong table. Lots of on street parking, and off street unloading or parking with special arrangement.

Guest access
Apartment has own entrance and is completely separate from rest of home. Guests have full

name: The birdhouse.Sweet suite! Downtown Roof top deck!
description:
Sweet loft apartment just north of downtown. Walkable. Roof top deck and gardens. Custom tile work, earthen clay plasters and beautiful lighting. Near yoga studio, cafes and grocery stores. Private oasis in downtown Asheville.

The space
Walking distance to downtown.Private entrance, roof top deck, kitchenette,earthen clay plaster walls, spa style tiled bathroom and decks. Lovely space for two. Has a smart tv, AC and fan, free wireless connection. Ideal-situation to relax,explore & enjoy!

Guest access
Filtered water, great views, wireless internet

Other things to note
I live in an apartment downstairs with my darling one year old.

name: Walkable West Asheville
description:
Location Location Location! This house is in the heart of West Asheville, easily walkable to some of the hottest spots around (.4 miles to Sunny Point OR Biscuit Head). Two private bedrooms, one with a double bed and one with a queen bed, fully equipped kitchen and big back porch. Walk to everything in West Asheville, drive to downtown in 5 minutes, Blue Ridge Parkway in 10.

The space
2 bedroom house in the heart of West Asheville. Super convenient location with a serene back porch for sitting and eating. Coded door lock makes check-in and in-and-out a breeze!

Easy walk to the Westville Pub, Sunny Point Cafe, Oyster House, West End and Owl Bakeries, Biscuit Head, the beautiful Isis, The West Asheville Yoga Studio, and much more, including grocery, music, and clothing stores. 1 mile from The Walk and the award-winning Admiral restaurant. Less than 5 minute drive to downtown Asheville, and super convenient to the Blue Ridge Parkway, the Biltmore Estat

name: Private Home 1 mile to downtown
description:
This apartment comes complete with bathroom, kitchen, living space, and private driveway. Just over 1.5 miles to downtown. We strive to offer you a clean, comfy, and private stay. There is 1 BR with a queen size bed. If desired, there is room in the living to add two more mattresses which allows for the accommodation of 6 guests total (2 per bed).
There is a TV screen with roku, as well as an hdmi cable. If you’d like to bring your computer, you can stream from Netflix or Amazon prime.

The space
Furnished downstairs of a beautiful home in a nice neighborhood ONLY 1.5 mi. from downtown! In 2 minutes you can walk to one of the best breweries which is also a great restaurant, movie theater along with a seperate kids game room- The Asheville Pizza and Brewing Co. In 5 minutes you can walk to sushi, burritos, ice-cream, coffee, tea and fresh organic food along with a variety of other shops.

The apartment is a spacious 1000 sq. ft ground level fl

name: Lovely mountain home with a view!
description:
Linens and towels provided. You will have access to entire house. Nice, safe residential neighborhood. Secluded yet close to downtown. Located halfway between downtown and the parkway in beautiful Haw Creek valley. 3 beautiful acres with stream.

The space
Nice room with private bath. Has FULL size bed with a comfortable Serta mattress. Linens and towels provided. You will have access to entire house. Secluded yet close to downtown. Located halfway between downtown and the parkway in beautiful Haw Creek valley. Retreat like setting on 3 beautiful acres with stream. Relax on the front porch or back patio and watch the animals. WiFi but no TV. Very quiet and relaxing. Fragrance free and smoke free. Comfortable, clean and affordable.
Also even though I have no pets, I dog sit occasionally. So if you prefer no pets, please check with me first.
It's about a 10 minute drive to downtown so you will need a car. Nearest bus stop is a mile away,

Would

name: Private, Downtown & River Arts
description:
This cozy room has a comfortable queen-sized bed, a private bathroom, and your own entrance. Walkable to Downtown and the River Arts District. Very close to the Biltmore Estate and West Asheville. Easy parking. People of Color & white people welcome; LGBTQ & straight friendly. Dogs too, but not on the bed. (Read our pet policy below!)

The space
Simple, clean and comfy w/ queen-sized bed, private bath, good shower, fridge, microwave, French press, coffee & tea, & wireless internet. Breakfast is on your own, but why eat in your room when Foodtopia awaits you?

We are LGBTQ and straight friendly. People of Color and white people are welcome.

Our home is a land partner in Patchwork Urban Farms growing perennial food forest. We’ve prioritized cultivating pollinator habitat and building soil over manicuring a lawn.

We are an easy walk or bike to the River Arts District (less than 1/2 mile) and Downtown (1/2 mile to Southslo

name: #2 Blue Ridge Room at Oakland Cottage B&B
description:
Oakland Cottage is an Asheville historic home, circa 1910, perfect for your Vacation-In-Asheville. The 5,000 sq-ft "cottage" has been naturally separated into 7 guest rooms, each with private bath. The open common areas, available to all guests, create a warm and spacious feel.

The space
Blue Ridge Room #2 is on the first floor with a king bed, full private bath, coffee maker, cable TV, WIFI, extra sitting room and private deck, with stair access to the back yard off the deck.

Pets are welcome in the Blue Ridge room for an additional $15 nightly per pet. There is a simple pet agreement which must be accepted by the pet owner in order to bring a pet to stay with you in your room or suite at Oakland Cottage.

Pricing is based on two guests. There is room for an additional guest for $20 each extra guest per night.

Guest access
Access to the house is available anytime with a lock box code to the front door and private key
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Asheville Mountain Vista 3mi to Downtown Asheville
description:
The space
Just 3 miles from downtown Asheville, Asheville Mountain Vista is a convenient cabin style vacation rental with 4 bedrooms and 3 baths, outdoor charcoal grill and lovely view of the Mountains, especially in winter. There is high definition cable TV, wireless internet, washer/dryer, full amenity kitchen, decks, outdoor fireplace, off street parking.

Our location can't be beat. Asheville Mountain Vista is just off scenic Town Mountain Road, 3 miles from the heart of downtown Asheville.

The Blue Ridge Parkway is also conveniently accessed via Town Mountain Road at Craven's Gap (BRP MPM 377.5), just 3 miles in the other direction - by road or neighborhood trail.

This lovely vacation home can accommodate up to 12 guests and has 4 bedrooms and 3 full baths.

Extensive decking & outdoor patio extend the living area into the outdoors.

Amenities include linens, towels, Cable TV, high-speed wireless Internet access, t

name: Come Home in West Asheville!
description:
The house has awesome nearby restaurants, breweries and is a five minutes from the French Broad River. The area perfect for biking ,walking and has easy access to downtown and all of Asheville.
In addition, the following services are offered on site for your stay:
Massage therapy (Couples, Deep Tissue, Hot Stone, energetic healing and Reiki).
Whole foods cooking sessions and meals
Yoga Sessions
Please inquire for details.
We look forward to hosting yor famaily and friends!

The space
The Homey Home is a four bedroom bungalow built in 1922 perfect for family and friends to gather and share a wonderful stay in Asheville.. It is spacious with a living room with a yodel wood stove, a breakfast nook, a tiny balcony to peruse the newly andscaped back yard!!
Their are also great places to stretch out and do yoga or meditation
The house fully furnished with four bedrooms and two baths, with a great kitchen that has granite count

name: ❤VIEWS! Luxury home near DOWNTOWN close 2 Biltmore
description:
Less than 1 mile to the heart of Downtown Asheville, at the end of a quiet, dead-end city street and perched on a hillside with an opening that offers endless west facing views, sits this tastefully decorated, newly remodeled, 2 bedroom, 2 bath modern house. The house also has a bonus room that is used as a media room.

The space
New Tankless/On Demand Hot Water Heater, Plenty of Off-Street Parking, Central A/C and Heat, Wireless Internet and Cable TV.

Watch the sunset over the mountains on our, very private, extra large - 26' x 12' - covered deck.

The master bedroom has a flat screen TV, New queen-size mattress with 3" gel memory-foam topper, and walk-in closet. The panoramic mirror is angled to see the mountain views while your head rests on the pillows. This bedroom has an en-suite bathroom with soaking tub and Kohler shower tiles. The bathroom has it's own long range views.

Offering privacy, the 2nd bedroom is on the opposi

name: Town and Mountain Peaceful Retreat
description:
The space
* SUPERHOST STATUS FOR OVER 12 YEARS !!! *
Welcome to our peaceful retreat tucked under the Blue Ridge Parkway!
Our location offers the best of both worlds! With convenient access to the mountains and the town. We are located approximately 5.5 miles from the center of downtown Asheville (the review with a response saying 8 miles is wrong, but Airbnb will not let me change it), with its quaint restaurants and coffee shops, and a country mountain road drive up to the Blue Ridge Parkway with inviting trails and spectacular views of the Blue Ridge and Great Smokey Mountains. The Biltmore Estate and Winery is very close by and a great way to spend the day. Also, Beaver Lake is right at your doorstep with a great walking path. Pisgah National Forest and the Great Smokey Mountain National Forest are both nearby with lots of outdoor recreation and adventure activities.
Outside makes this home a great mountain vacation setting with the small stream that runs

name: Sunset Cottage - year round views, 3 mi to DT AVL
description:
Sunset Cottage is a charming 1960s rancher with incredible year round views. There are two bedrooms, one with a King bed and a Twin bed, and one with a Queen bed and a Twin bed for up to 6 guests, and one full bath. Amenities include WIFI, cable TV, full amenity kitchen, washer/dryer, extra large back deck with charcoal grill & best sunsets in town! Located just 3 short miles to Downtown Asheville, in a quiet & private neighborhood with easy access to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
Sunset Cottage faces west, so enjoy sunsets from the many windowed kitchen/dining and large back deck. The two bedrooms and full bath are a nice size for two couples to share or for families wanting their own space. Each bedroom has a Queen bed and twin bed for a capacity of 6 guests.
All linens are provided, Cable TV, wireless Internet. Washer/dryer, full amenity kitchen, back deck with grill (garage is not available to guests). Cell phone service works well for most, if n

name: Asheville artist  bungalow. 3 minutes to downtown
description:
1 queen bed with bath in small shared 1920s Bungalow . Woodstove, organic garden, Large yard filled with large scale sculpture. Quiet neighborhood. 5 minutes to the beautiful scenic blue ridge parkway, 5 min drive to downtown Asheville.

The space
The private room has a queen bed and an extra futon mattress if needed. There is also a rocking chair and desk.

Your private bathroom has the essential amenities as well as a shower and bath.

The open space in the house features a wood burning stove, lots of plant life, sitting area and a dining table.

The kitchen is open for you to use. We usually cook our meals at home and you are welcome to join us if you are interested.

The patio and yard are great features on the house. The patio has soft lighting for the evenings and a BBQ to use. We have a large yard where you can find an organic garden, sculptures, a hammock and sometimes even a pingpong table.

We welco

name: West A'ville sanctuary in the trees
description:
Beautiful, cozy and quiet.

The space
Corona virus COVID-19 note: rest assured our studio apartment is thoroughly disinfected and all items are re-washed and dried w/ high heat in between each reservation.

A peaceful retreat awaits you in the trees just outside of West Asheville's "locals" downtown! Walkable to Haywood Rd and all our excellent neighborhood restaurants, art and yoga studios, farmers market and pubs. Note: Our house is in a dense suburban residential neighborhood and not outside of town. We have neighbors on all sides but we are lucky that our house is in an urban forest that affords privacy.

The studio apartment is below the main house which has its own entrance and outdoor space. Our family lives above and we are very respectful of your privacy. The studio is SMALL one room space (12x15) but well equipped with a hot plate, under counter fridge, small table and 2 chairs and a queen size bed. You have your own small bathroom w

name: Comfy Home in W.AVL
description:
Two bedrooms available in my home in the Emma neighborhood of West Asheville. The location is perfect for getting into West Asheville, the River Arts District, less than five miles to downtown and there is always hiking or tubing (depending on the time of year) on the French Broad River. After a day in town, sit back and relax on the front porch listening to the mockingbirds.

(FYI - I am staying elsewhere on the property at this time).

The space
I have a cozy house with two bedrooms to offer to travelers who come to visit Asheville. Check out the funk of the Asheville scene; music, art, restaurants, breweries and of course the glorious mountains. My little home is located 4.5 short miles from downtown and about 2 miles from the River Arts District.

The master bedroom provides a queen sized bed, while the guest room offers a full . Each room has a closet and dresser, there is a single bathroom. You will also have access to the washer an

name: "ZenShe" Private Guest Quarters and Entrance
description:
Very Clean,
Very Private
Very Affordable
And Very Zen

The space
You will be staying in peaceful, quiet, light filled private 1 Bedroom Master Suite with QUEEN size bed, large spa like Bath, with a totally private entrance and hallway in the hub of West Asheville. We have also provided you with an off the street private driveway to park your car which is located a few feet from the gate entrance to ZenShe. This guest suite (ZenShe) is in the main house but does NOT visually share any part of the of owners quarters. Home owners enter through their front door and through a vestibule into their home. Airbnb guest enter through the side entrance of the home into a hall way leading to the guest suite. The Airbnb guest suite and the homeowners living space are separated by two sets of French doors. Any sound you might hear are just homeowners coming and going through their vestibule as they enter or leave their home. Loughlin, the owners senior d

name: Asheville Montford Cottage, Walk To Town, 30 Days
description:
My romantic house is warm,comfortable & beautiful, filled with antiques& local art,stocked kitchen, in quite tranquil setting,has a large privacy fenced yard with majestic Oaks, wood burning fireplace in the family room, front porch with swing and outdoor dining area on patio.

The space
A taste of Real Asheville! This Arts and Crafts cottage is located in possibly the most popular area of Asheville, Montford. One of the most beautiful and largest historic districts in the state of North Carolina, filled with beautiful landscaping and structures, many of which were built between 1890 and 1925, reflecting Victorian, Tudor, Colonial Revival, Arts and Craft and Georgian architectural styles.
My home is 2000sq ft and provides lots of privacy. Decorated with many beautiful antiques and works of local artist, has hardwood floors and rugs and is filled with lots of beautiful natural light. The large den is very comfortable; with a comfy leather sofa, recliners

name: Montford Home 1.5 mi to DownTown
description:
Enjoy Montford & Asheville in my Beautiful Home. 2 main level bedrooms, both have Queen size beds with a shared bath with lots of Local Artwork throughout. Located in the Wonderful Montford Hills Urban Neighborhood. Easy access to downtown Asheville or a quick LYFT ride. You will have full use of main floor of my home.
This neighborhood has become quite popular since I purchased in 2000. Take time to walk in the gardens & surrounding neighborhood.

The space
Wonderful Montford Hills Home
Great Neighborhood/Downtown Location for when
You want to be right in town with EZ access.

Asheville is known for its scenic beauty, abundance of opportunities to enjoy the outdoors, fantastic restaurants supplied with locally grown food, craft beer and eclectic sights and sounds. Great boutique shopping and local music and art offer plenty to do if you prefer to stay in town. We are also friendly in the best of the tradition of Southern hospitality.

name: Urban Peace 5 ml from Downtown AVL
description:

^The Urban Peace Experience^ Bonus!

Newly Renovated-Absolutely Non Smoking - 700 sq. ft. Downstairs Apt. Totally Private. Contemporary Spacious Design. Indulge In Simplicity, in this quiet unique space.
Just 1/2 mile From the Blue Ridge Parkway!
And a 6 minute drive From Downtown Asheville!

Concrete caramel stain floors accented with sultry hand woven rugs and live plants. Wood burning stove for a cozy unwind. Comfy Euro lounger (opens into a full size bed).
Kick back and watch a 42in. "Smart" flat screen streaming Netflix, Pandora etc.

Open kitchen- Full size appliances,granite counter tops warmed with a Lyp

name: The Cottage In Asheville
description:
COVID-19 UPDATE: Due to safety and logistics issues created by the COVID-19 pandemic, the cottage is not available for booking. Please check back often for updates.

Corporate/temporary/vacation rental in North Asheville. Our clean, contemporary cottage is perfect for exploring Asheville! Relax in a calming environment, isolated from, yet close to the city. The place is your own. Unwind. [AVAILABLE BY THE MONTH]

The space
Note: Until the City of Asheville decides to join the 21st century, we are limited to a 30 day rental minimum. Contact us for information on stays of different durations. The Cottage in Asheville is a comfortable cottage with hammock and swing strung from old-growth oak trees. Located only 1.25 miles from downtown Asheville and only three blocks from UNCA, the cottage is the perfect place from which to explore all that Western North Carolina has to offer.
The lofted ceiling and skylight gives this small space an airy, open qualit

name: Serene West Asheville Home with a Mountain View.
description:
Entire home. Peaceful escape with all the conveniences of West Asheville. 2 bedroom, 1 bath home sits on 2 acres. Quiet neighborhood with relaxing views from the covered porch.

Uber and Lyft accessible. The house has easy access to restaurants and is only 1 mile to I-40. The heart of downtown Asheville is within 10-15 minutes; the Biltmore Estate is only 10 to 15 minutes away; the center of hip West Asheville is only 7 to 10 minutes away and River Arts district is just 15 minutes down the road.

The space
Our newly remodeled 100 year old farmhouse on the outskirts of West Asheville has two lush acres with mountain views located just minutes from hip West Asheville and downtown.

The house has 2 bedrooms available and 1 full bathroom. Bedroom 1 has a queen bed, Bedroom 2 has a queen bed, and the living room has a large sectional couch with a pull-out sofa bed that sleeps two. Full bath with clawfoot tub/shower combination. There is a full siz

name: The Cottage on Parkway Loop
description:
The Cottage is a cozy, light, fully self contained (small) home. It has all the amenities of a larger home, but with the comfortable convenience of a smaller space. It's just the right distance from Downtown, with the peace and privacy of a small neighborhood. All who stay have loved it, and we've had many returning guests.

The space
The Cottage on Parkway Loop is a peaceful, welcoming space that provides you the opportunity to truly relax.

If you've ever wondered what it's like to live in a tiny home, come stay with us and find out!

At 600 sq ft The Cottage has a lot to offer for its diminutive size. Downstairs are the living room, kitchen, and dining areas. A full bath with claw-foot tub with shower and laundry adjoins the living room. Upstairs is the master bedroom with king- sized bed and half bath. This light filled room is tucked into a dormer with large windows looking out into a canopy of trees. A small nook entices you to stay a

name: Blend City and Country at Lucky W Cottage
description: Wake up to a breakfast of super-fresh eggs after a great night in a 19th century antique bed with a 3" memory foam topper. This detached cottage is on a farm, and there's old-world stone work, a rock path, and even a Hobbit Hole awaiting discovery as well as many other outdoor areas. It is about 100' from the main house but is very private with mountain views. Take a swim in the pool or visit the horses and chickens. Only 10 minutes from downtown and 5 minutes from groceries and restaurants.

name: Modern Meets Zen, Rest & Restore - West Asheville
description:
Want to experience something different in Asheville? Looking to relax & rejuvenate but also easy access to everything? My home is a hybrid of modern & traditional, Asian & Western, modern & cozy. Walking distance to many local favorites in W. Asheville, the feel & tone of my home is quiet, contemplative, & refreshing. Birds & butterflies abound the garden & yard. A meditative, quiet space. I #HostwithPride. [Please note COVID measures in place.]

The space
Enhance your visit to Asheville by treating yourself to some "zen" in a home in West Asheville. Completed in April '13, my home (which I live in, full-time) is where you can rest your body and rejuvenate your spirit. "Modern Meets Zen" is within walking distance to many local favorites - 7 minutes walk to Sunny Point Cafe (rated "Best Brunch" in Asheville) & Oyster House Brewing Co., 8 minutes to West Asheville Yoga, 12 minutes to Biscuit Head, West End Bakery, 9 Mile, The Hop Ice-cream, & 20 minutes walk to Kin

name: # 1) Downtown Get Around
description:
This historic downtown apartment is perfect for your Asheville adventure. You can not beat this location, walk to everything! Three night minimum but you'll want to stay longer to fully soak up the unique Asheville vibe.

The space
This spacious 700 square foot apartment comfortably sleeps four. There is a private bedroom with a king sized bed and queen sized futon in the living room. Guests should be aware that you have to walk through the bedroom to get access to the bathroom. Perfect for a family or anyone who wants a little extra space. Hard wood floors and a redone kitchen and bath gives this apartment a comfortable feel. Central heat and air.

Guest will have access to a big covered front porch and off street parking.

The kitchen has modern appliances and the basic essentials. There's a whole foods store across the street which is super convenient. The market is open from 7:30am-9:00pm every day and has a hot bar & salad bar, coffe

description: Sample one of Asheville's famous craft beers on the spacious front porch and soak up the balmy evening breeze. This cozy suite boasts a grand bedroom mural, a shared sun room surrounded by trees, and a woodland fire pit for nightly s'mores.

description:
Cozy Mother-in-law apt with kitchenette and private bathroom and entrance. Has a queen size bed and a futon that can be pulled out to make a full size bed. Can sleep up to 4 but more suitable for 2 or possibly 3.

The space
Room has a queen size bed and a futon that will accommodate 3/4 people. Also have small air mattress and flip-bed to accommodate children. This room also has it's own private bath, kitchenette, and patio. TV with Roku, dvd's. Please be advised that there is no cable TV. Linens and towels provided. Nice, safe residential neighborhood. Secluded yet close to downtown. Located halfway between downtown and the parkway in beautiful Haw Creek valley. Retreat like setting on 3 beautiful acres with stream. Relax on the back patio and watch the animals. Very quiet and relaxing. Smoke free. Comfortable, clean and affordable.
You will need a car as the house is 10 minutes from downtown.
Please contact me through airbnb if you need more informat

description:
Quiet delight surrounded by gardens. Near shopping, restaurants, downtown Asheville, Blue Ridge Parkway, and public transportation.

The space
Quiet delight surrounded by gardens. Near shopping, restaurants, downtown Asheville, Blue Ridge Parkway, and public transportation.Beautiful ground level, fully furnished basement apartment in mid Century Modern East Asheville home. Private bathroom with large walk-in shower, bedroom with a queen size bed. Linens provided. Access to secluded patio, expansive gardens, and laundry room. WiFi, Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime Video, and PBS. Quiet neighborhood with many trees, friendly neighbors and places to walk. Restaurant and shopping only minutes away. Public transit nearby. A short distance from the municipal gulf course and Blue Ridge Park

The large rear balcony, and back yard forest-like greenery comes to life with birds/critter's in Mid Spring/Summer. You also have partial views of the French Broad River, and a few mountain peaks. The homes close proximity to most of what brings visitors to Asheville, makes this home hard to beat!

The space
The house has tall 10 foot ceilings throughout and original heart pine wood floors in most areas.

Loft bedroom comes with a double/full mattress accessed via ladder, and also a single/twin mattress below the loft. The room is capable of accommodating two to three guests.

The loft bedroom also has a built in desk which is well suited for those requiring a traditional office work space.

Counter height dining table accommodates four in

description:

Keurig coffee maker, mini refrigerator, microwave, toaster, table to eat or workstation, access to washer/dryer. 50" tv/cable in bedroom-king bed. Opens to a sitting room for a quiet place to read in recliner or futon. Walk around access to huge back deck & use of firepit. COFFEE/TEA Continental Breakfast INCLUDED. 20 minutes from downtown Asheville, 10 minutes to Blue Ridge Pkwy & 5 minutes to WNC Ag Center

huge 17'x14' inlaw suite with separate sitting room between bedroom & large private full bathroom. 50” flat panel tv in bedroom. Sitting room has lounge chair/recliner and futon that can sleep a 3rd person ($45/night) or child.
You have your own microwave, coffee maker, toaster, hot water kettle for tea and mini refrigerator w/ ice, iron, ironing board (and washer and dryer if you need it)!

Guest access
Your private access to your sui

description:
Our home is an official, permitted airbnb so your reservation is safe!
We are located on the south side of downtown between Biltmore Village and downtown Asheville. It is a five minute drive to downtown, and 2 minutes to Biltmore Village and the entrance to Biltmore Estate. City bus stop close by too.

It is a five minute drive to downtown, and a 2 minute drive to Biltmore Village and the entrance to Biltmore Estate. The studio has a full bathroom with shower, and 1 comfy queen size bed. There is a dining area, and sitting area with flat screen tv, premium channel cable package, and wireless internet. Linens and towels are provided.

There is private off-street parki

Fun Bungalow in the artsy mountain town of Asheville, North Carolina. In the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains, the Blue Ridge Parkway, the Art-deco mecca of downtown Asheville. This is a 1 bedroom, 1 bath small bungalow.

The space
Small, modern bungalow right on the edge of West Asheville and Candler with quick access to I-40 and 240. An easy 7 mile drive and you are in the heart of Asheville's great restaurants, breweries and amazing live music.

Queen sized Tempur-Pedic Bed.

A really great place to relax in the mountains near all of the great things Asheville has to offer. Home is decorated in a mid-century modern design.

Guest access
Entire house, wifi, 44" flat screen tv, loads of free premium coffee and tea and much more! Easy parking in the driveway for one car.

description:
1917 cottage with a private backyard and meandering stream.Relaxing environment in quiet neighborhood setting.The host is an artist well known for her regional landscapes.Amenities include a natural setting 1o minutes from downtown Asheville, nearby tennis courts, restaurants,microbreweries.and close proximity to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space

The backyard is approximately one half acre bordering a stream and offers a peaceful and serene setting to unwind. I am central to all of the amenities in north Asheville as well as downtown. Your privacy will be respected always but I am here for you, ready to help, guide and to insure your comfort.. The bed is large enough for two and linens are clean and fresh. If you have an interest in the arts, I can direct you to the downtown arts scene.

The space

Private and off the street parking. This space is ideal for 2 guests. If you have a child or a third person traveling with you, please message me and I'm sure we can work something out!

Guest access
There are spots for 2 cars to park by the garage. We do not park in the garage, so no worries about blocking us in. We do have our garbage and recycling containers parked on the far side of the garage, so please allow room to access those! Also of note, there are bears

We have two acres that includes several garden areas and wooded land. It is an unusual setting so close to town! The guestroom is located on the first floor of a large addit

description:
Ten minutes to downtown, this clean and contemporary farmhouse still has a rural feel. It is on the edge of a 40-acre farm. There is ample outdoor space for relaxing, a walking path and picnic area. The inside is light, airy and open.

The space
The house is two stories with hardwood floors and an open floor plan. There are three bedrooms. The master has a queen and a full bath. The upstairs bedrooms are spacious. One has a queen and twin size daybed that pulls out to form a king. The other bedroom has a queen and a futon that folds out to a full. The house most comfortably accommodates 6, but can sleep up to 10. There is one full bath upstairs that the two upstairs rooms share.

Guest access
You will have the whole house to yourself, as it is a stand alone rental. You will also have a side yard and a loop road through the woods (about 1/3 mile on which to walk). There is also a picnic area with amazing views near the bottom of th

description:
Sunny home on the edge of downtown's scene. Best neighborhood for walking to town on the greenway and UNCA botanical gardens nearby. Pet and people friendly with a sweet backyard, big front porch and back deck. Monthly rate of $2500 includes all utilities, wifi, linens and a well stocked kitchen. Cleaning fee has not been added in advance so you can choose to do your own cleaning at no cost or add it later if you wish. Optional cleaning fee is $125

This is a 1920's craftsmen bungalow that has been remodeled with french doors opening onto a deck off the main bedroom, built in walnut cabinetry, updated bathroom and a good solid kitchen. Both bedrooms have new queen size beds with all cot

King bed, Living room, kitchen, W/D, Air Condition and Wifi.

The space
Welcome to this downtown apartment! I have been an airbnb hosts since the start, and I am very happy to be able to offer this large and private addition to guests wanting to experience Asheville city life without having to drive.
This private apartment.

The best thing about this home is the location. You can see the downtown Asheville skyline from the side deck (more in winter when leaves are down), but the back yard feels woodsy with tons

For budget travelers who want to be downtown! Convenient location. No frills and not a fancy B&B. A place with history, character & real people. One of several short term rental rooms, this second floor room has a queen-size bed, is air conditioned in summer, includes a mini refrigerator, sink, sitting area, table & chair, wifi. Lockable and clean. Bathrooms are shared with others.

The space
This is a second floor room with a queen size bed, sitting area, original fireplace mantle, high ceiling, large windows and plenty of natural light.

At the Gray Rock Inn, downtown Asheville is right outside your door, and our reasonable rates mean your money can be spent on enjoying the city. Conveniently located on Biltmore Ave. and an easy walk to breweries, music venues, art galleries, boutiques and restaurants.

The Gray Rock Inn is a great value

Spacious, single level artist’s home with indoor heated swimming pool, gardens, koi pond.
North Asheville minutes from the enchantment of downtown, restaurants, shops, golf, ziplines, rafting, microbreweries, galleries and Blue Ridge Parkway.
Gas fireplace, chef's kitchen, HDTV, Netflix.

Permit ID:16-00944

Guest access

Indie shops, great restaurants, small breweries, and bars are just a mile or 2 away. *We have 2 cats that visit downstairs when we don't have guests.

Full Kitchen with dishwasher and laundry in house. Strong WiFi throughout the house. Each of three bedrooms has a comfy queen sized bed.

The large living room has lots of seating, ceiling fans, games and a TV.

There's a spacious two-tiered back deck for catching some sun, and a covered porch in the front of the

description:
PERFECT FOR PROFESSIONAL OR CONTRACT WORK! It is well appointed, clean and comfortable. The space is private, and on a separate level from the main house. There is a separate entrance through the beautiful yard with, natural gardens and many happy birds, old trees, and a sit-down patio. Enjoy the

name: Victorian Cottage Downtown - "Green Room"
description:
A beautiful one-hundred year old historic home in the Montford neighborhood. 3 blocks from the center of town, 5-15 minute walk to everything.

The space
This home is a quick 5 minute walk from the center of downtown. This historic neighborhood is peaceful, yet only a short walk to all the fun activities downtown. This is the calendar for the Green Room. Fantastic restaurants nearby, the US Cellular Center, and St. Lawrence Basilica are only three blocks away. We are a 5 minute drive from UNCA.. You won't need to move your car once you are settled in, unless you decide to go to the Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village, 10 minutes away. Easy access to the Blue Ridge parkway, NC Arboretum, Folk Art Center and much more!

Guest access
This calendar reflects the reservations for the "Green Room." It is located downstairs next to the "Blue Room." The Green room has a comfy queen size bed and an en-suite private bathroom. A "roll-away" bed i

name: Downtown Artist Loft
description: If you're looking for a secluded mountain getaway this is not the place but if you are looking to be in the heart of downtown festivities then our loft is the perfect place for you! Our loft has local art, full window view of College street, high ceilings and exposed brick. We are right in the center of all the downtown action. You are literally steps away from incredible craft beers, award-winning food and regional music. Downtown is lively especially at night where you can hang out and see a local funk band or head down to the drum circle then sleep late then head downstairs for a massage.

name: Victorian Cottage Downtown - "Blue Room"
description:
A beautiful one-hundred year old Richard Sharp Smith historic home in Montford neighborhood. 3 blocks from the center of town, 5-15 minute walk to everything. High speed wi-fi and cable tv, mini fridge, coffee and tea station in each room, private en-suite bathroom, outdoor spaces for relaxation.

The space
You will be staying in the "Blue Room". This is downstairs next to the “Green Room”. You will have access from the front porch, the front entry room, your room with the private en suite bathroom, and outdoor backyard pergola with table and chairs, with relaxing furniture. This home is a quick 10 minute walk from the center of downtown. This historic neighborhood is peaceful, yet only a short walk to all the fun activities downtown. Fantastic restaurants nearby, the US Cellular Center, and St. Lawrence Basilica are only three blocks away. We are a 5 minute drive from UNCA.. You won't need to move your car once you are settled in, unless you decide to g

name: Laurelwood
description:
Laurelwood is an entirely separate, 2-room suite with full bath, part of a single-family home. Located in a quiet neighborhood, it has a private entrance, a small porch area, and off-street parking. 5 to 10 dollar Uber ride or 5 to 10 minute drive to downtown Asheville. No surprise hidden cleaning fee.

The space
The space includes a sitting room with a queen size futon couch, flat screen TV with basic cable, microwave, refrigerator, and a keureg-type coffeepot. Tea and coffee are provided. In the bedroom is a queen-size bed which was designed and handcrafted by the owner. WiFi is available. Laurelwood is a 5 minute drive from Whole Foods and less than a 10 minute drive from downtown Asheville.

Other things to note
Laurelwood is convenient to downtown Asheville via free way access. There is also a busline with a bus stop less than a 5 minute walk. Uber is often used by my guests.

name: The Hideaway, W. Asheville.  2 BR Apt w/ Hot Tub!
description:
Read our reviews! Price includes cleaning fee! 2 bedroom Apt. located smack dab in the middle of the bustling Haywood Rd. corridor on a quiet side street. Park your car in a private driveway and forget about it! Everything you could possibly want is a short walk away. Breweries, award winning restaurants, you name it! Enjoy some local brew and then come back and have a relaxing soak in the backyard hot tub. The Hideaway is inspected by the City of Asheville as a LEGAL short term rental.

The space
Two bedrooms (king/queen), one bath, spacious lower-level 1000 sq ft apartment with access to fenced yard, hot tub, and fire pit. A short walk to award winning restaurants, music, breweries, parks, artist studios, and shoppes. Registered with and inspected by City of Asheville, we are a LEGAL vacation rental.

Highlights:
Unbeatable location and comfort! Hot tub! Cozy beds, a large, climate controlled living space with cable TV, kitchen, and a co

name: Modern River-Arts Cottage - Near Downtown/Mission
description:
CORONAVIRUS UPDATE: For the safety of all guests, I am blocking my calendar for 7 full days between guests, and am following all CDC-recommended cleaning and disinfecting procedures for all surfaces in the house.

The space
Are you looking for a home base for your adventure in Asheville? We’ve got it for you! This 2 BR, 1.5 BA single-family home is just a 20-minute walk or 5-minute drive from all the excitement of downtown Asheville, with all of its restaurants, shops, galleries, and general awesomeness!

This modern yet cozy home is fully furnished, including all linens, towels, soaps, etc. Also included are ALL utilities, even the lightning-fast AT&T fiber Internet, which is perfect for working from home.

Located in the hip and trendy River Arts District, your Asheville abode offers a large front porch with beautiful sunset views and a fun, private spot to enjoy both the beautiful springtime weather and the mountain and river views.

name: Downtown Asheville 2 bed/2bath unit for rent
description:
2 bedroom/2 bath condo. This 1100 sq ft unit includes full kitchen with granite counter tops. Bamboo wood floors throughout. A private balcony with city view. Spacious master bath with granite counter tops, and tile shower. Spacious master closet.

The space
Spacious unit. Comfortably accommodates /sleeps up to 4 people with king size beds in each room. Air mattresses with sheets/blankets provided in the unit.

name: FREE NIGHT-10 Mins to DT AVL & Biltmore-MNT Views-6 KING BR-Biltmore Basecamp
description:
Come enjoy the beautiful mountains and delicious food that Asheville has to offer! We are excited to host you in 2021!

Easy 6.6 Miles to Biltmore Estates, 6.5 Miles to Downtown Asheville (10-12 minutes to either!). 5 Minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway! Uber and Taxi's service this location. Perfect home base for your group's stay in Asheville.

Outside:
Relax on the back patio, just steps from the kitchen, while cooking up family favorites on the large charcoal grill. Relax around the fire on warm summer evenings or cool spring and fall nights, telling stories and cooking S'Mores. Watch your kids play in the large front yard, wrap around decks or veranda. They can also join the neighborhood kids in bicycling around the cul-de-sac and other dead end streets.

Guest access
Easy self checking with combination lock. Come and go as you please! Self check in available. You also have access to all the home has to offer. (Don't forget you may nee

name: New Cozy Garage Apt/ Great Location
description:
True Asheville Mtn feel in quite neighborhood with easy parking. Pleasant comfortable. Full kitchen, 1 BR, hide-a-bed couch in living room. 1 mile to city center, 1/2 mile to 240, convenient to everything.
Your own Washer/Dryer in garage.

name: ASHEVILLE DREAM CATCHER 1BR, Office, Balcony, VIEW
description:
So close to downtown without the crowds & noise. Spacious, beautiful, city apt in quiet, historic neighborhood. 1 mile N of downtown Asheville. Huge BR, walk in closet, French doors, balcony, views of the Grove Park Inn & Sunset Mtn & a sunny glass enclosed office. Oak floors, lots of light, spacious rooms, king bed & 2 gas log fireplaces. Fully equipped kitchen. Hi speed internet. Great cell reception. Free, street parking in front of the house. Walk to restaurants, parks, convenient store.

The space
This spacious furnished apartment, located in a beautiful 1920's home, exemplifies Asheville living, very unique. Hardwood floors throughout. 3 sets of French doors throughout the apt.

Lots of natural light throughout.

Both the living room and bedroom have French doors with views of the Grove Park Inn and Sunset Mtn. The living room is huge with a comfy sectional couch and stone fireplace with gas logs.(operable September 15-April 15 only)

name: Unique 1-bdrm apt-hot tub-No cleaning nor pet fees
description:
This large, private apt has a kitchen, bathrm, living room with a sofa bed (double) and a dark & quiet bedroom with new queen bed. Your own driveway; off-street parking near door (no steps). The huge patio has a hot tub (open 4/1-11/15) overlooks wooded backyard (pups love it) & a fairway (city golf course). The central location (in pet-friendly neighborhd) is 5-min. drive ($7 Uber) from dwntwn and simple access to Blue Ridge, Biltmore, brewery, highways-yet worlds away for quiet, easy privacy.

The space
WELCOME! Your private driveway is to the right of the house. You'll park just steps from your door by the huge, covered patio. This is where you can sit at the outdoor dining table to eat a meal you've prepared in the kitchen or ordered to go (several fine choices nearby). description:
Rustic ART studio guest-shack in Asheville. Great for couples natural outdoor yogi artist bohemian types.
In West Asheville, rural feeling but only 2 miles to Patton Ave & 5 miles (10 min) to downtown. Private & peaceful. Certified Wildlife Habitat. Birds chirping & bunnies hopping. Decor of unique art, antiques, instruments, plants, nature. NOT suitable for parties. NOT suitable for ritzy guests. LOOK @ PICS & READ FULL LISTING! Click on more!

Currently closed for COVID. Hope to see you soon!

Art studio/guestshack modified modular separate from our house, come & go as late as you want.

Can provide a single floor mattress if needed for a separate sleeping space.

name: Private Suite. 10 min walk to Town
description:
Private suite with private entrance. Private Full Bath. Kitchenette. 3 min walk to Trader Joe's, and a 24 hour grocery.
10 min walk to Downtown Asheville. Off street parking.
I am following airbnb for COVID 19 cleaning guidelines.

The space
I am following airbnb for COVID 19 cleaning guidelines. Guest will check-in using keypad lock on front door. I will be available during your stay, but will try to keep our personal interactions to a minimum.
This 500 sf private apartment has a private entrance. Includes a kitchenette, with dorm size refrigerator, microwave. Private full bath with walk in shower. Queen bed. Also there is a 10x13 bonus room for hanging out, working on computer, and eating meals.
All Provided: Sheets, linens, towels, dishes, utensils, soap, coffee, tea, WiFi

Other things to note
1 off-street parking space provided.

name: Cozy Downtown Cottage - Close to Mission Hospital
description:
CORONAVIRUS UPDATE: For the safety of all guests, we are blocking our calendar for ONE FULL WEEK between guests, and are following all CDC-recommended cleaning and disinfecting procedures for all surfaces in the house. Our home is a 5-min drive to Mission Hospital. We offer a 10% monthly discount for all guests, and a 20% discount for healthcare workers/first responders to thank you for serving our community. Comfy queen bed, A/C and ceiling fans, off-street parking, outdoor patio, and great location with all the comforts of home!

2.2 miles to Haywood Rd (downtown West Asheville)

description:
Comfortable guest bedroom in our mountain home sleeps two in a queen bed. We have lowest cleaning fee in town, no security deposit, and private, not shared bathroom. The space
We have keypad-operated deadbolt locks on our entry doors for easy check-in! Our home is in an awesome, scenic, and convenient location: we are a short 15-minute drive from downtown Asheville, 10 minutes from the airport, 10 minutes from the Biltmore House, 5 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, and 5 minutes from Interstate 26.

Guest access
This rental includes use of the guest bedroom and bathroom only. Use of the front porch is also permi

description:
Good value! A simple place with everything you need, extremely good location. 5 mins to airport, 10 mins to blue ridge parkway entrance, 15 - 20 minutes to downtown straight shot. Walking distance to, super market, bus stop and restuarants,
Private little forest.
You have your own private bedroom, bathroom, your own fridge and living room with separate entrance. Kitchen is mostly for you we cook upstairs. Overall it feels like a floor to your own.

The space
Spacious one bedroom apartment in a nice quiet subdivision. Brick house. One acre land. Private entry to the unit. Lots of parking space.

Utilities (water, gas, electricity, trash pickup), internet wifi available
• Living room- brand new floor ( sofa, TV stand and simple

name: Cedar Springs Farm Apartment- Close to town!
description:
This old country house was built in 1915, it has been remodeled through the years. My remodel includes this efficiency apt for your bnb get-away.
Private Bedroom with a Queen Bed, bath & shower, living room & kitchenette. It was formerly an enclosed back porch on my house.
Lots of outdoor space to enjoy in addition to the cozy indoors.
Please view the photos for visual cues in navigating, parking and amenities available to you.

The space
This 21 acre property is located just 5 miles from the center of Asheville and only 2 miles from Haywood Rd. in West Asheville. We're 1 mile outside Asheville city limit.

I have chickens, dogs and cats, so if you have an allergy, or just don't enjoy animals, this is not the place for you. There is a small water-catchment pond out back that is home to an abundance of aquatic life. In the summer the night sounds of frogs, crickets & katydids may remind you of camping out. name: Beautiful 2bdrm apt in Biltmore Village, Asheville
description:
Our home is a brand new, 1,125 square foot, top floor apartment. It has an open floor concept with a lot of natural light. The apartment has been decorated in mid-century modern style with eclectic art and furnishings. The balcony off of the living room offers a mountain view where you'll see cardinals and hummingbirds visit our feeders. Guests have access to the pool, gym and free parking. It's a little sanctuary to come home to after a fun day of exploring the city and mountains!

The space
The apartment is very quiet, spacious with hardwood floors. It has a lot of character and as mentioned the apartment on the top floor. The first bedroom has a very comfortable full sized bed with a big closet. There is a full bathroom right next door. The second bedroom has a comfortable queen mattress and a walk in closet with an ensuite bathroom. The living room TV has Netflix, Hulu and Amazon. There is a washer and dryer in the apartment as well. Our neighbors a

description:

Finished (but basic) basement sleeps 3 with Queen bed and couch. We have lowest cleaning fee in town, no security deposit. Basement includes queen bed, couch, mini-fridge, desk, dresser, couch and spacious living area. Only minutes from Biltmore Estate & downtown Asheville, only 3 miles from Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
You will have the entire basement to yourself and not have to come in contact with anyone. You will be sent a key code for self check in. My husband and I live in the upstairs portion of the house, but basement has it's own entrance and parking away from our vehicles.

name: Nana's Place is minutes from everything!
description:
We look forward to seeing you soon! 10 minutes to Biltmore Estate. 5 minutes to downtown. 5 minutes to restaurants/ breweries. This is a centrally located two bedroom/two bath house. You will be able to enjoy city and mountain views from your private deck.

The space
At Nana's Hillside Haven, you have the entire home
Beds: One king and one queen
Expansive outdoor space

Quiet home- private entrance

Wildlife in the area. Please do not leave food outside.

name: The Cabin In Grove Park
description:
Kick back, relax, and unwind at this peaceful creek side log cabin nestled in Asheville’s historic Grove Park neighborhood. Truly convenient to downtown, this rustic lodging is thoughtfully set up for a comfortable & relaxing extended 30+ day stay.

The space
Relax and unwind at this peaceful creek side log cabin nestled in Asheville’s historic Grove Park neighborhood. This rustic lodging is surrounded by mature trees, a grassy lawn, seasonal gardens, and the sounds of Reed Creek. Inside you’ll find the vintage cabin thoughtfully set up for a comfortable and immaculately clean extended stay.

The living room provides plenty of seating around a large stone fireplace, a desk, and a single bed for an extra guest or an afternoon nap. You can use your vacation with us as an opportunity for complete escape, but if you’d prefer to stay connected, we include high speed internet & premium TV channels. In the full kitchen you will find a oven/range, microwa

name: Asheville Mtn. Retreat
description:
The house is located on Tunnel Road - which is a major thoroughfare in Asheville. It is a busy road with some traffic noise so please keep that in mind! It is 8 minutes from downtown and 5 minutes from
the Blue Ridge Parkway. Enjoy the shade on the deck from the 200 year old oak trees. Open kitchen looking into the family room with wood burning fireplace. It comfortably fits 2-4 people with 2 bedrooms and 1 bath.

The space
Your "home away from home" is nestled on a double lot amongst hundred year old oak trees. It is located on a busy thoroughfare with some traffic noise so please keep that in mind! It is cozy with a "mountain like cabin feel" as out guests have told us.

Guest access
2 bedrooms (1 queen, 1 double) full laundry, 1
bath with slate shower, full kitchen, deck, cable TV, fireplace, and wi-fi. We provide all kitchen and bath necessities. It is clean, cozy and comfortable! Access to the house is thru either

description:
Our quiet, studio guest bungalow is conveniently located walking distance from downtown West Asheville, and features a luxurious bathroom, spacious kitchenette, comfortable queen bed, work space with wireless internet, and off-street parking.

The space
Our guest house is quiet and private, with one of the most fabulous bathing facilities in Asheville -- the roomy double headed shower and large garden tub with mirror surround make staying here truly luxurious. Comfy queen size bed can be supplemented with a twin size trundle on request (please inquire for rates).

Guest access
Private, off-street parking.
Access to the yard.
Additional supplies available if needed - just ask!

The guest house has one queen bed -- but we also have a twin-sized trundle (please inquire for price) if you need extra sleeping accommodations.

name: Sweet Room & Porch, Private Entrance And Bath
description:
Stay in fun West Asheville , visit all of Asheville sights, and return to sit on your own private porch, or cozy up in your lovely private room in my cottage. In addition you have your own private entrance surrounded by garden.
Room comes with coffee( which is great in morning on porch) mini-fridge , microwave, and tv. ,queen size bed ,new private bath area. WiFi on porch also.
My goal, as a seasoned host ,is to give you a welcoming stay and as much privacy as desired.
Welcome to Asheville!

The space
Bedroom with private bath , your own private porch and entrance, microwave,mini fridge,tv, comfty queen size bed.

Guest access
Room,porch,private entrance, garden,

Other things to note
I have two kitties.. I keep them out of the guest room. They like to hang on porch sometimes.

name: Dog Friendly, 5 Minutes to Downtown, Walk to Yoga
description: Charming little bungalow in the heart of Woodfin. Pet friendly with no extra fees up to 2 well behaved dogs!!! Take Uber or Lyft & be in downtown Asheville in five minutes!!! Asheville Community Yoga across the street. 2 bedroom ( one queen & one full), 1 bath suitable for four people, WiFi and Roku, lots of board games and books to pass the time. Large fenced side yard for dogs. Back yard has deck, horse shoes & fire pit for entertaining.

name: Cozy Cottage by a Little Mountain Stream and Pond
description:
10 minutes from downtown and Biltmore Estate, this cozy little cottage has everything to offer for a quiet and peaceful getaway. Complete kitchen and bathroom. There is a skylight for stargazing at night or watching the snow fall in the winter.
A mountain stream tumbling right outside that flows into a natural pond.

The space
The cottage is nestled by mountain stream and property backs up to 130 wooded acres. Cottage is 10 minutes from downtown and Biltmore estate.

Guest access
Enter the Cozy Cottage up the long drive way past the pond and park in front of the rail road parking tie. Walk up the stone steps along the stone path. The little stream and fire pit area will be on your left. Continue to walk with the few steps to your Cozy Cottage get away. PLEASE NOTE: The Cozy Cottage is NOT in front of the parking area. Please travel up the stone steps to your cottage by the little mountain stream.

Other things to n

name: Cheerful Home In Historic Downtown Asheville
description:

The space
Guests will never lack something nearby to do, see, taste, experience! This apartment is conveniently located a mere mile or two of many music venues (such as The Grey Eagle, The Orange Peel, Harrahs Cherokee Center, Thomas Wolfe Auditorium, ...) restaurants (such as Nine Mile, Curate, 12 Bones Smokehouse, Tupelo Honey, Mela, Bouchon...) as well as great places to discover art (such as the Diana Wortham Theatre, Asheville Art Museum, The Blue Spiral Gallery, Thomas Wolfe Memorial, Malaprops Bookstore, Fine Arts Theatre...)

Other things to note
The cottage is fully modernized but has lots of charming historic character. Neighborhood is quiet. Property, which includes backyard and cabana, is very peaceful. Has a carport for covered park

description:
The Urban Oasis is a spacious and cozy 1Br newly renovated private guest suite with a private covered porch and hot tub, set in the heart of West Asheville. Walking distance to some of the best restaurants and shops Asheville has to offer!


NOTE: Due to the Asheville, NC. COVID-19 Virus STR restrictions some restrictions may apply!

The Urban Oasis is a recently renovated private apartment on the lower level of a 1920's bungalow home. It has one spacious bedroom, a reading space and work desk, one bathroom, kitchen and private porch with access to a large wooded shared yard.
Your home away from home has a comfy queen size bed, A/C and a kitchen stocked with an assortment of tea and coffee to keep you comfortable and cozy. A Flat screen smart tv (access netflix, amazon prime, hulu with your account), books, and games are available to entertain you on a rainy day! description:
Listed on other popular platforms at lower prices! Pets allowed only if you book on an alternate site. Enjoy a mountain thunderstorm on the charm

name: Peaceful Log Home with Long Range Views
description:
Come and relax in a peaceful log cabin 4 miles from Asheville and minutes to many other popular amenities.
Hiking, rafting, disc golf, shopping, restaurants and breweries are only a couple of minutes away from the cabin. Popular West Asheville is only 8 minutes away with excellent restaurants and shops if you do not want to go to downtown Asheville. Asheville downtown is only 8-10 minutes (4 miles) away. Biltmore Estate is 15-20 minutes. River Arts District 5 minutes.

The space
Our log home is only 8 minutes (4 miles) from downtown Asheville and popular West Asheville. We are very close to the city but our property has a very private, retreat feel.

Our home consists of three bedrooms with 2 full baths. Two bedrooms are downstairs and one upstairs. The maximum capacity of the home is for six guests including children. The home is only to be used by guests that are staying at the cabin.

Living Room
We have a Roku 3 player for your

name: The Henhouse
description:
A spacious contemporary home. Walkable to breweries within 5-15 min. In between the River Arts district and downtown Asheville. Private entrance through gardens. Dog lovers welcome, $20 per pet/night, plus a one time $20 cleaning fee. Pet fees will be requested via Airbnb Resolution Center. Wifi and AC.

The space
The Henhouse of Chicken Hill is a ground floor apartment. It has a kitchen and a full bath.
A single roll away bed available upon request. Two private sitting porches are located in front and back of house. Now offering Roku.

Private entrance down the steps along the left hand side of the garden.

name: The NEST Above Asheville, with Downtown View!
