We are so excited to be hosting again after a long break during the pandemic! We are perched atop a hill overlooking downtown and the river on a quiet, family friendly street. Just north of downtown (8 min) in close proximity to West AVL and the RAD. A deck outside the King suite boasts a view of downtown and Mt. Pisgah! Perfect for couples getaway or friends weekend. You will find comfortable furnishings and everything you need including recommendations to our favorite spots. Live like a local!

The space
Recently updated bright, sunny home. We loved living here for the past 10 years and imagine you will love it too! There is an awesome view of downtown and the river from our large picture window, a great place to cozy up to a cup of coffee. The home has been refreshed to serve you since we have moved our family down the street. The porch off of the master bedroom is an oasis in itself.

Sunny living room for lounging, full eat in kitchen with reverse

name: Romantic Vintage Studio— Clean, Near Downtown!
description:
A clean, tasteful, stylishly rustic, 1927 soulful studio apartment, less than 1 mile to downtown & UNCA, steps from Homegrown, Luella's BBQ, Asheville Pizza and Brewing Company, shared garden/yard w/firepit, hardwood and ceramic tile floors, original ceramic tub, King bed + day bed, fridge, sink, coffee. We now offer cable TV on a 30" flat screen, wall-mounted TV, with over 300 channels, including HBO and Cinemax.

The space
This quaint, stylishly rustic apartment, in a 1927 stucco house, has lots of character, (like an original built-in ironing board and original ceramic tub!) plus everything you need for your relaxing Asheville retreat. (Tub also has a shower.)

We wash all bedding between guests and spray alcohol disinfectant on surfaces to ensure a safe and pristine environment.

The property is about 1 mile from the edge of downtown (GPS map says .8 , 3 minute drive and 20 minute walk to the outskirts.) Hardwood floors, plenty of natura

name: Fabulous Studio 7 min to downtown!
description:
This studio apartment is only a seven-minute drive to downtown Asheville. Situated at the end of a cul-de-sac, the acre and a half are filled with both flower and vegetable gardens, a large fire pit with plenty of seating (bring your bundle of firewood or ask if I can get for you at a small charge).

The space
If we have NOT had any rain in days, the fire pit can’t be used as forest fires are a big issue in the dry summers. There are many spots to hang out in the yard, either on a hammock or at a dining table. Owned by a local artistic welder, I have sculpture surrounding the place! The studio is equipped with many options for cooking with both plug-in fryers, toaster ovens, and a two burner stove. There are also outside grills for your pleasure. Bring your own charcoal!

Coffee beans, chocolate, half&half, eggs, and fresh croissants await you.

Guest access
I live upstairs but privacy is complete with the studio having its own en

name: Private suite in walkable W. Asheville
description:
Sweet private suite in W. Asheville bungalow. Private entrance and private bath. Walkable to all the great shops and restaurants of the West side village! Quiet, dead end street and off street parking. Just a 5 minute drive to downtown Asheville.

The space
The fully furnished suite offers a super comfortable queen size bed, your own private bath, a comfortable sitting area for coffee and meals, and a lovely deck all to yourself. This new addition to my home offers warm, hand raked birch wood floors in the bedroom and lovely tile in the bath. A mini-fridge, microwave and electric tea kettle make you fully self-sufficient for a short stay, but kitchen privileges are possible as well. Many wonderful restaurants and bars are walkable, and your stay is just a 5 minute drive from the River Arts District and downtown.

Guest access
This is a private suite with its own entrance. Kitchen privileges may be arranged.

name: Bittersweet Cottage - It's All About The View!
description:
Bittersweet Cottage is a wonderful retreat from your everyday cares. The one-bedroom cottage is located between downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Parkway. We think it has everything you need for a relaxing getaway. We hope you feel the same.
We have been welcoming guests here for over 14 years. Scores of honeymoons, birthdays, anniversaries and, well, you name it have been celebrated here. Our guest books are full of nice comments and we hope you will join the others in writing your own.

The space
Bittersweet Cottage is a self-catered free-standing accommodation. The location is ideal. We are only 5 miles from downtown yet offer outstanding city and long-range mountain views. You can listen to the sounds of the beautiful waterfall while soaking in your private hot tub, feed the koi in the pond and just let it all go.

Guest access
Guests have access to the 2 acre compound. Feel free to stroll around.

Other thing

name: Everything Zen Asheville
description:
A charming & simple "Zen like" Japanese 2 bedroom bungalow with two queen beds and the best of both worlds; 4 miles from downtown Asheville while surrounded by rural nature. 1/2 mile from the French Broad River in the Woodfin neighborhood, just 4 miles North of downtown. Excellent WIFI!

The space
Both bedrooms have queen sized beds. There's even a bed for a 5th person. The house is full of cool Asian inspired influences. Clean, simple and modern. A true Ashevillian experience.

Guest access
Full house, with a well stocked kitchen full of tools, seasonings & spices. Dine in some, eat out some...but please, no fires in the wood stove and no smoking inside.

Other things to note
Sorry but, no fires in the wood stove, we have toasty electric heat for you and a heated blanket. Our idea of "Zen" doesn't include a TV...or smoking inside :) We just had the oven and linens professionally cleaned... WiFi works great

name: Forest Hill Bungalow
description:
Our home is located in the historic Kenilworth neighborhood located minutes from downtown and Biltmore Village. The upstairs space available for rent is a two bedroom, one bath spacious apartment located in the upstairs portion of our 1917 bungalow. The space is a perfect size for two adults with or without children. Occupancy is limited to four adults. The apartment has a private separate entrance from the rest of the home.

The space
Recently extended!!! Our home is located in the historic Kenilworth neighborhood located minutes from downtown and Biltmore Village. The upstairs space available for rent is a two bedroom, one bath spacious apartment located in the upstairs portion of our 1917 bungalow.

The space is a perfect size for two adults with or without children. Occupancy is limited to four adults. We are family friendly and welcome LGBT guests.

The apartment has a private separate entrance from the rest of the home. We strive

description:
Spacious bedroom and clean, private bath in a sweet bungalow with lots of personality. Extremely convenient location in a historic neighborhood that is wonderful for walking/running, close to UNCA and only about a mile from downtown. Next to great BBQ!

The space
Lovely, bright, and spacious private bedroom with adjacent private guest bathroom make your stay very comfortable. The bedroom has a writing desk, large closet, and wonderful original art. Perfect for one or a couple. The screened porch is nice for lounging with coffee, or wine in the evenings. A cat is in residence and is elusive but adorable. There is off street parking for a small to medium car.
Asheville Homestay Permit Issued and Up to Date

Guest access
Guests will have access to the kitchen, including a coffeemaker (and coffee), electric kettle, teas, a screened porch with comfortable seating, and the company of my friendly cats. Wifi is included.

Other thin

name: The Suite at Bittersweet
description:
Enjoy spectacular views of downtown and the mountains beyond from the comfort of your mountainside retreat. Venture into town or hike on the Blue Ridge Parkway. Either choice is only a few miles away and offer the best of both worlds.

The space
If a killer view is high on your wish list the Suite at Bittersweet will blow you away. The vistas of the city and Blue Ridge Mountains are simply stunning. Sunsets are breathtaking and not to be missed. Come visit. You may never leave!

Guest access
You can go right into the Suite anytime after 3:00 PM on you check in day. The key will be on the coffee table. Get settled in and then give me a call. I will come over and check you in.

Other things to note
We stock the Suite with breakfast items for your first morning. There are eggs, juice, fruit, muffins, coffee and tea. The kitchen is fully stocked and all linens and paper products are provided.

name: Charming Cozy Home near Biltmore and Parkway
description:
Welcome y’all!

I have a calm, sweet, private home available just 5 minutes from Biltmore Estate & the Blue Ridge Parkway and 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. The house sleeps up to 6 with 3 bedrooms and 1 full bath. The house is all yours during your stay!

Come enjoy and explore. I’m a longtime local and love to share favorite places to visit & dine, too.
I also have a listing for a King and Queen suite on the north side of Asheville by Grove Park.

The space
This listing is for the entire house all to yourself!

My husband and I want a beautiful and restful space when we come home, so we have designed it that way for you, too. The home is unique because while it is simply furnished, it is comfortable, clean, chic, and a happy place to be. We recently redid the floors, too. We are committed to the CDC guidelines for cleaning and sanitizing between guests during this uncertain time as well.

The house has 3 bedroom

name: Nana's Nest
description:
This is a 1920's Brick Tudor about 3 miles from Downtown asheville . Located right across from a golf course which is like a big park, great neighborhood for morning walks.Hardwood floors , woodstove, large kitchen.The rooms are large and comfy.

The space
I actually have two bedrooms that could be availble depending on which night of the week is needed. Both have Double beds and i have put small dorm size refrigerators and electric tea pots in each room. They also each have desks. Please check Nana's nest 2. Both are large rooms .

Guest access
Guest will access to the use of the kitchen and are welcome to use living room , I do not have cable but have roku with netflix etc.

description:
This large spacious room overlooks my small pond / water feature which has the added feature of the sound of the waterfall when you have the window open . There is a shared bath, and I have a guest refrigerator , and you have full use of kitchen.

The space
My home is located across from the municipal golf course which is like living across from a park. Great walking neighborhood.

Guest access
You have full use of the kitchen , I have a large kitchen with ample room for cooking and all I ask is that everyone cleans up after themselves . If you cook on stove please wipe down and clean after every use. And if you fill the dish drain with dishes , please empty and put away dishes so there is room for the next person to wash their dishes.

Please note that AT&T phone service will not work in our neighborhood.

Guest access
Basement apartment only.

CableTV now, with over 300 channels! Steep external stairs.

description:
Our beautiful home is on a quiet hillside, 2 miles N. of downtown. Enjoy the privacy of your own large room, bathroom, shower, entrance & fridge. Walk to trails, gardens, UNCA, farmers market, brewery, eateries & a breathtaking sunset/mtn view.

The space

There is a work desk, a breakfast nook, two end tables, a large closet to enjoy. There is also a HD TV with Amazon Firestick Apps including Netflix. In addition, there is a small kitchenette with a fridge, freezer, microwave, hot plate, and a washer and dryer.
You also have a private bathroom and private bedroom.
This is more like your own apartment then just a private room.
There is a new mini split heating/ac unit, so you have full control of the climate.
Private off-street parking for 1 vehicle.

Guest access
You will have access to

2br,1b, bugalow in Downtown Asheville. Enjoy the beautiful mountains views and stunning views of downtown Asheville from the huge double deck with koi fish pond below. Everything recently updated. New beds and Serta mattress. Secured by ADT security. 30 night minimum. No pets

The space
Walking distance to central downtown Asheville, with mountain and city views from huge deck. Located in established family neighborhood with newer residents moving into the area and restoring the homes. Our home is one of the most recently renovated houses and one of the nicest houses on this narrow city street. Neighborhood has survived the many transitions of downtown Asheville, while holding on to the charm of this historic downtown community. Come prepared to live like the locals of downtown Asheville!

Guest access
Entire house except storage basement. Access to entire yard. Driveway on property.

Other things to note

THREE NIGHT MINIMUM. I cannot seem to find a way to change the field that claims otherwise.

Guest access
Parking is on-street. However, the spot directly in front of the house is normally available for you.

Both bedrooms are upstairs with kitchen and living room on main.

Other things to note
Driving Directions

From I-240 West, exit on Charlotte Street (exit 5B). Turn Right onto Charlott

name: Urbane Retreat Cabin In town Asheville 90 DAYS
description:
CHANGE YOUR VIEW FOR WORK or RETIREMENT!

We welcome you with a tradition of Southern hospitality, modern conveniences and an unmatched setting amidst the beauty of Asheville. This urbane retreat where city folks could tap into their inner adventurer.

Lovers of log cabins experience our ongoing commitment to providing an unforgettable experience for our guests who have recognized us with their ★★★★★ Five-Star reviews.

Let our cabin be your home base to explore Asheville today.

The space
Part of the joy of traveling is experiencing places and customs very different than what we’re used to. Because truly, once discovered is never forgotten Asheville, North Carolina is home to some breathtaking places. Asheville has grown into one of America’s best drinking cities and one of the best cities to enjoy live music.

(I rent by the bedroom, please note the cost if using both bedrooms).

name: Chalet at Winghaven, Sunny Log Home
description:
The Chalet at Winghaven is a brand new, spacious, sunny log home. Close to Asheville and all its attractions, the chalet is surrounded by 38 acres of picturesque hardwood forest. Amazingly this private oasis is very close to shopping & restaurants!

The space
Open the sliding glass door of the spacious MASTER SUITE to enjoy the mountain air or relax with a glass of wine on the covered porch.
Sleeping in the LOFT BEDROOM with its own private full bathroom feels like being away from it all, up in the trees.
Guests of all ages enjoy the BUNK ROOM which is adjacent to another full bathroom which features a washer and dryer.
The open kitchen /dining / living space with vaulted ceilings and exposed beams is bright and airy during the day and cozy at night with a fire in the danish wood stove. Or if you prefer the outdoors gather around a campfire in the backyard for a perfect ending of the day.
Please note we provide split firewood for the wood st

description:
Our place is close to restaurants, breweries (walk to New Belgium) great views, parks, and art and culture. You’ll love my place because of the location, the views, the people, and the coziness. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
We are also about 10 minutes from the Biltmore Estate as well!

The space
My Space is a separate entrance apartment with a full bathroom. It is attached to our house, as are all Airbnb’s in Asheville. It has a full covered porch for hanging and lounging as well. Our backyard is accessible, but must be shared with Charlie and Lola our loving doggie companions! Come relax and enjoy all of what makes Asheville wonderful, great food and beer!

Guest access
The lower level deck is all yours. We have an outdoor couches and a table and chairs to sit and relax and enjoy the view. We also have a full wood burning outdoor fireplace, we do allow fires, but please ask before doing so.

name: Beautiful Kenilworth Jewel
description:
We are in the very upper echelon of guest satisfaction; a superhost for 11 consecutive quarters; over 1,300 guests, nearly all five star reviews; meaning there is no higher level of guest satisfaction.

Spacious, private and lovely, this one-bedroom apartment is on the lower level of our three-story home. Your own private entrance and deck. You’re in the woods but 5-10 minutes away from popular spots, downtown, Biltmore Estate, the Blue Ridge Parkway and River Arts District.

The space
We have had the privilege to host over 1,300 people as AirBnB hosts and are in the upper echelon of guest satisfaction as just about all of our reservations gave us a 5 star rating, meaning there is in essence, no higher level of guest satisfaction than what we have attained. A beautiful, convenient location and a dedication to the highest level of service are our hallmarks.

We were chosen by a senior AirBnB staff to be the place they stayed at. "The two o

Please contact us if you need more flexible check in/out times and we will try to work it out.

Enjoy a relaxing soak in our new hot tub!!!

we

Other things to note
There are 12 steps up to the front porch so not a good match if some one has mobility issues . There is no

description:
Prepare to get comfortable in this condo in the heart of downtown Asheville. This desirable location puts you walking distance to anything; breweries, amazing restaurants and shopping. Legally permitted short term rental with the City of Asheville

If you are booking over a Federal Holiday (memorial, labor, thanksgiving, christmas, new years) we require a 3 day booking and not checkouts on those days. We reserve the right to cancel your booking if you do not comply.

name: Convenient to Everything! Private
description:
This house is an even newer version or our other one. Both houses are immaculate, have gorgeous views and are extremely convenient to downtown and Biltmore. The houses have open floor plans and are modern with huge covered porches and three bedrooms.

The space

One has a queen and twin size daybed that pulls out to form two side by side twins (or a king depending on how you look at it). The other bedroom has a queen and a high quality futon that folds out to a full. The house most comfortably accommodates 6, but can sleep up to 10. There is one full bath upstairs that the two upstairs rooms share.

Guest access

description:
Two blocks residential walk to downtown and U.S Cellular Center, this 1915 house in Asheville's premier historic neighborhood is a five minute walk to Reed Creek Greenway, Whole Foods, U.S. Cellular Center and much more!

The space

Upstairs you will find a queen size bed, and two full size beds, a full bathroom with clawfoot bathtub and shower. There is a queen size futon on the main level. An equipped baby crib is in the largest bedroom. Sheets, blankets, towels and washcloths are provided. The main level half bath also offers a washer and dryer. The kitchen is fully equipped for cooking. There is a counter height refrigerator, and also a full size refrigerator down stairs. Filtered water is available through a kitchen sink tap.

Guest access
Guests have private access to entire house, with exce

30 All Souls Crescent ste 200 Asheville, N.C. 28803

Griffin's Lair has one 24/7 parking place and a loading area in a commercial mixed use historic property. A clot

The space
Quiet peaceful friendly setting

Guest access
Backyard, decks, fire pit.

name: Peaceful Mountainside Living
description:
Reside on historic hunting grounds of the Vanderbilt's. Located just 12 minutes from downtown Asheville. With generous acreage and scenic splendor, the solitude will revive you from the bustle of our creative community, yet you'll be within comfortable distance from all attractions. The space is tastefully decorated with private entrance, private bath, and your own deck to kick back and enjoy the view! The space

Home is located in a wooded area directly adjacent to the Blue Ridge Parkway, therefore requires some "bear-wareness"! The Private suite features a bright and airy romantically inspired bedroom with organic

name: Artsy/Zen Bungalow in W. Asheville!
description:
Beautiful, newly renovated 2 BR/1 BA, in the heart of West Asheville. Come experience all the charm and quirkiness of downtown but on a smaller, more walkable scale. There are coffee shops, local restaurants, bars, bakeries, a farmers market, holistic health shop and a park all within a 2 minute walk. 5-8 mins drive to downtown, kid friendly, sunny back yard.

***(House is split level with a basement apartment below in which owners live -separate entrance- well soundproofed.)

Our home is at the heart of West Asheville, on Vermont Avenue, lovingly known by the locals as "Best Asheville". It has all the charm and quirkiness of downtown but on a smaller, more walkable scale. There are coffee shops, local restaurants, bars, bakeries, a farmers market, grocer, holistic health shop and a park all within a 2 minute walk. So whether you want to stay at home with your loved ones or go out and enjoy the nightlife, there is something for everyone!<

Hundreds of guests have enjoyed their stay at the "Pink House" where Tim Rice (Host) will provide you a "Legendary Guest Experience"

name: The AshVilla- Prime West Asheville location

Private 1 bed 1 bath all to yourself!

If you have a fever, shortness of breath, or any cold symptoms within the past 2 weeks or have been exposed to any one with (or suspected) COVID symptoms within the past month, we are unable to host you at this time.

Your home away from home also has A/C and a kitchen stocked with an assortment of tea and coffee to keep you comfortable and cozy. name: Historic Montford -  Walk to town!
description:
Historic Montford Area and only 1/2 a mile to town!

This spacious home has three porches and a gorgeous backyard with a fire-pit!

Sleeping arrangements:
Master: 1 king bed
Attic loft : 3 Queen beds plus another two queen sofa beds one in the living room and one in the playroom.

This bohemian styled home is perfect for families and groups who want to experience Asheville's finest.

The space
COVID Notice:
We want you to known that we are doing our part to help our guests stay safe by cleaning and desinfecting frequently touched surfaces (light switches, door knobs, cabinet handles, remotes, etc) before you check in.

We have also added a wall dispenser with hand sanitizer at the entrance for your use when entering premises, aside from providing cleaning supplies for your use.

About the property:

This Arts and Craft home was built in 1905 by the famous Biltmore's Architect Richard Smith.

name: Explore the Woods from a Quiet Apartment near Sierra Nevada
description:
Lie back on the blue chairs in the covered deck area and gaze out at the trees at the rear of the property. This inviting garage apartment has recently been renovated and has a cool open design. The living room has a nook with built-in bunk beds.

Pets are allowed with a $50/pet fee. A payment request will be sent through Airbnb a day prior to your stay.

name: Charming  Montford Apartment ~Walk Downtown
description:
This large basement apartment has twelve windows and 8-foot ceilings. Located on a peaceful street in the desirable Montford area. Walk everywhere if you love to explore on foot. Otherwise, drive/Uber or Lyft in a few minutes! This place is a well cared for, in a great neighborhood. It is an excellent choice for budget travelers.

All Day Darling (great breakfast and lunch spot just up the street) -- 10 minute walk
Downtown Asheville -- 15-20 minute walk
River Arts District -- 25 minute walk

The space
It is well kept and spacious, with lots of light, and located in a great neighborhood in Asheville. For those who love to walk this location is very walk able. It is also a five minute drive or Uber/Lyft ride into downtown. This one bedroom apartment is spacious and has everything you need for a long or short stay.

The apartment easily accommodates two people, with a queen bed. There is a convertible couch in the living room if you pr

name: Buried in Woods- Full of Art/ Style
description:
10 min. to downtown/Biltmore & 5 min from BRP, i40, & 240.

Unique private home surrounded by trees w/ great art collection, wood stove, well equipped kitchen, pool table, custom bar.

Upstairs— 2 rooms w/ queens & 1 w/ king & private bath.

Downstairs— an expansive suite w/ private bath & a queen bed.

Outside— covered porch in front, deck in back w/ grill, table w/ umbrella & fire pit.

In back woods— screened-in sleeping/yoga building & a deck w/ bog & chairs.

The space
A designer by trade, I have spent over 10 years (living in &) customizing this home with contemporary finishes and unique details. You will be surrounded by original art, stylish decor and quality appliances.

KITCHEN
The updated kitchen boasts concrete counter tops, and acid-washed copper back splashes with a granite island and a propane cook top.

LIVING ROOM
There are wood floors and high ceilings with a contem

name: The Tarot House
description:
Roomy two-story 1917 Craftsman bungalow. Step back in time... the "guest suite" has air conditioning, but not much else here has changed since the days of TB Sanitariums, when folks came to Asheville for the healing mountain air. This is a true home base for your exploration of Asheville.

Centrally located on a quiet residential street, only a few blocks from restaurants & shops.

The space
You and the members of your group will be my only guests at any given time. You will have private use of two adjoining bedrooms and shared use of two full baths, plus full access to all the other rooms seen in the photos. Shoot a game of pool, and make yourselves at home in the living room or on the breezy front porch. This space is ideal for a family group or a group of friends-who-feel-like family and want to save money at the cost of some privacy. You can also save money by preparing meals at the house. Pets share this home... allergy sufferers note! I will share

name: Private Entrance/10 Min to DT AVL/Dog Friendly
description:
For you I offer a quiet, wooded dead end residential street with an excellent location next to a sports park, close to Bent Creek & minutes from downtown Asheville. You will have your own entrance & a private bathroom with shower. The space is warm & inviting with plenty of room for your yoga practice & your outdoor toys. Dogs are welcome so long as they get a long with others. I have 2 furry friends, 1 pupper named Yeti & and an in/out door kitty named Madeline.

The space
The space is warm and inviting with a private bathroom. The features a Pacific Down Comforter covered in a Pottery Barn Duvet with a delightful selection of pillows (all bedding is provided). There is a microwave, mini fridge, Keurig system, a coffee and tea selection to get you started. There is a large desk at 2 chairs to be sued as a work space, table etc. There is a full dresses and wardrobe, an ironing board and table located in the wardrobe along with an extra pillow and blanket.

name: Solar House in South Asheville
description:
Great location in a very quite neighborhood on the side of a mountain. Beautiful sunsets in West. See famous Cold Mountain on the horizon. Private bedroom with deck. Shared bathroom next to private bedroom. Also half bath in shared laundry. Free high-speed 180mbs Wi-Fi. Use of kitchen and laundry. Off street parking. Cats live in the house. Please don't book if you don't like them or are allergic to them. One is very friendly; the other you will not likely see.

The space
Private Bedroom on 2nd floor of a passive solar house. Queen bed. Space for additional blow-up mattress and port-a-crib (provided). Shared bath is next to private bedroom. Desk in room and another on balcony above the atrium outside bedroom. Recently installed new flooring; see pics.

Guest access
Shared bath with hydro jet massage walk-in tub. Shared kitchen and laundry. High speed internet Wi-Fi. Share first floor dining and living room with TV. Room TV has few

name: The Rad Pad—Quiet Modern Nest 2 Blocks off Haywood Road
description: We are currently strictly following the CDC's guideline for CLEANING! The main interior room is bright, well-insulated, and quiet. The Rad Pad measures a roomy 600 square feet, with milk-stained wood ceilings and exposed beams. Refresh under a rain-head shower, with sea foam penny tiles underfoot and subway tiles covering the walls in the luxurious bathroom.

name: Mountain Beauty/City Convenience
description:
Would you like a beautiful mountain setting, but with the convenience of downtown Asheville only a few minutes drive away? Our tastefully-appointed apartment is situated at 3400' elevation, between downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
The private apartment, with its own private entrance, is self-contained on the ground level; no steps to climb! With the rearranging of a couple of pieces of furniture, it should be handicap-accessible for most individuals.

The bedroom has now upgraded to a NEW queen-size bed! Additional sleeping space in the living area on the rollaway single bed or foldout loveseat. Ideally the apartment will accommodate a maximum of three adults.

If you are thinking about staying longer than a weekend, but are concerned about laundry, we are happy to wash, dry and fold your clothes for you!

Please note: no smoking (including e-cigarettes) is permitted in the apartment or on the grounds. T

name: Graceful Heart Cottage
description:
Graceful Heart Cottage is a sanctuary home away from the hustle and bustle of major city life and the general populace. The cottage is situated on 2.25 magical acres with no street lights...see the stars! Enjoy Nature, Nurturance, and Laughter.

The space
Graceful Heart Cottage is a special place to retreat, have sanctuary from the infractions of the world, and be a place where Nature, Four leggeds, and Two leggeds can play peacefully.

Guest access
Parking, landscaped trails, a beautiful 1/2 mile walk to the end of the cove down the road. Doggy play time or watching the running of the Poms from the Bay window in the cottage. Shared driveway, 1/2 acre fenced in with cottage which includes an enriched environment area.

Other things to note
There is a $35 pet fee for up to 2 dogs per booking as the hair clean up does add to the cleaning time.

name: Downtown Asheville, Small Single - Best Value! -#7
description:
For budget travelers who want to be downtown! Convenient location. No frills, not a fancy B&B. A place with history, character & real people. Clean, comfortable historic 100+year-old rooming house with front porch, balcony, shared bathrooms. One of several short term rental rooms, this single, 2nd floor room has an air conditioner in the window in summer, mini refrigerator, sink, desk, sitting chair. Near front of building, across from music venue. Bathrooms are shared with other guests.

The space
This small room is perfect for the solo traveler, with a twin bed, sitting chair, writing desk, refrigerator and shelves. A large window lets in natural light (we have solar panels that do obscure the view, but heat our water).

At the Gray Rock Inn, downtown Asheville is right outside your door, and our reasonable rates mean your money can be spent on enjoying the city. Conveniently located on Biltmore Ave. and an easy walk to breweries, music venues, art ga

name: Charm n Comfort: 1 mi to Biltmore Estate, 4 to DT!
description:
A charming house just 4 miles south of downtown Asheville, 1 mile south of the Biltmore Estate, and 3 miles north of the Blue Ridge Parkway. The house has a large living area, a private bathroom for guests, plenty of outdoor living space, and is located in a great neighborhood! You have plenty of privacy as I am out and about a lot;)
I'm more interested in hosting individuals than couples.

Guest access
Access to both living areas, the kitchen, outdoor front decks/porches and your own private bathroom.

Other things to note
IF YOU INSTANT BOOK DURING THE WEEK, THE DAY YOU NEED A PLACE TO STAY, THE ROOM MAY NOT BE AVAILABLE UNTIL AFTER 430 BECAUSE i WORK AND MAY HAVE HAD A GUEST THE NIGHT BEFORE.

name: Sunny, Modern Apartment in Vibrant Downtown Asheville
description: Live like a local in this spotless, comfortable home, complete with brand-new appliances and plush furnishings. Admire the tasteful artwork, daydream on the sun-drenched sofa and sink into the softest beds in this chic, classically decorated space.

name: Sunny West Asheville Studio Apt.
description:
Bright sunny studio apartment in great neighborhood, eat-in kitchen.

The space
The apartment is furnished with a fully equipped kitchen including a full refrigerator, microwave, four-burner stove & oven, a coffee maker, coffee grinder and a toaster. It includes Wireless Internet, a TV and DVD player- sorry but no cable . There is off street parking for two cars. All linens and towels are provided.

Guest access
Guests have the entire apartment to themselves, there's a small porch and back yard that guests can use.

Other things to note
We do have a very friendly outdoor cat, Henry, who lives on the property.

name: Groove Stone Getaway
description:
Located only 10 minutes from Downtown Asheville, the Biltmore House and the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway in a serene Blue Ridge Mountains bedroom community.

Space for 5...but tailored to maximize relaxing comfort for 4 Guests.

Great monthly rental close to all that WNC has to offer.

The space
Located in a serene bedroom community of the Blue Ridge Mountains, scenic and charming Groove Stone Getaway enjoys beautiful mountain views and fantastic sunsets from the comfort of the large 3-Season room located in the private backyard.

With a fireplace in the main living room, you will feel cozy on cool mountain nights.

Your living room offers a 40" HD Smart TV with free Netflix, on demand HBO GO, and YouTube access. There is also a DVD player and plenty of DVD's for downtime.

Free high-speed Wi-Fi internet access is available throughout the house.

Your kitchen and dining areas are open and bright, in

name: West Side Loft- Cozy, Clean & Comfortable
description:
This loft apartment located in historic West Asheville is the perfect place to stay for a couple or solo travel. It has a private entrance with your own bedroom, bathroom, sitting/dining area, and efficiency kitchen. You'll have all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay. You'll be minutes away from downtown Asheville, the Biltmore Estates, breweries, and the Blue Ridge Parkway. The loft apartment is cleaned following recommended guidelines from the experts.

The space
In the bedroom you'll find a comfortable queen size bed complete with ultra soft linens and cozy blankets and a TV with access to Cable and Netflix. You’ll have plenty of space to spread out and unpack your belongings.

The efficiency kitchen is supplied with dishes, basic cooking utensils, dish soap, dish drainer, dish towels, washcloths, microwave and refrigerator. There is also a coffee pot, electric tea kettle and french press. Coffee and a small selection of teas will be p

name: Mountain View Charming Space Five Mins to Downtown
description:
WE CLEAN COVID CLEAN, leaving the space fresh and inviting for each and every guest! We now have a GERM GUARDIAN air purifier helping to kill airborne viruses, bacteria and mold spores, amongst other things! I couldn’t be happier. Beyond that, we always wear protective gear while cleaning, for both us and you. We ventilate the space before, during, and after cleaning. We clean and disinfect all surfaces, paying special attention to frequently touched surfaces. We vacuum and mop the floors. Shower mats are washed between guests. I am asking that guests bring their own comforter during this time (if this is too inconvenient please let me know and I will provide one). We have always taken pride in the way that we clean and have further enhanced such cleaning because we want you to feel safe to relax and enjoy your stay with us!

Every corner of this home is individually adorned with an eclectic bouquet of antique furnishings and inspiring artwork. Gather around a fire pit in a

name: Your Chic Mountain Getaway in the Forest!
description:
Tucked away in Asheville's enchanted forest..getaway to a charming, private, mountain retreat in the trees amongst wildlife & a trickling stream. Immaculately clean. Total tranquility, yet only 15 mins to Downtown AVL & Biltmore! 8 mins to Blue Ridge Parkway hiking. Perfectly relaxing & close to all that AVL offers...the best of both worlds. Clean, cozy, stylish home away from home. Off the beaten track in a peaceful, invigorating landscape. WIFI, BBQ, Fire Pit, hammock. A nature lovers delight.

The space
Escape to a magical oasis...where modern and luxurious comforts meet nature's beauty. A "choosy" nature lovers delight! A unique Asheville experience harnessing a perfect balance of seclusion, yet close to downtown, Biltmore, breweries, everything!! This is a quiet place to unwind, get creative, write or work. Relax with a local beer or glass of wine around the fire pit overlooking our tree lined forested property and a trickling stream down hill. Listen to the

name: Welcome to "Cozy Oak Cottage"
description:
Built in 1915, this one hundred+ year old cottage will be a wonderful place to call home when visiting the area. Being just one mile from Biltmore Village & the entrance to Biltmore Estate makes it a great location. Downtown is just 3.8 miles north.

The space
Enjoy original features such as the yellow heart pine floors in the bedrooms & bathroom along with many modern updates. Please note that there is no A/C in this house, but it does tend to stay cool during the summer when you keep the house closed up during the day. Allow the cool night air to fill both bedrooms and wake up to birds singing as you enjoy your morning coffee on the wonderful deck secluded among the treetops.
2018 update: I have added a small window unit A/C to the main living area to help reduce the humidity during the hotter times of summer. You will love the private wooded location that Cozy Oak Cottage has to offer, and you will be amazed how close you are to all that Asheville h

name: Downtown Asheville With a View - Great Value! -#11
description:
For budget travelers who want to be downtown! Convenient location. No frills & not a fancy B&B. A place with history, character and real people. Clean and comfortable historic 100+year-old rooming house with a front porch, balcony and shared bathrooms. One of several short term rental rooms, this second floor room has a queen-size bed, is air conditioned in summer, includes a mini refrigerator, sink, upholstered chair, wifi. Lockable and clean. Bathrooms are shared with other guests.

The space
This is a second floor room with a queen size bed, high ceiling and plenty of natural light from two large windows. Great views of Beaucatcher Mountain.

At the Gray Rock Inn, downtown Asheville is right outside your door, and our reasonable rates mean your money can be spent on enjoying the city. Conveniently located on Biltmore Ave. and an easy walk to breweries, music venues, art galleries, boutiques and restaurants.

The Gray Rock Inn is a great val

name: Stay in historic downtown suburb
description:
-Self Isolate in a lovely, sunny apartment overlooking a garden on your large, private deck.
-Located at the foot of Town Mountain, gateway to the National Park
-Walkers and joggers paradise- Nearby hikes and trails
-We are following all CDC guidelines for cleanliness and disinfecting.
-All linens washed w disinfecting laundry detergent
-All light switches, door handles, leavers, dishes, floors and surfaces disinfected.
-You can easily access walking trails from your apt.

The space
- 5 Minute drive to multiple, fully stocked stores.
-Nearby restaurants are open for take and delivery.
-Studio B is a sunny, spacious, recently updated apartment located in a lovingly restored 1920's artisan home. With room to spread out, there's a large living room, bedroom, full bathroom, and eat-in kitchen with dishwasher, fridge, sink, microwave, blender, and coffeemaker.
-Enjoy sitting on your private deck with views of a love

name: The Barn At Mountain Meadows
description:
Luxurious,Magical,Serene,Modern,Organic,Cira 1895

We are proud to offer the Barn at Mountain Meadows for your stay in Asheville.
This luxuriously appointed cabin is located 5 miles from downtown and less than 1 mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway.
Breathtaking eastern views and sunrises at 3500 ft. elevation. Borders Pisgah National Forest.
( New guests- Please ask about January/ February Special)

The space
With a list of features including

•California King size bed.
•Radiant heated floor (concrete hand polished with tung oil).
•4 person hot tub. Gaze at the stars , surrounded by ambient lighting and lush
plants ( Drained, Cleaned and refilled after each guest)
•Full kitchen featuring modern appliances , fully stocked with utensils and
everything needed for that chef or just someone that loves to cook at your fingertips.
Out door gas grill & Summertime Organic Herb garden.
•Granite coun

name: Hip Downtown Hideaway
description:
Come relax in our cozy downtown hideaway! This is a private and spacious 2-bedroom, 1.5 bath apartment on the first floor of a 2-story building. VERY close to downtown Asheville with stylish furnishings, queen beds, free laundry, central heating and A/C, full kitchen with dishwasher, stove, fridge, and microwave, lots of free street parking right out front, and TV's in the living room and both bedrooms! :)

The space
We are located just three blocks from downtown Asheville and a few blocks away from the South Slope area with its many hip restaurants, cafes, and breweries. The house is just one block from White Labs pizza and brewery, and McCormick Field, home of the Asheville Tourists baseball team. Enjoy exploring all that Asheville has to offer and then retreat to a cozy and quiet house in a residential neighborhood at the end of the day. Great for families, friends, or a romantic getaway!

Guest access
Guests have access to the private ful

name: Comfy home 10 min to downtown.
description:
Entire 2 bedroom house only 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. Relax on quiet country property. Make s'mores by the fire pit and snuggle up to watch the stars! We are super flexible and easy going hosts. We will try and accommodate you as best as we can in all situations!

The space
The first floor has large windows, stained concrete floors, 50" 4k HDTV with Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime, HBO go, etc. and a reclaimed wood coffee table. A laundry room with stacked steam washer and dryer. The full bathroom boasts a large tiled shower with separate temperature controls for the 16" rain shower head and the wall mounted showerhead with a detachable wand. In the colder months, guests can enjoy the heated tiled floor. The tankless, on demand hot water heater guarantees no one will have to take a cold shower. The kitchen is the focal point and features stainless steel appliances, a 36" farm sink, and a 5 burner gas stove. Seating is a kitchen island so you can watch the mag

name: Near downtown Asheville, BRP & Biltmore! Sleeps 8!
description:
This spacious home is nestled in a wooded east Asheville neighborhood just 15 minutes from downtown Asheville. Enjoy mountain views from the deck or drive 30 minutes to Lake Lure, 15 minutes to downtown AVL, and 10 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway and Biltmore Estate.

This fully-equipped house offers the perfect vacation combo: a relaxing mountain escape, minutes from thousands of acres of national forests, historic Biltmore, and downtown AVL

Relax with all the conveniences of home.

The space
Comfortably sleeps 6 and has 2 additional memory foam cots (sheets, pillows and blankets provided) as well as a Pack and Play travel crib (guests to provide sheets). Room for 4 cars - 2 in the front drive and 2 in the back (no street or sidewalk parking available).

Guest access
Guests will have access to the whole house except for the unfinished basement and the owners closet in the bathroom on the first floor.

name: Bright, urban chic apt min from Avl
description:
Sophisticated, serene, clean space. Legally zoned & permitted. Stylishly furnished apt in historic home. Industrial/modern/shabby-chic. Private patio with shared driveway. Fully equipped kitchen. Off street prkg/private entry. Convenient location, midway between Hendersonville and Asheville (10 miles). 2 night min stay-wknd rates

The space
See many more 5 star reviews on our listing at Vee aR Bee Oh . We opened the doors of "Das Peach Pit" to vacation guests for the first time in 2015 but we've been landlords for this former long term rental (and others in Avl) for the past 23 years! We are a legally zoned and permitted short term rental south of downtown Asheville. Named with a nod toward our house's moniker "Das Peach Haus" after my husband's lifelong nickname "Peach", this space is a newly renovated and furnished ground level apartment with plenty of natural light and it feels like a wonderful retreat. Open the doors of this former carriage space on the first

name: Female Dorm "Top Bunk #2" at Sharky's Hostel
description:
Dorm bunks at Bon Paul and Sharky's Hostel. We have a co-ed dorm, as well as female only dorm. This is the female only dorm. Please check our other listings should you need different accommodations. We have off street parking behind the hostel and are located in a very safe neighborhood. Our front porch is awesome, with a porch swing.

Self check-in starts at 3pm. Instructions will be sent after booking.

We provide linens and towels.

name: Private Room "Hitchcock" BPS Hostel
description:
The space
Private Rooms at BonPaul and Sharky's Hostel. Each Private room has a full size bed that sleeps two adults.

Guests have access to all hostel amenities: full kitchen and bathrooms, wifi and internet, common area and book exchange, and cool international travelers.

We are located in Historic West Asheville, walking distance to amazing restaurants, cafes and pubs, grocery, and Asheville's River Art's District.

Two private bathrooms are shared throughout the hostel.

Dogs are welcome for an extra $12/dog/night.

We are a traveler's hostel and therefore CANNOT BOOK TO LOCALS.

Self check-in starts at 3pm.

We provide linens and towels.

name: Cozy Cottage short walk to Downtown
description:
This 2 BR/1BA stand alone house walking distance to downtown and many neighborhood amenities. The home sits on a quiet 1/2 acre lot in the Chestnut Hills historic area and was originally built as a caretakers cottage for the 6 unit historic apartment house that sits in front. Fully Furnished, super comfortable and cute.

The space
Home is fully furnished and comfortably decorated. Hardwood floors make for charming space and easy care. Each bedroom has a queen bed, with bed linens included. Bath has been updated with vanity and storage. Kitchen is very large and was updated a several years ago with maple cabinets for cottage charm. It has full appliances (stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, over-the-range microwave, disposal), and all basic dishes, utensils, pots, pans are included.

Central AC (not all rentals in the area have central AC due to age of homes).

Comfortable living room has nice sleeper sofa and other furnishings, plus 40" flat pan

name: cozy bedroom in the heart of west asheville
description:
Have your own private sleeping quarters just a stone's throw from everything West Asheville has to offer! You can surprisingly enjoy a quiet walk down my street; however at the end of the street is Haywood-home to numerous cafes, bars, & restaurants! Additionally, you are just over 2 miles from downtown and 10 min from the BlueRidge Prkwy. In 'TheSpace' click on 'more' & read EVERYTHING under Guest Access, & if you have questions or need details, please message me via AirBnB prior to booking.

The space
Your 'home away from home' is a medium-sized dwelling which was built around 1930. Although I am an acupuncturist not an artist, I have been told that my home has a warm, artsy feel to it. Currently, I cannot afford a landscaper so please do not be put off by my somewhat 'wild' front yard. The house is in an excellent location & has an arts-n-crafts stye charm, without being extravagant! After clicking on 'more' & reading everything under guest access, if you ha

name: Downtown Asheville Music Lovers- Great Value! -#8
description:
For budget travelers who want to be downtown! Convenient location. No frills, not a fancy B&B. A place with history, character, real people. Clean, comfortable historic 100+year-old rooming house with shared bathrooms. One of several short term rental rooms, this 2nd floor room is directly off the balcony, facing Biltmore Ave, across from a music venue, has a queen-size bed, is air conditioned in summer, includes a mini refrigerator, sink, desk. Bathrooms are shared with other guests.

The space
This is a second floor, front corner room directly off the balcony and facing Biltmore Avenue, with a queen size bed, high ceiling, large windows and plenty of natural light.

At the Gray Rock Inn, downtown Asheville is right outside your door, and our reasonable rates mean your money can be spent on enjoying the city. Conveniently located on Biltmore Ave. and an easy walk to breweries, music venues, art galleries, boutiques and restaurants.

The Gray

name: Sweet, private, detached guest studio
description:
Private space all to yourself! Our detached carriage house studio is tranquil, clean and cozy - ideal for a solo retreat or a couple's weekend getaway. We are 5 miles from downtown Asheville and about 1 mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway in a small, quiet neighborhood in East Asheville.

The space
The cozy, shabby chic style renovated studio includes queen size futon with memory foam mattress topper, hardwood floors, a little bar area and a clean bathroom with shower. There is wifi & Roku. We offer a mini refrigerator and Keurig coffee maker for your convenience. Starbucks coffee, sugar & cream provided, along with bottled water in the fridge. The area is heated & cooled with a mini-split unit, and an air purifier was added in 2020. The studio ceiling is just under 8 feet, so please take note of that if you are tall. Weather permitting, enjoy the quaint deck area in our backyard garden for your morning coffee or evening nightcap.

Guest access

name: Sparrow Cottage
description:
This bright, cheerful, and clean cottage is a little home away from home! Walking distance to Downtown Asheville, local shopping, restaurants and night life and easy access to the Blue Ridge Parkway and surrounding attractions.

Please note: The City of Asheville is actively enforcing a zoning law that prohibits bookings of less than 30 days for accommodations such as the Cottage. Please contact me if you have questions. Thanks!

The space
Live like a local! Sparrow Cottage is a clean and cozy one bedroom, one bath house only a half mile from UNC-Asheville, Trader Joe's, Greenlife (Whole Foods local market) and Harris Teeter supermarket and an easy one-mile walk to the heart of Downtown with its great restaurants, galleries, shopping and night life.

The space is inviting, clean and bright! The front door opens out to a great front porch with a sitting area, perfect for a morning cup of coffee or evening glass of wine! The yard is grassed an

name: Wren's Nest Studio near River Arts
description:
Cozy, artistic, private one-room studio attached to our home (but with a private entrance) in a rustic wooded setting less than 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. Have breakfast on your own private a covered patio. Perfect for hikers, outdoor enthusiasts, kayakers, musicians & artists. And dog lovers!

The space
Cozy 235 sf studio with fully operational kitchen, full-size double bed, sofa, table and chairs, bathroom, large covered stone patio & fire pit all built for guests' use only. My partner and I built this house with our own hands implementing a lot of recycled materials from an old barn and an old fallen house. It's a super labor intensive, sustainable work of art that carpenters will appreciate. The house is situated on a fully fenced-in rustic acre. Another fence divides the acre in half so that guests and their dogs have the run of one half, and we have the other. The kitchen has oven/range, coffee maker, pots & pans, dishes, mini-fridge/freezer

name: Private Basement Suite in Walkable West Asheville
description:
Enjoy a private guest suite, separate entrance, full sized antique sleigh bed, full bathroom, and tv area with couch in finished, above ground basement. Keurig Coffee maker, mini fridge, and bottled water provided. All within walking distance to pubs, restaurants and shops of hip West Asheville and a short drive to downtown or Biltmore.

The space
Private basement suite with room to spread out! Bedroom, bathroom, and tv area with separate entrance in beautiful 1928 arts and craft bungalow in hip West Asheville. Walking distance to restaurants, bars, and shops. Short drive to downtown Asheville, the Blue Ridge Parkway, and Biltmore Estate.

Guest access
Basement has private entry and guests can come and go as needed. Basement is finished and has bedroom with full sized bed, full bath, tv area (antenna but no cable), and laundry room. If necessary, we can arrange for guests to use the kitchen on main level.

Other things to note

name: Mountaintop Log Cabin w/Pano View
description:
Minimum age to rent is 27. 5 night minimum June-August and major holidays.

Awe-inspiring views afforded by being near the top of the mountain. Minutes from shopping/dining in convenient South Asheville, less than 20 minutes from downtown Asheville & 15 minutes to Biltmore Village and Estate.
For hiking and nature enthusiasts, a 300 acre nature preserve with walking paths is steps away from the cabin. The great room has gas fireplace, leather furniture, rustic tables and a 50” TV w/ Netflix.

The space
One level living and open great room with amazing views make this log cabin truly unique. One king bedroom with attached 3/4 bathroom. One queen bedroom and one with two twins (trundle bed) with a 3/4 bathroom in-between. The wrap around deck overlooks the surrounding woods opening up to incredible valley and long range-mountain views. 6 person Leisure Bay hot tub spa with waterfall and lights situated on the deck for maximum viewing pleasure.

name: 25 Acre Retreat 9 Miles to Downtown
description:
Peaceful 25 acre property with grassy fields surrounded by gorgeous mountain views. Hiking trails, fire pits, camp sites, winding creek. Adjacent to federally protected land with more trails. 9 miles to downtown Asheville; near Warren Wilson College.

The space

name: Two Block Walk from Apt to Downtown
description:
Located less than 1 mile from downtown Asheville's center, Pack Square, our Montford neighborhood home was completed in June of 2015. Solar Powered & Green Certified we offer a one bedroom 650 sq ft apartment with private entrance, large windows, & safe off street parking.

The space
Nestled on a beautifully landscaped corner, our solar powered, Green Certified, stylish 2700+ square foot Montford neighborhood home was completed in June of 2015. We are pleased to offer you a one bedroom 650 square foot apartment area located in our ground level. The apartment has a private entrance and off street parking. It offers relaxed comfort with independent climate control and plenty of natural light from large double insulated windows and the secure opaque glass front door. The bedroom is completely private with two windows, ceiling fan, and big double closet. A large open plan living room & food area has a separate dining table along with counter/bar seating, plus a c

name: East-West Asheville Beauty
description:
Lovely tree-level apartment adjacent to single-family home, beautifully landscaped. Short walk to French Broad River parks, located in East-West Asheville. A few minutes drive from downtown.

The space
The apartment is new, with newer appliances and furnishings, a spacious full kitchen and 2 lovely bedrooms in a beautiful urban wooded setting. There is one bathroom with granite vanity top and a six-foot bath / shower.

The apartment is 900 square feet.

There's an ample private furnished balcony for bird-watching and relaxation.

It's an 8 minute walk to Old World Levain Bakery on Haywood Rd. A little further down Haywood are many charming shops and restaurants -- and the heart of West Asheville.

Home Grown (West) near the River is a 9 minute walk (across from the park) where you can have coffee, edibles, drinks, etc. and enjoy some of Asheville's best Food Truck fare.

The nearest grocery is 1.2 miles (Ingles, o

name: Lake view, Children-Friendly Cabins
description:
Excellent location to tourist attractions. Fully furnished & equipped kitchen, 2 Beds & 2 Bath rooms with 1 pullout couch bed (sleep up to 6people), covered screen porch, hot tub, stone fire place, wireless internet & cable TV, laundry facilities.

The space
The family operated Children Friendly Luxury Mountain Cottages.
Fully furnished & equipped kitchen, 2 Beds & 2 Bath rooms with 1 pullout couch bed (sleep up to 6people), living room, covered screen porch, hot tub, stone fire place, wireless internet & cable TV, laundry facilities. The cottage is tacked into a forest setting overlooking beautiful Lake Coma with the Blue Ridge Mt. serving as a breathing back ground.

Guest access
The cottage offer a beautiful, relaxing and naturalist environment around the Lake where you may enjoy puddling the boat, fishing.
It located 3.5miles/7minutes from Blue Ridge Parkway and French Broad River for further activities such as biking, hikin

name: Apartment 1 mile from  Downtown Asheville
description:
Newly remodeled basement apartment with great views of the mountains and a spectacular road for quiet walks or jogging. Beautiful, safe and quiet neighborhood within reasonable walking distance of downtown and the Grove Park Inn and Spa.
Dogs are welcome only if you list them and they are counted as an additional guest.
We are doing everything possible to maintain a safe and healthy space according to NC State COVID guidelines.

The space
Freshly remodeled and updated interior space. Private entrance with master bedroom and bath, full lounge/entertainment area with 53" LCD TV. WE have Netflix, Amazon Prime and several cable channels available to enjoy. There are two queen size futon couches for extra sleeping options. We also offer full kitchenette, with Mini fridge, two-burner hotplate, sink, toaster oven and coffee maker. There are basic utensils, knives, a pot and pan mainly for simple meal preparation. We try to keep a few breakfast items in stock

name: Cozy 2 bedroom. Short walk to WAVL
description:
My cozy 2 bedroom sleeps 4 lucky folks. Just a couple of minutes walk to trendy West Asheville and a 5 minute drive to downtown Asheville, your vacation will be filled with activities before you know it!

The space
My house is located right in the heart of West Asheville. A short walk will bring you to the best bars and restaurants this area has to offer. Check out the popular Sunny Point Cafe for breakfast (featured on Good Morning America) and if you're into craft brews you can walk to several local breweries!
If that isn't enough to fill your schedule, check out downtown Asheville. The arts and craft scene downtown is phenomenal and there is always something being celebrated in town. Take a ride on the La Zoom tour. This big purple school bus takes a comedy tour through the different areas of town, highlighting Asheville's extensive history.
For the outdoorsy type, my house is located a short 10 minute drive from the Blue Ridge Parkway and NC Arboret

name: Easy Walk Downtown - Sleeps 5
description:
Private entrance 2 Bedroom apartment. Lovely eclectic decorations. This is the ultimate Asheville retreat, while still being a short walk to downtown and many amenities: 2 Blocks to Vegetarian restaurant, Plant, 2 Blocks to Trader Joe's, 4 blocks to Elements juice bar, 4 blocks to Liberty Street Cafe, 4 blocks to Asheville Yoga, 4 blocks to Whole Foods, 5 blocks to High Five Coffee, 6 blocks to Downtown! Come walk our city and enjoy a beautiful space to come rest.

The space
(March 12 : Our professional cleaners have been taking extra sanitization measures with the apartments, such as using sanitizing products on surfaces and doorknobs and light switches). The house is a large duplex. Our family used to live upstairs (with preschooler and 2nd grader, Papa Eric and Mama Angie). We recently moved to Raleigh NC for a few years, while Angie attends graduate school. But this remains our Asheville home-base. We remodeled it when we moved out and are in love with the new

name: Soak up the Rays in the Solarium at a Zen Garden Suite
description: Bask in the natural sunlight through the clerestory windows, then step out to the backyard for views of Pisgah Mountain and wonderful western sunsets. Have a glass of wine or cup of tea in your private solarium. Explore the nearby River Arts district and Biltmore House, find calm by the maple tree among the birds, rabbits, squirrels, viewed from the solarium.

name: Log Cabin Near Downtown Asheville
description:
Town and country – best of both worlds. Romantic! Semi-secluded, 5 minutes from town, near Blue Ridge Parkway. Close mountain views from the wrap-around deck. Hot tub for 6. Fire pit in quarter-acre yard, chiminea on deck, gas log fireplace inside. Yard completely fenced & gated with playground. Cable TV, high-speed wireless internet. 1- and 2-night stays are available only if they are hemmed in by other bookings. Please email request for information about shorter stays. Dogs may be acceptable.

The space
Red Gate Cottage is a 1,100 s.f. log and stone cabin with 3 bedrooms – queen bed in master and double bed in second bedroom. Third bedroom flexible – either two extra-long twin beds or one king bed. 2 bathrooms – en suite master bath has deep soaking tub with candle sconces. Vintage cabin faced with stone and cedar on the outside and exposed original log walls on inside. Cathedral ceilings throughout are faced with pine planks. Three fireplaces: big river stone

name: WALK TO DOWNTOWN ASHEVILLE: Garden Homestay Room
description:
Welcome to my beautiful homestay! PREMIERE LOCALE: 2.5 blocks to the popular South Slope. 5 blocks to Downtown. 10 mins to the Blue Ridge Parkway nature trails. HOME: Clay painted walls. Gorgeous organic gardens. Peaceful environ. YOUR ROOM is 1 of 4. Sleeps 2 on a double bed. With closet, dresser, lamp, fan. Bathroom & kitchen are shared. NO AC or TV. Everything under 'Neighborhood' is an easy walk. Nearby baseball games can be noisy--bring earplugs. Read ALL details below before booking : )

The space
***PLEASE NOTE: We live in one of the most biodiverse temperate rainforests on the planet, ie: this area is teeming with life....including insect life. While our home is cleaned & vacuumed weekly, if you prefer 100% air-tight hotel environments, please do *not* book with us. We enjoy our old-home charm, open air living, the sounds of nature....and don't mind the occasional moth or daddy long leg. If this sounds good, please come enjoy. We'd love to have you! Otherw

name: #3 Downtown  Get Around
description:
This historic downtown apt is perfect for your Asheville adventure. It is only a 5 to 10 minute walk to downtown & convenient to 3 major grocery stores.

The space
400 square feet upstairs apartment. Access to downstairs porch. Bathroom is small. AC is window units, not central air.

Guest access
Smart TV- has a roku player with Netflix, Spectrum TV, and 6 HBO channels
Wifi available

Other things to note
Stuff to do:
In general "Best of WNC" (bestofwnc.com) is a great way to get ideas. The winners are generally legitimate, and there are a ton of specific categories.

•Take a stroll, keep an open mind, and let adventure happen. You will almost certainly run into someone you didn't expect to see.
•Start conversations with strangers. Asheville is rivaled only by the gulf coast for friendly strangers.
•Tune your radio to 88.7 WNCW, 88.1 WCQS (classical) or 98.1 TheRiver
•Play some pinball

name: Private Entrance, Top O' The Knob Chalet Suite
description:
Your own private suite, large spa bath, separate double shower, lounging and eating areas, private entrance, and deck. High-end bedding, pillow-top mattress, separate seating area, a dining table, hotel quality bath linens and bath amenities, and private deck/porch with lovely views of the mountains. Paved entrance and reserved parking allow guests to come & go as they please. Television, Netflix, Hulu, Epix, CBS, Streaming Cable, DVD, WIFI, microwave, Keurig, refrigerator/freezer.

The space
As we move into our sixty year with Vacation Rentals, our goal remains the same: To provide our guests with a safe location to stay and super clean accommodations. On top of that, we look out for you…we turn on extra lights when you come and go and we’ll help you with anything you might need while you’re here. We have over 300 five-star reviews from our guests across all of our vacation rental sites. Guest reviews also state that we are close and easily accessible to everyt

name: Walk to cafes, pubs, music
description:
Walk to Haywood Street cafes, pubs, breweries, music & shops
.6 mile to downtown W AVL (2 steep hills & no sidewalk) passing vintage and arts'n crafts homes & a small take a book library. There is a nice back way/marked bike bath from Haywood to festive River Arts District and downtown Asheville. Nearby trails & easy access to the Parkway. In a quiet, quaint neighborhood, this cozy cottage, deck & hammocks await. I am happy to host. Right off of hwy 26, 40 and 240. A forest deck with hammocks.

The space
Enjoy the deck overlooking a forest, relax with a hammock & hammock chair in your outdoor space. There is a Smart TV that you can use your own Netflix, Amazon, Hulu accounts or enjoy the included stations. How about some good ole’ fun with card games, or take a book from the book exchange in the game closet. Sip your fav drink on the deck. You have a blender, Keurig/K cup coffee machine with k cups & an abundance of tea options.
If you have a larger gr

name: Elegant, cozy, in-town, with  private hot-tub!
description:
Views of town AND walk to town, designer furnishings, luxury everywhere! Cozy and elegant, fully-equipped gourmet kitchen, quiet wooded cul-de-sac street, and lots of outdoor space to enjoy the mountain scenery. Dog-friendly! I have a gated fence surrounding the house so that your pooches can enjoy chasing squirrels with free range to run around the entire space.

Two outdoor seating areas and two separate fire pits plus a ping-pong table!

The space
My luxuriously decorated home does not skip a beat and will provide you everything you are seeking during your visit in Asheville. I have personally appointed it with furnishings and appliances suitable for full-time residency because it is my home and want it to feel like yours when you stay there. My past tenants are repeat renters and will gladly provide references about the details of the beauty of my home. I look forward to hosting you!

The master suite with ensuite bath and walk-in clo

name: Scenic Mountain Retreat
description:
Private 4 bedroom, 3 bath home with beautiful long range mountain views. 20 minutes to downtown Asheville and 20 minutes from Black Mountain. Spacious yard with fire pit and sun deck.

The space
This mountain retreat is nestled in beautiful Riceville valley. The house is clean and comfortable, and offers a relaxing atmosphere with the amenities of home. There are 3 bedrooms in the top floor. The master bedroom has a private bathroom and deck, while the two additional bedrooms share a bath. The master bedroom has a queen bed, the second bedroom has a queen bed, and third bedroom has a single bed. The kitchen is outfitted with cooking equipment and staples, the dining room provides lovely ambiance, and the living room has large windows and lots of light.
The downstairs section of the house has a bedroom with queen sized bed and twin bed, dresser, TV, and a small vanity closet with sink. Note that this bedroom has no windows. There is also a small bathroom and

name: Downtown Asheville-Great Location & Free Parking!!
description:
We are following strict cleaning and disinfecting guidelines established by the CDC. Safe, no-contact entry with key access in lockbox. Apartment is a quick elevator ride to the 3rd floor. Spacious and private 800 sf of space in the heart of Asheville. View the action on College St. from the living room windows. You are steps away from restaurants, brew pubs, & shopping. One bedroom, with living room (& Smart TV), dining area and full kitchen. All the comforts necessary for a long-term stay.

The space
Our apartment is on the third floor of a historic downtown building located between College Street and Patton Avenue. High ceilings, hardwood floors, and large windows that offer views of the mountains and busy College Street give the apartment an open and spacious feel.

name: Sheriff's Station - Historic House, West Asheville
description:
This historic stone house was originally built by the sheriff of Buncombe County in 1926. Made of local riverstone, the home is perched on top of a hill above the French Broad River and has beautiful mountain views. The large yard and wrap around covered terrace are great for lounging around. It is an easy walk to cool coffee shops, bakery, restaurants, breweries and bars in the hip East-West Asheville neighborhood.

The space
Guests have a private experience and stay upstairs where there is a large bedroom with a queen bed and a modern and clean private bathroom down the hall. You also have a private den upstairs with a mini-fridge, microwave and coffee maker and a futon for napping/relaxing. In the summer there is an air conditioning unit in the bedroom so you will be comfortable year round.

Guest access
Guests enter through a separate private side door on the terrace. You are welcome to chill out in the yard and covered terrace anyt

name: Serenity Yurt
description:
Come try something new and adventurous and stay at our yurt and enjoy the best of both worlds. You can feel a closeness to nature while not skimping on amenities as our yurt is outfitted with everything you need to have wonderful retreat.

The space
Living "in the round" will give you tranquility that will stay with you well after you return home.

Other things to note
You will be required to sign a rental agreement to stay at our yurt, a copy of which is listed under “house rules” in this add.

name: Cozy private furnished basement eff mins to town.
description:
Pretty little completely furnished basement studio in our Haw Creek country home on 3 acres. Social distance friendly! We can talk from the upstairs deck to the downstairs one! Very private. Quiet secluded woods yet only minutes from downtown Asheville. Joytul wood like stove ..actually propane, provides that mountain ambiance! This is a basement apartment with your personal patio area outside overlooking the forested yard. Lots of room to room in the woods with the wild turkeys.

The space
Peaceful and private. Listen to the owls at night. But there is high speed internet and TV for those that need more technology. Bear in mind my little apt is truly "country" even though we are only 5 minutes from Asheville. You will see a few moths who will want to join you inside, wild turkeys, and even the occasional friendly bear...(she only shows up on garbage day and is actually very shy). I say this as some folks prefer a more sterile and controlled environment and do

name: Mountain Views, Private Retreat, 15 min frm dwntwn
description:
Relax, Restore, Rejuvenate.
Our listing is not just a spare bedroom but a spacious, full-sized lower-level suite, located just a few minutes from downtown Asheville. We have a secluded, peaceful home on a paved, state-maintained road. You can enjoy 6.5 acres of private outdoor space, along with a steam sauna, hot tub & outdoor shower. We also provide easy access to a large deck offering spectacular views from almost 3000 feet - similar those as seen from the Grove Park Inn - only higher up!

The space
We offer a bit more room to spread out than the average hotel or rental space. This is an extraordinary contemporary style property with a full scale suite with private entrance that includes a queen sized bed, with a roomy closet, a small full bathroom, and sauna The adjoining living room has a sectional couch and pull out queen bed (up-charge for third and fourth person). The living room has high ceilings and similar views as the Grove Park Inn. On a clear

name: Corner Cottage
description:
In a quiet old neighborhood a short walk from downtown, this beautifully renovated bungalow is a perfect base for exploring Asheville. There's a porch with a rocker, a private deck with table and grill, and a nearby cafe. Ask about pets. Come stay!

The space
In your welcome packet, you will find suggestions on nearby restaurants, walks, cultural activities, and more! You are just steps from downtown. The Asheville area offers plenty of outdoor activities, from hiking to zip lines and canoeing. And for more information, the Asheville Visitor Information Center is just one block away!

Guest access
You will have access to the entire house.

Other things to note
Pets may be welcomed upon request. There is a $110 pet fee that will be added once reservation is made.

name: Apartment with a View
description:
Due to Covid, we have introduced a new policy, we will now only accept guests that can verify they are at least two weeks post complete vaccination.

Comfortable one bedroom basement apartment with private patio, mountain views and separate entry (owners live upstairs). The apartment is stylishly appointed, with a full kitchen and bathroom and off street parking in a quiet cul-de-sac. Close to downtown and within walking distance of Beaver Lake.

The space
Due to Covid, we are blocking off at least three days between stays to allow for thorough cleaning. The HVAC system serves upstairs and downstairs with just one thermostat, which is upstairs. If temperature needs to be adjusted just text us as we want you to be comfortable. Our new filtered (MERV 10 filter) HVAC system (8/19) is also equipped with a IWAVE self-cleaning air purifier bi-polar ionization system.

Guest access
Guests have full access and private use of the d

name: Perfectly cozy location 1/2 mile to downtown.
description:
1st floor bedroom with a very comfortable queen bed with en-suite bathroom in a wonderful location, only 1/2 mile walk to downtown Asheville. 1/2 a block from Trader Joe's on Merrimon Ave, Harris Teeter and right Behind Whole Foods.
Come enjoy the great food, music and outdoor activities that Asheville is known for. Free street parking beside or in front of front door across the street.

The space
My home is warm and inviting with all you'll need to enjoy yourselves. Large comfy Queen bedded 1st floor bedroom and en-suite bathroom. My bedroom and bathroom are upstairs.

Guest access
You will be renting the downstairs bedroom with en-suite bathroom. I use the upstairs bedroom and separate bathroom. You do not share a bathroom. Feel free to use the living room, kitchen, and lovely front porch.

The bedroom has a comfy queen bed, Large closet, a dresser, two chairs, suitcase stands, some umbrellas and a flashlight for your use.

name: Country haven, minutes to downtown, private pond
description:
Gorgeous 3 bedroom home minutes from downtown Asheville on two acres with private pond and mountain views.

The space
Enjoy privacy and restorative natural beauty with bright, sunlit spaces in a quiet and peaceful neighborhood 10 minutes from downtown Asheville.

Our home includes a modern kitchen with granite counter tops, two full baths with custom tile work, and hardwood floors throughout. The entire house is decorated with local art, books, plants and unique furnishings.

Relax and unwind on 2 landscaped acres with a private pond. A gazebo overlooks the pond and a trail circles the entire pond. The back porch opens onto a garden and patio with a grill.

Great place for a reunion or even a wedding!

Guest access
You have full access to the entire home, as well as two acres of lawn and trees. Enjoy the private pond and gazebo surrounded by a 200 year old poplar grove and lush mountain views.

Al

name: Luxury Modern Loft in Historic Central Downtown Building
description: Find your Asheville homebase at this chic and modern loft set in one of central downtown's beautiful historical buildings. High ceilings, brick walls, and original hardwood floors enhance the urban hideaway feel. Large windows let in tons of light and bathe the stylish decor in warm sunshine. Lounge and relax (and get a great night's sleep!) in our quiet and luxurious surroundings, before you go out again into Asheville's vibrant downtown scene which is right at your doorstep.

name: Blue  Ridge Cottage - Minutes to Downtown
description:
This private, comfortable, hand crafted home is less than 15 minutes from downtown Asheville and less than 7 minutes from Haywood Rd. Corridor (West AVL or "Locals Downtown"). Spacious nature-filled 1 acre fenced backyard offers fenced yard, ping pong, two fire pits and 200 sq foot covered deck ready to enjoy a meal rain or shine in our desired climate. Entire home has just been remodeled with hand crafted cabinetry in kitchen and bathroom. We feel fortunate to offer such a lovely space.

The space
This is a well designed side by side duplex with a staircase between each unit. There are no shared walls with the neighbor. We lived in this home for 5 years and felt the privacy of a single family home as do our guests.

Other things to note
Additional $25 cleaning fee for dogs.


4474

name: lovely peaceful room w coffee- central AVL east
description:
Peaceful, luxurious, private room in newer home. Tea and coffee provided... Zip-covered bedding. Close to local breweries, Blue Ridge Pkwy, Biltmore Est, highways. Wooded lot, rocking chair porch. Massages and petsitting available as addition.

The space
This is a very comfortable room next to a guest bathroom with granite countertops, up a stunning staircase with fresh hardwood floors. You are provided with a hot kettle, tea and coffee for your convenience. This is a newer home with a warm and inviting, yet luxurious feel. Across the street is a small neighborhood tavern separated by a big wooded lot. Sometimes you can hear people and music from there. Lots of grass in the .4 acre yard and even a swing set! It is a healthy space with a heavy duty mattress cover, box spring cover, and pillow covers!

Guest access
Enter through the main front door up a small set of stairs through a rocking chair porch. The entrance and bathroom will

name: Creekside Home Close to Everything
description:
