This one-time backyard work shop has been transformed into a gorgeous 2 bedroom one bath guest house with an open concept main living space. It stands next to a garden and creek, across a large, beautiful yard from the main house with a forest behind and to the side - a country feel that is just minutes from downtown. Please read our House Rules prior to booking. This is a pet friendly home, but please see House Rules for information about our pet policy.

The space
This 650 square foot home has all the upgrades you could ever want and is close to everything that is great about Asheville. Each bedroom has a queen bed with luxury style linens, ample closet space, and a desk with chair. The bathroom is very spacious, with skylight, laundry, and large walk-in shower. The kitchen is stocked with all the supplies one could need for cooking a great meal and includes a dishwasher, stove, microwave, and refrigerator. The open concept main living area includes a bri

name: Secluded but convenient cabin
description:
Our proximity to the Blue Ridge Parkway and downtown Asheville, makes us the ideal place to stay when you visit Western North Carolina. Our remote mountain setting is perfect for relaxation, or if you are more adventurous we are just minutes from many area attractions.

Other things to note
Pets are considered on a case by case basis and bringing them oneeds to be discussed directly with owner prior to a arrival. Please note we use well water. The iron in the water reacts with the chemicals in the spa which at times gives it a copper color which causes no sanitary or other issues, just aesthetics.

name: A Cottage At Willow Pond
description:
A comfortable cozy brick cottage tucked in a beautiful valley on a private owned 17 acre horse farm. Enjoy the pastoral view while relaxing and be close to town.

The space
Our Cottage is unique because it is private with no neighbors close. It sits on our horse farm and is only 2 miles from town.

Guest access
Guests enjoy the whole cottage to themselves.

Other things to note
Enjoy visiting the horses, please don't feed them

name: New house! Walk Dtown & River Arts
description:
Newly built, green house. 30 day rental. On dead end street in charming neighborhood. Furnished with custom, vintage, and boutique furniture. Hardwood throughout, stainless steel appliances, gas stove. Gas fireplace. Screened in porch. Two queen beds.

The space
Original art, and a bright space! We have 2 bedrooms, each with a queen, and third bedroom set up as a child's room with a crib but no third adult bed. The second bedroom has a desk. A fourth room is set up downstairs as a yoga room.

Guest access
We have a screened in porch and a back yard with a firepit.

name: Ladyhawk Retreat
description:
Ladyhawk Retreat - This lovely home is tucked away so you can enjoy peace and quiet. You will enjoy a very spacious Suite with a private bath off the bedroom. Please make a note that there are no street lights going down the long 1/4 mile driveway. Please let us know if you would like to enjoy a Mini Elopement or Vow Renewal - we can make a recommendation for you. Travel Safe & See You Soon!
Jacqui

The space
It is my honor to welcome you to my peaceful home! It is tucked away in a relaxing setting. Please understand- here are no pets or children allowed. You are welcome to enjoy other areas of the Home! I look forward to meeting you!
Jacqui

Guest access
You have full access to your large private Master Suite and bath as well as use of the main living room, and outdoor spaces. Thank you for understanding there is no cooking access.

Other things to note
Please don't hesitate to let me know what y

name: Country feel, city appeal, minutes to Asheville
description:
15 min drive of all major Asheville area attractions. Easily accessible first floor, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, in a 21st century home. The private setting in this charming wooded neighborhood and designated bird sanctuary is extremely relaxing.

The space
Welcome Home! Come and stay in our gorgeous, single-level, private space in our home. We are within the Asheville City limits, but you will feel as though you have escaped to the country, surrounded by trees and privacy. We strive to keep the apartment as clean and comfortable as possible. The flooring throughout is hardwood/tile for a dust-free environment. Bedding is covered with 100% cotton duvet covers that are washed after each guests' stay. I am a freak about changing HVAC air filters far more often than would normally be scheduled.

Guest access
Access is by keypad with 24 hour check-in. Owner is on-site if assistance is needed with check-in.

Other things to no

name: Airstream On The River
description:
Located within walking distance to Carrier Park, Asheville food park, and the climbing gym. You will be in the middle of it all! West Asheville, the River Arts District, and less than 5 miles from downtown. It sits on the French Broad River AND the Greenway with private river access. Ride your bike to New Belgium on the Greenway! Asheville Outdoor Center is right next door with tube rentals and shuttles, volleyball, ping pong, and a pub!

The space
The space: Not the Ritz! But we love our little (big) Airstream. She is 34 feet long, and was born in 1984 ;) The bathroom is small but with a window which makes it airy. The bedroom is a super cozy little cave with just the bed and 2 long side tables. You will have to crawl in and out of it :). We spent 2015-2016 traveling the country in the Airstream and it was a pretty stellar good time. For the winter we have a little electric wood stove that heats the entire place. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, b

name: Private, secluded cabin-wood/fireplace/hot tub.
description:
Private and secluded cabin with a traditional wood burning fire place/private hot tub log cabin. Surrounded by peaceful whispering pines and other natural surroundings. Asheville is only 15 minute easy car drive, easy routes to hiking Blue Ridge Pkwy, waterfalls, sight seeing and many local artisan crafts/antiques/breweries.

The space
Entire cabin with surrounding wooded landscapes

Guest access
When guest are arriving, we leave the front cabin door unlocked with the key on the kitchen counter. Lights will be left on front porch and inside.

Other things to note
Front door will be unlocked on your arrival with key on kitchen countertop. Notes provided inside cabin for your departure.

name: Mountain Top Retro Rental
description:
Initially built as a 1960s vacation home, this private wooded location with east facing mountain views is located high up on Beaucatcher Mountain. The house is less than 1 mile from downtown Asheville and less than 5 miles from the Biltmore Estate. Easy access to the Blue Ridge Parkway, local breweries, restaurants, music venues, and outdoor activities.

The house was remodeled in 2016 with mid-century modern furnishings. Enjoy privacy with this unique location within the city of Asheville!

The space
The house is 650 square feet as it was built as a vacation rental initially. There are not many houses with this proximity to Asheville yet sitting high on a ridge in a wooded area.

Other things to note
I have had some concerns about the driveway being steep and curvy from folks that are likely typically not used to driving in the mountains. I have driven a 24 foot box/moving truck up the driveway. It is manageable for nearly all veh

name: Hazel's Hideaway - Walk Downtown
description:
Sunny, one bedroom apartment in beautiful Historic Montford. A short walk to downtown and a few minute drive to the River Arts District. "Hazel's Hideaway" has all the coziness of home, the amenities of a hotel, and the personality of Asheville.

The space
**Our COVID cleaning routine: All surfaces and high-touch points are cleaned and disinfected with CDC approved products. All towels and bedding are cleaned and sanitized by a professional laundry service.**

The location and comfort of “Hazel's Hideaway" makes it the perfect home base for your Asheville adventure. This centrally located, newly appointed, one bedroom apartment is nestled in the charming Historic Montford neighborhood.

You will be a quick 12 minute walk (or a $5-$7 Ridesharing trip) to downtown with its great restaurants, shopping, and fun "South Slope" Breweries. You will also be a few minutes drive the the River Arts District with its many artist studios, and the newly

name: Asheville Mountainside Retreat
description:
Comfortable modern mountainside home with large private deck and patio. near shopping and center of downtown Asheville, music venues, hiking and biking trails, abundant wildlife and relaxing atmosphere.

Hammocks, fire pit and gas grill to enjoy outdoor time with friends. Large Deck overlooks mountains and valley.

Looking for local activities? "Only in Asheville" guide book, maps of hiking and biking trails, local tours, breweries, music and waterfall destinations.

Uber friendly.

The space
Classic home with rocking chair front porch, large deck, and patio outside master suite. Master located on the lower level has its own gas fireplace and full bath.

Hammocks, fire pit and gas grill provided.

Guest access
Use SECOND paved drive PAST the house. Look for arrow and Welcome sign at bottom of driveway. Lockbox on Blue door on front porch.

Other things to note
Not suitable for

name: Our lil' blue house - relax and enjoy AVL
description:
Our home is just north of AVL city center and a brief walk to family-friendly activities, amazing restaurants, a brewery/movie theater, grocery stores and public transportation. The house is great for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families with kids. Come experience the mountains, Biltmore Estate, Grove Park Inn, and much more!

Guest access
You will also have access to our brick patio for lounging, reading, or just hanging out.

name: Convenient Biltmore/Downtown home
description:
This home is located 2.5miles from Downtown (6-10$ Uber ride) ,walking distance to shopping in Biltmore Village and Catawba/ French broad Brewing. 0.5 mile from Biltmore House entrance, also great for guests going to shows at Orange Peel

The space
Private cozy space with one room available if needed. You will have a private bathroom, with access to half bath downstairs. There is a loft with seating if available for hang out area. We are very relaxed and easy going people, feel free to come and go as you please whether it's early or late. We grew up here in Asheville and are very familiar with the nightlife and things to do ie: good dining, breweries, mountain biking, hiking, floating the river, and many other things we can recommend. We venture downtown frequently on weekend evenings and guests are welcome to join if they want. We love entertaining and good conversation. We have two small dogs that are just as accommodating as we are. They don't bark or shed and

name: Mountain Retreat with Hot Tub
description:
Ideal location, walking distance to the Blue Ridge Parkway and Mountains-to-Sea Trail. Ten minutes from Biltmore House and downtown Asheville. Private spacious bedroom, queen bed, couch, ensuite bath, coffee station, mini fridge, microwave, hot tub, deck, and patio. For everyone's health safety, we are asking that our guests be fully vaccinated for COVID. Thank you.

The space
The rental bedroom is the only room downstairs in the house. It has a private bathroom.

Guest access
Guests can access the bedroom through the garage or through the front door of the house. It is a split level house, so you do not have to enter the main living floor. Guests may use the patio in the back yard, the hammock, and the hot tub on the upper deck.

Other things to note
Check-in time is flexible, but after 3:00 pm. Guests should text or call ahead of time to let us know arrival plans.

Check-out time is 11:00 a.m.

name: Spacious, Chic Grove Park Studio - 5 Min Dwntwn
description:
Set in a quiet, walkable residential neighborhood, you're only a 5-minute drive or Uber ride from our lively downtown (1.4 mi.) a short walk from the Omni Grove Park Inn, & close to UNC@Asheville (1.4 mi). Enjoy a light-filled sitting area, dining area & breakfast bar, and a comfortable, well-appointed bedroom, plus full bath, and off-street parking. Only 13 minutes to Biltmore estate; 16 to Blue Ridge Parkway. Also convenient for business travelers attending events at the GP Inn/UNCA/downtown.

The space
The two-room studio has its own entrance and constitutes the lower floor of a large Grove Park home. The space consists of two large rooms plus a full bath. The front room receives wonderful natural light and has a sitting area, a desk, and a dining area. A compact "breakfast bar" includes a mini-refrigerator and microwave (note: there is no sink or full kitchen.) and is outfitted with your choice of an automatic drip coffee maker or french press for fresh-brewed

name: 3/2.5 Clean and Comfortable Rental in Asheville
description:
A cozy, clean and comfortable 3 bedroom/2.5 bath vacation rental property on 1 acre tucked away in a quiet peaceful setting while centrally located within a 15 minute drive of Downtown Asheville. The house has a wonderful covered outdoor deck to sit out back and enjoy the view of the trees.

The space
This fully furnished 3 bedroom/2 ½ bath home can comfortably accommodate up to 6 people. The house is well equipped with superior bedding, bath towels, kitchen accessories (ie. pots, pans, silverware, plates etc.), blow dryer, iron, washer and dryer, high definition TVs in all the bedrooms with access to cable, Netflix and DVD player. Some exceptional extras include fire pit with adirondack chairs and a relaxing back porch. If travelling with children, the house contains board games to keep them entertained. The luxurious master bedroom with a King size bed and its own private bathroom is on the main level. Upstairs on the second level are the two additional bedro

name: Spacious 700 sq. ft. Suite in South Asheville
description:
This is your home away from home just a quick 20-25 minute drive from Downtown Asheville. 700 sq. ft. of cozy, modern space. You get the entire lower level of the home with a large master bedroom, a living room, a small kitchenette, & private bath room.

Please enjoy and respect the space. I do not allow any smoking, vaping, or tobacco use of any kind anywhere on the property. I want my home to be a healthy and peaceful space for all who stay.

The space
This listing is the lower level of the house.

Included in this space is a large master bedroom with a spacious closet, an expansive living room, a kitchenette with mini fridge, sink, microwave, and coffee pot, and a private bathroom.

New hardwood floors were recently installed. The space is bright and open.

Guest access
You have access to the entire lower level of the home (700 sq. ft.) Guests will have access to the large family room, kitchenette, bedroom, an

name: N. Asheville Retreat with King Bed and Views
description:
Enjoy beautiful mountain views with your morning latte when you stay at our mountain retreat. You'll love how easy it is to access all that Asheville has to offer - we are minutes from downtown, the botanical gardens, walking and running trails around the nearby lake, and plenty of delicious places to eat. Whether you are a couple looking for a romantic getaway, traveling with kids, or on a solo adventure, we would love to host you and help make your visit to our beloved city memorable.

The space
Your private, 1-bedroom apartment occupies the lower level of our home, with your own entrance (keyless entry). You have a private outdoor seating area with views of the mountains - and its even better when the leaves drop!

Inside you will find a newly renovated, bright open space. 9-foot ceilings and large windows make it light and airy and it is decorated for comfort. Sliding barn doors separate the living room and bedroom, where you'll find a king bed

name: West Asheville Home
description:
Perfect house for a visit to Asheville. There are three bedrooms. The master bedroom has a King bed and a private bathroom. One has a King bed and the other has a Queen. The Living Room has a futon couch too. The house is just a mile from the heart of West Asheville and 4 miles from downtown. The kitchen is fully equipped for cooking. My cat Marvin lives on the property but has a cat door and there is no litter box. Just ask that you give him some food and water. He is super friendly:)

The space
Located up on a hill so excellent view. The driveway is steep. There is room for 2 cars and you can turn around at the top. Three cars requires one car to do some thee point turns or just back out the driveway when you leave.

Guest access
Fire pit in back yard and outdoor dining table. There is a grill on the back porch.

Other things to note
The water dispenser in the kitchen is fresh spring water that collect from Black M

name: Chicken Hill Cottage in the River Arts District
description:
Modern home with studio built above the garage. Quiet neighborhood perfectly located on the west side of downtown, near the famed River Arts District (RAD). Just about everything is walkable within a mile. The newly completed French Broad River corridor, just down the hill, has several miles of greenways and protected bike lanes right along the river.

COVID Precautions: In addition to enhanced cleaning protocols, the unit has its own HVAC system and is only available for weekend rentals.

The space
Cottage is quiet with the exception of some city noises, freeway and train horn. Spacious and modern 500' apartment with a super comfortable Queen bed and a sleeper couch with memory foam mattress. High speed wifi. Kitchenette with fridge, microwave, coffee maker and the basics. Stocked with toiletries and hair dryer. Bistro dining, two outdoor decks, one private and one shared.

Guest access
You will have access to the cottage and

name: Lily Pad Cottage over a Mountain Stream and Pond
description:
This secluded cottage is located 10 minutes from downtown Asheville and Biltmore Estate. A mountain stream runs under the cottage and empties into a natural filled pond. The Lily Pad Cottage offers everything for a peaceful getaway.

The space
The cottage used to be a country church. Remodeled with luxurious tiled bathroom, large HD TV, extra cozy bed. Sliding glass door opens to a large wood deck with chairs, bistro table and chairs, grill and secluded pond view.

Guest access
Enter the Lily Pad Cottage up the long gravel driveway and park in front of the cottage. There are two cottages on property. PLEASE NOTE: The Lily Pad Cottage is closet to the pond.

Other things to note
With two cottages on property, if you are traveling with friends, see my other listing. It's called "Cozy Cottage by a little mountain stream".

name: Private 2BR suite near Biltmore, Brews & Downtown
description:
With it's super location about a mile from Asheville's vibrant Downtown, Biltmore House, breweries, gorgeous mountain hikes, and the Blue Ridge Parkway, Keebler House is your comfy, home base for exploration. This fully private two floor suite consists of two bedrooms, full bathroom, and a spacious tv/living room with kitchenette. Plenty of room to relax with a glass of wine or cup of tea, plays games or read. Free off street parking.

The space
Your own two floor set of rooms with a separate entrance gives you privacy and plenty of space to make yourself at home. The no contact, private suite includes two comfy bedrooms, a full bathroom, washer/drier on the second floor and a full living room/TV room with kitchenette on the first level. We provide coffee, tea and sparkling water, amenities, Keurig, microwave and mini-fridge. In the spring, summer and fall months you are welcome to relax in the garden around the fire pit. Across the street from a well-kept c

name: Historic Grove Park rental - Apt #2
description:
Historic apartment in the Grove Park area of Asheville. Convenient to downtown and Charlotte Street eateries.

Classically decorated, this unit has a full kitchen, dining room, living room, sunroom, queen size bed and full bath.

name: Sunny Downstairs Apartment
description:
Sunny, bright living space in the downstairs of our lovely Asheville home.

The space
We spent the winter of 2015 designing and constructing a beautiful and bright downstairs apartment in our 1920's Craftsman style bungalow in downtown Asheville. We are full-time farmers and full-time parents and are looking forward to hosting families, couples and friends in our new space. Our family lives upstairs and the downstairs apartment is a one bedroom, one bathroom with large and bright windows throughout. The bathroom has the old cast iron tub original to the house (great water pressure!), new fixtures, pedestal sink and travertine tile floors (throughout the apartment). The living area and kitchen are one room with brand new Ikea cabinets, bright yellow paint and radiant floor heat (throughout the apartment). The bedroom has a ceiling fan, open bookshelves, queen sized bed and a small closet for hanging your clothes. The living room has a double sized fold out

name: Cottage McIntyre Near Downtown! Weddings!
description:
The house has been in my family for 4 generations. Built by my great grandfather. Very conveniently located, only minutes from downtown, West Asheville, and River Arts. Lots of room in the house and on the property to spread out and get comfy.

We are now hosting affordable weddings on the spacious property. Reach out to Erin at silverfernevents.com for wedding information at Cottage McIntyre.

The space
Fantastic cottage built by my great grandfather. Large property with a stream running by. Minutes from everything Asheville has to offer. No smoking in the house. Plenty of room in the house and on the property to spread out and get comfy. Take a blanket out back at stare up at the stars!

Guest access
Full access with the exception of basement and barn on property. Occasionally we will have a small garden growing next to the house.

Other things to note
The home is limited to 4 guests. Any number of g

name: MONTHLY - Grove Park - Charming Guest House
description:
Lovely, bright 1920s guest house, renovated by architect host. Vaulted ceiling living area with skylights; comfortable queen pull-out couch; dining and desk space; queen bedroom; kitchenette ; modern bath. Quiet location with porch overlooking garden. Great walking neighborhood near downtown (30-day minimum rental)

The space
Light, airy and fresh space. Architect-renovated historic cottage.

Guest access
You will have complete, private access to the Guest House, which is located 50 feet from main house where hosts live. Guest parking space for one vehicle is conveniently located on alley, up one flight of stairs from cottage.

name: Beer City Boutique
description:
All of the comfort and style of a hotel room, without the downtown price tag! Free parking just steps from your door. A private porch welcomes you to your own entrance, where inside you will find a luxurious king bed, private bathroom, and kitchenette. Perfect for couples or solo travelers. Come and go as you please from the suite, right in the heart of beautiful AVL. Just a 10 minute walk to several breweries, downtown, River Arts District, restaurants, and nightlife.

The space
This private room is part of a larger home. Two solid wood and insulated double-doors join the two and will be deadbolt locked for the duration of your stay. Enjoy your own downtown front porch, a deluxe king size bed with premium sheets, fresh linens and towels, and amenities like shampoo and soap while you stay. The kitchenette includes mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker with reusable filter, coffee, and dining ware for two. The large, walk-in closet is available for your use so you c

name: Retreat outside gates of Biltmore Estate unit two
description:
This beautiful skylit apartment is located in the heart of Historic Biltmore Village only yards from the entrance to The Biltmore Estate and less than 2 miles to downtown Asheville's vibrant and eclectic scene. Only steps from Dining and Shopping.

The space
This unit is located in the Heart of Historic Biltmore Village within steps of oodles of shopping and dining options. It is brand new in 2016 and has all the amenities for a truly enjoyable stay. Parking is free in the Village and should not be a problem before noon or after 5pm.

Guest access
Guests will enter through the exterior private glass door on Swan Street and then access their front door via coded lockbox- no keys to find or forget.

name: Mountaintop Retreat near Downtown Asheville
description:
Although this newly-renovated mid-century home feels eons away from the real world -- as it is perched atop a beautiful mountain with breathtaking views -- it is only about 10-minutes away from Downtown Asheville! New mattresses and bedding plus quality furniture fill the space, and we have fully-stocked the kitchen. The very best feature is the new deck, with comfortable seating for enjoying the view below. We can accommodate up to 6 guests.

The space
Charmingly named "Mountain Miracle" by its original owner, this is a newly-renovated 1961 ranch-style home, with jaw-dropping views on a large wooded lot.
Indoors, we offer a full kitchen, two full baths, living spaces with a gas fireplace, and sleeping spots for up to 6.
On the main level: the master bedroom has a king bed; a second bedroom has a queen bed.
There is one full bath (with a bathtub) on the main level.
Downstairs on the garden level is the third bedroom, with a queen bed.
The

name: Retreat in Downtown Asheville (30+ day rental)
description:
Beautifully renovated, very Ashevillian 1905 home on the Historic Registry with incredible location. An easy walk to Downtown, South Slope, The River Arts District, and West Asheville. 100% private backyard space with fire pit and surrounded by nature. The new 4 mile riverside greenway is complete, featuring Asheville's first dedicated bike lane that begins just 2 blocks away from our house! This is the ultimate location. If the dates you want are not available, please contact us!

The space
1905 historic 1400 square foot home with preserved features such as original hardwood floors throughout, plaster walls, original trim and doors, etc. On one side of the house is a bustling downtown street, and the other side makes you feel like you're in the forest. Our backyard has been certified as a wildlife habitat and there is a short trail that runs to a creek! Everything is walking distance, including 30+ breweries, countless restaurants, art studios, etc.

name: West AVL Urban Retreat (Monthly)
description:
This West Asheville home privately located on a quiet residential street, right next to Carrier Park and Asheville Food Park! Haywood Rd (West Asheville's most happening street) and the River Arts District are both a short walk.

The space
This three story house has been recently updated, full of all the amenities you need to make your trip comfortable. Enjoy fast WiFi all throughout the house as well as decks on every level. The lower floor is the master suite, which has a desk with lamp, walk in glass shower, comfortable queen size bed, iPad and TV for Netflix/YouTube. An open kitchen/living area is on the main floor along with a half bathroom. Coffee is provided each morning via a convenient Keurig machine. The top floor has two bedrooms (with spacious closets) and a bathroom. One of the bedrooms has a deck right off of it as a space for docking your laptop to work comfortably.

All TVs throughout the house have a Chromecast connected so you can strea

name: NEW: Private Room is like a treehouse in the woods
description:
This is IDEAL for one person.

Perfect Location! My home is a short walk to Downtown Asheville. It's a new green built home and zone heating/cooling keeps it comfy all year. This is a tiny room :) the bed is a full size, and your private bathroom is across the hall. My room is right down the hall - I have my own suite so I don't use your bathroom , but I do want you to know it's close quarters. Please make sure you're okay with that before you book. I have 2 friendly Whippets one is a Puppy.

The space
PERFECT for single person and business travelers!

Montford is a very safe Asheville residential neighborhood. Centrally located & the Visitors Center is on the corner! Many tours begin there. A beautiful 10 minute walk to downtown.
This room includes:
- A Comfy Full size bed in a quiet, beautifully appointed room.
- Luxurious 100% bamboo bedding and designer towels
- Private Bathroom with deep Tub (it is a hall bathro

name: City Lights
description:
We have recently remodeled the first floor of our home to provide you with comfort and privacy. You will be in a wonderful neighborhood with delightful downtown and mountain views. And best of all, you'll be only minutes from the heart of our city. There are 2 private decks for enjoying many hours taking in the views of downtown and the Blue Ridge Mountains.

The space
The view from the front porch has an awesome view of the mountains and downtown Asheville. We are less than a mile from downtown. It is about 5 miles, straight up our street, to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

Guest access
The entire apartment, 2 lovely, private decks and private , off street parking are yours to enjoy.

Other things to note
We are near the Blue Ridge Parks. Therefore there might be the occasional bear or turkey wandering through the back yard.

name: Be Well: Walk to Downtown AVL
description:
Enjoy a private entrance and off-street parking to this quiet garden-level room in a 1922 bungalow. Take advantage of a 3-season outdoor kitchen and backyard garden outside of your room or walk only three blocks to the Asheville Yoga Center or seven blocks to the heart of funky downtown Asheville.

During the days of Covid, I’ve reduced availability and added extra time between stays so that the room is sure to be germ-free upon your arrival.

The space
Once a boarding house, our home has had several guests. Among the most notable are baseball Hall of Famers Jackie Robinson and Roy Campanella!

I am a private tutor and work mainly from home. My youngest child is now in college, and is sometimes home on weekends and holidays. Should she be at my home during your stay, she will use the upstairs bath. For guests with longer stays, the laundry room is available to you on the lower level.

The 3-season outdoor kitchen includes a cold wate

name: Mixed Dorm Lower Bunk #1
description:
Six bed mixed dorm in hostel. Easy walk to restaurants, cafes, bakery, organic market, pubs, music, and shopping.

Self check-in starts at 3pm. Instructions will be sent after booking.

We provide linens and towels.

*Please note this is a co-ed dorm - we have another listing for female only

The space
This is a communal hostel with travelers from all over the world.

Guest access
Guests have full access to common rooms, front and back porch, kitchen, and 2.5 baths

Other things to note
*Please note this is a co-ed dorm - we have another listing for female only

name: ZEN APARTMENT - feels like ur own little apartment
description:
Apartment in a beautiful home. Natural rainbow prisms, breathtaking room, connected kitchenette/livingroom. Central location, rocking chair porch, mins away from everything -traveler's favorite sites. Second queen bed and optional queen blow-up mattress. Licensed spa quality massages / pet sitting by host.

The space
Second floor large 2 rooms in home with a pristine new feel. You go up the stair and enter a private feeling kitchenette and living area that is connected to your room.

Guest access
Feel like you are arriving to your own home up a small set of stairs through a rocking chair porch. The entrance and bath may be shared with another rental room, but living quarters are well separated. As you enter the house, you will go up a flight of beautiful stairs with a chandelier to your suite. A fenced back yard and pet-sitting as an addition is an option for well behaved pets.

Other things to note
- I have 14 yea

name: Haywood House Asheville (West Asheville)
description:
Haywood House: West Asheville's Newly Restored And Most Walkable Rental! Fully Restored And Updated Craftsman Home With 3 Bedrooms And 2 Full Baths.

The space
The Haywood House is a newly restored, marvelous craftsman home in walking distance to the heart of vibrant West Asheville. Stay in West Asheville’s most walkable rental and enjoy the local restaurants, coffee shops, pubs, ice cream parlors, bakeries and groceries, while leaving the car at home!

It retains many features original to the house such as flooring, fireplaces and mantles, windows, and mouldings, but with all the comforts of home. The easy-access, one-level home has ten-foot ceilings and tastefully decorated throughout with period furniture, antiques, lamps and light fixtures. Haywood House is reminiscent of a time gone by, its craftsman charm updated with all the modern appliances and amenities.

All three-bedrooms boast king size beds. Eight can sleep comfortably including

name: The best view in Asheville!
description:
We think our house is pretty special, but luckily you don't have to take our word for it. Architectural Digest recently chose it as the most beautiful Airbnb in North Carolina, and GQ, Conde Nast Traveler, and TimeOut are also fans. Set in the serene and beautiful Riceville Valley, we are also just 12 minutes from downtown Asheville (or Black Mountain) and 5 to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
The photos are better than any description we can give but the house is minimalist and modern while also being warm and inviting. Custom kitchen with concrete countertops, stunning views from every room.

name: Mountain Cabin Near Downtown
description:
This mountain home, in a country setting, is just 5 minutes from downtown. Sip coffee in complete relaxation on the deck with the bustle of downtown right at your fingertips. This eclectic cabin has everything for a perfect weekend in Asheville.

The space
This mountain home is nestled in beautiful, wooded scenery just minutes from downtown in a quiet, residential neighborhood.

Guest access
There are three bedrooms and three baths to accommodate 6 people very well. The master bedroom has a plush, queen bed. The upstairs guest bedroom has a relaxing but firmer, queen bed. The downstairs bedroom has a queen bed in a fun modern room. Three bathrooms mean each guest or pair of guests get a private bathroom!! I have 2 smart TVs with Netflix and Amazon. My house is decorated with tons a fun artwork and vintage items. Plus, there are a few of my own handmade glass pieces available if you would like a souvenir from Asheville. The garage and one room

name: Beautiful Modern Suite with Hot Tub
description:
Enjoy a getaway in a brand new home walking distance to restaurants and bars on the thriving Haywood Rd in the center of West Asheville. Full amenities include a king size bed with a Casper mattress, a double sleeper sofa, a single sleeper chair, a wet bar/kitchenette, a flat screen TV modern bathroom with bathtub/rain shower head, laundry room with washer/dryer, a private deck with a 6 person hot tub and coffee to get you started in the morning.

The space
This is a modern lower-level apartment/suite with wet-bar/kitchenette in a brand-new house, walking distance to Haywood Rd in the heart of West Asheville. It is bright with 15 ft ceilings, large windows and hardwood floors throughout. There is a flat screen TV with Netflix, HULU and more. Enjoy the six person hot tub on the large, private deck. We also have a laundry room with washer and dryer for your convenience. Full size sleeper sofa/futon with single sleeper chair in the separate living area is perfect f

name: Quirky & Quaint Paris of the South
description:
Sure, those fancy perfectly restored classic Bungalows are nice. But, if you're looking for the real-deal eclectic West Asheville vibe, this is the place for you! Walk to the hippest joints in town and return to a creative one-of-a-kind urban oasis.

The space
In the nineteenth century, Asheville earned the nickname "Paris of the South" due to a reputation for fine shopping, dining, spas, and entertainment. Today, people travel to Asheville specifically to enjoy our vibrant eclectic culture. This spacious room in our 1915 historic West Asheville home combines both!

The space you are booking is the largest room in the house, offering a double bed, a queen bed and a loveseat.

Guest access
In addition to the primary room and shared full bathroom guests will have access to the front porch. One other upstairs room might be occupied. Guests will also have free wifi access and a small refrigerator.

Other things to note<

name: The Guesthouse at Deer Crossing
description:
Our home is a new custom built unique farm house which used materials off the property for much of its structure. We call it our “ barn house.” It is located down a private drive surrounded by beautiful horses and other animals. We are close to I-26 and the airport. Restaurants and theaters are 5 minutes away.
**Due to the beginning of a housing construction project in the acreage behind us, there could be possible noise from Monday thru Friday. Be aware of this before you book.

The space
Guests will have total access and privacy to their whole apartment. It is attached to our home and is above our garage. There is a private entrance.

Guest access
They will share our driveway for parking.

Other things to note
There is one other Airbnb guest room within our home. No space is shared. However, all guests can join us for a fire on the screened porch at anytime.

name: 10 minutes to Downtown & Biltmore, Next to Parkway
description:
Tucked away on a hill in a quiet residential area is our peaceful 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home away from home. Here you’ll find room to breathe, plenty of natural light, and just a touch of what’s familiar. We’ve made a peaceful place for you to relax, so you can focus on the next adventure. Why pile everyone into a hotel room (or two) when you can breathe the mountain air without stepping on any toes?

The space
Located beside the entrance to the Blue Ridge Parkway and just 10 minutes from Downtown Asheville and the Biltmore Estate, you’ll find you are never too far from adventure and excitement. There’s easy access to I-40, 240, and 26, so getting around town is super convenient.

Make sure to stop by the Folk Art Center just off the Parkway, or head on up to Craggy Pinnacle for a more leisurely parkway experience. If you’re in the mood to shop, you are only 15 minutes from local shops downtown and artisan showrooms in the River Arts District. When it

name: "Tree house" in South Asheville
description:
Special price reduction in this time of crisis. Rest assured that this space is thoroughly cleaned and disinfected. Has own ensuite bath, fridge, and microwave. High speed internet and multi channel TV. Also, since it has private entrance, you can choose to have plenty of "zero contact" space that has the feel of a tree house. Quiet neighborhood cul-de-sac with no through traffic. If you choose, you can use the first floor with kitchen, laundry, great room, a 2nd deck , and a gas grille.

The space
Large suite with full bath; private entrance and deck. Also has entry thru a backdoor to the suite which is accessed through atrium off main house. Large room has queen bed, futon, desk, fridge, microwave oven and multi channel TV. Additional single blow-up beds are available.

Guest access
Private entrance is from deck which is up 23 steps from lower yard. Backdoor entrance is only three steps up from atrium off shared first floor of house.

name: Urban Farmhouse
description:
There is a double bed in the main bedroom with a mural of trees to make you feel even cozier here in Appalachia. There is a yoga studio in the backyard and craft beer on the corner. Rest and rejuvenate here or drive to downtown in 5+ minutes!

The space
The space is calming and peaceful. The kitchen has a coffee maker, stove, fridge, and a eating space that looks out to the chicken yard, though due to Asheville's growth, we now also get to see a parking lot designated for the yoga studio behind the house. The house is over 100 yrs old and naturally has character and some dust in places. Overall though, the space is clean, cozy, and colorful! There is a fenced in yard for dogs and a separate one with chickens. Feel free to have fresh eggs from the coop if you'd like!

Guest access
Guests have access to most of the house and grounds :)

name: Mountain View Cottage with Hot Tub
description:
Come stay in our cozy cottage and take in the mountain view. Enjoy open floor plan great for gatherings. This home is adjacent to Pisgah National Forest and 1/2 mile to trail head for miles of hiking/running/biking. Beautiful views from front deck, covered sitting area and fire pit area as well as from our HOT TUB. Gas grill available.

10-15 mins to West Asheville 15-20 to Downtown. 5 mins to Amenities such as grocery, restaurants, Asheville outlet mall. 20 mins to Biltmore House & Airport.

The space
House was renovated with "fixer upper" style finishes. 3 Bedroom 1 Bath with bonus sunny entry room with twin bed window seat. Open floor plan great for spending time together. Enjoy cooking in spacious fully stocked kitchen. Guests will find coffee/tea on hand as well as other kitchen basics. Asheville is Beer City USA so we like to keep a few local brews in the frig and invite guests to do a beer exchange.
Relax in one of our outdoor areas

name: Cheryl's W. Asheville Chalet
description:
Close to Haywood Rd. (the high street of West Asheville), 15 mins. from downtown Asheville, near the airport, the AT, French Broad River, New Belgium & Sierra Nevada Breweries, and River Arts District. You’ll love the brand new space with a private entrance and deck; it's in the heart of W. Asheville but on a quiet street with back yard; the bed and bath are spacious with all the info. you'll need for your stay in Asheville, and wifi; good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The space
En suite bathroom

Guest access
Bedroom and bathroom and porch

name: Modern in Downtown Walkable West Asheville
description:
This sleek, modern, fully equipped one bedroom apartment is located in the heart of trendy downtown West Asheville. 5 minute walk from the center of bustling Haywood Rd. Serene with a private yard yet steps from some of the best food in Asheville!

You’ll have access to driveway parking, your own, completely separate entrance, and a large porch that’s great for morning coffee or an evening drink!

If you’re looking for a CLEAN space in a great location, look no further! :)

Other things to note
The mattress is two years old and it is a soft one. Mattresses are certainly personal preference, but I find it incredibly comfortable!

There is access to HBO, Netflix, and Showtime via AppleTV but no cable.

Please note: the city of Asheville does not allow properties within city limits to have a full sized kitchen. No legal homestays in city limits will have this!

name: Unique Hand-built Cabin in the City
description:
A quiet cabin walking distance to downtown and several grocery stores. Great for creative and adventurous folk looking for something outside the norm.

The space
A private little cottage in the trees, just 3 blocks from city life. Even closer to grocery stores and fresh coffee. Quiet and peaceful.

Our little house is built from lost treasures and reclaimed materials. The house is about 700 sq ft, comfortably furnished with everything you'll need and nothing more. Queen bed upstairs, walk-in shower, open, clean and airy. Wireless and Apple TV. We hope you will be delighted and maybe even inspired by the ease and gentleness of our home. There's a compost toilet, wood stove and radiant floor for heat, and us close by to help you get used to these eco-kind alternatives if you are not already familiar with their use. It's easy, really!

We're happy to share this little sanctuary with our guests.

Guest access
Cabin is located

name: Spacious studio apartment in Downtown Asheville!
description:
Stay in a beautiful, modern, light-filled studio located in the historic South French Broad neighborhood, within walking distance of the River Arts District, New Belgium Brewery, South Slope (brewery central) and Downtown, as well as a five minute drive to the Biltmore Estate. West Asheville is just across the river. There is plenty of parking in front of the house, so you will never have to search for a space. (This space is fully permitted and legal within the City of Asheville.)

The space
We built this space to be an artist studio but decided to make it available to you! The room is a beautiful, light-filled studio with a full private bathroom. Though there is a garage door, the space has always been used as an airbnb. There is central heat and air conditioning that you control and a mini fridge to keep your beer (or leftovers) cold! Please help yourself to complimentary coffee and don't hesitate to ask us for recommendations to make your time in Asheville a b

name: S. Asheville Private Apartment with Mountain Views
description:
Welcome to our Hikers Hideaway Airbnb suited for vacations or business travel! This home away from home is great for Couples, Families or Business. Enjoy your full sized, eat-in kitchen, spacious living room with comfortable seating, 42" flat screen TV with Roku, large bedroom, writing desk, walk-in closet and 1 1/2 baths.

Our Airbnb is peaceful and private yet you are just minutes from the Airport, Sierra Nevada Brewery, WNC AG Center, Biltmore, the Blue Ridge Parkway and all of Asheville!

The space
Looking to go hiking? We are within 30 minutes of Dupont State Park!

Our cozy get away from it all space available for vacations, hiking or business travel, this space provides with a full eat in kitchen, 42 inch flat screen tv with Roku, comfortable seating, a queen size bed, walk-in closet and 1 and 1/2 baths. Its like your home away from home!

Perfect for business travelers, couples and families! Even though our space is

name: Retreat outside gates of Biltmore Estate unit one
description:
This skylit unit is in the Heart of Historic Biltmore Village and would be The Vanderbilt's choice of get away in the 21st century. Walk to dozens of local restaurants, art galleries, and small independent shops, only a block from the entrance to the Biltmore Estate and less than one mile to the hospital complex. Downtown is a $5 uber or 2 mile walk. This unit was specifically built for hosting guests with luxury and comfort in mind, but additionally works well for long term stays.

The space
Skylights and modern finishes with homey touches makes this space perfect for your stay in Asheville. The spacious bedroom includes a comfy bed and armoire. The central area off the Kitchen has a fold down futon. A well appointed kitchen means you could stay in, but WHY ? with so many restaurants, shopping and breweries, literally outside the entrance to your home away from home.

Guest access
This home includes all the amenities you would expect from

name: Clean and Private Bungalow Apt. in W. Asheville
description:
Welcome to our private apartment in hip West Asheville. Please note that detailed cleaning and precautions are taken seriously for your and our safety. This peaceful retreat is in walking distance to historic West Asheville. Downtown Asheville, breweries and the River Arts District are a short drive or bike ride away. The Blue Ridge Parkway and hiking trails are only 20 minutes for the adventurous explorers. Come experience the beauty of Western North Carolina & our home.

The space
The private apartment was built in 2016. It is easily accessed from the back of the house. Please walk along the right side of the house to the backyard. The backyard is fenced and has a gate that will lead you to your private entrance. A set of french doors on the back porch is your entrance into the apartment. The television offers cable and we have wifi access for you too. We recently added a hot tub to enhance your relaxation while enjoying your vacation. Please make you

name: Charming Arts & Crafts Home-20 min downtown AVL
description:
New Arts & Crafts style home in quiet neighborhood with 2 bedrooms, 2 baths plus an office/music room which will accommodate my queen-size air bed. After sight-seeing, come home to a welcoming 9' x 30' porch with rockers, a home with hardwood floors, gas fireplace, granite countertops, ceramic tile and all the amenities. Be on the Blue Ridge Parkway in 15 minutes, and downtown and the Biltmore House in 20 minutes.

The space
Fully-equipped kitchen waiting for you to prepare a relaxing meal after sight-seeing, and dine on my mother's antique dining room table. Master bedroom has top of the line Temper-Pedic mattress. Lots of toiletries available in both bathrooms. 3rd bedroom has a piano (out of tune, I’m afraid!). House is close to grocery stores and other shopping. I have a queen-size air mattress for additional guests which can be set up in the music room but it’s a tight fit. 1300 sq ft. Note: currently new homes are being built in the neighborhood.

name: Country Garden Getaway with Hot Tub
description:
5-Star Sanitary Deep Clean. Enjoy bird sounds on the breeze, mountain setting and views, and clear night skies 9 miles east of downtown Asheville. My green-built home is well appointed, with great attention to detail. It's perfect for a couple or individual seeking a bucolic getaway.
This sweet little unit is the ground floor, with entrance in the front of the home. There is another unit above called 'Sunny Modern Country Apartment' (ABNB Room #7630648). They can be rented together.

The space
We have well-over 400- 5-Star reviews, and we have read all of their comments and made recent updates in 2019.
Completed in 2016, my quiet garden level apartment will impress even the pickiest of guests. It is the entire lower unit of the house with a private patio. There are sometimes other guests above you. Complete with large walk-in closet with shelves and hangers, full kitchen, microwave, toaster oven, and a high-end wooden table and chairs. My Country Garde

name: Clean & Spacious Apartment w/Full Kitchen & W/D
description:
This beautifully renovated apartment is 5 minutes to the heart of trendy West Asheville's shops, pubs & restaurants, and is only 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. This quiet, spacious & private apartment has an open floor plan, a full kitchen & a private bathroom. Fully furnished, supplied and equipped for a great stay!
The apartment is totally independent and self-sufficient. Guests also have access to an outdoor sitting area.

The space
FEATURES:
• Full kitchen with granite counters and modern appliances (microwave, refrigerator, stove, toaster).
• Everything you need to cook a meal (pots, pans, utensils, dishes, etc)
• Tiled shower walls, tiled kitchen and bathroom floors.
• Walk-in closet and dresser to store all your stuff.
• Off-street carport parking (with space for up to 3 cars).
• Private ground-floor access.
• Comfy queen size bed & twin day bed (extra linens and blankets in closet).
• Flat-screen TV with fr

name: Female Dorm Bottom Bunk at BPS Hostel
description:
This is for one bed in the female dorm Bon Paul and Sharky's Hostel. The dorm can sleep up to five people. We also have a co-ed dorm. This is the female only dorm. Please check our other listings should you need different accommodations.

We have off street parking behind the hostel and are located in a very safe neighborhood.

Self check-in starts at 3pm. Instructions will be sent after booking.

We provide linens and towels.

name: Heart of Downtown - Bright,Spacious,Historic
description:
Fabulous, sunny, 660 square foot 1 bedroom apartment in a 1920's historic home. Epicenter of the restaurant and brewery scene, everything is steps away. Private parking. Second floor with large windows and hardwood floors. Same building as Studio C and B Flat. Bedroom has a comfy queen bed, with full trundle. Living room has a luxurious couch and ottoman which can also serve as a sleeper when combined. Claw foot tub with shower. Full sized, equipped kitchen. TV with Netflix, Hulu, Amazon, Sling.

The space
Building is downtown but still on a relatively quiet street, just two blocks from The Orange Peel venue. Historic character, but updated. It is an upstairs apartment so please keep that in mind when walking around late or early hours (especially in kitchen which is above bedroom downstairs). Parking lot for one car, you won't need to drive anywhere downtown. All 4 of our Airbnb's are in the same building if needed for large groups. No pets or smoking on premis

name: Sam's Cottage
description:
Cozy cottage perfect for two or a serene retreat for one! Ideally located in the popular North Asheville area. Truly 10 minutes to downtown, but seems a world away in the woods. Choose to enjoy coffee or cocktails on the open deck or the shaded porch while listening to the sound of the petite waterfall and stream next to the cottage. The cottage is located on 50 privately held acres and guests are invited to explore the woods and stream behind the house.

The space
Sam's Cottage is the reincarnation of an what may have been a Mill, later an barn, then an Appalachian home. The building has been completely renovated for modern convenience and style, but the original pine floors and wormy chestnut paneling were salvaged to grace the home.

Guest access
Access to a washer and dryer, located in the garage below, are available upon request.

Other things to note
Please be aware that bears are in the area and though shy, t

name: Urban Farm Studio ~ Close to Everything!
description:
Live like a local! Enjoy our private Urban Farm Studio in the peace & quiet of a hip West Asheville neighborhood, with plenty of outdoor green space and a fully fenced yard for your furry friend (under 30 lbs). Relax on the furnished screen porch, or in front of the outdoor fire bowl, walk a mile to West AVL's shops & breweries (it's not far, but it is uphill), or grab a 10-minute Uber to downtown.

The space
Chill out on the cozy private screened porch while you listen to the birds & take in the green space & garden. Walk a mile to West Asheville restaurants & breweries, stroll around the Malvern Hills park, or cool off in the pool, just a block away.

The studio has a queen bedroom, a private bath with a shower, a separate living area/sunporch with a futon & tv, a furnished screened porch, open outdoor deck space, a kitchenette with a dining table & chairs, fridge, single burner, microwave, coffee maker, bar sink, and a full set of dishes & utensils. B

name: Bluebird Sanctuary. Mt view, walk downtown, W Ashe
description:
Location! Enjoy your deck at beautiful Bluebird Sanctuary, on a hill overlooking the French Broad River, New Belgium Brewery, River Arts District, and mountains in the background. Park your car and relax in fun West Asheville. Walk 1.8 miles to downtown or hop the bus to avoid parking hassles. The spacious rooms are filled with antiques, original art, and library. Kick off your shoes for an acupressure massage on the river rock floors in the luxurious bathroom. Seasonal nesting bluebirds!

The space
Enjoy antiques, original art and photography, spacious high ceilings. The private deck is perfect for enjoying morning coffee or an evening cocktail. The home is well taken care of with all high-end comfortable furnishings, including a library. You will also find backgammon, dominos, and cards. Guests have the entire lower floor to themselves. We love our occasional nesting bluebirds, and some of our art reflects our affection.


Stroll downh

name: Downtown Loft with Balcony
description: This gorgeous home features exposed brick walls adorned with work from local artists with high ceilings creating a space full of energy and creativity. The wooden fixtures add an elegance to the decor that is elevated by the pastel-colored furniture.

name: In the Heart of West Asheville
description:
My home is within walking distance to trendy West Asheville's music venues, restaurants, and bars. Conveniently located close to the River Arts District, Downtown Asheville, and The Biltmore Estate. Enjoy a comfortable outdoor space for lounging, eating, and relaxing in a quiet neighborhood. We have a private queen bedroom and a shared bathroom waiting for you.

The space
Our space is ready for you! You will have a queen bedroom and a full shared bathroom. There is a large covered porch with a patio set so you can enjoy nice mornings or sunsets with a beer.

We will share the kitchen space. There will be room in the fridge for you, a coffee maker, a toaster, pots/pans, dishes, and utensils. The kitchen will be equipped for you to cook up easy meals during your stay. (The WNC Farmers Market is just 2 miles away and open 7 days/wk from 8-6. Grocery stores are within a mile.) Coffee and simple breakfast foods will be available as well.

Brewerie

name: Easy Access to Downtown & Hiking, Sparkling Clean!
description:
"Linda was a wonderful host! She was very responsive and accommodating. The house was in a great location and quick drive to downtown. Everything was very clean. We had absolutely no issues. I would definitely stay here again!"-Sarah.
6 mi to downtown Asheville, Biltmore, microbreweries, shopping, entertainment. 5 min to Folk Art Center & Blue Ridge Prkway Visitor Center, 5 min to Donald Ross golf course. Oasis of large wooded lots, mountain views most of the year. Walk to Mountain-to-Sea Trail!

The space
Not a shared property. You are the only ones staying and have complete privacy without feeling isolated. Set in a rolling wooded neighborhood, with views from an upper deck and lower patio. Plenty of room for 6-8. As many conveniences as being at home. Well-stocked and great for people with allergies/chemical sensitivities since no pets are allowed and our green cleaning service uses their own handmade nontoxic products. Book with the confidence that you wi

name: Mama Dee's Hide Away
description:
Come stay in this inviting, immaculate, peaceful apartment located in the lower level of her house in cool green Asheville. Let Mama Dee pamper you with pound cake and other goodies on your arrival!. Close to Asheville, Hendersonville and Brevard.
22 minutes to the Biltmore House.
11 minutes to Biltmore Park; movies and urban village.
3 minutes to Sierra Nevada brewery
5 minutes to the WNC Agricultural Center
5 minutes to Starbucks and Ingle's Grocery
7 minutes to home cooking diner

The space
The apartment is very clean and welcomes you in after a long day of sightseeing. Two separate bedrooms gives everyone loads of privacy! Sit in the swing and look off to the pond, you may see some fish. Parking on ground level with the apartment. Quiet peaceful space that will let you remember all you saw earlier in the day.

Guest access
Access to the patio of the apartment and parking area and of course the pond and gro

name: Montford Apt w/Deck, Quiet, Private, Walk Downtown
description:
The Hideaway is a totally private 750 sqft. one-bedroom apartment with a spacious living room, dining area, well-appointed kitchenette, queen bed, two large flat-screen TVs, private ensuite bathroom, private covered outdoor deck, and many other amenities. Located in Historic Montford, a short walk to downtown Asheville.

The space
This spacious 750 sqft. apartment is the entire lower level of our home. It offers sophisticated decor and exceptional amenities. The Hideaway has its own entrance and a private covered outdoor deck with ceiling fan and lounge chairs. The bedroom has a very comfortable queen-size bed, antique dresser, reading lamps, a 48-inch flat-screen TV, an ensuite bathroom with shower, and everything you need for a comfortable stay. The living space has a kitchenette, an inviting dining area, a comfortable couch and chair, 55-inch flat-screen TV, books, and board games. Both TVs include Roku Players with Netflix, HBO Max, Showtime, Hulu, Starz, and

name: Zen Mtn Treehouse Lower
description:
PRIVATE ROOM: Great location & setting. 7 min. to Dtwn 3 min. to Pkwy!
Upon entering..the peaceful vibe you feel, will confirm you made the right choice! You have your OWN 400 SF. PRIVATE LOWER LEVEL with queen bed & full bathroom, private covered deck, closet, TV, fridge, micro & Keurig.
Read full listing. Travelling with others? See: Zen Mtn Treehouse Main

Ill be sure to leave the light on! :)
Rebecca

The space
My space offers you a private country feel, yet you are just minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway & Downtown. My home gives you the sense of staying in a treehouse (its a home in the trees) with a Zen vibe...just a heads up....the treehouse seems to book up fast!

Guest access
The whole lower level is yours! Large bedroom, full bath, closet & private deck. I do have stairs. Things you will NOT experience at the treehouse: the hosts kids or neighbor noises (have neither!), feeling claustrophobic in a tin

name: Simple but Sweet Cottage House
description:
Simply but sweet 3 br, 1 b home with kitchen, open living room. Has a carport with ample parking. Hardwood floors, 3 qn beds, dining for 6, bath tub, shower and small deck with grill. It also has a washer/dryer. Biltmore Park and Asheville Outlets 3 miles. Close to Airport, Arboretum, Blue Ridge Parkway, Bent Creek biking and hiking. There are many activities on the French Broad River like Zen Tubing, fishing, canoeing and more. Only 20 min from downtown Asheville, and Biltmore Estate.

The space
Convenient, comfortable, cottage that is near the Arden Community Center where there is a playground. There is great grocery store Ingles about 1.5 miles away. Very near is a cute little community diner and convenience store called Corner Grill. You can eat in or get take out. On Long Shoals, you near I 26 are Biltmore Outlets with shops, dining and a movie theater. At Exit 40 is the Airport and many chain restaurants such as Ruby Tuesdays, Chili's and Olive Garden. The

name: Modern  Loft  in the center of West Asheville
description:
Located in the middle of West Asheville and close to the River Arts District, you are walking distance to great restaurants, microbreweries , coffee shops and music venues. Because we will be going through a complete Furniture change before your arrival, we are lowering our average nightly fee of $175 to $124. All new Furniture will be very similar in color and feel to the pictures shown. Take advantage of this great opportunity :)

Other things to note
must go up stairs to apt

name: Spacious, Garden Suite w/ Private Porch
description:
Come and stay at this clean and spacious studio-sized apartment in a quieter part of West Asheville. You're only a 5-minute drive to Haywood Road, West Asheville's main drag, and only 7 minutes to downtown and the River Arts District! The Biltmore Estate is also only 12 minutes aways! You'll have your own entrance, washer and dryer and screened in porch with a great view of the blooming backyard. Off-street parking is available.

Guest access
You have your own entrance to spacious studio apartment with smart tv, full bath with shower, kitchenette with toaster oven, french press, coffee/tea, mini fridge, plates/glasses, screened in porch, closet.

name: Charming Asheville Cottage at Beaver Lake
description:
This beautiful North Asheville cottage is 3.1 miles from downtown & a 2 minute walk to the lake. You'll love the indoor & outdoor space. Whether you're here to explore funky Asheville, music, the arts, shop till you drop or explore the outdoors & nature, this private lower level English Walkout cottage is perfect for relaxation & serenity. Long stays available; we’ve only blocked dates to deep clean between guests - message us. (URL HIDDEN)City of Asheville Permit Number: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN).

The space
We LOVE our Asheville home and the surrounding mountains - and you will too. Our cozy lower level guest unit is a place you will remember... for all the right reasons. Privacy and nature - and only 3.1 miles to downtown! The private driveway and parking lead to the lower level cottage with an oversized covered deck facing tiered gardens for that wonderful al-fresco feeling. A great place to sit and enjoy the outdoors while sipping that delicious glass of win

name: Large 2 bed loft in W. Avl, bring the whole family
description:
Centrally located in West Asheville and next to the River arts district. Walk to restaurants, Microbreweries, coffee shops, music venues and my favorite, Ice Cream at "The Hop". A luxury stay without the cost of downtown Prices .. You’ll love my place because you can literally walk out of your front door and you are in the middle of whats considered the most friendly , walk-able neighborhood in Asheville. The apt comes with parking.. only 3 mins to downtown by car.

The space
what I love about the space is that its like gong back to a private spa resort. No matter what weve doing during the day, Galleries, Out for a Hike, floating on the river or catching a concert, we can always head back to the loft, never an issue with parking, Enjoy the views from one of the many the outdoor decks ( you can see the mountains surrounding the city), watch an incredible sunset, make dinner at home if you are too tired to head back out, share a drink with friends or just chil

name: Studio 54: Private cottage, 30-day
description:
Great landing zone if you’re looking to move to Asheville permanently.

Off-street parking beside the carport. Walk across the deck to your own little building: Bed, Bath, kitchenette. Heated and Air-conditioned, fast free internet, Roku TV (ie netflix etc), back yard pond, deck.

Very quiet neighborhood, 6 minutes (2 miles) to Mission Hospital, 8 min to downtown.

The space
Private building, not shared with me or anyone else. The bathroom has shower and toilet; the sink is in the kitchen area.
Nice wide parking space beside the carport; ramp to the tiny house.
Wi-fi is high-speed and reliable.

Guest access
Kitchenette: Refrigerator, microwave, sink, dishes;
Shower: towels, soap, shampoo
Couch / bed with good mattress
Other: desk and chair, rack for hanging clothes, shelves, night stands.

Other things to note
Backyard pond, deck.

name: Explore Asheville at a Bright Pad with Pops of Rich Red
description: Browse art galleries downtown, then admire this light-filled apartment's collection of pieces inspired by the surrounding mountains and local graffiti. Pull up a floral and perspex dining chair and people-watch from the bay window over lunch.

name: Asheville Studio w/ Sleeping Loft - Walk Downtown!
description:
Our private Sleeping Loft Studio is attached to our historic home, a 10 minute walk from Downtown Asheville in the Montford Neighborhood. Easy access to local cafes, coffee shops, bars, the Greenway, and UNCA. Set on 1/2 acre with expansive lawn and garden, the space itself is well-lit with an eco/tiny house vibe! Ideal for solo adventurers, couples that love unique, tiny spaces & business travelers. We invite kid, puppy, and LGBTQ friendly folks to be our guests (no additional pets, please).

Guest access
The studio space is reserved just for guest use, and while attached to the main house, accessible only via a separate entrance.

name: Asheville Cottage With All the Comforts of Home
description:
My place is close to the airport and family-friendly activities. Walking distance to great restaurants. 10 minutes to Biltmore House, 15 to downtown Asheville. Super comfy, excellent location. Privacy and convenience for your awesome vacation. Two bedrooms upstairs (spiral stairs) as well as the large full bath. 1/2 bath located on main level with laundry. If you have a need for more space, the house next door is available.

The space
Get comfortable, relax in the shade while grilling dinner on the gas grill. Fully equipped kitchen with room to visit around the island. There's an extra mini fridge for beverages! Your dog is welcome but please keep him/her off the furniture and clean up in the yard please. There is no smoking in the house but outdoors ok, ash-trays available. Washer and dryer available if you want to do some laundry. Games, TV, and wireless internet are there for your enjoyment. I've thought of everything but if there is something you need, I have

name: Radiant Apartment in Downtown Asheville
description: Recline on a hip sofa within an uncluttered living room boasting mid-century furnishings bathed in daylight from bay windows. Funky abstract artworks, rich hardwood floors, and modern accents unite for an air of buoyancy within this colorful home.

name: Explore the Arts District from a Century Building Apartment
description: Make breakfast in a renovated kitchen with upgraded appliances and sit in multicolored chairs in a sunny bay window. Lively red accents are found throughout the apartment, from patterned bedroom cushions to a pair of family size laundry machines.

name: Sunporch Suite w/ private entrance
description:
Enjoy your stay in a quiet residential neighborhood with your own private entrance, bathroom, and sunporch. We love Asheville and cannot wait to share this city with you! Located in Asheville with all it has to offer, yet enjoy the woods away from the city noise.
Business travelers, couples, and solo adventurers from all backgrounds, ethnicities, religions, and sexual orientations are welcome here!

***This space can also be reserved with an additional bedroom here. Contact me for information.

The space
Our private guest bedroom and sunporch are waiting for you! Located in North Asheville just 10 minutes from downtown we offer a quiet private setting for you to relax. *We live in the other part of the house and have a private entrance, too.
As you enter in through your private entrance on to the sunporch you will see that you have extra space to relax during your stay. There is a new mini-split Heat/Air conditioner addition on the sunporch to

name: On famous West Asheville corridor. Walk everywhere
description:
Easy and comfortable as it gets. Conveniently located less than one block off Haywood road. Private drive. Private entrance. Private bathroom. Kitchenette. Large room with vaulted ceilings. Roku. Super clean and cozy. You can't beat this location. Bakery, pubs, restaurants, coffee shops, game rooms, salons, breweries, all 2 min walk away yet astoundingly private!

The space
Perfect size for two people. New bathroom in aug 2016. Tv with Roku. Super cozy queen bed. Vaulted ceiling. Kitchenette with basics: toaster and convection oven, coffee maker, hot water percolator, utensils, mini fridge. Private drive and off street parking. Can fit two vehicles. Private entrance and patio with table and chairs. Simple, clean, cozy, and superb location.

I love this space. I'd live in it all the time if I didn't have kids!

Note: twice I've gotten feedback about the pump system. When you use the sink, toilet, or shower the water pumps up and out as opposed

name: #2-Downtown Asheville Traveler's Private Haven
description:
A comfortable room with a private bathroom for weary travelers who want to be downtown! No frills and not a fancy B&B: clean, quiet, convenient location. Asheville is outside your door at this historic 100+year-old boarding house. A place with history, character and real people. A private, ground-floor, cozy room with queen bed, table and chair, mini-fridge, microwave, wifi, small closet, high ceilings, and wood floors.

The space
This cozy room is perfect for the solo traveler, with a queen bed, sitting chair, writing desk, fridge , microwave, and shelves. Several windows let in natural light.

At the Gray Rock Inn, downtown Asheville is right outside your door, and our reasonable rates mean your money can be spent on enjoying the city. Conveniently located on Biltmore Ave, we are walkable to breweries, music venues, art galleries, boutiques and restaurants.

The Gray Rock Inn is a great value, a "no frills" but clean and comfy place to expl

name: Lovely Space//Private Entrance and Bath
description:
Close to Biltmore, Downtown, and the Parkway! This lovely light filled room has a private entrance and bath, queen sized bed, wardrobe, mini-fridge, and a sweet porch to boot! Located just south of the Biltmore House, 10 minutes to downtown, less than 10 minutes to Mission Hospital, and right down the road from the Blue Ridge Parkway. Come explore Asheville and stay in a clean, modern, comfortable space!

The space
This room is fresh, and clean with a simple modern flair. It has a separate entrance and a private bath, so you can come and go as you please. The room has a lot of natural light and sits right off of the kitchen for easy access. My room is on the far side of the house for your privacy. There is a queen sized bed and mini-fridge. You have access to the washer and dryer and back and front porches.

Guest access
Washer, dryer and kitchen. Front and back porches too.

Other things to note
There is a $25 c

name: Beautiful Mountain Home with View
description:
Great open floor plan. Great for outdoor enthusiasts. This home is adjacent to Pisgah National Forest and 1/2 mile to trail head for miles of hiking, running, and/or biking. Gorgeous views, large covered deck, gas grill, and six person hot tub.

Just minutes to a grocery store, restaurants, and the Asheville Outlets. 20 minutes to West Asheville, 20-30 minutes to Downtown Asheville, Biltmore House, and the Airport depending on traffic.

name: Cozy Room in South Asheville
description:
Cozy South Asheville home. Spacious backyard & nestled in a quiet, safe neighborhood. 20-25 minute drive to downtown Asheville. 8 minute drive to Biltmore park with restaurants & cinema. 20 minute drive to the Biltmore Estate. 15 minute drive to the entrance of the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
My house is very cozy and inviting.

The room has a queen size comfortable mattress. There's a desk for doing work or reading. The kitchen is fully equipped with a fridge, range and an oven. The living room is cozy and the space is open.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the living room, bedroom, and bathroom. The bathroom is not shared with others. Items can be stored in the fridge and cooking can be done upon request.

Other things to note
This location is so special because you are close enough to downtown and all its activities while also nestled in a comfortable and quiet neighborhood where you can relax

name: The Zen Cabin
description:
Close to downtown Asheville (less than 2 miles), Grove Park Inn, Botanical Gardens, and UNCA, you can walk to a meal, movie, & brewery. A quaint retreat--a serene space with high ceilings, natural wood & large windows. It's a small building next to our house in a private, peaceful, and simple setting. Includes a private full bath, wi-fi, meditation space, a desk, a mini-fridge, & coffee maker all in a comfy quiet neighborhood. It's great for couples, solo adventurers, & business travelers.

The space
It's own private building with it's own private full bath. A lockbox and key, allows you to come and go as you wish. It's a quiet and pretty space with lots of windows and wood throughout.

Guest access
You can park in the driveway or in front of our house. The Zen Cabin is at the end of the driveway to the left of our house. There is a separate entrance for guest access to which guests have their own keys.

Other things to not

name: Whole House just off Haywood Rd.
description:
PERMIT # 16-07675PZ

My place is super close to West Asheville's restaurants and nightlife. Uphill from River Arts District and Carrier Park.. . You’ll love my place because of the large living area and the variety of plants, comfy beds and the front porch. My place is good for couples, business travelers, families (with kids).

The space
The House is very close to the action of West Asheville. There are great spaces to relax with a growler after the brewery tours, especially on the front porch. There are great local bars and breakfast places within walking distance.
Chill out in my spacious living room and read a book and listen to a record.
Enjoy the privacy amidst the easy access to the variety of West Asheville.

Recent change: Zia taqueria has turned the parking lot next to the house into its outdoor restaurant. You will hear the patrons next door from 4:00-10:00, hopefully it makes your vacation feel lively. However, If you a

name: Private flat w/ Kitchenette & bathroom, Monthly
description:
My place is walking distance to bars, restaurants, greenways and the West Asheville Farmer's market. The home is 2 miles from the River Art's District where you can experience local artists, music and family-friendly activities.

I am happy to help you coordinate hiking and river trips while you are in town. I would even be willing to guide at an additional fee. There is a canoe, kayak and bikes available for use.

My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Other things to note
I only allow long term stays with a minimum of 29 nights.

name: Mountain Glow- close to downtown and BR Parkway.
description:
Guests are an 8-10 minute drive to the center of town and walking distance to the Blue Ridge Parkway and the Mountains to Sea Trail. We'll tell where and how to find these trailheads. Guests will love the stunning views, wide open sky and its comfort and privacy. It's a real mountain paradise out here. This spot is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). I can direct you to my favorite places to eat, drink and explore in this beautiful town.

The space
Guests will feel at home in this comfortable, eclectic apartment. Although a 10 minute drive from the heart of Downtown, it feels a million miles away at this cozy retreat. Each bedroom has it's own door on to the large porch to sip their coffee and plan their day in beautiful Asheville. The home is surrounded by about 20 acres of rolling fields, making wonderful clear 180 degree views of mountains and stunning views of the night sky. It's a 15 minute walk up a gravel road

name: Blue Ridge Mountain Home Away from Home
description:
We are a 6 minute drive to all the funky restaurants and shopping in West Asheville. We are also close to the beautiful river arts district and many breweries. We are a 15 minute drive to the city center of this sweet little mountain town. I am available to answer questions or make suggestions on things to do around town. I have lived here for 25 years and know all of the great hiking trails and restaurants!

The space
COVID update: we take cleaning very seriously! I work in the health care industry and understand the level of disinfecting that is necessary.
Please be assured that we follow CDC guidelines and we are putting a lot more attention towards cleaning and airing out in between guests! We wash all comforters and blankets as well as all other surfaces in between guests so you can be assured of a clean space

This house is a split level house/duplex. My family and I live upstairs and rent out the basement apartment. I value privacy

name: ~Front Porch Retreat~Sleeps 5~2.5 mi to D/T~
description:
Our Front Porch Retreat is a cozy place to stay for hikers, families, business travelers, & UNC-A visitors. We have a big front porch, fully-stocked kitchen, and great shower!
Our renovated home is located in a MODEST and quaint little Blue Ridge Mt. neighborhood that is being revitalized.
