We are situated close to the French Broad River, River Arts District, Zillacoah Brewery, UNC-A, & 5 min (2.5 mi.) to downtown Asheville: VIA BROADWAY. Uber comes here! Book your trip to AVL with us today!

The space
Our space is unique because it was built one hundred and one years ago, and has been restored to its original condition. Superstitious Southerners often painted their porch ceilings "haint" blue, a soft blue-green, to ward off evil spirits called haints. So when you arrive, look up at the porch ceiling and you'll see the "haint blue"! The cast iron sink in the laundry room is one of the original (c. 1918) features I left in the house and shows its age a little,

name: THE SWEET SPOT- serene hilltop, close to downtown
description:
Serene hilltop residence with panoramic view of mountains. Well stocked kitchen for entertaining or celebrating a special life event or a perfect place for quiet reflection in a romantic setting.
*Drive 10 minutes or < to
Downtown shopping, theater
Art district
Biltmore Estate
NC Arboretum
Zen Tubing - French Broad River
Lake Powhatan - swimming
Blue Ridge Parkway
Fly fishing

Newly constructed home, central to a wide variety of outdoor activities., including waterfalls, fishing, hiking, canoeing, tubing, biking and much more!

Guest access
Guests have their own entrance, and have sole access to a two bedroom, two bath, two porch dwelling.

Other things to note
Couple of unique things about my place are -
When the sun is shining (which

description:
As artists, designers and builders, we created this unique space for ourselves. Our apartment is part of a remodeled Arts and Crafts bungalow with a separate entrance, plus a cooking area. We love calling this home, where we easily walk to "downtown" West Asheville. This hip part of town has experienced a cultural growth explosion with: nightlife, music, public transportation, restaurants, coffee shops, brewpubs, a teahouse, and much more. Plus, downtown Asheville is only a 10 minute drive!

The space
There is a very functioning full kitchen. We happily occupied this space while we totally renovated our upstairs living space. We will have coffee (a drip coffee maker) and teas. There are several grocery stores in the area. However, there are excellent restaurants nearby!

Guest access
You will have the complete apartment to yourselves.

Other things to note
Our apartment is the lower level of our house. A private entrance

description:
All are welcome, no exceptions. Covid protocol professional cleaning.
House designed by EW Grove of Grove Park Inn. 2 bedrooms: 1 king, 1 queen. Max 4.
Onsite licensed massage, yoga, Arbonne facial/foot soak or infrared spa w advance appt.
Walk to eats: Copper Crown, Filo (breakfast, L&D), East Village Grill, Ultimate Ice Cream, Starbucks (Ingles). 1/2 mi frm BR Prkway at Folk Art Center.
Well behaved dogs only, 2 max.
Any addl guests to property approved by host in adv.

The space
Convenient comfortable oasis for relaxation and rest after exploring AVL. Easy access to downtown, Biltmore , Grove Park Inn, breweries and hiking. Bustling area of East AVL, walking distance to good food. Dog friendly with large fenced yard. Fire pit (firewood provided) and grill for your enjoyment. Host onsite in private apt.

Guest access
Guests have private use of house, covered front porch, fire pit area and large pet friendly

name: Cottage at Green Oaks Community
description:
The heart of downtown Asheville is less than 10 min. away! All the areas hotspots are super close to our 5 acres. Be it live music, breweries on the river, tubing, zip lining, fab restaurants, hiking, the Blue Ridge Parkway, spas, hot springs or what have you...the Cottage will be your perfect getaway.
Great for adventurers, lovers, writers, artists & tree huggers.

The space
The Cottage is in a very secure area minutes from downtown and yet off the beaten track. Uber is easy to catch a ride if you're out tasting the wonderful elixers A'ville has to offer!

Guest access
Besides the Cottage, you have access to the woods, gardens, outdoor pagoda area and shared laundry room. I have a mans & woman bike if you wanna bike to the lake. Asheville however is behind time in being bike friendly. If you bike downtown you'd want to take bikes 1/2 mi. further & bike on safe designated bike paths from there to downtown, the river Arts district and mor

description:
The cottage is close to everything Asheville has to offer. Walk or bike to Biltmore Village or The Biltmore Estate, or take a quick drive to downtown or the Blue Ridge Parkway. On the same street as the library, park with tennis courts, and playground.
Family friendly neighborhood with sidewalks.
Owners are professionals and live in main house with two young children and dog.
Both bedrooms have full beds.
Parking for one car.

*Recently upgraded internet for better work from home experience.

name: Asheville mountain living
description:
Our place is a just 10 minutes to Asheville and Black Mountain. Local attractions include Biltmore Estate, Cataloochee and Wolf Laurel Ski Resorts, The Cove, breweries, and many trails. My teenage kids and I enjoy hosting, and like to share a sunset on the porch or coffee in the morning. With our busy school schedules, guests find they have much of the day to themselves. Our home is great for couples or solo adventurers. We welcome kids, and furry friends (dogs are $20 per night pet fee)

The space
Our guest room is located on the ground floor opening onto the shared kitchen and open dining/living space.

Guest access
You can enjoy sunset on the porch looking out at a beautiful forested mountain landscape. Or enjoy a cool drink in the shade of the side yard and BBQ area.

Other things to note
Pet fee is $20 a night for one dog and $35 for two. Payable at time of check-in.

name: Downtown Furnished Studio!! Close to Everything!!!
description:
Near Downtown Asheville and Mission Hospital. Call today to reserve this immaculate and chic-furnished efficiency-only 3 walking blocks to the Center of Downtown Asheville. This adorable turn key rental provides everything you need. Monthly rental or up to 6 month rental contracts available today. Utilities included, high speed internet, Netflix, A/C / heating, kitchenette, refrigerator, stove, Keurig, dishwasher, Queen bed, full bath, washer/dryer. Parking . Privacy w/ downtown convenience!

The space
All of the conveniences of a large home contained in a quaint setting.

Guest access
On site parking, high speed internet and Netflix included

The house is well cared for, homey and comfortable with some antique furnishings, comfortable beds, efficient kitchen, and a beautiful dining table thats been in the family for nearly 100 years. The house has central air conditioning, Netflix, wifi, and Bose stereo with a broad selection of CD's available. A great place to relax and enjoy Asheville.

The space
This West Asheville home is a peaceful place to relax and renew. Walkable to Haywood Rd., you will find excellent restaurants, bars, cafes, yoga studios, music and arts. A quick 5 minute drive and you'll be in thriving downtown Asheville, surrounded by live music, breweries, and more wonderful food. Feel like taking a hike, mountain biking, or just relaxing in nature? You can be immersed in Pisgah National Forest in just 15 short minutes.
I have been vegetarian most of my life and would love it if you would tr

description:
This adorable throwback flat is located IN downtown. Private parking, walk everywhere. Epicenter of the south slope, you can walk to all the breweries within 5 minutes, anywhere downtown within 10 minutes. Second floor, 440 SQ FT apartment in historic house. 1 bedroom, living room with IKEA sectional/sofa bed, roku TV, equipped kitchen and bathroom with claw foot tub/ shower surround. All 4 of our Airbnb's are in the same building if needed for large groups.

TV has Roku with Sling and Netflix, etc...but not local channels for some sports and such, of course tons of breweries to walk to with games showing. No pets and no smoking on premises.

Guest access
Access to entire apt available, including dresser and hangers i

description:

Amenities include a private and spacious bedroom and bathroom, large lounge area, outdoor patio with lights, daily coffee and tea, private fridge with complimentary local brews, and a wet bar. There are mountain trails of every skill level nearby for biking or hiking.

The space

Our house is only 12 minutes to downtown Asheville, less than 10 minutes to spectacular foliage on the Blue Ridge Parkway, and 15 minutes to Black Mountain. Some of the area's best breweries are within 10-15 minutes of our home. We can answer any question about area attractions and provide great recommendations for restaurants.

Guest access
Guest access is the entire downstairs area, o

description:

Guest access
This is a guest suite on the ground level of our home with i

Welcome to CasaLina! This is a newly renovated arts and crafts bungalow from the 1920's, centrally located. The location of the house is minutes from south slope brewing district, Biltmore Village, downtown Asheville or the River Arts District. CasaLina is a very comfortable and cozy environment with art work featuring Latin America culture.
Our best friend Carolina is our co-host (guess why CasaLina?) and she will be contacting you and answering all your questions.

CasaLina is a quaint, lovely bungalow, centrally located, just minutes away from the south slope brewing district, Biltmore Village, downtown Asheville or the River Arts District.
CasaLina is located in one of the more diverse areas of town. Hamilton is a mixed use street with several medical related businesses and residential housing. It is a quiet street with not much through traffic.

Guest access
Guests will enjoy full access of the house. Two Bedrooms, d

name: NEW: Elegant Modern Suite & Short Walk to Downtown
description:
WALK to the Grove Arcade. Return from Town and sip some wine on your private deck before venturing out for the evening. Enjoy your soaking tub before retiring into Luxurious Bamboo Sheets THE SOFTEST sheets you will EVER Experience & cuddle up with a Sherpa blanket. Enjoy high ceilings, a desk/work nook with polished Concrete floors. Chillaxin? Lounge on the couch, watch cable TV or take a Yoga mat & stretch - or kick back on the large covered deck, watch the rain and sip your morning coffee.

The space
This is the entire lower level of my new recently built craftsman home. Since the house is built into a hill here in Montford, the "lower" level is easily 20 feet above the backyard has a large deck with a view of the trees. I recently renovated it and the floor is a polished concrete. Since I live in the upper level, you will hear me and my dogs above you, walking around. And life! I sleep on the 3rd level, and do my best to keep quiet after 10pm above you.
<

name: Lavender room
description:
My place is close to public transport, parks, and art and culture. You’ll love my place because it's in walking distance to all of West Asheville's must-see spots, and a short drive to great hikes and waterfalls. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids).

The large east facing french doors that provide a lot of natural light.

Guest access

This basement level suite is a clean, new-built space with lots of natural light, privacy and views of our urban homestead and the mountains beyond. It is the perfect spot from which to explore Asheville and the surrounding area. Located just 2 miles from downtown, it is an easy walk to the French Broad River as well as the many restaurants and shops of West Asheville. This space is great for couples, families, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The space

For visitors with children, there are loads of board games and books that can be enjoyed during your stay as well as a collection of toys that can be pulled from the bedroom closet.

The private bedroom has a queen size bed and there are two twin sized IKEA

4 bdrm 2 bath spacious home in a city setting! We are located across from business and a factory! If this bothers you this may not be the best rental to fit your needs. located 2.6 miles to downtown Asheville. High speed WiFi and ROKU on all TVs through the house! Large decks on both sides and very big driveway! We have an arcade pacman game, cornhole, and 6 free tubes for guests to use on the French broad river which is just across the street as well as other games etc.

The master bdrm is located downstairs and has a full size bed and its own bathroom with bathtub and shower plus toilet and sink. The other bdrms are upstairs and 2 contain

Newly constructed studio apartment located at the doorstep of the Bent Creek and Pisgah trail systems, NC Arboretum, Blue Ridge Parkway and the French Broad River. Quick access to both outdoor adventures and downtown Asheville with world class shopping and dining. Features a curated collection of vintage Mid-Century furnishings with a stunning marble master bathroom and a well appointed modern mini-kitchenette. Beautiful safe suburban neighborhood and very friendly hosts!

The space
Gorgeous newly constructed studio with trail access in Bent Creek. Located <1 mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway, 5 minutes from I26, and 12-15 minutes from Downtown Asheville. Home is in a quiet residential neighborhood on a cul-d-sac street.

For the Adventurers: We love to host adventure lovers. Bent Creek is known for exceptional Mountain biking, birding, and hiking. Studio has a safe covered area for locking up bikes or boats. We also provide local trail maps and books,

description:
A vibrant & ambient private ground level studio apartment, private entrance & a single parking space. Offering one queen bed, a twin day bed and an extra twin mattress to comfortably sleep 4, (can accommodate up to 6 w/ added qn air mattress). A sweet space w/ full bath, laundry, a mini split (air control), a kitchenette, a nice soft insulating floor great for yogis, littles learning to mobilize, and keeping winter tootsies warm. Close to the BRP, Biltmore, breweries, the airport & downtown.

The space

Not to mention an internationally celebrated portrait photographer and a licensed massage therapist/yoga teacher are your hosts and you can book our services as well!!
We look forward to helping make

name: Convenient Cozy Cottage near West Asheville
description:
Our stone cottage is close to West Asheville, city center and family-friendly activities. You’ll love our place because of the coziness, convenience, and uniqueness. The cottage is great for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and adult families. Sorry, no children nor pets allowed. No exceptions.

Located just a short 5 mile drive from the fantastic and scenic Downtown Asheville, North Carolina Arboretum, Biltmore House, and Blue Ridge Parkway. Very accessible to I-40 and I-26.

The space
Note: Cable TV and Internet/Wifi are included.

As the only occupants of the cottage, you will have access to the entire main floor with all amenities. Parking in driveway or in parking area at the back of the house. Easily accessible entrance.

Other things to note
Need to checkin a little earlier? Contact host and we will do our best to accommodate your request.

Le Petit Bleu is a warm, color-filled, cozy artisan cottage. The home is pet friendly w bamboo floors and tile. We offer a coffee/espresso machine, fully stocked kitchen, plush comfy bathrobes, aromatherapy vaporizer w essential oils, Sealy Posturepedic pillow-top king sized beds in both bedrooms each w four pillows, a large covered deck w privacy curtains, twinkle lights, a bistro set, and a fenced back yard. We are 5 minutes by car from downtown Asheville and its wonderful art and culture.

The space
We are a little bit old school -- in that we do not have an automatic dishwasher. =)

Guest access
All rooms of the home are accessible to guests.

Other things to note
This is a non-smoking property -- both inside AND outside. If evidence is found that this house rule has been broken you will incur an addition $100 cleaning fee. We are sorry to be so strict but removing smoke odor is extremely difficult. We also res

description:
This beautiful duplex borders Pisgah National Forest and is less than 15 minutes from downtown and the Biltmore Estate. Less than 5 minutes down the road, you can shop at the outlet mall or access the Blue Ridge Parkway. Take a tube down the French Broad river, explore the River Arts District, or even sip a beer at one of Asheville's many breweries. Great for couples, families, and large groups.

The space
This is one of the few places in Asheville where you can feel like your staying in the woods while actually being down the street from many of Asheville's popular places to visit.

Guest access
Kitchen, grill, Netflix, wifi, closets in every bedroom

Other things to note
This is one unit of a duplex. This unit has three bedrooms and two bathrooms.

name: Classy, Comfy Quiet Crash Pad in Downtown Asheville
description:
***Note about Covid and Cleanliness
I do not hire out cleaners and I clean the unit myself.
At this time, I take every precaution to keep you safe.
I have complied with Airbnb’s Pandemic Cleaning Guidelines and I comply with the CDC recommendations.
*all linens and blankets are washed between guests
*after cleaning I use approved products to sanitize all surfaces, door knobs/handles, remotes and light switches.

Easily stroll home from exploring music, food, beer, and art venues downtown. Relax in a living room with an inviting green-and-grey design motif. Soak in a bathtub before crossing a quiet carpeted floor to a bedroom with a bold wall covering.

name: Master bedroom in the heart of West Asheville
description:
Have your own private sleeping quarters just a stone's throw from everything West Asheville has to offer! You can surprisingly enjoy a quiet walk down my street; however at the end of the street is Haywood-home to numerous cafes, bars, & restaurants! Additionally, you are 2miles from downtown & 10 minutes from the Blueridge Prkwy. Under 'The Space' click on 'more' & read EVERYTHING under Guest Access, & if you have questions or need more details, please message me via AirBnB prior to booking.

The space
Your 'home away from home' is a medium-sized dwelling which was built around 1930. Although I am an acupuncturist not an artist, I have been told that my home has a warm, artsy feel to it. Currently, I cannot afford a landscaper so please do not be put off by my somewhat 'wild' front yard. The house is in an excellent location & has an arts-n-crafts stye charm, without being extravagant! After clicking on 'more' & reading everything under guest access, if you ha

name: Cozy--private entrance and bath,  central location
description:
Our home is located in a beautiful, safe neighborhood of single family homes on the municipal golf course in Asheville. We are located two miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway, four miles to downtown or to the Biltmore House, seven miles to the River Arts District. Easy access to the interstate makes our home convenient to all area attractions.
Honoring diversity is one of our highest values and we welcome all to our airbnb space.

The space
After a full day of adventures, come home to a peaceful and inviting space.
The bedroom features a comfortable full size bed, a sitting area with recliner and laptop table, and a wardrobe for hanging clothes as well as plenty of drawer space.
--Special note about privacy and noise: with any shared home space, there will probably be some shared noise. The sound does travel both directions in our home, but we respect your privacy and use a sound machine upstairs so we do not hear your conversations downstairs.

name: CozyCottageWalk2town, some availability
description:
Welcome, the heart of town. 4 blocks to AYC Yoga 3wkDISCOUNT, . NO CLEANING/hidden fees. 1 bedroom available at this time, limited avail. Ask about flexible dates. DT Food&Music. Cozy home yoga/meditation students, outdoor/art/music explorers. Natural, composting household, no smoke/ drugs. Older, clean home w character. Whole house airfilter and AIR. Small private room w full comfy organic mattress

The space
WELCOME ALL. For 3week yoga students,discount. AND There are pollinator plants and a fig tree in the front, some gardens in the back. I make smoothies using greens and medicinal herbs from the yard! The bedroom is a small cozy room in the back of this 100 year old home. Featured is a new organic mattress sitting on a natural wood bed frame. There is closet and shelf space, nightstand with light and room for books. This house is well used and cleaned with natural cleansers. On street parking. THANKS so much. If your budget is tight, let me know.
<

name: Dog-Friendly Home close to Downtown Asheville
description:
Let 4-legged friends run free in the large fenced backyard, while their owners enjoy the front deck's mountain view, as well as the gas grill and fire pit. Pieces by local artists are featured inside, along with fun items like a safe repurposed as a table.

This home has gone through a complete remodel within the last few years but still maintains all of the character and charm that was built into it in 1960. The house has two bedrooms, with two queen beds, and a queen sleeper sofa. It's in a quiet neighborhood and has great views of the night sky but is still conveniently located to downtown.

name: Bear's Den in Historic Montford
description:
We are once again offering our newly-constructed apartment in Historic Montford, just a short walk to all the action of downtown Asheville! The cozy, bright space is well-appointed with a private entrance, deck, and screened-in porch overlooking a beautiful ravine of foliage.
As your hosts, we fully respect your privacy. We may also have a local insider tip or two so don't hesitate to ask for anything at all ;) Your comfort & overall stay in Asheville is #1 for us.
See you soon
Ashley & Jeff

The space
You can truly feel safe in Bear's Den as we have chosen to install a top-of-the-line air purifying system so that the relaxation can begin the moment you arrive. Come sip a cup of tea on the deck while watching the Cardinals fly from tree to tree. Snuggle up on the couch with your honey & watch a movie. Have one of Asheville's many amazing local beers on the screened-in porch. Cook a savory dinner in the well-appointed kitchen. Plan tomorrow's trip

name: HOPS, Skip and a Jump to Downtown and River Arts
description:
Located in the heart of AVL, the sidewalk will take you to the downtown and River Arts District areas.

COMPLETE privacy: King bed in bedroom, small sectional sofa w/single bed option in living room, full kitchen, serene screened in porch, 65" TV w/ Netflix & local channels & coffee bar.

Curate, Orange Peel, Wicked Weed = 1 mi
Vivian & The Grey Eagle = .4 mi
New Belgium, Riverwalk, Hi Wire & Wedge = .6 mi
Biltmore = 2.8 mi

The space
As someone who enjoys using Airbnb when I travel, I have tried to select nicer things for my guests to enjoy (towels, bedding, furniture, etc). Guests have used words like "cozy," "quiet," "refreshing" and "relaxing" to describe their experiences in the apartment.

Guest access
Complete privacy and access to the guest apartment. For security purposes, your personal code to the front door will be provided the day of your arrival.

Other things to note
$

name: Asheville Tiny House
description:
Experience tiny living in this unique 20 foot long tiny house! Located inside the Pisgah National Forest in Bent Creek close to hiking, mountain biking, the Blue Ridge Parkway and French Broad River. Situated in the far corner of my backyard, in a suburban neighborhood. This tiny house is quiet and private and boasts a kitchen, bathroom, queen sized bed and loft for lounging. Parking on the street. Only 9 miles from downtown Asheville and 2 miles to the outlet mall. Uber and Lyft available.

The space
This tiny house is tucked away in my quiet suburban backyard, outside Asheville city limits, but still close to everything! Minutes away from the Blue Ridge Parkway and access to the French Broad river. Mountain biking trails start a little over a mile away. And only a 20 minute drive into downtown Asheville. The backyard is a shared space. Feel free to use the fire pit and bring a hammock to hang from the giant oak tree.

This tiny house is a BRA

name: Spacious Basement Apt—2 Quiet Acres near Airport
description:
Our 1BD, 1 BA huge basement apartment is loaded with comfort, convenience, natural light, privacy and modern touches. Sleeps up to 6 (we recommend 4 adults but have had 6 comfortably per many guest’s feedback). Feel like you are in the country with mountain views from the driveway, yet we are 5 mins from Biltmore Park, 10 mins—Sierra Nevada, 15–Avl Outlets and 18-20 mins—Downtown Asheville. Kids love our play set and swing! We are an active family, with young kids who live above...welcome!!

The space
Feel removed from the hustle and bustle of downtown in this convenient setting on 2 acres with additional land behind. Daylight basement apartment with tons of room. Sleeps 6. We recommend 4 adults in the space, but have had 6 comfortably per many guest’s report. If you’re a young family, message us first and we can decrease cost of additional guests.

We are located the following distances:
*5 mins: Biltmore Park (shopping, movies, restaurants, spa

name: Retro Vintage-West Asheville Urban Abode
description: Embrace the alluring aesthetics of this urban space. The residence features a vibrant dark blue interior contrasted by bright yellow surfaces, antique furnishings, vintage art, and varied motifs!

name: Nanny's Place in the Great Smoky Mountains
description:
Clean, safe, peaceful home located just 2.5 miles to shops & dining in Biltmore Village and Biltmore Estate main gate, 2 miles to Blue Ridge parkway, 5 miles to downtown, 6 miles to the River Arts District; grocery, restaurants and delicious coffee less than 3 miles away. Well appointed kitchen, lots of space, 3BR/2BA, super comfy beds. Great for couples / business travelers / friends getaway / family reconnect-time or SOLO retreats.

The space
-CLUTTER FREE - Spacious 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home (in residential neighborhood) with living, dining, kitchen and outdoor areas.
-Calm spaces (remember that novel you never have the time to start?......this is a great place to read it)
-Private deck for quiet, meditative yoga, sipping wine and making s'mores around the firepit.
-BBQ & picnic area - Coleman propane grill available for use, $10 additional (charge covers propane and grill clean up).
-Alfresco breakfast area
-Corn Hole toss game

name: City Serenity
description:
Private terrace level suite in my partially renovated home. Two bedrooms, one bath, living room + kitchenette. Quiet neighborhood convenient to downtown, interstate and much more. Owner lives upstairs in this urban duplex.
Private entrance, living room with large window view of woods. Microwave/ toaster, Keurig+ coffee, agave nectar, welcome cold filtered water. One mile hilly walk or quick uber ride to center of downtown, restaurants, music venues and festivals.

The space
Spacious (900sq ft)duplex unit, entrance porch halfway down driveway. No inside door that connects this space with the upstairs. Is above ground, not a basement. Eclectic throughout. Feels like a rustic mountain cabin. Natural gas heat, new central air and renovated bathroom. New windows throughout. Because it is on the terrace level it stays cooler in the summer and warmer in winter. Strict no smoking or pets.

Guest access
Front door has an electronic lock.

name: Cozy Cottage in the Woods Near Biltmore
description:
This charming guest house backs up to the Biltmore Estate forest, and is a short drive from downtown Asheville, the antiques district, restaurants, breweries, and hiking trails. We have recently restored this beautiful little cabin, which is one of the original Biltmore buildings. You'll love the comfortable bed, front porch, gorgeous decor, wooded surroundings & new bathroom with heated tile floors and a 1933 claw foot tub. Perfect for couples looking for a romantic getaway and solo travelers.

The space
This rustic barn-red guesthouse has been beautifully restored, and is in a detached house directly behind our residence. Our property is convenient to the Biltmore Estate (it used to be part of the Biltmore property), as well as downtown Asheville, and is set back in the woods. It is a 300 sq foot bedroom/living room plus a large bathroom and features gorgeous heartwood floors, whitewashed pine walls, a fireplace (non-functioning, but with original ‘Biltmore’ s

name: Separate HVAC | CDC Clean | Walk Downtown
description:
CDC certified cleaned with independent HVAC system. Enjoy a craft beer at your favorite brewery, visit the Biltmore Estate,hikes, etc all from this Modern ground level apartment with South Asian flare, set in a storybook Tudor in downtown. Short (0.9 mile) walk to the CENTER of downtown, Trader Joe's (0.4 miles), Whole Foods (0.3 miles), High Five Coffee (0.3 miles) and Archetype brewing (0.3 miles). NOT handicap accessible & although we have soundproofed ceilings, there is some footfall noise.

The space
Newly constructed ground level apartment in brand new storybook Tudor just blocks from downtown Asheville with it's own independent HVAC system. Your home away from home will be the entire ground floor apartment complete with private entrance, kitchenette, 2 bedrooms and a bathroom. We do live upstairs on the first and second floor, and while the ceiling above you is soundproofed we find there is still some footstep noise at times, so if you wake from any little

name: Amazing Views of Downtown and Mountains
description:
The pictures are your view. Private entrance. Game room/garage with foose ball, ping pong, shuffle board, washer dryer. Covered outdoor patio space with ski lift swing, grill and fenced back yard. Brick fireplace with electric fire.
Clean, quiet, private, You have your own entrance and your own space. This is a great place for a couple nights or a week. Full kitchen, everything you need if you want to stay home and cook, easy access to downtown.
Room for bikes, kayaks, etc.

The space
One California King and one full bed. Full is in main living area. Big sectional couch, a game table, and full kitchen with a dining table. The back yard is fenced and has a disc golf basket in the center. The patio is covered and has seating and a propane grill, and those great views of downtown. Full bath with large shower, (no tub). There is also a indoor fireplace with electric fireplace with heat, and remote. Thermostat controlled heat

name: Walkable West Asheville Apartment Monthly Rental
description:
$1000 super special Aug 10-Sept 3! Contact host about this rare deal. This second floor apartment located in the center of hip West Asheville is in walking distance to delicious restaurants, bars, coffee, unique shops and craft beer! And downtown is only a seven minute Uber or Lyft ride away. This space has character, is full of local original contemporary art, and has an eclectic vibe with its vintage, modern style. The kitchen is fully functional with a brand new fridge.

The space
Built in 1915, the house has a lot of charm and character. The apartment is on the top floor, above a local designer's studio, and feels like it's perched up above Haywood Rd. The retro kitchen's windows are full of light and have a beautiful mountain view. With two spacious bedrooms, a futon in the living room, new fridge and a remodeled bathroom, this is a comfortable and convenient base for your Asheville adventures. There is dedicated off-street parking for your use.

name: DOWNTOWN! Seconds from it all!
description:
This beautiful, downtown hideaway is perfect for a couple, or a few friends that want to enjoy the perfect stay in Asheville. Fully equipped kitchen, coffee maker, wifi, clean and spacious, and a few steps from all the shops, bars, and restaurants!

The space
- Comfortably sleeps two people.
- Tons of natural light and functioning Windows. Beautiful view out of the bedroom window.
- Amazing water pressure in the shower.
- Cozy decor, comfy and clean full size bed, flat screen tv and DVD player.
- Awesome neighboring residents.
- Steps away from nightlife spots such as The Orangepeel, Wicked Weed Brewery, Bens Tune Up, Jack of The Wood, Tupelo Honey, etc.
- Short drive to multiple hiking spots, hot springs, trendy W. Asheville, etc.

Guest access
You will be greeted with two keys (one for the outside for, and one for the apartment door). There will be a list of our favorite spots, WiFi password, snacks and coffe

name: 1899 Carriage House Suite in a Victorian Part of Asheville
description: Awaken naturally as morning light enters through high windows in a vaulted ceiling. Make breakfast in a simple kitchen before setting out to explore. Return to an elegantly furnished space, select a book from the collection, and read in peace.

name: Modern Mountain Getaway
description:
Cozy modern apartment with a walk out patio view of our forested back yard. Comfortably simple to suit a traveler's needs.

Located in a safe, quiet, wooded neighborhood that is perfect for walking. Hiking trails on property with occasional visits from foxes, bears, and turkeys.

Public transit access & less than 2 miles from Downtown Asheville and Biltmore Village. Uber & Lyft are both available, quick and affordable.

The space
Our Modern Mountain Getaway is located in the heart of Asheville. Surrounded by woods and nestled between hills, our quiet street is the best of city living. Near enough, but far enough, to enjoy the city and the mountains. The apartment is below our home and has a private rear patio entrance. There is a mini fridge, microwave and coffee maker. We have provided glasses, dishes and silverware for your convenience. We've stocked it with snack bars, tea bags and coffee pods. It's a cozy space ready to refresh you for a

name: A Step Back in Time - 1901 Estate Guest Cottage
description:
Take a step back in time in our 1901 Historic Estate's Guest Cottage. Our super cute cottage has a cabin-like charm & tall trees. Peaceful, but also close proximity to major attractions like Biltmore Estate & Downtown Asheville. We have Extremely comfortable beds, a fully-equipped kitchenette, & closet space. Good for couples, girl's weekend, solo adventurers, business travelers, couples with one child. FREE PARKING. (Continue reading for proximity to Biltmore & Downtown.)

The space
Our Guest Cottage is APPROX 470SF and is cleaned and disinfected to high standards. It's located in the quiet backyard of our home. This is a 2 person space max, or 3 if you have a small child.
There are no stairs in the cottage but there are stone steps that incline and lead up to the cottage.
Our home sits on 2.5 acres and was built in 1901. The Cottage is 100 plus years old and the estate caretaker and his family more than likely lived here.

The cottage

name: Downtown Inn Asheville, NC #1 King
description: We welcome you to Downtown Inn where Asheville is out your front door and the mountains are just minutes away.  We are within a short walking distance of many of Asheville's hottest attractions. The Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village are just a 10 minute drive and access to the Blue Ridge Parkway is just a 15 to 20 minute drive. Whether you are looking for downtown excitement or the peace of the mountains, Downtown Inn is where you want to be in the heart of Asheville!

name: Historic West Asheville Personal Retreat and Spa
description:
Historic West Asheville. Walking distance of coffee shops, breweries, restaurants, music venues; 2-min drive to downtown Asheville. Private apt: king bed suite, bath, partial kitchen/dining with coffee/tea, fridge, toaster, small cooktop. Pamper yourself: steam shower, sauna, hot tub, terrycloth robes . Screened in porch, private entrance.

Covid 19 Note: We sterilize sheets and towels after every guest, wipe down counters and door handles with disinfectant.

The space
Not just a room in our home, but private access to our whole first floor. Hardwood floors, kitchen area, dining room, screened in porch, leading to the hot tub. Private bedroom suite has a kingsize bed, desk, and seating area with a lovely view to our spacious backyard. Private full bath with steam shower and dry sauna. We provide cotton terrycloth robes, coffee/tea, cream and sugar.

Guest access
There is a private entrance into your first floor apartment, which has

name: Shenandoah Room
description:
SHARED BATHROOM. This room shows off true Asheville artsy spirit, decorated by a born and raised Ashevillian! Our house is very homey, most guests say staying with us is like "crashing at a friends house" only you haven't met your new friends yet! Located just over a mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway, and 6 miles to downtown Asheville! Our place is great for animal lovers here to visit Asheville and the surrounding areas. We have a large, friendly dog who lives in our home, and a friendly cat!

The space
Our home is spacious and filled with works by local artists and things we have collected during our own travels. The bathroom is right outside your room and is SHARED with one other Airbnb room in the house. There's a mini-fridge in your room for you to use.
We keep our place clean and our dog is not allowed in your room. But you shouldn't book with us if you are uncomfortable around dogs or if you are allergic to dogs or cats... Riddick will be excited to m

name: Cardinal King - HOT TUB - MNT VIEWS- Smart TV-WiFi
description:
Must have 3+ positive reviews from other hosts to stay with us! The best of both worlds; epic back deck with sweeping 180 long range mountain views just minutes from town. Beautiful evening sunsets and morning sunrises. We have self serve breakfast options and snacks always available (for stays under 7 days).

The bedroom boasts a king memory foam mattress which is perfect after a long day of hiking or exploring Asheville. Enjoy the bath just across the hall and the outdoor hot tub.

The space
Private spacious bedroom with farmhouse king bed. Non-smokers only! Bathroom and hot tub is shared with other Airbnb guests.

Enjoy a mountain thunderstorm on the charming covered front porch with adirondack chairs and fantastic view of the picturesque neighborhood with rolling hills and mountains.

On a sunny day lounge on the back deck while surrounded by the beautiful views of the Asheville Mountains as your backdrop. Watch fantastic light

name: D&D's Dog-friendly West Asheville AirBnb
description:
Private floor w/ a separate entrance to 1 BR suite in prime West Asheville. 4 min. stroll to Haywood Rd with plenty of shops, restaurants, bars, & cafes. 8 min drive to downtown. We are dog & kid friendly.
Details:
-1 BR with queen bed
-Couch in large living room that converts to King size bed
-Kitchenette w/ fridge, sink, cooking tools, etc.
-Pack-n-play for infants & inflatable mattress for toddlers (let us know if you need them)
-Private fenced backyard
-On+off-street parking

The space
The space is extremely large (about 1000sq ft), bright, and colorful. There is a patio to relax on with a private fenced backyard that is ideal for dogs.

We value the feedback from all of our guests and are always improving what we can, so please let us know if there are ways we can improve our space.

Guest access
The entire 1st floor and fenced-in backyard.

Other things to note
The it

name: ZenMtn Treehouse Main
description:
My place is 7 minutes to downtown Asheville & 3 minutes to the Parkway! My place gives you the sense of being in a treehouse (its actually a house in the trees.) This suite is on the same level as the kitchen & family room (you can use). It has a queen bed & private connected full bath. There may or may not be quests booked on the lower level during your stay. Travelling with others? See Zen Mountain Treehouse Lower to book an addtl en-suite at same location. Read full listing.

The space
Peaceful space in the trees, guests love the privacy yet convenience to downtown, Chimney Rock, Lake Lure, the Parkway....
This en-suite has queen bed, connected private full bath. It is on the same level as kitchen & family room. Traveling with others? The lower level may or may not have guests booked during your stay.

Guest access
I live here but rarely see my guests. (Have apt. on side) Im out enjoying Asheville as much as you are! :)

name: Cabin-Wood Fireplace-Hot Tub-Pool
description: Our Cabin is close to hiking, shopping, grocery, golfing, restaurants, basically everything.  You will  love Deer Haven because of it's beauty nestlled in a quiet neighborhood surrounded by national forest. Enjoy a fire in the wood fireplace, eat popcorn and enjoy a movie or a game of checkers or sit in the hot tub and study the universe. Go snow skiing or feel lucky and go to the caniso.  It’s not unusual to see deer looking for a handout.

name: Shenandoah RV (tiny house?)
description:
This is our 28ft 1993 class C motorhome with many upgrades and in good condition with full hookups and parked in the driveway at our home in East Asheville. We are 1.5 miles from I-40, 1.1 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway, and 6 miles / 15 minutes to downtown Asheville. The Asheville Mall and 50+ restaurants are all within 5 miles. We have plenty of safe, off street parking. The RV is great for singles, couples, friends, or families with kids here to visit Asheville and the surrounding area.

The space
Staying in our RV is like staying in a tiny home. Everything you'd expect to have in a full sized house is here in a tiny space. If you are thinking about living small or getting your own RV, staying in our RV will give you chance to find out what it's like.

The RV is connected to electricity, water, and sewer. The kitchen includes a refrigerator, 3 burner stove top, oven, microwave, and sink. The RV uses propane for heat, hot water, and cookin

name: A Secret Bungalow -Walkable to Downtown,
description:
Retreat to this hidden, cozy, charming home close to cafes in the "Montford" neighborhood. Next to downtown (10 min walk).Clean, quiet, private with screened porch & lush garden patio. 2 Bedrooms (Queen&Double), 1 Bath. High speed internet, Smart TV(no cable), DVD player, central A/C, dishwasher, washer/dryer, gas stove/oven. Great for couples, small families, or those needing interim housing. One level living. MAX 4 adults. 30 DAY Minimum stay. No pets. Price includes discount, no additional.

The space
Includes high speed internet 200 mbps. Entire house is all yours, 1000 square foot home. Peaceful, private, tucked away yet right next to downtown Asheville. On a quiet street, comfortable, clean and nicely furnished with eclectic blend of modern and traditional and original art. One level house, only stairs are at front porch side. Bed linens, towels, hand soap provided. Has Smart TV with DVD player (NO CABLE TV).

Maximum capacity is 4 adults, quantit

name: Quiet Haven Tiny House-Hottub-Pets- Asheville Mtns
description:
Our Tiny House is located a short 15 minute drive from downtown Asheville but yet it has a countryside setting. Asheville attractions/restaurants will fill your day with excitement. Come home, grill a juicy steak, build a bonfire, enjoy the hot tub or settle down in a nice comfy bed to a Netflix movie. It’s your choice, we try to make your visit as relaxing as possible. Thank you and we hope you will choose our Quiet Haven Tiny Home. C u soon.

The space
Our Tiny Home has one queen size bed and four bunks and a sleeper/couch for sleeping accommodations. It has a gas cook stove, oven, microwave and semi big refrigerator. It has two TV's with Netflix. WIFI is available. Large deck with grill and hot tub.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire space. Plenty of parking.

Other things to note
We have approximately 3 acres of open land to enjoy with your children or pets.

name: Mountain Views, Flowing Waters, Family Retreat
description:
Our home is in a country-like setting w/ mountain views. We are 6 miles from downtown Asheville, 3 miles to Warren Wilson College, 1 mile from hiking trails, near the B R Parkway and the Folk Art Center. Restaurants, shopping, music, art, golfing, tennis, and river rafting nearby. Skiing, 45'' away.
Fully equipped kitchen, small pond with waterfall in the yard. Two fireplaces, 2 bedrooms w/ 1 king and 1 queen. 3 convertible chaise lounges for your children/pre-teen, and 2 full baths.

The space
Come relax at our mountain home retreat! Enjoy our beautiful view of the mountains and visit with the wild turkeys. Our “Mountain Rose” is nestled in a quiet country-like setting, yet close to all that Asheville and surrounding areas have to offer as mentioned above.
When you’re ready to take a break from your activities, cook a meal in our fully equipped kitchen. There is an electric oven with 4 burner cooktop, microwave, coffee maker, toaster, blende

name: *Natural Light Filled Cottage In Asheville*
description:
The cottage is an easy 3.8 miles to the Heart of downtown Asheville, 2.5 miles to The Blue Ridge Parkway entrance and 4 miles to the Biltmore House. You’ll love the Cottage because of its 'getaway from it all nature vibe' yet so close to everything. It has open artistic simplicity, comfy coziness and natural light. It is great for people who want total privacy, physical distancing and to access everything Asheville and the surrounding area has to offer!

The space
This cottage is your own totally separate detached stand alone 400 square foot charming cozy house with total privacy and its own private driveway. It is nestled off of a side street with lots of greenery, flowers, song birds and fresh mountain air. We are taking extra care to disinfect your space following AIRBNB recommended cleaning protocols using non toxic EPA registered disinfectants. The cottage has easy access to I-240 and the Blue Ridge parkway. The space has been refurbished wh

name: Happy Hippie House: Walk to Restaurants/Shops/Bars
description:
You’re gonna totally dig this groovy getaway called the Happy Hippie House. It’s got the best location in all of Asheville since it’s in a cute residential neighborhood, a quick walk to West Asheville’s bars, breweries, restaurants, & shops – including Instant Karma, one of the coolest hippie shops ever! It’s also a quick 7-minute drive to downtown, 10 minutes to the Biltmore Estate, and 14 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Plus, you can’t beat the fun, eclectic vibe. It’s right on, man.

The space
You’re gonna totally dig this groovy getaway called the Happy Hippie House. It’s got the best location in all of Asheville since it’s in a cute residential neighborhood that’s a quick walk to West Asheville’s popular bars, breweries, restaurants, and shops – including Instant Karma, the coolest hippie shop east of the Mississippi! It’s also a quick 7-minute drive to downtown, 10 minutes to the Biltmore Estate, and 14 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway. So, it’s far out,

name: Pet friendly craftsman in the heart of Asheville
description:
Our home is a modern Eco and pet friendly 1400 sqft Craftsman 2/2 house with a fully fenced yard, a screened porch, 9 ft ceilings, hardwood floors, stylish furnishings and all amenities, stainless & granite kitchen, W/D, WiFi, HD TV, close to art, culture, restaurants and shopping, golfing or hiking . Minutes to Biltmore Village, Asheville Mall, Downtown, River Art District. Perfect for couples, business travelers, person(s) relocating and well behaved pets.

The space
Located on a quiet residential street in the heart of Asheville this is the perfect location to enjoy everything the beautiful and charming our city has to offer. Only 1 mile to the upscale shops and restaurants of Biltmore Village, or hop in your car and get to downtown's world class restaurants and shopping in just a few minutes. it is located in a nice residential safe neighborhood,less than 10 mns to the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway and the Folk Art Center, recreation on the French Broad River,

name: Cozy and Quiet on Hemphill
description:
If you love Asheville, we have just the right spot to take advantage of it all! First off, it’s only 60 paces to the Mountains to Sea Trail from the back door!! But wait, there’s more… 7 minutes and you’re in downtown Asheville, at the Biltmore Estate, or sipping a delicious beer at one of the many breweries. Best of all, if you want a stellar drive of scenic beauty, the Blue Ridge Parkway is literally the back yard. So, come one or come two, and let your adventures begin! Bring your pets too!

The space
Our little house on the hill is nestled perfectly between Asheville and Fairview. A sweet feature of being in the last house on the Hemphill is privacy. Walk to the woods and drive to the city!

Guest access
It’s not hard to figure out where to be in the house! Our cozy place allows for hanging out in the open living/dining room floor plan with a quaint kitchen attached to the end. For a nice breath of fresh air, folks can sit for a spell on

name: City Sanctuary
description:
My place is close to the city center, restaurants, dining, great views, art, culture, and parks in a quiet neighborhood. You’ll love my place because your accommodation is within a 10 minute walk to College St and City County Plaza in the heart of Asheville. On your walk to town you will view the city set in the beauty of the mountains. After a day of touring, hiking or river activities, you can sit in an outside grotto and relax before an evening on the town or a relaxing nights rest.

The space
There are 2 seperate rooms with a shared bathroom and a shared breakfast area in one of the rooms.

Guest access
My place is the entire ground floor of my house and has 2 private entrances and parking in a driveway next to the house.

name: Brand New Log Cabin...close to downtown Asheville!
description:
Be among the first to enjoy our Brand New Custom Built Log Cabin!
There's a Handmade Wood Breakfast Bar to start your day and a Handmade Black Walnut Hi-Top to enjoy a drink and while away the night! Our custom built 9 ft. "Cave" Shower is not to be missed. Located just minutes from downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Pkwy, experience a wonderful rural retreat while being just a few miles from all the area has to offer! We hope you'll enjoy "The Little Dog" as much as we do!

The space
Named after our beloved furry friend, "The Little Dog" is a smoke free Cabin and great place to base all your Asheville adventures from. Downtown, the Biltmore, the Blue Ridge Pky. are all just a short drive away. We are also just 5 minutes from both The VA hospital and Warren Wilson College. A 24 hour Ingles supermarket is also nearby.
Direct TV and Internet are provided.

Guest access
The Whole House is yours...Enjoy!!!!

name: Comfortable Home near to WNC Ag Center
description:
My place is close to (Halfway between Asheville and Hendersonville) 1/2 mile from Asheville airport.
Downtown Asheville, 20 minutes from house, is an extremely popular tourist destination. Lots of great food, beverages, street musicians, antique stores.

BILTMORE ESTATE and Winery
Premier destination for most visitors. Where the largest mansion in North America resides--tours daily.

HENDERSONVILLE
Is known for its apple orchards, picking and festival. Sliding Rock, water falls, etc.

The space
Newly refurnished 3 bedrooms/2 full bathroom. Half acre of greenery. Backyard surrounded by pine trees creating a living green wall. Back deck with grill. Screened in front porch.
Living area with gas log fireplace, TV, WIFI and DVD player.

Other things to note
http://www.travelzoo.com/blog/11-experiences-asheville/?dlinkId=2495015&utm_source=top20_us&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=us_top20_2017_24_deal%3a2

name: Guests Love The Location, Best of Asheville At Our Doorstep
description: Downtown Asheville, and greenways, are at your doorstep in this immaculately restored century-old home. Of 270+ 5-star reviews, guests Matthew & Belinda sum it up best: We have stayed at AirBNBs all over the world, and this was the best stocked, best cleaned place - and with more helpful suggestions - than we have ever stayed at! We wanted for nothing! And we walked to EVERYTHING! After a day of exploring, relax in a hammock chair on the front porch. Enjoy space to spread out with two bedrooms, living room, full bath and kitchen. Enhanced cleaning, and separate HVAC and HEPA Air Purifiers.

name: Cozy, Clean, Quiet & Convenient
description:
Fifteen minute drive to downtown Asheville!
Totally private apartment in a classic 1960's neighborhood.
Country decorated throughout, with antique charm and the owner's
personal decorative touches.
About your stay here-
The kitchen is equipped with full size stove and refrigerator,
plus microwave and coffee maker. Or, grill out on the covered
porch. A full-servicMy place is close to Asheville. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

name: Downtown Retreat in the heart of Asheville
description:
Serene and private fully-furnished guest house in the heart of downtown Asheville. Quiet space in the middle of all the action. 2 bedroom with King size master. Walk to all the best restaurants, shops, art galleries, music and pop up markets. Biltmore, Grove Park and the Blue Ridge Parkway are just a short drive away.

The space
Our guest house is an 800 sq. ft. addition built onto a historic house that is used as an office right in the heart of downtown. The house is completely separate. Lots of natural light fills the space. High ceilings and designer furniture and fixtures will make your stay feel deluxe and comfortable. This is a 2 story space and the bathroom and bedrooms are all on the second floor (approximately 12 stairs). The master bedroom has a King bed and balcony. The second bedroom is a smaller, cozy space that hosts a queen bed. Our space is perfect for couples who want a get-a-way, families with kids or friends/couples who are comfortable trave

name: Downtown hideaway! Walk everywhere!
description:
Comfy surroundings, private entry, off street parking, walk to all downtown shops, restaurants, and bars! I love living here, and I wouldn't trade it for anything! I cannot wait to share it's magic with you!!!

The space
Downtown
Walkability
Comfortable
Clean
Coffee
WiFi
Netflix
Fully stocked kitchen
Fresh linens/towels
Laundry on site
Off street parking

Guest access
WiFi
Washer/dryer
Private front/back yard
Full apartment
Discounted access to our Asheville affiliates

Other things to note
This unit is in direct partnership with F&L Hosting. F&L Hosting is a full service hosting boutique. They will help you plan your trip, show you around, even take the you around to their favorite spots. Ask for more info!

name: Private+clean+comfy+sunny apartment near downtown
description:
This wooded retreat is close to restaurants, breweries, dining, galleries, cafes, shopping, and downtown nightlife, with a 5 minute drive to the heart of Asheville! The house has great views, and is within 10 minutes of the Blue Ridge Parkway.

You’ll love the neighborhood, natural light, comfort and coziness, and the convenient location. This sanctuary is perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers needing a private place to relax, work, reflect, and play.

All are welcome.

The space
I've deliberately kept this space bright, clean, and simple, with basic amenities such as tea and coffee service, a mini fridge and microwave, and dishes. There is no formal kitchen, and no stove or big sink. I also provide basic toiletries in case you forget your own. There ARE curtains on the windows--they were installed after the photos were taken.

Games, puzzles, & playing cards are available for non-screen time. Should you

name: Apt Close to Everything in Asheville- $1600/mo!!
description:
Located in convenient West Asheville, this unique 650 square foot apartment rests atop a private home overlooking the River Arts District.
Our neighborhood is quiet but eclectic with a short walk to lively Haywood Rd with its many eateries & bars.
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The space
For our guests we have a fully equipped eat-in kitchen, a king size bed, tub & shower, large walk-in closet, ac, off-street parking, a work area and wireless internet & cable.

Guest access
Front porch swing, primary use of the front door and hallway (I use only for mail or packages), entire apartment, use of washer/dryer in basement once a week on a day set with me in advance

name: The Snook Nook ~ A Mountain Retreat In Asheville
description:
The Snook Nook is perfectly located just 3 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway and 8 miles from downtown Asheville. Just hop on the Parkway and have an Appalachian adventure or visit the hottest town the South has to offer as it slowly opens its doors.

Us Snooks are passionate about making our Airbnb the kind of experience we want to have when we're traveling. The Nook sets itself apart from the rest of Snookville by being the ideal rental for a quick getaway to this Appalachian playground.

The space
This is brand new construction as of Fall of 2018. Having hosted the Snook Nook for over a year in our downstairs apartment, we finished off half of our lower level specifically with Airbnb in mind. We still have the old hits in a fridge, a Keurig (with pods), a microwave, a Roku with streaming service and free Netflix, and a queen sized bed. To that, we've added lots more space, a sofa bed in the living space that sleeps one comfortably, a dishwasher

name: Willow Haven, near Asheville
description:
Go to youtube and type in Willow Haven Asheville for an 8 minute video tour of the house. Secluded clothing optional hot tub, close to lots of cool stuff - Sierra Nevada, AVL Airport, WNC Ag Center, Bold Rock Cidery, NC Arboretum, and Blue Ridge Parkway. Also nearby - Biltmore Estate, downtown Asheville. We typically leave a few local beers and ciders in the fridge for your enjoyment. Really feels like home.

The space
In light of the current COVID19 crisis, you should know that our friend Lisa does the cleaning. She has always been a clean freak, but now, with the risk of COVID, she is being even more careful than usual. You won't be able to find any viruses hanging around this house!

Willow Haven is not your average vacation rental. Check out our reviews for comments like, "best vacation rental we've ever stayed at", and "impeccably clean and well stocked". My wife and I live 3 miles away so we can make sure everything is done right done right.

name: Namaste Yurt, best of both worlds
description: Our first yurt was such a success we had to do another one.  This is a unique property that allows you to be close to nature and not skimp on amenities.  Though you will feel you are remote, you will be only 15-20 minutes from downtown Asheville, Biltmore, Black Mountain, multiple breweries and restaurants.   The Blue Ridge Parkway and Mountains to Sea Trail will be literally right out the door.

name: New Monthly Guest House - great Asheville Retreat!
description:
Enjoy our warm, cozy guest house. Located in "trendy" West Asheville. Walk to the village market, coffee cafes, restaurants, craft breweries, and more. Experience the “Asheville Vibe”. This “getaway” was architecturally designed and professionally decorated giving you the feeling of being in a cabin retreat! This is our personal getaway retreat when we visit Asheville. Your experience will be magical! See our 5-Star reviews! This is a monthly rental.

The space
HOME FEATURES:
• Very Private in Quiet Neighborhood
• NEW! Clean! Bright! Professionally Decorated!
• 1 Bedroom/Bath, Kitchen, Living Area, Laundry
• Garage Parking - 1 car maximum
• Gourmet Kitchen
• Outdoor seating area
• FREE! Secure Internet
• FREE! Full Cable TV Service
• FREE! Utilities

LOCATION! LOCATION! LIFESTYLE! You will experience tranquility and easy living in a private setting! Just a short walk to experience the Asheville Vibe! Live li

name: West Nest on Haywood Road
description:
The "West Nest" is on Haywood Road in the heart of popular West Asheville, walkable/bikeable to restaurants, clubs, music, the River Arts District, breweries and downtown Asheville. Our place is newly renovated and professionally furnished by Village Antiques. The West Nest is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. See below from more information on our accommodation and for things to do in West Asheville. The owners are local business owners and are glad to help our guests.

The space
Our Airbnb is bright, remodeled and is professionally designed and decorated with antiques from Village Antiques in mid-century modern and Japanese styles. We paid extra special attention to our bed, since we personally really value staying in places with comfortable mattresses. We will welcome you with a bottle of wine and we hope that you enjoy it on our patio with city and mountain views.

Guest access
You will be able to access the ent

name: Traveler's Home. Monthly rates.
description:
Furnished master bedroom (queen), ensuite, with private full bath, private parking and entrance. On a cul de sac in a quiet suburban neighborhood. See trees and river from your bedroom window. Lovely open living, dining, kitchen, patio, deck. Just 7 miles to downtown Asheville, Mission Hospitals, and 3 miles to VA Hospital and Warren Wilson college. Available by the month (28 days minimum). Quiet, clean, green. Have hosted travel nurses and business people and I welcome you!

The space
This home is in nature, with trees and river, yet just 10 minutes to thriving downtown Asheville. The living room has high ceilings and gas logs, open to dining room and kitchen, which is well equipped with kitchen tools. You have your own shelves in the refrigerator and cabinets. Your bedroom window and the front deck have views of the Swannanoa River. The back patio has table and gas grill, private and serene green.

Guest access
You will park your c

name: Private studio near downtown, Biltmore & breweries
description:
Clean and comfy studio with gorgeous bamboo floors mere minutes to downtown, walking distance to Biltmore Village, 5 minutes from 8 major breweries and the Biltmore Estate! Super clean and cozy, check out all my awesome reviews, this is the real deal, I'm a Super Host for a reason! Full size memory foam bed. TV/DVD with a Roku and 300 DVD's and wifi.

Private/separate unit with private entrance and parking, quiet neighborhood. Great for couples or solo travelers, can fit a small family.

The space
Awesome, recently renovated, clean new space! Private entrance and unit with it's own private driveway. Spacious bedroom area with beautiful bamboo floors, full size memory foam bed, a couch, a table and chairs. Wifi, a speaker that connects to your iPod or laptop, TV/DVD player with a Roku and 300 DVD's to choose from. All brand new appliances - mini fridge with separate real freezer, microwave, toaster and coffee maker.

It's a cozy space rea

name: Mtn Retreat 'Suite'  Dntwn 5 min  Private Entrance
description:
Our home in Kenilworth is 5 minutes from downtown Asheville and Biltmore Estates. We love meeting people and assisting as needed with making your visit to Asheville wonderful. Our quests love the comfy bed, the spaciousness, separate living room, private entrance, private parking, the views, private deck and shared fenced in yard. This is our primary residence and while you will have your own separate private spaces you may hear us or see us around outside occasionally.

The space
We are in a very lovely, secluded spot just minutes away from downtown and Biltmore Estates. The quest bedroom is spacious and the adjacent separate living room space is also very large and comfy, opening onto a large covered deck overlooking the mountainside and fenced in yard. Our guest area is on the first floor and we reside on the second. There are 17 steps between the two seperate areas and their is a doggie door and heavy cutain at the bottom of the stairs. By city regula

name: Private, dog friendly, king studio with garage!
description:
Our spacious retreat is in East Asheville, an 8 minute drive from downtown Asheville. We offer a private entrance with a one car garage. No standing in the rain to unload your car! Luxurious king bed, updated bathroom, bright living room area, dining table & kitchenette provide everything you need for a weekend or week long stay!

The space
The oversized studio apartment is 800 sq/ft with a private entrance through a one car garage. We have fitted the garage & entry door with a keyless system & also provide keys & a garage opener for your convenience. Heating and A/C are controlled from upstairs. If you need it adjusted please let us know via text message.

The apartment is a bright open space with a memory foam topped King sized bed, living room area has a lounger couch (converts into a queen pull out bed), 46" TV with swivel wall mount to watch comfortably from the couch or bed. Netflix, Hulu, Amazon & Sling TV give you plenty of viewing options. Wifi

name: Rancho54oh- Spacious & Convenient!
description:
A very spacious, sunny, and newly finished basement apartment is part of our home, that we call Rancho54oh. It's close to the best that Asheville has to offer! It's the perfect home base for all your Asheville adventures. It's a very family-friendly space, but also perfect for a couple's getaway.

The space
This newly updated space offers a private entrance, lots of sunlight, tons of space, warm cork floors and and a cozy, modern vibe.

Entry
You have the option of parking in our rear driveway using the alley for access. This allows you private, off street parking and more direct access to the unit via a walkway to the door. The door is glass to optimize sunlight, and has a key entry.

Kitchenette/Dining
There is is a nicely equipped kitchenette that has all the basics- silverware, dishes, napkins, a new toaster oven, coffee maker, french press, sink, dishwasher, fridge/freezer, microwave, electric kettle, wine opener, and a counter

name: Heart of Asheville Bright n' Peaceful Apt.
description:
My place is close to Airport 6.5 miles, Downtown Asheville 7.5 miles. Restaurants, dry cleaners, office stores, grocery/drug stores, Starbucks, Tupelo Honey Cafe, 12 Bones Smokehouse, 1.5 miles.

The space
Open, bright, 2br, 2ba, living room, dinning room, kitchen, balcony.

Guest access
Access to all living space accept owners bedroom, and bath inside the bedroom.

Other things to note
This is a smoke free space with exception to balcony.

name: Artist's Retreat in Hip West Asheville
description:
Large art-filled suite in West Asheville has four rooms. A spacious bedroom, sitting room, kitchen and bath with private entrance. The suite occupies the entire downstairs of our home on a quiet street.

Within walking distance of Haywood Road and a short drive to downtown Asheville's great restaurants, breweries, art districts, and the Biltmore Estate.

You're also close to great seasonal outdoor activities like rafting, hiking, biking, fly fishing, skiing, or cruising the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
Come enjoy a quiet retreat on an acre of land at the end of a cul-de-sac with a large beautiful yard that you are welcome to enjoy. Smith Mill Creek runs for 1000 feet along it's edge and we have forested lots at both ends. Yet you are only a half mile from a local brewery and in easy walking distance to many of the locals favorite haunts on Haywood Road in West Asheville. You have a private entrance, driveway parking, while enjoying close pro

name: Cozy, quiet retreat near Blue Ridge Parkway. 2 bed
description:
Cozy, quiet retreat near Blue Ridge Parkway. 2 bed, 1 bath,close to town!
Our place is close to parks, great views, art and culture, restaurants and dining, and breweries. From our house you are moments away from the Blue Ridge Parkway, NC Arboretum, French Broad River. Downtown is 15 minutes away by car. The new Asheville Outlet Mall is 5 minutes away.You’ll love our place because of it’s convenient location. Accommodates 4 or less guests. Must be 21 years of age. No heavy traffic allowed.

The space
The entire space is for you.

name: Windsor Forest Inn(Sierra Nevada 3 miles away!)
description:
Sparkling clean! Between Asheville and charming Hendersonville Near I26, WNC AG Center, restaurants, Outlet mall and Biltmore House, Blue Ridge Mtns,the BEST hiking trails. 1 mile from AVL regional airport . A kitchenette in lounging room with microwave, toaster, small fridge, sink, coffee maker, french roast coffee, cream , condiments, plasticware & plates,bottled water in fridge.
You’ll love our quiet, neat neighborhood, welcoming, deep comfort permeating the Windsor Forest Inn.

The space
You will have the top floor with over 1000 square feet. Spacious with privacy.Two separate bedrooms and 2 separate full baths. The master bedroom's bed is a massive 4 poster. Guests say it gave them one of the best night's sleep EVER!(away from home). PLUS the very special relaxing room with the gas burning log stove. Where guests gather to drink their favorite beverage, reheat food from meals out the day before, fix sandwiches,watchTV, visit their IPads. Other ameni

name: Historic Church in The River Arts District
description:
The Ora Street Church of God, located between The River Arts District, The South Slope Brewery District, and only 1 mile from Biltmore Estate was built in the 1920s and thrived for over 80 years before being converted into our home. Enjoy a short walk to restaurants, breweries, art galleries and music. The upstairs of our home, formerly the pastor's study, is now your personal master suite. We invite you to stay in our church house, one of the most unique and charming Airbnbs in Asheville.

The space
Our guest are given access to the more private back door which allows direct access to the stairwell leading up to the master suite. The back door is accessed via our newly remodeled back deck where there is a hot tub and stone fireplace for guests to use. This outdoor space is kept under video surveillance for our safety and for that of our guests as well. This entryway will open into a stairwell where guests will be met with a private minibar and beer for their e

name: Perfect apartment and location in perfect town
description: My place is close to the city center, nightlife, public transport. You’ll love my place because of the high ceilings, the views, the location, the people, and the ambiance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and furry friends (pets). It's only available for the entire month of September, 2018, with a 30 day minimum rental.

name: Asheville Clouding Around - A Million Dollar View
description:
Asheville Clouding Around is in a forest setting perched high on top of the Asheville's eastern Sunset Mountain,. The home has three bedroom/three bath home(sleeps eight comfortably) with all the amenities. Very close to the historic city center of Asheville, where all what the city and neighboring communities offer. You’ll love the private setting of our home, with all of the desired amenities, forest setting, abundance of fresh air and it's magical awesomeness of being high above the clouds.

The space
The home offers one large master bedroom suite with bath, one large bedroom with private bath, one bedroom with a detached bath, and a large Futon in living room. The home has a fully stocked kitchen, dinning room, living room, W/D, A/C, wood burning fireplace, WiFi, Cable and a huge private deck with three separate access points. Some say the best view in the Asheville Mountain Valley, this home is 1600 sq feet of living space, featuring a large open deck with a

name: Vibrant NEW Montford apartment- walk to downtown
description:
Come enjoy our charming and consciously renovated apartment that is just a few blocks from downtown! The space is nestled in Asheville's most charming neighborhood. A pleasant 10 minute walk through the Historic Montford district will land you in the heart of downtown Asheville, where endless eateries, music venues, and art galleries abound. Our dwelling is across the street from a park, and at the end of the Reed Creek Greenway. Perfect for a couple or small family.

The space
This modern basement apartment is the ground floor our 1920s historic Montford home. It has a private entrance that opens onto a patio and into a large fenced yard, that is separate from the owner's yard. The space has very large french doors and three windows, which flood the area with natural light during the daytime. The living space and bedroom are separated by heavy custom sliding barn doors, and both areas exhibit exposed brick and stained concrete floors. The urban micro ki

name: Affordable downtown penthouse. The best deal!!!
description:
You'll feel at home in this beautiful Penthouse with a view. Your steps from all of the action Asheville has to offer. Bring your pet because we love for her friends. Rather you're traveling for business, a honeymoon or anniversary, or just to get away with the friends, this place is perfect for you.

The space
Newly painted, and refurnished. This place is a traveler's dream. With 14 foot vaulted ceilings, huge windows with a Western View, Fully Loaded Kitchen tons of storage space and a beautiful stone fireplace, which is unfortunately only aesthetic. Your steps from everything downtown Asheville has to offer, and only a few minutes drive from hiking and historic West Asheville.

Guest access
WiFi, Netflix, washer and dryer, off street parking for one car, linens and bedding, coffee and coffee maker.

name: Cozy Tiny House Near Downtown and Blue Ridge!
description:
Come stay in my spacious and beautifully designed tiny cottage in the trees! Wake to windows full of sky and songbirds. Enjoy your morning coffee on the back deck for a chance to see mama bear with cubs foraging in the ravine. It's located behind my personal residence in a sweet little neighborhood only 4 minutes from downtown...(Uber and Lyft is available). It's cozy, quiet, and close to everything! Adults and Airbnb guests only... Thank you!

The space
I had this quaint and cozy cabin built by a company specializing in small home design. Their craftsmanship is unparalleled! It is nestled in the trees above a small ravine and sits in the backyard of my house. It is small (288 sq ft downstairs, 100 upstairs and a 100 sq. ft. deck) but has the feel of something bigger with high ceilings and an open concept and loft. It is close to downtown, the Biltmore, and Blue Ridge Parkway but feels like a quiet get away. This space is meant for two people and is for

name: Urban Hippie West Asheville Sanctuary
description:
My home is a cozy sanctuary on the edge of west Asheville. Here you'll have room to stretch out & slow down. The outdoor space is a large flat fenced in yard with views of Pisgah mountain from the hammock & fire pit! Growing garden, flowers, & honey bees on site! My property is on a dead end street with quiet, considerate neighbors, yet 2 turns from i40, 5 minutes to walkable west Asheville, 10 mins to downtown! Normally a super host but took 2020 off for upgrades & to follow safety precautions

The space
Wake up with coffee on the back porch while watching the birds at the feeder. Take a stroll in the gardens with views of Pisgah mountain. My property has blueberries, blackberries, muscadine grapes, and ground cherries for the picking when in season. Yoga mats and exercise weights are available for use. I am now a proud owner of an iron after a suggestion from a guest ; ) Fresh bedding, towels, and extra toiletries are provided. I also have a closet of games for

name: Home for 6-7 People in South Asheville
description:
This is your home away from home just a quick 20 minute drive from Downtown Asheville. You get access to the majority of the home.

This is a quiet and comfortable place for a family or group. My desire is that my guests feel at home and enjoy sharing my home.

Please note that I stay here. There are three bedrooms, two bathrooms, two bathrooms, and a kitchen available for use.

The space
Downstairs:
-Large master bedroom
-Large living room
-Kitchenette with microwave, mini fridge, and toaster oven
-Bathroom with shower and tub

Upstairs
-Two bedrooms
-One bathroom with shower and tub
-Full kitchen
-Living room
