Downstairs:
-Large master bedroom
-Living room
-Kitchenette
-Bathroom with shower

Upstairs
-Two bedrooms
-Bathroom with shower
-Kitchen
-Living room
-Laundry room

There are 3 beds,

name: Garden Wheel House Retreat
description:
Escape to this 1928 two-bedroom cottage filled with artistic and antique charm. This is truly a unique space that has been lovingly remodeled with heart and handmade custom furnishings. Cook a delicious meal in or order out.

Wander through the gardens and enjoy the artistic flare this property has to offer, including an outdoor dining room, patio, porch and shipping container lounge.

It is nestled in a peaceful nook, only 4 miles to Asheville and less than 10 minutes from Weaverville.

The space
A lot of heart went into these spaces. This space is extra special with all of the permaculture inspired landscaping, art and cozy outdoor living spaces.

***Please no climbing on the sculptures and treat our home with care.

We have games and hiking maps in the corner cupboard in the living room.

If you need to work, there's a convertible kitchen table inside with a pull-out stand for your monitor, or a standing d

name: Sandy's Place
description:
Sandy’s Place is conveniently located in the historic Kenilworth neighborhood of Asheville, less than 5 minutes from downtown, the Biltmore Estate, and the River Arts District. Asheville is known for its award winning restaurants, coffee shops, art galleries, music venues, theatre, craft breweries and abundant outdoor recreational opportunities. Our space is the perfect home base for couples, families, and business travelers looking to explore all that Asheville has to offer.

The space
Sandy's Place is in the quiet and friendly neighborhood of Kenilworth. Our home was built in 1939, rich with charm and character. In 1995 we constructed an apartment on the lower level of our three-story home where my mother, Sandy, lived for twenty years. In honor of Sandy and her amazing gift of grace and hospitality, our Airbnb is called “Sandy’s Place.” Look out the windows into a wooded backdrop. There is a sunny deck to enjoy your morning coffee or an evening beverage at th

name: Great One Bedroom Get-Away
description:
If your trip to Asheville includes both mountain and city adventures, then you will love this apartment! We are just 5 minutes south of the Blue Ridge Parkway (191 entrance) and Bent Creek, and only 15 minutes from downtown Asheville and the Biltmore House. We are close to the French Broad River as well, where fishing, tubing, and float trips are the perfect way to cool off on a summer's day. If you're into hiking or mountain biking, this is where the trails are.

The space
Our one bedroom apartment is approximately 800 square feet--small enough to be cozy, but large enough to have everything you need. It has:
-one full bath (large shower)
-spacious bedroom with a comfortable queen bed
-full size bed in main living area
- kitchen (stove top, refrigerator, toaster oven, microwave)
-blender, toaster, coffee maker, coffee grinder
-pots, pans, dishes, utensils
-washer/dryer
-living/dining area
-internet tv
-wifi
-

name: The Parkwood Tree House
description:
This funky, Asheville-style house started its life as a local artisan's workshop where he produced hand-crafted dulcimers, banjos, and his special brew of local "mountain dew" in the basement. Freshly converted into a beautiful home, it's tucked in a safe, nice, mixed working-class neighborhood 8 minutes from downtown Asheville. Large windows and spacious decks with wooded views make this a uniquely peaceful oasis equally close to the fun of the city and the beauty of the surrounding mountains.

The space
The Parkwood Tree House features a living area, kitchenette, and large deck on the main floor. There are two bedrooms, each with a full bath (showers only), one upstairs and one downstairs from the main level. We made every effort in the construction to include sound-deadening insulation between floors of the house so that guests can enjoy privacy throughout. The upstairs bedroom has a king bed and a desk nook, and the downstairs has a queen bed. The downstairs a

name: 1 BDRM, 2 miles to DWTN. Great for nurse/doc
description:
This cute cottage is within walking distance to Biltmore Village, a 1/4 mile from the entrance to the Biltmore Estate, two miles to downtown Asheville (very easy to Uber), 1/4 mile from I-40 and easy access to the airport. It is on a quiet street that offers all the comforts of home. This listing is only available for 30+ day rental.

The space
The cottage has a large living/dining area, one bedroom with a king size bed and one full bath (just off the bedroom). The house has a fully functional kitchen, Smart TV/cable as well as a washer and dryer.

Guest access
Guests have access to the driveway. It can fit up to 2 cars (behind each other). No street parking is allowed.

name: Downton Shabby    *15 mins to downtown Asheville*
description:
Cute & cozy 2 bedroom 2 bath whole house with jetted tub, mountain views, & fishing... close to downtown, hiking, and 4 miles to I40 & I26.

The space
Downton Shabby! Sorry, no butler or lady's maid, not even fine china! But it is cute, cozy, and well... shabby! And the owners are just corny enough to name it after one of their all-time favorite show... Downton Abbey! (Did I even have to say it? )

What you will find here is a cute and cozy cottage with mountain and pond views. The feel of being in the country but just 4 miles from I-40, I-26, and I-240. You will be 5 miles from downtown, and about 15 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway! And so much more that the Asheville area has to offer!

Come back from your adventures and have a quiet meal in the fully equipped kitchen, soak in the jetted tub, or sit on the porch swing and enjoy the views! Later, roast some marshmallows over the fire pit! And if you've never heard of Downton Abbey

name: Retro Asheville Ranch - 3 bedrooms, lots of room!
description:
Minutes from Sierra Nevada, Biltmore, Bent Creek, Downtown and airport! Spacious, bright, private, and comfortable for up to six people. Carport, fast wifi, washer/dryer, and tons of cable alternatives (Netflix, HBO, Amazon Prime, etc). Large backyard is great for kids, and walking distance to nearby trail system. Enjoy coffee in the sun room or cocktails in the gazebo. Next to 12 Bones BBQ South and Rocky's Hot Chicken!

The space
This 3 bedroom house is comfortable for up to 6 people in real beds: one queen, one full, and one full futon. The 3rd bedroom is roomy enough to use as an office even when futon is extended. Kitchen is fully equipped for general cooking needs.

Guest access
We welcome you to spread out in the house, yard, and gazebo. Please treat the hardwood furniture kindly - it has lasted many generations and we hope to have it for years to come.

name: Comfortable room with queen bed
description:
Comfortable room for 2 that is walking distance to historic West Asheville where one can experience fine dining and exotic nightlife, while being just 10 mins from downtown. There is also access to kitchen, living room, and full bathroom

The space
Great neighborhood with streetside parking

Guest access
Wi fi, cable, microwave, fridgerator

name: Luxury in an Artist's Loft as Base for Exploring Asheville
description:
Begin the day in a bathroom with granite counters plus Myers hand soaps and Pharmacopia toiletries. Sip French press coffee while looking out to the church from the window seat of a living room with industrial touches and exposed-brick accents. We just finished renovating the space so it looks much brighter than these photos show - now all the walls are white, we have a sleek, modern shower and new white quartz counter tops.
You literally can’t beat our fantastic location. In the middle of all the excitement - great bars, coffee shops, breweries, restaurants, the newly reopened art museum, Pack Square, Civic Center - all are within a short walk from the Urban Nest. If you come home too tired to go out, just ride down the elevator that opens into the popular Lobster Trap. Come home to a cozy, stylish a small most importantly, comfortable landing pad.

name: Private Suite: Walk to Biltmore and Breweries
description:
This dog-friendly suite is self-contained and accessible only by its own private entrance. The space is ideal for the lone traveler or couples seeking a romantic retreat in the mountains. The suite includes a spacious bedroom (with queen) and full bath. In addition, our guest can enjoy mountain views from the comfort of the adjoining breakfast nook. Guests (and pups) can enjoy the mountain air from the spacious deck or the fully fenced half acre in the back!

The space
Plan your day hikes with our selection of WNC hiking guide books while enjoying your cup of coffee on the porch. In the evenings, stroll through the garden with your favorite beverage in hand. Stop and smell the abundance of perennial flowers and enjoy the sun set and the summertime fireflies. You will often find us enjoying the same landscape or keeping the weeds at bay.

COVID-19 UPDATE:
We take the public health risks of our guests and staff seriously and continue to adapt our ope

name: Quiet North Asheville Retreat
description:
Great quiet North Asheville location surrounded by woods. You'll be four miles to downtown, six miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway, three miles to UNCA and two miles to the Grove Park Inn. If you have and event at the Country Club of Asheville, you could walk! Quiet as can be, relax on the porch in the morning before heading out to explore all that our great town has to offer. Enjoy a sunset walk around the Beaver Lake bird sanctuary before heading home to relax.

The space
Stone stairs lead up to the private sitting porch and entry door. The large living area holds a queen bed, TV area, coffee bar, two sitting chairs, and dining/work space. Off street parking makes entry a breeze. A cafe table and chairs on the back porch offer a great spot to enjoy the woods and maybe see some wildlife.

Guest access
The entire space is yours. This is a separate apartment from the house above a detached garage. Very private and quiet.

Other thing

name: Cozy 3Bed+2b But yet So convenient
description:
Our home sleeps 6 comfortably. Tucked practically 15 min from all Asheville has to offer! It’s 5 min from outlets, eating, groceries, bike trails, Parkway, and Arboretum. 10 minutes to airport and 15 minutes to the Biltmore house or downtown. Enjoy our huge porch, comfy beds, reclining couches, and full kitchen. P.S moose and deer heads are present. No Basement access. You must be able to walk up 2 flights of stairs.
***We had a few reviews in June 2020 about the beds. We have gotten them fixed.

Guest access
The total upstairs. The house has a full basement but it does not come with access unless granted by owners.

Other things to note
Please do not play or mess with Moose head or deer heads.

I have installed a Ring doorbell system. So the outside of the house is under surveillance.

name: Mountain Getaway close to downtown and Grove Park
description:
Our mountain getaway a wonderful ASHEVILLE experience. Secluded and private yet only a 12 minute drive into the heart of downtown. A beautiful guest suite with a large private deck all nestled in the mountains of Asheville. There for you is seating and a wonderful, peaceful view. Inside is your spacious fully supplied kitchen and a warm, comfortable den . A smart TV for your viewing. Pets are welcome only not to be left alone in the suite.

The space
Privacy and seclusion in the serenity of surrounding woods. The view from your deck is spectacular during "leaf season" and even better in winter with a long range mountain view. Spring time is a very plush green forest. Extra blankets and pillows, two big fluffy beds, coffee, cream , sugar and olive oil are provided. Your kitchen well stocked with provisions to prepare a lovely meal. A breakfast table perfect for a game of cards or workspace.

Your lovely suite will have you perfectly situated to enjoy all

name: Comfy Asheville Cottage with Private Fenced Yard
description:
Our cottage is in a quiet natural setting, good for couples, families or small reunions. Built in 2017, this very comfy house is on a private .25 acres with privacy fence. We are a dog-friendly place with a fully fenced lot. Located five minutes to downtown West Asheville, 12 minutes to downtown city center. Close to the NC Arboretum, Blue Ridge Parkway, Pisgah Highway, outlet malls, Buncombe County Sports Park, WNC Farmers Market, I-40 and I-26. Full kitchen, washer/dryer, a/c, sleeps up to 7.

The space
The cottage is quiet and mostly secluded, yet only minutes to eclectic West Asheville (Uber $6 and up), and downtown AVL (Uber $12 and up). It has a vaulted ceiling in the kitchen/living room and lots of natural light. The two bedrooms have memory foam queen-sized mattresses, and the second bedroom includes a half bunk with a twin. The yard is spacious and sunny with apple and pear trees. Includes a fire ring for small outdoor fires. The full size kitchen is ful

name: West Asheville Carriage House
description:
Tastefully decorated & furnished West Asheville rental. The apartment is located on the ground floor. Ample parking. Two Bedrooms and one bath. One Queen sized bed, one King sized bed. Luxury linens provided. Professionally cleaned between stays. 1 flat screen tv with cable and internet. Kitchen is stocked for your cooking needs. Close to Haywood Road, Malvern Hills park, and a very short drive to downtown Asheville.

The space
This ground floor apartment is tucked behind our office in West Asheville. This is a great space for 2 couples traveling together, or a family. Each have their own private room, and access to a full kitchen and living room.

Guest access
Guests have access to the whole apartment! All the closets and drawers are yours to use as you wish! This apartment is a full time vacation rental.
Please park in any of the parking spaces in the parking lot. Please do not park in the covered parking spot.

In this ti

name: Mountain Retreat City Convenience.
description:
This beautiful duplex borders Pisgah National Forest while still being less than 15 minutes away from downtown and the Biltmore Estate. Just down the road you can shop at the outlet mall or hike through the Arboretum. Take a tube down the French Broad river, hop on the Blue Ridge Parkway, or sip a beer at one of Asheville's many breweries. Great for couples, families, and large groups.

The space
Guests are welcome to 2 parking spaces right beside the front door, and additional if needed.

Guest access
Guests can access netflix, but cable television is not provided.

Other things to note
It is not uncommon to see deer and even bears at the rental. While being very close the city it backs up to the forest which provides a nice feel of privacy.

name: Spacious Downtown Asheville Loft
description:
This uniquely renovated, loft style condominium is located in the heart of downtown Asheville. The loft is walking distance to locally owned shops, restaurants, art galleries, theaters, music venues, breweries, and grocers. Downtown Asheville is a happening place, but if you're looking to get out for the day, its only a 15 minute drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway to find breath-taking views and hikes. Some of the best coffee in town is served right beside the loft entrance at High Five Coffee.

The space
The entrance to the building is located on Rankin Ave, directly across the street from the Rankin Parking Garage.
The loft is on the ground floor and has very easy access.
You will be provided with a code to the main entrance and the condo entrance to lock up the loft as you come and go during your stay. The renovated loft has exposed brick, high ceilings, original hardwood flooring, plenty of natural light, and white-noise machines in each bedroom to pr

name: Walking Distance To Downtown-South Slope-RiverArts
description:
Our place is an easy 10 minute walk into downtown for all the wonderful restaurants, shopping, and other things that make Asheville so desirable. The South Slope is a 5-10 minute walk from here. The River Arts District is a 15 minute walk or short drive. The Biltmore Estate and West Asheville are a 5-10 minute drive.

The space
We are happy to provide a convenient alternative to the expensive downtown hotels while you're in Asheville. Our space is most ideal for those looking for a clean and comfortable place to rest at night after exploring all day, but likely too small for those looking to just relax and spend a fair amount of time at their accommodation. The room is most suited for a couple--no extra guests beyond a 2 person booking. Parking is often a challenge downtown, but you can street park here for free and save yourself the hassle. It's a safe and easy walk into downtown and the South Slope for all of the wonderful things our city has to offer. If wal

name: Cozy private apartment minutes from Sierra Nevada
description:
Private, quiet apartment close to the Airport and Sierra Nevada. It has its own entrance and is in a nice neighborhood. Queen bed with your own bathroom. Has a large closet and just added a full kitchen. Living room has a futon couch and tv with Hulu and Netflix. Laundry set up available as well. It is perfect for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families. Pets are welcome. Located approximately 5 minutes to Biltmore Park area and about 15 minutes to downtown Asheville.

The space
This downstairs apartment has everything you need: bedroom, full kitchen, private bathroom, queen bed, futon couch, private entrance through garage, and washer and dryer in separate laundry room, living room with tv.

Guest access
The downstairs apartment with private entrance through garage.

name: Sweet Cottage With Hot Tub, Near Downtown
description:
Sweet 3 bedroom cottage convenient to downtown (less than three miles), walking distance to French Broad River, one mile to Beaver Lake. Hydrotherapy hot tub overlooking private backyard with a sunset view. Brand new kitchen and bath, quiet neighborhood, plenty of privacy, fresh flowers, and thriving gardens. We are a small house, so not ideal for more than 3 or 4 adults. Strong wifi! See us on IG @AtHomeinAsheville or follow our tag #athomeinasheville

The space
Come enjoy this open and airy cottage with original (1941) hardwood floors, custom kitchen with quartz countertops, and brand new bathroom with glass shower (no bathtub). Throughout, we've brought in modern conveniences without sacrificing the good character of an older home. We are conveniently located to I26 (less than .25 mile), UNC Asheville (one mile), downtown (less than three miles), and River Arts District (ride your bike). Our guests agree, this cottage is THE most convenient place in Asheville t

name: 6 Bedroom 4 Bathroom Duplex With Wooded Privacy
description:
This is a 6 bedroom 4 bathroom duplex backing up to the beautiful Pisgah Forest. This location is perfect for year round privacy while still being very close to everything Asheville has to offer. You will be right down the street from the Asheville Outlets, Blue Ridge Parkway, Arboretum, French Broad River, and numerous restaurants. Perfect for a family reunion or vacation to visit the Beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains.

The space
6 bedroom 4 bathroom Duplex with 2 full kitchens. It is as close as you can get to feeling like you live in the forest while still being close to the city.

name: The View’s the Limit
description:
Come enjoy the views of the Blue Ridge Mountains in your very own guest suite with a private screened in porch. Located 15 minutes away from Downtown Asheville, 5 minutes from the Outlets, and 8 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
Downstairs guest suite with private entry and parking spot. Our guests will have access to the private screened in porch, pool table, refrigerator, microwave, Keurig and bar top table.
Max of 2 adults. Children/families welcome. Air mattresses can be provided. Please inquire with the host.

Guest access
Self check in with your own smart lock code.

name: Front Private room w King Bed
description:
This is one bedroom in a 3 bedroom house in West Asheville. I lead Hiking, Beer tour by raft, and Mountain biking trips for Air BnB Experiences. Come enjoy me for an adventure. I enjoy hosting and can recommend great hikes, dining experiences, and the local brews. I can also just provide you with a place to crash. Come enjoy Asheville. I am a 5 minute walk to Up Country Brewery or a 5 min drive to downtown Asheville.

The space
The is clean and tidy but homey. I am up on a hill with great views. I am just a few miles from downtown so it is quick and easy to get anywhere.

Guest access
I am fully vaccinated so you can use the kitchen if you like.

Other things to note
There is a friendly cat that lives here. He does not hang out in the rented room though.
I have another bedroom that is also rented on Airbnb so you may see another guest. Those 2 rooms share a bathroom.

name: Explore Asheville
description:
Hi! Please read all before you book :) This is a private master bedroom inside the back part of our home with its own private keypad entrance/bathroom/off-street parking. We are very conscientious about guests' privacy; however, we are an active family, so guests may see us/our kids outside or hear us at times inside. We are centrally located in Asheville in a dense, old urban neighborhood. It’s a 5 min drive to downtown breweries/7 min to Biltmore Estate gate/12 min to Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
The room is all new construction, an addition attached to the back of our home, completed early 2017.

It is inside our house but is sectioned off from us so that privacy is intact.

The bed is queen size with a Tuft & Needle Mint mattress with a soft pillow top cover.

With cedar shake and corrugated metal on the outside and a sloping roof up from the bed side of the room, it has a fresh and modern feel.

There are two oversize

name: Stunning Barn Loft Just Outside of Asheville
description:
A true Sanctuary in the midst of the Appalachian mountains! Enjoy our stylish guesthouse in a uniquely beautiful setting to unwind, recharge and reconnect. You are located in Swannanoa, just a 15 minute drive away from downtown Asheville, yet in the midst of nature... and have all the comforts (+ tons of space!) of an entire home at your disposal. Ideal location for exclusive family gatherings, mastermind meetings and romantic get aways. No parties pls.

The space
A modern yet cozy Loft in the midst of Appalachian nature. Close to town yet you'll feel like miles away from everything. Sooooo much space! The perfect location to withdraw, unwind and hang loose... or to explore, hike and exercise.... meet (new) friends and fall in love with the charm of Asheville.

Ideal for a romantic get away or a retreat for a small group of friends.

Pls note that while there is ample space for sleeping, hanging out and hosting exclusive events; there is only

name: The Rockwell- Spacious River Arts District Home
description:
Luxury Greenbuilt home in the RiverArtsDistrict/West AVL. Large windows and sunset viewing in a spacious open floor plan. Less than a mile from West, restaurants, bars, and breweries, 1 mile to town. Connect to the greenway trail and walk along the French Broad River. Panoramic, Rockwellesque views of the industrial River Arts District and Downtown against a mountainous backdrop. Look out the window see the sway of the treetops. Each level has it's own deck and each bedroom has its own bathroom.

The space
Brand new home, fully furnished. Great sunlight. Plenty of space, both to gather and to retreat.

Guest access
Guests have complete access to the top two floors, including kitchen, living room, laundry room, 2 decks, 2 bedrooms each with their own bath, and one half bath on main floor. Shower in the master bathroom, large soaking tub in the 2nd bedroom.

name: Oasis close to downtown
description:
Our quiet, comfortable, basement apartment is walkable to downtown Asheville, Montford, UNCA, nightlife, public transit, city center, US Cellular center and parks. Grove Park Inn is about a mile and a half if you're up for the walk or drive. You’ll love the neighborhood and ease of access to downtown, breweries, Biltmore Estate, Grove Park Inn, hiking, biking, and all things outdoors. Great rental for couples, families (with kids), or solo adventurers, and families. Come see for yourself!

The space
You will enter your Asheville oasis via a private entrance and driveway off Forsyth St. (street behind our main entrance). You'll walk into a great space that's flowy, open and flexible to meet all of your needs. You'll be greeted by a comfy table and chairs for coffee, tea, takeout, or just great conversation. As you continue on, you'll enter the living area, comprised of a sofa sleeper and three chairs. Entertainment includes a flat screen TV, DVD player, and

name: Oasis in the City
description:
Newly constructed, contemporary Craftsman style house in the heart of West Asheville. Situated on a half acre organic homestead with edible landscaping, fruit trees, bees and chickens. Incredible views of downtown and the mountains. Walk to eclectic restaurants, breweries and coffee shops. Located in a quiet neighborhood just a short 5 minute walk to New Belgium Brewery and all that West Asheville has to offer plus downtown minutes away.

The space
Walk down the natural stone steps that lead to your private patio. This downstairs suite is situated below our family of four. We provide a quality sound machine to mitigate any skipping feet or sibling spats upstairs:)
Enjoy locally roasted coffee or a local beer on the patio in one of the modern rocking chairs with a view of the Asheville skyline.

Guest access
Parking is on site.

name: Taylor Ranch Retreat - Secluded yet close to Asheville
description:
This cozy private home, nestled in the trees, is centrally located between Asheville and Hendersonville, North Carolina. It is down a dirt road and is very secluded for your privacy and full feel of a country setting. This property is perfect for a writer or a weekend with your favorite friends and family! It has all of the comforts of home no matter what season! Enjoy the indoor wood burning fireplace during the winter snow, and the outdoor fire pit on a beautiful evening or you can climb into the private outdoor hot tub to relax after a day of exploring and watch the stars. It has a king-sized bed, a queen-sized bed and a day bed for sleeping as well as a futon in the loft.

This is a smoke-free home but an ashtray is provided outside on the deck. We do welcome well-behaved dogs with prior approval and a non-refundable nightly fee. High chairs and a portable crib are available upon request. Uber does service the area if you want a safe ride to and from downtown Asheville

name: Avery's Creek: Private swimming pool! Close to Asheville & Biltmore Park.
description:
Come enjoy your own private splendor in the mountains of Western Carolina. This unique log home lodge offers both a private swimming pool, and a hot tub for year round enjoyment. With the 6 bedrooms, this spectacular home offers plenty of sleeping arrangements for families & groups looking to vacation in Asheville, in the shadow of the Smoky mountains.
The home is close to skiing, golf, tennis, and hiking along the Blue Ridge Parkway, or in any of the local state parks; Pisgah National Forest, Grandfather Mountain, Mount Mitchell, the Cherokee Reservation, and much more. You are within 20 minutes of all 3 metropolitan downtowns of Asheville, Hendersonville, & Brevard.

The space
Location:
Private estate home located south of Asheville near Biltmore Park, 20 minutes south of downtown Asheville, 5 minutes to Asheville Regional airport, 5 minutes to Biltmore Park, & 18 minutes to the gates of Biltmore Estate.

Accommodations:
(Sleeps 22-

name: Cove Cottage - Charming Cottage Located Right Outside Downtown Asheville!
description:
Right on the doorstep of downtown Asheville! This Asheville cottage mountain retreat, nestled within Chunns Cove, in the spectacular Blue Ridge Mountains, offers a relaxing and invigorating escape.

The space
Location:
Asheville, North Carolina, Just outside Downtown Asheville. Literally 5 minutes from downtown, restaurants & grocery store are even closer.

Accommodations:
Bungalow Cottage, 3 Bedrooms, 3 Baths (sleeps 6)
Occupancy Summary / Sleeps in beds: 6 Max. Occupancy: 8
(PLEASE NOTE: Yonder provides linens for all beds; other occupancy will require guests providing their own linens.)

Description:
Everything you have heard and read about "vibrant downtown Asheville" is just minutes away, and waiting for you to enjoy. Located just on the fringe of downtown Asheville, The Cove Cottage is the perfect mix of “mountain seclusion” & full urban access. Eclectically decorated with both an urban feel, and a taste of t

name: Upstream Cottage; Asheville & River Arts-breweries, eateries, hiking & more!
description:
Your LUXURIOUS Asheville destination!
Wow, spectacular views of the French Broad and close to everything!
This luxurious vacation rental home is a newly constructed 3-Bedroom retreat, with a hot tub and nestled above the French Broad right on the greenway for easy access, and just outside of downtown Asheville!

The space
Location:
As for Upstream Cottage, this private home is located just outside downtown Asheville, overlooking the French Broad River and the Biltmore Estate property; an easy 5 minutes to downtown Asheville, the Biltmore Estate, Shopping in Biltmore Village, the River Arts District and Haywood Road with its energetic collection of restaurants and shops! At Upstream Cottage, you are within walking distance to Climbmax climbing gym and several coffee shops as well as river access to float the river with shuttles available by Asheville Outdoor Center located just down the street and rentals through Zen tubing. You can even enjoy a re

name: Cedar Cabin with Forest Canopy Deck
description: Embrace the outdoors at this cottage blending rustic design with exquisite luxury. The home features soaring ceilings, an open-plan layout living area, a cozy fireplace, wood finishes throughout, a screened porch, and an outdoor dining space!!

name: Clean, Comfy and Convenient S. Asheville Condo
description:
Located just between the Airport and the Biltmore Estate, we are just 11 miles (and 4 million trees) from downtown Asheville. Our place is no stranger to nature, but we're just a stone's throw away from a variety of popular shopping and dining choices. Traveling with friends, for business or with family? All are welcome here.

The space
Our place is a basic and comfortable 2 story apartment and we can accommodate up to four people. We also have parking spaces for up to two vehicles. In addition to the towels and linens, the kitchen is equipped to handle your cooking and cleaning needs. Please, no smoking anywhere on the property, and we don't have facilities for pets. We hope you enjoy your stay here in the mountains, and if you have any questions, please feel free to just ask us!

Guest access
Everything but the garage and the understairs closet will be accessible. Also, we do not have a telephone in the property.

Other t

name: Downtown Escape!
description:
My place is close to the city center, parks, art and culture, and great views. You’ll love my place because of the ambiance, the comfy bed, the neighborhood, the outdoors space, and the light. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and furry friends (pets). We have an air mattress for additional guests. There is one normal bed, and one air mattress.

The space
The space is a full size apartment. It has a large kitchen, stocked up and ready for anything. It has a nice dining table with four chairs, a full bathroom, and a big bedroom with a lounge area, two seats and a TV. This is one of the best bangs for the buck in the downtown area.

Guest access
You will have access to private parking, a fenced in front yard for your pets, wash room, and private, full time locked private entrance.

name: Beaucatcher Mountain Retreat
description:
Lovely one bedroom, private bath with private entrance nestled on Beaucatcher Mtn 1.3 miles from downtown Asheville. Beautiful mountain view with private deck, Street side parking with lovely path and stair-cased entrance (2 flights)
Minutes from, Blue Ridge Parkway, River Arts District, Orange Peel, Diana Wortham, Biltmore Estate and Omni Grove Park Inn. Cozy Queen bed, Small Refrigerator, Microwave and Keurig Coffee maker in room.
Great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The space
We are located on Beaucatcher Mountain just 1.3 miles to downtown Asheville. The private entrance to the bedroom has outside seating for morning coffee and afternoon wine with views. With Queen bed, private bath, and small seating area. Make this space your own for your stay.

Guest access
Private entrance accessible to 1 bedroom and full bath. No Kitchen access

Other things to note
High probability of anim

name: Beautiful Home in Historic Montford by Downtown
description:
Come visit our home, beautifully restored in the historic Montford neighborhood, only steps from downtown. Fantastic front porch with rocking chairs overlooking neighborhood, Lovely Private fenced in stone garden in the back with gas grill, new stainless steal appliances in kitchen, 65" flat screen and comfy down sofas in the living room, King, Queen, and Full sized beds, 2 full bathrooms, Private off street driveway. Walk Everywhere, so close to downtown shops/brewery/grocery

The space
Historic Home, built in the early 1900s, lovingly restored a few years ago. Large windows bring in lots of natural light. All high end stainless steel appliances, 3 flat screen TVs with Cable, great furnishings.

Guest access
You will have access to the whole house, except a few closets and a bedroom.

Other things to note
You are welcome to park in the driveway, but there is also plenty of street parking nearby if you would prefer.

name: Beautiful Mountain Views 5 Minunutes to Downtown!!
description:
Beautiful custom built space!! Tastefully decorated, first class accommodations on the mountain overlooking Asheville. WE CLEAN COVID CLEAN, leaving the space feeling fresh and inviting for each guest! Exposed rock wall opposite original outside wall; just a couple of the details that give this listing a unique and comfortable feel. Beautiful mountain views above with city lights below. This charming space is a short five minutes and $5 Uber ride from downtown Asheville yet feels worlds away.

The space
We now have a GERM GUARDIAN air purifier helping to kill airborne viruses, bacteria and mold spores, amongst other things! I couldn’t be happier. Beyond that, we want you to know that we always wear protective gear while cleaning, for both us and you. We ventilate the space before, during, and after cleaning. We clean and disinfect all surfaces, paying special attention to frequently touched surfaces. We vacuum and mop the floors. Shower mats are washed between gue

name: Explore AVL from this Stylish, Cozy Apartment
description:
This fabulous apartment is located three blocks north of downtown, in the bustling Chestnut Hills neighborhood. Our lovely home was built in 1909 and completely renovated in 2017. Due to the spectacular location and massive size of the home, we decided to retain half of the first floor as a vacation rental. We invite you to kick back, relax, and spend a few days in one of the best Airbnbs in Asheville.

The space
The private back door access leads guests to an outdoor deck with great mountain views and a table for two. Upon arrival, guests are greeted with a few local beers and a record player with an eclectic record collection. For the morning, coffee and tea. A quiet, comfortable bedroom with a queen bed, all new appliances and fixtures in the kitchen and bath, tranquil living room with cable TV, wireless internet, a grill on the deck, and a new washer and dryer.

Guest access
Off-street parking is available in a separate driveway, dedicat

name: Tiny House - Giant Views
description:
Enjoy beautiful Asheville in the great outdoors. Airbnb PLUS approved - Minutes from downtown Asheville, with privacy and massive views. Easy access to Blue Ridge Parkway. Biltmore Estate, breweries, and hiking all nearby.

The space
This is a new, "tiny house concept" guest cottage in the beautiful Town Mountain neighborhood, only 2 miles from the center of downtown Asheville. Every detail from luxury linens on the queen sized bed, to the Keurig coffee maker has been seen to. Queen sized bed in loft bedroom, accessed by a ship ladder (like a broad, shallow step ladder with handrails).

Kitchen has minimal equipment for simple meals. Dorm sized refrigerator, toaster oven, single eye hot plate and small microwave. There is no dishwasher. Adequate for small cooking jobs, but if you want to cook all your meals, this is not the home for you.

Guest access
Guest house is next to owner's main residence; however, the homes are oriented in

name: Skye Haven - Views! Romantic getaway 3 mi. to town
description:
Stunning year-round mountain views 2.7 mi. from downtown and 4 mi. to the Blue Ridge Parkway for a romantic getaway. Nestled in nature and perched at the top of the mountain our home has large windows, gas fireplace, and smart TVs in the living room and bedroom. Central AC and heat, huge shower, heated bathroom floor, and NO steps! Book online or directly with the owner for more savings. Inquire about any available SPECIALS or DISCOUNTS. Visit and Like us on FB at Skye Haven Asheville.

The space
Couples only. No kids, no pets. Perfect for honeymoons, anniversaries, or any special occasion. Our home has granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, microwave, dishwasher, Keurig coffeemaker, toaster, and blender. Use Uber, have food delivered, or grill on the deck.

Guest access
Guests will have use of the main floor including living room, kitchen, sunroom, bedroom, bathroom, decks, and front porch. Home will not be occupied by anyone els

name: Apartment with Private entrance and Private Bath.
description:
We welcome you to our studio apartment.
Our Check in time is 5 PM to 12 AM to give you time to enjoy Asheville and the mountains. We follow guidelines for the Air BnB cleaning procedures, and they automatically block one day before and one day after for Preparation Time. We have installed the Germ Guardian Air Purifiers with UV C to destroy bacteria and virus and mold to keep the apartment air fresh.
We do have a no-pets policy for those with allergies.

The space
We welcome you to our studio apartment. Enjoy the scenic drive to our quiet rural setting on Spivey Mountain , near West Asheville, and 5 and 1/2 miles (15 minutes) from downtown Asheville. The Biltmore Estate is 7.5 miles from our house. Cuddle up in the queen size sleigh bed. Have a cup of coffee and enjoy the sunrise!
Kern is a retired Pharmacist and is also a licensed massage therapist.
Anne is a Master Gardner and you can enjoy her lovely floral garden. The organic vegeta

name: Lovely city garden apartment at the Little Farm
description:
COVID-19 safe! Extra cleaning protocols in effect. Private studio - queen bed and double bed for extra guests, plus dining area with fully equipped kitchen. Veggies and fresh eggs on request when available. One Pet welcome but must be supervised, as we have chickens and ducks in our pond. Whole house filtered water, chemical free cleaning. Seven foot ceiling! Extra cleaning supplies provided.

The space
The space is a large tiled studio room, very sunny with two large glass patio doors facing south into the garden. Private, with separate off street driveway and parking. Cute dining area and bath, pet friendly for one dog on a leash and responsibly cared for but no smoking, please! New memory foam queen bed and double bed. Laundry available. Cook out on the grill or use kitchenette for cooking inside. Great for longer term rentals if you want to be self sufficient. Lovely neighborhood for walking, bike downtown, etc. FYI - we have dogs, chickens, an

name: Charming Red Roof Home in Tiny Farms
description:
We welcome you to enjoy relaxing walks in our garden, fresh air, and the sound of songbirds singing through your window — all just 15 minutes from downtown! You will love our cheerful, private suite; perfect for guests looking to enjoy the best our lovely mountain town can offer.

The space
This is a private garden flat on the first floor of the house, and it includes its own entrance and parking space. It is located in a quiet, charming cul-de-sac, with windows overlooking our acre-large garden and backyard forest.

The kitchenette is equipped with a microwave, coffeemaker, toaster, and minifridge. There is also an outdoor gas grill with a side stove in the patio area.

For active guests, our neighborhood is a safe and tranquil area, perfect for gentle bikes and walks. During the springtime, our garden comes alive with multicolored tulips, roses, English violets, and daffodils — to name a few! In summer, we have meteor showers and sparkling

name: ADVENTURE LAUNCH PAD
description:
Wonderful location for an memorable Asheville adventure. Free frisbee golf course in neighborhood, 1.5 miles to river adventures, 2 miles to Downtown, the River Arts District or UNCA. 7 miles to the Biltmore Estate and Village, 8 miles to the Outlet Mall, 9 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway entrance. Or stay in with all our comfortable amenites. We do have a 3 day minimum stay for reservations that include a Friday or Saturday.

The space
Hot tub
Fire pit
outdoor chess and checker board
sunning deck
herb garden
fireplace
2 master suites
3 bathrooms
80 gallon commercial hot water heater
2 full size refrigerators
Large open floor plan.
Central air!!!
Tv in every bedroom

Guest access
Guests has full access to the house and grounds including a shed for larger “toys.” Please use the many herbs planted in the gardens, and when in abundance, please harvest some to take home. Prefab

name: Downtown and Biltmore!
description:
Relax in this vibrant, newer construction home, fitted with all the essentials you need to enjoy your time in the Asheville mountains. Large, spacious rooms with large kitchen and open floor plan. Located just 3 miles to the heart of downtown with breweries, local restaurants,art galleries,shops and all the eclectic vibes that make Asheville unique and fun to explore. Biltmore village and Estate one mile away. High speed WiFi with sanitation our TOP priority!!

The space
This charming home has an incredible location to everything you will want to do while in Asheville.

Tastefully decorated with both an urban feel, and a taste of the mountains. You immediately feel at home and relaxed, like you were meant to be here. (The Asheville mountains will have that effect!). Our cleaning company is thoroughly applying the cleaning guidelines set out by the CDC and take this responsibility seriously. Our cleaners sanitize all touch surfaces, sanitize all sur

name: Front Porch Charm
description:
Less than 4 miles to downtown Asheville in a quiet, walkable neighborhood with comfortable, shady front porch. Large, fenced yard. Charming, renovated 1920s bungalow with brand new kitchen and master bath. Great place for large groups to relax and grill out, all within striking distance of downtown, River Arts, French Broad River and all the breweries. Dogs allowed with additional pet cleaning fee of $50 to be charged upon check in.

The space
Three bedrooms, 2 with Queen beds and 1 with 4 Twin beds. Large dining room, big screen, smart TV with cable and sports package, kitchen with new cabinets, gas range, microwave and dishwasher. Washer and dryer. New master bathroom with double vanity and walk-in shower.

Guest access
The whole house.

Other things to note
PARKING: This home has a driveway that can easily accommodate two cars - four if you line up behind the others. Please do not park on the grass! If you need more s

name: Tiny House - Must Love Dogs
description:
450 square foot tiny house on a quiet cul de sac with fenced yard. Must love dogs as there are two resident pups that use the backyard. Minutes from downtown Asheville, Biltmore Village, local breweries, hiking and walking trails and all that Western North Carolina has to offer.

The space
This tiny house has all the comforts of home. Private space away behind our home so you can rest and relax. Full kitchen and bath with full size washer and dryer. Heated and Air Conditioned. Private entrance through the gate on the side of our house. Deck to relax and enjoy the mountain air. Ceiling fans and electric shades. Beautiful hardwood floors. Spectrum cable, Netflix and Prime included as well as internet access. Hosts live in primary house so we're available to answer questions about the WNC area and all it has to offer.

Guest access
The tiny house is all yours! And, you can avail yourself of our backyard. One caveat - you must love

name: Garden Apt in Historic Neighborhood of Asheville
description:
- Self Isolate in this comfortable apt with nature at your doorstep.
-Being minutes from walking trails and hikes makes this a great choice for an extended stay.
-5 minutes to Harris Teeter, Trader Joes
-Located at the foot of Town Mountain- Gateway to the National Park starts in our neighborhood
-Many restaurants in our a neighborhood serving take out and opening soon
- Spacious floor plan, full kitchen, walk-in closet, & private deck --quiet neighborhood
-Private off street parking

The space
-Walking distance to Downtown Asheville
-All utilities ( plus Wifi and cable TV) included
-Private entrance with private off-street parking
Historic Neighborhood, walking distance to Historic Grove Park Hotel. They have many restaurants and spas, which are open to the public
-- 42-inch flat screen tv with cable
- Kitchen is fully stocked with dishware, pots and pans, coffeemaker, utensils, microwave, dishwasher, an

name: Family Friendly Apartment in Beautiful North Asheville
description: Explore Asheville from this apartment close to the Asheville Country Club. Featuring a comfortable, queen-sized bed, hand-crafted, built-in bunk beds, backyard swings, and a fire pit. This home is perfect for a family vacation.

name: Historic Home Near Downtown Asheville Pvt Bed/Bath
description:
Spacious light filled private room with private bath across the hall in my home, a 1912 Arts and Crafts house, in the historic Grove Park neighborhood. Within walking distance (30 minute walk), an easy drive or quick Uber to the heart of Downtown. Also very close by is the Grove Park Inn, UNC-A, Asheville Yoga Center, 2 parks, several neighborhood restaurants, a beer & wine store, and great local ice cream shop. Two blocks from public transit.

The space
Upstairs bedroom with an Ikea queen mattress on a slated frame and a XL twin couch.
There is a crib for parents traveling with an infant in an adjacent room.
Private bathroom across the hall has the original clawfoot tub with a shower and sink with separate hot and cold faucets. Beautiful wrap around porch to relax with your morning coffee or a book and afternoon cup of tea. My house does not have central air but does have A/C window units in the bedrooms for your comfort. The house is on the ma

name: Hidden Cove on the doorstep of Downtown Asheville; HOT TUB, Game Rm, LUXURY!
description:
This is truly a "one-of-a-kind" vacation destination, tucked into Chunns Cove, and just minutes from downtown Asheville. This spacious 5 bedroom cabin affords mountain privacy, a wrap-a-round, partially covered deck, and hot tub, while being close to a plethora of activities. Hidden Cove Cabin has quickly become one of the most popular homes in our Yonder luxury portfolio, and it's one of the most requested … not surprising when you put a designer inspired home together with lots of amenities and a perfect location, close to everything. Hidden Cove Cabin affords year round access. It's great for groups of all ages.

The space
Location:
Private home located 10 minutes from downtown Asheville, 25 minutes to Asheville Regional airport, 13 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway, and less than 15 minutes to the gates of Biltmore Estate. This affords easy access to everything in the area.

Accommodations:
4 bedroom, Bunk Room, 4 full baths, 2 half baths

name: Mountain Chalet close to Biltmore
description:
This home is so convenient to the Biltmore House you can walk about 100 feet and actually see it. The Blue Ridge Parkway is approximately 3 miles away, Outlets for the shoppers, hiking & biking for adventurers, Breweries for the beer lovers, Downtown Asheville is just 7 minutes, a pool is located on premise. So many options. Great for families and friends! We are so excited to share with our tenants this home! We also offer a whole house standby generator!

The space
We are so excited to say that we are doing an absolute 100% renovation to this beautiful home from inside to the outside. New paint, new fixtures, new hardwood floors, new tile showers, we added an upstairs loft for a third bedroom, new roof, new appliances, and so much more!!! Should you need two nights we will consider squeezing you in! Please inquire
1/8/20: We have added another bedroom in the basement for 2 more people. And full bathroom It will be completed by the weekend of January 24th

name: One Bedroom Guest Suite, Warm Relaxed Home in West Asheville
description:
Relax in your private, comfortable, one bedroom suite after spending the day exploring the town. Unwind in the afternoon on your shaded patio. Fix coffee in the morning to sip and enjoy before you head out for the day. Mini kitchenette space provided with fridge, microwave, coffee area. Feel secure with off street parking.

Covid-19 considerations: we are following all local guidelines and cleaning recommendations from Airbnb. No shared areas inside the home. Guest suite is located on the lower level of our home. We live upstairs so you will hear noise from a family living above.

name: True Asheville B&B- Wall Street Room- 2nd Floor
description:
Enjoy Asheville at the Chestnut Street Inn, a true B&B just a 10 min walk to downtown Asheville, 10 min drive to the Biltmore Estate and 15 min drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway.
Featured in Food & Wine Magazine, enjoy one of our 8 exquisite bedrooms (all with private baths), delicious homemade breakfast every morning, private en-suite spa treatments, freshly baked cookies in the afternoon, local beer on tap and a rotating house port wine to sip on our incredible porches.

The space
Wall Street Room
Downtown Asheville has been called the “Paris of the South,” and as you stroll down the cobblestones of Wall Street past boutiques, restaurants and buskers, you can almost feel Europe in the air. The Wall Street room, located on the second floor of the inn, is the most popular of our smaller rooms and is very sweet and cozy with a gorgeous Federal style queen-size canopy bed. The view includes an up close look at an award winning Dogwood tree and a view of down
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Private Bungalow Ten Minute Walk to Downtown Asheville
description:
Your private, spacious bungalow is located just a 10-minute walk to downtown Asheville and everything downtown has to offer. This two room suite has a lovely sitting area, dining table, Queen sized bed and Jacuzzi tub.

This bungalow is part of the adjacent Chestnut Street Inn and has received a 100% Sanitation Rating from the Department of Health & Human Services of Asheville.

name: Getaway to Blue Ridge Mountains-West Asheville
description:
Like new studio apt, walk to West Asheville, ten minutes from downtown.

The space
Fully furnished Studio Apartment. Outstanding location and complete privacy. Large outdoor stone patio with gardens. Kitchenette w/ high end fridge, ice maker, microwave/convection oven, convection hot plate, Pod coffee service with selection of gourmet coffees and teas, blender, toaster, utensils, glasses, plates and cutlery.

Guest access
Private parking in driveway for two cars. Additional street parking. Keyless entry using a keypad lock.

Other things to note
If you want to see the wilderness, we are familiar with the best places to hike, bike, camp, swim, fish, drive, see waterfalls, whitewater raft, zipline, etc.

name: Just West of West Asheville Studio
description:
This sweet studio (with a sleeping nook) is only 10 minutes from downtown, just west of West Asheville. Perfect for a couple, perhaps a few more if you are open to sleeping on the futon. It's in the basement of a private home with a separate entrance and its own parking and patio.

The space
The studio apartment includes a bathroom, kitchenette, curtained sleeping nook, dining space and living area. It's a cozy space in the basement of my home, but includes lots of windows and an outside patio for guests.

The ground floor apartment opens into a flat, partially fenced back yard with a fire pit, vegetable garden and a flock of chickens. You're welcome to pick black raspberries, walnuts, eggs and vegetables that are growing!

The kitchenette contains dishes, pots and pans, a small fridge, stove and oven, and kitchen basics like oil and vinegar, coffee, salt and pepper. You'll find a few snacks on the counter, too.

Fresh bedding, towel

name: "Super Close to Everything,"  Private Studio
description:
Our guests keep telling us, "you're super close to everything we want to see in Asheville": Downtown, Biltmore Estate, Blue Ridge Parkway, the River Arts District, hiking, biking, water sports. This cozy, private studio apartment, is UPSTAIRS in a 2013-built home, with private entrance; comfy queen bed, bath, sitting/TV room and kitchenette. Continental breakfast included. ALL are welcome. See below the special precautions we're taking due to Covid-19.

The space
- Because of the Covid-19 pandemic, we follow Airbnb protocols to prevent spread of the virus: In addition to using freshly laundered sheets & towels, we switch bed spread and shams between guests, wipe down every touchable surface with commercial anti-bacterial cleanser, wash all dishes & utensils, provide commercially pre-packaged portions for your continental breakfast, wear masks during your check-in or use a self-check-in. If you have questions, don't hesitate to ask. Now for the description

name: Comfy, Private Suite Near Biltmore/Downtown
description:
Cozy guest suite with private entrance. [Covid safety: Enviroshield disinfection between each guest, no shared spaces w/ host]. Fantastic location: *Less than 2 miles from Biltmore Estate & Biltmore Village shops, *3.5 miles to Downtown (10 min. Uber), *2.4 miles to Blue Ridge Parkway & Trails, *5 craft breweries within 2 miles! *4 miles to River Arts District. Den has Netflix/Hulu/DVDs. Bedroom has very comfortable bed with sunlight and tree-view. Wifi & lending-library.

The space
The bedroom has a comfy full-size bed. Towels and washcloths provided. Bedroom and hallway have white noise machines available for added privacy. Mini-refrigerator, microwave, coffee-maker and tea/snacks/oatmeal provided. Bedroom has closet with hangers, dresser, and luggage rack. Blow dryer, iron and ironing board provided.

Guest access
The space is a private suite within a house. Guests have a private entrance and use of the patio.

Other things to

name: Orchard House
description:
Beautiful mountain home on 6 acres ten miles to downtown Asheville. Convenient to hiking, biking, the Swannanoa River, and more. Surrounded by apple and other fruit trees, includes garden space and a fire pit. A peaceful escape just minutes to shopping, restaurants, and area attractions.

The space
Lots of space, 2400 sq ft., small studio 'apartment' downstairs included, views for days, great neighbors, ....mountain bliss.

name: Hike-Bike-Eat-Drink-Stay, Private 3/2 Bent Creek
description:
Private 3/2 with plenty of parking, fast wifi. Your home base for all of your Asheville Adventures. In Bent Creek neighborhood with tons of trail access for hiking and biking. Close to the French broad for tubing and paddle boarding. 2.5 miles from Blue Ridge parkway and minutes from outlets for shopping. Only 10 miles to downtown.

The space
The options in Asheville are limitless and you'll definitely be planning a second visit after coming. The house is located on an acre lot in a neighborhood that is surrounded by national forest. You'll enjoy your home base here almost as much as the endless things you can do in Asheville. At the end of your day, you can enjoy comfortable beds, fast internet speeds and tvs with live channels as well as streaming options for you to log into with your own ids.

name: Beer City Room - Heart of West Asheville
description:
Heart of West Asheville, the beer city room is a 650 sqft craft beer inspired flat, using original AVL reclaimed wood. Keyless entry, two gel-infused memory foam mattresses, walk-in closet, full bathroom with walk in shower, kitchen and spacious living room with Sleeper couch, Roku TV and High-speed WIFI. Complimentary fresh beer to enjoy on your very own patio. 5 minute walk to best food/coffee/beer in West Asheville, 5 minute Uber to River Arts District and 4 minute to downtown.

The space
*Legal permitted Homestay. Asheville city Homestays can NOT have an oven, kitchen sink or full size refrigerator based on local zoning requirements. This applies to ALL of Asheville City limit Airbnb's. Please check out my other listings located in county limits if you require a more complete kitchen experience*

*The home includes a microwave, hotplate, a large mini fridge, Keurig and a sink in the bathroom - Visiting Asheville is about enjoying our incredible loc

name: Charland Chalet- Guesthouse 5 Min to Town & BRP
description:
PLEASE READ ENTIRE AD TO ENSURE THAT YOU WILL ENJOY YOUR STAY :)

This listing is our stylish, family and pet friendly apartment with separate entrance in the bottom half of our mountain home. The apartment sleeps 2 people comfortably with room to sleep up to 6. We are 2 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway entrance that takes you to many hikes and waterfalls and no more than 10 minutes to the Biltmore and all of the restaurants and breweries downtown has to offer!

The space
We are seasoned Airbnb Superhosts renting our downstairs apartment in our mountain home. There is a well stocked kitchenette, washer/dryer, and room to sleep your whole group but still feels very comfortable for just two!

The sleeping arrangements include a king bed, a queen pull out sofa, and a daybed in the living room that can be configured as a 1 king bed OR two twin beds.

The kitchenette should have everything you need to cook basic meals including pans, a d

name: Magical large apartment downtown!
description:
Beautiful historic neighborhood in the heart of downtown Asheville. The apartment comes fully loaded with parking, Wi-Fi, coffee maker, t.v. and blue ray player, fenced in front yard for your fury friends, a large back yard perfect for relaxing.

The space
The space is newly renovated with modern and comfortable decor. It has large Windows with mountain views, comfortable queen sized bed, walk in closet, of street parking, Netflix, YouTube, Sega genesis by request, and walkabout downtown at your leasure. It's awesome!

Guest access
Front and back yards, Wi-Fi, private parking all of downtown!

name: "Paris of the South" Pied-à-Terre in W. Asheville
description:
Welcome to Asheville, Paris of the South! You found your own Pied-à-Terre right in town West Asheville. Your space is bright and airy with 12 ft ceilings in main room and super comfy Queen bed. Enjoy 850 sq. ft space to yourselves. Dressing/game area by the full bath, plus a cozy den, as well as a snack and coffee prep area. Outside is a private deck for your use. *Note many of our reviews are from 2017-18. New listing with many updated features, plus 2 new co-hosts! We re-opened August 2021.

The space
The space is surprisingly airy, open modern and bright. The high ceilings and unique design make it a one of a kind. The bed is in the main area, with a large Smart TV for streaming, and a comfy sofa and chair in the seating area. Across from the snack and coffee area is a cozy den with a door to separate if one guest wants to watch TV or work while the other guest sleeps. Another space just for your use is a yoga/flex space-use it as a dressing area, game ar

name: Lovely Private Apt. - Historic Home & Neighborhood
description:
This private, sunny, 650 square-foot apartment is the ideal location to experience local living in Asheville within walking distance to downtown, the botanical garden and greenway. Located in historic Montford, this 110-year-old house is filled with charm. Off-street parking offers access to a private deck entrance. Enjoy a drink outside on the private deck, dining or working in the sunroom, relaxing in a spacious living area and sweet dreams in a cozy, comfortable bedroom. Official Homestay.

The space
This private 650-square-foot apartment includes a private deck, sunroom, living room, bedroom and bathroom. Hardwood floors and antiques throughout the space add to the charm of the 110-year-old house as it combines the best of old and new. The sunroom includes a sink, refrigerator, microwave, toaster oven and single burner hot plate + kitchen ware. Access to a grill. Indoor and outdoor dining. The bedroom with Queen bed is made for comfort and restful sleep

name: Riverside Bungalow - 2 miles to downtown!
description:
Super close to downtown Asheville, perched on a hill with views of nearby river valley. Close to everything but also tucked away and quiet

The space
Unbeatable convenience to downtown Asheville (2 mi). Bright, sunny, space with views of surrounding river valley. In the winter the French Broad River can be seen just over the treetops. Located in a quiet industrial/residential neighborhood immediately north of Downtown Asheville. Close to several river parks and the River Arts district, but most of all crazy convenient to downtown. If you're looking for an affordable, comfortable, convenient space, this is it.

Situated on a hill just above the French Broad River, in what is easily one of Asheville’s most convenient and underrated neighborhoods. You’re 2 miles from all that Downtown has to offer, with some amazing neighborhood gems close by, like Asheville’s two newest breweries within a mile, High Five Riverside coffee shop, or Asheville Community Y

name: Retreat on Town Mountain
description:
You living space is an entire lower floor apartment, located on desirable Town Mountain, sitting directly above downtown, which your deck overlooks. Our location, three minutes from downtown, is ideal for being part of everything Asheville has to offer while still being "away from it all" during your downtime. The 1,400 sq. foot space includes a fireplace, large windows, flat screen TV, full bath, kitchenette and a 700 sq. foot walk out deck to enjoy your morning coffee or to watch the sunset.

The space
We have a well lit reserved parking space for you at the top of our driveway. From there you need only walk several feet down the drive till you come to the stairs that lead to your private entrance. You need not park to the extreme left. Leave yourself plenty of room to exit your vehicle. So long as our car can pass when we want to exit the property your fine.

If you require other parking arrangements do let us know as there is also parking avai

name: Dragonfly Cottage
description:
Dragonfly Cottage built in 1905 is a vintage Asheville boarding house, mix of modern (completely updated) and old. Walking distance to Brewery"s, or downtown shops and restaurants. Downtown neighborhood can be loud. Some people are not prepared for noise and street people. Sweet front flower garden, large front porch, and front parlor available to guest at all times. Old dog Levi is now confined to back of the house, host living quarters and back yard, Levi is not trustworthy around guest.

The space
Couple or singles get away!
Nice old world bedrooms. Two rentals up stairs this one is on the front of house with private bath across the hall. The other rental is Dragonfly Cottage II on back of house with ensuite bath. Both have comfortable queen size beds. Bathrooms completely updated. Local art displayed to create a mix of old and new. Pease ask about the artist.
Parlor room downstairs available for those that can't sleep (not wanting to disturb par

name: Dragonfly Cottage II ,  Cozy Cottage in Downtown
description:
Dragonfly Cottage, built in 1905, is vintage Asheville: mix of modern (completely updated) and old. Old boarding house feel. 15 min. walk downtown less to South Slope Breweries. Downtown streets can be loud at times part of the Asheville seen. Old Dog Levi is now confined to host living quarters and the backyard, old and crotchety, he is no longer safe around guest.

The space
Bedroom is upstairs in back of house, Queen bed, master suite nicely appointed with ensuite bathroom, large shower, separated by old pocket doors. Wonderful mix of old and new, classic old Asheville boarding house feel. One other bedroom rented up stairs.

Guest access
Guest are may use parlor to read or hang out. Have a shot of Bourbon from the mantle decanter before retiring, a Southern tradition. Drink coffee or a local beer (from the beer exchange in the upstairs fridge) on the large front porch. Or just relax on the front porch swing and admire the gardens an

name: The West Asheville Loft
description:
Sunny loft apartment in West Asheville, tucked behind our office. This little 1937 gem has just been completely renovated and is as crisp and clean as they come! Lush linens, a fully stocked kitchen and a divine shower make this little get away a great place if you are looking for a private place to stay in while adventuring through Asheville. Just a 3 mile drive to downtown, the river arts district or the south slope. Only 5 miles to the Biltmore House.

The space
The Loft apartment is located behind our 1937 Arts and Crafts Dental practice which was a single family home before we bought it and turned it into our dental practice in 1980. The Loft has been an apartment since the home was originally built. To find it, drive to the back of the building that says Carriage House (our other rental) and you will see the stairs that will lead you up to the apartment. There is a key lock box to make your self check-in convenient.
We have just recently completely re

name: Mountaintop Hideaway
description:
Our quiet mountaintop dwelling is the best kept secret in town. 2 luscious master suites king and queen bed all with spectacular mountain views!! Asheville restaurants and cultural events within a short hike. Spacious airy and super immaculate

The space
This property is so unique in that it is a quiet Mountaintop but 5 minutes to Asheville with access to all stores shop historic places and everything Asheville has to offer.

Guest access
Beautiful pool and hiking trails

Other things to note
This is a townhome with 2 off street parking spaces

name: Family friendly, Roomy, and Comfy
description:
Convenient to everything in and around AVL. Toys and accommodations for the kids, large patio and a yard, plenty of parking, TVs, fully stocked chef's kitchen . Open and sunny. Enjoy Asheville at your own pace in this roomy, comfy home-away-from-home!

The space
Open floor plan, large kitchen, and ample parking makes this home perfect for gathering together. The living room features lots of room for little ones to play and a big screen Roku TV while the adults have a great time nearby in the large, fully stocked chef's kitchen. We have baby and children's toys, including rattles, blocks, books, and more, as well as a pack-n-play, baby bathtub, high chair, and step stool. All toys are sanitized between guests.

Kitchen is stocked with crockpot, baking sheets, cooling racks, Hamilton Beach toaster oven, measuring cups/spoons, cooking and serving utensils, knives, mixing/serving bowls, pots/pans, French press and a coffee maker, ice cream maker, sugar, salt

name: River Arts Comfy Getaway
description:
River Arts District with Sunny Backyard and Fast Wifi to work from home easily! Overlooks River Arts and is walking distance to Downtown Asheville (15 min walk), River Arts District restaurants and art shops (5 min walk), New Belgium Brewery (5 min walk), Wedge Brewery (5 min walk), and 12 Bones BBQ (5 min drive). Minutes away from the new Asheville Greenway where you can bike, run, or skate along the river. Enjoy yourself in our friendly, beautiful, and comfortable home.

The space
The space comfortable, cool, and private. Located in the historic part of "Chicken Hill" you get to stay in this unique neighborhood with super close access to downtown and RAD (River Arts District). We have an amazing Green Way along the river to walk, bike, run, or rollerblade along a 5 minute walk away.

The house is in a friendly neighborhood that is unique to Asheville. You can walk to downtown or to the River Arts District easily. It's quiet, safe, and the neighb

name: Sunnyside
description:
Not available

The space
Not available

Guest access
Not available

Other things to note
N/A

name: Casa de Lobos - N. Asheville
description:
4 1/2 miles from downtown Asheville, Casa de Lobos offers a bright and private basement guest suite situated in the woods of North Asheville with a five minute drive to Merrimon Avenue for groceries, shopping, and restaurants. Please read listing description in its entirety to ensure this is a good fit for you & me.
*This property is PERMITTED by the city of Asheville.*

The space
Casa de Lobos is a split level home where your hosts and two small YAPPY dogs occupy the upper level. The totally private lower level is 1200 square feet that includes a living room:

-Sofa pull out queen size bed
-TV with cable/HBO
- Air/heat
-Desk & chair
-Wifi

Kitchenette:
-Keurig
-Microwave
-Full size refrigerator
-Toaster oven
-NO stove or oven

There is a separate bedroom with lock:
-Sleep Number queen size bed
-TV with DVD player ONLY
- Air/heat
-Reading nook
-Full bath

name: Gashes Fluss Haus
description: Walk back past tall trees, over a small wooden bridge with built-in love seats. Massage tired feet on a polished river-rock shower floor. This rustic 2-story cottage, dating back over 100 years, has whitewashed stone walls and a wood-burning stove. This is an old farm hand house and it shares the same property with the main house.

name: Zen Home
description:
Terrific place, located close to everything on a quiet street. Enjoy the sitting on the front porch or up your feet up on the hammock. I love to share our common areas with guest such as living room, dining room and have use to the kitchen.
I do have one outdoor/indoor cat named Lupita, short hair and enjoys mostly being outdoors. I have two rooms that are rented independently. Due to Delta variant, please only vaccinated guest.
We have homestay permit for short term rental.

The space
3 nights rental available except Aug. 8-15. The house was completely renovated but maintains the beauty of the Arts and Craft home. It has wonderful lounging areas, such as the back deck overlooking greenery and the humming birds that feed on the flowers and feeders. I love the front porch too, comfy rocking chairs and the hammock.

Other things to note
This home is in downtown Asheville area within an urban setting with a diverse neighborhood. Our

name: Luxury Suite with Blissful Comforts
description:
Off street parking and a stone pathway lead to a sheltered keypad entrance. Curl up with cushions and a cup of coffee or tea in a cozy reading nook offering exquisite garden views and in Winter, distant mountains. Enjoy heated floors, a secluded patio and a bidet in a serene Buddhist-inspired bathroom. Walk Reed Creek Greenway reaching downtown shops about a mile away. Complimentary Internet TV, Wi-Fi, face masks, hand sanitizer and wine.

Airbnb Enhanced Protocol is followed, cleaning and sanitizing each room per checklists with disinfectants approved by the CDC. HEPA filters throughout.

name: Mountain View Getaway
description:
Come enjoy the mountain view in our peaceful basement suite with full kitchen. 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath walk-out basement with an open floor plan. A jacuzzi tub, soft linens, and comfortable leather recliners are just a few ways for you to relax.

The space
1 Bedroom 1 Bath ~1000 sq ft walk-out basement rental with an open floor plan containing kitchen, living, and dining areas. The kitchen is fully stocked, including a few basic pantry items for your convenience. The living room has leather couch and swivel rocker, both with electric recliners to put your feet up and enjoy the 60" smart TV. The bedroom has a queen size bed with a Zen memory foam mattress and Serta comfort pillows. The bathroom has a jet tub and is stocked with soft towels.
There is a nicely shaded outdoor space with stunning mountain views to sit and enjoy your morning coffee. You will probably see deer, bunnies, and other small wild life. Additionally, feel free to enjoy a fire in the fire pit

name: Cute Craftsman Asheville Suite
description:
Upstairs loft with private entrance. This is the entire second floor of our home, and we have utilized a privacy screen to block off our downstairs living area from your private entrance. There are no shared spaces at all.

Follow us on Instagram at instagram.com/craftsmanavlretreat

The space
*We verify this suite is professionally cleaned with products approved by the EPA for use against COVID-19. Bookings at this home include a 72-hour buffer between guests. Your hosts are also both fully vaccinated against COViD-19.*

Spacious bedroom with a queen bed, private bathroom, and attached sitting nook. The sitting nook comes equipped with a couch, bookshelf and kitchenette station with a microwave, mini fridge and coffee maker. The bedroom room comes equipped with two nightstands, a dresser, a desk, a luggage rack and a 40 inch flatscreen TV with chromecast installed for your streaming needs.

Guest access
Guests only have

name: Downtown Inn Asheville, NC #2-King
description: We welcome you to Downtown Inn where Asheville is out your front door and the mountains are just minutes away. We are within a short walking distance of many of Asheville's hottest attractions. The Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village are just a 10 minute drive and access to the Blue Ridge Parkway is just a 15 to 20 minute drive. Whether you are looking for downtown excitement or the peace of the mountains, Downtown Inn is where you want to be in the heart of Asheville!

description: We welcome you to Downtown Inn where Asheville is out your front door and the mountains are just minutes away.
