name: Private Country Bungalow 10-12 minutes to town
description:
Private country bungalow, 10-12 minutes to downtown Asheville, 5 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Clean & comfy home with flowers, turkeys, & bunnies in the yard. (Maybe even a bear!) Perfect for families or mature adults. All religions, ethnicities, LBGT welcome. Screened porch, comfy & well-designed interior, very clean, fully equipped kitchen. Memory foam beds with cotton, super-soft sheets and quilts.

The space
We have worked super hard to make a thoughtful, comfortable place for you to enjoy. There are ceiling fans in each room, cabinets stocked with coffee, tea, and creamer. We try to leave cold brews/drinks in the fridge for you to have upon arrival. A fully equipped kitchen for making meals (including basic spices & oil) plus a kettle grill outside on the deck. Enjoy reading a magazine or having some wine on the screened porch. Relax on the comfy couches and watch your Netflix shows after hiking or being out on the Asheville food or beer scene. The beds

name: Cozy Mountain Cottage
description:
Welcome to Asheville and to our Home! We're happy to have you as our guest and hope that you will love this area as much as we do.

We're 10 minutes to Downtown Asheville, less than 9 minutes to The Biltmore House, and 4 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

You'll be secluded enough to feel like you're out of the hustle-and-bustle of the city, but just a short drive to the life and excitement of Downtown Asheville, and many other area attractions.

The space
We've recently renovated the duplex, so everything is like new! A lot of love and effort has been dedicated, and we hope that you enjoy the space.

The downstairs unit has (2) bedrooms, (1) bathroom, kitchen (with a stove and dishwasher), and a living room.

The living room has a television with Chromecast and Amazon Fire Stick (not cable or satellite), so you may easily stream movies or music directly from your smart phone. The Fire Stick comes with free access to Amazo

name: ENJOY the DANCE of SUNLIGHT in East Asheville
description:
Newer contemporary sun filled Guest House/cabin with everything you will need to enjoy a wonderful vacation in and around Asheville, NC while being draped in sun, privacy and quiet days in the mountains.

The space
5 minutes to Asheville, 12-15 minutes to Downtown, yet feels much more secluded. The Guest House offers lovely, creative open space with 12' high ceilings full of Southern light dancing through the rooms. Clean newer Construction with additional small private deck for relaxing, deck chairs, and a relaxing outdoor shower. Free WiFi and a 43" Smart TV. Clean Fresh Linens on a Queen Size Latex Mattress. Original Art Work throughout.

The Great Room consists of a custom made sofa, two lounge arm chairs, and a lovely Ball & Claw antique dining table with 2 comfortable chairs. All are from my personal home collection so please help me take good care of them. The bath is a small yet comfortable contemporary bath with shower. Since there is only

name: Downtown Inn Asheville, NC  #7-King
description: We welcome you to Downtown Inn where Asheville is out your front door and the mountains are just minutes away. We are within a short walking distance of many of Asheville's hottest attractions. The Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village are just a 10 minute drive and access to the Blue Ridge Parkway is just a 15 to 20 minute drive. Whether you are looking for downtown excitement or the peace of the mountains, Downtown Inn is where you want to be in the heart of Asheville!

name: Charming Arts & Crafts home in West Asheville
description:
This charming 1917 Arts and Crafts home is conveniently located at the heart of it all.
The house is situated in a historical neighborhood on a half-acre with views of an organic garden and the mountains. It's also just a very short 5 minute walk to Downtown West Asheville for breweries, restaurants and shops.

The space
My earthly spacious home has lush plants, beautiful antiques, gorgeous woodwork and European charm. There is a lovely wrap around deck to lounge about. Large open workspace is available in the dinning room and parking is free and close just next to the entrance.
I excel at maintaining a clean and safe environment for my guests.

Have comfort in knowing I invite and support cultural diversity and am welcoming to all couples.

Please note I am happy to accommodate folks working within a budget so an air mattress and couch are available in the living room for more than 2 guests.
Simply inform me of your needs

name: Downtown Inn Asheville, NC #8-Double
description: We welcome you to Downtown Inn where Asheville is out your front door and the mountains are just minutes away. name: The Red Rooster Bungalow
description:
My name is Mikael and I will be your host during your stay. My mother who lives in Huntersville is my partner. We have decorated the house to make it as cozy and comfortable for you as I we could. There are two separate floors and spaces. My living space is in the basement and the studio out back. Outdoor smoking only.
You have the whole upstairs to yourselves and I am a text away. I spend much of my time in the studio in back but am here to make your stay great.

The space
This brick bungalow is warm and comfortable with lots of space. You have almost the whole house to yourselves with plenty of space to spread out. One room has a nice queen bed in a room with charm. The other room has two single beds and is full of light and looking out into the courtyard. Plus the office futon can be set up as a bed. A large kitchen is supplied with coffee and light snacks. We provide coffee pods for the Keurig and filters for the coffee maker. The dinning area is als

name: My Green Escape
description:
UPDATE:
FREE PRIVACY OPTION FOR ANY REMAINING WEEKDAY THRU DECEMBER
Help me pare down for winter: Complimentary houseplants

Living/breathing space, fresh flowers, living plants, great internet, copious complimentary snacks and breakfast items, lush outdoor gardens, sparkling clean hot tub. Add privacy option for an additional $50/night/weekends
Be the only guests on site.

FREE PRIVACY OPTION FOR ANY REMAINING WEEKDAYs THRU DECEMBER

The space
So pressing at this time is prevention of Covid. Pick up, clean, then sanitize with Lysol spray disinfectant is my routine. We've added an (iWave-R), a residential air cleaner that works as an air ionizer, thus killing mold, bacteria and virus. Though I routinely clean, there is nothing routine how I go about it. Any surface that may have been touched by previous guests or myself are cleaned and sprayed. This includes soap dispensers, remotes, door handles, appliance handle

name: Robin's Nest - quiet neighborhood, homey
description:
A guest apartment with lots of light and privacy. Own entrance and parking. One bedroom with double bed. Dining/TV room. Full bath with tub after a full day out. Garage to store your bikes or other equipment.
Residential neighborhood on a quiet street with the occasional laughter of children and puppies. 10 min. east to Blue Ridge Pkwy., 20 min. east to Blk. Mountain, 10 min. west to downtown Asheville, 15 min. to the Biltmore Estate, Arts District or West Asheville.

The space
This is a great place for a getaway trip, business travel, or just passing through. After a day of the Biltmore Estate, brewery hopping, hiking, biking, or trail running, come home to your own cozy apartment with private parking, deck and entrance. Sleep in an artisan-built 4-poster, standard bed with new mattress. The spacious bathroom with a full tub for soaking and double sinks, makes relaxing easy. The TV room is comfortable and welcoming. The HD TV streams through ROKU where all o

name: West Asheville Bamboo Bungalow near French Broad River
description: Recharge on a large balcony overlooking a serene bamboo grove that leads down to the river. The eastern touches continue inside, via the intricately carved bed and cabinet. There's old-style furniture too, plus a wonderfully modern chef's kitchen.

name: *Squad Bunker* ~ Perf Chill Pad for Groups & Pets!
description:
I can't promise you cheaper beer, but I CAN provide a 5/5 perf chill pad for you and your friends to recover from hitting all the breweries. In fact, up to 10 of them (+ you=11). So choose your top ten (and don't tell the others!) and head to Asheville! Facts: ~3 miles to downtown, (cheap Lyft/Uber!) fridge & microwave. 2 queen beds, 2 bunks, futon, & queen air mattress (for groups over 7 guests, upon request).

The space
Do not book this space if you are looking for something fancy or with high-dollar amenities since it is, in fact, a ~basement~! Perfect for bro weekends and bachelorette weekends~! [not really for families!]. A group-friendly bunker walking-ish distance from Biltmore Village. Downtown Asheville is three miles - a quick Uber/Lyft ride - away!
Please note- we live above so you will hear us walking, etc. and our dogs, but we make every effort to be as quiet as possible when we have guests. Also since the bunker is pet-friendly, don'

name: Convenient + modern spot:  central North Asheville
description:
Accommodations are suitable for a single person or couple visiting Asheville for vacationing pleasure, business or both. Located in a quiet neighborhood less than 4 miles from downtown and there is access to the Blue Ridge Parkway without a single traffic light. Private and secure entry is separate from main home. Spacious living room with fireplace and streaming TV for lounging. Kitchenette with self serve coffee, microwave and minifridge. Parking is easy and only steps away from the door.

The space
The custom woodwork throughout the house was a collaborative design between owner and craftsman. Using locally sourced materials for cabinets; and urban reclaimed hardwood lumber for furnishings, doors and original paneling, all uniquely designed with a handcrafted touch.

Guest access
Guest parking is convenient and directly in front of home or on gravel parking pad. A door from bedroom leading to storage room remains closed and locked.

name: COZY WALKABLE WEST ASHEVILLE MODERN SUITE
description:
Lower level modern suite with off street parking, a lighted private entrance and outside patio. Relax in this modern space with private bath, QUEEN size temperpedic bed, kitchenette , a dining or work table, WiF and cable tv.
Walk to great restaurants in W Avl, the River Arts District, downtown and craft breweries. Feels like a cozy, private nook with modern comforts.

The space
Welcome to West Asheville and your modern and fresh accommodations. This suite has a private entrance that opens up to a tranquil, light filled cozy space to call home. It features a queen temperpaedic bed with pillows and mattress that have hypoallergenic coverings for your comfort.
The suite features a large open kitchenette with comfortable living quarters. Enjoy the space with
HDTV flat screen TV, a DVD player and WiFi.

KITCHENETTE
This has a 1/2 fridge/freezer and double sink.
Coffee maker, hot pot and microwave are provided.
Your ho

name: Central AVL - 1BD/1BA Hideaway - 5min to DT
description:
Be central! If you're looking for a place that is convenient to ALL that Asheville has to offer, then our place is right for you. Our private, 1 bedroom, 1 bath apartment is quiet, surrounded by trees, and right in the middle of everything.

We are minutes from downtown (5min), the Blue Ridge Parkway (4min), Biltmore Village (9min), and Asheville Mall (2min). The apartment is located below our primary living space, but features private entry, dedicated living space, and off street parking.

The space
The apartment is located in a walkout basement, but take a look at our pictures and you will see that this is not your average walkout. The bedroom ceilings are 10 FEET TALL throughout. The apartment features a large living room space, and is equipped with mini fridge, and coffee maker, and nook.

Guest access
You'll have access to the downstairs area with the exception of a few places marked off (e.g., storage closets). You'll also h

name: Blue Ridge Fire Tower
description:
Located on the Blue Ridge Parkway just minutes from downtown, this beautiful fire tower inspired cabin is perfect for your next vacation! The cabin is far enough away that you will feel secluded yet just minutes from all the fun and action of downtown. Come and experience all that Asheville has to offer and then enjoy relaxing on the wrap around porch, cuddling up in front of the fire pit, or hiking the near by Mountains to the Sea trail. We are excited to have you experience our "happy place"!

The space
Due to the coronavirus outbreak our cleaning company is taking extra precautions while disinfecting and cleaning the house between guests. They are taking care to disinfect frequently touched surfaces, such as door knobs and light switches. As well as changing all sheets and towels regardless if they appear to have been used.

The house is two stories with the bedrooms and full bath downstairs and the common area with a half bath upstairs. There are tw

name: The Acorn Guesthouse
description:
Welcome to The Acorn guesthouse at Cozy Oak! Think of this tiny house as a hotel room with added benefits. You have about 180 square feet under roof that includes a private bathroom along with additional covered outdoor living space for relaxing. The fire pit area is a shared space for all guests to enjoy. There is a small refrigerator, coffee maker, toaster over, & microwave in the Acorn as well as dishes, etc. so you are able to prepare some meals. Smart TV for Netflix & a few channels.

The space
This space is perfect for those looking for a "Tiny House" experience! The location on a dead end street is very private & wooded, yet you are so close to the city life of Asheville! One can easily walk to Biltmore Village (1 mile away) and enjoy the many breweries & restaurants located there. Downtown Asheville is less than 4 miles away.

*Note* This listing complies with the City of Asheville’s short term rental laws by utilizing a 30 night minimu

name: Asheville Luxury Socially Distant Retreat
description:
Beautiful home at 'The Cliffs at Walnut Cove' golf resort, adjacent to the Jack Nicklaus signature golf course. Suitable for groups of responsible adults or families with supervised children. 5,000sf of luxury mountain living with an open concept living/dining/kitchen area that makes it ideal for gathering with family or friends.

Roku smart tv with extended sports channel streaming on SLING TV, Amazon Prime Video, Disney+ and Netflix for guest use

NO pets & NO smoking

The space
Suitable for groups of responsible adult friends or families with supervised children. Home fits up to 11 guests (if 2 people in each king and queen bed) and a total of 13 if there are infants using the two cribs.

3 bedrooms with King beds and ensuite bathrooms. Bedroom 1 has a large walk-in closet off of the ensuite bath that has a full size folding crib if desired. The upstairs master also has a huge walk-in closet with a folding crib.

Be

name: LOCATION : 2 mi to Downtown/Breweries/restaurants
description:
Click on the ❤️In upper corner to save me to your wishlist! charming & spacious 1800 sf. house is completely renovated. It has very functional open-concept floor plan, spacious bedrooms, and excellent baths plus new appliances in kitchen. It includes master suite with King size bed, full bathroom with Jacuzzi, large shower and walk in closet. The other room is quite large and has two twin size beds. The second bathroom has a tub/shower. There is a sofa bed for two , and 1 queen/2 twin airbeds.

The space
Our house is quite unique because of its strategic location within 2 miles from downtown and Biltmore Estate. Everything is a short drive and Uber is about $10 dollars per ride to downtown. Easy access to River Art District, Grove Park Inn, Breweries, West Asheville restaurants, mall, antique shops and much more.
There is a private driveway to park at least five vehicles.

Guest access
The one story house is safe for kids and senior gue

name: North Liberty House
description:
Enjoy a private ensuite with queen-size bed, private bath with tub, and sitting area in a beautiful 1920's light-filled home in an historic neighborhood in North Asheville - just a quick walk to downtown, and just one block to Asheville Yoga Center, Liberty House Coffee and Cafe and cycling/fitness studio.

Ample street parking available.

The space
Classic 1920's two-story cottage, in historic first-tier suburb. Nearby neighbors include many stately B&B's like The Beaufort House Inn, Chestnut Street Inn, White Gate Inn.

Guest access
Guests can make themselves at home, and relax in comfort in this beautiful house and grounds. Enjoy the common areas downstairs: living room, dining room and kitchen and the yard filled with several sitting areas and our very own urban vegetable garden. Feel free to lounge on the front porch or enjoy your morning coffee in the backyard. The kitchen is available for you to prepare your self-service bre

name: Downtown love, downtown life.
description: This beautiful, comfy apartment has everything a busy tourist will need. You are steps away from everything downtown; including breweries, music venues, restaurants, shops, etc! It also offers a peaceful home feeling, with a down time appeal, pet friendly, of street parking, friendly faces everywhere, etc! We live where we live and cannot wait to share it with you.

name: North Liberty House 2
description:
Enjoy your 2-room suite with queen-size bed, private bath (in hallway) and sitting area in the bedroom; enclosed sleeping porch accessed through main bedroom has a comfy twin-sized futon for a third person (nominal extra charge). This beautiful 1920's light-filled home is in an historic neighborhood in North Asheville - just a quick walk to downtown, and just one block to Asheville Yoga Center, Liberty House Coffee and Cafe and cycling/fitness studio.

Ample street parking available.

The space
Classic 1920's two-story cottage, in historic first-tier suburb. Nearby neighbors include many stately B&B's like The Beaufort House Inn, Chestnut Street Inn, White Gate Inn.

Guest access
Guests can make themselves at home, and relax in comfort in this beautiful house and grounds. Enjoy the common areas downstairs: living room, dining room and kitchen and the yard filled with several sitting areas and our very own urban vegetable garden. Fe

name: Magical Mountain Mod Near Downtown
description:
Separate two bedroom apartment in our custom mountain modern home. You will feel like you are nestled in the mountains while being just 1.5 miles from downtown. Short walk to UNCA, city bus, and hiking trails with panoramic mountain views. Brand new furnishings and stainless appliances. 10 foot ceilings, passive solar design, over-sized windows, and large private deck. Washer, dryer, kitchenette, and smart TV. We are family-friendly and have a large fenced outdoor play area available to guests.

The space
We have a beautiful and magical wooded area, yet we are so close to downtown. I take great care in making sure the space looks great, and making sure guests have their needs met. Modern and clean with a bit of the alternative vibe quintessential to Asheville.
Please note that we go the extra mile to protect our guests from COVID-19. I have worked as an infection control specialist, and I take extra care to ensure that our cleaners have received specialized

name: Asheville Getaway...Fenced in Backyard!
description:
Ten minutes away from West Asheville and fifteen minutes away from downtown Asheville. Your privacy is valued here with your own entrance. This is an all inclusive basement suite which is equipped with all the comforts necessary to support an extended or overnight stay. You will be able to take breaks in between your adventures without having to drive a long distance. You will rarely see me as I will leave you to have your very own Asheville experience.

The space
This is as close as you can be to Asheville and be in the country too! We are on a secluded cul de sac surrounded by mature foliage and a pasture. Enjoy time out on your own deck in the hot tub under the stars and ancient oak trees. There is a kitchen equipped with a full-size oven if you want to chef up what you foraged at the local outdoor farmers markets You will be sleeping on a Tuft and Needle mattress with 300 thread count sheets. If there's anything we should get right, it's nice clean sheets and

name: Off the Beat Inn Path
description:
Cozy 3 bedroom 1 bath cottage in a quiet neighborhood nestled in the Blue Ridge mountains of Western North Carolina. Asheville and the surrounding area abounds with outdoor activities including but not limited to hiking, fishing, water sports, historical sites, concerts and festivals throughout the year. A relaxing and enjoyable place to visit anytime of the year.

The space
Our cottage has a deck to relax on and large shaded yard in front. Ample parking space for more than one vehicle with a single car covered carport.

Guest access
Guests have complete access to the entire house and front yard area.

Other things to note
Smoking is prohibited in the house or on the deck. The smoking area is under the carport where an ash container is located.

name: Asheville Escape minutes to downtown! NEW FIRE PIT
description:
Minutes to Downtown ASHEVILLE! NEW ROCK FIRE PIT AREA! 9 miles from the heart of Asheville this peaceful mountain house is the perfect escape. Spacious open floor plan is great for families or friends. Watch the sunrise over the mountains from the wrap around porch. Only 5 miles to the Blue Ridge Pkwy and 8 miles to the Biltmore House. Trails, rivers, breweries, the arts and crazy good food. It's all here!

The space
You will have access to the entire house. We have 1.5 flat acres, no hills to climb or drive up. Beautiful mountains to look at from the porch.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire house.

Other things to note
Linens provided for all beds. 2 sets of towels per person. WiFi, Washer, dryer, 2 large screen TVS. 1 is smart television, Blu Ray player, Netflix, double ovens, gas stove top, dishwasher. Central AC and heat.

name: Creekside Place in Central Location
description:
Sweet, cozy getaway centrally located less than 5 min. from Asheville airport and Sierra Nevada, 20 min. from downtown Asheville and Hendersonville. Relax on a memory foam mattress with a walk in closet and an en-suite bathroom. Enjoy smart TV with cable, WiFi, fridge, microwave, gas range, cookware, and coffee maker. This is a bottom unit of a duplex with no shared space. Separate entrance and door code for convenience and privacy. Home is easy to get to in a safe and quiet neighborhood.

The space
This is an easy to get to place near interstate 26 and less than 5 minutes from Asheville airport. The house is tucked away in a bird sanctuary beside a stream with a private entrance for easy coming and going. Explore cool breweries such as Sierra Nevada and Blue Ghost near the house. Enjoy the non-shared brand new kitchen with granite countertop, personal living room, large refrigerator, microwave, cooking utensils, a new queen size memory foam bed, and a business/wo

name: Chestnut House
description:
Private, spacious apartment two minute walk from Haywood Road in West Asheville. You'll have a full kitchen with toaster oven, microwave, coffee maker, hotplate, fridge and dishwasher. There's coffee and tea in the cupboard and half and half in the fridge. There's Wifi as well as cable / smart tv in the living room. Enjoy your own shady deck under the Chinese Chestnut. Our beautiful backyard has a 300 year old oak tree and an apple orchard you can hang out in.

The space
The apartment is custom built with reclaimed wood, sinks and tub. There's a ton of exposed brick, offset rope lights and space to be alone if you want. We have AC in the bedroom which will cool down the already cool spaces. The floors are both heart of pine and tile. The master bedroom closes off from the rest of the living area and has nice lighting. There's a tiled alcove in the bedroom large enough to do yoga in, also with rope lighting. The apartment has south facing windows and has wonderfu

name: West Asheville Yellow Bungalow on Haywood
description:
The Yellow Bungalow is in the heart of West Asheville’s vibrant nightlife, great restaurants, breweries and bars. This updated Victorian bungalow is the perfect home base for exploring Asheville. Built in 1915, this funky little house has character, charm and comfort.

The space
Complete with a front porch and off street parking (for up to three cars), the home sleeps six with two large bedrooms offering queen beds and closets. Upstairs you’ll find a private lofted space with two twin beds. Downstairs includes a sitting room; a full living room with a large screen TV and cable; a nice-sized bathroom with bathtub and shower; and a great kitchen with a full-size refrigerator, electric stove, and microwave. Basic cooking supplies and utensils provided, including a full set of dishes and silverware. The kitchen also includes a cute dining nook that seats 5 to 6 guests.
This rental includes the entire top level of the home with a private entrance. The downs

name: Entire Asheville Home - Walkable, Monthly Rental!
description:
Great place in the heart of West Asheville - less than a half mile (0.4 mile) walk to Haywood Road shops and restaurants, including Westville Pub, West End Bakery, Universal Joint, Isis Restaurant and Music Hall (bands from all genres), Biscuit Head, etc. Also close to West Asheville Park with playground and ball field. Huge backyard and creek for kids. Great deck for grilling. Peaceful, quiet setting at end of street. Monthly rental (up to 3 months at a time - additional months negotiable).

The space
Our house is now 4 bedrooms, 2 full baths after we finished off a large portion of the basement.

Guest access
Everything! Enjoy the property.

name: Bear Retreat
description:
Just a short walk to Haywood Road, the heart of West Asheville: local eateries, breweries, coffee houses, pubs, live music and more.....minutes by car to downtown, River Arts District, the Biltmore Estate or just relax on the spacious front porch!

Please note: pets are not allowed. I am sorry, exceptions cannot be made.

The space
This bungalow has been remodeled and restored to have modern updates with an original feel.

name: The In-Between:Private small house between N&W Avl
description:
Beautiful rental in Northwest Asheville (in-between North and West Asheville). Close to river, downtown, West Asheville, River Arts District, Richmond Hill Park, Biltmore, UNCA. Easy access to all the area's best restaurants, breweries, tours, nature, and attractions. Studio-style, 640 sq. ft, 2 story, 1 bed upstairs, 1 bath upstairs, 1 foldout sofa downstairs, and 1 air mattress available on request. Small kitchenette. Fantastic back porch for relaxing. Private driveway and private feel.

The space
The In-Between is a brand-new 640 square foot dedicated vacation rental. I live next door, but I believe in the need for a private retreat. You'll have your own private driveway, privacy fencing, and full use of the rental house. I am on call if you need me for any reason, and am happy to answer any questions about the accommodations or the area--otherwise, I will leave you to your peace.
There's a city bus stop right across the street, but more often I us

name: West Asheville Arts and Craft Bungalow
description:
I live in an arts and craft bungalow in west asheville. I am in the heart of west asheville and am walking distance to all the amenities on the west side of town. New Belgium is a mile down the road and downtown Asheville is three miles to town. Wonderful walking neighborhood.

Guest access
You will have access to the whole house.

name: Just Beyond Utopia
description:
Just Beyond Utopia is a charming cottage located on a 12 acre wooded estate just three miles from the heart of downtown Asheville. The estate has gardens, forests, and a Swiss Family Robinson style tree-houses with a fire pit to relax and socialize with friends and family. The cottage has a queen bed, bathroom with a shower, full kitchen, and a ladder to climb to a cozy loft, perfect for younger family members with 2 twin beds. It is truly the perfect location for families or romantic getaways!

The space
Our cottage is on the ground level. There is one step up to enter the cottage front door. You’ll find a fully stocked kitchen with a full stove, refrigerator, coffee pot, toaster, microwave, and . The cottage has both heating and air conditioning. High speed Wi-Fi is available with an HDMI chord if you wish to stream shows/movies to the TV.

Guest access
The entire guest cottage is exclusively your space. Additionally, you are welcome to ex

name: River, Mountain Modern close to everything
description:
Gorgeous Brand New River Home! Walk across the street and float to 4 different Breweries. Red Oak hardwood floors with beautiful granite counters and everything is new. Spa bath tub and shower in Master with additional fireplace. Contemporary Mountain Modern Décor with Large Balconies with Mountain and River Views. This home is only 1.7 miles to downtown Asheville and 1 mile to West Asheville. Perfect location to explore all the hiking,biking, kayaking, restaurants and breweries in the area.

The space
The property is perfectly nestled between Downtown Asheville, West Asheville and the Biltmore Estate. We are across the street from the French Broad River and during warm months you can drop in the river and float down to breweries and bars.

Guest access
The entire property is included when renting the property. Garage will hold 1 car comfortably.

Other things to note
The driveway is somewhat steep so please make su

name: Asheville Red Cottage - cheerful cozy city home.
description:
Tucked away on the side of a hill on a lovely, quiet tree-filled dead-end street in West Asheville, our cheerful and cozy home away from home awaits you.


The Red Cottage features a fully equipped kitchen, a brand new ceramic tiled bathroom, hardwood and bamboo floors, two air-conditioned bedrooms. Enjoy a barbecue out on the deck, or just relax and enjoy the views.

The space
Maximum of one well behaved dog, and no cats.

name: Walkable and Tranquil One Bedroom Apartment
description:
Enjoy a large, comfortable, and private light-filled apartment with huge windows and french doors opening onto woods on all sides that feels like a hideaway, but is located in the heart of happening West Asheville. The location is highly walkable and yet completely tranquil.

The apartment is a private area in the downstairs portion of our home. We have a newborn baby and a four-year-old so there will be some noise filtering down to the apartment.

The space
The apartment has one bedroom with a queen bed, a full bathroom with tub, a kitchenette, and comfortable living space including a large sectional and a dining table overlooking the woods. There is also an outdoor seating area to enjoy the sights and sounds of nature.

The space is the downstairs of our home and we are generally available to help with any questions or recommendations for great restaurants, breweries, hikes, and other activities in the area. There is some noise that will pro

name: West Asheville Apartment at Haywood Bungalow
description:
In the heart of West Asheville’s vibrant nightlife and great restaurants, this updated Victorian bungalow’s basement apartment is the perfect place to start exploring Asheville. Built in 1915 and recently renovated, this funky little basement apartment has character, charm and comfort! Complete with a small back patio and off street parking (for up to two cars), this one-bedroom basement apartment is the perfect place to call home while staying in Asheville.

The space
The apartment with fully tiled floors has a den with a large, flat screen TV and cable; a large bedroom with a queen bed; and a private, full bathroom. The dining area opens up to the kitchen, where you’ll find all amenities including a full-sized refrigerator, electric stove, microwave and dishwasher. Basic cooking supplies and utensils provided, including a full set of dishes and silverware. The apartment has A/C and heat to ensure your comfort no matter the time of year. This rental includes

name: Sweet space with a hot tub, pool, private entrance
description:
Just on the outskirts of town in West Asheville, our space offers privacy and comfort less than a 10 minute Uber ride into the heart of downtown. When you are not out experiencing the sights and sounds of Asheville, enjoy swimming laps in or lounging around the pool. Relax and be soothed by the Jacuzzi hot tub in your own private master bath. Come and go as you please, just follow the lighted path around the side of the house to the private entrance of the apartment. Cheers!

The space
The private suite with private entrance is really quite large, measuring 25 feet in length and 16 feet in width. It has plenty of room for the 4 poster bed, couch, coffee table, high top round bistro table and antique armoire for you to hang and store your clothes. You can fit plenty of snacks, drinks, ice etc. in the 4.7 cubic ft compact fridge and warm up your leftovers in the microwave. The suite has a master bathroom with his and her sinks, toilet, shower AND a very nice Jac

name: Cozy Country Cottage, Ten Minutes from Downtown!
description:
Charming artist's cottage sits on an acre of land with garden, fire pit, picnic space, school park next door, and plenty of sweetness and privacy to enjoy- located just a few minutes from downtown Asheville. Come and enjoy the city, and then retreat to this cozy little country home, for an authentic Appalachian experience.
We live next door in another small house, and operate a small pottery studio, which you are welcome to check out! We are pet and kid friendly, and love having guests.

The space
This is a small, pleasant space with a queen bedroom, a full size bedroom, and a queen size pullout in the living room. I ask groups of five or more to check in before booking with an inquiry to make sure it will meet their needs. Includes kitchen (full size fridge, stove and microwave), small bathroom, wi-fi, and window unit AC. Please note, this is not a fancy or modernized home, but we think its rough edges are part of its charm, and hope you will feel that

name: VERY CLOSE TO DOWNTOWN- Peacock Escape
description:
Our property is over 100 years old and situated in a very safe neighborhood. Beautiful studio with private deck and private entrance! Walking distance to Downtown Asheville

Enjoy our premium Cal King Bed !

We follow all CDC protocols for cleaning!

Dogs stay free! Pet sitting available for additional fee just ask!

Microwave, medium fridge, coffee maker and toaster provided.

The space
View the Historic Grove Park Resort from your private covered deck. Sleep like a baby in our Super Lux Cal King Bed. The Peacock Retreat has everything you need for your visit to Asheville.

Guest access
You have access to our yards and decks and private parking right in front!

Other things to note
We are very dog friendly and offer pet sitting services for an additional fee just ask!

Mike and Tom are fully vaccinated.


Our above & beyond promise...

If you a

name: Jaw Dropping Views, Minutes to Downtown, Location!
description:
Absolutely unique, newly finished terrace apartment with unmatched long range views of BOTH the mountains and the French Broad River from the comfort of your mountainside retreat. The sunsets will take your breath away! Minutes into town, the Grove Park Inn, Biltmore Estate or the Blue Ridge Parkway. Jaw dropping views, yet close to all the sights. Hang out at your own pub, play billiards and grill with a sunset view. Enjoy all that Asheville has to offer. You'll never want to leave.

The space
New listing, newly renovated. Just ½ mile off I-26, on a beautifully landscaped property, this stylish 1400+ square foot ground floor, terrace apartment is completely self contained and private. You will have your own private entrance, beautiful backyard and off street parking. It boasted long range mountain views including the French Broad River and gorgeous sunsets. This is a private street and the only rental property that offers this amazing view. We often have visito

name: Country Chic Home in South Asheville
description:
This cozy country chic house in South Asheville is a perfect escape in the beautiful Appalachian Mountains. Inspired by the city it dwells in, the home features a large fenced in yard, which is great for your kids & pets, upgraded kitchen and bathrooms, and an aesthetic that will make you feel right at home while escaping it all! Fire up some s'mores by the pit, grill and chill on the patio, or sink into the couch with a local brew in front of the widescreen... this is vacay your way!

The space
Inside you will find lots of local Asheville made decor, a brand new kitchen with updated appliances, a dining room table big enough for 6, a fireplace, laundry room with brand new washer and dryer, 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Outside, the yard is equipped with a front & back porch, large BBQ grill, patio table and umbrella, fire pit, hammock, tire swing, and a 13 ft. trampoline.

Guest access
Love tennis? Bring your racquets! Public tennis courts ar

name: Cozy Hideaway in heart of Downtown Asheville
description:
Na

The space
Na

Guest access
Kitchen, Living room, roof top patio, washer dryer

Other things to note
This is a No Smoking property.

This is a quiet neighborhood, please no partying.

No more than two guest permitted.

Please no shoes in the house.

Please conserve electricity and turn out lights when not in use.

name: West Asheville Epicenter - NC Vacation Rental
description:
Perfect for a Vacation Rental in West Asheville NC!

Located in the heart of West Asheville and just minutes from downtown & the River Arts District. West Asheville has quickly become the most popular place for locals to live, and offers some of the best dining and late night options in town. A short walk to Carrier Park and the French Broad River, plus breweries, recreation on every side. Handmade organic bath products included.

Please include pets in request, fee charged, no dogs >50lbs

The space
Single family, one level home with a driveway, front and back yards.

Guest access
Two bedrooms, living room, kitchen, larger front and smaller back porches with 4 stairs.

Other things to note
- The $100 per pet fee charged upon check out (please contact me in advance)
- Please let me know if you will have a pet
- No pets on furniture due to people with allergies
- An additional charge fo

name: Private Suite, private entry.
description:
Sanitizing since BEFORE Covid.

Updated for 2020 with a comfy couch, new linens and fluffy towels.

Close to the breweries, restaurants, entertainment, and minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway. 8- 10 minute Uber to downtown.

You'll have a private entrance to the lower level of this north Asheville home. 2.9 miles to downtown, 0.4 miles to beautiful Beaver Lake, 1 mile to Grove Park Inn. Several excellent restaurants within 1 mile.

You’ll have privacy and quiet, & off street parking.

The space
This space has a separate ventilation system from main house. As a medical professional with 24 years experience, we have been sanitizing hard surfaces, handles, and remotes, and washing all linen in hot water since before Covid-19 as part of our regular cleaning routine. We take pride in providing an extremely clean space for you.

This is the entire lower level of our home and the door to our living space upstairs wi

name: Downtown Artist Dream, Walk everywhere!
description:
This comfy hideaway is a very unique space. I like to consider it an art lovers creative space. Tucked in the middle of downtown Asheville, this unit provides maximum comfort, front and back yards for your fur babies, a short walk to all things downtown AVL, a short drive to all the best hiking, and a community of wonderful souls that are always happy to point you in the right direction. You will love staying here!

Guest access
Guests can access private parking, high speed wifi, washer and dryer, front and back yards for lounging, and I'm at your service at all times, and I accept the roll of concierge, happily!

name: Slice of Heaven in Asheville
description:
You will find our place surrounded by beautiful scenes of Asheville’s mountains and wildlife. We have a private entrance to your unit with a welcoming space that provides you with a Keurig coffee machine with a variety of coffees. We also include many other extras to help make your stay easy and stress free. An ironing station is included as well as a steamer in case you need to freshen up your clothes. We have Direct TV with HBO and WIFi. We hope you will enjoy every moment of your stay.

The space
We want you to feel like you are staying with friends so we made sure to decorate with simple but quality items from around Asheville so you can enjoy some of the art we have to offer here.

Guest access
You have your own private access with a key pad lock and we change the code for every guest. There is room for one car in the driveway. Please park directly in front of the unit. Please do not block the garage doors. There is no street park

name: Location Location Location!   Downtown Asheville
description:
Welcome to central Asheville. We are convenient to everything. About 10 minute walk to Pack Square and the Thomas Wolf house, and the Grove Park Arcade. Be sure to visit the Biltmore Estate and Grove Park Inn, and we have a long list of wonderful restaurants to enjoy.

The apartment, exclusively yours offered for rental - is a charming efficiency with kitchen space, full bath, and large bedroom-sitting-area.

Guest access
Access to the apartment is through a private entrance on the 2nd floor..

Other things to note
We ask that renters sign a rental contract to assure a clear understanding of the terms of the rental (how long, how much etc... ) .

name: Artistic Retreat - Minutes to Town & Scenic Trails
description:
Artistic family friendly guest suite in North Asheville near the Grove Park Inn located 10 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway biking/hiking trails and 5 minutes by car to downtown Asheville and the hospitals. Families with kids, business travelers and weekend explorers with or without pets are welcome. We can provide recommendations for restaurants, nearby hiking trails and other local attractions.

The space
The studio apartment has a separate entrance and views of the organic flower/vegetable gardens. The space was originally built as a mother-in-law suite that is separated from the main house by a 2” steel door that locks on both sides. It has a private bedroom, living room, dinning area, kitchenette, and private bathroom with a walk in shower.

The living area has board games, a large screen TV and a Roku device with access to Netflix, Hulu, Vudu and other online channels.

The kitchenette has a coffee maker, microwave, toaster and mini f

name: Westside Wayside
description:
Our second story apartment features huge windows that let in the breeze, the sunshine, and the mountain air! Nestled in a quiet neighborhood and set back from the road, our apartment is very peaceful and secure. Enjoy a huge king size bed, a large living room with queen size pull-out couch, a full kitchen, and a full bathroom. All of this less than 10 minutes from Downtown Asheville!

The space
Our apartment was specifically crafted with out of town guests in mind. This 800 square foot space sits atop our detached garage and is adjacent to our year round home. Built in 2017 this apartment features everything we like to have when we travel: a full kitchen, private onsite laundry, a king size bed, big windows that open (don't you hate staying in hotels where the windows don't open!). We live in a tight knit neighborhood so there are other homes close by. That said, we are set back from the street and the apartment has a very private feel. Private, keypad ent

name: West Asheville Bungalow
description:
Charming 1920's Bungalow in the heart of downtown West Asheville. Less than a 5 minute walk to restaurants, pubs, unique shops and live music 7 days a week.
Our home has been lovingly restored with comfortable furnishings and eclectic decor. My husband and I enjoy our home with 3 dogs, 1 cat, and a very talkative African Grey Parrot. We welcome people from all backgrounds and would love to provide you with a fabulous place to stay while you enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

The space
Very quiet and comfortable space with plenty of room to enjoy entertaining and relaxation.

Guest access
Back patio with bbq grill

name: Safe & Clean in Artsy WAVL
description:
Short drive to downtown (+ free parking w/our pass), walking distance to coffee, bars, and all the other local treasures, yet safely nestled in a family neighborhood. Rest up for your Asheville adventures with a luxurious queen bed and relax in a comfy living room with Direct TV, Disney+, Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Video). Features a large bathroom with walk-in shower, breakfast nook (coffee/tea provided), hip artwork, and a private-entrance. The space is great for couples or single guests.

The space
We have parking behind our house for one guest vehicle. If you and your guest need to bring more than one car, you may park on the street. The HVAC is controlled from upstairs. Let us know if you would like us to adjust anything and we will be happy to!

Guest access
The downstairs is all yours! We do have a private, unfinished utility closet (behind the accordion doors). We use this for storage and ask that our guests not enter.

Ot

name: Artists Woodside Home with Private Entrance
description:
We are located 15 min's from downtown Asheville. This is a basement apartment with a private entrance around back. Entrance is through our unfinished community laundry room and then into a small basement kitchen. If more then two cars are arriving, please let us know. We live upstairs, we do our best to be quiet however we do have a toddler who runs around and can be loud during the day. We provide a sound machine in your room for your convenience. Thanks!

The space
While staying with us, make yourself at home. We try our best to be chemical free so there are no air fresheners or fabric softener used in the space. Help yourself to whatever is in the refrigerator or freezer. There is a cute little coffee shop with excellent coffee along the river, 1.4 miles from our house. It is called "High Five Coffee" located at 2000 Riverside Dr. It is located in a big stone parking lot, right next to the river. It's hard to miss with "COFFEE" painted on the side of t

name: Montford  Charmer Close to Downtown Asheville
description:
Historic Montford Neighborhood Vintage Gem: charming private 1BR apartment with private entrance. 10-15 min walk downtown! Now with 2 TVs full cable, Showtime, Hulu, HBO, Netflix, Pandora and Disney Plus!

The space
Located in the Historic Montford district, this apartment is truly a vintage gem--the house is 102 years old!

The kitchen and the area where the double bed is in the apartment was converted from what once was a covered porch. There is a SLIGHT slant in the flooring, so watch your step. We think it adds to the vintage charm.

NEW: You now have cable tv! There are two tv’s—one in the bedroom in front of the king size bed, and one in the living room!

Sleeping: There is a King bed and a single futon in the bedroom. The living room has a futon that folds out into a queen bed. As noted before, there is also a double bed in the room off the kitchen. Be aware that the room where the double bed is in does not have a door.

name: Private Simple Guest Suite close to Downtown
description:
We have a dog friendly, simple guest suite in East Asheville. Amenities include a queen size bed and a full-size futon, fridge, microwave, Kuerig coffee maker , full bathroom with large tiled shower, desk and table. The space comes with private entrance, parking and fenced in yard available for pets (dogs) if needed. Quite/tranquil, but close to town!! Only five minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and a short drive to downtown.

The space
Spacous and comfortable. Close to Biltmore Estate, the Blue Ridge Parkway and Downtown Asheville. On a tranquil street, walking distance to a coffee shop and restaurant.

Guest access
You'll have the entire downstairs of the house with a private entrance. You'll also be able to use the fenced in back yard.

name: Suite in Montford (kid-friendly)
description:
Private suite in the Montford neighborhood, just a 15-minute walk to downtown Asheville. The suite is a 750sqft open floor plan with a private entrance which opens up to a covered porch and fenced yard. Includes a kitchenette (mini fridge, sink, microwave, coffee maker, dishes/utensils/glasses), large living room, two TVs plus a home theater (projector TV) with streaming and DVD players. Perfect for families, couples, or anyone wanting a spacious, private, and comfortable space.

The space
This guest suite is the entire lower level of our craftsman home built in 2010. High ceilings and large windows - the space is bright, airy, and open.

Note, the private entrance to the suite is at the back of the house and down a set of exterior stairs.

This suite has an approved City of Asheville Homestay Permit.

Guest access
In addition to the 750 sqft private suite, guests are welcome to use the backyard and play structure (which

name: Asheville: A Stamp of Approval
description:
Private room w/ private bath.
My home is in an ideal location for reaching everything Asheville has to offer. Just minutes away from downtown, shopping, restaurants, music, nature outings & more.
Charming two story cape cod. The upstairs of my home is your private retreat featuring a large bedroom with queen bed, in room sitting area, private full bathroom. Natural light abounds. Clean & bright. Covered porches. Large yard w/ mature trees. My AirBnB Experience: Asheville rooftop bars & history

The space
Welcome to A Stamp Of Approval. Your home away from home during your stay in Asheville! Enjoy full privacy on the second level of my home. Full size bathroom and spacious bedroom with in-room sitting area are yours for resting, relaxing and recharging. Ceiling fan. Lots of natural light. Windows provide views of my lawn and tree adorned front and back yards.
Comfortable queen size sleigh bed with nice quality linens. Two large chest of drawers a

name: Charming 1920s Craftsman Bungalow close to Local Breweries
description: Prepare meals in a retro kitchen with a distressed paint finish on original cabinetry. Disappear into a deep leather couch or armchair after dinner. Watch the neighborhood go by from a front porch, or swing in a backyard hammock and have a patio BBQ.

name: Heavens Little Haven Two
description:
Million Dollar Arts and Crafts style home sitting on almost 2 landscaped acres in the country, yet positioned only 5 miles from downtown Asheville, challenges you with deciding whether to spend more time indoors or out. A large house that offers a kick-back and take it all in environment, while offering you all the amenities to keep you busy and entertained if desired. The house is broken into a few living/entertainment area is inclusive of an area complete with pool table, bar

The space
The location couldn’t be more perfectly located as it sits a mile from the interstate and is only a 5 minute easy drive to Downtown Asheville, 20 minutes from the ski slopes of Wolf Laurel or 30 minutes from Ski Cataloochee. If you want to hike on the Appalachian trailway, you will find connecting trails a few miles away. Triple Falls in DuPont National Forest is a beautiful 30 minute drive, and the renowned outdoor amphitheater drama Unto These Hills in Cherokee is less than 3

name: Llamasté-an Animal Lover’s Bohemian Mountain Haven
description:
Welcome to Llamasté....a heavenly, dog-friendly, animal lover's mountain retreat surrounded by 24 lush, wooded and pastured acres, complete with llamas and goats, 3 gentle dogs, a cat, wild turkeys, bears, and more. 5 of the 24 acres are in easily walkable pasture.

Located 13 minutes East of downtown Asheville and all of it's splendid offerings, Llamasté is a sanctuary, a magical hideaway where one can be apart from the Fray but still be close to wonderful nature and downtown hot spots.

The space
A professional dowser has proclaimed that this land has powerful chi lines exuding from the mountain range around Llamasté that meander throughout the house and land. The entire house is literally bathed in this exquisite chi, making Llamasté a true sanctuary for the Soul.

Your lockable 190 sq. ft. bedroom with extremely comfy memory foam queen bed and private adjacent bathroom are located on the first floor, accessed from the side porch and drive

name: Hideaway Cabin in the City!
description:
Welcome to Malvern Hills Station, a hideaway cabin in the city! Brand new central AC! Your own peaceful getaway in the heart of West Asheville. Located in the family friendly Malvern Hills neighborhood of West Asheville, this charming country cabin is in the center of it all and in a very walkable neighborhood. Malvern Hills Station is the perfect spot to have your own little private home in the city. Its so easy at Malvern Hills Station. This is convenience and charm at its best!

The space
This detached apartment is located beside the hosts home. The driveway is shared, and there is an off street parking space for guests. The apartment is located to the right of the driveway, above the garage, and there are stairs that lead up to your front door. The entry door is around the back of the apartment from the parking area. The property is shared with the owner's main house, but everything in the rental is separate and for guest's private use only.

Gues

name: 5-star Farmhouse in the City
description:
Take solace in this clean, spacious, artsy renovated farmhouse! Nestled on a mountainside yet less than 1.5 miles to downtown - this is the ideal home base for your Asheville experience. Offering two well appointed bedrooms, a study that sleeps two, several living spaces, four comfy beds in total, two full updated baths, and a modern chic farmhouse kitchen. We enjoy peace and quiet so our home is not the right location for late nights outdoors, and fires are not permitted.

The space
Built in 1910 and with over 1,800 square feet, this super clean, two story home is light, bright, peaceful, and private. Less than 1.5 miles from downtown Asheville, with easy access to the River Arts District, Biltmore, West Asheville, Grove Park Inn, and more. Everything is a short drive or Uber ride away. We always use best practices for disinfecting and sanitizing our home.

The bedrooms are located on the second floor, with beautiful furnishings such as an antique slei

name: Fashionable Gem in the Heart of West Asheville
description: Featuring polished concrete floors, trendy furnishings, and raw wood accents, this home combines rustic and modern elements for a warm atmosphere. Drink coffee and read in the morning light from the comfort of an Adirondack chair on the patio. The suite provides a private room with queen bed and sofa bed to accommodate 2 additional guests.

name: Private Apartment in Quiet Mountain Neighborhood
description:
Relax in this private/attached apartment in quiet mountain neighborhood. Private entrance to this one bedroom apartment (800 plus square feet). Bedroom with queen bed, walk-in closet, full kitchen, living/dining area includes queen sofa sleeper and table with 4 chairs. Washer/Dryer and full bathroom. Private porch area facing landscaped back yard.

The space
This location in East Asheville is away from the hustle, yet minutes to all Asheville has to offer! 15 minutes to downtown Asheville and local restaurants, theaters, breweries and more. 10 minutes to Asheville Mall. 10 minutes to Blue Ridge Parkway Visitors and Folk Arts Center(s) or travel North or South on the Parkway to lots of hiking, mountain biking and scenery! 5 minutes to VA Hospital if visiting a loved one. All the comforts of home while enjoying Asheville!

Guest access
Free Parking, full private apartment with own entrance and back porch area with seating.

name: 'Le Canard' Cottage w/ Porch: 10 Mi to Asheville!
description:
Live the dream in this French country home: nicknamed 'Le Canard,' this 2-bedroom, 1-bath Arden vacation rental ensures a heavenly escape to the Smoky Mountains. Sit on the sun porch, grill a meal on the patio, or simply revel in the wooded backyard views. When you're ready, head up to Asheville, where you can see sites like the famous Biltmore Estate and several museums. You'll love returning to this cottage after your days' adventures to cuddle up by the fireplace with your loved ones.

The space
Private Backyard | Pet Friendly w/ Fee | Chiminea Fire Pit

The Smoky Mountains are calling and this chic cottage is the perfect place for you and your family to experience North Carolina and all of its beauty.

Bedroom 1 (Les Chanteurs): Queen Bed | Bedroom 2 (Le Pacifique): Queen Bed | Sun Porch: Twin Bed

OUTDOOR LIVING: Outdoor dining area, screened-in sun porch, gas grill, wooded views
INDOOR LIVING: Gas fireplace, Smart TV w/ Rok

name: Guest Suite of New,Modern House 5 min to Downtown
description:
Our modern house is located in the Norwood Park Historic District. Located on the north side of downtown Asheville, you can leave your car at our house and walk to many of the highlights that Asheville has to offer. Downtown Asheville, the Grove Park Inn,UNC Asheville are all no more than an easy 35 minute walk or 5 min drive through a quiet, safe neighborhood. You will have the entire first floor, the guest suite, with a private entrance, accessed through an outside staircase. We live upstairs.

The space
Come experience Asheville as a local! Our new, modern house is located in the Norwood Park Historic District, a small, quiet neighborhood that is listed on the National Register of Historic Places. Located just on the north side of downtown Asheville, you can leave your car at our house and walk to many of the highlights that Asheville has to offer. Downtown Asheville, the Grove Park Inn, UNC Asheville, and the UNC Asheville Botanical Gardens are all no more tha

name: Downtown Asheville walkable retreat
description: Modern decor, private, comfy and smack in the heart of downtown Asheville. This hideaway is steps from all the breweries, restaurants, night life, shopping, music, and art that Asheville has to offer. The private, secure, of street parking will allow you to never drive your car during your stay (unless you choose to explore near by hiking, or historic West Asheville). You'll love it here. Oh, and we are pet friendly!

name: Holly Cottage
description: Sweet little house in North Asheville!  This comfortable cottage is perfect for families or a pair of couples.  Two bedrooms (1 queen and 2 twin beds) and two private bathrooms.  The fixtures (cabinets, counters, sinks, etc.) of the house are vintage 1990's with updated furnishings.  New wool carpets in the bedrooms.  Located in an established neighborhood, but privately situated on a large wooded lot.  5 min drive to grocery stores and restaurants and 10 min drive to the heart of downtown.

name: White Fawn
description:
White Fawn is a furnished executive monthly rental in the Windswept Condo Community conveniently located within minutes of both downtown Asheville and Memorial Mission Hospital. Renters will enjoy the modern updates and a serene environment both freshly painted and newly furnished. The turn-key experience includes all new linens, towels, a fully appointed kitchen, a Bluetooth speaker, a 50" 4K TV, additional pillows, and extra blankets. Both bedrooms offer generous closet space.

The space
30 Day Executive Rental

Guest access
The entire unit is accessible, with the exception of the outside storage closet.

Other things to note
The thermostat is configured with a lower limit of 72 degrees F for the Summer, and an upper limit of 70 degrees F for the Winter. We reserve the right to adjust the settings remotely if they are repeatedly abused.

name: COZY & CLEAN, Perfect for friends, 2 BR/2B
description:
Looking for a quiet, cozy & relaxing place to stay in Asheville you have found it! While my guests can come & go without us meeting, I enjoy getting to know them, that's what AIRBNB should be about!
PLEASE NOTE- this is an-law unit in my home, not a hotel. Quiet hours are from 9 PM to 9 AM. For a variety of reasons the listing is not really appropriate for young children. PLEASE REVIEW LISTING RULES & MESSAGE ME W/QUESTIONS BEFORE BOOKING.

The space
I take pride in providing guests in a clean & comfortable place to stay in Asheville!
This is a separate in-law unit in my home, over the years that I have hosted on AIRBNB it is has been my experience that guests who are the happiest, are those that want a great place to come back to and relax after spending the day seeing the area. The listing is not really set-up for partiers, boisterous groups, or young children.

Large master bedroom has its own bathroom- with bathtub. Second bath

name: Wentworth Cottage 2 miles from downtwn & Biltmore.
description:
Beautiful cottage with more than your average BNB. Hardwood floors, fully equipped kitchen, cable, coffee, washer/dryer and secured garage to store your kayak's, camping equipment or motorcycles. Our place has large yard. Located in a quiet family neighborhood, close to everything. 2.5 miles from Biltmore estate. 5 mins to downtown Asheville. 5 miles to Blue Ridge Parkway. 2 mins to Fun Depot. 2 miles to Highland Brewing Company. 2.5 miles to Biltmore Village. 3 miles from WNC Nature Center.

The space
This place is owned by native Asheville residents. 2 bedrooms (One queen and 1 full) with an additional queen memory foam bed inside the fold out couch. Smart TV, Roku, cable TV, full kitchen, washer and dryer. 100% cotton high thread count sheets. Very clean. Coffee provided as well as Brita water pitcher and cooking supplies. Great for the whole family! HAVE A BIG GROUP?- A neighbor across the street also has an AIRBNB That sleeps 5! We may be able to coordinate

name: ✥ The White House ✥ 9 min to DT A-Ville, Sleeps 8+
description:
Professionally Managed

Professionally cleaned

Linens provided

Additional bungalow on property available
✥ The White House Bungalow ✥ 9 min to DT A-Ville!
www.airbnb.com/rooms/31693217

1 King, 2 Queens, 1 Queen blow up, (2) 11' couch
