The White House is a great family house with excellent proximity to everything you'll want to see during your stay. 5 minutes to Super Hip West Asheville and 9 minutes to downtown this 3/2 has a unique modern classic feel. The Brand New Lucid Memory foam mattresses and professionally laundered linens will definitely

name: West Asheville Gem!
description:
Welcome to your home away from home! This gem is a warm and inviting lower level rental in the heart of one of West Asheville's best neighborhoods, Morningside Park. Quiet and relaxing, yet minutes from all the action. Walkable to Haywood Rd and 3 miles to downtown Asheville. 5 miles to Bent Creek where you can catch some amazing trails to satisfy your inner biker/hiker/runner. Also less than 5 miles to Biltmore Estate, America's largest home. Be within minutes to all Asheville has to offer!

The space
This is a lower level, 850 sq/ft guest suite with a private separate rear entrance. Accomodations include private bedroom, bathroom, living room and outdoor sitting area.

Living room comes complete with oversized leather couch, 45" smart TV equipped with Apple TV and Netflix, and plenty of room to relax! Enter the oversized bedroom directly off of the entertainment area, brand new and furnished with a modern touch. Experience the plush queen size bed oas

name: Private Studio By UNCA, Greenway, River & Downtown
description:
Our studio is less than two miles from the heart of downtown Asheville, adjacent to UNC-A (and Saturday tailgate market), one block from the Greenway, near the Botanical Gardens and less than three miles to New Belgium Brewery/River Arts District. The studio is in a safe neighborhood, is a great starting point for a run/ride and and has its own entrance and parking with plenty of flora and fauna! Our studio is great for couples, runners/cyclists, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The space
The studio has a private entrance, a queen bed, sofa bed that sleeps one adult, microwave, mini-fridge and bathroom. There is a patio with a table and chairs for your morning coffee or afternoon tea.

Guest access
You have a private entrance to the studio and off-street parking. The street has very low traffic since we are at a cul-de-sac.

Other things to note
Directions (parking is different from physical address):

name: Montford Oasis, 1 mile from Downtown Grove Arcade!
description:
Welcome to the Montford Oasis! This is a cozy lower level duplex in the Montford Neighborhood, within walking distance from downtown Asheville. We offer a clean and colorful space for you to relax and unwind. Separate entrance with your own lounge area, desk, kitchen, keurig coffee maker, microwave, toaster oven, refrigerator, bathroom/shower, and bedroom. This space accommodates 2 guests only, no exceptions.

The space
The space is an entire separate entrance apartment. We live in the Montford neighborhood, within walking distance to downtown.

Guest access
You may access the entire apartment.

Other things to note
There are no other things to note.

name: Hemlock Hill Hideaway Log Cabin
description:
In 1862, farmer-turned-soldier Pvt. Riley Ray enlisted in the civil war. He survived, returned to the area and began building this log cabin in 1864. In 2017, his descendants sold it to us and we're sharing it with you! An extensive rehab, a pristine setting and modern upgrades guarantee a memorable stay in a piece of rare American history. Only 20 mins. to downtown Asheville, 2 miles from Bent Creek State Park and river tubing, and 10 minutes to the airport and Sierra Nevada. This. Is. It.

The space
We drove up the hill to this cabin and it was love at first sight! There's a good chance that will happen to you too. The cabin sits on 7 acres and 3 of those acres are the woods surrounding it which are attached to Pisgah National Forest. The cabin is much more spacious than it looks from the outside. There are two large bedrooms each with a private bathroom and one small bedroom that's perfect for singles or kids.

Guest access
Guests get to

name: Our serene cabin in the woods
description:
Our private cabin in the woods is in a secluded, quiet mountain community. It shares over an acre of land with our primary residence, wild turkeys, and an occasional bear. Just 20 minutes from downtown Asheville, the famous Biltmore Estate, and craft breweries galore! The Blue Ridge Parkway is 7 minutes away, offering beautiful scenery, waterfalls, and wildlife. Dozens of hiking, jogging, and biking trails. Warren Wilson College is 5 minutes away. Perfect location any time of the year!

The space
Our cabin is privately located down a path leading away from our primary residence. There are numerous steps leading from the parking area down to the cabin. The cabin is surrounded with trees so waking up to the sound of birds and squirrels is such a delight. Wood floors and walls make the cabin cozy and a screened in porch where you can drink your morning coffee or evening glass of wine is so enjoyable! There is a queen sized bed plus a futon upstairs and full

name: Sunporch Suite w/ private entrance (2 Bedrooms)
description:
Enjoy your stay in a quiet residential neighborhood with your own private entrance, bathroom, and sunporch. We love Asheville and cannot wait to share this city with you! A location is in Asheville and all it has to offer, yet feels like you are in the woods away from the city noise. Families with kids, several couples, travelers who want their own space, and Girls Trips from all backgrounds, ethnicities, religions, and sexual orientations are welcome here!

The space
It is important that guests know that due to the layout of the rooms, the first bedroom is the entrance and exit for the second bedroom. If you stay here you will need to be comfortable sharing this space together! I included a photo of the layout so you can see how the floor plan looks.
The sunporch has a living area with a couch and reading lamp. There is also a table that seats four people where you can play cards, eat a meal, work on your computer, drink a beverage, etc.... There is a Keuri

name: Historic Rose Cottage in River Arts District
description: Boasting a prime location for walkability to downtown, Rose Cottage is a local landmark that comfortably sleeps two guests but can accommodate four. Artistic touches with beamed ceilings to the Glasgow rose tile adorning the exterior. The one level home is divided into two halves - one side is a home for a permanent resident. The over 1/2 is a 650 sf guest suite, ground level with a private entrance. The 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom w/ flexible living space can be closed to make a second private room with sleeper sofa, kitchenette w/ mini fridge, sink, microwave, and toaster oven (no stove per Code)

name: Charming Mountain View Home Perfect for Social Distancing
description:
Climb steps to a huge deck that wraps around a striking blue timber house. Marvel at calming mountain views on over an acre of woods. Inside, cross gleaming hardwood floors in an open-plan living space to prepare meals in a gourmet chef's kitchen.

Looking for a smaller place for two just down the road from here? Check out our new sister property at https://airbnb.com/h/cozy-cottage-asheville

name: Sunrise Perch - High on a mountain & close-in
description:
Affordable, clean and private with an epic view of Asheville all the way to the Blue Ridge Parkway.. Only 3 miles from downtown (10 minute drive)..

Shuttle ride downtown or to restaurant or neighborhood of your choice available!

The space
Master BR w 1/2 bathroom and access to a (shared) full bathroom and full kitchen in a Singlewide trailer.

Hot tub available seasonally (fall/winter).

Camping space available for $25 night.

Other things to note
Urban homestead in full swing! Expect garden tools and watering duties nearby though we intend to respect privacy!

name: Eclectic and Stylish Simplicity in a Rustic Setting
description:
Wake up to sky and trees in a modern, light-filled, and thoughtfully decorated home. The space features simple wood finishes, a soaring ceiling and windows that create a peaceful balance with nature, unique furnishings, an open-concept layout, and a deck.
The space is dog-friendly (there are dogs in the lane who are friendly and like to visit on occasion--if you or your dog would not appreciate this, they are easily shooed away) with a $75 fee per pet/stay. One pup only as the space is small.
Mini-split with air-conditioning and heating.

name: Mill House [Fenced in yard; 10mins to Downtown]
description:
Our charming historic 1925 mill house in a quiet neighborhood is perfect for couples, adventurers, family & friends. We welcome pets at no extra charge. Enjoy our shady front porch and fenced in backyard with spacious deck and outdoor shower. You're just minutes from Asheville's River Arts District, the Biltmore Estate, Blue Ridge Parkway, and Downtown Asheville's restaurants, shops, breweries, and other attractions.

The space
This cozy historic mill house at the end of a dead-end street has a high ceilings, original woodwork and a spacious fenced in backyard with a deck and an outdoor shower (warmer months only). From the front to the back, you'll find this place offers amazing privacy and beautiful views just minutes from downtown Asheville.

The house has 1 bedroom with attached bathroom as well as a full kitchen, including a prep table and breakfast nook.

The living room has a dining table and pull-out sofa.

The back door i

name: Montford Garden Apartment - Walk Downtown!
description:
Spacious one bedroom studio-style garden apartment in historic Montford. Private entry and outdoor space overlooking quiet green space, the best of urban & mountain living with just a 10 minute walk to vibrant downtown with shops, restaurants & breweries. Enjoy the locals' life!

We look forward to having you & sharing all that we love about living in Asheville!

The space
Enjoy the locals' life, walking just a few blocks to restaurants like All Day Darling for coffee & breakfast, Montford Deli for lunch, Nine Mile or Chiesa for dinner. Quick drive to Whole Foods, Trader Joe's, and Harris Teeter for essentials. Also a quick trip to River Arts District, New Belgium Brewing and historic West Asheville and hip Haywood Rd.

Easy access to I-240, I-26, and I-40 will get you anywhere quick, be it hiking along the Blue Ridge Parkway, a day trip to Brevard, Black Mountain, Waynesville, or Weaverville, or perhaps just to the AVL airport.

Re

name: Lucky W Ranch House-Great for Gatherings, Close to Downtown
description: Gathering is comfortable and easy in this classic 1965 ranch house. It's been extensively remodeled and upgraded, and offers a colorful, funky mix of new and old furnishings. There's also the opportunity to enjoy a wood fire, inside or out. Only 10 minutes to downtown, but in a relaxed, country setting. Horse pastures and woods surround the property, but access to town is a super-easy and beautiful drive through the country. Only 7 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

name: West Asheville Artisan’s Grotto
description:
Welcome to the West Asheville Artisan’s Grotto, a unique Asheville artist-style basement apartment with 8 ft ceilings, granite counters, huge shower with local granite features, table ceilings with recessed full spectrum lighting, quiet, private space right in the heart of west Asheville.

Walk to nationally acclaimed eateries including Biscuit Head and Sunny Point. Hop on a bicycle, it’s barely 4 miles to downtown. A great place for couples both with or without children.

name: West AVL Bohemian Bungalow, walk to Haywood Rd
description:
Laid-back, artfully decorated Bungalow perfectly located in the heart of West Asheville.

The space
Come relax and use this place as your home base as you explore all the incredible activities in Asheville. Enjoy a full 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom home with full kitchen, breakfast bar, and wraparound front porch. Prime location that is a short walk to Sunny Point (Asheville's #1 Brunch spot), Biscuit Head, Nine mile, and other Haywood Rd eateries.

Guest access
You have full access to the front porch, living room, dining room, kitchen, and washer/dryer. The backyard is not for guest use, and is fully fenced and padlocked. Access to the home is via a keypad on the front door, so no need to fuss with keys. You will also have off street parking in the driveway.

Other things to note
A dog lives here while the residence is not being used by Airbnb guests. The house is thoroughly cleaned, but there may be dog hair/dander present, s

name: Private Full Basement - South Asheville Oasis
description:
PRIVATE ASHEVILLE OASIS 1+ BEDROOM SUITE
Come relax from your adventures in Asheville in my updated basement suite. With multiple private sleeping arrangements possible, the entire 900+ square feet is for you and can comfortably hold 5 - 6 adults. Please look through the pictures to see all the rooms and possibilities. There is a separate key-code entrance & driveway parking for two cars.

The space
My South Asheville Oasis gives you a comfortable place to stretch out and relax in between your adventures in Western North Carolina. I am located right off I-26 minutes from the Biltmore Park shops and restaurants with an easy drive to the Biltmore House (15 min), downtown Asheville (10 min), the Blue Ridge Parkway (10min), Dupont State Forest (20min), and Tryon International Equestrian Center (45 min.) The space includes a small refrigerator, microwave, Kurig, and a kettle. The tv has basic cable , Amazon Prime, and Netflix. The space also has it's own

name: The "NYC Studio" in the Airplane House
description:
The Airplane House sits up high on a hill right off the interstate with a beautiful view of the mountains surrounding downtown Asheville which is only 5-8 minutes away. This unique guest experience will have you wrapped up in the excitement and relaxation of Asheville as soon as you arrive. The guest suite we call "The Studio" consists of a private 600 square foot NYC style "apartment" with its own entrance that is great for couples.

The space
"The Studio" is on the lowest level of the Airplane House and has its own entrance that is at the end of a long, down-hill path that is surrounded by forest. You must step down slightly to get into the Studio. The interstate is on the east side of the house so access to Asheville is quick and easy. There is one off-street parking spot and ample street parking. It is recommended that your luggage is on wheels so you can roll it down the hill to your private entrance. "The Studio" has a kitchen area with a large refrigerator

name: Perfect feel - Asheville home base
description:
Enjoy an entire upstairs apartment :) It feels like a luxurious oasis - soothing colors, fresh feel, new and clean, two bedrooms that are well separated w a quaint living room and kitchenette between. 10 mins drive to Asheville hot spots, one exit to Blue Ridge, home on a large semi-private wooded lot. Basketball hoop, dog run, rocking chair porch. Pls count pets in guest count! Beds for 8 people, up to 4 pets.

The space
Rocking chair porch, light tubes allowing natural light through the ceilings throughout, stunning chandelier stairway, hardwood floors, zip covered mattresses and pillows, butcher block countertops in kitchen, granite in bathroom, peaceful and serene feel. Two bedrooms, one bath connected by a living room / kitchenette. This open apartment is on the top floor and the host lives on the bottom floor.

Other things to note
Welcome!

- This rental is the top floor of a large home that is generally a separate

name: Unique urban location in historic Montford (1/4)
description:
Downstairs spacious apartment(1/4) in historic Montford home built c1900. Remodeled kitchen contains new oven, linens, cooking equipment, coffee maker. Remodeled bathroom has all-new fixtures and towels. Newly painted, with large, open rooms in 1000 sq.ft. space. Living room has sleeper bed, flat screen TV, wifi, cable TV. 2 walk-in closets with storage; sitting room. 4-poster bed. 2 blocks from downtown restaurants, coffee, entertainment. Walk to Trader Joes, Whole Foods, Harris Teeter

The space
The home has a back parking area, large wrap around front porch with glider sofa and chairs to enjoy the breezy view. House sits above and back off the street. Private entrance; walk up the front steps or one step up via the walkway from the parking area to enter on the porch. Easy access to washer/dryer in the newly concreted basement area. Lots of storage for bikes!

Guest access
You will have the apartment you will be staying in and a

name: West AVL Family Funhouse • 5mi to AVL • Views
description:
Charming, super kid-friendly home with lots of great features: well stocked with books, games & toys, foosball table, huge built-in playground, trampoline, fire pit, beautiful mountain and valley views, 12 minute drive to downtown, tons of birds, stars galore and decorated with a colorful but natural touch.

The space
**NEW FOR 2020**
The Family Funhouse isn't just for little kids. We now have a media room downstairs, perfect for those anti-social teenagers who think family vacations are laaaame. They can watch movies or bring their favorite game console and connect with the supplied HDMI cable. This should keep them happy for at lease a few minutes!


We are conveniently located to all of Asheville's greatest sites:

• West Asheville - 6 minutes
• Downtown Asheville - 12 minutes
• River Arts District - 10 minutes
• River Adventure Trips - 12 minutes
• Biltmore Village - 15 minutes
• Grove Park Inn - 15 minute

name: EZ Access 2 the Heart of AVL & Blue Ridge Pkwy.
description:
Private suite with separate bedroom, private bath, kitchenette & multi-purpose room. Suite has an independent "Heating & Air Conditioning System". Guests have complete comfort control of the suite's temperature.

We follow all current Covid protocols, and your Host's are fully vaccinated.

The space
We welcome tourists, hikers, business people; or if you're here to visit family members and/or friends; those caring for loved ones in Mission Hospital or the VAMC. Only 3 steps up, to the suite's private entrance and deck, which you're welcome to use!

Guest access
Off-street parking in well-lit area, close to the private entrance to the suite & deck. Plenty of room for kayaks or a second car.

Other things to note
Please be considerate by honoring a 10:30 pm to 7:00 am quiet time. Only registered guests allowed to stay overnight. No smoking, vaping or candles allowed on premises.

name: Mountain Cabin with Creek close to Everything!
description:
The Rustic Mountain Cabin is a perfect private retreat located in East Asheville only 5 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and 10 minutes from the heart of downtown Asheville. This cabin is newly built in 2017 and is 600 SF on the main level with a large 200 SF bedroom loft overlooking the great room.

The space
Our cabin is stocked with all cooking utensils, bedding, towels and has WIFI and satellite TV with flat screens in both living room and master bedroom. There is a large outdoor fire pit (wood supplied) and grill. The cabin is professionally cleaned after every guest.

Guest access
You will have the entire cabin. A larger three bedroom two bath cabin is located on the same property. It is also an Air B n B rental that sleeps 6. The driveway is shared by both cabins but each has it’s own parking.

Other things to note
The upstairs sleeping loft is accessed from a set of exterior stairs from the front door to the r

name: Art Gallery in Historic Home, Located in River Arts District
description: 1907 Historic Craftsman home located in the Chicken Hill area of the River Arts District. Rotating art exhibitions on display featuring local artists make this listing unique. Soak in an original claw-foot tub, walk along the river or to many local restaurants, art galleries, and breweries. Lots of character in this old home with modern amenities. Each room has a shower and bathroom attached, and there is a kitchenette with microwave, mini fridge, and coffee maker. A great location to enjoy everything this small mountain town has to offer.

name: West Asheville Garden Apartment
description:
This separate apartment with private entry is minutes from Downtown, River Arts District, Biltmore Estate, and Blue Ridge Parkway. Shopping, eating, hiking, camping, zip-lining, river sports at your fingertips! Have mobile massage therapist and extra room ready for your relaxation. Come enjoy Asheville!

The space
This space is calm, relaxing, and whatever you need it to be.
The kitchenette is equipped with microwave, toaster oven, refrigerator, induction burner, hot plate, and all cooking and eating utensils.
There is a mobile computer desk in the bedroom closet for anyone that needs to work from “home.”
There is a smart tv in the living area. There are some apps available or feel free to login your own.
There have been extra cleaning procedures added to the routine to ensure all surfaces are ready for you, the next guest! Come enjoy!

Guest access
After finding the address, instructions are as followed. Please par

name: PRIVATE & Cozy Guest House-Easy Access to Downtown
description:
New detached guest house on SE side of Asheville! Easy/Quick access to all of the action and fun Asheville has to offer. We are located near I-40 with an approximate 10 minute/3 mile drive to the Biltmore Estate main entrance or the Blue Ridge Parkway (2.7 miles) and about 13 minute drive to downtown Asheville. You'll enjoy privacy with our upper story unit, close parking, all located on a short neighborhood street. Nearby shopping, restaurants, and outdoor activities abound.

The space
In response to COVID-19, we are following AirBnB's enhanced cleaning guidance and maintaining a minimum of 24 hours between guest stays. We do kindly ask that if you are planning to stay a weekend night that you book both Friday & Saturday evenings if staying for the 2 night minimum as we must block the night both prior to and following your reservation. Our place is great for the solo traveler, friends catching up, or a couple looking for relaxation or local adventure. Although

name: King-sized Bed in Bent Creek, Asheville Cozy Room
description:
Located in the Pisgah National Forest in Bent Creek close to hiking, mountain biking, the Blue Ridge Parkway and French Broad River. Featuring a super comfortable king sized bed! Private entrance to come and go as you please. This room is attached to a house, but is walled off from the rest of the house, and it's not in the basement. Watch the sunset on the back deck. Parking on the street. Only 9 miles from downtown Asheville. 5 minutes to the outlet mall. Uber and Lyft available.

The space
The cozy room is located outside Asheville city limits in a quiet suburban neighborhood, but still close to everything! Minutes away from the Blue Ridge Parkway and access to the French Broad river. Mountain biking trails are about a mile away. And only a 20 minute drive into downtown Asheville. The backyard is a shared space. Feel free to use the fire pit and bring a hammock to hang from the giant oak tree.

The cozy room is a small studio space attached to

name: Spacious Guest Suite/Apt close to downtown fun!
description:
Snuggled within hiking distance of the Blue Ridge Parkway is our lovely home with an upstairs guest suite. It includes a den with an HD/Smart TV, full bathroom, huge bedroom with a queen bed, and two twin beds. This private guest suite also has a small area with a mini-refrigerator , microwave, and a coffee maker and even some snacks for you to enjoy. It also has fully stocked drawers with plastic/ paper goods for you.
Strict cleaning practices are in place for your safety, too.

The space
In the past, we have hosted young adults and families for extended lengths of time. Each of them comment on the exceptional privacy they feel up there, like it's their own apartment. We are sure you will feel that way, too. Minimum preferred age for our guests is 25.

Guest access
The entire upstairs, comprised of four rooms, are for our guests. It is very spacious and comfortable.

Other things to note
There is a relatively easy

name: Happiness! West Asheville
description:
Ask about our monthly availability.
We're excited to welcome you to our charming home on a quiet street in the heart of walkable West Asheville. We're just steps from Haywood Rd restaurants, breweries and shops. Minutes to the Biltmore Estate and downtown Asheville. Enjoy our open floorpan, full kitchen, laundry, sunny deck and front porch overlooking our flower garden. Covered off-street parking for 2 cars, park-like backyard and plenty of outdoor space. Two bedrooms in the 900 sf interior.

The space
Our space is well loved with great energy. Relaxing and yes, full of Happiness! We have a warm interior that helps make a vacation rental feel like home. The beds are latex with high thread count cotton sheets, cozy blankets and comforter . Comfort and cleanliness are a big deal and part of the hospitality that we provide.
Our place has great outdoor spaces to enjoy the fresh mountain air. All that and minutes from a vibrant Downtown, Biltmore Estate, Riv

name: HayLo in Hip West Asheville: Walk, Bike, Ride!
description:
New construction, furnished with modern sensibilities and accented by local makers. This private guest suite is attached to main home and for your convenience is accessible through a private exterior entrance. Adjacent suite available for folks traveling “together but separate” and can be found on Air BnB as The New Hitop Studio In Hip West Asheville.

The space
HayLo is located four blocks ( 12 minute walk ) from Haywood Rd in West AVL. Haywood is a thriving small district business complete with cafes, pubs, restaurants, bicycle shops, music venues, tattoo parlors, and breweries. Additionally, the River Arts District, Wedge Brewing Co, and New Belgium Brewing are located just down the hill from HayLo. HayLo pairs nicely with bicycles and includes indoor bicycle storage so pack your ride(s).

River Arts District and Downtown Asheville are minutes away by bicycle or car. Green belts and Riverbank parks are right down the hill. Easy access from Highway &

name: Parkway Paradise -1.5 Mi Away - 6 Mi to Downtown
description:
Welcome to our home, lovingly known as Lilly's Place. Available for your use is a bright, clean, 1 BR, 750 sq ft studio apartment located in the lower level of our home. It is conveniently located just 6 miles from downtown Asheville and 1.5 miles from the entrance of the spectacular Blue Ridge Parkway. Enjoy all the mountain scenery and hiking trails you could want! Located in a lovely subdivision of 14 homes, this studio is designed as its own living space with its own separate entrance.

The space
Studio includes a "continental kitchen" offering a coffee pot, mini fridge, toaster, microwave and dishes. The studio has a large bathroom with a nice shower; the bedroom has a plush, pillow-top, Queen size bed; the living room has a pullout Queen sleeper for the kids or friends traveling with you. Smart TV for your streaming services. Don't forget your access codes.

Guest access
Guests will have their own private access to the studio loca

name: Healing & Yoga Home 10min from Dtwn Asheville #I
description:
Treat yourself to a mini vacation at this charming suburban wholistic airbnb. Nestled in the Appalachian Mountains our home is a healing, yoga and artistic space. Located between West Asheville and Candler. Easily accessible to Hwy 40 and Smokey Parkway; only a 10 minute drive to downtown.

If this room is not available feel free to check my other private room #2: https://airbnb.com/rooms/26454939

The space
This warm eclectic home embraces a nurturing, natural, cozy environment while discovering yourself in Asheville.

Guest access
Bedroom, front deck, front patio, living room, kitchen and full bath.

Other things to note
Welcome! We can suggest some referrals for a variety of wholistic and healing modalities that the Asheville community offers. Our intention is to provide you with the guidance and encouragement that may support your transition towards a more wholistic lifestyle.

This might be the

name: Foxhaven Long Range Mountain Views in Asheville
description:
The restrictions are over, so come enjoy the mountains! We have taken the CDC recommended steps to ensure your wellbeing.

Comfortably furnished mountain home with 20-mile mountain range views from each room. The main floor is an open concept so that you can hang out in the kitchen.

Four miles to Blue Ridge Parkway, 15 minutes to the Biltmore Estate and 14 minutes to Downtown Asheville. Situated on a private three-acre tract of the forest so you will feel like you're a part of nature.

The space
This is a new home with an open concept on the main floor. It is located in a private location that allows you to truly soak in the mountains without leaving the property.

Enjoy the modern kitchen and prepare a meal with the whole group or take advantage of the many take-out services that are currently offered by local restaurants. Take in the breathtaking mountain views from the central living space through the elegant French doors and

name: Modern Asheville Greenway Residence w/ 2 Decks!
description:
Discover the thriving art scene and breathtaking scenery of Asheville from 'Intown Riverside Oasis,' a 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath vacation rental situated on the banks of the French Broad River. This family-oriented retreat features a multi-level deck overlooking the water as well as an updated interior. The property also boasts an unbeatable location along the Asheville Greenway, within walking distance from the New Belgium Brewery and 3 parks, along with various coffee shops, restaurants, and bars.

The space
Free WiFi | Keyless Entry | Modern Interior | River Views | 1,600 Sq Ft

Designed with nature enthusiasts and North Carolina family trips in mind, this 3-story property offers all the mountain essentials, fantastic outdoor space, and a prime location on the Asheville Greenway!

Bedroom 1: King Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3: Queen Bed, Futon | Additional Sleeping: Queen Air Mattress

OUTDOOR LIVING: Main level deck w/ outdoor

name: Private lower level suite
description:
Private Lower level Suite with its own private entrance, driveway and parking . A short distance to Biltmore Village, breweries, restaurants and shopping. 5 minutes by car to downtown. The lower level has its own bathroom with shower. The lower level also has its own mini-split heating and A/C unit (brand new), microwave, mini-fridge and smart tv.

The space
Private bedroom with a queen size bed and living area with its own entrance and parking. Includes :microwave, coffee maker, mini fridge, couch, mini split AC/heating, smart tv.

Guest access
Guests have access to the lower level suite; which includes a sitting area, bedroom and bathroom, and outdoor area.

name: Perfect Friends/Family Getaway, Min to Everything
description:
Entire Private Home. Feel at home in our cozy one-story bungalow with the best of both worlds--a quiet country setting that is conveniently located 5 miles to downtown and the ByWater, 6 miles to River Arts District and New Belgium Brewery and 7 miles to West Asheville. Wake up and relax in a bright kitchen stocked with local eggs, fresh bread and coffee. Perfect for families or groups of friends, our house has a great front porch swing and big back yard with fire pit, grill and room to play.

The space
The master bedroom has a king bed with an en suite bathroom.
The second bedroom has a queen bed.
The third bedroom has a bunk bed and pack n play if needed.
One couch in living room has a pull-out (full size) mattress.
Newly renovated garage has pool table, futon/couch, and tv. This opens from the kitchen and out to the back yard.

Fully-equipped kitchen, laundry room, WiFi, smart TV.

Guest access
The entir

name: Walkable West Asheville, entire guest suite.SWEET!
description:
Amazing private guest suite with queen bed, couch, TV, full bathroom, eating area and mini fridge/coffee maker and microwave. Private entrance. Outdoor private patio sitting area. Easy walking distance to sweet downtown West Asheville to find endless restaurants, bakeries, pubs, shops, or hop in your car or grab an Uber and get to fun filled Downtown Asheville in 5 minutes!

The space
There is a private entrance, outdoor sitting area, queen bed and a couch that can be used as another sleeping spot (I have slept on this couch, very comfy!) It all is very separate from our living space, but close at the same time. The heating/cooling system is a brand new mini-split which is easy to operate and get the space to your perfect comfort.

Guest access
We will share with you the key code and so you can easily come and go as you please!

name: Comfortable, quiet South Asheville stay
description:
House in quiet South Asheville neighborhood close to multiple breweries and the Biltmore, short walk to two bus lines, only 3.5 miles from downtown. Parking for two vehicles, access to back deck and all common rooms of the house.

Guest access
All areas of the house except the master bedroom.

Other things to note
We do have a small friendly dog, however he won't be left alone with guests.

name: West AVL Gem! 7 minutes to Biltmore & great for 4!
description:
Wandering tree's and a serene view...
This second floor gem is located in West Asheville & only minutes from the Biltmore.

Downtown, RiverArts District & South Slope- a 10 minute drive, or less.

The lower floor of our home is perfect for four people- cozy and spacious. A woodsy view & quiet deck give you the privacy to relax and unwind. Come and go as you please, with your reserved parking spaces and private entrance.

We leave the space unoccupied for 24 hours with strict cleaning standards.

The space
Efficiency style downstairs "apartment" or “guest suite” with private entrance.

Follow the lit path from your personal parking spot- down the stairs, and onto your own furnished back porch where the wandering wood will sooth you.

The entire lower floor of our home is all yours! You will be delighted by how roomy the space is- we suggest this size space for four people, you may find it is a bit much for one

name: Serenity Knoll
description:
Best of both worlds. Beautiful, modern studio apartment secluded on private mountain road. Just 5 minutes from interstates 26 and 40, 10 minutes from the heart of downtown or the Biltmore Estate, 5 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway and NC Arboretum, 2 miles from the WNC Farmer’s Market and 1 ½ miles from Asheville Outlets. Perfect location to access the area's best restaurants, breweries, hikes and attractions. Pet Friendly with a $45 pet fee per stay collected from Airbnb upon check in.

The space
Looking for a great safe getaway during the “new normal”? Serenity Knoll is the perfect choice. As super hosts, we know you want a fantastic clean safe space to relax and enjoy all the local outdoor activities. We have you covered because staying with us means you can trust us to provide all of the following and much, much more!
• Super close to local outdoor activities!
• Entire private space and designated personal outdoor spaces to enjoy.
• E

name: Walk 2 Downtown/RAD. Cozy Bungalow
description:
Historic & charming urban escape in Downtown AVL. Walk to the best Downtown has to offer in 5 minutes. 2 blocks in the other direction takes you to the River Arts District-R.A.D+Great Location & Luxury accommodations! Enjoy! New Covid 19 sanitation standards upheld.

Guest access
Easy contact free 24 hour entry... code to the door will be given on or before the day of arrival...

name: Modern Mountain Retreat in North Asheville
description:
Beautifully furnished, modern apartment in the mountains with spacious private deck overlooking quiet woods. Less than 2 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway, 3.5 miles to Merrimon Avenue and Fresh Market/Ingles; 6 miles to the heart of downtown. Easy access to all the area's best restaurants, breweries, hikes and attractions. Studio-style, 325 sq. ft apartment with kitchen, bathroom and washer/dryer.

The space
This is a dedicated guest space with separate stone stairway entrance (guest parking is at the bottom of the stairway), keypad-access entrance, large private deck and separate climate-control. You control the temperature in your space.

The kitchen is equipped with a refrigerator, microwave, coffee-maker, 2-burner stovetop and all basic kitchen supplies. The dishes are vintage brown hull pottery and clear glassware-- beautiful to use and enjoy on the deck for any meal. There is also a kitchen table for a workspace or dining indoors.

Ther

name: Gorgeous home on the Blue Ridge Parkway
description:
This gorgeous home sits on the Blue Ridge Parkway and is less than 10 minutes from downtown Asheville. Enjoy the city and retreat home to your own private place in the mountains. The house sits on over 1 private wooded acre. Hike right out the front door onto the Mountains to Sea trail. Over 2000 square feet with fine finishes. Soak in the oversized jet tub. Enjoy a round of bumper pool or choose from the many games on the game shelf. Cook in the fully stocked kitchen and enjoy a real retreat.

The space
Relax in the over sized indoor Jacuzzi tub while gazing into the woods. Enjoy the gas stove indoors or the fire pit outside. This home has beautiful wood finishes and amazing windows throughout.

Guest access
The entire home and 1.5 acre lot are yours to enjoy.

name: Nana’s Crafted Cottage
description:
All are welcome in this hidden beauty that is my peaceful escape.Small yet spacious duplex in a safe,well established neighborhood with large yard & fire pit.Comfortable furniture with laid back distinct style.Unique artwork and antique chandeliers.Extremely convenient: 2 min to I-40, downtown,Biltmore Estate,Blue Ridge Parkway and at least 12 breweries ALL LESS THAN 20 MIN DRIVE! This property has been in my family longer than I have! I'd love you to enjoy the stars from the driveway too!

The space
LIVING ROOM
*42" TV *Roku * Netflix *Maps *Mini-visitor center: info guides
*Comfy couch *Oversized loveseat *Reading Chair *Collection Local Authors * Collection of filmed in Asheville DVD's
KITCHEN
*Stove *Oven *Pots & Pans* Utensils * Kids dinner sets* Olive Oil * Balsamic Vinegar * Basic Spices * Oatmeal * Grits * Pancake Mix * Breakfast Bars * Microwave popcorn * White Cheddar Cheese Popcorn * Local Ashevil

name: Grove Park Guest Suite - Walk to the Grove Park
description:
Come stay in beautiful Grove Park. Enjoy this tree lined, walkable neighborhood, only steps away from the Omni Grove Park Inn property yet 2.5 miles to downtown, 5 miles to the Biltmore Estate and 8 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Easily accessible by Lyft or Uber.

My husband and I have lived here for 28 years so we've got you covered on where to eat, drink and sightsee. I've complied a list of over 50 favorite restaurants, 18 best breweries and our top 20 things to do in this lovely town.

The space
Light filled, quiet, private guest suite includes living room, bedroom with king size bed featuring a cool gel foam mattress, and full bath. The apartment is well stocked with many amenities including a Keurig coffee maker, assorted coffees and teas, organic half and half, shampoo, hairdryer, ironing board & iron. Wifi, wide screen tv, cable, Netflix and Amazon Prime included. Our lovable Golden Doodle, Finn, is never allowed in the guest suite.

name: Asheville Mountain Retreat @ 5 miles from downtown
description:
Enjoy mountain living while only 5 miles from downtown Asheville! Elk Mountain Scenic Hwy is a beautiful mountain road that is a major destination for road cyclists. The road connects to the Blue Ridge Parkway and the house is only minutes from all of the north Asheville amenities - including Fresh Market and Ingles. Incredibly spacious home with 3 levels. Relax on the deck while watching the fireflies and listening to the cicadas. Wildlife sightings are frequent - including turkeys and bears!

The space
Over 2500 sq ft of space on close to an acre of land. Master bedroom/bath with king bed is located on main level and has connecting bathroom. The two bedrooms off the loft upstairs have queen beds and share a full bathroom. In the fully finished basement you will find a separate living area with wet bar, dart board, private deck with porch swing, comfy couches and TV with video games and movies. There is a queen bedroom with private bath and separate entrance of

name: Beautiful Montford Hideaway! Minutes from Downtown
description:
Welcome! Our basement suite sits in a historic neighborhood just a quick (hilly) walk from the heart of downtown Asheville. Our place was finished in 2017 and is comfy, modern, and clean, featuring artwork from locals, great light, all while sitting nestled in the trees. We've love hosting and have achieved Superhost status each evaluation period, earned a 5.0 rating, and booked over 100 stays from all over. You're next!
This suite is permitted for homestay use by the City of Asheville.

The space
Please note that we are following cleaning practices outlined by the CDC regarding COVID 19.

NEW: we recently screened in our back porch for additional comfort! This space features rocking chairs and a love seat and you may never want to leave. Please note that we do not allow smoking on the porch.

Inside, the dining area features a table and chairs, coffee maker as well as coffee and tea, dishes and cutlery, and a small refrigerator and micro

name: City Home in Private Setting
description:
Ranch house with privacy, but conveniently located to Asheville's attractions. Within ten minutes are Bent Creek for mountain biking or hiking, the Blue Ridge Parkway, downtown Asheville or West Asheville. The Biltmore Estate is about 15 minutes away. Walking distance to Asheville Outlets and a grocery store.
I want to emphasize that THIS IS NOT A PARTY HOUSE!! Please don't book if that is your intention. YOU WILL BE ASKED TO LEAVE.

The space
This fully renovated, open floor plan house is equipped with high speed WiFi, a flat screen TV with a Roku for streaming and antenna for local channels, a functional wood stove for the cooler months, beautiful gardens, and comfortable accommodations.

Kitchen:
Fully equipped with stove, microwave, toaster, dishwasher and full sized refrigerator. Stocked with essential cooking items: pots, pans, utensils, plates, glasses, basic spices, etc. Keurig machine with K-Cups for your morning coffee and various

name: The Asheville Oak
description:
Come relax at our cottage, located 1/2 mile outside the city limits.
6 Miles to Downtown Asheville, 3 miles to The Biltmore Estate. 1 mile from I-40 and I-240 access.
Just passing through? This is the perfect place for your stay. Late night self check in provided for your convenience. You book, we send you the front door entry code.
Convenient.
1 Queen Bed in the main floor bedroom, 1 Double bed in the loft (must use ladder to access loft).
Be sure to read the House Rules! No smoking.

The space
The cottage is located in a residential neighborhood. Oakley Elementary School park is mile up the road and has a large field, basketball goal, paved track and playground.
The neighborhood consists of lots of elderly folks as well as lots of families with kids.
Need room for 2 more people? Check out The Asheville Acorn, located on the same property!

Guest access
As a guest, you will have access to and th

name: Balcony Cottage in Town--Oasis of Calm
description:
Morning coffee on French balcony, wine and cheese on porch at sunset. Relax in a light-filled cottage with everything you'll need for a peaceful visit. Newly renovated studio cottage in quiet neighborhood only 5 min. drive to lively downtown Asheville, walkable, uber $7. High speed wifi, flat screen TV, full kitchen, very comfortable queen bed with quality linens. Sep. entrance and off street prkg, washer/dryer. Cottage in town that feels like sweet, quiet retreat. (30 day min.--city rules.)

The space
Newly renovated cottage in quiet neighborhood in North Asheville. Great neighborhood restaurants and walkable to downtown. Vinnie's, Zen Sushi, Avenue M, Gan Shan, to name just a few, are minutes away. The Grove Park Inn, now Omni, is a terrific walk anytime of year, but especially in fall to sit on porch and in winter to warm by huge fire(URL HIDDEN) Cottage is nicely decorated and care taken for comfort, needs, and style. A separate entrance with code for s

name: Natural Retreat For Two
description:
Beautiful, sparkling clean studio apartment in quiet neighborhood, private entrance with self check-in. Wake up in queen sized bed, enjoy lovely bathroom with tub, full kitchen with coffee and oatmeal provided, great natural light, sweet seating area on private patio.

Mountain bike/hike in Bent Creek Recreational Forest, a minute from French Broad River, Arboretum, Blue Ridge Parkway, and Outlet Shopping. 15 mins to downtown and West Asheville. Easy access to airport.

The space
The studio is fresh, bright and beautiful ~ a restorative space to relax. We clean to the highest standards, including following all Airbnb cleaning and sanitation protocols. Whether you've been exploring spunky West Asheville with its restaurants and shops, checking out street life downtown, visiting Biltmore, or sampling breweries, our quiet neighborhood is a sweet place to relax and renew. If you'd like to mix up town life with the natural world you will find Zen Tubin

name: The New HiTop Studio In Hip West Asheville
description:
Kick back in West Asheville in this newly constructed addition. The Hi-Tiop is situated a few blocks away from West Asheville's Haywood Rd business district.
The bedroom suite includes a roof top deck, coffee bar, 48" TV complete with Apple TV and NetFlix, and mini-fridge. Indoor bicycle storage is also available upon request. Adjacent suite available for folks traveling “together but separate” and can be found on Air BnB as HayLo in Hip West Asheville: Walk, Bike, Ride!

Yes, there is a microwave.
Please note there is no smoking on the property.

name: The Dressmaker's Suite
description:
This gorgeous apartment is a converted dressmakers studio with the feel of a Parisian flat. Located in a West Asheville residential area three short blocks from Sunny Point and Haywood Road shopping, venues, dining and culture. A clean, elegant, and creative space with a private entrance and your own parking spot right outside your door.

The space
This suite offers a space for comfort and luxury. A bed with gorgeous linens and soft pillows. The palest blue walls and saffron yellow silk curtains. A vast table for spreading out the entire newspaper and/or your latest creative endeavor. Appointed with handmade and artistic touches and gilded flourishes. A clawfoot tub with sunlight pouring in. The scene evokes a poetic dream.

Guest access
A single off street parking space, spacious workspace, bedroom, private bath. Walking distance to West Asheville's diverse restaurant, bar and shopping scene.

Other things to note
This

name: Walk to downtown Asheville, private studio suite
description:
You will love staying in our cozy above-garage studio during your stay in Asheville! Can sleep up to 4. We are less than a mile from downtown and only blocks away from the nearest coffee shops (City Bakery & Starbucks), plenty of restaurants (Jettie Rae’s Oyster House, Taco Temple, Bone & Broth, Charlotte Street Pub & Grill), ice cream (Ultimate) and exercise studios (Asheville Yoga Center & SOR). We are also only a few miles from the iconic Grove Park Inn. Uber downtown approx. $9 per ride.

The space
Our house sits on a quiet street in a historic Asheville neighborhood. Our above garage studio is a 350 sq. foot private space with its own entrance from the main house that Marc and I live in. The keypad entry makes life a bit easier because you don't have to keep up with a set of keys :) There is a comfortable queen sized bed with an additional pull out sofa bed (size full). Studio includes microwave, refrigerator, coffeepot, utensils, dinnerware and other u

name: Appalachian Abode-walk to all W-AVL’s hot spots
description:
Charming and cozy in hip East/West Asheville. This brand new chic apartment retains character of the bungalow style home it is in. You will have a private entrance and patio which leads to a 1 bed/1 bath with a kitchen that you have all to yourself. Sleeps up to 4 comfortably. The bathroom has a tiled shower with rain head and bench. You will be walking distance to some amazing restaurants, bars, shops and breweries in West Asheville. It's a quick, easy drive to the heart of downtown Asheville.

The space
This private basement level apartment retains the charm of the bungalow style home it is in and you will love it!
It has a plush queen size bed and a brand new queen size sofa sleeper. Tiled shower with rainhead and bench seat. Kitchen with full sized refrigerator, microwave, sink and coffee pot.
Private patio to sit on and sip your morning coffee or afternoon local beer or wine!
Your welbehaved, house trained dog is welcome with prior approval an

name: Newly Renovated Home in Downtown Asheville
description:
This private rental is located in a newly renovated home within a 5-10 minute walk of everything that downtown Asheville has to offer! Leave your car in the driveway and walk to the all the best restaurants, shops, and breweries in the area. A few blocks in the other direction takes you to the funky River Arts District, the French Broad River, and West Asheville.

The space
Guests will have the entire upstairs of this home. There is no shared space with the downstairs tenants (me and my 3 dogs). There is one bedroom with a queen bed, a private bathroom, and a living space with an additional pull out sofa bed. While it can sleep up to 4, it would be most comfortable for a couple. The unit has its own private entrance, free parking, coffee maker, toaster, mini fridge, microwave, personal thermostat, and a TV with lots of streaming options such as HBO, Netflix, and Amazon Prime.

Guest access
Guests have the entire upstairs to themselves, a

name: Cute Cottage w/ Mtn View, Walk to Biltmore Village
description:
Early 1900's cottage in the Oakley neighborhood, conveniently located within walking distance to Biltmore Village. Downtown is just 3 miles away and easily accessible by Uber or bus. My place is perfect for individuals, business travelers, couples or young families.

This is an 'old-new' house with lots of character. The space is bright and airy with charming details, modern amenities, great outdoor spaces and beautiful mountain views. A unique find in the city!

The space
Inside, there is a cozy living area with two comfortable loveseat couches and a cushioned storage ottoman. The couches can be used as sleeping areas for small children and there is also room for the full size air mattress on the floor. There is a 42" HDTV with Roku to watch Netflix, Hulu and Amazon Prime, a Blu-Ray/DVD player, and WiFi for your laptops and mobile devices.

The kitchen is fully equipped with cookware and utensils, coffee maker, microwave, full-size stove and

name: Cozy downtown walkable retreat.
description: This cozy, downtown hideout is the perfect place to escape reality and take in everything Asheville has to offer. Steps from all of the breweries, bars, restaurant's, shops, etc. You can find outdoor adventures galore in a short drive, or take a $5 uber to historic west asheville. Our eclectic neighborhood will make you fall in live with Asheville at first site. We look forward to hosting you!

name: Asheville mountain views and walk to downtown!
description:
Our historic home (1895) is adjacent to the Grove Park golf course. We have beautiful long-range views of the Blue Ridge Mountains and are close to downtown. You can walk to restaurants, coffee shops, stores, and the Grove Park Inn. Our private downstairs suite has its own path and entrance. It includes a bedroom, living room, and bathroom. Come relax, explore, and enjoy the views, patios, and sunsets. Pet friendly.

The space
We have a comfortable and cozy downstairs apartment with a separate entrance. The main bedroom has a queen bed. The bathroom is recently remodeled with new sink and shower, but has low beams making the ceiling low for tall people (6 f ). A refrigerator, microwave, and Keurig are available in the apartment.

Guest access
You are welcome to use our grounds during your stay. Take a walk in the yard, have a seat at one of the tables or adirondacks, have a swing under the tree, or catch some rays on the lounge chairs.

name: At Home in Asheville: Comfort, Location, Amenities
description:
Asheville is awesome! And it's even better when you make our beautiful Montford condo your home base. Enjoy quiet neighborhood living, with downtown Asheville just around the corner. Discounts available for stays of 30 nights or more!

The space
Renovated in 2017, with clean, modern finishes throughout. Enjoy 1,632 square feet of living space, with an open floor plan, lovely hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances and granite in the kitchen. Fully outfitted with everything you need for a great extended stay!

Bedrooms are on the 2nd floor. The master has an en suite bathroom. There is also a full bath with tub off the upstairs hallway.

Off-street parking for up to 2 cars.

The condo is in a great location: quiet, but walkable to Montford coffee shops & restaurants -- and to downtown, if you're up for it. Also close to highways for quick access to everything else!

CREATURE COMFORTS: cozy furnishings, new appl

name: La Buena Vista
description:
Welcome to La Buena Vista and experience living like a local in this quiet West Asheville neighborhood! This house sits on a residential street in the heart of West Asheville, and offers mountain views, easy parking, walking access to Haywood Road hotspots, and the best front porch for sunsets and relaxing. Soak in the view and convenience while exploring our fair city!

The space
Mountain views for miles from this cozy hilltop spot. Large living room and front porch for hanging out, and private bedroom and bath. Note there is no kitchen access. Hardwood floors and ample daylight create a clean and fresh space. Large working desk in a quiet space for professionals working remotely. A locked barn door separates your living area from my permanent space, so we both can enjoy privacy and security. Think of the house as a duplex - where guests and host each benefit from separate living spaces.

Guest access
Large, level front yard, large por

name: Private entrance - 2 rooms with 2 full baths WAVL
description:
Cozy bungalow with comfortable rooms. Everything you'll want is within walking distance to the center of West Asheville. Food, Music, Breweries, Fun and a lot more are just an evening stroll away! If you need to go a little farther (say the Biltmore, Black Mountain, or for a hike in the Pisgah National Forest) this house is very convenient to I-40 and I-240 as well as I-26!

Take your time and take it slow. Or if you want, hit the road and enjoy the great outdoors!

The space
The house is a modern bungalow style house with hardwood floors and lots of light. You'll enjoy updated features while still enjoying the bungalow charm! 5 beautiful skylights cascade light across the living room, kitchen, and other parts of the house. Another major advantage this house offers is being in close proximity to lots of fun things to do while at the same time being on a quiet dead end street!

Guest access
The living room, porch and back deck are

description:
ADORABLE, clean, cozy 3 BR/1 BATH home an easy 8 - 10 min drive/Uber to Downtown Asheville. Located in urban area so mix of homes and businesses. Close to UNCA, River Arts District, Biltmore Estate, W Asheville, and many restaurants/breweries! Sweet private fenced backyard with a gas grill and firepit. Cable TV with premium channels. It's the same type of disinfectant used in restaurants and hotels, you spray it on and leave it to dry and it is effective against covid viruses.

HOUSE: Recently renovated 3 bedrooms and 1 full bath. Large Kitchen with new appliances and granite countertops. Coffee maker

($50 per stay pet fee)

name: Views, Sunsets, Privacy - Next to Grove Park Inn!
description:
This lovely AirBnB apartment boasts 900+ square feet of space and is located just steps away from the Grove Park Inn. Only 2 miles from downtown Asheville, it sits on a private lot, in a quiet neighborhood. Enjoy beautiful mountain views and sunsets through wall of windows in living area, or relaxing on your patio. Large ensuite bedroom, full kitchen, expansive family room with additional sleeping options - designed and accessorized to meet your needs. All are welcome!

The space
Clean, accommodating, spacious and relaxing - designed to be your home away from home. Inside you have separate kitchen, living area, and bedroom. Outside is your private patio where you can enjoy morning coffee or watch the sunset with a glass of wine or local craft beer.

description:
Sleep tight in a private Queen Bedroom with adjacent, private bath in an owner occupied home with a laid back atmosphere, situated in a tranquil neighborhood in East Asheville.
Shared, common spaces have a relaxing, laid back vibe. Hosts are fully vaccinated and follow CDC cleaning guidelines
Enjoy a cup of coffee in the morning, or a glass of wine, local craft beer, or a bourbon on the deck or covered porch, in the evening with your hosts. Easily accessible to downtown, Biltmore Village and Estate, and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Uber and Lyft are readily available in this location.

description:
Exercise, kayak, or just enjoy the view.
Brand new home easily accessible to Carrier Park with miles of greenways along the French Broad River. Rent bikes, head to the climbing gym, rent tubes or kayaks and float down the river all within footsteps of the front door.
Walk the greenway system to New Belgium and the River Arts District. Conveniently located close to downtown and West Asheville.
Legally permitted Airbnb with the City of Asheville

The space
Brand new home with premium appointments. Keyless entry. Smart TV. King-sized beds with Biltmore Collection linens. Shampoo, conditioner, and soap provided.

Guest access
Whole house, with two balconies overlooking the French Broad River.
Upper balcony you can see into the Biltmore Estate grounds.

This mountain cottage is conveniently located 2.5 miles from downtown Asheville and 4 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway offering guests the best of both worlds...a retreat in the heart of the mountains yet convenient to all that Asheville has to offer. This well loved and maintained cottage is beautifully furnished and offers two bedrooms with queen sized beds; two full bathrooms; twin sized pull out sofa; and an open living dining area with a wood stove; central heat and AC and ceiling fans.

The space

The house sits at the end of a private gravel road and shares a cul de sac with only one other house. There are a few other homes located along the road leading to the cottage. In the fall and winter you can easily see mountain ridges as the house is tucked in between several ridges. The house and neighborhood are quiet and private making you feel you a

Snuggle with your favorite beverage! Leave the door open and enjoy birdsong and cool summer breezes. Watch a cool DVD!

description:
This beautiful and charming cottage sits at the foot of 16 acres and is quintessential to everything Asheville and the surrounding area have to offer. The cottage is close to everything, yet gives the feel of being away from it all. Built in the early 1900's, this house maintains it's history along with modern upgrades. The house over looks a pasture with cattle, where you can find deer grazing and turkey's passing by. To the left of the house is a pond that we do allow fishing on.

The space
This newly renovated cottage comes fully furnished with two bedrooms equipped with two queen beds, a blow up queen bed, a Duraflame fireplace in every room, a Duraflame log fireplace, dining room, and a 30" HD TV with Direct TV in the living room. description:
Base your Asheville escape out of our newly-built, lower-level apartment in “East West” Asheville. The city is at your doorstep and the mountains are an easy drive. Come and go as you please with your own private entrance and off-street parking. Wander on foot to New Belgium in one minute, or easily access the many breweries, restaurants, shops, and venues of the River Arts District, Haywood Road, and Downtown. Our home is within walking distance of the French Broad River and miles of greenways.

The space
Our home was built on the hills above the French Broad River in 1920. In 2017, we completely renovated the house with visitors in mind. The Sweet Spot includes a ground-floor, 800-square-foot apartment specifically designed for Guests. The space is bright and naturally lit, with large windows in every room. description:

The kitchen, dining, living rooms, two front and one back covered porches

name: Quiet West Asheville home (private entrance)
description:
15 year old home on a quiet street in West Asheville! Perfect for mountain getaways. Close to downtown West Asheville and downtown Asheville!

The space
Guests will enter through the gate at the base of the driveway to the outdoor steps and will head down the steps to the lower-level rear entrance. We will also be implementing even more stringent cleaning policies in order to keep guests safe and conformable.

name: The Little Red Porch
description:
The Little Red Porch - A private retreat in the beautiful mountains of peaceful East Asheville. We welcome people from all backgrounds, cultures and beliefs to our home, hoping to share Asheville, NC-- a wonderful, magical place--with as many as folks as possible. And we LOVE having KIDS stay with us! Please take a look at our bright, cozy apartment and see if we look right for you.

The space
Our place is conveniently located in a quiet neighborhood 8 minutes from the heart of downtown and under 20 minutes from about everywhere else. We are super close to I-40, I-240, and the Blue Ridge Parkway, and about 7 minutes from I-26. West Asheville, The Biltmore House, Black Mountain, and the River Arts District are all 10 minutes away.
