name: Perfect place for a quick getaway
description:
This sunny room is attached to a private area in a daylight basement. The living area opens to large fenced yard with a 300 square foot flag stone patio with nice patio furniture. Light up the evening with the tiki torches that line the patio. The sliding glass door acts as a private entrance to the room as well as access to the patio.

The shared living room/dining room has a TV with netflix available. Open up the sliding glass doors to a second floor deck with an available grill for cooking.

The space
Convenient to restaurants, breweries, music venues and bars of Asheville and West Asheville. Popular areas for hiking, mountain biking, rafting and road biking are close by. Quiet neighborhood with easy parking. Guests have access to a full kitchen. My knowledge of the local area is an invaluable asset to any visitor new to the area.

name: Oasis in the Trees
description:
This newly renovated Arts and Crafts studio has its own parking and entrance and is surrounded by beautiful trees and gardens. The bedroom and sitting-room have Mexican tile floors, stylish furnishings and a soothing ambiance. You will enjoy a comfy queen-size bed, a kitchenette with all the modern conveniences, fast Wi-Fi and a 32 inch Smart TV. The beautifully tiled bathroom has heated floors, a shower built for two and a dressing area separate from the bedroom.

The space
The Oasis in the Trees is great for a couple looking for a romantic get-a-way or if you have kids, we have a comfortable queen-size pull-out couch that can sleep two young ones.

Guest access
There are great hiking trails and mountain biking areas nearby. If you are a nature-lover, a mile up the road is a bird sanctuary and a short hike away is Beaverdam Lake which is great for a nice walk with a beautiful view. We are also seven minutes from Asheville's entertaining an

name: Perfect Place for a quick getaway 2
description:
This comfortable room is on the main living floor. Simple, comfortable and clean is how my past guests describe it. The room overlooks the large fenced yard with a 300 square foot flag stone patio that is set up nicely to relax on. Light up the evening with the tiki torches that line the patio. The shared living room/dining room has a TV with netflix available. There is a deck with an available grill for cooking.

To read more reviews check out my other rooms reviews.

The space
The bedroom has a simple design to maximize comfort and minimize distraction. A comfortable queen bed invites for a great night of rest after a fun day in the mountains or downtown Asheville.

Guest access
Convenient to restaurants, breweries, music venues and bars of Asheville and West Asheville. Popular areas for hiking, mountain biking, rafting and road biking are close by. Quiet neighborhood with easy parking. Guests have access to a full kitchen. My k

name: The Snookmore, Mountainside Refuge with a Hot Tub
description:
Nestled in the southern tip of Snookville, the Snookmore is designed for front porch rocking. With the Blue Ridge Mountains peaking through the treetops and the community garden just a stone's throw away, all you'll need is a iced beverage and life will slow right on down.

The Snookmore is the perfect refuge in these uncertain times. Its only neighbors are us and another rental (The Snookery), and we all have plenty of space to call our own.

** Newly installed backup generators. Never be left the dark again!

*** During the winter months, we do recommend four wheel drive.

name: Studio apartment in mountains of North Asheville
description:
Come and visit the BIltmore Estate which is offering great deals this time of year and is only a 20 minute drive from the apartment!!

Great one bedroom studio apartment located in the mountains of Asheville, NC. The apartment is located:
-12 minutes from the heart of downtown Asheville
-7 minutes to the famous Omni Grove Park Inn
-5 minutes from an entrance to the Blue Ridge Parkway

The space
Three guests are welcome.. but please note that the common area is not an ideal place to sleep for an adult. This apartment is great for one couple to stay in, or one couple plus a child.

If a third guest would like to join, their will be sheets available to sleep on the futon.

Please note that the apartment is at the end of a gravel road up a mountain, with great views of the city lights at night on the way up. It is a windy road that some see it as an adventure, while others do not. A 4 wheel drive car is recommended. Also,

name: The Shanty~Hot Tub~8 Miles to City of Asheville NC
description:
This 1BR/1BA abuts a creek and wooded setting 8 miles south of Asheville within about 4 miles of BR parkway. Now has an old, slightly stained Claw Foot Soak Rub for that relaxing evening. Close to shopping, dining, hiking, biking fishing. A bohemian shanty garage conversion of reclaimed materials from vintage shops. covered parking, screened porch with chiminea and grill, microwave, mini fridge, Keurig Coffee and blue tooth tunes. Its cozy, organic and a bit different. Enjoy!

The space
Location and décor sets this apart. If you want an interesting décor and a safe environment near Asheville this is an excellent choice. The Shanty has a atypical style hot tub which is your old style claw foot tub. This tub has no jets but its just as soothing and offers you a serene soak without the noisy jets. Fill and drain as you like. Sheets, towels, starter supply of paper goods, coffee and a small box of fire wood with starter is offered to burn in the chimin

name: The Birdhouse: Close to Biltmore, Downtown. SOLAR!
description:
MONTHLY / WEEKLY DISCOUNT. FOLLOWING THE COVID-19 CLEANING PROTOCOL. Beautiful 100% SOLAR POWERED! 400 sq. ft. studio. Permitted. Surrounded by gardens. Private entrance. Safe street parking. Lots of natural light & amenities. Allison's local beech wood accent this modern studio with local artwork and Sarah's unique terrariums. Private patio space. 1 mi. to Biltmore, breweries & Blue Ridge Pkwy! 3 miles to downtown. Short walk to bus stop! Just off I-240 and I-40 in east Asheville.

The space
One queen size bed with comfy Tuft & Needle mattress (brand new). One size "full" futon in living area with new, thick mattress. Both beds have mattress and pillow protectors for allergens and bed bugs.

Kitchenette is furnished with microwave, chef-style 2 burner cooktop, chef-style large toaster oven, small fridge and freezer, blender, coffee maker, etc... The toaster oven performs all the functions as a regular range, just in a smaller package. Kitchenette is st

name: The Happy Hippy Haven! 7min-> town! Vapes OK.
description:
This private en suite with private access is perfect for fellow bohemians! Whether you’d like help finding a home to buy or are just exploring AVL, Kitty’s place has got you covered. You can enjoy the queen microfiber & twin beds, a newly remodeled bathroom with a shower &
basic kitchenette supplies. Your door to the house is blocked off w a mattress so you can enjoy privacy and inclusivity. If you need anything, just text!
Guests must agree to House rules. No Fussy Ppl! Include real# of guests

The space
Private Coded Entrance into Master Suite with Full Bathroom from the master suite Deck, adjacent to Fire Pit/Grill.

Master bedroom has microfiber Queen bed and comfy twin cot Plus a set of velvet armchairs that were once owned by the Biltmore Estate.

Enjoy photographic pieces of Asheville’s sights and scenes in your room decorated with French antique furniture.

Pet feline Clawdette & beagle Ruby live here.

V

name: Adorable Bungalow in Trendy West Asheville
description:
Live like a local! This charming West Asheville bungalow is on a quiet street yet a short walk to cute, trendy Haywood Road. Stay in the heart of the coolest neighborhood in Asheville. Walk two blocks to restaurants, coffee shops and bars along hot Haywood Road. Or head to the River Arts District, downtown Asheville, or the South Slope in minutes. Enjoy the West Elm furniture, original hardwood floors, and modern, updated, subway-tiled kitchen in this private home.

The space
Park your car and leave it for your whole stay! This charming, well-maintained 1928 bungalow was fully renovated a few years ago. Just a 5 minute walk from the heart of where the locals hang out - on West Asheville's main commercial street - Haywood Road.

Special touches:
*Air purifiers - with optional UV - throughout the common areas
*Tuft & Needle Mint Mattress
*Avocado Organic Bamboo Mattress
*Berkey Water Filter
*Clean, Sleek LG Stainless Steel Fridge<

name: Cozy Craftsman Bungalow in the Blue Ridge Mts
description:
1920's bungalow in the heart of Asheville. This 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath home has a quiet charm and an unobstructed view from the front porch. Moments from downtown, you will have access to the Blue Ridge Parkway and downtown nightlife. With an abundance of natural light, a gas fire place, natural hardwoods, marble counter tops, and a well-appointed, fully-stocked kitchen with stainless steel appliances, you are minutes from 2 natural grocers, and have an eclectic selection of restaurants to explore!

The space
PLEASE NOTE: As this is our first Airbnb listing as hosts, we are in the process of doing minor updates and a decor makeover. The pictures posted are current and temporary. Work will be completed by November 12, in time for Holiday Bookings!

This 3 BR home has one master with a walk-in closet, a children’s bedroom with a walk-in closet, and a guest room/office, with yet another walk-in closet. The full bath is outfitted with an oversized tile shower a

name: The Snookery ~ Refuge Perched on a Mountain
description:
The Snookery is the perfect refuge in these uncertain times. Perched on the mountainside with a back deck with views from the hot tub, it is the perfect place for a safe, memorable gathering.

Its only neighbors are us and another rental (The Snookmore), and we all have plenty of space to call our own. Do not hesitate to reach out with further questions!

The space
Perched on the mountainside, the Snookery has two back decks with views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Designed to sleep up to 12 comfortably, the Snookery affords large groups a place to convene, but can also provide an intimate stay.

Newly constructed in 2107, it has a fully equipped kitchen for the gourmet chef, the option of a Keurig, Coffee maker or hot tea pot for the morning haze, and both a dining room and back porch dining table for any meal setting you please. Also on the back deck you'll find a grill for the vacation cookout and a hot tub for the end of the day wind

name: Woodsy Spot in the City
description: Cozy, woodsy home 1 mile from downtown Asheville! This one bedroom apartment is the perfect spot for your Asheville getaway. It sits in a quiet, private neighborhood and has a private entrance. Located near UNCA, less than a block from the Greenway where you can walk to the Botanical Garden or ride your bike to downtown, and the Saturday Farmer's Market where you can find organic in-season fruits and vegetables, local coffee and baked goods. It is perfect solos, couples and business travelers.

name: Cozy Basement Apt near Airport/AVL/Breweries/Fun!
description:
Just minutes from the Asheville Airport, Sierra Nevada Brewery, and the Blue Ridge Parkway. This Basement Studio apartment is the perfect home base for your Asheville area Adventures. It has a private entrance, full kitchen, bathroom/Shower, laundry, and living room/bedroom space. All you have to do is pick which direction you want to head for your adventure each day: Brevard, Asheville, Hendersonville, Pisgah National Forest, the sky's the limit!

The space
NEW IN 2020: New queen mattress on the bed, new sleeper chair that folds into a twin size bed, new flooring in living room/bedroom area, and freshly painted walls.

This basement studio apartment has everything you need for an Asheville get away. Located within a gated community the property is surrounded by wooded lots giving you the feeling of being away in the woods but is actually conveniently located just minutes from the Asheville airport and Sierra Nevada brewery. Guests have their own private

name: Minimum 28 day rental in lovely Grove Park
description:
Spacious light filled upstairs bedroom with a hall bathroom. Private 1912 Arts and Crafts house in North Asheville close to Grove Park Inn and downtown. Kitchen and porch also open to guest. 28 day minimum stay available.

The space
I'm particularly interested in renting to a person looking for an extended stay vacation rental or someone in the visiting nurse program, a student, new to Asheville or someone looking for temporary housing. I do have this room listed separately for short term rental less than 28 days . This listing is JUST for 28 days or more.

Guest access
Guest have access to the kitchen and porch as well as a washer/dryer. Parking is on street parking in front of the house.

Other things to note
The house is in a lovely North Asheville neighborhood about 1.5 miles from downtown and .75 miles from the Grove Park Inn. Mission Hospital is 3 miles away. There are 7 restaurants, a bakery, a butcher, 3

name: Town & Tree: Modern Hideaway walk to Downtown
description:
Cozy+Natural+Light+Modern. Walk to downtown. Private space with separate entrance, private deck with outdoor eating area. One bedroom: Queen size memory foam bed. Living room: open to bedroom with smart TV. Full bathroom: large rain shower. Kitchenette: mini-fridge, microwave, filtered water, coffee/tea. Extras: ceiling fans, AC/Heat, free street parking in front of the house. No access to the rest of the house - just this space. Quiet Historic Montford neighborhood - 10 minute walk to downtown!

The space
Our home is a Healthy Green Built Home built in 2014 with an all new build-out for this private Airbnb space finished in October 2017. The Airbnb space is on our lower level and there is no access to the upper floors where we live. The Airbnb space is still above ground. Every attention to detail has been made for your ultimate comfort from the use of space, privacy, convenience, and tons of natural light. That portion of our house is all yours. The interior is

name: Wild Canary Mountainside Retreat/Hidden Nest
description:
The Hidden Nest is an almost new apartment, very quiet, with fabulous view, 1 mi. from city limits, 7 mi from downtown. Living room has a pull-out double & single sofa bed (modern mattresses - no torture bar) and TV; gas logs fireplace; kitchen w/snacks; cozy, dark bedroom includes Q-bed, 50" TV w/cable; bathroom w/fluffy towels, washer & dryer. Record player w/mostly folk from 60s/70s. Small patio; convenient to downtown, Biltmore House, West Asheville, Blue Ridge Parkway, outlet malls.

The space
Very private, cozy and quiet - just a couple of miles from I-40. Close to restaurants, grocery stores, pharmacy and fast food. Less than 10 minutes to downtown; less than 15 to the Biltmore Estate and outlet malls. The Blue Ridge Parkway is reasonably close.

Guest access
You will have the entire lower floor, with private entrance. The living room has beautiful work by local artists.
There is a string of Christmas-type lights that outline

name: Haven Under the Oaks
description:
Haven Under the Oaks offers a cozy, inviting space to relax while you are visiting the Asheville area. Located in South Asheville, you are 13 miles from the heart of downtown and The Biltmore Estate. It is less than five miles from the Asheville Airport and The Blue Ridge Parkway. Easy access to Brevard and Hendersonville. The Tryon Equestrian Center is an easy 35 mile drive via I-26. Bright, open living space with plenty of room for all.

Guest access
Guess have access to entire home with the exception of a storage space in the basement.

name: Sunshine's Daydream in West Asheville
description:
Come and live like a local in our newly constructed, modern 500 sq ft studio apartment. Situated in trendy West Asheville, right off Haywood Road. A prime location to sample some of Asheville's favorite activities....locally brewed beer and coffee, live music, good food, art and of course, the great outdoors.

The space
The ground-level studio apartment is decorated with a modern design and amenities, all new furniture and appliances to help you feel right at home. It has a private entry with an individual key code for each guest.

The studio is an ideal space for a single traveler or a couple - with a comfortable new queen-size bed with organic cotton sheets.

Travelling with a young child or expecting a guest? Use the futon couch which folds into an extra bed. Please Note: The extra futon will be most comfortable for people 5 feet 6 inches tall and under. Also, let us know if you require the extra bed to be available for you when you book yo

name: 2 Bedroom Condo blocks to Downtown Asheville
description: 2 Bedroom Condo 3 blocks North of downtown Asheville! Hardwood floors throughout, updated kitchen and baths, Flat Panel TV, WiFi, W/D, located above Asheville’s newest cocktail bar, walk 5 minutes to downtown. 30 day minimum

name: Private apartment minutes from Blue Ridge Parkway!
description:
Set in a quiet neighborhood in East Asheville, our apartment provides a bathroom with a jacuzzi bathtub, a living area with comfortable, rocking leather couches, and large windows with a view of our wooded back yard. This living space is the bottom floor of our family home with a separate entrance. We are conveniently located just 5 miles from the center of Downtown Asheville with restaurants, bars, grocery, and gas just minutes away.

The space
The living room provides a TV with cable, large leather couches, and a big picture window overlooking our wooded backyard. There is a minifridge, microwave, and Keurig coffee maker for your convenience. The spacious bathroom includes a jacuzzi bathtub, shampoo, conditioner, face wash, body wash, blow dryer, and hair straightener. We also provide towels and linens. The bedroom has a queen bed, TV with cable, room-darkening curtains, desk, large closet, and an empty set of drawers. There is an air mattress and a pack-n-play

name: The Nature Nook near Asheville NC
description:
The Nature Nook is a 1BR studio with kitchenette in a park like setting with 2.5 acres, some of which is partially wooded. A serene wooded setting but only 8 miles close to downtown Asheville NC. This space is only 5 minutes from Blue Ridge Parkway and conveniently located near the Biltmore Estate, Grove Park Inn, French Broad River, arboretum, hiking trails, mountain biking trails and hot springs, airport etc. Its close to everything Asheville. Enjoy!

The space
The Nature Nook is situated on park like, partially wooded 2.5 acres tract in a Arden NC, conveniently located between downtown Asheville( 8 miles) and downtown Hendersonville (11 miles) . The Nature Nook is near hiking, mountain biking, rafting, ziplining, breweries, etc. Its in a serene location just outside city limits of Arden and close to restaurants and shopping. The Biltmore house is about 8 miles.

Guest access
My guest have the entire home which includes 3BR and

name: Asheville Mountain Sanctuary (Private 4 Rm Suite)
description:
This North Asheville House is in a forested area 5 minutes from UNC Asheville and 10 minutes from Downtown.

The ground level private apartment is a totally separate space (downstairs) from the rest of the house *(upstairs) with a large master bedroom, master bath with large tub (and jacuzzi jets) and a Kitchenette (No Sink) with Double Stove-Top Hot Plate, George Foreman Grill, Fridge, and Microwave. There is also a DVD player built into the TV (with Cable). AVL Home Stay Permit #18--04905.

The space
All the appointments of a luxury suites hotel, at a fraction of the cost; including a plush King Size bed and bedding. There was no Air BnB pre-setting for KING, so sorry for any confusion. Also the Kitchenette has a dual element stove top, microwave, toaster, George Foreman Grill and mini-fridge. A full size fridge, Slop Sink, and laundry facilities are in the adjacent garage.

WE RECENTLY ADDED A SECURITY DEPOSIT, AS WE OPENED UP THE SPACE T

name: Rustic Asheville Cabin: 20 Acres w/ Swimming Pond!
description:
Nestled in the lush green forests of North Carolina sits this charming Asheville vacation rental. Nature and art lovers alike will adore this 3-bedroom, 2-bath cabin with its spacious layout and 6-mile proximity to 'The Paris of the South'. Families, groups, and couples traveling together can experience the sights and sounds of the River Arts District, the peaceful scenery of Blue Ridge Parkway, or the rich history behind the famed Biltmore Estate. Come on in and enjoy your home-away-from-home!

The space
Free WiFi | Secluded Land | Pet Friendly | 1,600 Sq Ft

Delight in the tranquility of nature, roast marshmallows around the fire pit, and taste the rich flavors of North Carolina from this spacious Asheville vacation cabin.

Bedroom 1: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Full Bed | Bedroom 3: 2 Twin Beds | Living Room: Futon

OUTDOOR LIVING: Private porch, rocking chairs, patio furniture, gas grill, private swimming pond, hammock, fire pit, ou

name: Cozy & convenient in Asheville, Grove park area
description:
Private guest suite, fully equipped with a private entrance, Grove Park area - 30 day rentals (or longer) only
- private kitchenette with small fridge
- Living area with a queen bed or sofa breakfast table and seating.
- New LCD TV connected to your favorite streaming service & local channels
- separate private bedroom with a memory foam queen sized bed (medium / firm)
- private bathroom with a bathtub / shower.

Close to downtown Asheville and a short walk to grocery, restaurants and more!

The space
the space is comfortable newly renovated 1 bedroom apartment located in a very unique mid century modern house. with its own entrance it is very private with an off street entrance. Space features two queen beds in separate rooms or we can re-configure it to have one queen bed in the bedroom and a sofa in the living room. there is a private patio at the back of the house, just a few steps from the door to the suite. there is also

name: New Two Bedroom Dream, Close to Everything with Fireplace.
description: Wake up on the low platform bed w/ a Turf & Needle mattress before opening the 12-foot sliding barn doors into the bright living space. This is remodeled lower level unit where co-hosts live on upper level for your convenience blends a rustic flair of Asheville Pine flooring with modern decor. We offer several complimentary amenities. This apartment is also wheelchair accessible entryways & shower. Just walking distance to restaurants, shops, & the River Arts District. Sleeping arrangements- 2 King Bed & 1 Queen Sofa Bed, 3 Flat Screens.

name: Cozy, Convenient: 3 Bdrm Home, 3 miles to Biltmore
description:
Private home & property: 3 bdrms / 2 baths in a quiet, convenient neighborhood just 5-10 mins from Biltmore, Downtown & the Blue Ridge Parkway! With large front & back yards, a covered porch off the dining room, TWO cozy living rooms w/ big screen smart TVs, FULL KITCHEN, bonus kitchenette, fire pit, board games, and plenty of off-street parking, you should have all you need to feel at home here in Asheville.

Note that listing has been updated to include the full house as of May 2020.

The space
COVID 19 Policies:

1. I am paying the cleaning crew double to ensure they take their time and that all linens are washed in hot water, high touch points are sanitized thoroughly, and the home receives a deep cleaning each time a guest checks out.
2. When I don't have guests, I live in this house too and can assure you I'm taking the cleaning process seriously and personally.
3. I'm carefully following recommendations and updates from CDC

name: Elegantly Spacious Guest Suite on Elkmont
description: Browse the owner's hand-made book while enjoying a drink around the fire pit to discover local places to see and things to do. The suite itself is beautifully decorated, with a fine painted dresser perfectly complementing the patterned carpets.

name: Relaxing River Oasis with Pool and Hot Tub
description:
Come enjoy our river front home with a relaxing farmhouse vibe! We have 4 acres with a pool and hot tub and access to the French Broad River and the Paddle Trail. Be at the Asheville airport in 7 minutes, Brevard in 20 minutes, and downtown Asheville in 25 minutes. Visit the numerous local breweries, hike or mountain bike in Pisgah NF or Dupont SP, and enjoy the local shopping scene. Relax with family and friends in the spacious living room and large kitchen after a full day of adventures.

The space
Home has 2 King beds, 1 Queen bed, and 2 twin beds. Dining table seats 10. Please do NOT use the fireplace in the dining room.

Guest access
Guests will have access to entire main level of home, pool, hot tub and yard.”” Pool is not heated!! And will be closed during winter months November- April.

Other things to note
The home is equipped with a whole house generator so you should never be without power.

name: Immaculate, Traditional Home - S. Asheville 2BRs
description:
Our home is located in a private, quiet neighborhood, within minutes of the Asheville Airport, restaurants, shopping centers, craft breweries, the Biltmore House, and major highways. Gusts will have the use of 2 bedrooms, each equipped with a queen-sized bed, WIFI, cable TV, and a writing desk & chair. One bedroom also has a loveseat & chair recliners. Guests share a Hall bathroom. Breakfast is included, and transport services and laundry facilities, may be arranged for an additional fee.

The space
2 bedrooms with common bath. Each bedroom is fully furnished, with a queen-sized bed.

Guest access
Guests can avail of a home-office, family/living room, breakfast area, and outdoor amenities (enclosed porch, spacious deck, and patio).

Other things to note
Continental breakfast is included; private transport & laundry will be available for additional fees, upon request.

name: Gilbert's Getaway (Extra Clean!)
description:
Come home to your own cozy apartment with private parking, deck and (keyless) entrance. Sleep in a queen bed with new memory foam mattress.

Enjoy the new tiled bathroom, with floor heating and a modern Toto toilet. The kitchen area is equipped with all new appliances. Use the counter-height table for meals or as your laptop-ready desk.

The HD TV offers full HBO, Showtime, Netflix and Amazon Video. Connect to lightning fast wireless internet. Just ask Alexa to play your favorite music!

Guest access
You get the entire guest suite plus the patio to yourselves! There is space to park your car right next to it. We use a self-check in keyless entry system so you come and go as you please since there are no keys to lose or return! We'll send you a code.

name: West Asheville Get-Away
description:
Enjoy newer construction, vaulted ceilings and a bright open floor plan that is walkable to local shops and restaurants and minutes from hiking, biking and rafting destinations. This 1 bedroom apartment is beautifully furnished with lots of light, ample off-street parking, spacious private deck, and fenced-in yard! Open floor plan with private bedroom/bathroom (*living room couch pulls out for additional single bed). All utilities included. Great high speed internet. Close to city bus line.

The space
Perfect space for single guest or couple w/ child. Walk to town for lunch/coffee and then head off to The Blue Ridge Parkway, Pisgah National Forest, or hike the Appalachian Trail - all located just minutes away.

Guest access
There are no shared spaces. This apartment is located over a garage (garage used for owner's storage only). There is a small fenced in yard that is also accessible. We do ask that animals are not left unattended.

name: Montford Urban Treehouse
description:
New 650 SF detached garage apartment in charming, historic Montford neighborhood, a short walk to several eateries and nightspots and a 20-min walk to downtown. Inside has vaulted ceilings, hardwood floors, a fully-equipped kitchen that opens to a comfortable living room. Bedroom has a comfy queen bed with quality cotton linens and a large closet. The spacious spotless bathroom adjoins a linen closet. A shady, private deck with grill and 2 off-street parking spots serve the apartment.

The space
New construction 1 bedroom 1 bathroom private home in historic Montford.

Guest access
Gorgeous historic neighborhood for walking. Walkable to cafes, parks, and downtown. Two off-street parking spaces connect to the apartment.

Other things to note
Dedicated washer and dryer and storage area for bikes, skis, luggage, etc.

name: WEST ASHEVILLE COTTAGE 4Bdrm/2 Bth-Near Everything
description:
COME ENJOY OUR HOME

WEST ASHEVILLE Cottage-4 Bdrm, 2 Bath, Sleeps 8 Comfortably. Large Kitchen w/Brkfst Nook, Cozy Den, 2 Gas Fireplaces, Huge Rear Deck w/Grills. Covered Front Porch, Large Fenced Back Yard For Your Pet

Perfect For Families or Couples. LOTS OF SPACE TO SPREAD OUT!

Close to Everything in West Asheville: Pubs, Restaurants, Breweries; 15 Min. to Biltmore House, Downtown Asheville & Parkway. 10 Min. To River Access.

SAFE, COMFORTABLE ACCOMMODATIONS

The space
We have approx 1900 sq.ft. , plenty of room to spread out. Lots of comfortable couches inside, high rear deck with grill, and covered front porch. 10-15 min. drive to downtown, Breweries, river activities, Biltmore House, and the Parkway.

Guest access
We rent you our WHOLE HOUSE: 4 bedrooms, all with Queen beds, 2 full baths (tub/shower), large fully equipped kitchen w/breakfast nook, living room, den, and washer/dryer.

name: The Down Home Doublewide
description:
This doublewide has been transformed into the sweetest little cottage you've ever seen. Conveniently located on a wooded lot just ten minutes' drive to downtown Asheville, this curated 3 BR/2 BA charmer features a fireplace, covered AND uncovered deck. Pet friendly and one mile to grocery. You'll love it!

The space
This is a three bedroom, two bath cottage-style home set on a sloping, wooded lot. The master bedroom is quite large with an en suite bath. The second bedroom is plenty comfortable as well. Both have full size beds. The third has a twin daybed that expands to full when needed; this room also functions as a TV room. This keeps the emphasis on socializing in the kitchen/living room.
It's just under 1000 square feet, and not a single inch is wasted. Artfully and eclectically curated, with a full complement of kitchen amenities and a covered deck provides bonus space during warmer months.

Guest access
Great news! When you stay

name: Ideal for couples/solos-COZY & CLOSE TO DOWNTOWN!
description:
Looking for a quiet, cozy & relaxing place to stay in Asheville you have found it! While my guests can come & go without us meeting, I enjoy getting to know them, that's what AIRBNB should be about!
PLEASE NOTE- this is an-law unit in my home, not a hotel. Quiet hours are from 9 PM to 9 AM. For a variety of reasons the listing is not really appropriate for young children (deck, noise issues). PLEASE REVIEW LISTING RULES & MESSAGE ME W/QUESTIONS BEFORE BOOKING.

The space
This listing is located in a residential neighborhood. It is a separate in-law unit in
a quiet home. Please respect the neighbors right to the quiet enjoyment of their homes. The rules and guidelines that I have developed for this listing are designed to ensure that everyone is happy- guests, host and neighbors! : )
Hang on the awesome deck and have local craft beer! Bathroom has a shower.
Kitchenette for light cooking, featuring Breville Counter Oven, Coffee Maker

name: Pet-Friendly Upper Berne in Asheville!
description:
This pet-friendly (dogs only) rental is the upper portion of a duplex, tucked in the tree tops, yet just 3 minutes from the middle of Asheville! (It's not recommended for young children as sound carries to the lower unit.) A large front porch with a grill, and a side porch add to a tree house feel. We supply all linens, towels and robes. You'll receive cookies from Judy's Well-Bred Bakery & Cafe as well as a $10 gift certificate and treats for your pup.

The space
The Upper Berne Chalet has the location you want when visiting Asheville, with the feeling of being far away from it all on a hillside, yet literally a 3 minute drive to downtown Asheville. There are two spacious bedrooms and one shared full bath. The combined living/dining area is open, comfortable and cozy with a large 52" TV in the living room. The kitchen is fully stocked with coffee, tea, condiments, spices, pots & pans, dishes and utensils. There is a large front porch with table, chairs and a

name: The Cottage at Winghaven—A Stunning Woodland Paradise
description:
Cozy up by the wood-burning stove in this new, light-filled log cabin. Enjoy complete privacy and gorgeous forest and seasonal mountain views while still being close to Asheville. Minutes to restaurants and shops, but away from it all!
Well behaved pets are welcome!

name: Houz Zen: A Pet Friendly Private Suite
description:
Enjoy everything that the Asheville area has to offer! Our private ground floor suite boasts a separate entrance and offers a comfortable space to unwind. The peaceful fenced in backyard is perfect for you and your pet. Guests tell us how ZEN our indoor and outdoor space feels. What's more, we are super pet friendly! We have NO pet fees for up to 2 pets however we hope you will ensure your pets are not destructive.

We look forward to having you as our guest!

The space
Entire lower level of a private residence. Completely separate space with your own private entrance. Private patio included along with a 3/4 acre fenced in backyard leading to a small creek! 1 bedroom apartment with a queen bed, 1 bath, free WiFi, 60" Plasma, Blu-Ray DVD player, YoutubeTV with Starz, Showtime, Netflix, Amazon, Chromecast, etc., convenient location to Airport, Asheville, Brevard, & Hendersonville. Guest parking space provided. Owners are both ex hotel managers

name: One Block North of Downtown AVL!
description:
Views of downtown Asheville and a peek at Mt Pisgah are yours from this renovated apartment above Alpha Real Estate just one block north of downtown! Enjoy your stay with chic urban feel and walk to all the festivities. This spacious two bedroom unit will spoil you with every attention paid to detail. Modern decor and classic features. Relaxing, romantic master bedroom with a 4 poster king bed. A terrific home base for all your WNC adventures!

The space
The top floor of this 1912 home is yours! The home was restored by a master craftsman with fashion forward decor. The blend of old and new will delight you. Covered back deck with private entrance. This will be your favorite downtown spot with everything at your fingertips!

Guest access
One parking spot in our lot M-F 9-5. After hours up to 3 cars - must be moved by 9 am. Extra parking on the side street. Thanks!

Other things to note
You will be emailed a code throug

name: Nice forested spot 5 minutes to downtown Asheville
description:
This charming, mid-century home is located just 1.4 miles from downtown. Close to everything, centrally located and yet on a quiet mountain road with mature trees, privacy, and wildlife! It is the perfect home base to explore all Asheville has to offer.

Enjoy a mountain escape within a few minute's drive of downtown, the River Arts District, West Asheville, and the Biltmore Estate.

We take coronavirus seriously and disinfect the home thoroughly between all guests following Airbnb's protocol.

The space
The home has an open floor plan with a sunny kitchen and dinette. There's a comfortable living room area with large windows looking out into the trees. A door off the dinette opens right onto the deck. Sunlight comes over the mountain and into the kitchen and deck for morning coffee.

The deck overlooks the yard and mountains beyond. The home is on a quiet road. We have Carolina Chickadees, Tufted Titmouse, Red Cardinals, Blue Jays

name: Cozy studio in hot West Asheville.
description: Our apartment is located in a safe, friendly neighborhood a short walk from Haywood Rd. in West Asheville. Guests have a private entrance and small deck, and off-street parking. We have a comfortable and sunny room with a queen platform bed and love seat, as well as a Roku t.v. and books to enjoy. The private bathroom has a tub/shower combination. We provide some essential toiletries, a Keurig coffee maker and water kettle, coffee and tea, fresh towels and soft bedding. To enhance your comfort during this unusual time, we’re taking extra care to disinfect frequently touched surfaces between reservations.”

name: 1940's Farm House Retreat in North Asheville
description:
Come visit our lovely mountain home located less than 5 miles to downtown Asheville and only 10 minutes to the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway. We welcome people from all backgrounds who might enjoy a stay in our quiet, peaceful, rural neighborhood with off street parking! Get the mountain experience without worrying about steep mountain roads! Sit and relax on our covered front porch or enjoy dinner on our screened in back porch. Keep your eyes open for turkeys, rabbits and bears!

Guest access
Except for a few storage spots, the whole house is all yours! We also live in a separate cottage on the property and are happy to offer advice or answer questions if we are in town!

Other things to note
Things that may impact your stay:
- Carriers other than Verizon often have spotty service in our home, but wifi is always available.
- Upstairs ceiling height is 7ft with some sloped corners, stairwell to upstairs is ~3ft wide, and upstairs show

name: Our Little Getaway
description:
+++Now equipped with a full house UV-C ultraviolet sanitizer in the central heat pump system so the air exchange is always cleaned of viruses and bacteria!+++

Come enjoy our fully furnished little getaway in E. Asheville just 4 miles from Downtown, minutes away from the Blue Ridge Parkway and many breweries. Our place is also convenient to lots shopping areas.

The space
We are offering a sweet, newly renovated 400+ square foot apartment. There is lots of natural light. Brand new full kitchen with granite countertops and equipped with cofee maker (with coffee), microwave, stove, pots, pans, dishes, silverware and a lot more. Kitchen has an island for more storage with a breakfast bar. Full bath with shower and tub. Super comfortable organic new queen-sized Murphy bed that is combined with a special couch. TV with Roku. Shared laundry room which has your closet and dresser for clothes. Plenty of storage for longer stays.

Guest

name: Top Floor Condo in the Heart of Downtown
description:
To check availability for tonight, please send an inquiry.

The space
This two-bedroom, two-bathroom condo features 13 ft high ceilings, and huge windows with abundant natural light. The master bedroom is an en-suite and features a king size bed. The second queen bedroom is well separated from the master and next to the hall bath that includes a tub. There is a comfortable living area, full kitchen with separate dining area, washer and dryer, dishwasher, and microwave.

The Altamont Condos is located on historic Church Street in the heart of downtown. The street is tree lined and full of beautiful old buildings including three historic churches. The location is ideal, being close to everything downtown and the street is off the high traffic streets, so it is quieter than nearby Patton Avenue.

This building was originally constructed in 1895 and renovated in 2010. The historic character of the building was preserved so it continues to

name: RV by the creek. 10 Min. to West Asheville
description:
RV by the creek. 125' from the house in the blueberry patch. Horse pasture across creek. Portable fire pit with covered wood box. Camp chairs and table. Your own little world to explore Asheville from. I'm retired and when not singing or playing tennis am usually around gardening. My wife, Laura is a hike leader and has a counseling practice. Parking leaves a bit of a stroll to the RV and we have a luggage-carrying wagon to help. Looking forward to your visit.

The space
We're on 2 acres facing a creek with big gardens in the back. You're in a cozy RV with all the amenities way out in the front yard by the creek in the blueberry patch.

Guest access
The big front yard is yours. Portable fire pit with wood supply, camp chairs, outdoor table, dip your feet in the 4' wide creek. Tours of the gardens in the back by appointment if you'd like. Cows in the pasture next door and horses across the creek to keep you company. Graveled pat

name: Quiet Bright Bedroom Close to Downtown
description:
Quiet bedroom nestled in the hemlocks in an adorable bright and sunny bungalow in North Asheville, 1.7 miles from downtown (40 minute walk via the greenway, or a 5 minute Lyft). Walking distance from the North Asheville Farmers Market, hiking trails and the Botanical Gardens, UNC Asheville, breweries and restaurants. Enjoy a fire in the firepit on cool evenings!

The space
This private room has a queen bed, dresser, and two closets. All common areas are available for guest use.

Guest access
Please make yourself at home in all of the common areas...which is everywhere except the second bedroom and the basement.

All amenities in the home are available for guests to use. This includes wifi, all kitchen appliances, coffee and tea. Please note that we do not have a TV.

There is a lovely front porch to sit and read books on, and firepit in the yard that guests are welcome to use.

Other things to note
Wh

name: Comfortable downtown Studio. Walk everywhere.
description: This newly renovated well lit coffee Studio offers wonderful natural light from large windows High ceilings and a full-size kitchen. Has a comfortable seating area, flat screen TV, coffee maker, and everything you need to cook basic meals.

name: QUIET, COMFY & CLEAN ~ Near Downtown & UNCA!
description:
You will have private access to one half of our clean, comfortable and quiet home in North Asheville. Two beautiful, spacious second floor rooms, private Bath and a fantastic location for visiting the area!

Relax on our large front porch complete with rocking chairs. Enjoy the garden, fruit trees and large quiet yard that gives a feel of country in the city!

Conveniently located 1.3 miles from Downtown, an easy 10 minute walk, with great access to I-240 and I-26 less than 1 mile away!

The space
Two spacious, well lit, private rooms available on the second floor with a private bathroom, living room and entrance. The Yarrow Room contains one queen bed and sleeps two. The Loft Room is a bit larger and contains a queen bed and a double futon. The Loft Room will sleep four people. Private bathroom is located between the rooms off the landing.

There is a third room off the landing that is our private space, though at it's entrance y

name: Comfortable private room in historic B&B
description:
This is one of our most popular rooms located in the Northwest corner of the second floor. It has a silk upholstered queen bed, beautiful pine floors, and warm beige hand-plastered walls. Antique furnishings are complimented by beautiful art work and luxurious bed linens. The bathroom is a generous size, as it was original to the house and has been modernized with a shower.

The space
The Lion and the Rose is a Queen Anne style home dating back to 1898.

There are only 4 rooms and 1 suite. All come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and DVD players. Some also have fireplaces and original features, including stained-glass windows.

Amenities include a 2 course cooked breakfast, free parking and a DVD library, plus a complimentary welcome beer upon arrival :)

Guest access
Large wraparound porch, backyard fire pit, wildlife certified garden, two communal parlors, 24/7 guest pantry with refrigerator, freezer and microwave
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Large king suite with private balcony and soaking tub
description:
Whether you're looking for a romantic Asheville weekend getaway, or a longer vacation option, the luxurious Craig-Toms Suite is the perfect setting for your needs. It has two rooms that offer privacy and space for a group to gather. It can accommodate three adults with the king bed and mahogany daybed.

A large TV, gas fire place, and oversized comfortable chairs await weary travelers needing some down time. The suite is the only room on the third floor, so your privacy is guaranteed.

Through the original stained glass door, a private balcony awaits you, providing fresh air and beautiful natural light.

The suite also has it's own refrigerator for your convenience.

The luxury bathroom offers a soaking tub, skylight, and large walk-in shower.

The space
The Lion and the Rose is a Queen Anne style home dating back to 1898.

There are only 4 rooms and 1 suite. All come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Arden / South Asheville guest room
description:
Freshly renovated guest room in the Asheville Airport area. The guest room features a queen bed, it's own private full bathroom, a desk, access to the shared kitchen, living room and dining area. This is a NON smoking unit. Located 2.5 miles from the airport, Biltmore Park, w/i 5 miles to 4 breweries - Including Sierra Nevada and entrances to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Just under 7 miles (15 minutes) to Biltmore Village, 9 (20 minutes) to downtown Avl, making it convenient to a lot of areas.

The space
Private queen bedded room with private full bathroom and full closet. Wi-Fi, linens, toiletries and use of the living room, kitchen and dining room are included. Storage in the fridge along with use of the washer and dryer should be discussed before being used. Also included is my 12 years of knowledge of the area from great places to visit to insight into how to get there.

Newly installed bamboo flooring and fresh paint make this room a great place to

name: Mountain Moments Retreats
description:
Relax in this spacious 4 bedroom, 3 bath home in a quite neighborhood only minutes from downtown Asheville. Centrally located so you can access, hiking, biking, breweries, retail centers, the Biltmore Estate and all the entertainment and restaurants that downtown has to offer with no more than a ten minute drive.
This spacious home is perfect for families as it is on a half acre lot with a fenced -in yard and it is only minutes from a local park and playground.

The space
~Four Bedrooms
~3 queen beds, 1 full bed, and 1 twin bed
~Huge Master Bath with stand up double headed shower and large separate "jetted" tub
~Huge Walk in Closet
~Large guest bath with shower
~Direct cable
~Blue Ray Player
~Board Games, card games, and coloring books for all ages
~Washer and Dryer
~ Kitchen with granite and stainless steel appliances
~ Coffee Maker
~Large Flat Screen in living room
~All linens and towels p

name: Biltmore Retreat Luxury King Guest Suite
description:
This awesome location is just 5 minutes from the Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway. There is an Ingles grocery store and CVS Pharmacy within one mile. You are close to shopping and dozens of restaurants, and within 10 minutes of Downtown, West Asheville, and the River Arts District. This property is approved by the City of Asheville, Home Stay Permit # 18-00224.

The space
Your Biltmore Luxury King Guest Suite with private entrance is part of a brand new, green certified energy efficient home. It boasts a beautiful master bath with double sinks, granite countertop, and spacious, custom tile shower. Refresh yourself upon arrival with a cup of coffee via the K-cup maker with several varieties for you to enjoy. There is also a mini-frig and microwave for your convenience. The brand new king bed is super comfy and there is also a queen air bed in the suite. The walk-in closet is roomy and has two luggage racks, iron with ironing board, plus a card table and

name: Amazing Mountain View close to Biltmore, Downtown
description:
Private Suite with views of Blue Ridge. Minutes to Biltmore Estate, River Arts District, Downtown Asheville, and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Home is green built, but located in historic Kenilworth neighborhood. Enter through the private patio entrance. This is the lower level of our home so you will hear us in the morning when we get our coffee. Listen to the brassy train horn when it passes through the Village. St. Anne's Church chimes the hour and half hour.

The space
Sit on the patio and look over the Blue Ridge. At night, the Village lights twinkle through the trees. Bring your slippers in the winter as the floor is polished concrete.

Guest access
You will have the entire lower level to yourself. Park across from our home, and follow the sidewalk around the right side of the house, to a sliding wooden gate under the deck to your private patio.

Other things to note
Kenilworth Inn lies at the top of our street.

name: Avl Getaway: Beautiful & Spacious 2 Bedroom Suite
description:
Get the best of both worlds: enjoy the uniqueness of Asheville’s most treasured neighborhood and enjoy being only a 5 min drive from Asheville city center. Our private entrance ground floor suite has all you need to explore. At only a short 1.5 mile neighborhood drive, you will be close to everything in town including breweries & restaurants.

Our unique space is filled with our own art and items from our world travels and is equipped with local coffee and beer so you get a taste of our city.

The space
We follow all regulations to make sure our space is up to cleanliness standards set by Air BNB and CDC to keep our guests safe including having at least 27 hours between guests.

Check out our property on Instagram at @avlgetaway

Our fully private suite is on the ground level of our new green built home. We travel around the world for work and pleasure and have decorated our suite with items from East, South, and West Africa, the

name: Charming Historic Cottage on NE edge of downtown.
description:
Welcome to 1898 Clover Cottage (on the National Register of Historic Places). The two story cottage is located in the beautiful and enchanting Albemarle Park neighborhood in North Asheville. Our home stay room is an octagon shaped room of truncated turret architecture located on the ground floor just off our lovely large porch. The cottage is furnished in an eclectic mix of mid-century modern and victorian era furniture with a queen bed in your room. All nice people are welcome here.

The space
Your hosts, Anna and David are available by phone or text and on-site most of the time (we live on the second floor and work quietly at home). You are welcome to relax on our front porch with coffee, tea, or a glass of wine and watch the sunset over the mountains. Anna is a Licensed Massage, Reflexology, and Craniosacral Therapist and likes to bake goodies to share. David is also a LMBT and artist/photographer specializing in (1860’s civil war era) wet plate collodion, tint

name: Merry Heart Homestay
description:
Modern and cozy studio space in the historic neighborhood of Montford. The space is well lit and comes furnished with a comfortable queen size bed, refrigerator and 2 burner cook top stove. There is also an adjoined yoga room that is available, per request. The rental also comes with off street, driveway parking. Walking distance to all of the neighborhood restaurants (Nine Mile, Chiesa, All Day Darling) and downtown Asheville.

The space
Close to everything! Not only is downtown Asheville right there but also less than 5 minutes away is the beautiful botanical gardens of UNCA, the French Broad River and the River Arts District!

Guest access
There is driveway parking for guests right next to the coded entrance into the home. No stairs!

Other things to note
Though there is a washer and dryer located in the bathroom, this is NOT for guest use. Should be noted for men who are over 6’ that the ceiling height is low in cert

name: Mountain Views & Hot Tub at Reeves Cove Cottage
description:
The house was built in 1927 and was originally located on the Biltmore Estate Dairy Farm property. It was moved to this location in the 1950's. It is a cool quirky place with lovely mountain views from the bedrooms, back deck and yard. Interior décor is in "Fixer Upper Farmhouse style". House includes a Hot tub, fire pit and screened porch for our guest to enjoy.

Need more space? Rent together with our tiny house or with our Blue Bird Cottage.

The space
Our house is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath nearly 100 year old cottage that has been updated with todays modern amenities. There is a family room, formal dining, sun room and screened in porch. The master suite has a living area area with a couch as well as a queen sized bed and sliding doors to back deck.
There are Mountain View’s from the bedrooms, back deck,hot tub and fire pit.
The house is in a rural area but is just 5 minutes to the grocery store, 10 to Asheville Outlet Mall and 20 minute

name: Country Setting - Minutes to Downtown Asheville
description:
Entire home conveniently located 10-15 minutes to all Asheville has to offer.
7.8 miles to The Biltmore House, 7.4 miles to downtown Asheville, 12 miles to airport and 45 minutes to Skiing.
Spacious family room with wood fireplace , TV, cable, NetFlix & High Speed Internet. Dining area seats 8. Kitchen is well appointed for 12 guests. 3 bedrooms on main level. Huge bonus room sleeps 6. Grill area and Fire pit for outdoor enjoyment.
Perfect for multiple families to vacation
No pets allowed

The space
4th bedroom / bonus room features queen size bed, 2 double futons with coil mattresses for extra comfort. Large screen TV, Blu ray player, dvds, games, books, cable TV and Netflix. Separate zoned heating and cooling.
Child safety gate and pack and play for infant sleeping. Elliptical machine upon request. It is stored away for the safety of children. Perfect for kids sleeping/recreation area or great for a whole family to have private sl

name: 1 Bedroom Apt. Historic Montford (2/4)
description:
Spacious downtown apartment in 4-unit historic Montford home. Fully equipped kitchen & furnished; linens provided.
There are 3 other units that have other guest living in them. You won't share any common space with them. You will have a parking space in the gravel area in back.
There is a TV in the armorer in the living room, along with Charter WiFi & cable TV.
It's only a short walk to downtown where you can find award-winning restaurants, entertainment, coffee shops, breweries, & shopping.

The space
This downstairs apt. has been newly painted; there is new tile in the kitchen and bathroom. Completely renovated kitchen with new appliances. Very comfortable seating; flat screen tv is in an armoire in the living room. It's a perfect haven for 1 or 2 people who enjoy walking or biking the two blocks into town or to the grocery store, people who want fast access to the incredible hiking and mountain biking available here, as well as sight-seeing. Ash

name: Whole House Sublet 30+ Night Stay 10 Mins to AVL
description:
This listing is for a monthly sublet. We have a minimum stay requirement of 30 days. Come relax in our cozy suburban home with spacious open split floor plan. Comfortably furnished, jacuzzi bath tub, gas fire place, back deck with grill and patio seating/dining, front porch with rocking chairs, one car garage and driveway parking, wi-fi. Less than 15 minutes to downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
Enjoy the comfort of a whole house in a quiet neighborhood. The home is located one minute from I40 which provides easy access to Downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

Guest access
Guests have access to entire house and property with the exception of a small bedroom that remains locked during your stay.

Other things to note
The house includes latest edition of local newspapers and entertainment guides, tourist brochures, local hiking guide books and map with dire

name: The Sanctuary - Walk to New Belgium & Downtown
description:
The Sanctuary is a comfy, unique vacation space with private parking and access to a welcoming outdoor patio deck. Located in the River Arts District of Asheville, directly across from New Belgium Brewery and Tasting Room, The Sanctuary offers a relaxing retreat!

We're also within 1.5 miles of both Downtown Asheville and West Asheville, so if you're adventurous, you can walk the whole city!

The space
The Sanctuary is comfortably equipped with:
- Queen bed
- Loveseat
- A Roku smart TV with Netflix, Hulu, and other streaming capabilities. Just link to your account!
- Mini-fridge
- Tea kettle with complimentary individual tea bags
- Coffee maker with complimentary Dynamite Roasting local coffee grounds
- Water cooler with fresh, filtered water
- Ambient noise machine
- Set of mugs and drinking glasses
- Ensuite bathroom
- Private entrance with combination code door lock
