name: Asheville Cottage in Historic Montford 30 Day Min
description:
Welcome to my entire cottage in the Historic district of Asheville known as Montford. Enjoy the comfort of your own place for your vacation while exploring the many adventures that the area offers.
You can easily walk to the vibrant and exciting downtown Asheville to people watch or attend live theater, visit art galleries, shop in the many eclectic stores, or dine at one of the over 65 restaurants! Known as the 'Paris of the South'.

The space
Sink into a king-size luxury mattress after a fun- filled day of adventures. A walk-in closet with additional shelving is quite roomy. A brand new trundle with two luxury twins are welcoming at the end of the day. High thread count linens and towels provide a level of comfort for guests. And the bedspreads are freshly laundered before each guest arrives. Even the pillows are sanitized between guests or replaced.

Guest access
This home has everything you need and then some for an enjoyable visit.

name: Tiny Home Nestled Under Large Trees near Downtown Asheville
description: Stay close to nature in a rustic getaway perched on the edge of a wooded property. Listen to wildlife at night from Adirondack chairs. Awaken to birdsong filling the mountain air. Indoors is an ingenious use of space that offers every comfort.

name: Aunt Betsy's bedroom & bathroom with private entry
description: Previously known as the Rankin House Inn B&B, the home (circa 1843) now has a single king bedrm & private bath for rent. Aunt Betsy's rm is full of charm & history with the added privacy of it's own entrance and balcony. The loc. just north of the city in historical Montford, cannot be more convenient- only 3 walk-able blocks to d/t AVL. Walk to dinner, breweries, art studios alike. The Grove Park Inn & Biltmore are within 2 mi. of the house. Come enjoy the quite serenity of Aunt Betsy's Rm now!

name: AVL Sunshine Daydream House 6 Miles from Downtown
description:
This eclectic and charming 1950's bungalow has just been lovingly remodeled for your enjoyment.

It sits on the West side in a quiet neighborhood just on the outskirts of town. Convenient to I40, just 17 minutes from the airport, 13 minutes (6 miles) to downtown, 15 minutes to Biltmore, 15 minutes to UNCA and 10 minutes to happening Haywood Rd.

Clean, comfortable and stylishly funky with lots of windows to let in that sunshine!

Great for families, small groups, and four legged friends!

The space
Pets are welcome and we have a fenced in yard, so bring your well behaved furry friends. Please let me know if you do plan on bringing pets.

There are 3 bedrooms total (all new mattresses): The 2 downstairs rooms both have queen beds (and a small porch off one), and the finished attic has a king bed and a couch that converts to 2 twins. The twin beds can be a pain to make up so please let me know if you'd like this done for you

name: Serenity Cottage w/HOT TUB & Courtyard, 1 mi<BRPW
description:
Note: Our cottage is open for all stays.
Quiet, Cozy, Private!!! Hot tub, full kitchen for 4, outdoor courtyard, TV with Roku, and wifi. Located 1 mile from NC Arboretum, Bent Creek River Park, & Blue Ridge Parkway. Just 15 minutes from downtown Asheville and Biltmore Estate. This stand-alone house is located in a quiet, safe, & rural neighborhood. The space has modern furnishings and is decorated with an outdoorsy National Park theme.

The space
Bent Creek is the most popular place to mountain bike in Asheville! Bike from your front door or drive 1 mile to Rice Pinnacle Trailhead and explore the Pisgah National Forest! Or park at Hardtimes Trailhead and walk the NC Arboretum trails or hike thru a rhododendron thicket to Lake Powhatan! Jump onto the Blue Ridge Parkway and enjoy the breathtaking overlooks and serene hikes or take a tubing trip down the French Broad River just 1 mile from Serenity Cottage. It is a short ride to everything you want to do in t

name: Cozy Convenience: King Beds, 3 miles to Biltmore
description:
2 Bedroom/1 Bath home apartment in a quiet, convenient neighborhood just 5-10 mins from Biltmore, Downtown, and the Blue Ridge Parkway! With features including King Beds, key-less entrance, cozy living room w/ smart TV, kitchenette (microwave, cook-top, toaster oven, Keurig, fridge/freezer), fire pit, board games, and plenty of off-street parking. You should have all you need to feel at home here in Asheville.

The space
COVID 19 Policies:

1. I am paying the cleaning crew double to ensure they take their time and that all linens are washed in hot water, high touch points are sanitized thoroughly, and the home receives a deep cleaning each time a guest checks out.
2. When I don't have guests, I live in this house too and can assure you I'm taking the cleaning process seriously and personally.
3. I'm carefully following recommendations and updates from CDC, WHO, local & federal governments, and our AirBnB community.

Please feel fr

name: West Asheville Living
description:
Less than a 20 minute walk to Biscuit Head and other West Asheville hot spots from our quiet, welcoming neighborhood. It's a 5-minute drive to the River Arts District and New Belgium Brewing, 10 to downtown or the Biltmore Estate, and only 15 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway. You'll enjoy the privacy and comfort of the in-law apartment in our modern, green-built home.

PERMITS: We are a LEGAL homestay and fully permitted through the City of Asheville!

The space
The space

Your space is a bright and airy in-law apartment in the walk-out basement of our home. You have your own private entrance,private temperature control, living space, kitchenette, bathroom, and bedroom. We welcome ALL guests to our cozy space!

Guest access
You will have access to the full basement apartment, with a separate entrance. We avoid using the yard when you are present and save chores like mowing the lawn for when you are out exploring or betwee

name: Mid-Century inspired space in quiet neighborhood
description:
Spacious, mid-century inspired space located near the Pisgah Forest. A short walk takes you to trails for hiking & biking. Located minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway & French Broad River. Downtown Asheville is 15 minutes away! Our space offers, a large fireplace, Casper queen-sized bed w/topper. Kitchen features Brazilian rosewood & walnut countertops & have all the necessities to make your stay comfortable & convenient. We also offer coffee, eggs and oatmeal! Laundry access upon request.

The space
The space features a large fireplace built with bricks exclusively picked from the old Brevard College library. The apartment is furnished with unique vintage finds paired with modern design and includes a custom-crafted pool table. There is also a television and an Amazon Echo Dot in the living space. Feel free to access the weather, music, and a good joke! We have off-street parking as well.

Guest access
Unfortunately, at this time, we do not

name: Stunning 1902 Cottage! Walk to downtown Asheville!
description:
Enjoy a completely remodeled beauty in Historic Montford! Home is located on a quiet one way street filled with beautiful mature trees. Walk downtown to dine at one of the 60 restaurants, see a concert at The Orange Peel, or visit one of the multiple craft breweries, voted Beer City USA! So much natural light with vaulted ceilings and 2 skylights. The kitchen opens directly into living area with cozy gas fireplace! Gorgeous soapstone countertops, stainless appliances, and peaceful back deck.

The space
The master bedroom hosts a king bed, luxury linens, walk in closet, and Smart TV. Bath has a tiled walk in shower with double vanity sinks. The second bedroom offers a queen bed with a large glassed in tub and shower combination. Living area has a 40 inch flatscreen TV. The gourmet kitchen is fully equipped for cooking in on the gas stove or outside on the gas grill. Enjoy morning coffee or glass of wine either on the covered front porch or beautiful back deck overl

name: Newly Renovated Private Lower Lvl Suite in Oakley
description:
Newly renovated apartment less than a mile to Biltmore Estate, Village and numerous restaurants and breweries.

The space
Freshly renovated lower level suite less than a mile to the Biltmore Estate and Village. We are close to many hiking trails, rivers for rafting, multiple ski areas, the Blue Ridge Parkway and Great Smoky Mountains National Park.

Other things to note
Due to city regulations, there is no stove in the apartment. However we have an extra large toaster oven and a 2 burner hot plate for your convenience. At check in we have tea, coffee, snacks and bottled water. For your safety we have a keyless coded lock door and the code is changed after every guest. PLEASE CHECK YOUR AIRBNB MESSAGES BEFORE YOUR STAY! This is where you will find your personalized entry code, where to park, and other helpful information.

name: Bright and airy room with tiger oak bed and beautiful bay window
description:
This is the largest room on the second floor and has a magnificent antique tiger oak bed with a high back and footboard and matching dresser. It has a gas fireplace, custom painted walls in soft gray, tasteful furnishings and art. The sitting area set in a bay window overlooking the front lawn, has a single mahogany day bed that can be used for seating while watching TV or enjoying the view. Upon request, this bed can be made up to sleep a second or a third person. An adjoining door can be opened for two couples to share the sitting area with the Margaret-Grace Room. The private bath has a newly tiled shower.

The Marion Hall Room was the Master Bedroom throughout the years the house was a single family home.

The space
The Lion and the Rose is a Queen Anne style home dating back to 1898.

There are only 4 rooms and 1 suite. All come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and DVD players. Some also have fireplaces and original features, includin
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Romantic B&B room with beautiful canopied four poster bed
description:
This beautiful and romantic room is in a quiet corner of the second floor. The bed is a gorgeous, hand carved Biltmore heritage canopied four poster queen, with draperies made in England. The sitting area with comfortable upholstered chairs make this a spacious and comfortable place for reading or relaxing after a long day of touring. The bath has a tub-shower combination.

The space
The Lion and the Rose is a Queen Anne style home dating back to 1898.

There are only 4 rooms and 1 suite. All come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and DVD players. Some also have fireplaces and original features, including stained-glass windows.

Amenities include a 2 course cooked breakfast, free parking and a DVD library, plus a complimentary welcome beer upon arrival :)

Guest access
Large wraparound porch, backyard fire pit, wildlife certified garden, two communal parlors, 24/7 guest pantry with refrigerator, freezer and microwave
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Cozy B&B room with mahogany bed and 2 course breakfast
description:
This room is located in the front corner of the second floor and can adjoin the Marion Hall room. A lovely "fainting couch" in the corner by the window invites you to read or enjoy the view. The mahogany panel bed, antique dressers, coral colored walls and coordinating bedding all serve to make this an enchanting room. The private bath has a tub/shower combination.

The space
The Lion and the Rose is a Queen Anne style home dating back to 1898.

There are only 4 rooms and 1 suite. All come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and DVD players. Some also have fireplaces and original features, including stained-glass windows.

Amenities include a 2 course cooked breakfast, free parking and a DVD library, plus a complimentary welcome beer upon arrival :)

Guest access
Large wraparound porch, backyard fire pit, wildlife certified garden, two communal parlors, 24/7 guest pantry with refrigerator, freezer and microwave
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Immaculate, Traditional Home in S. Asheville BR1
description:
Our home is located in a highly-desirable quiet neighborhood, within minutes of the Asheville Airport, restaurants, shopping centers, craft breweries, the Agricultural Center, Biltmore House, and major highways. The bedroom is furnished with a queen-sized bed & a reclining loveseat & chair. WIFI, cable TV, and a writing desk & chair are also available. Breakfast is included, and transport services and laundry facilities may be arranged for an additional fee.

The space
1 spacious guest bedroom with a queen-sized bed, additionally furnished with a recliner couch & chair, writing desk/chair, dresser, cableTV, and WIFI access.

Guest access
Guests can avail of a home-office, family/living room, breakfast area, and outdoor amenities (enclosed porch, spacious deck, and patio).

Other things to note
Continental breakfast is included; private transport & laundry will be available for additional fees, upon request.

name: Immaculate, Traditional Home in S. Asheville BR2
description:
Our home is located in a highly-desirable, quiet neighborhood. It is minutes away from the Asheville Airport, Biltmore House, restaurants, shopping, the Agricultural Center, craft breweries, and major highways. The bedroom is furnished with a queen bed, writing desk and chair, & dresser. WIFI and cable TV are also provided.

The space
1 nicely-appointed guest bedroom with a queen-sized bed, writing desk/chair, dresser, cableTV, and WIFI access.

Guest access
Guests can avail of a home-office, family/living room, breakfast area, and outdoor amenities (enclosed porch, spacious deck, and patio).

Other things to note
Continental breakfast is included; private transport & laundry will be available for additional fees, upon request.

name: W. Asheville Spa and Gameroom Getaway
description:
COVID PRECAUTIONS TAKEN SERIOUSLY: This newly renovated basement unit is 1/2 m to heart of west Asheville. Private Hottub and outdoor shower available upon request, Beautiful gas fireplace in BR w/ queen bed, full bath, kitchenette, airhockey/pool/ping pong, darts, board games, smart tv, wii. Under 10 min to Downtown, River Arts District, French Broad River trails, Outlet Malls, and Biltmore Estate.

The space
Guests have private access to this lower level apartment and sole use of it while visiting. We will be staying on the upstairs level with a separate entrance, so you will hear us at times.

Guest access
Guests have sole access to the entire lower level apartment, private hottub and outdoor shower spa area by appointment, and sitting area in back yard with fire pit.

Other things to note
Please park in driveway.

name: the BEAR DEN—separate HVAC+HEPA+walk 2 SunnyPoint
description:
Amazing, private guest suite in Historic West Asheville within walking distance to the excitement of Haywood Road–the main corridor in WAVL where you'll find amazing restaurants, like Sunny Point Café and BiscuitHead, bars and breweries. Our pad is great for vacation, staycation or as a work-from-home alternative. The suite has blazing fast wifi, contactless check-in & a separate, dedicated HVAC + a HEPA purifier. We strictly follow Airbnb’s Enhanced Cleaning Protocol.

The space
The suite is professionally furnished with a Queen Organic Loom & Leaf memory foam mattress, Samsung Smart TV w/Netflix and cable, Scandinavian sofa/daybed (perfect for a third guest), desk and ergonomic chair (excellent for business travelers), bistro table, record player with a variety of vinyl and a Ms. Pac-Man/Galaga machine on free play!

It features hardwood floors and its own temperature control for central heat and/or air conditioning. We provide all linens and towels as

name: Janina's Cozy Studio at Biltmore Central Asheville
description:
Asheville Chic only 1-1/2 miles from Biltmore Estate, near London Road Design District! Renovated European-Style, Self-Contained Studio with Separate Entrance in Private Family Home, Perfect for Couples & Weekend Getaways. Reputation for sparkling cleanliness and no direct contact with resident host required! Guests can also enjoy an outdoor cafe table and seating area among the organically-grown roses and perennials garden. Free WiFi.

The space
Guests at Janina's stay in their own separate space with its own street door, so no direct interaction with your host is required, though help is always available! And consistent with Janina's reputation for sparkling cleanliness, we will be following enhanced cleaning protocols required by Airbnb. As an extra precaution, we schedule a minimum of 24 hours between bookings and no longer accept back-to-back same-day reservations, in which guests depart in the morning and new guests arrive in the afternoon on the same day.

name: WAvl tiny home, pet friendly-no fee, close dwntwn
description:
Enjoy this tiny home with a loft bedroom featuring a king bed. Drink your coffee on the porch, roast marshmallows on the bonfire, soak in the hot tub & unwind!

Conveniently located just minutes to Downtown in West Avl.

The tiny home is located behind the main house, and does require you to walk down a somewhat steep pathway. It's just a warm up before you hit the Blue Ridge Parkway to enjoy spectacular views of the mountains.

This house is little, but your adventures will be grand!

The space
Tiny cabin with a wooded yard, porch with hot tub and grill, electric fireplace, and spacious loft bedroom. Pet friendly!

Guest access
Access to entire tiny home and yard surrounding tiny home. Shared parking area with a designated spot for loft guests.

Please be aware that the pathway from the driveway to the tiny home is somewhat steep and uneven, but there are handrails and lights along the way.

name: Montford Hideaway - Ten minute walk to downtown.
description:
Enjoy the downtown convenience of our industrial-cool basement apartment just two blocks from downtown Asheville, NC. We live on a super-friendly downtown street, and parking is tight, so we can offer one off street parking space behind the house.

The legal homestay apartment is in the basement of our primary residence. We are a quiet family, but there may be some muffled noise from upstairs, and maybe even few toenail clicks or a bark from our very friendly dog!

The apartment has a private back patio where you can enjoy the lovely Asheville weather.

We both work, so we are generally up early. Fitz works from home, and is always available to see to any needs or answer any questions you may have.

Hope to see you soon!

name: Family Getaway/Minutes to Downtown
description:
Plenty of room for a family getaway. Enjoy dinner on the deck, or a cup of coffee in the morning as the birds are singing. There is a large yard, perfect for football games or you can shoot some hoops!

Sorry. No pets.

name: Country cottage in the center of it all!
description:
Close to the city with a country feel. Come and enjoy all that Asheville and the surrounding areas have to offer in our little country cottage. We are located in Fletcher, NC- about 20-30 min from downtown Asheville and the Biltmore House (about 9 miles)- and a short drive from Asheville Airport. Tryon Equestrian Center is just 30 min away. Hiking, kayaking, shopping- all within 30 min drive or less. Outdoor fire pit for chilling after an amazing days adventures with your local brew or wine!

The space
We don't have cable for the TV but we do have internet you can access- We have a smart TV so if you have a Netflix account, you can access all your favorite shows/movies- We also have a DVD player/ DVD’s and a variety of board games as well. If you like to spend your time outside, we have a corn hole game, rock fire pit and porches on the front and back of the house to relax and enjoy the outdoors.

Guest access
All spaces accessible-

name: The Bluebird Basement Getaway
description:
Super CLEAN, safe and serene escape to Asheville! Renovated walkout basement with its own ground level entrance. Tucked into the trees with a 60 Acre virgin forest sanctuary for the backyard. Quiet and serene, yet just 3 miles from the heart of downtown Asheville. Lots of Asheville’s best bars, breweries, and more just a mile or 2 away. Up for a hike or frisbee golf? The Richmond Hill City Park is about 1/2 mile away! Or head to the River Arts District to explore, just 1.5 miles away.

The space
-The kitchenette space offers an island with seating for two, a toaster oven, small fridge with freezer, coffee maker, hot plate, and microwave. Perfect for an easy meal or to heat up your delicious leftovers.

-It has 1 separate bedroom featuring a barn door. There are lights on nightstands on each side of the bed creating a cozy and comfortable sleeping arrangement. The bed is a Lucid Memory foam mattress on a platform. It is VERY comfortable!

name: Private modern apt above River Arts.  Walk to town
description:
Private, brand new, and modern inlaw apartment close downtown Asheville. You will love the airy bedroom that feels like a vacation in itself and the attention to detail that is evident throughout this carefully designed space. Enjoy sitting on the back deck, walking to the River Arts District (.1 miles) or to downtown (1 mile). There is room to park one car in the rear. Close to many galleries, breweries, and restaurants. Basic kitchenette is plenty to meet basic cooking needs for a week.

The space
The space is a new addition to the back of my house that I finished in January. It has a great lay out that makes it feel spacious and airy. The top floor feels a bit like a tree house with only the bed in it. There is a middle level with a tv and a couch that folds down to sleep an extra guest. The ground floor has the bathroom and a small kitchenette. Out side there is a deck with a grill. The back yard is shady and a great place to hang out even on a hot summe

name: Fun West Asheville room for a special getaway
description:
Comfy room, with a queen bed and brand new linens, in trendy West Asheville home. Private lower level of home with your own private deck, but you can use the upper deck as well. Less than a mile to West Asheville entertainment. 5 miles to the center of downtown Asheville. Close to great hiking, biking and world class dining.

The space
Great room for a comfy, well located weekend in Asheville

Guest access
You will come in on the upper level, for your convenience. Your room has a lock and you have the whole lower level. You may use the washer and dryer on the upper level. Uber is usually only a few minutes away.

Other things to note
I will provide you with personalized information based on your interests.

name: Serene AV Escape w/Alcohol Decontamination Service
description:
Do you want to experience Asheville just like a local in a gorgeous property that represents all that is Asheville and feel comfortable that your rented space is extremely clean? Well, this space is professionally decontaminated using an alcohol fumigator for true disinfection (multiple times each week and just before your stay) and is only available for one booking each weekend to ensure this cleanliness. See the description of "the space" for specifics.

The space
This gorgeous homestay resembles a beautiful hotel in the middle of a wooded mountain. Yet, it is just 5-6 minutes from downtown Asheville and less than 10 minutes away to most breweries, Biltmore House, Grove Park Inn, and the Blue Ridge Parkway. The space is professionally decontaminated using an alcohol fumigator for true disinfection. Enjoy the mountain scenery and fresh air from a private second story balcony where your large Master bedroom and an additional room meet. The front door is accessibl

name: Guest house.  Walk to town, all new, 2nd story
description:
South facing and full of light, second-story, 500 sq feet above a garage. Wood floors, tile shower, heated marble bathroom floor. Architectural details: skylights in kitchen and living room, antique stained glass windows in bedroom and bathroom, milk-glass light fixtures, bulls eye trim, 11 foot vaulted ceilings. Kitchen includes granite counters, stainless steel appliances, washer dryer, ice maker, dishwasher.

The space
The apartment is above a two car garage and is in on the property of the house that we live in. Our house is on the corner and the apartment is on a quiet, narrow back road that only has five houses on it. Parking is ample and close. The apartment has 12 foot ceilings and three sky lights which all make the space bright and airy feeling. The apartment was constructed in January 2018 so it's brand new and very clean.

Guest access
Guests have the entire apartment. There is an outside stairway to access the apartment. The doo

name: Cute Single with Private Bath 1.5 miles to Haywood
description:
Need a place to crash while you hike or bike the trails then hit the breweries? This room is perfect for the busy solo traveler. One mile from Haywood and all the best of West Asheville. Enjoy a very comfortable private room/private bath and access to laundry. This room has a single bed for one guest only, no TV, but we do have wifi. You will be sharing a home with two others when you stay, so we appreciate guests who understand this fact.

The space
Your room is separate from the other bedrooms in the house, allowing for more privacy when coming and going and when sleeping. Note the room is near the kitchen and you may hear others using the kitchen while you stay but we observe quiet hours from 9pm to 7am. We have a fully fenced in yard for four legged guests.

Other things to note
If you are bringing a dog, please let us know a little about your fur baby to see if they are good fit for our house and family dog. Sorry we do not allow cats i

name: North Asheville Urban Forest
description:
A 1926 Craftsman Home that is two miles from the city center. The UNCA Botanical Garden is within walking distance. Both hosts have been vaccinated for COVID-19 so it's safe to greet you without wearing a mask. If you'd feel more comfortable with us wearing one, let us know. All rooms and bathroom will be thoroughly cleaned between every guest according to current CDC guidelines. Your room is on the second floor (17 steps). No smoking.

The space
Our place is great for a couples get-away. Both straight and LGBTQ+ couples are welcome!

Guest access
Your stay includes a private bedroom with queen size bed, private bath and a private den. Both the bedroom and den are equipped with flat screen TV's and Netflix. Amenities include sheets, towels, local herbal bath products and access to the kitchen. You will be warmly welcomed at the door by Shiloh the family pup. No smoking.

name: Cozy Little Farmette Minutes to Downtown Asheville
description:
Enjoy the peace and quiet of the country! This cozy little farmette, situated in the valley off the Blue Ridge Mountains, is a slice of heaven within minutes of downtown Asheville.
Outside, you’ll feel an instant sense of peace and tranquility surrounded by horses, happy, free ranging chickens, abundant woods, gardens, ponds, open lawns and patios for your restful getaway. Inside, the house is joyfully animated by the presence of a sweet cat and two joyful pups.

The space
Located on a quiet street with views of Blue Ridge Mountains and abundant nature: fox, bear, turkey, ducks, geese, blue heron and blue birds are some of my wonderful outdoor critters! While I have an indoor cat and dog, they are very quiet, and stay out of the airbnb space.

Guest access
The bedroom and bathroom are private, off to one end of the house, with your own entrance. There is a lovey patio to spend time sipping your coffee, meditating, yoga or just being. Sh

name: The Flint Street House downtown Historic Montford
description:
Historic Montford home. 3 blocks from the civic center and downtown. This is an old home in a wonderful neighborhood. The space has 2 bedrooms and 1 bath with a common hallway area where you’ll find a small fridge, coffee and snacks. The larger room has a king and an air mattress is available. The space has character, very comfortable, very clean, and very convenient to all that asheville has to offer. It’s short walk to downtown, coffee shops, restaurants, bars and breweries.

The space
Old home in historic neighborhood. You’ll have the whole 2nd floor to yourselves and access to the front yard and porch. There is a private stairwell to the second floor. There are two bedrooms, and a bathroom. In the common hallway you’ll find coffee and a fridge and some snacks provided. I live on the first floor. We may see each other come and go but the spaces are separate and private. Pets are welcome at an extra charge of $25 as long as they’re well behaved. Guests are resp

name: Live/Work/Walk Everywhere from Drover's Way House
description:
Drover's Way is located on the edge of Downtown AVL with free onsite parking! With a large room downstairs and sitting areas off the bedrooms upstairs, a couple can easily find office space for remote working yet still enjoy having the benefits of a whole house to live comfortably with space to relax in. The house has 2 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms, a kitchen, a laundry room, front porch with rockers, and best of all, it's within a block of Archetype Brewing, High 5 Coffee, & Five Points Diner.

The space
Monthly rental! Since the pandemic began, more people are working remotely and wanting to isolate from other people. At Drover's Way you have the best of both worlds (monthly rental now). You can walk up the street to pick up take out food from some of Asheville's best restaurants, and bring it back to enjoy on the porch. Work from home with our high speed wifi (fast enough to support multiple people on Zoom calls), then enjoy cooking in the well equipped kitchen

name: Country quiet, close to town.  King Beds, Hot tub!
description:
Entire home conveniently located about 15-20 minutes to Downtown Asheville and West Asheville bordering a farm. Relax in the hot tub after a long day of exploring Asheville; the Biltmore Estate, the Grove Park Inn, and the Blue Ridge Parkway are all must-visits. Featuring wrap around porches, a fully fenced in back yard, a large back deck for outdoor entertaining, gas grill, an amazing hot tub, high speed internet, smart TV, and luxury memory foam king beds in all the bedrooms.

The space
This home is located 15-20 minutes to downtown and West Asheville. Uber and Lyft are readily available. Enjoy the expansive decks and the large fenced in backyard along with king beds in all the rooms. There are 2 upstairs bedrooms with a shared full bath, a master with bath on the main floor, with an extra half bath in the hall. The basement is finished with a king, queen, and one couch.. The house is at the end of a cul de sac in a fairly quiet neighborhood. We have an outdoo

name: SoCozy
description: Welcome to SoCozy, a single room with private entrance and bath on the ground floor of a new home in the heart of the historic Montford neighborhood. We have just completed  this space for out of town guests so everything is brand new.  Coffee and tea are provided and there is a fridge, toaster and microwave as well as glasses, dishes and utensils.  We look forward to welcoming Airbnb visitors and being hosts to folks visiting Asheville. Come stay with us in the vortex that is Asheville

name: Ultimate Asheville Airbnb #location
description:
CORONAVIRUS READY! Two CLEAN separate spaces! PETS (ask). I adapt the space to any need. Prefer 2 night min Fri-Sat (ask).

King Bed (2p) with nice futon (1-2p). Bedroom with a queen (2p). Twin floor mattress option (1p). We hope our guests get the most out of Asheville.

Converted garage to a living space with a separate entrance. Hallway to a full bath where another private bedroom is located.

The space
Built in 2005. This home is of solid construction and well maintained. Converted our garage to a living space with a separate entrance. It leads to a hallway with a full bath where another private bedroom is located. This whole portion of the house will be yours privately. Feel free to interact with me as much as you want, but I'll respect your time to relax or party!

Parking places are designated on the side of the driveway. You will receive a temporary door code for the French doors via text message.

Guest acces

name: Mayfair Cottage
description:
In Asheville, local is always the way to go! Come explore the personality and charm of Asheville in an authentic, stress-free oasis on the west side of town. Practice your golf swing, or play a game of volleyball in the community park – just a short walk away. With modern flair and vintage 70’s era touches, you’ll be right at home in our cottage; fifteen minutes or less to downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, or Blue Ridge Parkway. Close to everything that Asheville has to experience and enjoy!

The space
Recently remodeled and featured as home of the week in the Asheville Citizen Times, the space is fresh and bright with touches of 70's vintage, minus the blue shag carpet. As you come in, you'll find yourself in the shared laundry room (bicyclists can leave their bikes safely here) which opens up to the kitchenette. The large living space is equipped with a dining room table and a sitting area, and the bedroom and the bathroom are to your left. We love our city a

name: New Log Cabin, Mountain Views, HotTub, Fire Pit
description:
This beautiful, true-wood log cabin has everything you are looking for when visiting Asheville and the surrounding area. Just 5 miles from the interstate and downtown Asheville, this log cabin is quintessential to anywhere you want to go. Giving you convenience to everything and the comfort and modern amenities with long-range mountain views when you're home.

Complete with outdoor dining table, gas grill, hot tub and fire pit, you are sure to have a wonderful evening outside on the deck.

The space
Please note that the second bedroom is a loft and is open to the main floor. It is not a private bedroom. Please note that we do relocate the cows in the winter from December thru March due to cold weather and freezing water.

Other things to note
Please do not go into the pasture with the cows. They get very excited when someone goes in there, as they think they are going to be fed hay. Please note that we do relocate the cows in the w

name: Rice Family Cabin
description:
A charming Appalachian cabin built in 1934, lovingly restored in 2018 with modern amenities. Original antique furnishings have been preserved. Conveniently located in East Asheville with nearby Blue Ridge Parkway access. 5 minutes to Mountains-to-Sea trail and Folk Art Center, 10 minutes to downtown. Enclosed back porch and open deck overlook a private meadow surrounded by woods. Perfect for those seeking Asheville's blend of rich history, modern culture, and breathtaking natural beauty!

The space
This cabin was built by a descendant of the first settlers of Buncombe County. This is a uniquely beautiful and historical Appalachian homestead, constructed from hand-cut yellow pine logs that grew on the original land. Many of the furnishings are antique heirlooms. The cabin is all one level and the layout has not changed from the original 1930s-era design. The front and back entrances include short sets of stairs, and there is a keyless entry. Please note that both b

name: City Casita Downtown - KING Bed and Free Parking!!
description:
Great downtown condo right behind the Harrah's Cherokee Center and Thomas Wolfe Auditorium. Safe, keypad-locked building with elevator access. Top floor = nobody above you. Easy walking distance to just about anything downtown. Coffee shops, restaurants, breweries, bars, retail shops, grocery stores, activities, and more within blocks of the front door. Biltmore Estate and access to the Blue Ridge Parkway for hiking trails are within a 15 minute drive.

The space
Get more out of your stay in Asheville with this little home away from home. Enjoy having a full-size kitchen and living room in addition to the bedroom and bathroom in this 600+ SF condo. This makes for a much more spacious stay than a hotel. You will have a FREE PARKING SPOT designated for you just outside and elevator access that will make it easy for bringing in luggage. You won't need to use your car during your stay, though, because you are close enough to walk to just about anywhere you would want

name: Oak Shade Suite - Private Asheville Guesthouse
description:
Oak Shade Suite, a recently renovated 95-year-old carriage house, is a private oasis on the south side of our 3-acre wooded lot. The elevated deck overlooks a large garden and dozens of centuries-old hardwoods. Directly below is Alex's pottery studio and woodshop, and next door is Nicole's drafting and letterpress studio. Our family lives in the adjacent bungalow on site.

The space
Charming and comfortable 1 bedroom 1 bath apartment with a living room, kitchenette and deck.

If you are tall, please come with a sense of adventure and a willingness to duck. We’ve taken care to design the space and arrange the furniture in a way that minimizes the low ceiling clearance in places, but there is the potential to bump your head in certain areas indicated in listing photos.

We regret we cannot accommodate pets. Smoking is strictly prohibited.

Guest access
Private guest parking at the end of a wooded gravel driveway. Suite has

name: Convenient king suite---walk to downtown!
description: Convenient Five Points king suite within walking distance of downtown Asheville. The suite provides a private entrance, kitchenette, and a bathroom with a shower. There is usually plenty of parking on a safe street around the property. The walk to downtown is about 10 minutes.

name: Asheville Studio 78
description:
Asheville Studio 78 is centrally located near I-240, between Merrimon Ave and Charlotte St., in the heart of Asheville. Although a short walk from downtown shopping and restaurants and 1/2 mile from Asheville Yoga Center, this peaceful studio is tucked away in a quaint and quiet neighborhood, overlooking swaying trees and beautiful landscaping. Asheville Studio 78 is also just under a mile to the Grove Park Inn... which you can see from the windows of the studio!
NEED A LONGER STAY? CONTACT ME.

The space
The studio is a private room above our garage, designed for the mature adult or two looking for a quiet relaxing space while visiting or working in Asheville. Due to the stairs and space sorry, but NO CHILDREN under 14, no pets and NO SMOKING.
Please contact us about long term stays and do check out our other spaces!

Thank you for visiting our site and have a great day!

Guest access
Guests share the driveway and have a

name: 3BR/2.5 bath: Townhome 2 mi from Airport, quiet.
description:
Home away from home. Cozy 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms Townhouse in a quiet area. Minutes away from Target, Walmart, and restaurants like Sierra Nevada. Located south of Asheville, you are only 15 miles from the heart of downtown and the Biltmore House. It is within 2 miles of the Asheville airport/AG center & 5 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway. Easy access to Brevard and Hendersonville. The Tryon Equestrian Center is an easy 35 mile drive via I-26. Great for family vacations and extended trips!

The space
Fully furnished, single-family dwelling where you will feel right at home.

Guest access
You will have access to the following common areas downstairs: Living room (room for Queen air mattress & couch), dining room, kitchen, laundry room, 1/2 bathroom downstairs. The 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms are located upstairs.

Other things to note
There are new units being built down the road in our neighborhood, so you may se

name: 1BR/1Bathroom close to Airport in South Asheville
description:
You will have access to a private BR/Bathroom in our townhome located in a quiet neighborhood. Only minutes away from Target, Walmart, and Sierra Nevada. Located south of Asheville, you are only 15 miles from the heart of downtown and the Biltmore House. It is within 2 miles of the Asheville airport/AG center & 5 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway. Easy access to Brevard/Hendersonville. Great for singles/couples on a business trip or vacation & looking for adventure in the beautiful mountains!

Guest access
You will have access to the following common areas downstairs: Living room, dining room, kitchen, and laundry room. Your private bedroom and bathroom are located upstairs.

Other things to note
There are new units being built down the road in our neighborhood, so you may see constructions crews coming and going during the day.

name: Beautiful Century Old Charmer w/ hot tub
description:
My house is located in the heart of West Asheville. It is walkable to awesome restaurants, local shops, grocery store, parks, music venues, and breweries. Downtown is a short and inexpensive Lyft ride away. Your suite has a private bathroom and a king size bed. Come enjoy this space as much as we do.

The space
There is a great back yard space to enjoy. We are pet friendly but ask you clean up after your fur baby. We have a hot tub outside for you to enjoy and relax after, or before, your Asheville adventures.

Guest access
There is a large open kitchen equipped to handle any culinary adventure you might embark on. There is a living room with a big screen TV, but bring your fire stick or roku, and dining room. My patio has a gazebo, a grill, a trampoline, and a fire pit.

name: Cute Updated Condo - Steps to Downtown
description:
Walking distance to downtown Asheville's best restaurants, nightlife, and shops, this cute 1BR condo has a newly renovated kitchen and bath. Great for both business travelers and extended getaways. Reach the Blue Ridge Parkway in minutes. Sleeps 2.

The space
Whether you’re seeking an extended getaway or a comfortable hotel alternative for your business travel, this lovely 1BR third-floor condo is steps away from the heart of downtown. A newly renovated kitchen and bath make your stay comfortable, and the peaceful bedroom features a view of the city and a full-size bed.

This Asheville rental is conveniently located less than 10 minutes from nearly everything you would want to see! You're just around the corner from the U.S. Cellular Center and the Thomas Wolfe Auditorium and minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, Grove Park Inn, and the Biltmore Estate.

Asheville's rich outdoor activities abound as well -- take your pick of hiking, fishing, zip

name: Clean & Cozy Cottage-Pet Friendly, 3mi to Biltmore
description:
This cozy, light-filled, guesthouse cottage--just minutes away from everything Asheville has to offer--is all yours during your mountain getaway in Asheville. Less than five miles to downtown, the Biltmore, and the Blue Ridge Parkway, it's convenient and quiet. Whoever you are, you are welcome here!

The space
Our little cottage guesthouse (560sqft) is tucked away in the suburban Oakley neighborhood of Asheville. Custom-built features make this cozy space special and functional.

The bottom level is light-filled with a fully-stocked modern kitchen and bar seating. Coffee and tea provided. The living area has a loveseat sofa with a pull-out single bed. Downstairs is also a remodeled bathroom with a large, tile shower.

The metal spiral staircase leads to an open-floor loft bedroom with heavenly memory foam, queen-sized mattress. Also upstairs is a height-adjustable desk with chair, dressing area and plenty of space to spread out. The mattress

name: Minutes To Downtown | Heart of West Asheville
description:
Welcome to the Malvern Hills Guest Suite! A private 2 bedroom guest suite tucked into a West Asheville neighborhood near the heart of downtown. A ten minute walk to all of West Asheville's favorites and a short, five minute drive to downtown. You have your own private entrance, bathroom, dedicated living space, and off street parking. The Malvern Hills guest suite is the perfect spot to relax and see all the sights Asheville has to offer.

The space
Our place is open, airy, and light-filled. Offering SmartTV, Wi-Fi, brand new queen size beds, hotel-quality linens, and a comfortable (and stylish!) place to lounge.

Guest access
The entire place is yours while you are here. You have your own private entry and plenty of on-street parking.

Other things to note
Pet(s) live on property - We do have a cat and dog that live upstairs for those concerned with allergies

name: Asheville East Retreat
description:
We are committed to making your stay with us an enjoyable, safe experience. For that reason, we follow Airbnb’s Enhanced Cleaning Protocol (see above).
We take this very seriously, for your safety, as well as ours.

Our guest suite has been completely updated. New carpet throughout, freshly painted, wall mounted 50” television. Dining table for those times you want to eat in. Electric heater/fireplace console in master bedroom.

The space
The private entrance to the guest suite opens into a large living-room with comfortable seating, 50” TV connected with Hulu Live-TV, trundle bed for guests, and an area that has a small fridge, microwave, coffee pot and essentials, including locally roasted coffee.

Just off the living-room is the master bedroom that has an extremely comfortable king size bed, which is sure to make your stay more relaxing. The closet has extra towels, blankets, hangers, iron/ironing board, and first-aid kit.

T

description:
Location, Location, Location can not be beat with ON SITE parking.

Perfect studio condo for TWO (2) in the heart of downtown Asheville. Located directly behind U.S. Cellular Center. Walk to everything. Parking is a huge issue in Asheville. You have your own dedicated space.

Classy, minimalist but decorated in the mid-century modern style, this condo will take you back to an era when black and white photos were the vogue and Asheville was a little known gem in the mountains. Everything you need

The space

We thoroughly clean everything after every stay including surfaces, window seals and door handles.
We are in isolation.

Private Master Bedroom & Bath with Recreational Space. No Smoking or Cooking Equipment Allowed.

(Shared Space)

3 bdr. ranch home, basement to store bicycles, rec room with pool and ping pong table, deck off dining room with grill and picnic table.
3 minutes from the NC Arboretum, Blue Ridge Parkway, and Asheville Outlet Mall, 15 minutes from Biltmore House and downtown Asheville, 30 min. from Pisgah National Forest , biking and hiking trails with over 250 waterfalls.
Neighborhood Has Park With Covered Pavilion , Basketball and volley ball courts, playground & Bike Trails.

The space
Two bedrooms have queen beds in each. The third bedroom has a trundle bed (two single beds) So this would accomodate 2 families with 2 couples and no more than 2 children total.

Guest access
The entire house is available with use of fully equipped kitchen. Nice back yard for the kids to play in as well as a basement room with ping pong and pool table.

name: Charming Cottage Overlooking Downtown AVL
description:
Experience the convenience of this private, modern, naturally lit, large in-law studio (1,100 sqft) and porch nestled under large trees overlooking the heart of beautiful downtown Asheville, NC. Parking in the city is tough, stay here and you can walk to it all downtown! Famous Pack Square, French Broad Chocolate Lounge amongst many breweries like Wicked Weed, restaurants, and coffee houses (5-10 minute walk). Private entrance. Relaxing, open, modern layout, lots of amenities. Family Friendly

The space
-WALK TO THE HEART OF DOWNTOWN ASHEVILLE IN 5-10 MINUTES
- PRIVATE IN-LAW LARGE STUDIO COTTAGE
-TREEHOUSE FEEL. Quiet, tranquil, and private. Large trees surround the property

name: River House Asheville
description:
Hidden gem, gorgeous private setting yet near the action! Located on the Swannanoa River, 12 minutes from downtown Asheville. Large master bedroom with king bed and walk-in tiled shower. 2nd BR with queen bed, hall bath with deep tub and shower. Sleeper sofa in living room. Beautiful forest/river setting. 9-house private road. 2 miles from entrance to Blue Ridge Parkway. Fire circle, wonderful wading river. There is weekly landscaping maintenance which may occur during your stay.

The space
Proximity to downtown Asheville while having secluded feeling, and the Swannanoa River in the back yard, make this space unique. In winter the Adirondack chairs around the fire pit, in spring and summer wading in the Swannanoa, Private feeling in a peaceful little neighborhood.

Other things to note
Please drive extra slowly in and out of our private road. Landscaper/maintenance person comes weekly between 10-6.

name: Tiny House [Fenced in yard, 10mins to Downtown]
description:
Come on up to the house! Located in a quiet, woodsy neighborhood, our tiny house has almost every amenity and is perfect for couples, adventurers, family & friends. We welcome pets, both dogs and cats, at no extra charge. Enjoy our comfortable home with a fenced-in yard and beautiful views in every season. You're just minutes from Asheville's River Arts District, the Biltmore Estate, Blue Ridge Parkway, and Downtown Asheville's wonderful restaurants, shops, breweries, and other attractions.

The space
This luxurious pet-friendly tiny house has a spacious, fenced-in backyard and deck, amazing privacy and beautiful views just minutes from downtown Asheville.

The kitchen has everything you need to cook or just heat up leftovers from your favorite restaurant. The bathroom has a claw foot tub complete with bubble bath. The main room has a Murphy Cabinet bed and small seating area.

If you're bringing your pup(s), the yard is completely fenced i

description:
The Granny Smith Suite is located on our second floor and looks out to the front of the house with a seasonal view of the surrounding mountains and the stately white pine trees surrounding the property.
The room has a private balcony, gas log fireplace, ceiling fan, and dedicated climate control. Also, enjoy a king-size Duxiana 6006 bed made with the finest linens.

Our goal is to tailor your visit to your wishes and, by doing so, we hope to make your stay special. When you arrive we want you to kick off your shoes, put your feet up and make yourselves at home. Guest access

description:
Little Shady Oak. A Stylish 3 BDR bungalow in the heart of it all. Located just outside historic Biltmore Village. Downtown Asheville is at your fingertips. Dog friendly. Walkable restaurants, breweries, galleries & shops!

30 day Executive Rental.

description:
Sweet little oasis of a newer home that is about less than a mile to shopping, restaurants, bars and music, (5 NYC city blocks). Brand new 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom private floor all to your self in a custom built home on a dead end street with lovely neighbors. The space is below the main house with its own entrance and outdoor space backing up to a stream (some times only a dry bed, but is a tributary into the French Broad River). On demand water heater (which means you never have to worry about running out of hot water) and separate AC/Heating system for you to control the temperature of your floor as you like. Memory foam queen bed, large walk in closet, bathroom is both a tub and shower, and living room is quite spacious with ample seating and a glass dining room t

description:
Enjoy our charming 2 bedroom, 2 bath house centrally located in Asheville. The large yard and easy access provides a fun and relaxing home whether your visit is for work or play. Close to the hospital, the Biltmore House & Village, and downtown.

The space
This recently renovated farmhouse is comfortably furnished with off street parking.

Guest access

Other things to note
Pets are approved on an individual basis. Please contact me BEFORE you book if you wish to bring your pet.

description:

Clean and comfortable historic 100+year-old rooming house with a front porch, balcony and shared bathrooms. One of several short term rental rooms, this single, second floor room has an air conditioner in the window in summer, includes mini refrigerator, sink, table, chair. High ceiling and wifi. Bathrooms are shared with other guests.

The space
This room is in the back corner of the building, has a single size bed, closet, table and chair.

At the Gray Rock Inn, downtown Asheville is right outside your door, and our reasonable rates mean your money can be spent on enjoying the city. Conveniently located on Biltmore Ave. and an easy walk to breweries, music venues, art galleries, boutiques and restaurants.

description:
MASTER KING BED AND GUEST QUEEN BED / 2 AND 1/2 BATH / PRIVATE OPEN AIR GARDEN PATIO / 2066 SQUARE FEET

A modern luxury appointed home that sleeps four.

Enter this residence through the second-floor main entrance and ascend to the living area via a contemporary staircase or enter from your private elevator that opens to a stunning view of the large open-air garden patio. The residence is furnished in a contemporary style.

description:
The surrounding woodlands are in full regale this time of year
Spring soon will be exiting and the warmth of summer has brought my property into full leaf and bloom, come experience Green Retreat Deluxe, a master bedroom with on suite bathroom with soaking tub & shower. description:
Beautiful 2 BR, 1 BA home across the private lane from the Swannanoa River - 12 minutes from downtown Asheville and 5 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway. River views and sounds from the deck. Wood burning fireplace, central air, grill, pet friendly. $25 per pet fee added after reservation is made. This is a great place to stay as a jumping off spot for hiking and outdoor activities, that is near town.

Please drive very slowly along the private road that leads to the cabin. Strict leash law in Asheville. Landscaper/maintenance person comes weekly between 10-6.

description:

Our place is great for pet friendly guests who intend to visit Asheville or surrounding areas! We have an extremely friendly lab/pit mix dog who lives in our home, and a friendly cat. We also have chickens and ducks in the back yard! We love taking guests on tours of our mini farm, so do not hesitate to book with us!

The space

There is also a closet in the room that is used for storage but has plenty of room to hang necessary items.

description:
This is a beautiful, 720 square feet, new construction, in law suite with a private entrance. It has a full kitchen and bathroom. One driveway parking spot with additional street parking. Come visit Asheville and all it has to offer with the comfort and feel of being right at home!

The space
Located just 2 min off of I40 and 5 min from the historic Biltmore House. 5 min from the incredible blue ridge parkway. 5 min from The Asheville Mall. 8 min from central downtown Asheville and all it has to offer. Including the endless list of locally owned eateries and bistros. 8 min from the Asheville Outlets. Also $12 or less Uber rides will get you to over 50 breweries and tasting rooms.

description: Embrace the blissful ambience of this bright, inviting home. The residence features contrasting textures and patterns, subtle uses of color, a custom mural wall in the master suite, and a Juliette balcony overlooking the neighborhood.

description:
The house is situated in the Kenilworth neighborhood, convenient to both downtown and the hospital. It is about half a mile to downtown and half a mile to Biltmore village. Local breweries and eateries within walking distance!

This is a private room but you will also have a private bathroom. You will have access to your own personal sitting room where you can watch TV, read or do a.m. yoga!

The space
This is a private room but you will have access to a sitting room. The sitting/ TV room is located right next to the bedroom that will be your personal space. The bathroom, in the main hallway, will also be yours. The house was built in the 1920's and has elegant architectural details, such as built- in box beam celings.

Guest access
You will have an easy self check-in with a lock box and code.

Other things to note
I have a dog, Indie. She is well behaved and very loving. A medium-sized dog, fluffy and cute.

description:
We can’t wait for you to enjoy our private guest suite! Located in a quiet neighborhood just north of Asheville, you can enjoy a private wooded setting and still be just minutes from The Grove Park inn, Downtown, The Biltmore, and many excellent restaurants and breweries.

This is a private guest suite with a separate instance.

Moments to the heart of Biltmore Village, 1/4 mile to Biltmore Estate entrance, 1 mile to Mission Hospital & 2 1/2 miles to vibrant downtown to explore Asheville's many dining pleasures!

The suite offers a separate en suite bath with a deep two-person tub, a dressing table with a lighted makeup mirror, double sinks, a separate shower and incredible sleep experience of the Duxiana 6006 bed made with the finest linens.

The main building offers 5 guest rooms plus a dog-friendly separate cottage, steps from the inn. Common areas, dining room, porches, and outdoor areas are yours to enjoy; however, we remain a B&B not a private residence for rent so we do not offer the kitchen for unsupervised guest use. . description:
The Lower Berne Chalet is a 1 bed, 1 bath apartment in the lower level of a duplex. (There may be guests upstairs.) There is a newly remodeled, fully-stocked kitchen, living area, separate bedroom and a full bath. There a cute screened porch adjacent to a fenced dog yard. You'll be tucked away in the trees, just 5 minutes from downtown Asheville and all the fun! As an added bonus, we'll leave fresh-baked people cookies and dog cookies from Judy's famous Well Bred Bakery and Cafe.

The space

This two bedroom, one bath apartment includes a family room with a coffee station and limited kitchenette, a covered and screened porch as well as access to a full sized washer and dryer.

Downtown is great for fun and hanging out and then hit the comfy beds here! This is not the place to party all night.

description:
Great 900 square foot space to play and enjoy Asheville & appropriately socially distance! We know the pandemic is affecting everyone, & we believe that there is such a thing as traveling responsibly. We do clean thoroughly with various combinations of soap, bleach & at least 70% isopropyl alcohol.

Ever wanted to enjoy the mountains and be within walking distance of the coolest spots? It offers plenty of natural light, great views of the backyard with creek, separate parking and entrance.

A Bluetooth tower ensures you can enjoy the space with your favorite music at your fingertips. Enjoy the large lounging couch and super comfy bed. For extra guests, there is now a fold out fouton. Adirondack chairs are conveniently located just outside the door

All rooms of guest-house.

This is a non-smoking property (inside and out) and, although we love animals, pets are not permitted in this guest house.

We have a rescued dog and we cannot accept reservations with pets. Our dog barks occasionally (especially if there is thunder or fireworks) but we will quiet him down as quickly as possible. The front door on the right.

We're also within 1.5 miles of both Downtown Asheville and West Asheville, so if you're adventurous, you can walk the whole city!

name: 80 Lex: Apartment 201 : Exquisite Lodging
description:
This is it.

In a city all about it's micro-neighborhoods, N. Lexington Avenue is The Neighborhood. This is the historic and cultural center of downtown Asheville, once home to farmers and growers and today the heart of all things trendy, artsy and quintessential.

And on hip Lexington Ave., Unit 201 at 80 LEX – a building once the town's feed and seed warehouse, now its hottest address – is THE place: a 1-bedroom, 1-bath apartment that breathes Asheville chic.

The space
ONE KING BEDROOM/ ONE FULL PRIVATE BATH / LARGE SOFA / 639 SQ FT

Over 600 square-feet of industrial loft space, Unit 201 offers vintage furnishings and modern amenities, trendy wallpaper and filament light bulbs, exposed brick and curated artwork – everything you crave from your downtown Asheville experience.

And indeed, downtown Asheville is here, RIGHT here. Walk out your door and you’re on Lexington Avenue, the beating heart of Asheville’s din

description:
Welcome to my peaceful home on a quiet street located only 7.7 miles from the Asheville Airport (AVL), 2.5 miles to the entrance of The Biltmore Estate, and 5 miles from downtown Asheville. Access to the Mountains-to-Sea Trail is within walking distance with the Blue Ridge Parkway only five minutes away. With Interstate 40 Exit 51 only 1.5 miles away, you will have convenient access to the best of Asheville.
The closest food accommodations are about 1 mile. Car recommended.

The space

If you need a desk for work on your computer, you can have access to the large desk located in the other room.This room receives lovely afternoon light. When you book this room, I will block my other listing so that you have complete privacy.

If traveling with friends or family, The Calm Room with a king size bed is available for booking upon request.

It takes about 15 mins to drive Downtown, and 10 mins to the middle of Haywood rd. (downtown West Asheville) breweries, restaurants, and concert venues! Beautiful mountain views and easy access to the highway! Enjoy solitude in our quiet, cozy neighborhood.

The space

Have a cup of coffee and make your plans for the day at the dining table and coffee station, a great area for meals and conversation. Buy some fresh groceries at the farmers market and cook a romantic meal in the suites kitchenette nook. The kitchenette caddy

It includes a separate entrance, a bright living room with kitchenette, a spa-quality en suite bathroom with soaker tub, large shower, and dual vanity, plus a roomy master bedroom with ample closet space. Your Suite is completely separate from my living area and can be locked to ensure your privacy.

Other things to note
Our place is on a well traveled road, at times there can even be a bit of foot traffic. The home is old and you will be able to hear cars passing. Generally it is a tame neighborhood, but sometimes people are up late.

Fully furnished, and a perfect home base for forays into town or the woods. Dog friendly with fenced yard, with excellent parks and greenways nearby.

The space

For example, try our awesome coffee shop High Five Riverside, or the brand new brewery at the end of the block, Riverside Rhapsody. Or hop over to the trails and campus at UNC Asheville for a jog. Use this house as adventure hub for a tube or paddleboard down the French Broad River. Cheap Lyft to anywhere in town.

Guest access
Entire home, yard, and porches. Laundry on site.

Other things to note

Welcome to 7 Oaks Cottage! This 1940's cottage sits on 1 beautiful acre with mature oak and maple trees and 2 covered patios for relaxing. Just minutes from Blue Ridge Parkway, downtown Asheville and many National Forest trails. It is the perfect home base from which to explore All the Asheville area has to offer.
Our cottage has always been rated 5 stars for cleanliness. We also have an enhanced COVID-19 cleaning protocol. Families are welcome! Kid and baby toys and accessories available.

The space
My husband and I fell in love with this adorable cottage as soon as we saw it. Something about it was truly charming. After our purchasing the home from the previous owners of over 40 years, my husband began caringly remodeling and has transformed this quaint cottage into an updated abode without sacrificing any of its delightful charm.

There is one large bedroom which has enough space to sit privately and read or stretch out. We have supplied some

name: Be our Guest at May Manor!
description:
Welcome to May Manor! If you're looking for a quiet spot in the heart of West Asheville, look no further! We are less than 10 minute walk to Haywood Road where you will find music, food and Asheville's famous beer! We are also 10 minutes by car from downtown and a short drive from hiking, biking and other outdoor activities.

We provide a cozy, studio apartment with access to an outdoor seating area to enjoy your morning coffee or an afternoon cold one. Driveway parking and free wifi.

description:
Main floor of a two story home. Open floor plan with plenty of light. Two sliding glass doors onto a deck with mountain views (Craggy's Pinnicle). Large bedroom with office space. Kitchen and living areas are open and tastefully finished (we think.) Kitchen and bath both recently refinished. Plenty of off street parking. Quiet dead end street. Bird viewing from kitchen windows. Minutes to Biltmore village, down town and the Blue Ridge. Perfect for business, traveling nurse, or a couple

The space
Ideal for business travelers and traveling health care workers.

Guest access

Other things to note
This is the upstairs of a two unit house, in a quiet neighborhood. No party’s please.

description: Be immersed in the placid charm of this newly constructed, sun-soaked cottage, with its double height ceiling and back country atmosphere, yet 10 minutes from downtown Asheville and the Biltmore Estate. Sleeps 8 with 2 Queen beds and 4 singles in loft. To address COVID19 concerns, professionally cleaned by a retired nurse using Airbnb's cleaning and disinfecting protocols. We have set up the rental calendar to have at least three days between guests.

description:
Come, dreamers. Rest from your journey at this luxurious castle in the sky. Slumber beneath the stars... inhabit ethereal beauty apart from the mundane world.

Imaginarium, woven into the fabric of reality by Ashevillian craftspeople inspired by an exclusive EONAHS design, features four rooms – all distinctly different – yet flow together as one.

Located in the best neighborhood and area of Asheville, this private loft is your gateway to unforgettable adventure.

The space
High-style private loft sits atop West Asheville’s historic Tree Tops Estate.

Birthed from the imagination we all seek to preserve, it is only IMAGINARIUM.

Rare is the Asheville Airbnb with 1000 square feet of private living space. Enjoy unmatched privacy and comfort by means of private entrance and private thermostat in a completely isolated private suite.

High-end amenities abound... Talalay latex mattress & organic topper, filtered shower

name: Historic Asheville Home - Montford (Walk Downtown)
description: Beautifully renovated 1915 historic home set on 1/2 Acre. 10 minute walk from downtown Asheville. 4 bedrooms upstairs (King, 2 Queens, 1 twin), Gourmet Kitchen, spacious living room, 2 working fireplaces, Yoga Room, upstairs laundry, attached studio space with its own entrance, bathroom, kitchen space & sleeping loft.  Fenced in backyard with Sand Box, garden space, outdoor seating area, large back porch.

name: Edwin Place
description:
My home is a restored 100 year old house within the city of Asheville, one mile from Rt. 240 & close to downtown. Just a 25 minute walk or a 6 minute ride to the heart of downtown; a ten minute drive to the Biltmore Estate, and one block from the Grove Park Inn golf course.
This is a family oriented neighborhood in a historic district, Grove Park, designed in the early 20th Century.

The space
Traditionally appointed bedroom in back of house overlooking the garden, four-poster double bed (comfortable for 2 guests) with crochet canopy, tiger maple dresser, two tables & two chairs with sufficient space for laptop & in-room coffee & tea service. Period style private bathroom with updated amenities.

Additional space is available for a 3rd and 4th guest(s) in an adjacent bedroom with 2 twin beds a few steps away from the bathroom. For each registered guest using the second bedroom there is an extra guest fee.

Guest access
Tw

name: Downtown Asheville Traveler's Haven-Best Value-#12
description:
For budget travelers who want to be downtown! Convenient location. No frills and not a fancy B&B. A place with history, character and real people. Clean and comfortable historic 100+year-old rooming house with a front porch, balcony and shared bathrooms. One of several short term rental rooms, this single, second floor room has an air conditioner in the window in summer, includes a mini refrigerator, sink, table and chair. High ceiling and wifi. Bathrooms are shared with other guests.

The space
This small room is perfect for the solo traveler, with a twin bed, table and chair, refrigerator and sink. A large window lets in natural light with an excellent morning sunrise.

At the Gray Rock Inn, downtown Asheville is right outside your door, and our reasonable rates mean your money can be spent on enjoying the city. Conveniently located on Biltmore Ave. and an easy walk to breweries, music venues, art galleries, boutiques and restaurants.

The G

name: Private+Walk to RAD & West AVL+Deck!!!
description:
Your Sunrise Suite includes:
-500 sq ft lower level of our home
-Private entrance
-Private deck
-Bedroom with queen size bed and en suite bathroom
-2nd full bathroom w/ tub
-Smart TV (no cable)
-Google Assistant
-Games & books
-Laundry
