-Sleeper sofa for (1)
-(1) Off-street parking spot (mid-size SUV/van or smaller)

The space
Private lower level guest suite of our clean modern home with private entrance in safe stylish neighborhood.

Optimal location between popular West Asheville and River Arts District (RAD). There is nowhere else in Asheville we'd rather live! Hip area boasts a plethora of restaurants, shops, live music, galleries, breweries and access to French Broad River Greenway, all within enjoyable wal

name: Stylish Studio in the Trees - Montford
description:
Welcome to the Studio in the Trees, a leafy airy sojourn for your Asheville wanderings. Located in the walkable historic Montford neighborhood, and only 5 minutes drive (a mile's walk) to downtown, this extremely private studio apartment with separate entrance has its own screened-in porch (perfect for birdwatching!) LGBTQ Friendly.

DUE TO THE CORONAVIRUS I AM TAKING EXTRA CARE TO DISINFECT FREQUENTLY TOUCHED SURFACES BETWEEN RESERVATIONS

The space
• To enter the private, spacious studio apartment with key pad access, go down one flight of stairs, enter a serene screened in porch with couch, lounge chair and eating table.

• Inside the studio space is the living area on the right with a sleep sofa, club chair, Smart TV with extensive cable access and dinette table.

• On the left is a queen size bed, two dressers and ample closet space along the entire back wall.

• Eleven foot ceilings with extra tall windows afford an

name: Sunflower Hotel Vibe Minutes Downtown+Biltmore
description:
-Beautiful room close to downtown (2.5 miles), Biltmore Village (2miles), Blue Ridge Parkway (1.5 miles), Mall (1 mile) and shopping areas. Residential neighborhood centrally located.

-You will access using the front door . The bedrooms are upstairs. We live downstairs, but the entrance to the room is completely independent from our living space. You will share the hallway entrance with two other rooms.

- You will receive a key for your room.

-I respect my guests privacy. I am available by text 24/7 for any need you might have.

-Recommendations and accommodations.

The space
-Beatiful, spacious and sunny bedroom.
- You will receive a key for your bedroom and one for the house
- Check in and check out with lock box. Make sure you take the key with your bedroom name on it.
-If you check in after 9 pm please be respectful by not making loud noises.
- You can come and go from the house freely just mak

name: Biltmore and Brewery Base-Camp
description:
Our studio apartment is located just atop the hill above historic Biltmore Village. From here, enjoy an easy down hill (10 min) stroll through our quiet neighborhood to make your way to the action. The historic village, that once served as the logistical base-camp for the construction of the Biltmore estate, has since transformed into a boutique shopping district and is now home to 5 breweries, a distillery, and excellent dining options. The home itself is tucked away providing peace and quiet.

The space
Guests have access to a private suite but not the entire house. The studio suite includes a bedroom, bathroom, laundry room, and a kitchenette(coffee maker, mini-fridge, and microwave). Guests will have access through a private entrance.

Guest access
Guest will have access to the bottom level of the house.

Other things to note
While the down stairs unit is completely private and separate, there are often others in th

name: The Baying Hound Campground {Tent Site #2}
description:
Want to stay close to downtown Asheville and not break the bank? We're not fancy, but if you've got a tent and want to get a feel for Appalachia then you're in the right place. You will have access to a surprisingly clean outhouse and sink. The campground is tucked away in a neighborhood less than 10 minutes away from downtown Asheville. Tent sites are located in a private, 2-acre wooded valley. There are NO linens, towels or pillows provided. Please read on for more details!

The space
Site #2 has a footprint of about 10 x 10.5 feet and is located near the bamboo fence and sink.

Please just one tent per site and one car per reservation. Additional parking spots available at a fee - just ask!

THE CAMPGROUND
The Baying Hound Campground is where rural Appalachia meets “keep Asheville weird.” You’ll see sleeping pods decorated by professional artists, structures made from upcycled building materials and permaculture experiments in the ma

name: Liberty House
description:
Spacious two bedroom apartment over quiet law firm within walking distance of downtown Asheville, two blocks from Trader Joe's and one block from Harris Teeter, Chick-fil-A, Liberty House Café, Plant restaurant, Pulp & Sprout, Asheville Yoga Center. Quaint private deck and mountain views from bedroom.

The space
Kitchen, dining and living area create the main living area. Large full bath with large washer/dryer. Master bedroom with king bed and large closet. Smaller bedroom with full bed and mountain views. From the master bedroom, you must cross through a corner of the smaller bedroom to access the rest of the apartment.

Guest access
Please utilize on-street parking during weekdays except for loading and unloading. Please feel free to use parking lot behind building on nights and weekends and when loading/unloading, including groceries.

name: Green Acres Groove w/ HOT TUB,  8 Miles to ASHV
description:
The Green Acres Groove is a 3 BR / 2 Bath home positioned on a partially wooded park like setting of 2.5 acres. Enjoy the groovy retro décor and the blissful location which is centrally located to both Asheville and Hendersonville NC. The Groove is only 8 miles from downtown Asheville where you'll find the Biltmore Estate, Grove Park Inn, French Broad River Arts District. Nearby are hiking trails, mountain biking trails and hot springs, etc. Its close to everything Asheville. Enjoy!

The space
Some of the exterior phots are about 5 years old. The yard is not as nice but getting there. There is a holistic medicine & wellness center on site if guest choose to explore some pampering. It is located in the walk out basement of the home and the entrance to the center is on the back side, opposite from the entrance of the house.

Guest access
Guest have the upper floor of the house which contains plenty of art and groovy 60s décor.

name: Sweet Suite in Asheville Y'all!
description:
Location, location, location! Garden level suite w/private entrance great for exploring Asheville & Western NC. Whether you are drawn here to explore our craft brewing and beverage scene, interested in the Biltmore Estate (only a 12 min drive), want to hike or mountain bike, or experience our arts and crafts culture, this suite is for you. We offer easy access to the Blue Ridge Parkway, I-40, I-26 and downtown. Hosts can provide recommendations to make your Asheville experience memorable!

The space
*NOTE* While cleanliness has always been our priority, we are being extra diligent in our cleaning efforts in keeping with COVID-19 guidelines. We ask our guests to please share in the effort by using provided hand sanitizer or hand soap when arriving at, or returning to, the suite.

Main bedroom includes a queen size bed with a queen size futon (with an actual bed quality mattress) in the common area. The kitchenette includes a small refrigerator, micr

name: The Asheville Frog
description: Climb a set of exterior stairs thru your private entrance and enter a bright, airy, modern space with some mid-century charm. You'll be welcomed into the space by beautiful floors made from reclaimed barn wood. The open floor plan includes the living room, kitchen and dining areas. The fully equipped kitchen includes gorgeous quartz counter tops with a large peninsula that serves as a breakfast bar. Spread out on the couch with a good book or catch up on Netflix on the 55” TV. The bedroom has a super comfy queen bed, dresser and large walk-in closet. Pets are welcome with an additional pet fee of $15/pet/night.

name: Woodland Retreat w/HOT TUB & DECKS, 2 mi<DTWN
description:
Note: Our retreat is open for all stays.
Woodland Retreat boasts an outdoor hot tub just 2 miles from downtown Asheville with self check-in! Entire property is extremely private and surrounded in native plants and trees! Stand on the front deck and glimpse life at tree level and enjoy waterfall sounds.

The space
Indoor features include wifi, cable tv, great room w/ stone fireplace, + 4 bedrooms for 8. Chunns Cove is home to wildlife galore including black bears + wild turkey! Let Woodland Retreat be your perfect private getaway!

Main level living includes:
open concept great room with full kitchen, dining room, and living room with fireplace
master bedroom with king mattress
master bathroom with jetted tub and walk in glass shower
second bedroom with sleeper sofa
second full bathroom
front deck with waterfall sounds
shady back deck with charcoal grill

Ground (lower) level includes:
2 bedrooms

name: Explore Breweries, Trails, & Galleries from West Asheville
description:
Enter through sliding glass doors at the garden-level. Inside, discover a cozy living room with TV, updated bathroom, and a bedroom with lots of natural light and views of neighborhood trees. All it's lacking is a full kitchen, which is why it is listed as a private room. With no shared or common spaces, you will find this space a private, relaxing getaway to explore all Asheville has to offer.

*NOTE: It says kitchenette is shared, but it is not shared. The entire space is private. It’s a glitch in the specification of this being a “private room” even though it is its own space.

name: Beaver lake lodges 301
description:
Located five minutes from downtown, easy access to everything Asheville has to offer. The lodge is within walking distance of a YMCA, several restaurants, and Beaver Lake. The Blue Ridge parkway and many other hiking destinations are ten minutes or less drive from our site.
Our lodges have private entrances with key-less entry, fully equipped kitchens, comfortable furnishings and a memory foam air mattress with extra pillows and linens if needed. We have a pet fee of 25$ for pets per stay.

name: Heaven in Haw Creek
description: Located in East Asheville, less than 5 minutes to either the heart of downtown or the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway. Private lower level suite with private entrance, own bathroom and outdoor seating area in beautiful setting next to a creek. Direct Tv with premier package and wifi.

name: W AVL Artist's Mountain Living  5mns  to downtown
description:
Pet and Eco friendly very private home,5mns to downtown and the river Arts District
Completely renovated 1950 sqf, quiet one level artsy home on cul-de-sac opens to a huge deck, a covered pavilion, fenced backyard w fire pit patio. Sunny split plan with lg bedrooms, tiled baths , beautiful bamboo floors , granite , stainless steel appliances.
So close to downtown but as quiet as in the mountains.
5 mn to the heart of W AVL, 8mns to all Downtown destinations.
2 car garage.

The space
Many large windows bring lots of light and offer views of tall mature trees and the forest.
A wide and not very steep driveway leads to the 2 car garage which is downstairs from which you take stairs to get upstairs. Once in the house , you are staying on one level. But if you do not like stairs you can just walk from the back deck to the parking area.
We offer front loaders W/D, WiFi, HD 4K TV. Our house is minutes to the center of west

name: EastWest Asheville with Private Entrance
description:
We welcome you to our home in West Asheville. Our wonderful neighborhood is located conveniently near I-26 between Haywood Road and The French Broad River. Here you will have a cozy, safe place that offers you a private entrance while visiting and exploring the area. Within blocks is New Belgium and a bit further across the bridge is the River Arts District.

The space
Your home away from home includes a private entrance and separation from the rest of the house. Inside you'll find a double bed, mini fridge, microwave, and water boiler along with some other kitchen items.

name: Laura's Landing
description:
Fabulous location - inside and out - for couples or singles who want a VERY clean space and a private landscaped patio within walking distance to downtown and the South Slope. Laura’s Landing is in a small community next to a wooded area where you’re guaranteed to see a diversity of wildlife - and with luck, the occasional bear! We take pride in providing the best experience for our guests and love to help make your special occasions, truly memorable! Check out the reviews for yourself!

The space
Access your "Homestay" at grade level down the driveway at the back of the main house through your own private, nicely landscaped, patio with a bench and table for relaxing with your morning coffee. There is also a bistro table if you wish to use carry out or delivery.

The bedroom has a spacious feel with 10' ceilings and 2 large windows. It has a queen size bed, a small fridge (no ice maker), microwave, electric tea kettle with an assortment of teas, a Keur

name: #3 Dogwood Room - Oakland Cottage B&B
description:
Dogwood #3 is a wonderful Queen bedroom on the first floor with it's own outside porch & private entry. The entry foyer to the Dogwood Room, has a daybed for an extra guest. Full private bath, cable TV, complimentary WIFI & off-street parking (just steps from your private entrance), in-room mini fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Breakfast is healthy and hearty! Served each morning in the dining area with other guests. Additional common areas & amenities available to all guests at the inn.

The space
Wonderful full and hot breakfast each morning in the main dining area of the B&B, included with your room reservation.

Guest access
Enjoy extra space during your stay - fireplace in main living room, tea, coffee in dining area available all day, butler's pantry open to all guests - with extra fridge/ freezer with ice, dish ware and glassware available for your use.

Other things to note
Dogwood room has an additional
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: 2 BR Private Apartment Under 3 Miles to Downtown
description:
Private Apt with mountain views in a a secluded neighborhood 2.5 miles from Town.

Brand New Rustic Chic Apt includes King and Queen Bedrooms, Full bath with Deep soaking tub, sleeper sofa, and kitchen.

Access downtown or River Arts District in under 10 minutes. Drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway in 20 minutes. Take a stroll around Beaver Lake 1/4 mile away.

Our Airbnb is designed for couples or families looking to enjoy a wonderful vacation!

Fully regulated and in code with Asheville.

The space
This 2 bedroom completely separate apartment provides you with the close proximity to Asheville you desire along with stunning mountain views, nearby walking trails, and plenty of entertainment options.

Guest access
Guests will have their own private apartment completely separate from us.

Other things to note
A 2 car parking area is available for guests. We cannot guarantee addition

name: Peaceful home & walk to downtown West Asheville
description:
Lovely home in peaceful neighborhood only a 10 minute walk to downtown West Asheville. Private Garden Level rooms with private bath and outside patio for relaxing and enjoying nature while laying in a hammock with beautiful song birds of many colors to enjoy. 5 minute walk to Carrier Park, this Park is such a little gem, with a beautiful prairie filled with wild flowers and walks along the French Broad River.
Come enjoy Asheville and have a restful nights sleep in my little sanctuary.

The space
The space is equip with a refrigerator, electrical plate, pots and dishes. If you need more to be comfortable or plan on cooking big meals, please ask me and use of the Kitchen is available.

Other things to note
Please respect my home and the neighborhood and ENJOY your visit.

There is a $20 per fluffy, per night fee.

name: Hidden Gem Minutes From The Biltmore House
description:
Hidden Gem with Mountain Views Nestled approximately 10 Minutes from Downtown Asheville and the Biltmore House! Only a Couple of Minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and major interstates.

The space
Come and relax in this 3 bedroom 2.5 bath house in a secluded neighborhood.

A great house to stay in while you experience all that Asheville and the surrounding area has to offer. All bedrooms are located on the 2nd floor.

We provide linens and towels to our guests along with soap products. We have a crib located in the Queen Sized bedroom. The kitchen is equipped and ready for use.

A driveway is available for up to 3 compact cars or 2 small SUVs.

PLEASE NOTE THAT THE DRIVEWAY IS VERY, VERY SHORT AND STEEP.

STREET PARKING IS NOT ALLOWED UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES WHATSOEVER. ALL VEHICLES ASSOCIATED WITH THE RESERVATION OF THIS PROPERTY MUST BE FULLY PARKED IN THE DRIVEWAY ASSOCIATED WITH THIS PROPERTY. OTHERWISE,

name: Tour the Blue Ridge Parkway from a Loft in the Countryside
description: Get a taste of quiet country living next to a peaceful pasture. Gaze at woodlands and mountains from a window and find a cozy loveseat to curl up on and read. Explore nearby breweries and return for a great night's sleep under a tall pitched roof. Ask about special packages including Honeymoon, Birthday, Anniversary and the local Asheville package.

name: The Sanctuary - Asheville
description:
Peaceful home w/ private suite. Quiet culdesac next to UNCA and botanical gardens. 5 mins to downtown, 2 min walk to Saturday Farmer's Market. Private entrance, facing the woods. Suite includes a nice sized bedroom, full bathroom, laundry and private porch. I keep a very clean, peaceful and beautiful home. I am a massage therapist and yoga instructor, and if you'd like to book a massage, ThaiVedic bodywork, or private yoga during your stay, let me know!

The space
Peaceful, mindful home with clean and clear vibes. Immersed in nature, next to downtown. Simple, unique.

Guest access
Your private suite, bathroom and porch.

name: Downtown Getaway + Modern Bungalow / FRONT SUITE
description:
Private Room within a Shared home. I offer two suites within the home and a third I live in. GREAT location! Walk downtown in 5-10 minutes! This Newly renovated Historic Asheville home with modern amenities is the perfect place to recharge after a day of Adventuring around our lovely little town!

There are three grocery stores within a 3 minute walk, and a favorite Local Diner around the corner!

This is a shared home. Shared space include Living Room, Dining Room, Kitchen and Bathroom.

The space
This CLEAN and COMFORTABLE home boasts brand new STAINLESS STEEL kitchen appliances, original HARDWOOD FLOORS, and even a RECORD COLLECTION.

Enjoy a movie or your favorite show from the comfort of your incredibly comfortable queen size memory foam mattress, or use the WIFI to work remote or catch up with friends!

Take a long hot shower in the beautiful modern bathroom, or have a glass of wine in an Adirondack chair on the

name: Family Getaway - Close to Downtown!
description:
Our home is located on a quiet, peaceful cul de sac only 12 minutes from downtown Asheville. The house is on 1.25 acre with a heavily treed area in the back and a treehouse!
The house is 1.5 miles from Woodfin Riverside Park, which is an awesome place to spend time fishing, kayaking, riding bikes, or just relaxing! Grab coffee at High Five!
*We’ve implemented a cleaning protocol set by our county including sanitizing all surfaces and washing all bedspreads in between guests.

The space
We have a gorgeous balcony off the dining room, with comfortable couch seating as well as a dining area and fire pit. The sunroom is a lovely space with a sunny, indoor dining area and couches. There are lots of toys for children to play with, as well as a swing set and trampoline. The home is fully stocked with everything you could possibly need for a great vacation! We provide linens, coffee and cream, and a fully stocked kitchen with everything you need to cook meals! B

name: Spacious and Private Guest Suite Centrally Located
description:
Problem Solved! Spacious private guestroom in a quiet neighborhood with beautiful mountain views and close access to the best of Asheville's downtown and Blue Ridge Parkway National Forrest. The space is very large at just under 300 sq/ft and completely private. It is equipped with a queen bed and love seat style couch. A pack and play can be provided upon request, as well. The space is also equipped with a mini-fridge, Kuerig coffee maker, and microwave.

The space
Our neighborhood is tucked away among the main thoroughfares of Asheville. This means easy access to all attractions while also being able to enjoy the quiet serenity of the mountains. We are happy to accommodate extra quests with an air mattress or pack and play.

Guest access
You will have access to a large guest room on the first floor of the house. There is a bathroom and closet in the room. It also has it's own private entrance. This entrance is located at the back of the hou

name: The Bluebird Getaway
description:
Spacious and Serene 3 bedroom house just minutes from downtown AVL. Great location! Large deck off a big kitchen and lush green forest behind. Feels like you are living in the trees! Near end of cul-de-sac so quiet and private, but close to everything. Great city park just down the street with hiking, biking trails, and frisbee golf course. Large master bedroom with ensuite bath and two more bedrooms with a shared bathroom. Plenty of parking!

The space
This home is situated in a perfect location. Just 3 miles to the heart of downtown and easy access to anything and anywhere Asheville has to offer. The bustling River Arts District is only about 1.5 miles away and there are food and music venues even closer, including White Duck Taco, New Belgium Brewery and more! Relax on the large back deck while listening to the birds and nature. There are only trees and greenery to take up the view. Or head to Richmond Hill Park just down the street for some disc golf, or

name: Cozy Modern Camper & Canoe- Close to DT and Hiking
description:
Modern camper in quiet neighborhood in East Asheville, 10 minutes from Downtown and 5 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway. AC, heat, stovetop for light cooking, kitchen sink, mini fridge, microwave, and a small bathroom with toilet, sink and shower. Hot water heater for shower that works great (as long as it isn’t freezing outside). Queen size bed as well as a sit around Dinette area that has the ability to transform into a bed. Bluetooth built-in speakers as well. TV with hdmi hookups.

The space
Cozy 20 foot R-Pod Camper In quiet neighborhood close to downtown, breweries, and hiking/sunset drives on the Blue Ridge Parkway

Other things to note
We’ve just added free use of our Canoe for use in the French Broad River (or wherever). Please let us know ahead of time if you’d like to use, so we can have it prepared with proper ropes, etc for attaching to your roof rack.

name: Light, open home w/ chef's kitchen, screened porch
description:
Luxurious home in a quiet neighborhood, close to everything. Huge windows provide tons of natural light. Open floor plan with chef's dream kitchen & comfortable bedrooms.

Fabulous outdoor spaces for cooking out or just relaxing. Covered porch is a true oasis. Escape there with a book and a glass of wine or share with friends after dinner.

Walking distance from the Folk Art Center and the Blue Ridge Parkway. 5 minutes to downtown, 10 minutes to world famous Biltmore Estate.

The space
Luxurious home in a quiet neighborhood. Huge windows provide tons of natural light. Open floor plan with chef's dream kitchen including a pro-style range and hood and a refrigerator that has internet connection and plays music! Complete remodel completed July 2019 so colors will be different from pictures.

Fabulous outdoor spaces for cooking out or just relaxing. Front porch has a beautiful view of the mountains, back porch with table and chai

name: 80 LEX : Apartment 202 : Iconic Downtown Location
description:
ONE BEDROOM/ ONE PRIVATE FULL BATHROOM/ 566 SQ FT
They say that wherever you go, there you are.

We say, when you go to Asheville, this is where you want to be. Right here, in the heart of Asheville. Right here, on N. Lexington Ave., in a building once home to farmers and growers and today the heart of all things trendy, artsy and quintessential.

The space
Right here, in Unit 202 at 80 LEX: in an ultra-sleek, über-chic 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment that epitomizes the heart, soul and spirit of trendy Asheville.

Because here, in 566 square-feet of industrial loft space, exposed brick, pops of color, and layered textures, Unit 202 offers an only-in-Asheville kind of retreat: handpicked décor and vintage furnishings, curated artwork and upholstered barn doors.

A home-away-from-home that is both on trend and yet, thoroughly welcoming. A rental above trendy shops and on the same block as Asheville’s hottest restaurants

name: The Baying Hound Campground {Tent Site #1}
description:
Want to stay close to downtown Asheville and not break the bank? We're not fancy, but if you've got a tent and want to get a feel for Appalachia then you're in the right place. You will have access to a surprisingly clean outhouse and sink. The campground is tucked away in a neighborhood less than 10 minutes away from downtown Asheville. Tent sites are located in a private, 2-acre wooded valley. There are NO linens, towels or pillows provided. Please read on for more details!

The space
Site #1 has a footprint of about 11 x 14 feet and is located next to the bamboo fence. This site probably has the best wifi out of all the sites. :)

Please just one tent per site and one car per reservation. Additional parking spots available at a fee - just ask!

name: Craft Beer Home - Free Kegerator of Local AVL Beer
description:
*The home includes a free 1/2bbl kegerator of local craft beer*

Let's be serious, besides the tremendous amount of local art, hiking, history and music... You're here to experience Asheville's world famous beer scene! Come experience the life of a local Asheville Brewer. The Craft Beer Home is a luxurious 2500 sqft fully craft beer inspired home, covered head to toe in artwork and regenerated brewing equipment, including an elegant dining table built from a stainless steel $15k brewing skid.

The space
Located just 9 minutes from Downtown Asheville and 7 minutes from the famous West Asheville, this large home is perfect for families, revisiting friends, bachelor and bachelorettee groups, work retreats, etc...

The Craft Beer Home includes:
*Keyless entry
*Two living rooms with large 4K Roku TVs
-Stereo with AUX chord hookup
*50+Mbs Wifi
*Four brand new king size beds
-Each bed includes 4 incredible k

name: Relaxing private suite  Us and Biltmore !
description:
Located in South Asheville, and a quick 15 minutes from many of Asheville's top attractions. 3 miles to the Biltmore House, 3 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway and a short 15-minute drive or Uber to the heart of downtown. Please come enjoy a slice of our Mountain Bliss!

The space
We welcome you into your own guest suite, with a private entrance, bedroom and living room. The spacious bedroom features a full-sized bed and full bathroom. The living room includes a flat-screen tv with cable, a comfy couch, a microwave and mini-fridge. We keep the suite stocked with coffee, tea, cold water, games and many books collected over the years (personally I enjoy murder mysteries, so you’ll find quite a few of those). It’s homey and quiet – perfect for relaxing after a day of business or exploring!

Guest access
Private entrance to the suite, which is the bottom-level of the house. Parking available on the driveway.

Other things to note

name: Honey's Place: Asheville • River Arts • Biltmore
description:
Honey's Place is a private, modern, garden-level 2 bedroom apartment. Dog-friendly (woof). Conveniently located 5 miles (10-15 mins drive) from Downtown and the River Arts district. Easy access to I-26, UNC-Asheville, and the Biltmore Estate. Clean, quiet, and spacious with a full kitchen. Wake up to complementary coffee and tea. Luxury, hypoallergenic bed linens on all beds and original art on the walls. Stay here to relax, recharge, and explore the winter beauty of Asheville!

The space
Guests will enjoy the convenience of a fully equipped kitchen with a refrigerator, microwave, four-burner stove & oven, and coffee maker. Complimentary coffee and tea as well as breakfast bars are provided to help you greet the day and your adventures in Asheville!

We welcome well-behaved dogs (with additional $50 pet fee), but no cats. Note: If you bring your pet, we ask that you do let them up on the sofa or beds.

In addition, the apartment offers self che

name: Very Special Downtown Asheville Loft, Free Parking
description:
Come stay in this very special loft, located in historic downtown Asheville, a romantic and unique city surrounded by the beauty of Western North Carolina's mountains.

Our loft is on the 3rd floor of a private and secure building, renovated and beautifully furnished to include a king size bed more comfortable than the one at home, a 52' television, satellite radio, central air, and a fully equipped kitchen with granite countertops.

Enjoy local eateries and breweries right outside your door.

Guest access
All of loft

name: West AVL Landing Pad
description:
Complete privacy. This spacious room has its own full bathroom, entry way, private deck and is separated from the rest of the home by a lockable doorway. This cozy accommodation features views of downtown, a centralized location, off-street parking and a very comfortable king size bed.

Features hardwood floors, large closets, full private bathroom, mini-fridge, coffee maker, wine glasses, and more thoughtful amenities.

The space
Located in West Asheville, only 1.5 miles from downtown and very convenient to the Interstate. Local restaurants are within walking distance (Green Tea Sushi and Gypsy Queen) with all that downtown and west Asheville have to offer within a short drive.

Guest access
Guests have their own private parking spot, back deck, back entrance, bathroom and bedroom. The back end of the house is completely yours!

Other things to note
Air BnB COVID cleaning protocols in place with an air puri

name: Retreat in Luxury with Nature ~ Relax and enjoy!
description:
Your treetop retreat awaits you!
Bright, airy studio + loft area with separate bed. Large wall of windows overlooks the gorgeous mountains of Asheville. Private entrance. Stargaze from your private deck. Explore local restaurants and breweries. Catch the waterfalls!

Walk from your doorstep to
-Hiking trails behind us
-Farmers Market downhill (.3 mi)
-UNCA
-Botanical Gardens

**GROVE PARK INN is 1.5 miles

5 min drive to the heart of downtown.

Cable TV with premium channels and bathtub.

The space
Entire place: Your large, bright airy studio has a
- private porch with 4 deck chairs and a small table
- kitchenette that meets the Asheville code (no stove tops allowed) with coffee maker, microwave, blender and small fridge.
- bathroom with a tub and a window
- open loft space with an additional, super comfy queen bed.
It’s BRIGHT with a wall of windows and a breathta

name: Lorena's House
description:
Charming and spacious 2200sf 3 BR/2 BA house with MTN view. Private country home with a large yard. Minutes away from Asheville outlets mall, Restaurants, Blue Ridge Parkway, Bent Creek Arboretum and Zen’s Tubing.
Only 15 Minutes to Downtown Asheville, Sierra Nevada Brewery, Asheville Airport, Biltmore House and Gardens, Grove Park Inn and many other Asheville attractions.

The space
Lovely Master bedroom with King Size bed and Master Bathroom.
Second and third bedrooms have queen size beds and share the second bathroom.
Large Living Room with Leather Sofas and a 55” HD Television includes cable and wifi. Adjoining game room with pool table. Den or reading room with beautiful bow window.
Kitchen includes Stove, Refrigerator, dishwasher, Microwave, Toaster Oven, Toaster, Coffee Machine, Blender, Cooking utensils and dishes.
Dining Room seats six.
Enjoy your morning coffee or evening drink on a cozy Upper Balcony with beautiful mountai

name: Tiny Home at the Gardens—Near Center of Asheville
description:
A pocket of peace just outside city limits. Tiny Home sits on hill overlooking two-acre organic farm, sustainable nursery, meadows and surrounding mountains. Feels like you're in the country, yet you're a 10-15 min drive from the eclectic downtown, famous Biltmore, and arts districts. The pine-cedar paneled 8'x24' house is bright and sunny with high ceilings. Full-size bath/tub. Comfy queen-size bed. Full-size mattress in loft. Well-equipped kitchen. Composting toilet. High sanitation standards.

The space
Whether you'd like a unique place to stay while exploring Asheville, or are seeking a therapeutic and educational farm retreat, this place suits all types of needs. While Asheville is well-known for its restaurants (which you should definitely explore), this region also has many exceptional small farms, and you're staying at one of them! (Called M. R. Gardens). We offer the option for guests to purchase a seasonal harvest, which we'll send you information about

name: West Asheville Private Studio Apartment
description:
Entire lower level studio apartment with private entrance, off street parking in guest dedicated driveway in an established West Asheville neighborhood. A comfortable, clean, safe place where you can sleep sound and rest easy. Close to many restaurants that charge minimal take out delivery fee.

The space
Premium queen bed mattress with protect-a-bed cover and pillow protectors, dresser, full size mirror, bedside tables, living room recliners, 45 inch flat screen TV with Roku. Bathroom is small but cozy with a standup tiled shower. Your linens include thick Boutique Egyptian Cotton towels and wash clothes, soft 600 thread count sheets and a quilt or comforter.

Plenty of plates, bowls, glasses and flatware in studio kitchenette. Studio has full size fridge / freezer, microwave, large toaster oven, coffee maker, double sink with a disposal.

Studio is 3.6 miles west of downtown Asheville. Bus stop two blocks away serving three different

name: Boho-Chic Apartment One Mile from Downtown Asheville
description:
Follow the Tennessee field stones to happy hour sunsets and mountain views from your private patio, complete with a fire pit for those cool mountain nights. This bohemian haven offers vintage pieces, handmade and artful decor, and a sweet look at local life.

Please be aware that as of August 18 2021, Asheville/Buncombe County is requiring face coverings inside commercial businesses regardless of vaccination status. This includes restaurants, stores, & tourist attractions.

*We as hosts assume no responsibility for the impact of business closures on your travel experience.*

name: Studio #1 / Modern Design / 8 mins  to DWTN AVL
description:
Only 8 mins. drive to downtown & 5 mins. drive to Biltmore Estate, this sleek and modern studio apartment in a quiet residential neighborhood is a comfortable, stylish oasis and home base for exploring all of Asheville. Artfully appointed and all brand new!

The space
Efficiently designed studio space with many architectural details and all original fine art. 16' x 25' (375 sq ft) European aesthetics and compact design with kitchenette as prescribed by code/homestay guidelines. WiFi and Bluetooth speaker provided. No television.

Guest access
There is a locked fire door between rental space and main house. Completely autonomous and private studio unit with it's own entrance.

Other things to note
Close to all the breweries and attractions in South Slope, the Biltmore Village, River Arts District and East Asheville. Also only 2 minutes to The Blue Ridge Parkway which has beautiful vistas and hikes no matter the season. E

name: Cave Creek Hideaway
description:
Enjoy this private space tucked into the woods of South Asheville, conveniently located to downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, Arboretum, Blue Ridge Parkway, WNC Ag Center, Asheville Outlet Mall, hiking trails, and Sierra Nevada Brewing while still allowing you to enjoy a quiet mountain retreat.

The space
We live on two-acres of wooded property set back about a half mile from the main road. The house is three stories, and you will have access to the entire bottom floor. There are three bedrooms available, two smaller dorm sized rooms (one with a queen bed, the other with a full) as well as a larger bedroom with a queen bed. All rooms have barn doors with locks. Each bedroom has a tranquility sound soother machine with various relaxing sounds for better sleep and stress relief, a small room fan and room size heater for your personal comfort. Dressers and closets are available for guests to unpack, and all three bedrooms have fresh bedding changed after each

name: Eclectic Industrial Apartment in Historical Building
description: Embrace the unique charm of this boutique space in an iconic red brick property. The loft-inspired private apartment features exposed original walls, dark surfaces, contrasting textures and patterns, an array of unique furnishings, and curated artwork throughout.

name: Industrial Chic Meets the Old World in Downtown Asheville
description: Wake up next to striking exposed brickwork in 80 LEX Apartment 204, designed to epitomize the chic and rustic flavor of trendy Asheville. It boasts soaring ceilings with a curated collection of antique and new furnishings, and thickly layered textures, colors and patterns.

name: West Asheville Artist Sanctuary
description:
Charming artist retreat in the heart of West Asheville. A light-filled, uplifting atmosphere with colorful, whimsical decor and an expansive back deck for sunsets and libations. This is the perfect place to relax, recharge and reset. 25 min. walk to Haywood Rd. and West Asheville's restaurants, breweries, stores, and more! 5 minute drive to Downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, River Arts District, The Arboretum, farmer's markets, and the French Broad. EZ access to frwys & anywhere in WNC!

The space
French provincial brick, built in 1925, restored in 2015. Lush and beautiful front garden, filled with colorful flowers and indigenous plants. Large back deck with patio furniture and string lights for a peaceful evening under the stars.

Guest access
The guests have access to the entire main house with 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, living room, dining room, sunroom and large outdoor deck.
The basement is Not included.
Because the City of As

name: Entire Guest Suite w/private entrance
description: Conveniently located in East Asheville, less than 5 minutes to either the heart of downtown or the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway. Private lower level suite with private entrance, own bathroom and outdoor seating area in beautiful setting next to a creek. Direct Tv with premier package and wifi.

name: Lockhart Lodge @ Bent Creek
description:
Pet friendly home in sought after Bent Creek neighborhood that is less than 5 minutes from the awe inspiring Blue Ridge Parkway; the magnificent North Carolina Arboretum; the ever popular Pisgah Forest hiking and biking trails; the rafting and tubing friendly French Broad River; and the Asheville Outlets hosting over 40 name brand outlets!! This home is perfect for mountain bikers, motorcyclists, bird watchers, pet lovers, serious outlet shoppers, hikers and kayakers - just to name a few!!

The space
This home is totally newly remodeled, inside and outside. The home boasts three bedrooms with new queen size beds and mattress toppers for your comfort. The two bathrooms are spacious and updated with modern decor. The kitchen has new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and large capacity refrigerator with ice maker. Stairs lead down to the spacious den, laundry room and finished garage. Large fenced in back yard is ideal for your pets or childr

name: Chateau on Patton Mountain! Minutes to downtown!
description:
Welcome to the Mountains! This beautiful and private 4BD/3.5BA home features hardwood floors, large bedrooms, walk in closets, stainless appliances, pool table, 12 person hot tub, garden tub, 2 master suites (one on each level), MOUNTAIN VIEWS and to top it off its just a 5 minute drive to downtown Asheville! Just so you know we are in the process of JUST getting this on AirBnb and still filling it up with furnishings so I am adding pictures each day. It will be available for July 4th Weekend!

Guest access
Everything but the garage. Thank you for understanding

Other things to note
Please lock your doors and do NOT leave trash or food outside. There are bears in this community and they have been known to open car doors and get in them! Keep doors closed to home as well or they may come inside and find your popcorn!

name: Luxury apartment - giant views minutes from town.
description:
Terrace level private apartment only 2.5 miles from downtown with amazing mountain views. Lower level of owner's home with private entrance, deck, living room, bedroom and bathroom. No shared spaces in listing and privacy is ensured. High speed wifi and smart TV (no cable) included. Home is air conditioned. Peaceful, wooden setting, shady deck overlooking garden with western, mountain views. New mattress, luxury linens, walk in shower, hardwood floors and extremely clean.

The space
Large, one bedroom apartment with private bathroom, living room and deck. Kuerig coffee maker provided with all other hotel amenities.

Guest access
Private entrance with keypad lock

Other things to note
Entire lower level of home with incredible mountain views from bedroom, living area, deck and yard. Your area is completely private, quiet and a true mountain escape.

name: West Asheville Rustic Studio
description:
Located in the heart of West Asheville, quiet, cozy space that provides everything you need for your get away to Asheville. Kitchen area has coffee maker, fridge and microwave. Private entrance and patio is perfect for morning coffee outside. Walking distance to everything on Haywood Road. 5 minutes to downtown Asheville, 6 miles to the Biltmore House. Convenient to I-26, I-40 and off of I-240.

Other things to note
There is off road parking for 1 vehicle in the driveway. If you need to park an additional vehicle please let me know ahead of time.

name: Southern Comfort
description:
Entire house, 2 bedroom pet friendly home with fenced yard, quiet deck, fire pit, and outdoor soaking tub! For those who wish to bring their fuzzy friend (or not) to visit and explore Asheville and surroundings. 3mi (less than 10 min) to west Asheville, 6mi (less than 15 min) to downtown and only 2 miles from I-40 and I-26!
Be aware: cats and dogs live here routinely so be mindful of allergies. The dogs and cats will leave for your stay. Complimentary beverages!

The space
Quiet, close to everything, pet friendly with a large fenced yard to play! Private outdoor tub to soak and enjoy the sounds of the creek.
The master bath has the shower; your friends in the 2nd bedroom will need to enter the master bedroom to use the shower. They have a half bath of their own.
Due to the coronavirus, I am taking extra care to sanitize frequently touched surfaces between reservations

Guest access
Everywhere is available except my closet. I

name: Beautiful upstairs Montfort apartment (3/4)
description:
Spacious downtown apartment in 4-unit historic Montford home. Fully equipped kitchen & furnished; linens provided.
There are 3 other units that have other guest living in them. You will have a parking space in the gravel area in back. Where other guest will park.
It's only a short walk to downtown where you can find award-winning restaurants, entertainment, coffee shops, breweries, & shopping.

The space
This is an upstairs unit. The kitchen has cooking tools. A Queen size bed. A private entrance and bathroom

Other things to note
Guest are responsible for taking the trash and the recycling down to the street on Tuesdays. You will need to look up the recycling days

Shampoo and conditioner, paper towels, toilet paper, dish soap, and soap are not provided throughout the stay (since we mostly do long term stays only)

name: West Asheville Gem! *Laundry service included!
description:
Located in fun and funky West Asheville, this lovely private apartment is within walking distance of iconic Haywood Road, full of charming shops, eateries, music venues, breweries, etc.! It's amazingly convenient to Asheville's famous River Arts District, the Arboretum, Carrier Park, downtown Asheville, Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Estate, and anywhere else you care to explore!

Offering plenty of natural light, the apartment is a welcoming and sparkling clean home away from home.

The space
The fully equipped kitchen has a stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, coffee maker, and all the eating & cooking utensils you'll need. The bedroom bed and living area sofabed both have new queen mattresses. The bathroom has a tub/shower combination.

Complimentary WiFi and"smart" TV with Showtime.

An outside set of steps lead from your paved parking area to your private entrance. A lock box holds the apartment's entry key for self check-i

name: Sunflower Cottage
description:
This cottage was recently built and has all of the amenities to make your stay luxurious.

The kitchen has a brand new gas oven, granite countertops and a large porcelain farm sink for preparing meals. There is also a Bosch dishwasher for easy cleanup.

The main level has an open floor plan with loads of windows, gentle sunlight, and beautiful white oak hardwood floors through out. There is also a covered front porch and a covered back deck for relaxing.

The bath on the main floor has a jacuzzi whirlpool tub for bathing and a marble vanity for getting ready to spend a night on the town.

The upstairs bath has a walk in limestone shower with detachable shower head as well as a relaxing rain shower. You can sit on the built in bench and let all of your stress flow down the drain.

Both bedrooms have king sized beds and plenty of space to hang up belongings.

There is also a new Samsung washer and dryer upstairs.

name: **Asheville's Good Vibes Suite** (pet friendly)
description:
Come enjoy some peace and tranquility in our brand-new, open-floorplan, spacious apartment suite!
Interested in breweries? Within three miles, there are dozens of breweries, including our favorites: Wicked Weed & New Belgium!
Other points of interest: it sits four miles to the center of downtown, just over a mile to Crest Pavilion, nine miles to the Biltmore Estate, within ten miles of numerous hiking trails along the Blue Ridge Parkway. Your suite is private and quite but close to so much!

The space
To start off you can put your mind at ease since we have our suite professionally cleaned and sanitized by a local cleaning company that has been in business for over 20 years!
We have been and will continue to follow the guidelines given from the CDC

We just finished building our home and added this lower level one bedroom apartment suite so we could share our tranquil space with those visiting our lovely town. It has an open floorplan.

name: Visit the Biltmore House from Beautiful Wood-Rich Home
description: Gaze through the massive floor-to-ceiling windows to take in forest views from every room of this home set among the treetops. Eclectic furnishings and antiques are evident throughout, along with sculpture and art from local Asheville artists.

name: Pet friendly basement studio apt in West Asheville
description:
This is a pleasant and cozy(small) basement apartment.
There is a comfy futon with springs similar to a bed, and also a Queen size bed.
We are 5 minutes from West Asheville shops and restaurants, and 10 to 15 minutes from downtown.
I provide towels,soap, bedding, coffee and water.
There is also a smart TV with Spectrum TV

Guest access
The studio apartment and back yard.

Other things to note
You are welcome to use the yard which is fenced along the sides

name: Downtown Getaway + Modern Bungalow / SIDE SUITE
description:
Private Room within a Shared home. I offer two suites within the home and a third I live in. GREAT location! Walk downtown in 5-10 minutes! This Newly renovated Historic Asheville home with modern amenities is the perfect place to recharge after a day of Adventuring around our lovely little town!

There are three grocery stores within a 3 minute walk, and a favorite Local Diner around the corner!

This is a shared home. Shared space includes Living Room, Dining Room, Kitchen and Bathroom.

The space
This CLEAN and COMFORTABLE home boasts brand new STAINLESS STEEL kitchen appliances, original HARDWOOD FLOORS, and even a RECORD COLLECTION.

Enjoy a movie or your favorite show from the comfort of your incredibly comfortable queen size memory foam mattress, or use the WIFI to work remote or catch up with friends!

Take a long hot shower in the beautiful modern bathroom, or have a glass of wine in an Adirondack chair on th

name: Private , Peaceful 1 Bedroom Apt.
description:
Beautiful, fully equipped apartment on a mountain surrounded by trees yet just 10 minutes from downtown Asheville and 15 minutes from Biltmore & the Blue Ridge Parkway. You will appreciate coming home to the peace and quiet of this lovely space after exploring the vibrancy of all that the Asheville area has to offer. Enjoy a beautiful sunset on the spacious outdoor patio with tables & chairs or roasting marshmallows while relaxing in the fire circle area.
(Pack & Play available upon request)

The space
Completely renovated apartment with all new appliances, furniture & queen sized memory foam mattress with luxury linens and pillows. Fully equipped kitchen if you chose to prepare your own meals and plenty of space for outdoor dining. There is a smart TV in each room plus a cozy gas fireplace in the living area. Tucked away and completely private , surrounded by trees, you are sure to enjoy a full mountain experience.

Guest access

name: King Room with Breakfast in Asheville
description:
Indulge in an authentic b&b experience with amenities. Be a guest at our 1905 inn, located in historic Montford, 1 mile from downtown Asheville and near UNC-Asheville. Private king room with ensuite clawfoot tub/shower. Homemade breakfast at 9am. Quiet street with free parking and great location. Walk to downtown, just 3 miles to Biltmore, and convenient to interstates and Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
Beautiful restored 5 guest room B&B with over 1 acre of secluded gardens. Welcome to Pinecrest Bed & Breakfast!

This king room is named the Cowley Room after the first owners of Pinecrest. Your accommodations include premium king mattress with luxurious linens by Comphy Company. Located on the second floor in the rear of the house, two windows overlook our lush back yard. Our signature robes hang on the back of the door and the bathroom is fully equipped with Turkish towels, soap, shampoo, and hair dryer. Flat screen TV in room with cable and two
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Downtown Asheville in Comfort, Style & Value! -#10
description:
For budget travelers who want to be downtown! Convenient location. No frills & not a fancy B&B. A place with history, character & real people. Clean & comfortable historic 100+year-old rooming house with a front porch, balcony and shared bathrooms. One of several short term rental rooms, this spacious second floor room has a queen-size bed, is air conditioned in summer, includes a mini refrigerator, sink, table & chairs, wifi. Lockable and clean. Bathrooms are shared with other guests.

The space
This is a spacious second floor room with a queen size bed, high ceiling and plenty of natural light.

At the Gray Rock Inn, downtown Asheville is right outside your door, and our reasonable rates mean your money can be spent on enjoying the city. Conveniently located on Biltmore Ave. and an easy walk to breweries, music venues, art galleries, boutiques and restaurants.

The Gray Rock Inn is a great value, a "no frills" but clean and comfy place to ex

name: Brookeside Cozy Cottage - Near Downtown Asheville
description:
Enjoy your stay at our warm and cozy detached cottage that offers you privacy and is only five minutes to the fun of downtown Asheville, under five minutes to the University of North Carolina Asheville campus, and close to the Biltmore House and Blue Ridge Parkway.

The cottage stands alone along a quaint brook with seating and tables.
Listen to the many sounds of numerous birds!

The space
The cottage offers one bedroom with a queen sized bed, and a living room with a convertible sofa that opens into a full sized bed, sleeping up to four adults total.

There is one full bathroom with shower, and a fully equipped kitchen.

There are TV's in the living room and bedroom with Roku streaming devices. A folding computer desk is available for extra workspace when needed.

The cottage is located just minutes from downtown Asheville, yet feels secluded and private. Uber and Lyft are available in the area and average $8 - $10

name: The Peaceful East
description:
Your home away from home! Pull into your own private single-car garage and step into a cozy daylight basement apartment that's full of southern charm. This completely private, one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment features a full kitchen, washer/dryer, and a private outdoor patio that faces a half-acre of wooded area. A peaceful neighborhood only 12 minutes to the heart of downtown, 10 minutes to the Asheville Mall, and about 5 minutes to access the Blue Ridge Parkway. Come on in and stay a while!

The space
When you arrive, you will pull into your own private single-car garage. We provide coded access to the garage so that you can check in at your convenience. The keypad is located on the left inside panel of the garage door. More information about check-in is provided after booking. The garage space is also where the washer/dryer is located.

The door inside the garage walks directly into your living area, which features a small sectional, cozy armchair

name: Great! private: very close to airport, AVL, hiking
description:
*Hosts fully vaccinated for COVID-19*
Very quiet, clean, and cozy! The perfect relaxing home base for adventures. Walk to Blue Ghost Brewing or go outside and spot white squirrels. Just a few minutes from the Asheville Airport, WNC Ag Center, and Sierra Nevada. Asheville, Hendersonville, and Brevard are all a 15-20 minute drive. Many attractions are close by including the Biltmore Estate as well as Pisgah, DuPont and the Blue Ridge Pkwy for those who enjoy hiking,biking, and waterfalls.

The space
You will have access to the downstairs of my home. Your bedroom and bathroom will be completely private. We may come to the lower level to use the laundry room or shared living area during your stay.

Guest access
You are welcome to use the downstairs living area on the same level as your bedroom.

Other things to note
Check-in: 6pm or after
Check-out:10am

There are very sweet dogs on the property. There

name: 3 Mile Cabin - 3 miles to Downtown, Hot Tub, Views
description:
Beautiful, super clean cozy cabin, designed for 2 but can sleep 4 (futon sofa), fully stocked kitchen with gas grill and outdoor fire ring (firewood provided). Beautiful views of the Blue Ridge Mountains and the sheep pasture on our property. Very private, parking, cable, Netflix, Amazon Prime, WiFi, 4 person hot tub. Great home base to explore Asheville, downtown is only 3 miles away, as well as a short distance to the Blue Ridge Parkway (10 miles), Biltmore House (6 miles).

The space
Private, Amish built cabin built on part of our 2.5 acre homestead, our home is located on the other side of the property. Watch sheep graze, rabbits play, and chickens free range in our pasture from the front porch. Beautiful year round views, covered porch, private outdoor seating area with hot tub, 600 feet off the road, very quiet. Cabin is one bedroom, designed for 2, has futon sofa and can sleep 1 or 2 more, it's 400 sq feet inside with 100 sq ft. porch outside.

name: Convenience, Charm and Comfort
description:
You'll love this spacious and airy apartment nestled in the historic tree lined Montford District. Delight in eclectic sun filled rooms with old world charm. This one bedroom, fully outfitted, rental has been recently, lovingly, and completely remodeled. You will find yourself wishing you never have to leave...

The space
This bright and homey apartment is in a recently renovated historic building which boasts all the modern conveniences but maintains its 1923 character.
You will enjoy light filled rooms with hardwood floors and a design aesthetic which is both cozy and sophisticated. It is a large one bedroom unit with a fully equipped cooks kitchen, relaxing sun room, and a charming bathroom with large refinished antique tub. Relax in the airy living room, stream your favorite programming, or read a book on the convertible love seat which can become a chaise lounge or single bed. The comfortable large bedroom with queen sized luxury mattress and bedd

name: Hip Asheville "Cabin-Esque" Getaway - 3 Bdrms
description:
Welcome to the cozy, hip, rustic restored 1940's "Cabin-Esque" Cabin near the French Broad River. 9 mins to Downtown Asheville & UNCA! 3 bdrms, chefs kitchen & spacious gated deck for relaxing w/ tons of grassy space for your friends, fam, kids & pup! Immaculately clean. A peaceful, semi rural, neighborhood setting in a cool cabin with old school charm. 15 mins to Biltmore & Blue Ridge Parkway. Cable TV, Fire Pit, BBQ, Coffee. Natural cleaning products & locally sourced furniture!

The space
COZY, CLEAN, CABIN. Where modern comforts meet a funky-hip, old cabin. We used as many local furnishings as we could get our hands on! Close to Downtown Asheville, UNCA, The French Broad River, Botanical Gardens, The Biltmore, Hiking, restaurants, breweries - everything you came to Asheville for is minutes away. This is a spacious space, large enough for the family to gather comfortably. Relax around the fire pit with a local beer or glass of wine... or hang out on the deck.

name: Hip Asheville "Cabin-Esque" Guesthouse
description:
Welcome to a hip & cozy "Cabin-Esque" home away from home - filled with rustic elegance! A tastefully designed guesthouse with 1 bedroom, bathroom, spacious kitchenette and tons of grassy outdoor space...in a beautiful, peaceful country-neighborhood setting. Less than 10 mins to Downtown Asheville & UNCA. Float down the French Broad River...a mile walk. 15 mins to The Biltmore & The Blue Ridge Parkway. Cable TV, Fire Pit, A/C & Heater, WIFI, BBQ, Tea & Coffee. Always immaculately clean!

The space
Where modern and lux comforts meet a cozy-funky-hip 1940's cabin. We used as much local furnishings as we could get our hands on! And natural cleaning products. So close to Downtown Asheville, UNCA, French Broad River, Botanical Gardens, The Biltmore, Hiking, restaurants, breweries - everything you came to Asheville for. This is a fun, comfortable, super clean space. Relax around the fire pit with a local beer or glass of wine. We host a ton of couples, girls trips, g

name: The Baying Hound Campground {Double Tent Site #3}
description:
Want to stay close to downtown Asheville and not break the bank? We're not fancy, but if you've got a tent and want to get a feel for Appalachia then you're in the right place. You will have access to a surprisingly clean outhouse and sink. The campground is tucked away in a neighborhood less than 10 minutes away from downtown Asheville. Tent sites are located in a private, 2-acre wooded valley. There are NO linens, towels or pillows provided. Please read on for more details!

The space
Site #3 is perfect for families or small groups with more than one tent. This site can accommodate two tents, with spots measuring 12 x 12 feet and 10 x 18 feet. We allow 2 cars per reservation for this site. Additional parking spots available at a fee - just ask!


THE CAMPGROUND
The Baying Hound Campground is where rural Appalachia meets “keep Asheville weird.” You’ll see sleeping pods decorated by professional artists, structures made from upcycled building

name: Cozy Comfy Eclectic Home in West Asheville near Downtown
description:
Lean back on a couch in a living room filled with eclectic and vintage accent pieces while listening to vinyl collections. This 1928 house showcases original character such as hardwood floors, staircase, and wood trim. It is a comfortable and homey retreat after exploring the beautiful city of Asheville. It is located in West Asheville and is close to Downtown and to other top destinations such as Biltmore House, Grove Park Inn, River Arts District, and Blue Ridge Parkway.

This listing used to be listed as private bedroom, but beginning 7/20/20 it is rented as ENTIRE SPACE with TWO BEDROOMS and TWO FULL BATHROOMS.  Please note that reviews prior to 7/20 pertain to the one-bedroom listing.

Currently, Airbnb PLUS team is unable to come out to take pictures of the additional bedroom and bathroom and owner is not allowed to upload his own shots. The second bedroom (one that’s not in the pictures) is located on the second floor. It is bigger with queen size gel m

name: Artists' Home in the Heart of West Asheville
description:
Private room with shared bath in the home of a family of artists. Four blocks from the heart of West Asheville with it's cafes, pubs, live music, and restaurants. 2 miles from downtown, 10 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
Our 1923 bungalow is cozy and comfortable with many artsy touches, surrounded by lush, semi-wild gardens, chicken coop, and an orchard on our 1/2 acre. The peaceful blue guest room is furnished with one full size (double) Sealy Paulson bed, a fluffy mattress topper, 4 pillows and a down comforter. It also has a microwave, coffee maker and complimentary coffee and tea. Free wifi. Desk has hiking trail books, maps, and an info board with suggestions for restaurants, breweries, tours etc.. The house stays pretty cool in the summer, there is a window fan in the room. The shared bath has a full tub. It's in a quiet, family neighborhood, only 4 blocks walk to Ujoint, West End Bakery, Brew Pump. A couple more blocks will bring you to

name: Hip Asheville 1940s "Cabin-Esque" Getaway
description: Rustle up something special in the chef's kitchen and wet bar of an elegant home that's been freshly restored to retain rustic charm with a soupcon of old-world pizzazz in Asheville. Outside is a spacious gated deck, with a BBQ, on a grassy lot of an acre, complete with fire pit and more than enough space for the kids, adults and pup to play! Always immaculately cleaned using natural products & disinfectant.

name: Peaceful Lakefront Retreat with Dock & Back Deck
description:
Peace and quiet await at this charming, renovated 2BR home nestled in the mountains on three acres, sitting directly on a lake. Spend the day swimming at the private beach area, fishing, or playing sand volleyball. Just 20 minutes to Asheville. Sleeps 6.

The space
Peace and quiet await at this Bull Creek Ranch 2BR/2BA retreat, nestled on three acres and boasting a private mountain lake, sweeping views, and a fruit and nut orchard. Spend the day swimming and fishing from your own dock, or take the canoes out for a float. Gather on the huge back deck to watch the stars come out, or make s'mores by the firepit.

Play sand volleyball at the court just across the driveway. Sip cocktails on the front patio or read a book while the kids play on the sandy beach area.

You’re minutes from the fine dining, local breweries, and eclectic shops of Asheville. Go for a drive along the Blue Ridge Parkway, or spend the day touring the Biltmore House and Grove

name: South Slope Secret Garden Abode
description: A gravel path lit with string lights and lined by lush bamboo leads to a comfy private room on the edge of South Slope. The room the perfect spot for unwinding after a day of exploring Asheville and the surrounding area. Located on the main floor of a charming 1927 brick home, the room is well styled with an ornately carved and comfortable queen bed and a modern teal velvet sofa. As well, guests will find a private bath featuring a double walk in shower and Turkish robes. A convenience station featuring a minifridge, coffee maker and microwave with included coffee tea and light snacks is also in the suite.

name: Lovely “French Creek Studio” near Biltmore & City
description:
My home is in a wooded older community within The Municipal Golf Course in Asheville. This is a new, small, lovely upscale space recently completed, very private with its own entrance. The feel of the space denotes nature and is done in muted shades of gray, green, and touches of vibrant color. This is a very bright, cheerful, cozy and comfortable space with a large glass door which overlooks the golf course. You may see wild turkeys, squirrels, bears and an occasional coyote.

The space
The space is private, small and cozy with a view of trees & golf course across the street. This is an L shaped room. There is a closet for your clothing & a luggage rack. A large vanity is provided for your sundries.

There is a mini refrigerator, microwave & a Keurig coffee maker for coffee, tea, and hot chocolate. There is a comfortable sofa (not a sofa bed), Wifi & TV with Rocu, Netflix, Prime and Hulu. A portable A/C and two fans are available in the summer

name: Spacious Walkable West Asheville Suite
description:
Enjoy your own private entrance to this spacious apartment within walking distance of West Asheville eateries, breweries, shops, and musical venues. Downtown Asheville, River Arts District, and Biltmore are all easily accessible. Enjoy the Blue Ridge Parkway and miles upon miles of hiking trails. Return to relax in this home, a LEED certified green home. Perfect for families, couples and traveling friends. There is one King bed and space for children or an extra adult on the couch.

The space
This space features a beautiful custom wet bar, microwave, and mini-fridge. The space is full of games, wifi, wii, and books for you to enjoy.

Guest access
You'll have your own private parking and entrance in the back of the house.

Other things to note
I follow the 5-step enhanced cleaning protocol outlined by AirBnB.
Also, just want you to know in case you are allergic to dogs, that a sweet golden retriever lives upstairs i

name: Modern Urban Cabin close to Downtown
description:
Beautiful private large bedroom and bathroom with private entrance in historic neighborhood. This is a new construction green home just 1.5 miles to downtown and 2 miles to the River Arts District. Architecturally designed with homey modern decor and lots of natural light makes this a perfect place for your Asheville adventures.

The space
With your own private entrance you have a lovely bedroom and bathroom for your private use. There is a king size bed, a sofa & a kitchenette area that includes a refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker. WiFi, a flat screen tv (with cable and roku), and white noise machine are all included in the room. Lots of widows give this space lovely natural light.

Guest access
This is a private space within our home with your own entrance. There is one large room with a king size bed, couch, side chair, dresser, coat rack, kitchenette area, flat screen tv (including cable and roku), wifi, blackout blinds and m

name: Healing & Yoga Home 10min from Dtwn Asheville #2
description:
Treat yourself to a mini vacation at this charming suburban wholistic airbnb. Nestled in the Appalachian Mountains our home is a healing, yoga and artistic space. Located between West Asheville and Candler. Easily accessible to Hwy 40 and Smokey Parkway; only a 10 minute drive to downtown Asheville.

If this room is not available feel free to check my other private room #1
https://abnb.me/lsi1N4LN71

The space
This warm eclectic home embraces a nurturing, natural, cozy environment while discovering yourself in Asheville.

Guest access
Bedroom, front deck, front patio, living room, kitchen and full bath.

Other things to note
Welcome! We can suggest some referrals for a variety of wholistic and healing modalities that the Asheville community offers. Our intention is to provide you with the guidance and encouragement that may support your transition towards a more wholistic
This might be the perfect

name: Perfect Location Modern Studio in Heart of WAVL
description:
This studio is cozy slice of heaven in the idyllic city of Asheville. Enjoy coming and going as you please in your private entrance studio with a key code. You'll enter the space through the screened porch with table and chairs. Rest on your incredibly comfortable Casper mattress queen bed. The space is cool, modern, light-filled, and small, but with very tall ceilings and incredible amenities including a full-house water filter and recently added Nespresso machine.

The space
We live in the best part of West Asheville - just minutes walking from the best restaurants, coffee shops, an organic grocery store, and a farmer's market. We're a great base to explore downtown and the plethora of hikes in the area. We love our neighborhood and know you will too!

Guest access
You'll have access to the screened-in porch and studio apartment. You'll have a full-bathroom with a shower stall, kitchenette with coffee station and mini-fridge, and a closet w

name: Autumn Glow Bungalow in West Asheville
description:
Autumn in Asheville! Peak leaf peeping! Enjoy the good life in my beautifully tended, inside and out bungalow. Swing and picnic on the large front porch, lounge in air conditioned comfort, slow down and rest. Work from home. Look for your dream home. Walk just two blocks to vibrant downtown West Asheville's eclectic and popular eateries, breweries, performance halls, boutiques and artists. You'll be just 3 miles from downtown Asheville and Biltmore House and 6 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
NOTE: Ginger Tabbies David Bowie and Led Zeppelin will be home during your stay. They are adorable, affectionate, healthy and playful.

Though located in a highly desirable neighborhood in central West Asheville, this home is cozy, quiet and serene.
Restored to better than original condition, enjoy beautiful hardwood oak flooring throughout plus thoughtful creative accents with a focus on serenity, good humor and what's good for the mind, heart

name: Billiards Bunkhouse- Koi Pond & Outdoor Fireplace
description:
Come stay in a relaxing, spacious and bright, 500 square ft studio. Choose to hang out by our beautiful koi pond and hand-feed our koi, chill by our outdoor fireplace next to the waterfall, or head to town for adventure! The Bunkhouse is on a tranquil 1/2 mile gravel road, just 6-7 miles to downtown Asheville, the River Arts District, and Riverside Drive, where there is river access, walking trails, UNCA Botanical Gardens, outdoor eateries, music venues, and much more!

The space
This newly-built guest studio features a 9 ft pool table, vaulted ceiling, relaxing sleeping loft, full bathroom with tub, studio-sized kitchen, and tons of natural light. It has a private deck, with a bistro area for outdoor eating. The Bunkhouse has french doors, just steps away from our outdoor fireplace and koi pond with waterfall.

Our friendly dogs may be wandering around the yard hoping to be pet, however please enjoy them outside, as they are not allowed in the Bunk

name: Kmart’s Kastle  In Asheville
description:
Located in South Asheville
- approx. 7 miles south of downtown
- approx. 7 miles north of Airport/Sierra Nevada
This is a very convenient location located about one mile from all the great restaurants and shopping in South Asheville, yet tucked away for some nice privacy on an acre and a half lot providing nice outdoor space to enjoy yourself

The space
One level house 2100 sq ft, 1600 sq ft garage, 1.5 acre lot with large front yard, lots of room for parking, great location within 15 min of everything Asheville has to offer. Two oversized bedrooms accompanied by two normal sized bedrooms and a large living room

Guest access
Washer/dryer are accessible in house

Other things to note
There is a studio apartment next to garage. It shares a wall with laundry room on 3 bedroom side of house. There will be a separate listing if the studio apartment is included in rental.

name: The Baying Hound Campground {Tent Site #4}
description:
Want to stay close to downtown Asheville and not break the bank? We're not fancy, but if you've got a tent and want to get a feel for Appalachia then you're in the right place. You will have access to a surprisingly clean outhouse and sink. The campground is tucked away in a neighborhood less than 10 minutes away from downtown Asheville. Tent sites are located in a private, 2-acre wooded valley. There are NO linens, towels or pillows provided. Please read on for more details!

The space
Site #4 has a footprint of about 22 x 14 feet. This site is one of our most popular and comes with a hammock already set up for you! :)

Please just one tent per site and one car per reservation. Additional parking spots available at a fee - just ask!

THE CAMPGROUND
The Baying Hound Campground is where rural Appalachia meets “keep Asheville weird.” You’ll see sleeping pods decorated by professional artists, structures made from upcycled building material

name: Close to All The Fun!
description:
Private studio (in-law) space located in N. Asheville (Beaverdam) area available for 30 days or longer (can be month-to-month with 2 months reservation up front). This new studio has all the essentials for a vacation in desirable Asheville, NC. Basic kitchenette includes refrigerator, microwave, toaster oven, 2-burner infrared ceramic electric hotplate, full service for 2 with pots and pans, utensils, cups, dinner ware. Bathroom has a large walk in shower and hanging storage for clothes.

The space
Cozy, complete studio apartment in North Asheville, all utilities & WiFi included, AC/heat - 300 sq ft with spacious full bathroom and private entrance from your own patio. Private quiet road with safe off-street parking 20 feet from your entrance. Perfect as temporary lodging for someone moving to the area, or for short-term work assignments, as well as for a weekend to enjoy legendary Asheville! The studio is all one level with the entrance one step up on the outsid

name: Mt Air Private Apt.
description:
Enjoy your private apt., park in the shade at the front door. Less than a mile from I-40 (Exit 53 A); the Blue Ridge Parkway (MP 385). Easy access to all of the wonders of western North Carolina:
Biltmore Estate/Winery , gate 4.5 miles, 6 min.
Uptown Asheville 5.9 miles, 9 min.
Billy Graham Training Center, The Cove, 3 miles, 5 min.
Folk Art Center 3.9 miles, 7 min. drive
NC Mt. to Sea Trail .8 mile, 2 min. drive or 15 min. walk
Plethora of breweries....closest one 2.5 miles

The space
300 sq. feet, split level; living room & kitchen on one level, bath and bed room are two steps up. The private apartment is 2 years new. Interior and the decor is designed and planned for beauty and your convenience. A mix of new and antique furniture; stained woods, large windows for natural light; Italian tiles in the bath. Several works of art from local artists are on display as well as a 15' wood canoe hanging from above. Mul

name: Convenient and Cozy Lookout Retreat
description:
We love this beautiful area and are so happy to share it with others!
This cozy retreat is the perfect home base for all of your Asheville adventures! Conveniently located in North Asheville, it’s less than ten minutes from downtown, within walking distance to UNCA and central to many breweries and restaurants. This second floor apartment boasts light filled rooms and a tasteful, calming atmosphere.
All are welcome:)

The space
With only a few houses in near vicinity, your window view overlooks pleasing perennial pollinator gardens and our ever-expanding organic vegetable beds. Like to exercise? Take a walk up the road to the UNCA observatory to witness one of the best views of downtown Asheville and the surrounding mountains.

This space includes a large bedroom with closet, small dining room with kitchenette, living room with TV, central AC/heat and bathroom. While we do live below the unit, there are no shared spaces and two doors

name: Green Tiny Home w/ MNT views near parkway/dtown
description:
Nestled in one of the most picturesque valleys in Asheville, NC. Hidden Flower Tiny Farm is the perfect getaway for relaxing. Guests can enjoy all their creature comforts while trying out living off-grid in a tiny cottage. Located on five acres in the heart of the Appalachian Mountains you feel a million miles away; all the while only 5 MILES to all that downtown has to offer and 4 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Our motto is-Small, Simple, Sweet, Stress-Free & Sustainable Vacation.

The space
A light and airy tiny house cottage tucked away on a tiny farm below a farm home built-in 1872, with views of the Blue Ridge Mountains, nestled by the tiny orchard and surrounded by pasture.

Perfect for lovers of nature, hikers, folks wanting to get away from the hustle and bustle, artists, musicians, and eco-enthusiast to have their own unique tiny house experience.

This tiny house is mostly off-grid and great for environmentally forward-thinking gu

name: RAD house
description:
Our home in the River Arts District is centrally located! We are a short downhill stroll to the artist shops and restaurants of the RAD and about a 10 minute walk to downtown/ south slope. Great hiking, the Biltmore , and Mission Hospital are only a few minutes drive. The spacious open floor layout of our home invites the gathering of friends and family. Off street parking, a fully equipped kitchen, and laundry available. Pets are negotiable. Please ask before booking about bringing your pet

The space
2 bedroom, 2.5 bath home. Hardwood and tile throughout the home. Three large porches to relax on with a cup of coffee in the morning or a glass of wine in the evening as you watch the sunset. We have a small garden guest are welcome to pick from when the season allows, and a chicken coop with 6 chickens who should start laying fresh eggs for us to share with you soon. Off street parking is available, and guest are encouraged to use it instead of street parking.

name: *Zoe's Room* - 7 miles to Downtown Asheville!
description:
Perfectly located
1.2 miles off I-40, 6 miles to the Parkway 5 miles to the Asheville Outlets!
SUPER comfortable full-size (double) bed, Large (55") Smart TV, TONS of channels and FAST wifi!
It's Jason's house... We just live in it.
Jason is the golden retriever, he loves guests and so do we (3 humans, Jason and Wolf the cat), but if you don’t like pets and people this probably isn’t for you.
If you like to socialize, talk about travel, co-mingle, or are a foodie, COME ON IN, our door is open!

The space
Front bedroom in a charming, older brick home on a quiet cul-de-sac.
Pleasant living-room with large Smart-TV and ALL the channels!
Communal kitchen. If we are eating dinner you are welcome to join us.
Your bathroom is shared, but you will have more than ample access to it.

Guest access
Living room, Dining room, Kitchen, Bathroom, Backyard... Only the 2 other bedrooms and basement are not shared spa
