name: Bright, cozy Asheville suite w/ private entrance
description:
We're in a residential neighborhood less than 10 minutes to Biltmore Village, Downtown, and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Enjoy a comfortable suite with all the basics to make your Asheville stay feel like home! You'll have a private entrance on the first floor, your own bathroom with spacious shower, a desk for working, a cozy reading corner, queen size bed with memory foam topper, and closet to tuck away belongings. We have maps and hiking guides available for you to borrow on your next adventure!

The space
You'll be residing in a first-floor suite with a private entrance. Your room is within our home but does not have contact with other spaces. We provide tea and coffee, towels, and linens. There is a small backyard you’re welcome to hang out in! Our space has been fully inspected and permitted by the city for your safety.

Distances for points of interest (low traffic, driving):
Biltmore Village: 2 miles (7 minutes)
Biltmore Estate 2.9 miles

name: All Things Bright & Beautiful Apt  (Newly Built)
description:
A private entrance and space is a perfect place for you to social distance. Enjoy fresh air on our private balcony.
Our cleaning crew is taking extra steps to sanitize in between guests, above and beyond our normal high standards of cleaning.

Location: east side of W. Asheville, overlooking the River and River Arts District.
1.5 miles to downtown Asheville and downtown West Asheville.
3 minute walk to New Belgium
5 minute walk to the Greenway
Bike and run on the beautiful new Greenway.

The space
Our nearly 1,000 sq. ft. apartment has recently been completed and ready for your stay. With two large skylights and big windows the apartment is bright and cheery. Open the windows and enjoy the breeze coming up the hill off the river.

***A remote workers dream with fast reliable WiFi. We opted for a drop leaf dining table that can transition into a work station.***

Enjoy your morning coffee on the balcon

name: Creekside ~ w/HOTTUB~  8 miles to downtown Ashe NC
description:
Private & safe 1 BR just 8 miles from downtown Asheville NC , 13 miles from Hendersonville NC and only 3.5 miles to the airport and Blue Ridge Parkway. Located on a partially wooded property abutting creek. Niceties include a screened sitting porch with 2 person hot tub, grill and chimenea and covered parking at door for inclement weather. Enjoy the outdoor fire pit just across the creek in a quiet wooded clearing for connecting with mother nature.

The space
Newly and tastefully renovated. Cozy. Convenient to Asheville (8 miles) , Fletcher (2 miles) , Hendersonville (13 miles) and Saluda NC. The space is in a suburban neighborhood on a 2.5 partially wooded with a woodsy feel but yet within 2 miles of restaurants and shopping. Relax on screen porch with hot tub and enjoy the song birds during day and orchestra of cicadas in the tree tops at night.

FYI for pet owners.....this is a pet free property and pets are never allowed without prior d

name: Hummingbird Garden Bungalow 1BR - walk to downtown
description:
Our 1BR bungalow apartment is in a charming historic neighborhood 4 easy walking-blocks from Asheville’s vibrant downtown, as well as an easy walk to Whole Foods, Trader Joes, Asheville Yoga Center, and many restaurants. We invite you to experience the beauty and tranquility of the bungalow and gardens coupled with the great location.

Always feel free to inquire about date flexibility if you don't see your exact dates open.

The space
Surrounded by lush cottage-style gardens and framed by a backyard creek, our garden home offers a unique urban retreat experience. In this magical oasis, you will inhabit a private arboretum just 4 walkable blocks from the vibrant restaurants, shops, galleries, music venues, and street performers in downtown Asheville.

The cozy bungalow apartment is perfect for 1-2 people. It's about 650 square feet in an updated, 1926-built house. Lots of natural light streams through the many windows throughout. The open flow

name: Quiet Montford Bungalow, 10 min walk to downtown
description:
Quiet 3 bedroom/1 bath home in the historic neighborhood of Montford. This is a green, lush space, inside and out. Lots of light. The back of the house overlooks acres of woods, a treasure that allows seclusion while still being a stone's throw from downtown. The short walk to town is about 10 minutes. After enjoying, retreat back to peace and quiet.

The space is lived-in, so it's not immaculate. Expect the personality and charm of a (loved) home. Books on shelves, plants, food in cupboards.

The space
I’m a wine importer, and David is a baker and miller. We are big sensory people. I like to think the colors, light and abundance of plants in the house cause it to possess something transporting and relaxing. We spend a good bit of time in Provence, and the colors and textures are a result of trying to bring home pieces. All linens are good quality. You can't be a sensory person without having a slight bedding obsession, right? There will always b

name: Asheville Quiet Serenity Super Convenient Location
description:
Comfortable, quiet neighborhood, close to everything.

CV-19 Update:  This condo is attached yet separate from main house. You will not have to be in contact with anyone. It even has its own separate heating and a/c unit. It adjoins the main house, not inside it.

40' TV
High speed internet/cable
Environmentally clean. (inquire)
Extensive hiking trails from backyard
Lush green mountain setting.
Free greeting by old dog "Sammie"
Experienced, conscientious host
Easy access to all AVL fun

The space
This is a beautiful, new private suite with your own entry, large private bath, bedroom. Super cozy, comfortable and quiet. It is basically a separate condo, attached to the house. It is completely private with your own keyed entrance, private bath with large step-in shower, breakfast nook area and cable TV. Our location is very unique. It is not walking distance to downtown Asheville, but there is no conges

name: East Asheville, HotTub, Views,  Fire Pit, Parkway
description:
Close to everything Asheville - restaurants in walking distance, near the parkway for biking, hiking, minutes to Biltmore House, Grove Park, downtown. The apartment has beautiful views, hot tub, and firepit. This over garage apartment is new construction, laid out spaciously and is absolutely beautiful. The deck views is where you will want to spend your evenings for sure! Asheville has so much to do so we hope you will enjoy your time out and about and coming back for a relaxing evening.

The space
This apartment is styled very modern. It is very stylish but is quickly converted to extra sleeping space. There is a full kitchen to cook meals and washer/dryer to do laundry if needed. There is a full bathroom with shower and tub. Dog friendly (no cats). Private entrance to your own deck with hot tub and firepit and beautiful views. Our cleaning specialist has cleaned all the details of your apartment thoroughly. We use air purifiers with uv lights, ozon

name: Downtown in a Flash. Relax with Your Family
description:
We love Asheville. We’d love for everyone to soak in the mountains, enjoy the dining, hiking, and wonderful city we call home. The 1400 square foot, newly renovated house is an easy 8 minute drive to the heart of downtown. We welcome families with small children and groups to relax, celebrate, and unwind in a truly special place.
This home features an open floor plan-your entire group can enjoy each other’s company while cooking, dining, and lounging. A hallway delivers you to the bedrooms and front bath. The master, en suite, and access to covered deck are at the end of the hallway.

name: The Last Minute Cottage Getaway
description:
The Last Minute Cottage is a cozy recently updated STAND ALONE studio in a converted 1940's garage! It is conveniently located 4 blocks from popular Haywood Road and all the West Asheville shops, restaurants and bars it has to offer. Looking to get outside? Carrier Park and the French Broad River Access is only 1/2 mile away. Easy access to float the river! The cottage is also located 2 miles from downtown Asheville and 1 mile from the River Arts District.

The space
The cottage is sunny and private. It is a detached structure that has its own off street parking for two cars. There are 2 stairs to get into the front door.

There is a kitchenette with a mini fridge/freezer, microwave, coffee pot and toaster. Coffee, tea, cream and sugar are provided to get your mornings started off right.

There is also a flat screen SmartTV with Hulu, Netflix and Sling. Wifi is provided as well.

Why do we call it the Last Minute Cottage....

name: The Patton Mtn Retreat. Near Grove Park & Biltmore
description:
WE HAVE ADDED CENTRAL AIR THROUGH OUT

This 3 bedroom, 4 bed, 2 bathroom house sits atop Town Mountain in between the Grove Park Inn and Downtown Asheville. It can easily sleep 4 adults and 2 children.

Its private, quiet, and nestled in the woods with views of nearby mountain ranges.

The house is naturally cooler than surrounding Asheville because its elevation is so much higher. It has a gas log fireplace in the living room and a wrap around porch.

Other things to note
The TV in the living room is connected to roku which allows you to access Amazon, Netflix, Hulu, etc. but must have your own login. No cable TV provided.

name: Affordable and Spacious Basement Suite
description:
Hi friends! Welcome to our mountain home!

Cozy, clean & spacious downstairs basement suite of a single family home in South Asheville with private entrance, bathroom, laundry, bedroom, and backyard.

The space
Our basement suite has been carefully designed to include all you could need during your Asheville stay. Guests are able to enjoy full privacy in their fenced in backyard area. Kitchenette includes fridge, coffee maker, microwave, and toaster oven. Suite included personal washing machine & dryer, utility sink, bath towels, fresh linens, and organic shampoo, conditioner & shower gel in bathroom.

Our goal is to provide an affordable and very comfortable experience for all of our guests.

Private backyard for guests is provided.

Guest access
Private entrance is located left of garage. Parking space accommodates one vehicle. Wooden gate will open to a walkway leading you to the guest suite space. Simply e

name: Upstream Bohemian, Modern Design, Hot Tub, Mountain Views
description: Melt away stress with the calming jets of the rooftop hot tub atop this modern architectural home. This eco-friendly residence features natural wood and stone finishes throughout, contrasting textures and patterns, and an outdoor dining space. The natural light lends a spotlight to the bohemian decor and relaxed mountain vibe. No parties or events.

name: Great Location. Huge Yard,River Access, Views,Dogs
description:
This family and dog friendly 3 bedroom,2 full bath home is in a quiet neighborhood. Very convenient location. A mile from I-40, Blue Ridge Parkway entrance, restaurants, and grocery store. 5 miles to downtown and the Biltmore House. Large deck with mountain view. Large yard for kids, dogs, and outdoor games. Rental has several outdoor games to use. Each bedroom has queen size beds that sleep 5. The large kitchen is fully equipped for all your cooking needs. Private access to the Swananowa River.

The space
This rental is close to everything. 1 mile away from I-40, Blue Ridge Parkway Entrance, Restaurants, and Grocery Store. Great Mountain View’s. Large front and back yards. Great for kids, pets, and outdoor games. Full functional kitchen. 3 bedrooms that all have queen size beds. 2 Full Bathrooms. Laundry room is downstairs for guest use.

Guest access
Guest have access to the entire house, and the front and back yard. The property has privat

name: Orion Sky, "a little country in the city"
description:
Beautifully renovated for relaxing between adventures, this studio apartment with its own private entrance is just minutes away from downtown Asheville and from the up-and-coming downtown West Asheville.

The space
At Orion Sky, we care about our guests. Your safety, and ours, are the most important thing to us. We follow a cleaning and sterilizing protocol that is even more astringent than Airbnb’s protocol.
*This apartment does not allow pets nor children. (The hosts own one small dog that is unfriendly to children and other animals. He is kept in a separate area and is not allowed in Orion Sky.)

Now, about the apartment!
We lovingly renovated our studio apartment to give you the perfect place to land and truly enjoy your time here.
With its own private entrance, this studio apartment is yours to relax in and enjoy while you take advantage of all Asheville has to offer.
Your hosts live in the main house and are avail

name: Cottage in the Trees- Walk to Downtown AVL
description:
Experience the convenience of this private, modern, cozy in-law apt. (260sqft) with a private deck, entrance, and outdoor garden nook nestled amongst large trees in the heart of beautiful Asheville, NC. Parking in the city can be tough, stay here and you can walk to it all downtown! Iconic Pack Square, French Broad Chocolate Lounge amongst many other breweries, restaurants, and coffee houses (5-10 min. walk). Private, modern space attached to the home with lots of amenities. Private parking

The space
--WALK TO THE HEART OF DOWNTOWN IN 5-10 MINUTES
--YOUR COZY AIRBNB STUDIO APT. (260 Sqft.) IS PRIVATE AND ATTACHED TO THE HOUSE, NOT SEPERATE
--PRIVATE PARKING, ENTRANCE, OUTDOOR PORCH AND LOUNGE AREA, AND AIRBNB
—Watch the sunset with a beverage of choice and relax on your private patio
--Quiet and Private Residential Neighborhood.
--Sleep on a Queen size Deluxe Foam Mattress.
--Stock coffee or tea, heat up leftovers, or chill a be

name: Asheville Bark House
description:
12 Trail Ridge road is what everyone is looking for when they choose to make Asheville home. That mountain country, rustic feel with everything that a modern home has to offer. Situated on 1.87 acres with year around sunset views, this quintessential mountain home has it all. It is so perfect for entertaining that you may never want to leave.

The space
This master on main is the reason marriages stay together. No need to share because it has his and her vanities, his and her walk in closets, and his and her water closets, in addition to a huge walk in tile shower with more than enough room for two.
No need to carry laundry around when it is situated close to the bedroom.The laundry room has built in cabinets and hampers with a copper sink and granite counter tops for folding laundry.
The downstairs has another master suite with a walk in closet and a spectacular tree house feel with eastern views.
Enjoy open and bright dining space in this gourmet

name: Comfy Camper & Firepit..Only 20 Easy Minutes Out
description:
****You will love this nearly new "Jayco Jayfeather" 26' camper for a fun unique getaway on a beautiful wooded property. It is a comfortable bright space on a safe dead end rd yet close to a variety of great restaurants, music venues, the airport, & Blue Ridge Parkway hiking. Asheville, Hendersonville and Brevard Waterfalls are all 20 min. The Jayco has full hook-ups, kitchen, bath with hot shower, wifi, Netflix, Prime & a Fire Pit Escape to this romantic fun retreat in the mountains.****

The space
Covid cleaning: There is always a day and a half between guests providing lots of time to clean. Every hard surface is cleaned between guests and disinfected. Hand sanitizer is provided for guests . All sheets, towels, cooking utensils are cleaned. There are soaps provided and these bottles are cleaned also. Of course you may bring your own. Please do not stay in the camper if you have any covid symptoms. I wear a mask and/or social distance if you need any person

name: 1940’s s Chic Bungalow in Walkable West AVL
description:
Come Vacation/work in a 1940’s Vintage decorated bungalow in one of the hippest neighborhoods in historic Asheville (Three Blocks/Five minute walking distance to Haywood Road. Breweries, live music venues, restaurants, arcade, coffee shops. Ten minutes to Pisgah Natl Forest and blue ridge parkway. 1.1 mile to Hominy Creek River Park where there’s a “Put-In” for watercraft and also the beginning of the French Broad Greenway paved 3.5 mile trail great for runners, cyclists and walkers.

The space
Three Blocks from trendy Haywood road in the most diverse eclectic neighborhood of West AVL. Five minute walk to breweries, ISIS music hall, restaurants and bars; One mile from river access to the French broad river for tubing and kayaking (tubing/kayak company with live music and bar). One and a half blocks from West Asheville park. 15 minute bike ride and a 5 minute drive to downtown. 5 minute drive to Golds Gym, the River Arts district and New Belgium Brewing! 15 min

name: Upstream Penthouse, Spacious, Modern, Riverfront & Hot Tub.
description: Step into a rooftop hot tub at the end of an active day and slowly unwind under the stars. Find plenty of cozy beds in colorful rooms for the whole family. Descend a staircase to an upscale kitchen and enjoy wide woodland views of the mountains, the Biltmore Estate and French Broad River. The patio is a perfect place to enjoy a cup of morning joe or watch the sunset while sipping your favorite cocktail. No parties or events

name: Mountaintop Getaway minutes from West Asheville!
description:
A quiet mountaintop getaway in the trees, just 3 miles from West Asheville and just 6 miles to Downtown Asheville! With lots of privacy, it's a great place for a mellow getaway or a fun weekend with friends.

This home is not only pet-friendly but pet-encouraged! It has a fenced-in backyard and lots of room for your dog or dogs to run, as well as a quiet road for leash-walks.

The space
The space is just the top floor of our home, as the basement is currently being used for storage. The front door is down 2 sets of deck steps from the driveway. There is one very large bedroom with a king size bed, and a sleeper sofa in the living room. We can also provide an air mattress for the bedroom if extra sleep space is needed.

The bathroom has a jacuzzi tub and a spacious walk-in shower. There is a working wood stove to make cold nights cozier, and a two-person hammock for relaxing in the trees. The back patio has a grill and dining set for dining o

name: City of Asheville at Your Feet
description:
Town Mountain home 5 minute drive to downtown Asheville (Uber: $8-$10). Private entrance to 1150 sf: 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, large den, breakfast area with coffee/tea, snacks, fridge with beverages, partial kitchen with microwave, toaster, small cooktop. Privacy and views of downtown and the Blue Ridge Mountains from the large deck accessible from the master and den. Minutes to the Grove Park Inn and easy access to Blue Ridge Parkway. Cozy, charming home perfectly situated for a great getaway.

The space
Morning on the mountain is a great time to sit on the deck with a cup of coffee or tea and enjoy the view. The mountain is always changing and looks different with each stunning sunrise and sunset.

Winter is a beautiful time on the mountain. The weather is not a concern with a generator on site.

The den includes a TV with Roku and access to Netflix and Amazon Prime. A breakfast table and other essentials help make your stay memorable.

name: Downtown Condo Self Checkin. Walk Everywhere -Safe
description:
Everything is right at your doorstep from this downtown condo located only a stone’s throw away from all the shops and restaurants that Asheville has to offer. Take advantage of the free parking to save time and money as well as avoid the downtown traffic.



The kitchen is fully equipped for easy preparation of snacks or meals. Technology includes 200 bandwidth WiFi both wireless and Ethernet connections.

We have another condo available in the same complex if you have traveling partners.Ask

The space
Our condo has a luxury tiled bath which includes a deep soaking tub and a large glass shower with TWO separate shower heads. The condo’s central hot water system provides an abundant supply of fresh hot water. Stay a while.

Guest access
The owner’s group at the property have a fitness room, laundromat and patio. Use is limited to owner occupants.

Other things to note
Parking in downtown

name: GREEN & SERENE Asheville  Retreat Time!
description:
This is retreat time. We are located on a quiet corner of the forest area, yet 12 minutes from downtown Asheville! Woods on two sides of the property and privacy! YOUR experience starts with a Sound Healing Treatment the 1st day. (The 111.00 is added to the cleaning fee) Then that experience can be nurtured with time in nature! The second Day, if you choose, can be learning about Sound Healing! Sound Nurturance and Healing. Visit, www.dahvid.com
Blessings

The space
The Space is Chemically free, has a queen size sleep number adjustable bed, Air Ionizer ( good for allergies)
These rooms have been renovated in the past year! Bathroom is new!
Mini split A/C and heat. Electric wall heater. Robes in closet fir your convenience.

Guest access
You will be able to have a private entrance. Private Bathroom with shower just redone!! full size refrigerator in the laundry area.
Provisions for tea.
There is a shared hall area

name: DOWNTOWN ASHEVILLE: Healing Homestead
description:
Downtown..natural..beautiful! 3 blocks to the popular South Slope. Everything under 'Neighborhood' is walking distance. Sanctuary homestay. Gorgeous medicinal gardens. Peaceful boho vibes. Hand-crafted details. Clay walls. Hardwood floors. 100 year home. 4 bedrooms. Shared bathroom & commons. YOUR ROOM > Sunset view, desk+chair, queen bed sleeps 2 comfortably. Includes bedding + towels. Come enjoy my edible urban paradise! No drunken beer bros, please! READ MORE BEFORE BOOKING...

The space
WELCOME: To my beautiful homestay with shared bathrooms + commons + a private room for you.

***PLEASE NOTE: I live in one of the most biodiverse temperate rainforests on the planet, ie: this area is teeming with life, including insect life. While my home is cleaned + vacuumed weekly, if you prefer 100% air-tight hotel environments, please do *not* book with me. We enjoy our old-home charm, open air living, sounds of nature....and don't mind the occasional moth or da

name: Couples Mtn retreat with separate suites, downtown
description:
"Pictures don't do this place justice"... previous guest response.

“This is THE place to stay in Asheville! We will definitely be back soon" ...previous guest review

First class accommodations on the mountain overlooking Asheville. Beautiful mountain views above with city lights below. This charming space is a short five minutes and $5 Uber ride from downtown Asheville yet feels worlds away. Exposed rock wall opposite original outside wall gives this apartment a unique and comfortable feel.

The space
“Dorothy's place is an absolute gem! It's up in the hills in a quiet neighborhood, but only a quick 5-7 minute drive from downtown and a 2 minute drive from a grocery store. The unit is spacious was incredibly comfortable for us (two plus our pup). The care and effort put into the space is super impressive. There is a queen sized bed, full size fridge and sink, a coffee maker with coffee/cream/sugar, tea, a microwave, and toaster oven. There's

name: Modern, minimalist, spacious W. Asheville studio
description:
Large private studio in immaculate West Asheville home. Walking distance to hip Haywood Road and its many coffee shops, bars, shops, and restaurants. Private entrance and located on a quiet, residential street (you can hear the crickets at night). The studio offers everything you'll need for a comfortable stay: queen bed, new bath, plush sofa, table for two, and other thoughtful amenities.

The space
Open layout (approx. 450 sq. ft.) offering minimalist, clean design in a beautiful West Asheville home. Our family lives upstairs.

When you come home from hiking the area's beautiful mountains or checking out the town's vibrant F&B scene, you'll find a tranquil space for a good night's sleep.

Guest access
You'll have your own entrance to come and go as you please; the space is completely private.

Other things to note
We want to make sure that you understand that we live upstairs but try our best to be respectful

name: Peaceful, clean & comfortable * 10 min to Downtown
description:
Entire home conveniently located about 10 minutes to Downtown Asheville and West Asheville, 6 minutes to the Biltmore. Relax on the side porch after a long day of exploring Asheville; the Biltmore Estate, the Grove Park Inn, and the Blue Ridge Parkway are all must-visits. Featuring a fully fenced in back yard, a large open space for entertaining, gas grill, high speed internet, smart TV, a surprisingly luxurious King pullout couch, a comfortable Queen bed, and a lovely King bed in the master.

The space
Guests will have full use of the house, it’s all to yourself!

Guest access
Guests can use the whole house, including a full kitchen, new washer/dryer, fenced backyard, and nice side porch.

Other things to note
Propane for the grill is not provided due to insurance requirements.

name: South Asheville Serenity
description:
Beautiful, fully-remodeled home on 2-acre wooded lot near Asheville airport, Sierra Nevada Brewery, Blue Ride Pkwy and Biltmore House. Home is right out of HGTV with 2 indoor fireplaces, an outdoor fireplace, bar and dining room! This home has plenty of character. Very comfortable, quiet and a short ride to downtown! Great for families or multiple couples.
***NEW Outdoor fireplace. Firewood available. Beautifully landscaped back yard with stone walls and unique plants.
No pets allowed

The space
No Pets Allowed
Must be at least 24-years-old to book this home

Guest access
There are pullouts in the both the den and the living room area. There is also a comfortable daybed on the closed in porch room.

description:
Welcome, ya'll! We have a light & spacious king bedroom and connected queen room with a private bath & entrance nestled in North Asheville, just a few minutes from Grove Park, downtown Asheville, & the Blue Ridge Parkway. Come enjoy & explore all that our mountains have to offer! We are very cautious due to Coronavirus and will ensure the place is sparklingly sanitized for you, too!

We have another listing for a whole house near Biltmore & Blue Ridge Parkway here for up to 6 guests as well.

The space
Welcome, y’all!

We have a spacious suite with two connected bedrooms, a private entrance and private bath. One room has a king bed and the other is a queen. You will essentially have your own floor of the house!

Each room sleeps up to 2 with plenty of space for your things. Wifi, comfy memory foam mattresses, and eco-friendly cleaning products are used. We are keeping with CDC cleaning protocols to sanitize the space as well. There

name: Skyview Place

Modern, light, fun apartment. 1 mile from center of downtown with mountain views.

The space
close to downtown with mountain views

description:
This cozy getaway is on a private road with minimal traffic, making it a very quiet and peaceful place to relax. Perfect for students, working professionals. Couples getaway. Or just someone passing through that needs a great place to rest. The owners/occupants of this property still resides here and as a result, maintains it with great care and uncompromising cleanliness. Guest will self check in with lockbox. The space is one of peaceful, quiet and thoughtful design.  You will feel it as soon as you walk in. Your room includes a Queen size bed. Sleep for two.
Next

One key is from the home entrance, and a key to the private bedr

description:
Magical mountain home! This new 4 bedroom home, completed in July 2018, sits nestled above Carrier Park with sweeping, panoramic views of the mountains and the French Broad River. Perfect for a family vacation or a getaway. Enjoy an easy stroll to Asheville Adventure Park where you can rent tubes and kayaks for a spectacular ride on the river. Only a short drive to downtown, the house is a wonderful retreat furnished in a contemporary decor.
https://mymatterport.com/show/?m=vdGBtf8yHUW

The space
Sleeps up to 14 people. There are three king beds, four twin beds set up in bunk bed fashion, one pull out full-size couch and one inflatable queen size air bed. Golden slumbers ensured with top of the line Saatva mattresses in each bed. Unique headboards are from Desert Metal Design. Wood finishes from local NC hardwoods. There are three large screen smart Tv's with Netflix , DirecTV, HBO and an audiophile grade stereo. Contemporary art on each floor from notabl

description:
Charming,organic, private suite! convenient to all Asheville!! Get a good night's rest at this quaint setting! Located just minutes from downtown and Hip West Asheville! Private setting with large yard. Walking distance to crown plaza Minutes from New Belgium, 10 min to Biltmore Estate,and Grove park inn! interstates 26-40 convenient toThis house provides plenty of off street parking. All amenities included for a comfortable stay.

Private area, and yard back porch

Parking is on the side of the house, in the driveway where the sign is., key pad on the back door for arrival. I will send the code to you a day before arriving for security. Thanks Matt

description:
Pretty 3 bedroom home has 1.5 baths, a full cook's kitchen, a nice porch and lots of closet space. Walkable to downtown, the River Arts District and the hospital.

You'll be comfortable and welcome with great access to everything Asheville has to offer. Plus off street parking!

Pet friendly.

LGBTQI and straight friendly; BIPOC and white people welcome.

I prefer to talk with people before booking this space to answer questions and share details. So please message me before booking.

The space
This charming and comfortable house is in an ideal location to get the best of Asheville.

The pretty, BoHo living room seats 6 for conversation and gazing at the bird feeders on the porch.

The primary bedroom has a comfortable queen-sized bed and a half-bath.
The middle bedroom also has a closet and is currently set up as an office, but an air mattress could be set up. The smallest bedroom is ideal f

description:
Get the real Asheville experience in this unique mountain ranch home, just minutes from everything. Spend your days exploring all the city has to offer and your nights cozied up by the firepit in the big fenced-in backyard. Couples, families and groups alike will love cooking gourmet meals in the updated, fully stocked kitchen and dining al fresco at the custom built farm table on the side deck.

The space
Located in East Asheville just 10 minutes from Downtown, and a couple minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway.

Guest access
Guests will have full access to the whole home, 2 car garage and driveway, fenced in back yard, outdoor deck and dining, and large front yard.

Other things to note
Home is cleaned with proven disinfectant products and we have enhanced cleaning measures in response to COVID-19, sanitizing all frequently trafficked surfaces.

Likely to make concessions for small pets or special situations.

name: Grove Park Bungalow
description: Recently renovated bungalow in desirable Grove Park neighborhood. This is a 3-bedroom, 2 full bath home with a fenced backyard. Walk to the Grove Park Inn, bike the Blue Ridge Parkway or head downtown for food, music and fun or simply hang out on the sleeping porch with beautiful Mountain View’s. This house has it all and is located 1 mile north of downtown.

description:
Family-friendly, cozy West Asheville basement apartment, with private entrance. Walk to the park & explore the creek along a beautiful walking trail. 2 Blocks from Bowling, Ice cream & restaurants. Take a 2-min Uber ride to the famous Haywood Street for coffee shops, restaurants, live music, shopping, and more. It's a 9-min drive to Downtown. If you're kind and respectful, you're our type of people and welcome at our home! We hope you enjoy our little town as much as we do!

The space
Enjoy your morning coffee, or evening glass of wine on our fenced-in Front porch (not yet in pictures)

Because this is a basement apartment, please expect to hear the pitter-patter of feet (even though we have added super soundproofing) you can definitely hear voices and movement upstairs.

Internet connection is Fiber and can support up to 9 Power Users.

Well-behaved dogs are welcome.

We have a private driveway, (1 space) and free s

name: Updated Arden Home ~12 Miles to Downtown Asheville
description:
Calling outdoor enthusiasts and adventurers! This 3-bedroom, 2-bath vacation rental house is the perfect place to book your Arden getaway. Ideally located just 20 minutes from downtown Asheville and within 1 hour of the national park and 2 ski areas, this vacation rental is the perfect home base for all your recreation and entertainment needs. The 1,800-square-foot home- perfect for friends and family- is pet-friendly, boasts a brand new kitchen and all the comforts of home, including free WiFi!

The space
Master Bedroom: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Full Bed | Bedroom 3: 2 Twin Beds

Conveniently located and loaded with all the amenities you could need, this home has it all! Just minutes from Asheville's top attractions, you're sure to enjoy making this property your home-away-from-home.

Spread out and settle in throughout the 1,800-square-foot interior, where sleek hardwood floors guide you from one well-appointed living space to the next. The l

name: The Nomad Pad ::Less than 10 minutes to downtown::
description:
:::Please read the entire add and photo descriptions to ensure this property is a good fit for you, we hope you enjoy your stay!:::

We offer a secluded space located in the basement of our two story home, nestled in the cozy mountains of Asheville NC. Our home is located in a quiet, safe neighborhood that is 10 minutes from the heart of downtown, The Biltmore estate, all the breweries, 35 minutes from Chimney Rock/Lake Lure, and the Blue Ridge Parkway is practically in our backyard.

The space
The basement living space includes a private room with a brand new king size upscale memory foam mattress, private bathroom, huge private living room, and a separate entrance and driveway for our guests. The guest driveway has plenty of space and parking for up to two large vehicles.
The entire living space plus bedroom is roughly 1,000 square feet.

The living space included in this property offers two comfortable couches (one of which is a reclin

name: Charming Asheville Basement Apartment
description:
Charming basement apartment located in popular Asheville, North Carolina. Just minutes away from Biltmore village and downtown Asheville.

The space
This space offers a spacious living room/bedroom combo that sleeps up to four guest. There is a full size bed along with a full size futon if needed. Linens , towels, and washcloths are provided. There is one full bathroom that includes a large shower. Kitchenette includes a microwave, coffee pot, and refrigerator. We have provided plates, bowls, cups, and utensils. Washer and dryer are available for use. Cable and wifi are also available.

Guest access
Guest have access to the fire pit in the back yard. There is firewood under the back porch. There are stairs leading to the first floor of the house but the are off limits to guest.

Other things to note
We will be parking on the left side of the driveway and will leave the right side of the driveway for guest parking. Please

name: Green Retreat
description:
Before requesting read "Other things to note" below

Fall soon arrives: upper deck seating area, nestled in tree canopy. Full kitchen, dining room & living room with gas fireplace are available to you. All located off your large master bedroom with private bath and sitting area. Waffle weave robes are provided to enjoy as you head down to common hot tub area or access the warm outdoor seasonal shower, both of which are clothing optional.

Two night minimum but exceptions made on occasion..

The space
So pressing at this time is prevention of Covid. Pick up, clean, then sanitize with Lysol spray disinfectant is my routine. We've added an (iWave-R), a residential air cleaner that works as an air ionizer, thus killing mold, bacteria and virus. Though I routinely clean, there is nothing routine how I go about it. Any surface that may have been touched by previous guests or myself are cleaned and sprayed. This includes soap dispensers, remotes, door

name: A Jaunt to Biltmore Village from a Forest Retreat
description:
This Certified Green Built home is nestled in the forest, on 1.5 acres, in the heart of Asheville. From here it's a 10-15 minute leisurely stroll down the hill to historic Biltmore Village. Biltmore Village is home to 4 breweries, a distillery, chic retail, and some fantastic restaurants. Ask us for recommendations! The gates to the Biltmore Estate are also found here. Downtown is only a couple of miles away and is only a 5 minute Uber/Lyft ride away. Fares are generally no more than $10.

The space
The home was built using certified Green Building techniques and offers guests their own private access to the lower level suite. The space includes a private bedroom, living area, and breakfast nook. Locally roasted coffee is provided along with a TV (with Netflix), microwave, and refrigerator.

Guest access
Guests have access to their own dedicated parking. From here they'll make their way down the marked path to the suite entrance. The door i

name: Monthly downtown condo w/ dedicated parking spot
description:
This is it - a rare downtown Asheville condo with a dedicated parking spot! (No more driving around in circles, paying exorbitant parking rates or feeding parking meters!). Since we are located downtown, that means you can easily walk to all your favorite AVL restaurants, shops and breweries. Our condo gives you quick and easy access to the Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Estate, and other nearby Asheville attractions.

The space
Featuring bamboo floors, granite countertops, natural light, fully furnished modern decor, a full kitchen (complete with coffee maker, blender and toaster oven), new bedroom and bathroom linens, TWO brand new flat-screen TVs, a DVD player, and an in-unit washer/dryer, experience your private living space near the Western Carolina mountains.

The futon converts into a full-sized bed for additional guests. Relax, and enjoy yourself in your own little sanctuary with all the comforts of home.

We hope you enjoy your stay wit

name: Cozy Couple’s Getaway - Montford
description:
Quiet, safe and secluded getaway in beautiful, historic Montford neighborhood. Private entrance, outdoor deck and electric fireplace. WiFi, smart TV and DVD available, no cable.
Approximately 1.5 miles North of downtown Asheville known for unique boutiques, amazing eateries, various craft breweries, quaint coffee shops, year-round festivals, music venues, and sporting events. A short drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway, camping, hiking, biking, kayaking, tubing and disc golf courses.

Other things to note
On-street parking for one vehicle is available in front of property. Access to property through steps down to entrance.

description:
Prime South Asheville location. Just 15 to 20 min from downtown Asheville & the Biltmore Estate, 10 min from Asheville Airport, 5 min from dining & entertainment, 10 min to Pisgah National Forest & 40 min to Dupont SF and Chimney Rock SP. Convenient to Sierra Nevada and Bold Rock Breweries. Clean, humble home in a quiet and safe neighborhood. Supportive and comfortable memory foam mattress for a great night's sleep. Coffee maker with coffee supplies in-room. Off-street, driveway parking.

The space
The attached garage has a free weight gym set available for use and storage for mountain or road bikes. A garden hose around the corner is available for rinsing muddy mountain bikes.

Guest access
Feel free to store food in the fridge and re-heat left-overs in the microwave or toaster oven. If you would like to utilize the kitchen to cook all or most of your meals, an extra fee of $15 per night applies. Please provide this need at the time of book

description:
Our tranquil home is the perfect base for your Asheville adventures! Surrounded by trees & birds this 1 story home is quiet & charming with easy access to Downtown & West Asheville. Highlights include: an inviting front porch, spacious living room, 2 bedrooms with new queen beds & a pull out sofa in the office that sleeps 1. Everything in the kitchen is at your disposal & guests are welcome to use the laundry. Also includes wireless internet, t.v. with cable, covered parking & 2 ac/heat units.

The space
This private house with keyless entry is located on a quiet, no outlet road. 15 minutes to downtown and 8 minutes to West Asheville. Covered parking for one vehicle in the carport. A second vehicle can be parked behind the first vehicle but not blocking the driveway. The house is fully furnished, including a fully equipped kitchen with a full fridge, microwave, four-burner stove & oven, a coffee maker & a toaster. Basic amenities provided include: fresh towels/lin

name: Mile North Urban Suite
description: Located approximately one mile north of dynamic downtown, this apartment in a renovated 1940s mixed-use house lets you live like a local and is a perfect base camp for any Asheville adventure –– fix breakfast on quartz counters in a relaxed, bright kitchen area with hardwood floors and black tiling. Conveniently located, it's walkable to dining and groceries, the park and a greenway. In the evening, come home and kick back on a teal sofa and recharge in this cozy, open-plan apartment set up to be a home away from home for relaxing and recharging while visiting our Appalachian wonderland.

name: The Snookstream~Glamping in the woods of Asheville
description:
We've carved out a cozy spot in the woods specifically for our 2010 Airstream Sport (22'), complete with a fire pit, electrical hookup and composting toilet. Come on down to Snookville!

Other things to note
Please note that while this is glamping, it's still closer to camping than a hotel. The compost toilet works like a charm, but it is a compost toilet. The shower is a camper shower, which means on the smaller side and with lukewarm water (the water heater never gets the water super hot). We love it and our guests have too, but if you're looking for a little more, we have the Snook Nook right up the road!

name: Sunny Oasis Pocket Studio Apt - walk to Downtown
description:
Hi! We don't accept bookings for others. The person booking must be the person who stays here. We appreciate it if you have several recent great reviews and a filled in profile. Please read all info to make sure it's a good fit for you.

Our studio is in an historic neighborhood 4 blocks from Asheville’s vibrant downtown, Whole Foods, Trader Joes, and many restaurants. We invite you to experience the beauty and tranquility of the studio apartment coupled with the great location.

The space
The studio is perfect for the quiet, minimalist solo traveler. It's about 180 square feet in an updated, 1926-built bungalow. Natural light streams through south and west facing windows. Has a full-size/double bed (not a queen), a sitting area with chairs and end table (no dining table). The kitchenette is stocked with cookware and eating ware for the minimalist chef - everything you need for an easy meal, but with all the amazing restaurants in town, who wants to coo

description:
Welcome to "Something Blue" our newly remodeled home we'd like to share with you! Boasting close proximity to downtown Asheville (10 mins), Biltmore Estate (10 mins) and multiple local breweries (only 5 mins away). The house is just steps away from a portion of the Mountains to Sea trail on the Blue Ridge Parkway (literally walk to the trail head). Our house is equipped with all you'll need for a great stay in beautiful Asheville. House also includes blazing fast Internet!!!

description:
Mountain Serendipity is a 1000 sq ft 2 room suite with private patio about 5 minute driving time to downtown Asheville's restaurants, bars, breweries, galleries, shopping, nightlife, Grove Park Inn, Botanical Gardens and UNCA. The neighborhood has roads for walking through beautiful forested land.
