name: Natural Homestay in Downtown Asheville
description:
Please read ALL details. Welcome to my homestay--you've found a gem! 2.5 blocks to the popular South Slope + 2 more to downtown + close to nature trails. Gorgeous organic gardens. Peaceful boho vibes. This SINGLE-occupancy room is for 1 person ONLY. It's small with a single bed, many windows, a dresser, lamp, fan....NO A/C or TV. Bathroom & kitchen are shared. Everything under 'Neighborhood' is an easy walk. Nearby baseball games can be noisy--bring earplugs. Read all details below. Thank you!

The space
***PLEASE NOTE: We live in one of the most bio-diverse temperate rainforests on the planet, ie: this area is teeming with life....including insect life. While our home is cleaned & vacuumed weekly, if you prefer 100% air-tight hotel environments, please do *not* book with us. We enjoy our old-home charm, open air living, the sounds of nature....and don't mind the occasional moth or daddy long leg. If this sounds good, please come enjoy. We'd love to have you! Othe

name: Private Home w/Hot Tub, 13 Miles to Dtwn Asheville
description:
The ultimate North Carolina getaway awaits at this newly renovated 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom vacation rental house in Arden! Situated just a few miles outside of Asheville, this home for 15 boasts outdoor amenities like a hot tub, partially-covered back deck with a gas grill, private patio, and a propane fire pit. Inside, you'll find 6 flat-screen Smart TVs, a Google Home device, game room with a billiards table, and much more! Return from a day of touring Asheville to relax in total luxury!

The space
Master Bedroom: King Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3: XL Twin-over-Queen Bunk Bed | Bedroom 4: King Bed | Living Room: Full Sleeper Sofa | Den: Full Sleeper Sofa | Additional Sleeping: Queen Air Mattress (with 4" foam topper), Pack-n-Play

Park your car in the 2-car garage and step inside this 2,650-square-foot home. You'll immediately fall in love with the interior's stone and copper accents, as well as the tremendous wooded views found throughout.

name: 2 Cranes Getaway
description:
2 Cranes is located between downtown Asheville (less than 2 miles) and Biltmore Village (1 mile), and a short walk to South Slope breweries & McCormick Field (< 1 mi). I'm adjacent to the Mission Hospital Medical Campus, on the edge of the beautiful, old Kenilworth neighborhood of Asheville. Blue Ridge Parkway access is a few miles south or a few miles east. The entrance to The Biltmore Estate is a mile from the house.

The space
The space I have listed is most of the lower level of my house- a bedroom suite finished in 2018 with new everything and a private entrance from the driveway. There is one queen bed with a comfortable mattress, a cool chair in the small sitting area, and a 42-in smart TV on the wall available for your app sign-in. There is a skinny counter-height work table for laptops, a mini-fridge and coffee pot provided. Many of the outlets have USB ports for cell phone charging. There is a cute patio carved out of the driveway for added privacy fro

name: Treehouse setting babbling brook 5 min to downtown
description:
Gently nestled into the heart of the Grove Park Sunset district of North Asheville, this peaceful private entrance, one-bedroom, ground floor living room, bath, and kitchenette suite offers the calm of the forest, a babbling brook, and luxury accommodations just 5-minutes from downtown Asheville, the Blue Ridge Parkway, fine restaurants plus easy-access to many other Asheville attractions including the Biltmore Estate.

The space
Fully furnished, lower level suite boasts all of the appointments of a fine hotel including, fireplace, full-sized bed, crisp, clean linens, twin daybed/couch, mini-fridge, toaster, coffee-maker, AC/heating, a private entrance with easy parking, wi-fi, cable access, and TV, all located in Asheville's safest neighborhood (immediately adjacent to the Grove Park Hotel). Accommodates 2 - 3 people.

After exploring the sights and sounds of Asheville’s world-renown restaurants, breweries, music venues, local art studios, hikes, and at

name: Sweet Hideaway Suite
description:
Newly finished guest suite with a private entry, queen bed, full bath, living room, and efficiency kitchen. The living and bedroom both have smart TVs and the kitchenette is well equipped with toaster oven, microwave, mini fridge, and coffee maker. Just minutes away from outdoor recreation spots, easy access to the Blueridge Parkway, 1 mile from I-40 and I-240, 1 mile to Highland Brewing, 5 miles to downtown Asheville, and 2.5 miles to the Biltmore Estate area.

The space
This space is perfect for couples or small families and is close to everything Asheville has to offer.

Guest access
Guests will enjoy complete privacy as this is a downstairs unit separte from the rest of the house.

name: LOCAL TOUCHES Heart of West Avl, Close to Downtown
description:
IN THESE UNIQUE TIMES, OUR CLEANER IS TAKING EXTRA PRECAUTIONS.

Enjoy a sparkling clean apartment in the heart of one of the best neighborhoods in America! Our apartment is two blocks from Haywood Rd. which is peppered with shops, restaurants, bars and breweries. We're a quick drive to everything else in Asheville.

Local touches throughout the apartment, including complimentary local beer, local art, vinyl by Asheville artists, local books and an extensive suggestion book.

The space
One-bedroom apartment with a private entrance and a parking space. Need to store bikes, kayaks, etc.? Just give us a heads up.

Guest access
Entire apartment.

Other things to note
Asheville has very strict short-term rental rules. Kitchen's may not include a sink, full-size refrigerator, range, etc. All legal rentals must be a part of the host's home. While our apartment is completely separate and private, you may occ

name: Downtown Artist Loft for Five
description: Overlook vibrant College Street from the open-plan living space at this industrial-chic oasis in the heart of downtown's festivities. The apartment showcases local art, with high ceilings, exposed ducts, and rustic bricks creating a relaxed feel.  If you are looking for a secluded mountain getaway this is not the place but if you want to be in the heart of downtown festivities then our loft is the perfect place for you. Our loft puts you right in the center of all the downtown action.  We have space for 5 -- 1 queen bed, 1 queen sleeper sofa and 1 twin sleeper sofa.

name: Tiny Red Hideaway w/ mnt views (near PKWY & Dtown)
description:
Nestled in one of the most picturesque valleys in Asheville. Hidden Flower Tiny Farm is the perfect getaway for relaxing. Guests can enjoy all of their creature comforts while trying out living off-grid. Located on a 5-acre homestead in the heart of the Appalachian MNTS. You feel out in the country; while only 5 MILES to all that d-town AVL has to offer & 4 MILES to the Blue Ridge Parkway for hiking & views. Our Motto is: Small, Simple, Sweet, Stress-Free & Sustainable. PLEASE READ FULL LISTING.

The space
This super cute and VERY tiny house is perfect for an individual traveler or super comfortable couple. As stated it is VERY tiny. Please do not be surprised by this.

Perched on a hill above a two-stall barn and nestled by a mountain stream this tiny house is so relaxing. We welcome eco-enthusiast to come to have your own unique tiny house experience.

This tiny house is mostly off-grid and great for environmentally forward-thinking guests;

name: Historic Bungalow in Montford, Asheville
description:
Beautiful, updated bungalow in the heart of the historic Montford neighborhood of Asheville. Know for its leafy streets, friendly neighbors, and history, Montford is sought after for its amenities, huge older homes, sidewalks, parks and proximity to downtown.

The space
Located on a quiet, one-way street in the heart of Asheville. The home is a Griffin Award Winner for historical restoration with meticulous attention to quality reconstruction and replacement of historic fixtures with lavish detailing. truly modern-day conveniences with Old World charm!

Two bedrooms with two full bathrooms are located on the first floor. The Master bedroom has an inviting and comfortable king size bed with an ensuite master bath containing a Whirlpool jacuzzi and marble shower. The perfect oasis for a relaxing bath and a deep night's sleep. The second bedroom has a luxurious queen bed for a peaceful night's rest.

The living area is inviting for conversation

name: Secluded Mountain Views In Asheville
description:
Secluded yet close to everything. Five minutes from restaurants, grocery, etc. yet surrounded by trees with great mountain views. New wood and tile floors, updated kitchen all 2018; master bath redone 2016. Nicely furnished; great combination of elegant living in a wonderful natural setting in South Asheville.

The space
Please note that we have a property caretaker living in a downstairs unit, so there will be others at the property, including dogs, during your stay. There are no shared living spaces; you park in the garage and enter the home up a flight of interior stairs connected to the garage; they park in the other garage bay and enter the downstairs separately. You have the private upper deck; they have their own private lower deck. Once you venture out into the yard, that space is shared. Upstairs, you'll basically never hear anyone downstairs. They will occasionally hear your footsteps above them.

We have a steep paved driveway that

name: Baying Hound Campground - Entire Campground
description:
Reserve an entire campground for your next large group get-together (approx. 25 ppl). We're not fancy, but if you've got tents and you want to get a feel for Appalachia then you're in the right place. There's access to a surprisingly clean outhouse and sink. The campground is tucked away in a neighborhood less than 10 minutes away from downtown Asheville. Tent sites are located in a private, 2-acre wooded valley. There are NO linens, towels or pillows provided. Please read on for more details!

The space
We are easily one of the closest, and cheapest, camping options when it comes to staying in Asheville. Only 8-12 minutes by car from downtown Asheville, we are a friendly, family-run, budget option when staying in the area. The camping area is located in a small, private, green valley, and you will definitely feel like you are "out in the sticks" even though you're actually super close to all the breweries and parks that make Asheville what it is.

Summ

name: 10 min to dwntwn AVL, super cozy 1930s bungalow
description:
Enjoy all that Asheville has to offer from our charming 1931 Little Gem Cottage. Recently renovated inside & out this sweet & cozy space features an eclectic mix of vintage, industrial & farmhouse touches. We tried to capture AVL's artistic energy through some of the finishes, artwork and furniture pieces that were handcrafted locally. Two guest rooms sleep up to four people and are comfortably appointed with beds and soft linens that were chosen to delight and encourage some great snuggling.

The space
Kick back on the full-sized sofa and enjoy the super-fast WiFi or log in with your account to enjoy streaming apps like Netflix, Hulu on the 42” smart TV.

Two guest suites – Guest suite one features a luxurious queen-sized upholstered bed and a calm color palette. Guest suite two offers two twin beds with toppers for “sink-into-the-bed” comfort. Twin beds can be pushed together for a king sized comfort.

Asheville has an amazing food & beer

name: SPECIAL 7 Days or  longer!  LOVE DOGS!
description:
Spacious 700 square feet Eclectic two bedroom luxury suite including King Bed in the main room and a Queen Bed in its own bedroom .This is part of a large home with several other rental units. We live at the property which has a double sound proofing wall between. It has private entrance and off the street parking. There is a custom tile shower for 2. Candles, live plants, natural soaps available for you to wind down after a great day sightseeing, hiking or enjoying downtown Asheville

The space
Private garden with outdoor table for four and a hammock for your enjoyment. access to two acres of other on-property gardens paths as well. Also, feel free to walk around the quiet neighborhood with views of a large pond, nature and mountain scenery on a circular road.

We are available on-site and/or by phone if any assistance is needed. We run and own a raw vegan sugar free chocolate business on-site which we sell in the Whole Foods. Free selection of our

name: Rustic-Chic Hideaway with Mountain Views
description:
Slow down at this secluded property in the heart of Asheville. Though just steps away from downtown, stunning mountain views evoke the relaxed pace of the countryside. Rugged accents contrast with stylish furnishings for a comfortable feel. This is a lower level unit in what is considered a duplex - so the property is shared but no one will occupy your space.

***There is only one parking space available to guests so please plan accordingly.

name: Mountain Magic Asheville Home(Mountains &downtown)
description:
Magical contemporary mountain home on private road in the woods 15 minutes from downtown Asheville and 10 minutes from the Biltmore Estate. Clean, well lit entry, quiet, peaceful, relaxing, rejuvenating and views that will make you relax. Our guests have commented on how clean it is and how easy it is getting to Asheville and other favorite sights in WNC.

The space
Entire main floor. 3 bedrooms, large master bedroom has attached bathroom suite. Modern mountain house with amazing views and very large windows throughout. Quartz countertops with a kitchen bar quartz countertop. Large, high deck (45 feet by 12 feet) off of kitchen and master bedroom. Owner (your host John Baer) resides in the first floor apartment and has access to the garage. The main floor and owner’s apartment each have private entrances and are not shared spaces

Guest access
Guests have private access to the main floor with private entrance.

Other things to

name: Asheville - Hiker/Biker Retreat in Bent Creek
description:
Mtb Biker and Hiker private, wooded paradise! Falcon's Escape is located right near the Rice Pinnacle trailhead of the Bent Creek Experimental Forest and Lake Powhatan with 10,000 acres of nature for you to explore. We are also 1 mile away from the NC Arboretum, the French Broad River, and the Blue Ridge Parkway. You can reach downtown Asheville within 15 minutes with attractions galore including the Biltmore Estate the historic Grove Park Inn, New Belgium Brewing, and the River Arts District.

The space
Private entrance with lock-box for easy check-in. Fabulous yard and fire pit area. Wooded surroundings. Great kitchenette with fridge, freezer, and microwave. Tile shower. WI-FI, Wall mount TV with DVD player, Keurig coffeemaker with K-cups provided, plenty of storage, light filled space.

Guest access
Guest suite has private bedroom, living room/kitchenette with sleeper sofa, and full bath with tile/ stone shower. Large yard and fire pit a

name: Asheville - Private Mountain Guest Suite
description:
Guests have access to the entire 2nd floor of the home. Upstairs is dedicated guest space - 2 bedrooms, a living room and a full private bathroom. The Airbnb has its own thermostat & mountain views.

The space includes a Keurig machine for coffee/tea, microwave, hot water kettle and a fridge. The couch is a double-recliner and the 50+ inch TV is hooked to a Amazon Firestick, cable available through ATT-TV app

Located about 5 miles from downtown and a few miles to the Biltmore Estate/Village.

The space
The entire 2nd floor is for a single set of guests. They have their own private living room, thermostat, full bathroom and 2 bedrooms.

Guest access
I offer self check-in and am flexible with what time you'd like to arrive.

Other things to note
The space comfortably accommodates 5 people maximum.

name: Asheville Tiny Home
description:
This house is located in a prime location. It is close to town, inside a warm, friendly neighborhood. It has a secluded yard and outdoor space to enjoy the mountains and wildlife while being less than 5 miles to downtown. The home is fully furnished. This modern kitchen has all of your cooking needs and wants. There are plenty of windows to fill the space with morning and afternoon light.

The space
This house has a spacious deck with a grill. There is access to a creekside outdoor space with a fire pit that can also be utilized upon request. Possible storage options are available.

Guest access
This home has a washer and dryer. Utilities, WiFi and Netflix are included.

name: CozyAirSuite
description:
We prepared a place where one would feel comfortable and relaxed. Spacious Clean rooms, Loaded kitchen, and comfortable seating. There are outside stairs to go down to the Air. We are close to downtown Asheville, The Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village and just minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway. We hope you come visit our Beautiful and unique city.

The space
We have stayed at many hotels and beach houses and know how to make this place pleasant and relaxing. A lot of loving care has been put into this guest house to make your stay a pleasant memory. We pride ourselves on cleanliness and attention to detail. The oven is a Toaster Oven, large in size and we do have cable TV. No children please.

Guest access
A stocked kitchen. A spacious relaxing living room, private entrance into place. Close to 40 and 240 without highway road noise! Convenient location access to Asheville Fun!

Other things to note
NO CHILDREN PLEASE

name: yoga hOMe retreat
description:
Stay at our elegant country oasis within the city of Asheville! Enjoy the privacy and solitude of a rural retreat on 7 acres of rolling meadows, while only a ten minute drive to downtown Asheville.
You'll have the entire downstairs to yourself, with easy parking, private entrance, and your own outdoor patio off the fully equipped, eat-in kitchen. Relax after a long day of hiking in the full living room with pull out bed. Both spacious bedrooms have comfy queen beds and en-suite bathrooms.

The space
This is a BRAND NEW build dedicated completely as a guest rental. There is a yoga studio upstairs with ongoing classes that you are welcome to join.

name: Cottage Overlooks Waterfall - Near Grove Park Inn
description:
1.3 miles from downtown Asheville and a five minute walk to the Grove Park Inn, this newly renovated 1913 cottage has period features and modern amenities. Enjoy a private deck w/ a 12 ft waterfall, hotel style linens and bath toiletries and 4000 k Amazon Fire TV with Amazon Prime, Netflix and Hulu. Free bottle of wine. Private one car parking pad w/ 14 steps to cottage. Park-like setting equipped w/ hammock, picnic table and grill for your exclusive use.

The space
A beautiful Cottage registered in the National Register of Historic Places in a Swiss Chalet neighborhood that begs you to walk. Well-equipped kitchenette with small refrigerator, dishwasher, electric drip coffee maker, microwave, and toaster oven. Breakfast beverages (coffee, tea, hot chocolate, creamers and sweeteners) supplied. The bathroom includes a spacious shower and all new fixtures. All original artwork including 19th century prints, Japanese vases and sculpture and oil painting.

name: Quiet Backyard Apartment
description:
Airy 2 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment on top of a hill in a quiet neighborhood convenient to both Biltmore Village and Downtown Asheville. We are about a 10 minute drive from downtown and a 5 minute drive to the Biltmore Estate. This space sits just behind the main house and has its own private entrance.
This space is available to people who are taking a little bit longer to get to know Asheville. We do not accept reservations for shorter than 30 days. Guests of all backgrounds are welcome!

The space
This is a completely separate 2 bedroom one bathroom apartment above a workshop in our backyard. It has it's own entrance and is secluded from the main house. It has a well equipped kitchen for longer term guests. The furnishings and the appliances are brand new and will allow guests to treat it as their own home. The apartment also has it's own washer and dryer available free of charge.
It is perched on top of a hill and offers lovely views of the neighborho

name: Biltmore South Retreat
description:
Charm abounds in this sweet, sunny, upstairs apartment. With lots of windows and natural light, this lovely tree lined property is located in a quaint, friendly neighborhood. The energy here has been lovingly cultivated through years of spiritual practice, and is uniquely pristine and nurturing.

Only 5-10 minutes from Asheville's wide array of activities, including the Biltmore Estate, Downtown Asheville, the Arts District, the Blue Ridge Pkwy, shopping, amenities and I-40.

The space
This is a separate upstairs apartment, with the host apartment below. There is one bedroom, one bath, a sitting / guest room with a pullout bed, a full kitchen, washer / dryer. There is onsite parking for 2 - 3 cars.

Guest access
You will have access to the entire upstairs apartment, with one bedroom, kitchen, living room, sitting room, and one bath.

Other things to note
We have company most Wednesday eves, but this should

name: Modern Gem -  Peaceful Relaxing Getaway
description:
Welcome to our beautiful Asheville home located 10 minutes from downtown and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Newly remodeled with a freshly updated kitchen and baths. Newly installed Central Heating and Air Conditioning. This home is located close to Breweries, Hiking, Parks and Rivers, and the Biltmore Estate's main attraction.

The space
There is a large front porch with comfortable and relaxing chairs that face a nice spacious lawn. Gather around the fire pit for evening cocktails or just roasting marshmallows. The inside of the newly remodeled house is very spacious with a large living room that opens into a beautiful well-stocked kitchen with a dining area. All this opens up to a large deck via a sliding door with a table and chairs and additional seating with views of the yard and lots of trees. The master bedroom is large with a queen-size bed and a large closet with its own private bathroom. The rear guest bedroom has a queen-size bed and the front bedroom has a

name: HeirloomHeArt - 10 Miles from Downtown Asheville
description:
“HeirloomHeArt”, in Candler, is a contemporary/countryish house with a comfortable, walkout, private apartment on the lower level.

Your apartment, with eclectic decor, has its own front patio and sunroom. Out back, overlooking the rugged and heavily shaded back yard, is a deck and an eclectic garden.

This Business Analyst and Journalist look forward to your visit!

The space
You'll likely be greeted by our sweet Georgia, our Shepard mix and probably never see Cyd the, much loved but "worthless", cat that owns us all!

Asheville's mountain charm offers a diversity of pleasures that respond to a wide mix of tastes, frolic, and laidbackness.

We are welcoming people and lovers of Asheville and North Carolina who enjoy ensuring our guests are comfortable.

Guest access
Lower level around the apartment and garden areas.

Other things to note
Our neighborhood is quiet and peace

name: Jennie's Bed and Breakfast
description:
A delicious breakfast is included every morning of your stay! Forget hotel buffets where you have to wait in line for a substandard meal. Jennie will make you the breakfast you want. Read the reviews! You won't be disappointed. Private master bedroom and bathroom in a beautiful setting, 4 mi from downtown Asheville. Enjoy all Asheville has to offer with convenient access to downtown via Uber, car or local bus lines. Home Stay Permit Number 20-07719. Vetted/Inspected by the City of Asheville.

The space
Guests enjoy privacy in the master bedroom with private bathroom, and enjoy all of the amenities of the house. Complimentary WiFi, and full use of kitchen are included. Living room has a 40" Smart TV with basic cable including ESPN (Netflix and Amazon Prime are available on the television with your subscription.) Washer and dryer available. Kitchen has a smaller television (20") which also has basic cable. The house has three bedrooms and two bathrooms. I live here

name: Downtown Asheville Condo - right in the heart of things.
description:
Visit Asheville like an insider with Banjoe Vacations! Our professionally cleaned and sanitized condo is a fantastic escape right now. We are taking extra precautions and following CDC guidelines to ensure the condo is ready, letting you relax worry-free. This great downtown location means you can walk to anything you'd want to do in town. Over 10 breweries and the fantastic downtown restaurants are all within easy reach. When you've had enough, come relax in the condo, complete with everything you need from fluffy towels to coffee for the Keurig. From here you are 5 minutes from the River Arts District and 10 minutes from the Biltmore Estate. Free parking (for 1 car) in the garage. And our guest room can be made up as either two twins or as a king-sized bed. Just let us know which you'd prefer.

The space
We are in a brand new building, right in the middle of downtown Asheville. With free parking (for one car) in our garage, you can leave your car behind. The con

name: The Grovenest
description:
Gorgeous 1000 sq. feet 2 bedroom apartment with private entrance and huge private covered deck on the lower level of our mountain home (built in 2016). With forest on all sides of the deck, it is like living in a treehouse in spring and summer, gorgeous colors in fall, mountain views late fall and winter. Only 4 miles/10 minutes from downtown Asheville! Parking for 2 cars max (strict) and 4 guest max (strict).

The space
- Parking for 2 cars maximum [Strict]
- 4 guests maximum [Strict]
- Avgs 5 to 6 degrees cooler than downtown
- Kitchen stocked with paper towels, coffee filters, trash bags, salt, pepper, sugar, non-dairy creamer, dishes, wine opener, pots & pans, coffee maker, blender.
- Starter packets of coffee
- Bathroom stocked with toilet paper, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, hair dryer, trash bags
- Towels & linens included
- Extra blankets & pillows
- 3 TVs: 42 inch in living area, 32 inch in both bedrooms
- H

name: ShovelheadExpress
description:
Welcome to the Shovelhead Express! This property is located in a prime spot convenient to everything! It is a quiet, safe location. Enjoy the retro decor with the amenities! It’s a 1 bedroom with a full-size bed and an Ikea sofa bed to comfortably accommodate 4. The main living space has a TV with provided Netflix. Well behaved dogs are welcome. (You are responsible for cleaning up after them!) No Cats! (Unless you can convence me your cat is not destructive and willing to pay for damage!)

The space
You are close to everything but the property sits within the buffer zone of the Blue Ridge Parkway. Also, this property is about 100 yards from US25A (Sweeten Creek Road), one of the area’s main arteries. If you turn right in 3.6 miles you’ll be at gates of the Biltmore Estate! Downtown Asheville is only 5 miles away. This will be one of the closest complete properties to downtown considering this type of rental being heavily regulated (banned) within the city li

name: The River House 14 min to DT Sleeps 10 Hot Tub
description:
Professionally Managed

Professionally cleaned

Linens provided

HOT TUB!!

Fully stocked kitchen

Long range views

Treehouse-style in the summer

3 bedroom 2 bath

Sleeps 10

Three Kings, Two Futon Queens

6 mins to Blue Ridge Parkway

14 mins to Asheville proper

32 mins to Asheville Airport

15 mins to the Biltmore Estate

Gas fire logs

Tankless water heater

Strong wifi

Central heat and air

Outdoor gas grill

Sunny Deck

2-50-inch smart TV's with Chromecast

Uber and Lyft friendly.

The space
WelcOMe to your hOMe in the NC mountains!. This space is an energetic design combining elements of a Boutique Hotel and a Luxury hOMe, where your every need is anticipated and absolute comfort is at hand. You will find simple elegance and attention to detail i

name: Cedar Springs Farm Campsite- bring your own tent
description:
Your basecamp is a freshly mown area for tent camping easily accessible from your car in a small grassy field. We are conveniently located just one mile outside Asheville city limits for your downtown experience, and easy driving distance from mountain and river adventures.

The space
Bring your own tent and camping gear, I'll provide solar string lights, and solar stake lights to light the camp with soft light enough for you to find your personal pee-potty tent at night! (Even though it says 1 bed on this listing, there's not, the site doesn't let me say 0 beds!)

Enjoy a solar-heated shower, and experience the surprising comfort of a composting toilet. You can enjoy a campfire at night, grill your food, and eat your meals at a softly-lit and umbrella'd picnic table.

We are a working farm growing medicinal herbs and happy free-range chickens. We have two territorial farm dogs so if you choose to bring yours, we all must be vigilant to kee

name: CHIC MOUNTAIN FOREST GETAWAY - 4 bdrms
description:
Tucked away in Asheville's enchanted forest...get away to a magical 4 bdrm secluded, mountain retreat. Immaculately clean, cozy, airy dream home w/ vaulted ceilings, wood burning stove & forest views. Surrounded by trees, wildlife & trickling stream. Couple acres of tranquility, yet 15 mins to Downtown AVL & The Biltmore! 8 mins to Blue Ridge Parkway hiking. Close to all that AVL offers. Yet off the beaten path in a peaceful, invigorating landscape. 3 TVs, WIFI, Netflix, BBQ, Hammocks, Fire Pit!

The space
Escape to a magical oasis...where modern comforts and luxurious touches meet the rustic natural beauty and sweet energy that these mountains have to offer. A "choosy" nature lovers delight! When you're looking for a unique Asheville experience, that captures balancing natures seclusion and convenient proximity to downtown, Biltmore, breweries, the Blue Ridge Parkway, everything - this is it! A quiet, private, peaceful mountain place to unwind, get creative, writ

name: Stuck in the Middle south Asheville near airport
description:
Sunny, 3 Bedroom home in South Asheville Area near airport. Arden Fletcher area. Private, dead end road. In the middle of everything! Biltmore, Dupont State Forest, Tryon Equestrian Center, WNC Ag center, all the fun of Downtown Asheville. Plenty of parking for your RV, horse trailers, or cars. Basement has ping pong table and game room. All new furniture and new mattresses. We have a Keurig coffee pot. Gas fireplace. Whirlpool tub in master bathroom. Washer and dryer included. Fire pit.

The space
We are in the middle of everything. We are close to Asheville but also near Hendersonville. Close to Brevard and not far from Chimney Rock. Like the name says: Stuck in the Middle. We also have white squirrels and turkeys sometimes which I think is really neat. Plenty of parking if you have an RV or horse trailer. We are:
2.4 miles to WNC Agriculture Center
2.5 miles to Airport
4.8 miles to Sierra Nevada
9.4 miles to NC Arboretum
9.5 miles to

name: Cozy Cottage Near Town
description:
This cozy cottage located just outside city limits is 1.4 miles from Haywood Road (West Asheville), 4.5 miles to downtown. Cottage is located about thirty feet behind our home in a peaceful and quiet residential area that has a country feel but is very close to town. The building has windows on all sides and has great natural light. It's a stand-alone building.

The space
There are seven stairs leading to the door. Well-stocked kitchen has a full-sized oven, microwave/convection oven, small fridge, electric kettle, dishes, and cookware. Wake up to some coffee from the press or standard maker. There's a smart TV to allow access to any streaming subscriptions you may have but there is no cable.

There's a small bathroom with shower. Building is well-insulated and cozy with ductless heat pump.

All bedding is provided along with towels. The queen bed downstairs is new, a comfortable 12" foam one. The king bed in the loft has a 3 inch foa

name: ❤APARTMENT STYLISH/FREE BREAKFAST &AVL10MINS !
description:
Welcome to a newly renovated home located▪︎2 miles to Haywood Rd ▪︎6 miles to Downtow Asheville▪︎Uber for only$10▪︎Experience a quiet Private property with off road parking •Full kitchen Living room area▪︎Queen bed▪︎Daybed with trundle and Sofa bed bath▪︎large TV, Netflix▪︎wifi ▪snacks drinks▪︎Professionally cleaned▪︎Enjoy the city surrounded by mountains. Nationally known floral attraction along the Blue Ridge Parkway.Eateries•local micro breweries•shops•boutiques •galleries •shows.

The space
A beautiful place designed to please and accommodate our guests. Perfect for families, professionals, and people looking to enjoy all that Asheville has to offer. Convenient to Biltmore Estates, Chimney Rock, Lake Lure, Blue Ridge Parkway, and Mt Mitchell. Enjoy our local festivals, parks, and local breweries,all the restaurant in Haywood Rd 7 mins -- West Asheville - 5 minutes
• Downtown Asheville - 10 minutes
• River Arts District - 9 min

name: Retro Apartment- Trailer  5 min to Downtown Ash
description:
Come be our guest at the Rigsby House! We are conveniently located 3.2 miles from Downtown Asheville. 500 sq feet of living space made comfortable for our guests to enjoy.

The space
This newly rebuilt one bedroom and one bath retro apartment trailer has a fully functioning kitchen that makes stays convenient. This apartment is equipped with a full size laundry room for our guests to use. Our guests have a private entrance with convenient parking. Cable TV & Unlimited wifi with password is provided.

Guest access
Full access to the apartment!

name: Mtn. Views, Hot Tub, 10 min. to DT and Biltmore H.
description:
"Stay in style" in this New Eco-Friendly"home, quiet neighborhood, 10 min from downtown Asheville and Biltmore House. We love to give everyone who stays in our home a five star experience. We have tried to include every amenity you could possibly need during your stay. We live right next door and want to be as involved as you would like us to be. Never hesitate to reach out to us about anything at all because our goal is to always improve!

The space
The home is in a well-established neighborhood at the end of a cul-de-sac. It is a very quiet area conveniently located in Asheville. Surrounded by woods, you may observe a flock of turkeys taking off to roost in the trees. Appreciate the peaceful setting, enjoy a leisurely meal on the screened in porch, and relax in the hot tub.

Our just finished house has brand-new furniture and an open space living area with large picture windows to gaze into the sunset and enjoy the mountain views. You feel like you a

name: Walkable West Asheville
description:
Join us in the heart of West Asheville, home to breweries, river sports, art, and all kinds of good times. Our space is new construction and furnished with all the amenities you’ll need for an awesome time. We are conveniently nestled between Haywood Rd. and the French Broad River.

The space
The suite ecompasses the entire first floor of our home. The space is 700+ sf with a private key-coded entrance, separate HVAC, personal laundry room, and off street parking in the driveway. There are no shared spaces.

name: Asheville's la Casa Apartment on Hip Haywood
description:
"Location location location! If you're hot to check out the best of West Asheville you can't beat it-lots of yummy restaurants, cool cafes, unique stores very nearby. The suite has everything you need and was a pre-school in its recent past, and some of the amenities reflect that. If you want an eclectic, spacious, unique place to plant yourself for weekend away with friends, Stephanie and David's place is perfect. Walkable to everything with easy check-in and check-out"
Kristen -Berkley, CA

The space
La Casa is ideal for small groups, couples or families. Located in the heart of West Asheville, just a one-minute walk to popular dining, shops and music venues. This 1,600sqft apartment is an open studio plan, with comfy beds, 1.5 bathrooms and a down-home feel with shabby-chic decor that makes one think of that well-loved and broken-in family mountain house. Child and *dog-friendly with two fenced-in dog areas (please see below for PET POLICY + FEE). Th

name: Five Stars in Five Points
description:
In the heart of one of Asheville's vibrant neighborhoods, you'll find a clean, cozy, newly renovated peaceful and private place to rest with a gated entry and covered porch, nestled in an expansive Dame's garden in the coveted Five Points Neighborhood. Here you will find yourself less than a mile from downtown, with easy access to all the very best Asheville has to offer. Free street parking and and a lit walk up the gravel drive.

The space
Freshly updated private bathroom and newly renovated private bedroom and sitting room are adorned with classic pieces like a brass bed, cotton linens, wingback chair, antique bookcases, and eclectic art. You'll find treats for the weary traveler, fresh ground coffee, coffee maker, and a small fridge. We always use best practices for disinfecting and sanitizing this home.

Let the french doors of your private entrance entreat you to savor a moment on your own little covered porch. Wander the gardens and traverse t

name: 1 Mile To Downtown Asheville Breakfast Included
description:
Located just 1 mile north of downtown Asheville in the Woolsey Dip region of North Asheville. Enjoy our gorgeous studio suite located on a 2 acre property. The cottage is a completely separate unit with a private entrance. 400 square feet with a bathroom and kitchenette, heart of pine floors from the old cobble shop in Biltmore Village, antique stain glass windows throughout, vintage decor and a queen size bed.
We are pet friendly, please inquire with us about your pet before you book.

The space
Enjoy AC and heat, a full bathroom with lush towels, shampoo and conditioner, hand cut soap and bath robes. The queen size bed is fitted with organic cotton crisp sheets.

We have a Roku TV, ( which provides Netflix, Amazon, Sling TV, Hulu, CBS News, Google Play, VUDU and PBS,) wifi and a radio for entertainment. We do not have conventional cable. Sling TV provides you with several cable TV channels.

We offer a continental breakfast the first mor

name: Blue Ridge Parkway Treehouse
description:
This one of a kind tree top guest house is located adjacent to the Blue Ride Parkway where you can bike or hike from the back door and into Bent Creek and Mills River. It sits above the French Broad River where you can easily access the river to paddle, SUP, or fish. Perfect for 2-3 people who love the outdoors yet want to be close to the Asheville area. This property is 10 minutes to downtown and is also pet friendly.

The space
This fabulous guest house is situated on 15 acres in a beautiful wooded area with views of nearby mountains and biking/hiking trails out the backdoor. The home sits just below the Blue Ridge Parkway and provides easy access to the parkway, bent creek,mills river and the french broad river. The guest house is brand new with beautiful custom finishes throughout, tons of natural light, and views of the mountaintops.

Guest access
The guests have access to the guest house that is above the garage. There is a private ent

name: Modern Biltmore Village Guest Suite
description:
Welcome to our modern guest suite in Biltmore Village! Completely remodeled with new, hotel-like amenities. Our central location could not be better. Walk to 20+ restaurants, breweries and bars! Only 1/4 mile to the Biltmore Estate gate, 2 miles to downtown Asheville, 1 mile to Mission Hospital and easy access from I-40. Enjoy a queen bed, a convertible sofa, fantastic bathroom, bistro table and chairs and tv/wifi. A great space to relax in after a day of sight seeing!

The space
Our home sits up on a hill and feels so private like your own tree house, yet close to everything. The guest suite is connected to our home on one end and has its own private, outside entrance. It’s a loft-like studio with 10' ceilings, and natural light throughout. Enjoy 500 square feet of living space with cable TV, WIFI and A/C. Everything in our guest suite is new as of 2018! The queen bed has 450 thread-count sateen sheets with a hypoallergenic mattress protector, down duvet and memo

name: Bearview Cabin minutes from Parkway and Downtown
description:
Bearview Cottage is newly renovated. It has log siding and a generous partially covered deck, with outdoor table and chairs. It looks onto one of the largest mountain peaks in Asheville. Nice wooded lot in a quiet neighborhood.
A wonderful bear theme, which have been seen on or around the property.

Fully stocked kitchen, dish washer, ice maker, dishes, cooking items, etc.

Spacious 1000 square foot home. Recently converted to a log cabin with a large deck. Gas stove for cool mountain days.

The space
Very convenient to all of Asheville.
2 miles off I-40

Guest access
Washer and dryer included

Other things to note
Detailed instruction book on coffee table for instructions using the internet, sling tv and propane gas fireplace.

The drive Bearview Cabin is located on is a private single lane drive. We are on the side of a mountain and the last 30 feet is steep. Front wheel dri

name: Modern & Cozy Home with Mountain Views
description:
Cozy, modern retreat near Blue Ridge Parkway. 2 bed, 1 bath, close to town!
Our place is close to parks, great views, art and culture, restaurants and dining, and breweries. From our house you are moments away from the Blue Ridge Parkway, NC Arboretum, French Broad River. Downtown is 15 minutes away by car. The new Asheville Outlet Mall is 5 minutes away.You’ll love our place because of it’s convenient location. Accommodates 4 or less guests. Must be 21 years of age. No heavy traffic allowed.

The space
The entire space is for you.

name: Cozy Cruise Inn
description:
Cozy, modern retreat near Blue Ridge Parkway. 2 bed, 2 bath, close to town!
Our place is close to parks, great views, art and culture, restaurants and dining, and breweries. From our house you are moments away from the Blue Ridge Parkway, NC Arboretum, French Broad River. Downtown is 15 minutes away by car. The new Asheville Outlet Mall is 5 minutes away.You’ll love our place because of it’s convenient location. Accommodates 4 or less guests. Must be 21 years of age. No Heavy traffic allowed.

The space
The entire space is for you.

Other things to note
In the home you will see several model cars to decorate the property, they are not toys. Please do not move the cars or allow kids to touch them. Thank you in advance for following this request!

name: Biltmore Village Hideaway
description:
Biltmore Villa Hideaway is a Dog-Friendly Property - we love our furry friends! If you'll be bringing your dog with you, use the "Personal Message" box when making your reservation to tell us their weight (40 lb. limit). A Vacation Planner from Carolina Mornings Vacation Rentals will contact you within 72 hours of acceptance of your booking to collect the pet fee.

Off-Street Parking in Biltmore Village! Experience a piece of Asheville's history at Biltmore Villa Hideaway, a well-appointed condominium just a stone's throw away from an impressive selection of boutique shops, art galleries, and gourmet dining.

Show off your culinary skills in the fully equipped kitchen and serve a home cooked meal at the large dining table. Cozy up by the gas fireplace in the living room and watch movies on the flat-screen TV with cable service.

Don't forget your furry friend Fido, this property is pet-friendly (with restrictions)! This vacation rental is located in A

name: The Owl's Nest Studio Apt. North Asheville
description:
Come relax and enjoy the views from the private screened in porch, private guest garden with sun deck, or from inside the apt. The choice is yours. At the end of the day, have a restful evening in the comfy king size bed. Mornings are easy with coffee, tea, granola, or make some toast with the homemade bread.
Internet password is on the fridge and you can log onto your favorite streaming accounts. We thoroughly clean and disinfect after every guest. No smoking on the property.

The space
In addition to our routine cleaning, we wipe down all hard surfaces with disinfecting wipes and use disinfecting spray on sofas, not just during cold and flu season, but year round, after each guest. ALL bed linens are washed after every guest.
The kitchen area does NOT have a stove but does have a sink, fridge, microwave, toaster oven, Keurig coffee maker, electric tea kettle, and blender. We provide milk, butter, and jams, coffee pods, and a variety of tea.

description:
Cozy, complete studio apartment in Western Asheville private home.
Near Asheville Outlet Mall, Blue Ridge Parkway Brevard Road (NC191) entrance, I 26 exit 33 and NC Arboretum.
544 sq ft, full private bathroom, kitchen area and walk-in closet.
First floor with private entrance and terrace overlooking lovely garden surrounded by trees in the Blue Ridge foothills.
Very private on quiet street with off-street parking.
Washer, dryer and iron/board available.
Small sofa opens to make third bed.

Other things to note
Please note two possible additions to rental cost: 1) There is a cleaning surcharge of $10 per day per visit (up to $25 per week stay) if a dog is in party, and also that cats will normally not be accepted due to allergy concerns; and 2) There is an extra charge of $10/day for a third person of any age requiring a third bed. These charges will be requested through Airbnb if they are to be included.

Please note that b

name: Sunset Peaks
description:
Sunset Peaks is a Dog-Friendly Property - we love our furry friends! If you'll be bringing your dog(s) with you, use the "Personal Message" box when making your reservation to tell us how many and their weight. A Vacation Planner from Carolina Mornings Vacation Rentals will contact you within 72 hours of acceptance of your booking to collect the pet fee.

Sunset Peaks has it all: convenience to town, easy accessibility, and panoramic year-round mountain views! Enjoy spectacular sunsets from the deck and nearly every room in the house, plus access to dining, shopping, and entertainment, all located just a few miles away in South Asheville.

The fully equipped kitchen features a gas range and will delight the chef in your group. Or take advantage of the mountain weather and grill out with the best views in town!

Kick back by the gas fireplace and watch your favorite cable TV shows, plus there's access to streaming services (guests must use their own acc

name: Mountain Modern Home-Away-From-Home (North AVL)
description:
Relax into this beautiful remodeled North Asheville mother-in-law suite with private screened-in porch amid mature wooded grounds.

This comfortably-appointed space is:
1.7 miles from Merrimon shops, restaurants (Early Girl, Avenue M), grocery stores (Ingles, Fresh Market)
2 miles from Beaver Lake & Bird Sanctuary
2.5 miles from Grove Park Inn & Golf Course
3.5 miles from UNCA and Botanical Gardens
4 miles from Downtown Asheville shops, breweries, restaurants
6.5 miles from Biltmore Estate

The space
Nestled in cozy rolling hills, North Asheville is a sought-after, idyllic neighborhood defined by quiet and natural beauty. Within this neighborhood, your home-away-from-home awaits...

Picture a wooded sanctuary filled with birdsong in the morning. Imagine a Mountain Modern studio-style hideaway that is yours alone: a dedicated guest suite with parking space, a separate entrance, a spacious, private screened porch,

name: Vista View Lodge
description:
Vista View Lodge is a Featured Dog-Friendly property. If you'll be bringing your dog(s) with you, use the "Personal Message" box when making your reservation to tell us how many and their weight. A Vacation Planner from Carolina Mornings Vacation Rentals will contact you within 72 hours of acceptance of your booking to collect the pet fee.

Large Group Property with Mountain Views! Perfect for get-togethers and reunions, Vista View Lodge comfortably accommodates groups and large families with three levels of comfortable living and multiple gathering areas.

You'll appreciate the convenience of being able to cook your own meals in the fully equipped and newly
updated kitchen and eat-in while on vacation. Cozy up by the great room's stone fireplace to share a warm mountain lodge atmosphere and a movie on the flat-screen TV with cable service.
Good times await in the recreation room with a wood stove, wet bar with mini-fridge, and pool table.

name: Black Oak
description:
Gorgeous Home with Mountain Views! A Green Built NC Gold Certified home, Black Oak offers the ideal location if you're seeking in-town convenience coupled with uninterrupted, south-facing mountain views. This upscale North Asheville home also enjoys a quiet end-of-road neighborhood location.

Imagine cooking your favorite homestyle meal in the gourmet kitchen, then dining with a million-dollar view from the dinner table. Take advantage of the cool breeze and enjoy the gas grill on the covered deck, a refreshing place to relax in any weather.

Cozy up by the gas fireplace in the living room and watch movies on the flat-screen TV with satellite service (with bonus movie & NFL packages!). This vacation rental is located in North Asheville and is approximately 6 miles driving distance to downtown.


• 3-Story House
• 3 Bedrooms: 1 King Bed & 2 Queen Beds, plus a Queen Murphy Bed
• 3 Full Baths & 1 Half Bath
• Main Level: Master Suite/Bedro

name: Rufus’ Retreat
description:
Welcome to Rufus’ Retreat! Conveniently located 2.5 miles from Downtown Asheville//3 miles from the River Arts District//1.5 miles to UNCA, this freshly renovated 1 bedroom 1 bath apartment comes fully equipped with all essentials guests may need for a cozy getaway in the mountains.

**Check out our other listing: Ralph’s Retreat (lower apartment)!

The space
The space is open and airy, located a short drive//walk//bike ride to downtown Asheville, the River Arts District, UNCA and West Asheville.
Asheville Community Yoga, DanceClub Asheville, Acupuncture Center of Asheville, Zillicoah Brewery, Gingers Revenge Brewery, the French Broad River and Beaver Lake are all within walking distance of Rufus’ Retreat.

Guest access
The entire upstairs apartment is available for guests. Please be mindful that there may be guests staying in the downstairs apartment during your stay.

Other things to note
Rufus’ Retreat

name: Spacious Getaway close to Biltmore and Beer
description:
Full lower floor in a huge house with lots of light and windows. Completely private with private entrance. Brand new space and we didn't cut corners on the amenities. Located in South Asheville in the country but minutes to shopping. About 15 minutes from downtown. About 12 minutes from Biltmore Estate.

The space
Completely furnished with beds for 10 people. Four bedrooms are very versatile and can be joined or separated. We installed curtains between each of the two bedrooms for safety reasons. Full kitchen with all supplies - cooking utensils and dinnerware. An enjoining patio can create a serine space after a day of sightseeing. Just a few minutes to stores, shopping, the Biltmore Estate. Downtown is about a 15-20 minute drive.

Guest access
The entire lower floor with private entrance, patio and 1500 sq of space.

name: Deer Run
description:
Cozy Log Cabin with Satellite TV! Just ten miles northwest of downtown Asheville, Deer Run invites you to sit a spell in the front porch rocking chairs and gaze out at the mountain horizon.

You'll appreciate the convenience of being able to cook your own meals in the fully equipped kitchen and eat-in while on vacation. In the evening, gather around the fire pit, tell tall tales, and look up at star-filled skies. This vacation rental is located in Asheville and is approximately 20 minutes driving distance to downtown.


• One-Story Cabin
• 1 Bedroom with a Queen Bed, plus a Futon
• 1 Full Bath
• Main Level: Bedroom 1 - Queen Bed; Pull-out Futon in Living Area; Full Bath


Important Property Note:
• High Clearance Recommended (SUV/Truck/Crossover)
Please ensure your vehicle has sufficient clearance (i.e. SUV, Truck, or raised sedan). Low-clearance vehicles are not recommended.

name: Red Barn
description:
Romantic Getaway Cabin! Red Barn is the perfect cabin for two with mountain views and a covered front porch. Take a stroll to discover the nearby covered bridge and gurgling stream.

You'll appreciate the convenience of being able to cook your own meals in the fully equipped kitchen and eat-in while on vacation. Cozy up in the living room and watch movies on the flat-screen TV with satellite service.

name: Welcoming West-Side Retreat
description:
Bright and light lower level of our eclectic 1920’s West Asheville bungalow. Technically a studio, there is a bedroom- it just doesn’t have a door in an effort to keep it as open as possible. Queen size bed and a fold-down couch that can sleep one adult or a couple kids. Local art and a little quirk make our space unique and fresh.
We are a close 5 minute walk to Haywood Rd where you can get dinner or catch a show, and just a 3 mile drive to downtown Asheville.
Thanks for checking us out!

The space
Relaxing pad in the heart of the west side. Nice new bed and a spa-like bathroom give our space an extra level of comfort.
Sorry, no pets allowed.

Guest access
Enjoy your own deck over-looking our back yard and woods beyond.

Other things to note
We live upstairs with our young children and share a back yard with a tiny house, you will be able to hear us upstairs. We do our best to keep to ourselves and ke

name: Newly renovated studio NEAR Airport and AVL
description:
Newly renovated studio apartment attached to home. Private entrance, shares 1 wall with the main house that is blocked off. The only shared space is the driveway.

Located near the Asheville airport (2.5mi) and 20mins to downtown Asheville

Private bath. Queen bed, dining table/chairs, couch, microwave, coffee maker, refrigerator/freezer, tv/antenna/firestick

Mini split heater/AC unit with remote

Hardwood floors.
Noise cancelling air purifier

Light blocking curtains

The space
This is a newly renovated studio with mini fridge/freezer, microwave, coffee maker (no stove).

Queen bed, Couch, 40” tv with antenna & fire-stick. Unit has it’s own mini split heater/AC unit with remote.

We clean our home and Air BNB very thoroughly to ensure everyone’s health and safety. We also limit all personal contact, but are as available as you need.

There are 2 loving Labradors that live

name: Your Asheville Adventure Base
description:
The Asheville Adventure Base is the perfect spot for gatherings of families and friends. Conveniently located in North Asheville, this home is only ten minutes from Downtown and is nestled in a wooded, quiet neighborhood on the French Broad River. Its amazing location makes for a quick trip to many breweries, restaurants and UNCA. Though the cheery, light-filled, open concept layout might beckon you to just sit back and relax. We welcome all to stay with us and soak in the beauty of this area!

The space
This home sleeps 6 and includes a fully stocked kitchen, outdoor gas grill, dining area, large living space with TV, and three bedrooms. The master bedroom has an en suite bathroom while the two other bedrooms share a hallways bathroom. Downstairs there is a half bath near the dining/living area as well as a washer and dryer. All you need is here! Make a cup of coffee and gather on the front porch to soak in some mountain air!
We will provide a breakfast o

name: A house in West Asheville, private and walkable
description:
With a private wooded back yard and a creek this place is still walkable to everything West Asheville has to offer: dining, shopping, live music and breweries. Only 5-10 minutes drive from downtown and 10-15 minutes to the airport and Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
This spacious house has 9’ ceilings and an open floor living room. The house has 3 bedrooms and 2.5 baths. There is a walking/running/biking trail right across the road on one side and a creek with trail on the other, the setting is great for someone looking for a private get away that is close to downtown or West Asheville night life. There is an apartment with a full time tenant on the lower level of the house, but there are no spaces shared except for parking in the back yard.

Guest access
Street parking or private parking in the back yard , with a private sitting and grilling area. Wherever you park you need to climb stairs to the front door.

Other things to note

name: Moonlight Ridge
description:
If you'll be bringing your dog(s) with you, use the "Personal Message" box when making your reservation to tell us how many and their weight. A Vacation Planner from Carolina Mornings Vacation Rentals will contact you within 72 hours of acceptance of your booking to collect the pet fee.

Get a taste of the country life less than ten miles from downtown Asheville! Moonlight Ridge offers outstanding views and plenty of room for large group or family getaways. You'll love taking advantage of the home's fully equipped kitchen! Cozy up by the freestanding gas stove in the great room and watch cable channels on the 60-inch flat screen TV. Take advantage of the mountain weather and enjoy the beautiful sunroom or the sitting area on the patio. Relax in the evenings in the new hot tub.

Moonlight Ridge features two master bedrooms, each featuring a king-size bed. The luxurious upper level master bath makes it feel like you're visiting a spa with its soaking tub and vibra

name: Lucy the Vintage Trailer
description:
Lucy the Vintage Trailer is a 1947 camper that has been retrofitted to meet the needs of our visiting guests. Located close to Asheville, Hendersonville, Brevard (home to waterfalls and mountain biking trails), the Asheville Airport, Biltmore Estate, and all the best restaurants, breweries and shops in WNC!

COVID info: we are going to great lengths to keep our Air BnB safe for guests. Please do not book if you have any COVID symptoms or have potentially been exposed within the past 2 weeks.

The space
A full-sized mattress comfortably sleeps two adults. Play board games, work on your laptop, or enjoy your coffee at the cozy dinette. Coffee and tea essentials are provided.

The camper is parked next to our house but still affords plenty of privacy in this quiet, wooded neighborhood.

Lucy is a small 14-foot trailer so she is cozy but comfortable! There is not a ton of extra space for luggage but you are welcome to store belongin

name: Happy Place Haven - Beautiful New Home w/ Firepit
description:
Beautiful new construction home 15-20 minutes to downtown Asheville, and even closer to get to the River Arts District and West Asheville.

This home has been furnished with guests in mind - clean, comfortable, and with a lot of amenities. The backyard deck is peaceful and has a beautiful view.

For those with home office needs, there is high speed internet with over 100 mbps downloads.

Happy Place Haven is an inviting and relaxing homebase while you enjoy the Asheville area.

The space
Whether you are in Asheville for hiking, the food scene, the Biltmore, or the French Broad River, Happy Place Haven is a great place to begin and end your day.

All the mattresses and furnishings are new, and have been selected with comfort and quality in mind. All towels and linens are provided. Hair dryers are also available for use.

The kitchen has plenty of dishware, glassware, silverware, and cookware, so that you can enjo

name: Perfect Base Camp with all you need!
description:
The Wrens’ Nest, Ashevilla! The perfect couples getaway, or executive small home for traveling professionals.

This newly renovated cozy modern space with vaulted ceilings has tons of natural light.

4 miles from downtown, 4.2 miles to Biltmore Village and Biltmore House.

Guests are not required to physically stay 777 days, please see our site for details.

Well equipped kitchen with high end stainless appliances and granite.

Bedroom has luxury linens, queen bed, custom headboard.

The space
In accordance with the city of Asheville planning and urban design department, and by imperial decree of the office of the zoning administrator for the city, this charming unit is on a 30 day rental cycle.

If your desired dates are available, you’re in luck!

Guests will need to message me for help with completing your reservation.

Compare to the average $300/night hotel rate. You ge

name: Daylily Delight- Camper on a farm close to town
description:
Enjoy the comforts of home in this remodeled 23' camper. It's tucked away on the edge of the woods with a tiny creek flowing at the foot of the spacious deck out front (with brand new patio furniture). You have a view of the farm and High Top mountain behind us. You have privacy and many modern conveniences in this small but adequate space. It may even win you over into considering tiny-house living!

The space
***Please be sure to read last paragraph if you plan to bring a pet.***

This 21 acre property is located just 5 miles from the center of Asheville and less than 2 miles from Haywood Rd. in West Asheville ( West is the Best). We're 1 mile outside Asheville city limit.

Due to these uncertain times, I first want to assure you that you’ll find an expertly sanitized, safe, and comfortable place to land. If you have any questions about how we’re being affected here in Asheville/Buncombe County and/or the guidelines specific to the area,

name: Asheville treasure ~ Private apartment
description:
Nestled in an Ivy glen only three miles from downtown Asheville, your oasis awaits. A fully private space. Sleep on a foam air topper over a firm Queen mattress and enjoy the tranquil space of more than 800 square feet to relax and call your Asheville home. Additional 550 square ft. covered deck is furnished to enjoy carry-out dinners alfresco or simply rock on Grandmother's gliders. This quiet family neighborhood sits with easy access to everything on your to-do list.

The space
Designed for your privacy, your suite includes a refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker and television with Netflix. Wifi mesh network assures fast internet access. Queen sleeper sofa makes room for friends or family to share your adventures.

Guest access
Your apartment's private entrance is via your private covered deck with dining and relaxing spaces. Overlooking a lush green back garden, your entry glows with timed cafe lights, when your day's adventure is over,

name: Shelly's Place- walk to Biltmore Village
description:
Be among the first to stay in this totally remodeled 700 sq ft vacation suite! Two blocks from the numerous shops, restaurants, galleries, breweries and events of Biltmore Village, 1/2 mile to the Biltmore Estate entrance, and 2 miles to downtown Asheville ($10 uber!). An abundance of extra artistic touches and curiosities make this a comfortable place to serve as base camp while you explore Asheville or just relax on a rainy day.
Permit# 18-09079.

The space
Enjoy the hand crafted sun-room created with up-cycled materials that connects into the living room and the front porch.
The private front porch has two Adirondack chairs, a porch swing and two tables.

Guest access
Guests have private access to the entire downstairs of the house. There is a small side yard that guest are welcome to use. There is parking space for guests to have two cars.

Other things to note
The downstairs has a kitchenette that i

name: Storybrooke Place
description:
Showcase Estate with High-End Amenities! Storybrooke Place offers guests two separate homes, with a total of five bedrooms, and a beautifully landscaped estate featuring custom stone patios, a raised fire pit, and a private hot tub, among many more delightful amenities awaiting your discovery.

The gourmet cook’s kitchen features a superior performance Viking gas range equipped with a griddle that's perfect for making morning pancakes. Cozy up by a stacked stone hearth - there's a wood-burning fireplace and two wood stoves - and watch movies with the best in media technology, including a Smart TV and SONOS Wireless HiFi multi-room music system (with a portable tablet control center) in the lower level entertainment area.

Take advantage of the mountain weather and enjoy the kitchen patio's Big Green Egg charcoal grill and the custom-built outdoor dining area. At the end of the day, take a long soak in the bubbling hot tub, or try out the master bath's deep soak tub

name: Historic River Arts District Home
description:
Contemporary 2BR/2BA private access apartment within our 1890 Queen Anne Victorian home, 1/2 mile to downtown Asheville, the River Arts District, and the South Slope - steps from the most wonderful eateries, breweries and bars. Right across the river from the hipster West Asheville. A quick 5 mile drive to Biltmore.
Ideal for two couples traveling together, or a group of friends, who can have fun together in the lounge or at the porch and have their privacy in the large and comfy bedrooms.

The space
The nice part is that there are two bedrooms with King size beds and two bathrooms so that everyone has their own private space from one another. If arranged in advance we can put a twin size mattress on the floor in the 2nd bedroom for a 5th person. In the living room space there is a coffee maker, microwave, mini fridge, toaster oven and electric tea kettle. Hang out with your friends on the front porch or in the living room. We have wireless internet if you

name: Walk to downtown Asheville from this chic studio!
description:
The cottage has been completely remodeled and the downstairs studio is ready to welcome you! It is located on a quiet one way street with beautiful mature trees . Enjoy morning coffee or a glass of wine on the covered patio overlooking the grassy yard. Walk 1 block downtown to dine at one of the over 60 restaurants and enjoy art studios, breweries, concert venues and festivals!

The space
The gourmet kitchen is fully equipped with brand new stainless steel appliances and gorgeous soapstone countertops. The bedroom hosts a plush new king bed with luxury linens, walk in closest and large Smart TV. Bath has a tiled glass walk in shower with large vanity soapstone countertops and charming sliding barn door. Living area has a large sectional sofa that could offer additional sleep space and a 42 inch flatscreen TV.

Light and bright! The kitchen seats 4 at the dining table and offers additional bar stool counter space seating. Entire space has light grey hardw

name: The Robin's Nest secluded garden retreat.
description:
Bright and airy guest suite with a private entrance located on a half acre park like property. Protected forest borders the property with the French Broad River just beyond it.
This sleepy community offers peace and quiet yet is just a stones throw from some of Asheville's best bars, breweries and restaurants as well as the River Arts District, Biltmore Estate and of course Downtown.
Perfect for single travelers or couples.

6 minute drive to downtown or skip the parking and Uber or Lyft.

The space
This private room is part of a larger home. Enjoy your own front porch area and outdoor fire pit, a deluxe king size bed with premium sheets, fresh linens and towels, and amenities like shampoo and soap while you stay. A large armoire in the bathroom is available for your use to hang clothing or store personal items.

The Space - The Kingsize bed is a brand new Serta Perfect Sleeper with a separate pillow top cover. There is a night table

name: Mountain views close to everything in Asheville!
description:
Come stay away from it all in Asheville! Drive the Blue Ridge Parkway and hike all the wonderful trails for a weekend! Mountain Breeze is a newly remodeled, cozy modern home 10-20 minutes to everything in Asheville with awesome mountain views! Best of both worlds! Get the cabin experience but close to all the top attractions, restaurants, and activities!

Pet Fee:
$125 for 1 dog
$150 for 2 dogs
$175 for 3 dogs
