professionaly designed by a local interior designer.

name: Modern Round House - Mtn Views - 2 Miles to DT AVL
description:
Enjoy beautiful, long range mountain views in all seasons from this unique mountain home. Super convenient location between downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Parkway (8 minute drive to downtown Asheville/ $10 Uber) and only 4 miles to the parkway.

The space
The upstairs level features an open floor plan with fully stocked kitchen, living room with gas fireplace, office, and deck that all look out to views of the Blue Ridge Mountains, as well as the master bedroom with king bed and full bath. Deck includes a grill and comfortable outdoor seating with a propane fire table. The perfect spot to enjoy your morning cup of coffee or a glass of wine/ local beer at the end of the day. Downstairs level has two bedrooms, each with queen beds, one full bath, living room area with TV, and deck. There is also a separate driveway and entrance to this lower level to provide ample parking for your group.

Guest access
Full access to whole house exce

name: Find this amazing house at Upstreamway.com
description:
River Arts District, minutes away from Downtown Asheville. Spectacular Modern Eco-friendly house with a hot tub and amazing mountain views. Designed for large groups and special occasions. The home over looks the French Broad River and the Biltmore Estate.

The space
Sleep 16 people. Designed specifically for vacation rental, this unique setup has all the comforts of home in the middle of all that Asheville has to offer. Parties and events not allowed.

Other things to note
Just bring your toothbrush. We will supply the rest.

name: Modern Mountain View w/hot tub*
description:
Gorgeous & immaculate newly built home in Asheville, North Carolina, only 10 minutes from downtown! House includes fully furnished dream kitchen with beautiful granite countertops, heated tile floors, hardwood bamboo floors, 4 BR, 3 bathroom, 3 car garage, 2 entrances to the house on separate levels to have separate living quarters if desired, front screened in deck and FOREVER MILLION DOLLAR VIEWS. Perfect for your next trip to the Blue Ridge Mountains!

The space
Shower/bath towels (but NOT hot tub towels-please bring your own hot tub towels if you intend to use it), STARTER TOILETRIES (1 toilet paper per bathroom, 1 travel sized shampoo/conditioner/gel per bath, one soap per bathroom, etc...) and basic cleaning supplies are provided. Any additional items can be purchased at the large grocery store about 1 mile away. The house sets at the top of a beautiful subdivision. You don't get these views without a little drive up! So the driveway is steep but completely

name: Magnolia Mountain
description:
Modern Design & Majestic Views! Located just one mile off of the Blue Ridge Parkway and close to a popular hiking trail, Magnolia Mountain is a contemporary retreat with a million dollar view. Topping off this home's bright ambience is an all-glass sunroom--a real treat in any weather!

Savor the aromas of a home cooked meal from the gourmet kitchen! Cozy up in the living room and watch movies on the flat-screen TV with satellite service. Take advantage of the mountain weather and enjoy the gas grill and expansive back deck. Complete your ticket to relaxation with a long soak in the jetted tub.

Guests enjoy garage access, plus there's a full-size ping-pong table! This vacation rental is located in Asheville and is approximately 12 minutes to downtown Asheville.


• 2-Story Home
• 4 Bedrooms: 1 King Bed, 3 Queen Beds & 1 Twin Bed, plus 1 Full Sleeper Sofa
• 3 Full Baths
• Main Level: Bedroom One (Master) - King Bed, attached Full Bath;

name: Rose Hill Country Cottage
description:
Newly Remodeled in 2018! Centrally located in Asheville's beautiful countryside, Rose Hill Country Cottage is the perfect alternative to a hotel room. This quaint, clean cottage features all the comforts of home, including a fully equipped kitchen, a barbecue grill, and a king-size bed. Entertainment options include WiFi and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Relax and enjoy the mountain weather on the wrap-around deck, accessible from both the living and dining areas. You've found an amazing value and a peaceful getaway at Rose Hill Country Cottage! This Asheville vacation rental is located in Asheville and is approximately 10 minutes driving distance to downtown.


• Single-Floor Home
• Fully Equipped Kitchen
• 1 King Bed
• 1 Full Bath
• Cable TV
• Porch with Seasonal Mountain Views
• Quiet Location Convenient to Downtown Asheville


Important Property Notes
• Please note that the cottage has a maximum occupancy of

name: The Daily Condo 201 at 120 College Street
description:
If history repeats itself, then may it always be a replay of Asheville’s Gilded Age. If walls could talk, then a centenarian newsroom would have some spectacular stories to tell. And if location is everything, then The Asheville Times Building @ 120 College Street is the epicenter of all things Asheville.

Welcome to the intersection of past & present, to stories of the Gilded Age, and to the ideal home base for Asheville vacations.
Welcome to The Daily Condo 201 @ the Asheville Times Building.

The space
Historic Building, Iconic Views! Heart of Downtown w/ Private Outdoor Space

Once home to the Asheville Times, the local afternoon newspaper and now the city’s most antique-chic address, this is IT: a 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 500 square-foot condo that breathes Asheville history, embodies the Gilded Age spirit, and incorporates all the modern amenities of the 21st century.

HIGHLIGHTS (many more details, below)

-

name: The Gazette Condo 200 at 120 College Street
description:
Step into in the shadow of history, follow in the steps of the greats, and meet us at the intersection of the Gilded Age and present day.

Welcome The Gazette Condo 200 at 120 College Street in The Asheville Times Building.

By any stick and by every measure, this is Asheville’s most esteemed address. This is where creativity marks prestige and walls do talk. This is the focal point of creative energies and historic importance, artistic wanderings and entertainment prowess.

The space
This is the former headquarters of the local newspaper which changed ownership and names from The Asheville Daily Gazette, to The Gazette-News, to The Times, to The Asheville Times – witnessed the Golden Age of William Sydney Porter (pen name: O. Henry), Thomas Wolfe, and F. Scott Fitzgerald, among other Asheville art royalty. Indeed, 120 College Street is THE creatively prestigious address in Asheville.

This is your home base in Asheville’s crea

name: The News Condo 202 at 120 College Street
description:
Were history to intersect with the present, were the Gilded Age to go modern, were Asheville to center all its creative energies on one special address, it would be here. Right here.

Arguably the most prestigious historic address in Asheville, The News Condo 202 at 120 College Street embodies the wonder, the heritage, and the legacy of a grand Southern city: a centenarian building, erected during the post-Industrial boom and once-headquarters to the Asheville-Gazette then the Asheville Times.

The space
Spacious Stay in a Historic Newsroom! Heart of Downtown with Private Terrace

Here, the city’s most antique-chic address offers an answer to your Asheville wish list: A prestigious and historically significant building, updated for the needs of the modern age. Welcome to The News Condo 202 at 120 College Street in the Asheville Times Building, located at the intersection of past and present, surrounded by the glory of the Gilded Age, and

name: Crows Nest 2.0
description:
The Crows Nest 2.0 is a new green home that was designed to provide a private and comfortable space in our home for guest of all backgrounds. Energy efficiency and modern features allow our guest to make the most of their experience in Asheville and the surrounding areas while treading lightly.
Justin and Autum are both professionals in the community and deeply involved in the outdoor recreation, health / wellness and music community and happy to share their tips and suggestions with guest.

The space
Feel free to park on the premises in the gravel section of the driveway (2 cars fit perfectly). There is also free street parking on the main street.

Your space is a private lower level section of the house with a private entrance. It includes two bedrooms with queen beds, a 14 x 20 main room and ceiling fans in each room. One room has a closet for storage, while the other has easy access to the bathroom.

A full private bathroom, stocke

name: Fresh and Modern Asheville Shipping Container Home
description: This brand-new shipping container home has everything you need for a relaxing getaway.  Lounge on the deck, relax in tranquil surroundings, and feel the breeze through the trees. Step into the luxurious shower for an energy boost, then soak up the spacious feel of this converted world-traveled container. The home is located within walking distance to Blue Ridge Parkway hiking and just a quick drive from local breweries and restaurants.  The house is also equip with Cable TV and blazing fast Wi-Fi service.

name: Charming 3BR, 6 Bed Haven | 10 Min to Downtown
description:
$75 fee per pet
Tucked away on a hill in a quiet residential area is our peaceful 3 bedroom, 2 and a half bathroom home away from home. Here you’ll find room to breathe, plenty of natural light, and just a touch of what’s familiar. We’ve made a peaceful place for you to relax, so you can focus on the next adventure.

The space
Located beside the entrance to the Blue Ridge Parkway and just 10 minutes from Downtown Asheville and the Biltmore Estate, you’ll find you are never too far from adventure and excitement. There’s easy access to I-40, 240, and 26, so getting around town is super convenient.

Make sure to stop by the Folk Art Center just off the Parkway, or head on up to Craggy Pinnacle for a more leisurely parkway experience. If you’re in the mood to shop, you are only 15 minutes from local shops downtown and artisan showrooms in the River Arts District. When it’s time to come back and unwind, you’ll find there’s space for your crowd and thei

name: Heart of Asheville: RAD, West Asheville & Downtown
description:
Enjoy your private suite in the lower level of our beautiful 100-year-old house. We offer a clean, comfy stay convenient to: Downtown (1 mi), River Arts (.5 mi), West Asheville (1 mi), South Slope (1 mi), and Biltmore (2 mi). This is an urban area, next door to a housing authority (low income housing) on a street with historic homes. We live upstairs with our 2 small children. You may hear them, and us, as we all share this big old house.

The space
This location is truly awesome! It's a mile and half from downtown, West Asheville, and the Biltmore house. We're also walkable to the River Arts District (RAD), where you can explore artist studios, a brewery, wine bar, and some excellent restaurants. We suggest using Uber or Lyft at night.

Your suite is completely private with your own dedicated parking and entrance. The living room has a full sized futon (sleeps 1). Local art adorns the walls. The space is light filled and accented with plants. :)

name: West AVL & River Arts Oasis - Private & Walkable
description:
NOTE: We are still taking extra precautions with additional cleaning steps and 48 hours blocked between each guest.

Relax in our light-filled apartment with 9 ft ceilings and modern furniture, once a peaceful yoga studio, now your private home base. Overlooking the nearby river, downtown, and surrounding mountains, it's all about location! Walking distance to everything. Stocked kitchenette, comfy queen bed, sparkling clean bathroom and plenty of space to stretch!

The space
The space is modern and clean with a living room, dining area, fully-stocked kitchenette and a brand new queen-size memory foam bed. Mature trees and a landscaped fenced-in backyard offer views of the mountains and downtown out your windows with plenty of privacy. We do live above with our infant and dog so you may hear us a moving about here and there but we will do our best to keep it down.

We are right by the river - steps from the greenway with miles of trails

name: The Hill on Lexington Market
description:
Breweries, restaurants, bars, civic center and shopping all walking distance. Park in your numbered reserved spot for your stay and walk for the rest of your journey.

The space
We have just expanded the space and it now has a separate bedroom and a futon in the living room so it can accommodate 3 guests. We now have a 58" ROKU 4k TV in the living room and a 4K ROKU TV in the bedroom. There is a sink, electrical outlet and vanity sink in the bedroom. There is also a writing desk with desk top USB and 3 prong electrical outlets. My space is unique because it is located in the Lexington Market area which is the Haight Ashbury type of neighborhood of Asheville. Guests can have a luxurious bath or show in the separate shower with 2 shower heads. Sink, plates, refrigerator, microwave and we have just added a picnic backpack with separate plates, utensil, glasses with a hot cold storage compartment for food. It even has a wine bottle cooler. For those beautifu

description:
Year round beautiful long range views!! Fireplace, deck, fire pit, internet, Roku w/ Sling TV, Wi fi, board games and entertainment.

We are delighted to offer you a private three story 2700 square foot mountain home with stunning panoramic views. 4 bedrooms, 2 1/2 bathrooms 12 minutes to downtown Asheville. Sleeps 13.

Sleeps up to 13 guests

name: Authentic North Asheville Farmhouse, 1890's
description:
The house sits up on a hill overlooking the 5 points neighborhood, less than a mile from downtown Asheville and a pleasant walk away. It's a quiet street, off the beaten path. This 19th century farm house features plenty of natural light, a wood stove, heart pine floors, front & back porches, surrounded by vegetable & flower gardens. (Rental unit has a generous sized private bath with clawfoot tub/shower, although the guests need to walk through one of the bedrooms to access the bathroom).

The space
Vintage stereo receiver and cassette player available in the main room with a wide variety of tapes for your listening pleasure. Clawfoot tub in the bath. Vegetable garden, pear tree, and wildflowers out in the yard, in season. Best coffee shop (high 5) 3 blocks away, Best neighborhood bar in Asheville (Little Jumbo) 2 blocks away. Wind up 78 player with some classic discs for your use in the main room, too. No tv but wifi provided. Upright piano and acoustic b

name: Boho Bungalow in walkable West Asheville
description:
Stay in our new West Asheville Boho Bungalow, located in a quiet residential neighborhood within walking distance to hot West Asheville's Haywood Road. Many breweries, coffee shops, restaurants, bars, grocery stores & shops all within a :15 walk.
We offer your own private apartment with separate private entrance with plenty of available street parking. West Asheville offers many eclectic shops, restaurants, music venues and bars, and is only :07 to downtown or the Biltmore.

The space
Renovated in December 2018, this new apartment offers 400+ sq/ft private living with bohemian decor. The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 full bath with tub, and a sleeper sofa for guests. The Bungalow now includes a semi-private outdoor space complete with a vintage-style patio set for 2 and string lights for ambiance. Perfect for that morning cup of coffee or a beer after your day exploring Asheville. Inside there are many special touches including exposed beams and custom

description:
Treat yourself to a stylish, hip, and relaxing stay at The Montford Jewel! This recently updated space is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom, 1250 square foot downstairs apartment nestled in the Historic Montford district, blocks from Downtown Asheville. We live upstairs above the rental and are happy to accommodate guests in any way during your stay. Our historic home is newly renovated for 2021, and it now offers ample amenities and a cherished experience for guests to enjoy in this perfect location.

The space
Our 1924 historic Montford home features ground-floor access. Prior to check-in, guests will receive a customized code to access the lock box with your key. Guests will enjoy a private entrance with french doors that open onto a furnished patio area. This space contains windows in each room (except the bathroom) to ensure that natural light reaches every corner. The Montford Jewel is an intentionally styled space that encourages its guests to unwind and relax. Als

description:
BEST LOCATION- Conveniently located to downtown and popular attractions.

We are delighted to offer you a private three story 3500 square foot mountain home with stunning panoramic views. 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. Sleeps 16.

description: We are located in a quiet private neighborhood within 10-20 minutes of most Asheville attractions including the Biltmore House, downtown Asheville, shopping, restaurants, Blue Ridge Parkway and numerous hiking trails. AirBnB area allows for guest privacy in a walk-out basement with separate entrance. Feel free to start your day off with a morning workout on the elliptical.

name: New Apartment, Biltmore Village
description:
Brand new apartment in walking distance to Biltmore Village with many shops/eateries/breweries. We are minutes from the Biltmore Estate entrance and about a 5 minute drive to downtown Asheville. Our location is convenient to all Asheville has to offer. This new addition is connected to our primary residence but separated by 6 ft hallway/double doors for privacy/security and completely separate entrance. No shared walls The apartment is approximately 600 sq ft, very spacious w/vaulted ceilings.

The space
We are available if you need us, otherwise we keep to ourselves. We provide pretty much everything you would need for a long weekend or a month if you prefer.

Jim and I have provided short term accommodations for over 7 years through another site. Please feel free to contact us for direction to those reviews for your reference. An added note...we do the cleaning ourselves as we want the space as clean as we’d want for ourselves. We take pride in our cle

name: Rose Ranch Montford 1, central, sterile, secluded
description:
Totally separate from main house, light and cozy, your room has a private entrance and private bath. I sterilize everything! Can be rented in conjunction with "Rose Ranch Montford 2," allowing up to 2 additional guests. In Montford, 20 minute brisk walk to downtown. Wonderful, friendly, diverse neighborhood, 2 blocks from the Historic Riverside Cemetery. Many trees and Victorian homes. Great for walking, running, biking and getting exercise while social distancing!

The space
I have instituted extra cleaning and sanitizing regimes for your entire space, ensuring peace of mind for all. For longer stays, access to our washer and dryer upon request.

The bedroom and bath have been fully updated with new fixtures, windows, walls and floors, cork in the bedroom and marble in the bath. There is free parking on a very quiet street. More people walking dogs pass by each day than cars that drive by! Our place is surrounded by trees with lots of squirrels runnin

name: Charming Asheville Cottage Minutes to Downtown
description:
My home is a comfortable, two-story, open-plan cottage decorated with Oriental rugs and art. It has a fully equipped kitchen, wi-fi and a large-screen television. The back deck offers a nice view of our mountain. I hope it provides you with a good base from which to enjoy Asheville’s sights and the surrounding countryside.

I require a minimum 3-day stay and a maximum of 10. I provide an orientation sheet, as well as suggestions for grocery shopping, restaurants, etc.

The space
If you are a tourist, I am happy to provide you with some information about the area. If you are visiting for family or other reasons, I will be happy to offer such help as I can.

If you are here for hiking, I can provide some suggestions, as well as maps and guidebooks.

I supply coffee and tea for breakfast.

name: Luxury Downtown Asheville Loft
description:
This beautifully remodeled downtown Asheville Loft features a vast open-plan layout, soaring tin tile ceilings, brick walls, hardwood floors, a gourmet chef's kitchen, oversized windows with mountain and city views. Have some fun with the pool table and enjoy the beautiful views from the living room and the balcony. This property is an established rental with great reviews, but a new listing due to new management. Eleven can stay here but one will sleep on a twin in a loft, and two on the sofa.

The space
Our central downtown Asheville location gives you access to everything within easy walking distance. Restaurants, breweries, events and shopping are all close by. The space is gracious and roomy, with great views and all the amenities you will need during your stay.

Guest access
All spaces in this home are accessible with the exception of the supply closet located off the master bedroom.

name: Private and wooded! Minutes to Downtown Asheville!
description:
Private, tree top wooded views. Located on a 4 1/2 acre property in Asheville city limits. Minutes to downtown and west Asheville.
Private entrance, huge porch, king size bed with pull out queen sofa. Quiet, peaceful and private yet close to all of Asheville activities. Great bird watching!
Located near outlet mall, the Blue Ridge Parkway, the Arboretum, and great hiking! Great location to experience all Asheville life and also have a peaceful, private, wooded, get-away!

The space
Sunny and bright private space with large beautiful windows with views.
Due to the Covid pandemic we are committed to ensuring the safety and health of our guests through complying with the strictest cleaning regulations set forth by airbb.

Guest access
Access to entire space.

Other things to note
Friendly dog who may bark some and 1 cat on property.

name: A Country Place in the City
description:
This light and bright bedroom and bath, with its own private entrance, is located in a quiet corner of Montford, one of the oldest and prettiest neighborhoods in Asheville. Surrounded by flowers, vegetable gardens, trees, and lots of birds, this spot is a few blocks from three good restaurants, and downtown Asheville is only a mile away.

It's a unique spot for a getaway, a quiet place to read, rest, write, and work, and well located for exploring the diverse attractions of the Asheville area.

The space
The decor is clean, simple, and cheerful, and includes new bedding and linens.

There is an electric teapot, a Melita coffee pot, and an assortment of teas and coffee, as well as a minifridge and microwave, if you want to breakfast in. But you will probably want to try the breakfasts at nearby All Day Darling as well.

Guest access
While here, guests have the use of the driveway for off-street parking and for sitting out

name: Cheaper than a downtown hotel
description:
ENTIRE GUEST HOUSE 1 MILE FROM DOWNTOWN ASHEVILLE & 1 MILE FROM THE BILTMORE HOUSE.

RELAX ON THE FRONT OR BACK PORCH WHILE ENJOYING THE FRESH ASHEVILLE AIR.

THE KITCHEN IS STOCKED WITH POTS, PANS, DISHES, AND UTENSILS.

*NO PETS ALLOWED
*NO SMOKING IN THE HOME
HUGE BACKYARD FOR PARKING

The space
CLEAN AND COZY!

Guests can access the entire home on the top floor. The top floor has a kitchen, dinning room, 2 living spaces, 3 bedrooms, and 2 baths

Winter: This home has base board electric heat- easy to operate. Turn right to turn heat on or up and left to turn heat off or down.
Summer: This home has electric window air conditioners

description:
Let our fresh one-bedroom apartment located approximately one mile north of dynamic downtown be basecamp for your Asheville adventure. Live like a local in a renovated 1940s mixed-use building walkable to dining and groceries, the park and a greenway. Whether you're in town for business or leisure, our flat is set up to be your home away from home so you can relax and recharge while visiting our Appalachian wonderland.

The space
Sleeps 4
1 bedrooms [1Q] and 1 Q sleeper in living area
Full kitchen with coffee maker and toaster
Full bath
Second-story [stairs required to access]
Front shared balcony with table/chairs
1 parking space included
Apartment is located above office space that is in use M-F approximately 9a-5p

Entire apartment is available for you to enjoy. There is also a shared balcony.

Other things to note
Note the cancellation policy when booking — we do not i

name: Friendly Hollow Haven
description:
Relax in this private guest suite in a quiet neighborhood in West Asheville. The suite features windows with plenty of natural light and a separate entrance looking out over the backyard with large oak trees. Just a five minute drive from bars and restaurants in West Asheville, and fifteen minutes from downtown and from the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
The space includes a large studio bedroom with a queen bed, convertible sleeper sofa (full sized; comfortably sleeps two small children or one adult), and two person table. A mini fridge, microwave, dishes, and coffee/tea station are provided. NOTE: To comply with city of Asheville homestay permit requirements, no stove/range, oven, or kitchen sink are able to be provided. The hallway features full access to laundry and a private bathroom. A locked door at the end of the hall ensures your privacy and you have a private entrance through the backyard with a keypad lock system with a code individualized your stay.

name: Sunny Historic Urban Retreat Easy Stroll Downtown w/ Parking
description: Pull back the curtains in the evening and watch the cityscape shimmering. This second-floor apartment is in a building dating from 1910 and has been fully renovated. It features antique and Mid-Century wooden furnishings, decorative rugs, and colorful artwork.  *Please note we have another apartment on the first floor you can book by searching https://abnb.me/o2Ri8IyK96 or “Historic Urban Getaway Stroll Downtown w/ Parking”

name: Chic, stylish luxury in the middle of downtown fun
description:
When you come to Asheville you want to stay where all the fun is, right? In the middle of all the great restaurants, bars, micro breweries, shops, art galleries, artist studios? You want to park your car somewhere easy and safe, and then walk to all the great and interesting things that Asheville is so famous for? Well, that's exactly what our downtown apartment offers: chic and stylish luxury with private parking in a location that is so central that you'll never need your car.

The space
Our apartment is located in the brand new Asheland building, in the middle of downtown. It faces west with a view over the downtown roofs and the beautiful Blue Ridge mountains in the background, and gets a lot of natural light. Our private balcony offers beautiful sunset views. Inside the decor is modern and warm with a classic Dutch twist. Luxurious finishes and comfortable furnishings, a fully equipped gourmet kitchen, a spacious bathroom with walk in shower, a quiet and comf

name: Asheville Yoga Training? Here's your spot!
description:
Enjoy a private ensuite with queen-size bed, private bath with tub, and sitting area in a beautiful 1920's light-filled home in an historic neighborhood in North Asheville - just a quick walk to downtown, and just one block to Asheville Yoga Center, Liberty House Coffee and Cafe and cycling/fitness studio.

Ample street parking available.

The space
Classic 1920's two-story cottage, in historic first-tier suburb. Nearby neighbors include many stately B&B's like The Beaufort House Inn, Chestnut Street Inn, White Gate Inn.

Guest access
Guests can make themselves at home, and relax in comfort in this beautiful house and grounds. Enjoy the common areas downstairs: living room, dining room and kitchen and the yard filled with several sitting areas and our very own urban vegetable garden. Feel free to lounge on the front porch or enjoy your morning coffee in the backyard. The kitchen is available for you to prepare your self-service bre

name: Lazy Bear Lodge - 12 mins DT AVL, Firepit, Dogs
description:
Come enjoy the mountains! We have taken the CDC recommended steps to ensure your wellbeing.

Fully stocked kitchen, island bar stools, a large table with six chairs, and four more folding chairs in the garage.

The living room has a large TV over the gas fireplace. The lower level has one bunkhouse style bedroom with a queen, a bunk bed with twin on top and doubles on the bottom, a full bathroom, and a family room. The fireplace is gas on the lower level.

The space
This is an excellent location for your mountain getaway. Enjoy the mountain atmosphere while also taking advantage the wonders that the city of Asheville offers.

At this convenient location you are only a matter of minutes away from the top outdoor attractions such as the Blue Ridge Parkway, the NC Arboretum, the Asheville Outlets, and the Biltmore Estate.

The Lazy Bear property is just a mile to Bent Creek Community Park trail system with easy trail acc

name: Touch of Grateful! Cozy comfort! You will get by!
description:
I am a travelling ship captain offering my home as your base whilst I'm at sea. There's a "boaty" quality to the place-compact and comfortable! Locale is quiet residential hood in Fletcher, NC.
Great crash pad for all you outdoor sports junkies! Huge dry covered porch will house all your adventure gear. Brewery hopping is easily done. Uber in minutes to Sierra Nevada.

In minutes-
Airport and I-26 8
Sierra Nevada Brewing 10
Biltmore Estate 20
DTN AVL 25
DuPont State Frst and Brevard 30

The space
This space is new to me and it is a very comfortable little pad. It has two bedrooms and full kitchen in an open floor plan. Big comfy couch, great water pressure, big hot water heater, fast wifi, new 55 inch UHD TV.

Very warm and cozy in winter, cool in summer. Great sleepy space, you get in here and can't hear a thing going on outside.

This is the lower floor of a two level duplex. The uppe

name: Local Asheville Getaway w/ a Gorgeous View!
description:
FOLLOWING ALL COVID-19 PRECAUTIONS!

We are a family owned property, with a small quaint Asheville apartment! You will no doubt have a quiet and peaceful stay. Facing the Blue Ridge Parkway we have the appeal of the beautiful mountains in our backyard. We have worked hard to make sure you enjoy your stay, and we hope you enjoy your time here in Asheville!


-5 minutes to Biltmore Village

-10 minutes to Downtown Asheville

-Local art, breweries, and attractions within minutes!

Thank you!!

The space
Quaint apartment space! Nice and cozy for a couple, someone visiting family in the area, or a local business trip!

Take advantage of the small deck and additional patio with gas grill!

Guest access
Feel free to take advantage of the huge back yard!

Other things to note
- NO Pets Allowed
- NO Smoking
- NO Loud Music or Parties
- Maximum of 2

name: Explore Asheville from a Radiant Carriage House
description: Start the day brewing coffee in a cheerful kitchen with vivid wood surfaces and a breakfast bar. This cozy, open-plan carriage house offers endless warmth by way of its modern furnishings and charming decor, all under a paneled gable ceiling.

name: MountainTop Escape
description:
MOUNTAINTOP ESCAPE**** Newly updated in February 2021! New Chef's kitchen and Beverage Bar, 4 updated Bathrooms including 3 completely new! We now have 5 Bedrooms with private en-suite Bathrooms!!****Our incredible 7 acre, 5,000 square foot secluded end-of-the-road mountaintop luxury estate --'MountainTop Escape'-- has 360 degree long range panoramic mountain views. Currently Airbnb does not allow "parties" or "events" Family gatherings are still welcomed

The space
The Coronavirus can be a formidable enemy so we are taking extra-special precautions and doubling our efforts to clean and sanitize all surface areas and anywhere you may touch. This has been and will continue to be our NUMBER ONE GOAL.
Our property manager, JCV Properties, and our dedicated cleaning staff are passionately following all CDC, State of North Carolina and Buncombe County cleaning standards and habitation rules and procedures. We have secured an abundance of approved supplies.

name: Blue Ridge Retreat
description:
Charming, walkable neighborhood close to many great amenities in West Asheville. Short drive to hiking, breweries, the River Arts District and many great restaurants. Well behaved dogs are ok. $25 pet fee required

The space
Spacious, clean studio space with coffee bar, television, wifi, large bathroom with tub and shower.

Other things to note
We moved into this new, custom built home in November 2018. You will feel as if you’re the first to stay here! Everything feels and works as if it were new because it is!

name: Bears' Den on Buffalo Mtn
description:
Clean & modern space in nature:
Fantastic for outdoor enthusiasts...convenient to mountains, trails, and BlueRidge Pkwy. After a day on the trails, grab a beer and a snack at one of the many tasty options nearby. We are an outdoorsy family that loves this town and are happy to share tips on where to ride, hike, see, and taste.

This is your perfect getaway spot no matter what-after a day of adventures and fun come to a restful, calm and fresh place and recharge for your next set of activities.

The space
Ah, that fresh clean smell! Please note we are prioritizing health and safety. After each guest we carefully clean and then sanitize with disinfectants and microfiber cloths. We have blocked dates in between bookings so as not to rush the cleaning process. If you have allergies or other concerns we are happy to provide our cleaning and sanitizing practices and products.

The space in this new home is fully private lower level quarte

name: Peaceful, modern retreat with mountain views
description:
Set on two wooded acres, Rainbow Vista is our recently built, mid-century modern retreat overlooking Reeves Cove and Pisgah Nat'l Forest. We are currently accepting bookings between Thursday afternoons and Tuesday mornings with Tuesday and Wednesday nights reserved for cleaning. If you are interested in booking 7 nights or more, Tuesday and Wednesday nights can be made available... Just ask!
Click 'Show More' for additional description.

The space
Relax in the open-plan living space with wood-burning stove, sectional sofa, and large dining table. The large, modern kitchen's island is perfect for preparing meals while conversing with friends and family. The generous covered deck features an outdoor kitchen with grill and pass-through to the indoor kitchen. Both bedrooms offer spectacular mountain views.

Two queen-size beds and two full baths make this home perfect for two couples or a family. You are welcome to use books, games, and television. T

name: Pink House on Floyd
description:
This beautiful, freshly renovated 3-bedroom house with a hot tub, spacious deck, and large fenced yard is super convenient to both Asheville and Biltmore. Located only 1/3 mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway, this home offers comfortable indoor space and a beautiful outdoor setting only 12 minutes from downtown Asheville and 8 minutes from the Biltmore House.

Well behaved dogs are welcome at our rentals! Pet fee is $50.

The space
This comfortable 3 bedroom house has room for the whole family, as well as a beautiful deck with a patio set, hot tub, and large fenced yard for your furry friends. It's equipped with wifi, two smart televisions, and cable service to keep everyone entertained on rainy days.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire home except for one closet off the master bedroom in which we store supplies for the next guests.

Other things to note
Please accurately represent the number of people

name: Bonus Amenities Will  Please 5 Minutes to Downtown
description:
Newly Remodeled with a Modern Rustic feel. Boasting a private entrance and walkout French Door access from the bedroom. Wheelchair accessible entryways and shower. Just walking distance to restaurants, shops, and the River Arts District. Sleeping arrangements- 1 King Bed & 1 Queen Sofa Bed, 2 Flat Screens and Work Area/High top breakfast bar. All just minutes from Downtown Asheville. about a 20 minute walk or 5 minute drive.

The space
This amazing remodeled home blends a rustic flair of Asheville Pine flooring and natural wood backsplash with modern furniture and decor. All the items in the home were purchased brand new in 2017, it features 10ft. ceilings, 12ft. barn wood sliding double-doors and beautiful bright colors. Plus our bonus amenities are sure to please!

You’ll enjoy spacious rooms over 20’ long and all the amenities you can want for your stay. Enjoy waking up to a view of the Pisgah mountains in the morning with your coffee, tea or nightcap

name: Dutch Colonial for 2 in downtown West Asheville
description:
Hello and welcome to my lovely early 1900s Dutch Colonial Revival home. There is room for 2 guests at this home. This gem is conveniently located just 2 blocks from West Asheville! Take a stroll down to Oyster House Brewing Comp or catch some live music at The Mothlight. Only a 10 minute drive to downtown Asheville, The Biltmore Estate, or the River Arts District. This is a 3 bedroom 2 bath home with original oak floors, a huge back deck to watch the sunset on, and a charming garden.

The space
It is just me and my rescue beagle Darwin at the house. You will have one bedroom, use of the entire home, and your own private bathroom.

Guest access
Free street parking right in front of the house

Other things to note
Complimentary coffee & tea

name: Modern Condo in the Heart of Downtown Asheville
description:
Park your car and leave it for your whole stay! This luxury condo is located in the middle of Downtown Asheville. You will be steps away from Asheville's famous restaurants, breweries, and independent stores. This is the perfect Asheville location!

The space
Rankin Press Lofts is a modern/industrial masterpiece with exposed brick throughout, original wood floors, concrete counter-tops, and modern furnishings.

The bedroom has a Queen bed with a Tempurpedic mattress, and two each of side-sleeper and down pillows. A dresser and full closet will store all your belongings comfortably. There is also a full stack washer/dryer, iron and ironing board for your convenience.

An outdoor balcony with a cozy bistro table is perfect for and evening glass of wine or your morning coffee. Everything you need is included for your stay, including: linens, towels and bath products, cookware and cooking utensils. Just show up and relax!

Parking is al

name: Mountain Air King size bed Nice & Quiet
description:
Very spacious stress relieving Arts and Crafts home in a desirable West Asheville. Within 15 minutes of Downtown, shops and dining.
Partially fenced backyard for privacy. Enough private parking for 6 school buses! Screened porch with swings. Spacious open floor plan, 9 ft ceilings and big windows help you to enjoy the Mountain Air, relax and rewind.
Quiet family neighborhood. We are occupying the second floor and are very respectful of your privacy.

The space
Friendly safe neighborhood, less than 15 min from the River Arts District and ~ 20 min from Biltmore, but away from stress and heavy traffic.
Your home away from home will be the entire private master suite (with inner lock) with a master shower, toilet, and a spacious walk in closet.
You will also have another private half bath off the kitchen, living room, shared laundry and full kitchen with oven, mini fridge, pantry, microwave.
There will be tea, coffee, and snacks to start you

name: West Asheville Home with Downtown Views
description:
This West Asheville home is just a mile from Haywood Road's restaurants, breweries, and bars and only 2 miles from downtown. Visiting in the fall or winter? Then you'll also be able to wake up to the sunrise over the downtown Asheville skyline from your bedroom window! Winter views of downtown can also be enjoyed from the dining room table or while sipping coffee or wine from the back deck.

The space
Guests will be given a unique code to use for key-less access throughout their stay. Upon entrance to the house, you will step into the open concept living room, dining room, kitchen, and work space, which are all available for your use.

A welcome gift and a detailed guest manual--complete with my extensive list of Asheville recommendations--will be provided on the kitchen island for you.

Your private bedroom is complete with a queen size bed, closet space, drawer space, and beautiful sunrise views from the window!

Asheville is an e

name: Moonrise Motel - Walk to Downtown AVL + River Arts
description:
ATTENTION FILM LOVERS:
This fantastical Wes Anderson-inspired Airbnb is the perfect space for you!

Enjoy thoughtfully selected decor inspired by beloved Wes Anderson films. The quirky, retro vibes are sure to charm even those who aren’t as familiar!

This sleek, modern new-construction home is centered between historic downtown Asheville, eclectic West Asheville, and the vibrant River Arts District (RAD). Guests will be mere minutes away from just about everything Asheville has to offer.

The space
LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION!
Proximity to Everything Asheville has to Offer:

• Downtown restaurants, bars, and breweries | 22-minute walk or 7-minute drive, 1.0 miles
• 24+ vibrant art studios/galleries in the River Arts District (RAD), Wedge Brewing Co., Bull and Beggar, District Wine Bar | 6-minute walk, 0.3 miles
• South Slope restaurants and breweries | 16-minute walk, 0.7 miles
• New Belgium Brewery |12-m

name: Historic Urban Getaway Stroll Downtown w/ Parking
description:
This beautiful light-filled, well-appointed apartment is located on the main floor of a historic home in the heart of thriving Five Points neighborhood, connecting downtown, the greenway, UNC Asheville and beloved Montford. Downtown Asheville's best restaurants, bars and breweries are an easy walk from this central location. This urban home is a delightful base for exploring Asheville. The apartment is a permitted short-term rental. Note we have another unit upstairs https://abnb.me/mcqrNiIK96

The space
Built in 1910, the building which houses two vacation rental apartments on the first and second floor respectively, overlooks downtown. Purchased by new owners, the house was totally renovated in 2018.

The downstairs apartment: A private entrance leads visitors into an airy space that overlooks downtown with great nighttime city views. The spacious and comfortable 850 square-foot apartment offers a comfy living room, an eat-in kitchen and a private fr

name: Rose Ranch Montford 2, central, sterile, secluded
description:
Totally separate from main house, light and cozy, your room has a private entrance and private bath. I sanitize everything thoroughly in between guests.

Can be rented in conjunction with "Rose Ranch Montford 1," allowing up to 2 additional guests. In Montford, 20 minute brisk walk to downtown. Wonderful, friendly, diverse neighborhood, 2 blocks from the Historic Riverside Cemetery. Many trees and Victorian homes. Great for walking, running, biking and getting exercise while social distancing!

The space
I have instituted extra cleaning and sanitizing regimes for your entire space, ensuring peace of mind for all. For guests with longer stays, we can provide access to our washer and dryer upon request.

The bedroom and bath have been fully updated with new fixtures, windows, walls and floors, cork in the bedroom and marble in the bath. There is an electric log fireplace for extra heat with a romantic flickering flame. Mini frig, electric teapot

name: Rustic Cabin located near Downtown Asheville
description:
This rustic yet elegantly decorated log cabin captures the spirit of Asheville. The private, wooded setting is the perfect backdrop for soaking in the hot tub or rocking on the front porch. After you've watched the sun go down, driving 5 miles to downtown for a night of fine cuisine and entertainment couldn't be simpler. If you love the attractions that both civilization and Mother Nature have to offer, stay with us and experience the best of both worlds.

The space
We are less than 5 miles from downtown Asheville and only 20 minutes from the Biltmore Estate.

name: Cottage Under the Blue Ridge
description:
Enjoy everything Asheville has to offer! Take a short walk through the backyard to hit the Mountain to Sea Trail for a scenic hike on the Blue Ridge Parkway or hop on by car approx two miles away to enjoy breathtaking scenery of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Start your day enjoying coffee on the peaceful front porch in the rocking chairs, or an afternoon nap in the hammock, and then to downtown less than 10 minutes away to your choice of incredible restaurants, breweries and shopping!

The space
Our cottage is completely furnished with a beautiful stone fireplace and gas logs. The sofa turns into a queen bed with a comfortable memory foam mattress.
Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen including a full fridge, microwave, toaster, blender, crockpot, Keurig coffee maker with an assortment of coffee and tea.
We provide hairdryers in both bathrooms as well as soaps, shampoo, and conditioner.
All linens and towels are provided and a full washer and dryer with d

name: Cane Creek house, close to Asheville.
description:
Fresh new construction on quiet street 5 mins from Asheville airport and WNC Ag center, only 20 mins to downtown Asheville. Sleeps 6 comfortably. Sierra Nevada Brewery only 10 mins away. Just around the corner from Fletcher park with scenic walking trails and a playground. Minutes from Taylor Ranch if visiting for a wedding.
This house will fulfill all your needs after a day out enjoying Asheville & the surrounding area. Easy access to amazing biking with storage space in the garage for bikes.

The space
This is a detached home all on one level.All new construction.Beautiful fully stocked kitchen with everything you need to prepare meals.Cathedral ceilings in living area,Ceiling fans in all bedrooms for your comfort.Smart TV in house so you can log in to Netflix.
European style comforters with covers on all beds make for a relaxing stay.

Guest access
Full access to home.One car garage with opener.Covered back deck with dining tab

name: New, Contemporary South Slope Townhome with Private Elevator and Rooftop Terrace
description:
Welcome to your contemporary home-away-from-home in Asheville, NC! This gorgeous and modern (2 BR/2 BA/2 half BA) townhome is brand-new, sleek, and outfitted with some rare perks, like a private elevator and private fourth-floor roof top terrace, with incredible views of downtown Asheville. With four floors of living space, there's more than enough room for your group of six. All of this is steps from South Slope, and less than a mile from downtown Asheville, craft breweries, and the famed Biltmore Estate; while you're surrounded by the stunning natural beauty of the Blue Ridge Mountains. The convenience of this location, the well appointed rooms, and the extravagance and comfort of a private elevator and roof top terrace will have you counting down the days until you can visit again!
Security cameras, for your safety, are located at the front and back exteriors of the property. This is a residential complex; please be mindful of your neighbors and refer to the quiet hours and HOA

name: Almost Heaven Cabin-Asheville
description:
Almost Heaven Log Cabin is the perfect mountain getaway for just one couple or a group. This sweet Appalachian style cabin is located on a private road with wooded surroundings.

Listen to the mountain brook that runs beside the cabin while relaxing on the porch. Only a 10 minute drive to grocery store and 20 minutes to downtown Asheville. Great romantic getaway and plenty of space for a group.

The space
One of the best features of this cozy cabin is its convenient location being only 20 minutes to downtown Asheville and many attractions like Biltmore Estate, antique shops and breweries.

Located in beautiful Riceville valley, the cabin has a lot of warmth and character with 1800 sf. of space. It has original pine wood floors and updated appliances and TVs. It’s nestled in the trees in a wildlife habitat, located at 3000 ft. elevation.

The cabin has with plenty of space and light spread over 3 levels. Relax on the big sof

name: New luxury in the heart of downtown
description:
Explore Asheville from this beautiful new condo located in the heart of downtown. Warm and inviting, this professionally designed space will be your perfect home away from home during your stay in our amazing town. From the custom hardwood floors throughout the space to the well appointed kitchen and in-unit laundry you'll be well rested and ready to explore. Secure parking means one less thing to worry during your stay. Enjoy your morning coffee while taking in mountain views from the balcony before heading out into town. Minutes walk from all that downtown has to offer; visit the breweries, restaurants, music venues and galleries that Asheville is famous for without ever having to look for your car keys.


The Space:

Located in the brand new Asheland building in downtown Asheville the condo is luxuriously appointed. Designed with comfort in mind a full gourmet kitchen provides for lunch before hitting the hiking trails, or those nights that you just want to

name: New, Luxury Condo in Downtown Asheville Condotel Unit #307
description:
Welcome to The Ashe Den on Asheland Avenue!

The Ashe Den is a new luxury condo in the heart of downtown Asheville. This 3 bedroom, 3 bath third floor condo comfortably accommodates your party of up to 8 people:
1 en-suite Master with 1 King bed; bathroom has 2 sinks and a shower
1 en-suite Master with 2 Queen beds; bathroom has 2 sinks and a shower
1 Guest room with 1 king, directly across from an additional full bathroom

The kitchen, living room and eating area are all well appointed for a comfy and stunning home away from home. The bar seats 4 and the table seats 4, but the table can pull out and seat up to 6 if you would like to gather around. You can also toast to vacation on the spacious, mountain-view balcony!

This unit has all of the premium amenities you can imagine and is ideal for your traveling family or group!

All of your Downtown and South Slope destinations are extremely walkable:
Tupelo Hone

New appliances, bedding, and furniture create a stunning accommodation for you and your loved ones to relax and enjoy yourself. Located on the 5th floor, this residence features a full kitchen, dining room, living room, and balcony. Luxurious 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, open floor plan, full kitchen, and additional sleeping options-all designed and accessorized with premium amenities to meet your needs. name: Biltmore and Downtown!
description:
Relax in this vibrant, newer construction home, fitted with all the essentials you need to enjoy your time in the Asheville mountains. Large, spacious rooms with large kitchen and open floor plan. Located just 3 miles to the heart of downtown with breweries, local restaurants,art galleries,shops and all the eclectic vibes that make Asheville unique and fun to explore. Biltmore village and Estate one mile away. High speed WiFi with sanitation our TOP priority!!

The space
This charming home has an incredible location to everything you will want to do while in Asheville.

Tastefully decorated with both an urban feel, and a taste of the mountains. You immediately feel at home and relaxed, like you were meant to be here. (The Asheville mountains will have that effect!). Our cleaning company is thoroughly applying the cleaning guidelines set out by the CDC and Airbnb and take this responsibility seriously. Our cleaners sanitize all touch surfaces, sanit

name: Newly renovated apartment with private entrance
description:
Well lit and newly renovated basement apartment with private entrance. Located in east Asheville; less than 10 minutes from downtown. Situated in a peaceful, quiet neighborhood. A family of three lives upstairs. There is a queen bed in the bedroom and a new queen sleeper sofa in the common space area. Kitchen has a mini fridge with freezer, a microwave, toaster, and a coffee maker. Netflix and Amazon streaming available but there is no cable service. A covered deck adjoins the apartment. Enjoy!

The space
There is no smoking/vaping on the property. The wood stove is off limits to guests.

Guest access
You have access to the entire basement apartment, which has a separate entrance.

Other things to note
There is a gas grill available for use on the covered deck. A washer and dryer are available for long term guests. There is an air purification system installed in the HVAC unit.

name: Cate's Cottage
description:
Charming 1920's fully renovated cottage in Montford, Asheville's most historic neighborhood! Walk downtown, or visit one of the award-winning restaurants nearby. Everything you need for a comfortable stay is provided. Live like a local!

The space
This sweet 1920's cottage is warm and inviting. Hardwood floors, fully-equipped kitchen, and comfortable seating areas help you to feel at home.

Guest access
All on one level, you have full access to the home. The basement below houses our bikes and such, and is locked.

name: West Asheville Retreat
description:
Large private bedroom with full basement available for private use including a media center and a pool table, private bath, private deck and private entrance.

The space
Very comfortable and spacious room. Sleeps 4 on a queen bed and two single beds. There is also a sofa that pulls out into a double. Plus, private media room with pool table.

description: Roll out of bed in a fresh, modern, mindfully appointed cottage; then walk out the front door into vibrant downtown Asheville. Take an easy stroll to Asheville’s famous breweries and five-star eateries. Only a stone’s throw from The Thomas Wolfe Auditorium and Harrah's Cherokee Center. The space features an open floor plan with vaulted ceilings. Enjoy cooking your own meals or just making a hot cup of coffee in a fully outfitted kitchen.

name: A Mile to Biltmore and Downtown!
description:
Relax in this vibrant, newer construction home, fitted with all the essentials you need to enjoy your time in the Asheville mountains. Large, spacious rooms with large kitchen and open floor plan. Located just 3 miles to the heart of downtown with breweries, local restaurants,art galleries,shops and all the eclectic vibes that make Asheville unique and fun to explore. Biltmore village and Estate one mile away. High speed WiFi with sanitation our TOP priority.

The space
This charming home has an incredible location to everything you will want to do while in Asheville.

Tastefully decorated with both an urban feel, and a taste of the mountains. You immediately feel at home and relaxed, like you were meant to be here. (The Asheville mountains will have that effect!).

description:
Welcome to the Cozy Cottage in the heart of downtown Asheville! We provide a clean and safe environment for you to enjoy, a true home away from home. We are the only licensed 'Whole House' (stand alone house) Rental in Downtown Historic Asheville!

Our cottage is an 'Architectural Jewel' nestled amongst the few historical homes that line this charming street. Situated in the heart of downtown Asheville, all the activities and excitement of downtown are only a short walk away.

The space
This 120 year old historical cottage has been completely restored in recent years and is equipped with all the amenities of modern living yet keeping the ambience of yesteryear. All new plumbing, electrical, HVAC, roofing, it is in perfect shape. The heart of pine wooden floors, stair railings and pocket doors are original to the house and have been beautifully refinished. Whether you have a group of friends or just your family, this is the downtown home that offers ever

description: Peruse the ornaments and furniture from around the world that fill this unique space in a laid-back, walkable area. The flat is accessed through a serene, private garden, a lovely spot to sip local coffee in the morning serenaded by birdsong.

description:
Huge private playroom with queen sofa, separate office with full sofa plus 2 large master suites! Spacious home 5 minutes from Biltmore Estate, 10 minutes to downtown Asheville and easy access to Blue Ridge Parkway! Close enough to everything yet when you are home you are away from the hustle and bustle. Our home is situated at the end of the drive so when you are here you will feel tucked away. As hosts we are excited to share our home in the city that we love!

The space
We have tall privacy fences that make grilling and dining on the secluded back deck or relaxing on the cozy outdoor furniture even more enjoyable. Enjoy views of the mountains on one side, a full foliage to the other and large pines edging the front yard.

The rooms have a great distance from the common areas so you can easily sneak away if you are looking for some rest or quiet time. The electric fireplace makes for a cozy or romantic atmosphere no matter the season! We provide sever

name: Cooper Cottage
description:
Charming, modern, newly renovated guest studio. It’s located along side my personal residence in a quiet little neighborhood just minutes from downtown Asheville, NC. Uber is available. It’s quiet and close to everything.

The space
This unique stand alone studio is just a short 15 min drive to downtown Asheville, NC. Minutes away from enjoying a day of mountain biking, hiking, or fishing in the beautiful blue ridge mountains. Spend the day exploring the Biltmore Estate and enjoy a quite night in your own quarters.

Guest access
Guest have access to the entire space.

Other things to note
I do have an outdoor/indoor cat that could possibly stop by to say hello. She is grey. I also have a golden retriever that lives on the property. He is on a leash and friendly, but may bark.

description:
We’re located in Bent Creek, right across the street from a 22-acre community park, with immediate access to hiking/Mtn biking trails, and about 2 miles from the BR Parkway, French Broad River & the Arboretum. It’s a quick 15 min ride to downtown. Our 22x14’ room is brick, simple and rustic with it's own private entrance. The private hot tub is right outside your door. Plain and simple, this is a fun, romantic getaway.

Other things to note
If you mtn bike then know that you have immediate trail access and can shoot across the street to our community park, warm up on our pump track and then hit Rice Pinnacle and the Bent Creek Experimental/Pisgah Forest trails right from the house.

North Asheville near University of North Carolina and Grove Park Inn

description:

Acres of tranquility & 15 mins to Downtown AVL & The Biltmore! 8 mins to Blue Ridge Parkway hiking, views & waterfall. Immaculately clean, cozy, open & airy, dream home w/ vaulted ceilings, wood burning stove & forest views! Close to all that AVL offers. Off the beaten path in a peaceful, invigorating landscape. TV, WIFI, BBQ, Hammock, Wildlife.

description:

You'll find your spacious hideaway conveniently located near downtown Asheville, the Blue Ridge Parkway, the Biltmore Estate, Beaver Lake, hiking and biking trails, the River Arts District and more. description:
Come relax in this spacious retreat surrounded by trees only minutes to downtown. Easy Uber/Lyft access to downtown. Lower level has 2 bedrooms and one bath. One bedroom has a queen bed. The other bedroom has a bunk bed with a double on the bottom/twin on the top and a twin daybed. Laundry room and den with rock fireplace. Wrap around deck.

Plenty of parking for 4+ cars.

description:
Built in 1927, this charming home has just enough room to be comfortable for sleeping and lounging.
Fully equipped kitchen for cooking, charcoal grill in back porch for cook out or plenty of restaurants within a mile or two. The backyard has a garden and fenced in area for dogs to play.
Beaver lake is a few minutes walk from house with a 2 mile trail around it. Some of the best road cycling in the world is available from the front door. Mt. biking is 15-45 minutes drive. Yoga studio next door.

The space
This is a very cozy place to relax before and after your adventures in Asheville. The front porch sits near the end of a dead end street and is a great place for morning coffee. The backyard, which has a peaceful atmosphere, is private with a fire pit, table and chairs. Hard wood floors make this a pet friendly space and super clean. Well lit during the day from natural sunlight, dark and quiet at night.

name: New Luxury Condominium in the Heart of Downtown Asheville with Mountain Views
description:
Enjoy Western mountain views from this new luxury condominium located in the heart of Downtown Asheville.

Located on the 4th floor, this spacious 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom residence is perfect for couples, families or a gathering of friends. With both a king size bed and a sleeper sofa we can comfortably accommodate up to 4 adults. Our sizable bathroom boasts a large walk-in shower and double vanity sinks.

Walk downtown for dinner or stay in to create your own dining experience with a full range of new stainless steel appliances and cookware. Add sunset mountain views to your experience from our western facing balcony. Secure onsite garage parking means one less thing to worry about.

As Asheville locals we want to make sure you experience all that Asheville has to offer. Whether it's outdoor activities or downtown entertainment recommendations, both owners and onsite concierge staff are here to create a memorable experience.

Modern Farmhouse in the Heart of West Asheville

The Room:
This cozy space offers a queen sized mattress on a hand-made iron bed frame built by a local blacksmith. There are several pillows with varying firmness, plenty of extra blankets and a space heater.

There is a comfortable chair for sitting and a small desk with space for a laptop.

We provide coffee and tea, sugar (and alternatives) with half & half and filtered drinking water. A mini-fridge is stocked with complimentary sparkling water. Breakfast bars are provided to get you going in the morning. Take a short walk to Biscuit Head, Sunny Point or Bim Beri Bon for a full breakfast. description:

PLEASE SCROLL THROUGH THE ENTIRE LISTING AND READ ALL DETAILS BEFORE BOOKING.

My house is in a quiet, safe, walkable neighborhood. Neighbors are friendly and can often be seen taking walks or jogging alone, with family, or with dogs. Don't be surprised if they wave at you. You may see some wildlife such as rabbits, groundhogs, deer, or an occasio

Relax in the Hot Tub after along day of sightseeing! Welcome to our home situated on beautiful hill with lovely Mountain views. Our home is located just minutes to the Outlet Mall, grocery store, Blue Ridge Parkway, NC Arboretum, Restaurants, Biking Trails, Waterfalls, Breweries, and so much more. description:
Asheville Flat
Prime location in the heart of downtown Asheville -
Hiawassee Street directly adjacent to the Thomas Wolfe Auditorium and Civic Center. So, if you are attending an event there, you can't beat this location!

1 bedroom with 1 queen bed

name: Yurt at Odd Bits Farm: hike, pond, pool.
description:
Comfortable 16' Yurt, with enclosed hot outdoor shower, compost toilet and sink, all next to a pond and old logging roads, 15 minutes from downtown and 8 minutes to lots of West Asheville action. (Do check out our AVL Guide).

You’re at a family homesteading permaculture life project, founded in 2017. We're planting organic food and fruit, flowers, bamboo and hemp.

We also have a Treehouse here, are working on therapy/spa area. Pool is open.

Self check-in and check-out, privacy and distance.

The space
The yurt is a traditional Mongolian design, made by a local craftsman. It's comfortable and spacious, perched on a 24'x24' deck in the forest and near the farming area. It's a very private and discreet place, there are no more properties beyond ours so our backyard is 300+ acres of NC forest. We're located very close to the city and all that it has to offer. The perfect combination between private nature glamping and easy access to

description:
Aunt Sandie's cottage is the main house in front of our "Artist in The Attic" listing. A mini organic farm in process of being restored, relaxing & cozy. 15-25 min. to river, parks (kids or pups), arts district, hiking. Fire pit, king bed in master. Board games for everyone. Message me for shorter or longer term stays.

You’ll love relaxing with plenty of natural light and full kitchen. Shelves are stocked with art supplies, reading material, board games, and more. Located in a rural neighborhood with stress free parking. Good for couples, families, small groups, and furry friends (pets). This cute

This 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath home offers chic decor, modern amenities, and a backyard deck perfect for summer cookouts and evening cocktails. Outdoor activities abound just outside your front door, including hiking, biking, swimming, fishing, rafting, tubing, ziplining, and skiing. You’ll also enjoy close proximity to a plethora of art galleries, shops, museums, and theaters in downtown Asheville.

After your explorations, return home to relax in your 1920s retreat, stylishly detailed with retro-chic decor and vintage pieces.

If traveling with a large group, consider renting the home next door for parties of up to 20 people.

Catch your favorite shows and watch the latest movies on the 55” cable TV. Or, curl up

description:

description:
The first bungalow built-in 1920's 'West Asheville Estates' off Vermont Avenue, this totally renovated charmer is a delightful way to unpack, get your mountain bearings and relax. Expansive sunny back deck and historic covered front porch to take in the mountain air. Fast WiFi for efficient remote work. Local WAVL food scene still cooking and delivering fine fare. Decorated with a whimsical combination of antiques and modern art, prepare yourself for a very memorable stay.

The dining room calls out for serious gourmet food take-out from a block away and next-day planning conversations. Make a cocktail at the bar and enjoy a sunset off the back. The property has its own trail to river front for fishing and swimming. The water comes from the reservoir so it is very clean. Trout is stocked every year. This private trail and area of the river is used for guest and managers use.

The 1st floor has a full working kitchen and a table for four.

Which type of rental properties would you enjoy: the kind that makes you feel like you’re awkwardly crashing in somebody’s spare room, with family photos on the nightstand and a stranger’s clothes in the closet, OR the kind that feels like you’ve checked into a well-appointed, standalone vacation home that’s actually better than most hotels?

The bungalow stands alone to the side of our main house with a great deal of privacy.

Having worked in Wyoming for several years, there are antlers and hides to go with the Appalachian prayer flags, cookie tin banjos and quilt blocks ;). The house is over 100 years old, has much character and a lil dust to go with it but this urban homestead is a special one :)
The tepee in the living room, which sleeps one comfortably, can be set up to sleep two cozily if needed!

6 guests, 3 bedrooms, 3 beds, 2 baths.
