name: Private North Asheville Bungalow No Cleaning fees
description:
Private, quiet, modern bungalow. Newly updated with designer finishes in North Asheville. Can accommodate additional guests if needed.

Private entrance and parking.

Located between UNCA and Merrimon Ave. Bike or Uber to downtown. Walk to restaurants, bars and coffee shops.

We also have an electric car charging station for your use, just give us heads up if you need it.

The space
This bungalow also includes use of the upper porch area. This is a very large space with large table for dining and two very large couches with two coffee table. Tables also functions great as a work space. Floor cushions are also available in this area. The porch has electricity for your plugins. Details are listed in house manual.

Guest access
Large porch area can be used by guest. Go through the gate and up the stairs. Barn doors close for privacy. Wired for music. Just ask Alexa to play your favorite tunes. Blinds can go

name: Asheville Country Cabins - Sunflower
description:
The Sunflower Cabin is our brand new luxury cabin with 2 Beds and 2 Baths, fully equipped kitchen adorned in granite, hand-stained spruce cathedral ceilings, gas fireplace, remote-adjusted king beds and large walk-in shower.

The space
The Sunflower Cabin is our brand new luxury cabin with 2 Beds and 2 Baths, fully equipped kitchen adorned in granite, hand-stained spruce cathedral ceilings, gas fireplace, remote-adjusted king beds, large walk-in shower and the spacious 1,000 square foot wrap-around porch with private hot tub! Enjoy the sights and sounds of our forested estate while relaxing in the top-of-line MAAX hot tub with waterfalls and chromotherapy! After, lounge in comfort by the gas fireplace watching the flames dance while your favorite movie is playing on the 50" flat screen TV with surround sound. If you enjoy cooking, we have the perfect kitchen for you. All appliances are stainless steel surrounded by beautiful granite hand selected by the

name: Cabin 2.2 miles from downtown Asheville
description: Located on a wooded mountainside with mountain views and only 2.2 miles from downtown Asheville and 4 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway.  There are two bedroom decks, as well as a large deck off the living area, and a screened porch that is perfect for outdoor dining.

name: New! Beautiful rental 5 blocks to Downtown
description:
Private entrance 2 Bedroom plus big sunroom apartment. Newly remodeled and beautifully decorated. This is the ultimate Asheville retreat, while still being a short walk to downtown and many amenities: 2 Blocks to Vegetarian restaurant, Plant, 2 Blocks to Trader Joe's, 4 blocks to Elements juice bar, 4 blocks to Liberty Street Cafe, 4 blocks to Asheville Yoga, 4 blocks to Whole Foods, 5 blocks to High Five Coffee, 6 blocks to Downtown! Come walk our city and enjoy a beautiful space to come rest.

The space
The house is a large duplex. Our family used to live upstairs (with preschooler and 2nd grader, Papa Eric and Mama Angie). We recently moved to Raleigh NC for a few years, while Angie attends graduate school. But this remains our Asheville home-base.

We remodeled it when we moved out and are in love with the new decor and furnishings. We love this neighborhood - right in the middle of everything we want to access in Asheville, but tucked above and aw

name: Exceptional Home Nestled Among Acres of Forest
description: Be transported into a tranquil home that offers luxurious living surrounded by nature. From the mahogany kitchen cabinetry and Carrara marble coffee table to the Italian lighting over a walnut breakfast bar, every space exudes style and comfort.

name: La Maison du Bonheur: The Calm Suite
description:
Welcome to my peaceful home on a quiet street located only 7.7 miles from the Asheville Airport (AVL), 2.5 miles to the entrance of The Biltmore Estate, and 5 miles from downtown Asheville. Access to the Mountains-to-Sea Trail is within walking distance with the Blue Ridge Parkway only five minutes away. With Interstate 40 Exit 51 only 1.5 miles away, you will have convenient access to the best of Asheville.

The space
The Calm Suite offers a king-sized bed, a spacious sitting area, a large writing desk, and a walk-in closet. This large room has a full private bathroom. Be sure to save time in your itinerary to enjoy some coffee or hot tea in this serene space. When you book this room, I will block my other listing so that you have complete privacy.

If traveling with friends or family, The Peaceful Room with a double bed is available for booking upon request. Both rooms would then share the full bath.

Guest access
Guests are wel

name: The Aerie in Emma—sunlit haven minutes from it all
description:
This little casa is light and bright, and close to everything! I love simplicity and texture, mcm and color. Functionality plus aesthetics, as well as being pet- and adventurer-friendly. I love supporting local makers and shops, and you will see that reflected in The Aerie’s furnishings and decor.

The space
Enjoy this open house and spacious fenced in yard all to yourself!

Guest access
Entire property: house and yard, except the shed which remains locked.

Other things to note
*PLEASE read ALL house guidelines and info prior to booking*

name: Asheville 1 Cozy Bungalow. Pets OK! 5 Min To Dwtn
description:
Built in 1927, this charming home has just enough room to be comfortable for sleeping and lounging.
Fully equipped kitchen for cooking, gas/coal grill on back porch for cook out or plenty of restaurants within a mile or two. The backyard has a garden and fenced in area for dogs to play.
Beaver lake is a few minutes walk from house with a 2 mile trail around it. Some of the best road cycling in the world is available from the front door. Mt. biking is 15-45 minutes drive. Yoga studio next door

The space
This is a very cozy place to relax before and after your adventures in Asheville. The front porch sits near the end of a dead street and the is a great place for morning coffee. The backyard, which has a peaceful atmosphere, is mostly private with a fire pit, table and chairs. Hard wood floors make this a pet friendly space and super clean. Well lit during the day from natural sunlight, dark and quiet at night.
Construction is complete for

name: Biltmore & more! Private, cozy, modern; sleeps 1-3
description:
Inviting, light-filled, contemporary space situated in a quiet residential neighborhood. Completely new en suite bedroom/sitting area with private entrance and deck.

Close to all Asheville has to offer: historic and dynamic downtown (2.5 miles), the Biltmore estate (2.5 miles), Blue Ridge Parkway (1.8 miles), UNCA (4.5 miles) and Warren Wilson College (5.5 miles).

Includes kitchen amenities: refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker.

Free parking on premises.

Sorry, no pets allowed.

The space
Private suite includes queen bed, sitting area with sofa/bed, private bath.

Guest access
Access through private deck at the rear of house. One short flight of stairs leads to the deck.

name: Asheville Country Cabins - Mountain Laurel
description:
The Mountain Laurel is our brand new luxury cottage featuring 2 Beds and 2 Baths. Enjoy forest and mountain views from the spacious 1,000 square foot wrap-around porch with private hot tub! Comes with fully equipped kitchen adorned in granite.

The space
The Mountain Laurel is our brand new luxury cottage featuring 2 Beds and 2 Baths. Enjoy forest and mountain views from the spacious 1,000 square foot wrap-around porch with private hot tub! Comes with fully equipped kitchen adorned in granite, white-washed spruce cathedral ceilings, gas fireplace, remote-adjusted king beds, and large bathrooms with walk-in shower. Enjoy the sights and sounds of our forested estate while relaxing in the top-of-line MAAX hot tub with waterfalls and chromotherapy! After, lounge in comfort by the gas fireplace watching the flames dance while your favorite movie is playing on the 50" flat screen TV with surround sound. If you enjoy cooking, we have the perfect kitchen for you. All

name: Chicken Pie Alley, walkable to downtown
description:
Welcome to our private downstairs apartment that has been lovingly renovated to offer easy comfort minutes from the heart of downtown Asheville. Nestled on a quiet cottage lane, our space offers a clean, welcoming and private space that is easy walking to coffee houses, pubs, restaurants and the civic center (4 blocks away).

The space
1 bedroom apartment walking distance to downtown Asheville, no need for Uber (save $). Eco friendly with many added touches to make your stay relaxing and comfy. Coffee, tea, organic breakfast, microwave (for heating up those yummy leftovers from the many amazing restaurants near by), fridge. Fun decor, quality linens, comfy bed.

Guest access
The apartment is all yours with private entrance. Access to washer and dryer if needed. Our backyard, although a work in process, offers a quiet sanctuary from the bustle of the city. In the summer and fall you are welcome to fresh veggies from our garden.

O

name: Views,  Mins. to Downtown Asheville,  Fire Pit
description:
Location with mountain views!
New property, this lovely 3 bedroom 2 bath home with a spacious open floor plan, located minutes from downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, Outlets, Blue Ridge Parkway and Asheville Arboretum, and still has a feeling of a private wooded environment . Enjoy more than occasional deer crossing in a pristine forest location close to everything Asheville has to offer. Nicely appointed home features, mountain views, fire pit, covered porch, hi-speed wifi, & Directv.

Other things to note
There is a $75.00 pet fee for one dog, each additional dog is $25.00. This will need to be paid at the time of check in.

name: Bungalow + Guest Suite  Near Downtown!
description:
Conveniently located a short drive to Downtown Asheville (2 miles), the River Arts District, and UNCA botanical gardens. This two bedroom one bath house, plus one bed one bath studio guest suite with private entrance comes fully equipped with all essentials guests may need for a comfortable getaway. Accommodates six individuals, four on upper level (main home) and two in private guest suite (lower level).

The space
Main level is open and airy, with large south facing windows, tall ceilings, original heart pine wood floors, and lots of tropical plants. Main level comes with queen size mattress in master bedroom, double size mattress in loft, plus single mattress under loft.

Lower level Café Studio Suite is a cozy relaxing space, with sauna inspired rain shower, café style kitchen, comfortable queen bed, and private entrance.

The French Broad River along with some distant mountain peaks may be partially visible from the spacious rear balcony,

name: Stylish House By Riverside Park - Entire House!
description:
Enjoy a tranquil stay on the hills at our cozy 3 bedroom house. Take a 10 minute stroll to the Riverside Park to have a scenic walk and take photos by the river. Then head to downtown and eat at the restaurants or drink at the breweries that Asheville is famous for. It's only a 10 minute drive away

This house has a 1000 Mbps fiber connection and is suitable for multiple people to do remote work, gaming, and streaming simultaneously. We are also solar powered!

The space
This stylish house is solar powered and comes with 3 bedrooms all equipped with queen sized beds. Each bedroom has its own closet. The entire house has luxurious hardwood floors that brings the beautiful forest scenery to the home.

Wake up to breathtaking sunrise views over the mountains or settle down to rich chromatic sunsets while laying back out on the patio.

Gorgeous personally custom made office table made from solid wood floats over 2 chairs creating the per

name: the RUBY ROOST cozy retreat near West Asheville
description:
A true gem, conveniently tucked away in a quiet neighborhood near West Asheville. We welcome you to your 2nd story private apartment of our home. Enjoy your intimate lighted deck and posh suite with every amenity you may need and more. Located minutes from West Asheville and 10-15 min to the heart of downtown. Delight in a recently built, fully equipped and dreamy space to relax after a night on the town or a hike through the mountains. Private Deck, Full Lounge, Kitchen, BA, BR, Laundry.

The space
We allow one well behaved, house-trained dog for an additional $25 fee. Please inform us upon booking. Once booking is confirmed the pet fee will be sent to you via the resolution center to accept before arrival. Maximum of 1 pet since this is a cozy 600 sq ft space. They must be crated if you are leaving the property without them. This is for safety of your pet and maintaining the integrity of our space. We provide a small/medium crate for your convenience. If your pu

name: Beautiful Quiet and Spacious Home in WestAsheville
description:
Private house set above the road with a wonderful screened-in porch to enjoy one of West Asheville's beautiful neighborhoods. Walking distance to all the neighborhood restaurants, pubs, and cafes. There is also easy access to the interstate for a quick car ride into downtown Asheville.

The space
The house is quiet and spacious. The house is also within walking distance to all the shops, restaurants, and nightlife in West Asheville. Just a short walk to Biscuit Head! It is also conveniently located to downtown Asheville in less than a 10 minute car ride.

You will be able to check yourself in via the smart lock at the front entry way. The first floor has a spacious living room with a smart tv with access to Netflix and HULU. In the kitchen you will have access to the refrigerator and any condiments inside, as well as the cooking utensils in the kitchen. The screened-in a porch has a porch swing as well patio furniture to enjoy coffee in the mornings. The

name: Cozy mountain retreat. Convenient to downtown.
description:
Placed within the trees in a quiet neighborhood where houses are spaced far apart. Gravel parking is enough for at least 4 cars. You'll also have a covered deck on the side of the house.

This special hide-away is centrally located & 10 minutes to just about all of Asheville's major destinations, including Downtown, Biltmore Estate, Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Village, and River Arts District. Sleeps up to 6 people.

The space
Westridge cottage is convenient to all of Asheville's amenities has to offer. The house has 2 sliding glass doors in the living room, providing ample amount of natural light. Flat screen T.V with amazon fire also with basic cable channels.Full kitchen that is properly equipped for cooking. Each bedroom has a queen size bed. The 3rd bed is a pull out sofa in the living room. Covered porch has chairs and sofa for enjoying Asheville's incredible weather.

name: Mountain Escape - 10min to DT Asheville
description:
Enjoy this newly renovated mid-century home with a large fenced in yard, back deck with hot tub, plenty of parking and enough space for a large group or family. Located in a quiet neighborhood about 10 minutes from Downtown Asheville, 5 minutes to West Asheville, 7 minutes from the Biltmore and more!

The space
The perfect space for large or small groups and very close to downtown Asheville.

Other things to note
Disclaimer: Access to the hot tub is not always guaranteed. We aim to make the hot tub available and ready for use with each reservation, but sometimes maintenance or cleaning could hinder use.

name: Nana's Cottage 3 miles from downtown, pet friendly
description:
Nana's Cottage is a two bedroom home located in a country setting yet only 3 miles from downtown. It is a short ride to everything you want to do in the Asheville area, including wonderful dining, gorgeous hiking, and antiquing. The Biltmore estate is 15 minutes away. After a day of sight seeing and adventure, Nana's Cottage is a great place to call home. You can cook a meal in the fully appointed kitchen, go on the internet, or just relax.

The space
Our home has a comfy living room with a sectional sofa, dining area with seating for 6, a fully equipped kitchen and a tiled bath with a tub/shower combination. The entire home has wood floors and is professionally decorated. The walls are decorated with antique theatre posters.

The large master bedroom has a king size bed with a bamboo mattress. The large second bedroom has a queen size bed and a desk and chair.

The home has plenty of parking, has a great deck and a large fenced yard for you

name: Front Porch & Charming Street near Biltmore Estate
description:
* 1,320 sqft., two-story house
* Safe, quiet neighborhood
* Keurig coffee maker
* Fully equipped kitchen
* Kid-friendly
* Screened-in front porch
* Cool gel ventilated memory foam mattresses
Craftsman style home 5 minutes to Biltmore Village & 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. Tour the Biltmore Estate, explore the River Arts District, dine at the historic Grove Park Inn, or Hike in Pisgah Forest. Then relax at your private Asheville getaway. This is the perfect home base for your next adventure!

The space
House is well-built and in great condition. Washer/Dryer is available onsite.

name: The Suite at Club View (Grove Park Inn)
description:
Conveniently located directly across from the Grove Park Golf Club, & a short walk/shuttle ride to Grove Park Inn...2 miles to dwntwn Asheville, yet completely removed from the city bustle.

The suite is private w/ its' own entry; Gorgeous views of the surrounding mountains...Enjoy the perfect location for a special weekend, honeymoon, or a week with an excuse to not cook & explore all of the wonderful Asheville restaurants (several w/in walking distance). You'll likely never want to leave.

The space
Better than a Suite at the Grove Park Inn, yet a short walk away; enjoy all that the hotel has to offer. Luxury linens and towels like you would find at the best hotels with a deluxe bathroom and very large walk in shower. Wake up to Incredible views of Mt. Pisgah without getting out of bed. Nice sitting area, and table to eat, drink coffee or work on your computer. Nespresso coffee maker and regular coffee maker provided with coffee, tea and acco

name: Passive solar house 14 mi from Asheville
description:
This net-zero house is conveniently located on one secluded acre 5 miles from Asheville Regional Airport, 6 miles from Sierra Nevada Brewing Company. Built-in 2020 by Blue Ridge Energy Systems, Asheville's oldest green builder (est. 1977), it features large south facing triple pane windows, six-inch walls, 6.5 kW of PV panels, and a Tesla destination charger. Handcrafted cherry bed frames support queen size Casper memory foam mattresses in each bedroom and a handcrafted cherry table seats six.

The space
Our house is conveniently located near airport, restaurants, breweries, and hiking, but is secluded and extremely quiet due to the triple pane windows and heavy insulation. It features a fully equipped kitchen with handcrafted maple cabinets, granite countertops, and a large induction cook top. The four person hot tub is located on the large covered porch permitting it to be enjoyed in almost any weather.

Guest access
Guests have access to

name: Mimi's Cottage in Asheville, North Carolina
description:
Mimi's Cottage is in the Kenilworth section of Asheville. It is a quiet, walkable community with wonderful neighbors. The area is located in the middle of the city but has the feel of living in the country. It is a five minute drive to Mission Hospital while also only five minutes from the Biltmore Estate. Downtown Asheville is ten minutes away.
In addition to being conveniently located, Mimi's Cottage is comfortably nestled by century old white oak trees and hemlocks.

The space
The owners of Mimi's Cottage are recently retired university professors. The campus and community are favorite topics for conversations that guests find useful as the seek sites for relaxation, recreation and entertainment.

name: Incredible Views, Luxurious,Magical,Modern ,Serene
description:
Incredible Views, Luxurious, Serene, Organic,Magical,Pristine

We are proud to offer the Bamboo House at Mountain Meadows for your stay in Asheville.

This luxuriously appointed Private House is 5 miles from downtown Asheville & 1 mile to the Blue Ridge Parkway
Breathtaking views and sunrises at 3500 ft.
• Eco Friendly Bamboo Allergen Free Floors
* Gourmet kitchen,Stainless Steel appliances, Gas Stove
• Custom stonework in Shower with Rain Head
• AT&T U-Verse wireless internet/Direct TV

The space
Private House 4 Bedroom, 3 Full Bathrooms, Sleeps 2-8
WELCOME

We are proud to offer the Bamboo House at Mountain Meadows for your stay in Asheville.

This luxuriously appointed Private House is located 5 miles from downtown Asheville and less than 1 mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway:

Breathtaking eastern views and sunrises at 3500 ft. elevation Borders a National Forest.

Wi

name: Sunrise Rest-West Asheville Modern-Hot Tub & Deck
description:
This is a quiet neighborhood for respectful guests; ( No partiers and no smokers, please). Entire bottom story of a modern house in West Asheville. Includes two private bedrooms, sitting room, kitchenette, full bathroom, laundry and deck with hot tub. Walk to Haywood Road restaurants, breweries and shops or walk to New Belgium Brewery. 2 minute drive to River Arts District and a 5-minute drive to downtown Asheville. Get a great nights rest: all new beds. Think hotel quality!! Thank you.

The space
You will have your own floor of the house that has a deck, hot tub and yard with view of downtown Asheville. 2 large bedrooms!! Only registered guests on the property, please!!

Guest access
Guests will have access to entire bottom floor, deck and hot tub area

Other things to note
Keep in mind that there is only one parking space allocated for guests

name: Musician's Bungalow Walkable West Asheville +Sauna
description:
Our 1920's Musician's Bungalow is located in the heart of West Asheville! Start off your day with a cup of coffee on the front porch, and later take a 5 minute stroll on tree-lined streets to Haywood Road, for countless dining and entertainment options.

The newly renovated backyard is all set for your outdoor entertaining needs with a grill, covered stone patio and cedar barrel sauna. This little gem is the perfect getaway for folks looking to explore Asheville like locals.

The space
-Working Fireplace
-Electric Fireplace
-Stunning hand-crafted stone back patio
-6 person outdoor Barrel Sauna
-Outdoor 8 person stone slab dining table
-Smart TVs
-High speed router
-Front porch with rocking chairs
-Japanese Alkalizing water filter
-Stainless Steel Appliances
-Granite counter tops
-Fenced in front and back yard
-Office

Guest access
Keyless Entry Locks

Other t

name: Centrally Located Luxury Bungalow
description:
This new, stunning bungalow is in the heart of Asheville, the River Arts District, and directly overlooks New Belgium's Taproom. PARKING, ample space for off-roading gear, and a gorgeous lawn/balcony where you can take in the view.

Enjoy Breakfast at Ultra Coffee Bar, Lunch at All Souls Pizza, tour artist's studios, & catch a show at The Grey Eagle. Take a short walk over to the French Broad Greenway, or grab a beer over at the Wedge Brewing. There isn't a better location than this.

The space
This gorgeous and modern 2BR/2BA s brand-new, sleek, and outfitted with some rare perks, like marble bathrooms, ample parking, an outdoor firepit, and vaulted ceilings.

Guest access
Entire House

Other things to note
Check-Out Instructions

Before you go there are a few things we ask that you do:

1. Double-check that there are no longings you left behind
2. Make sure all windows are closed

name: Luxury AVL Property w/ Private Pool near Biltmore!
description:
Gather with family in the NC mountains!
8 bedrooms, 12 beds
3 Kings, 4 Queens, 5 Twins, 4 sofas
Beautifully decorated private home perfect for multi-generational families. Close-to-town yet secluded, you will have total privacy as you swim/sun in the private swimming pool, enjoy the sunset from the front porch rockers and share stories by the fire pit. Enjoy a spacious, professional kitchen and a 14-seat dining room/table.
This home is the perfect setting for a magical, easy vacation.

The space
This home is perfect for family groups, multi-family vacations, and other folks looking to have privacy and spend time together. The house is not appropriate for parties or events and are not allowed.
Sleeps in beds: 19
Max capacity: see room layout below. There are 22 places to sleep including 3 sofas

name: New Luxury Condominium in Downtown Asheville Condotel~45 Asheland Ave.Unit #501
description:
New luxury condominium in the heart of downtown Asheville. This 1 bedroom and 1 bath unit has all the premium amenities you can imagine. New appliances, bedding, and furniture create a stunning accommodation for you and your loved ones to relax and enjoy yourself. Located on the 5th floor, this residence features a full kitchen, dining room, living room, and balcony. You'll fall in love with this new condominium and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Asheville.

Guest access

name: Cozy Cottage 2.2 miles to downtown Asheville
description:
Cozy cottage in the woods on a mountainside just minutes from downtown. Peaceful, pastoral setting with mountain views and a wraparound deck with plenty of outdoor seating for relaxing, and dining. Deck has propane grill. Inside, the open living area with loft is comfortably furnished and well equipped. The kitchen has a range, refrigerator, ice maker, disposal, and dishwasher.

The space
Limited to four adults or three adults with two small children.

Guest access
Entire structure

name: Home So Sweet! Add Cottage next door for 4 more
description:
Location, Location! This beautifully furnished home is close to all the action Asheville and Hendersonville has to offer. The open floorplan makes group gatherings easy. The den has two interior doors to make it private from the main house plus a half bath. The outdoor fire pit is a favorite, quite spot on cool nights. Collier's nature preserve is about 2 minutes away, offering hiking trails in the neighborhood. Coffee shop and other conveniences are within walking distance or a short drive.

The space
Start up supplies are supplied

Guest access
Please text me your email address. I will email your check in/out instructions just before your check in date.

name: Asheville Charm
description:
Asheville Charm is located less than 10 minutes from Downtown, 5 minutes from River Art District, 5 minutes from Haywood/Montford Street restaurants and 15 minutes from Blue Ridge Parkway. Perfect location to enjoy day activities (kayak, hiking, tubing, etc) and night entertainment in Downtown Asheville.

The space
Free Wi-Fi and TV streaming.
Washer and Dryer
Hair Dryer
Microwave
Central heat/Air Conditioning.
Free parking in premises.
Shampoo and soap
Iron and iron table

name: Luxury Lower Duplex, Deck, Heart of Asheville
description:
This newly constructed home apartment is in the heart of Asheville, and the River Arts District. This is the best location in town: five minutes to downtown, five minutes to West Asheville, and next to the French Broad River. This property has ample parking, a gorgeous lawn and a front deck where you can kick back, and take in the view.

Take a stroll over to Wedge brewing, catch a show at Grey Eagle, or walk along the greenway!

The space
Welcome to your contemporary home-away-from-home in Asheville! This gorgeous and modern 2BR/2BA (+ 2 half bath) is brand-new, sleek, and outfitted with some rare perks, like marble bathrooms, an outdoor firepit, a private deck and lawn overlooking New Belgium's taproom, and stainless steel appliances.

Other things to note
Check-Out Instructions

Before you go there are a few things we ask that you do:

1. Double-check that there are no longings you left behind
2. Make s

name: Sleepy Gap. Unwind with your Family and Friends.
description:
Sleepy Gap Oasis is a stylish 2,000 sq foot COUNTRY HOME located at the base of the Blue Ridge Parkway, a 15 minute drive from the airport and a 20+ minute drive from downtown Asheville (depends on traffic and destination, of course). This space is perfect for friends and family who want to spend a quiet & quality stay at the center of everything in Western North Carolina.
GET AWAY from the stress of life, NOURISH your soul, SLEEP in comfort and CONNECT WITH NATURE.

The space
Before we start, here are 4 things people love about our Stylish Country Home:
1 - The region is simply amazing. Some of the most beautiful waterfalls, bikes/hikes, views and breweries are near our property. But you probably know this already, which is why you’re visiting.
2 - Our home has recently been partially renovated and it has a lot of character. The beds are comfortable and you’ll have a fully stocked kitchen. We also feature a lot of original artwork on our walls.

name: The Little House That Could (10 mins to Asheville)
description:
Hi, I'm Tara. I love meeting new people...what better way than to open my home to people traveling to Asheville Nc. I have a love for all patterns, colors and shapes. Mid Century is my favorite. I put a lot of love into the decor of this home to make it feel cozy. I hope ya'll enjoy!

The space
The Little House That Could is less than 10 mins to downtown Asheville and located in Woodfin. It sits right off the road with easy access to the highway. Local roosters are your mountain wake up call.

Guest access
There is a parking spot on the side of the house and you will need to park there and back out of the driveway to exit.

Other things to note
No pets please. I’m allergic.

name: Cozy Cottage | 7 Min. From Downtown | No Pet Fee
description:
This cottage was built in the early 1900's and has been lovingly remodeled.
The property feels private with a spacious yard, giant old oak trees , and plenty of private parking while still being in very close proximity to everything Asheville has to offer. It is 2 miles to downtown and popular Haywood Road.
It includes a cozy living space, fully equipped kitchen, comfy king sized beds, shower/bath combo, original hardwood floors, a fire pit and a large front porch for outdoor chillin’.

The space
Guests have access to the entire house and yard except for the storage shed.

Other things to note
The bungalow was built in 1930 so there are small quirks like creaky and uneven floors and other small imperfections. I think this contributes to the charm though!

name: Cozy Log Cabin Apartment w/ Fairy Forest
description:
Escape from the world in this beautiful newly built log cabin apartment. Wake up refreshed amongst a sunflower mural done by local Asheville artists. Then step outside on to your porch overlooking the forest in the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains. 10-15 minute drive to downtown. Fully equipped kitchen. Luxurious cabin feel bathroom. Wooden cabin accents throughout, newly built by hand from the owners themselves.

The space
Everything in this space is brand new and has been completed along with the construction of the main home at the end of 2019. There's also a relaxing outdoor area with ample seating, a fire pit, and a great view of the Fairy Forest. 20 minutes to the entrance of The Biltmore Estates. 16 minutes to the entrance of the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway.

*** The gravel driveway is steep. Not for the faint of heart. AWD, 4WD, or an adventurous spirit HIGHLY recommended. Seriously, you've been warned! :) We are not kidding so please come prepar

name: Vast Sky Mountain View Asheville Studio
description:
**Due to the coronavirus (COVID-19) we are contact free for our guests, including self check-in with keyless entry. We sanitize hard surfaces and linens between guests**

Ample ground level studio with fantastic views of the Western North Carolina mountains. We are close to the many things that make Asheville the BEST CITY to live in and visit, including the Grove Park Inn, Biltmore Estate, Blue Ridge Parkway, River Arts District, French Broad River, Pisgah National Forest, and the NC Arboretum.

The space
Keypad entry. Queen Bed. Sofa is a Twin XL for additional traveler. We also offer a Pack and Play and a few games. Linens included during your stay. We offer coffee, hot chocolate, and tea for Keurig with creamer and sweetener. Mini fridge. Microwave. Dinnerware for your take-out meals. Glassware for your wine, local brews, and distillery finds.

Guest access
You'll have the entire ground level studio all to yourselves. A

name: Woodnest minutes from everything!
description:
Welcome to our lovely loft nestled on the second floor of the 1927 family Bungalow. Convenient location on a quiet street with lots of greenery, a couple miles from the Biltmore Estate, the Blue Ridge Parkway and Downtown. Off street parking, private entrance and cozy porch of your own. Arranged with homemade wood furniture and caring details.
Once welcomed, you can relax in this peaceful setting, whether you come to Asheville for business, exploring the city or its surrounding nature!

The space
Entrance is through a side gate to an enclosed back yard with an exterior staircase well lit with motion sensors. As you enter, there is a counter with storage underneath for luggage and whatnot. Robert, your host, installed oak flooring and custom-built most of the furniture with local wood. In the evening, you can hang out in the sitting area or use the desk. Or just swing on the porch, looking at the sunset over the mountains, listening to birds chirping o

name: Modern Luxury in RAD, Stylish Balcony
description:
This stunning newly constructed 2nd floor apartment is in the heart of Asheville, and the River Arts District. This is the best location in town: five minutes to downtown, five minutes to West Asheville, and next to the French Broad River. This property has PARKING, ample space for off-roading gear, and a gorgeous lawn and balcony where you can kick back, and take in the view. The balcony overlooks New Belgium's Taproom, a chic, quiet tourist attraction.

The space
Welcome to your contemporary home-away-from-home in Asheville! This gorgeous and modern 2BR/2BA (+ 2 half bath) is brand-new, sleek, and outfitted with some rare perks, like marble bathrooms, a one person jacuzzi tub, an outdoor firepit, and a balcony overlooking New Belgium's Taproom.

Take a stroll over to Wedge brewing, catch a show at Grey Eagle, or walk along the greenway!

Guest access
There is ample parking, and the lawn is available for all guests for lounging and

name: Downtown & RAD at Your Doorstep!
description:
Stay in Chicken Hill, a 10-minute walk to downtown Asheville or the River Arts District. The bottom floor, back porch, and fenced in backyard are all yours during your stay. You'll also have access to locally roasted coffee to start your day off caffeinated and can store your local six-pack in the downstairs minifridge.

The space
The rooms are located on the bottom floor of the house. Full-size windows and the double door to the back porch make it feel warm and welcoming, definitely not a traditional basement. A curtain at the bottom of the stairwell will separate you from the upstairs living space that I occupy. In the foyer, you will have a Keurig coffee maker, microwave, minifridge, and simple breakfast of oatmeal and fruit available. If needed, you can also use the washer and dryer.

Guest access
Access the outdoor stairs via the stone pathway to the left of the house. This will take you down to the fenced in backyard and private

name: Wentworth Hilltop: Private home, outside Biltmore Village + close to Asheville!
description:
Wentworth Hilltop: a very special Asheville vacation spot for the discerning traveller.
Come experience the easy life overlooking the Blue Ridge Mountains. This is a newly constructed home, eclectically decorated with all the modern "comforts of home away from home". You'll enjoy easy access to Biltmore Village, the River Arts District, while being amazingly close to downtown Asheville.

The space
Location:
This private home is located just outside downtown Asheville, and the Biltmore Estate property; an easy 5 minutes to Biltmore Village, and less than 10 minutes to downtown Asheville, the Biltmore Estate, the River Arts District all with its energetic collection of restaurants and shops! You are only app. 15 minutes to Asheville Regional airport. You are essentially close to "everything" in and around Asheville. The home is accessed via only paved roads.

Accommodations:
(Sleeps 6-8) 3 bedroom, 2 full baths, single 1/2 bath
Oc

name: Family Friendly, Fenced, 5BR/3.5BA Game Room/Dogs
description:
The restrictions are over, so come enjoy the mountains! We have taken the CDC recommended steps to ensure your wellbeing.

Enjoy a full mountain getaway without leaving the property. It has a large hot tub, a spacious deck, a patio, a sports bar with pool table, a quality kitchen with cookware, two dining rooms, an office area for remote work, an elegant spa bathtub and 60” & 50" HDTVs in living room.

This property is very close to downtown Asheville and all its current take out services.

The space
This is the perfect property for those who wish to have a mountain getaway without leaving the vacation rental property. It is designed for entertainment and relaxation. It has a quality kitchen and two dining room areas. So you can prepare a meal on the property or take advantage of the many take-out services offered by our top local restaurants both in downtown Asheville and surrounding areas.

On the property take advantage of the h

name: Wizards Hollow - Treehouses of Serenity
description:
**The April 2022 calendar will be released on October 1 @ 8 a.m!!**

"Wizards Hollow" is one of 5 treehouses and a hobbit hole that makes up Treehouses of Serenity. We are located just 10 mins north of downtown Asheville nestled in the Blue Ridge Mountains. Each property has expansive windows in order to take in the long-range mountain views and include fully functioning bathrooms.

We love our pups, but we don't allow pets, and please read and understand the Airbnb strict cancelation policy

The space
Calling all Harry Potter Fans, bring your inner magic! Wizards Hollow is our version of Hogwarts here in the mountains of Asheville. The castle is close to 600 sq ft of wizardry. Fly your house flag, and if you are not sure to which house you belong, consult our sorting hat! Feeling mischievous, our invisible cloak will keep your family guessing! After mixing your potions, relax in one of two queen beds. This home has 1 bedroom and a spi

name: East West Nest: Stylish and Walkable in West Avl!
description:
Welcome to our bright and super stylish free standing carriage house on the east side of hip West Asheville! We have one bedroom with a queen bed and a full sofa bed in the living room. Enjoy your morning coffee or evening beverage from the second story porch in the trees. With a ten minute walk, get to New Belgium Brewery, Taco Billy, Early Girl Eatery, Owl Bakery, and the French Broad River Greenway. Find yourself in downtown Avl or in the River Arts District with just a 5 minute drive.

The space
Our East West Nest cleaning team follows Airbnb’s five-step enhanced cleaning process, which is based on Airbnb’s cleaning handbook that was developed in partnership with experts. In addition, we are also changing our throw blankets and couch throw pillows after each guest. We are committed to providing a clean and sanitized home for our guests!

Our space is bright and welcoming and has been outfitted with all the comforts you'll need during your stay. The

name: Asheville Chateau Relaxo - 2 Bed/2 Bath
description:
The Chateau Relaxo is a beautifully appointed home by all the action of Asheville. Close to the Blue Ridge Parkway, the Biltmore, Biltmore Village & downtown. All are only an Uber or a short drive.

Outside enjoy a gas fire pit, grille, screened porch & a tree top deck, 30 ft off the ground!

Indoors is a grand kitchen, a gas Jotul stove & a large, open floor plan. Enjoy a game of Dutch shuffleboard or cozy up on the comfortable furniture to watch a movie on the 65” HD TV (Netflix Included).

The space
Welcome to Asheville’s Chateau Relaxo! This is an entire home rental. Please enjoy your stay!

Guest access
Entire space rental 2 bedrooms/2 bathrooms

Other things to note
We have two parking spaces on the property. We are unable to accomodate more than two vehicles. There is no street parking available.

name: Private apartment on mountainside near Asheville
description:
This unique, private apartment is located on a mountainside about 21 minutes south of Asheville and 23 minutes from downtown Hendersonville. The Blue Ridge Parkway is minutes away for hiking and walking. The kitchen is perfect for cooking all of your meals. You can sit at the dining table and see Mt. Pisgah in the fall and winter or watch the squirrels and deer from spring through fall. A dog-friendly place with a fenced-in back yard covered in grass and river pebbles and stones.

The space
The apartment is a completely separate unit located in the basement or ground floor of the main house. There are two private entrances, one from the parking area, and one from the garage. The bedroom has lots of closet space and a dresser. The bedroom window looks out over a private fenced in back yard and has opaque blinds to allow the room to remain dark. A small laundry room with a washer, dryer, iron, and ironing board adjoins the bedroom. There is a small full bath with

name: The Aerie - Treehouses of Serenity
description:
"The Aerie" is one of 5 treehouses and a hobbit home that makeup "Treehouses of Serenity". We are located just 10 mins north of downtown Asheville nestled in the Blue Ridge Mountains. Each property has expansive windows in order to take in the long-range mountain/sunset views and include fully functioning bathrooms.

Please note, we love our pups, but we do have a strict no-pet policy. Also, prior to booking, please read and understand the Airbnb strict cancelation policy.

The space
If this treehouse is not available during your travel dates, check out one of our sister properties.

Aerie - noun - a large nest of a bird of prey, especially an eagle, typically built high in a tree or on a cliff

Feel like a soaring eagle as you take in the views from The Aerie. This 3 level "birdhouse" is equipped with a queen bed in the loft, kitchen, and bath on the middle/main level and living room on the lower level. This birdhouse is trimmed

name: Long term stay house, king bed & private bathroom
description:
Within 10-15 minutes to Downtown Asheville, Asheville Art Museum, Buncombe County Civil War Memorial, Thomas Wolfe Memorial, Asheville Drum Circle, Orange Peel Social Aid and Pleasure Club, US Cellular Center, Basilica of St. Lawrence, Montford Historic District, Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Estate, Historic Biltmore Village, the Arboretum, the Outlets, The Omni Grove Park Inn, Carrier Park, Highland Brewery, River Arts District, Grove Arcade, Mission Hospital, Downtown Hendersonville.

Guest access
Kitchen, Patio, Living Room

name: 1 Bedroom in Charming duplex 2 miles from Dwtn
description:
One bedroom in a 2 bedroom duplex. Very short distance to downtown Asheville and all it has to offer

The space
Charming House 2 miles from the heart of downtown Asheville. 5 minute walk from numerous shops and restaurants of merrimon avenue. Botanical garden and Greenway 10 minute walk away

Guest access
Shared living room, dinning room, kitchen and bathroom. I am hardly ever home

name: 45 Asheland. New downtown luxury condo. #304
description:
Bright, airy corner residence with beautiful views of the mountains and downtown skyline. This 2 bedroom 2 bath condo is a spacious, open concept design with stylish finishes and fixtures. Everything is brand new and sparkling clean. Large windows invite plenty of natural sunlight. Kitchen opens directly into living area. Walk out the front door of the building and you're in the heart of downtown Asheville and it's many award winning restaurants, tasting rooms, boutiques and galleries.

The space
You can go for days without using your car. If you get the urge to explore further afield, hop in your car - it's only a short five minute drive to the beautiful Biltmore Estate, Biltmore Village or Blue Ridge Mountain trails. The 45 Asheland Building is very secure with a keyless, coded exterior entrance and elevator to make your comings and goings safe and easy. There is one dedicated parking space for each condo in the garage; additional cars must park in one of the ci

name: Forest Oasis  King & Queen Beds 10 min to downtown
description:
Entire home conveniently located less than 10 minutes from Downtown Asheville, West Asheville, River Arts District and New Belgium brewery. Relax on the covered back porch in the woods after a day of exploring Asheville. The Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway are must-visits! Open space for entertaining, high speed Internet, 2 smart TVs, 2 Queen beds and 1 King. French Broad Outfitters, Richmond Hills Disk Golf Park, and The Salvage Station, are all only a few minutes from the house!

The space
Guests can use the whole house, including a full kitchen, back porch, washer/dryer, and cozy woodstove in the living area. 3 Bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, both with tubs and showers. The yard is very wild and you will likely see deer, turkeys, groundhogs, and other companions of the wild. If you do choose to walk around the yard, keep in mind that it is steep and wild and not for the elderly or children.

Guest access
Please be careful when dr

name: Tiny House with Mountain Views
description:
Come enjoy Asheville from our newly remodeled light and bright tiny house. Super efficient open floor plan. Kitchen area with full size refrigerator and microwave. Outdoor grill with burner for additional cooking needs. Living area with couch, tv and electric fireplace. Queen bed in the sleeping area. Step out one of two sliding glass doors to enjoy the mountain views from the deck or gather around the firepit.

Tiny house also rents together with our "Reeves Cove Cottage" to sleep 11.

The space
If mountain views are what you want you have found your tiny get away. Just 15 minutes to vibrant West Asheville, 20 minutes to downtown Asheville and just 5 minutes to grocery store. This house provides that get away feeling without being too far out.

Pretty simple space but very well designed with great kitchen area, relaxing living area and cozy sleeping area. High end finishes throughout. The best is the deck to relax and take in th

name: Mountain Cottage and Tiny House with hot tub
description:
This listing is for BOTH our main cottage AND the adjoining tiny house.

Both were renovated and decor are in "Fixer Upper Farmhouse style". Hot tub, grill & fire pit are available for guest use.

The main house was originally located on the Biltmore Estate Dairy Farm property & was moved to this location in the 1950's. It is a sweet somewhat quirky place.

Need more space? Check out our Blue Bird Cottage for 2 additional bedrooms/baths.

The space
The main house is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath home that has been updated with modern finishes. There is a family room, formal dining, sun room and screened in porch. The master suite has a living area area with a couch as well as a queen sized bed and sliding doors to back deck.
There are Mountain View’s from the back deck,hot tub and fire pit.
The tiny house is a thoughtfully designed 250 sqft space. Efficiency kitchen, full bathroom, living area with electric fireplace and mount

name: The Sweet Mt Royal House ~Views/Biltmore/Asheville
description:
Welcome to the Illusion of Seclusion!
Feels remote, actually close to everything: Asheville, Biltmore, airport, Blue Ridge Parkway, hiking, & more!

5-Star Outside: Several seating areas on 2+ acres - screened porch, a large covered area w lighting, fire pits, large deck for the amazing mountain view and breezes.

5-Star Inside: Every room has been beautifully remodeled with comfy beds and linens, cleaned by "Fresh & Clean" professionals, and the views are simply amazing!

The space
This property is "Fresh & Clean"

So, if you're looking for someplace beautiful, comfortable, CLEAN, and private to get away from the hustle and bustle... you found it!

This beautiful unique mountain house sits on a lovely quiet wooded lot with gorgeous long mountain views, but it's near everything! Neighbors call it, "the illusion of seclusion". A perfect space for a family gathering or couples escape. (Sorry ~ no parties or events allowe

name: West Avl Private Space: Comfortable & Convenient
description:
Roomy & comfortable, one block from lively Haywood Road. Walking distance to many restaurants, shopping, & music venues. A quick easy drive to downtown or to great hiking. The space is the front half of the house including your private Living Room, Dining Room, Bedroom, & Bath. Private front door entrance. NO kitchen access, but there is a coffee maker/toaster oven, electric kettle, mini-fridge, microwave & water cooler are in the bedroom.
I live in the separate back area of the home.

The space
Check yourself in with your provided keypad code. Just inside of your private front entrance is your living room and the comfortable bedroom is to the right. The peaceful front porch is furnished with a table for outside dining and outdoor couch for relaxing.

In the living room is the TV equipped with Roku, local channels on the Spectrum app as well as hulu and netflix. The living room has a futon couch that can be pulled out for another bed. I also have

name: Bent Creek Loft
description:
This perfectly situated studio has beautiful mountain views, direct access to the Bent Creek trail system, and a 22-acre community park right out the back gate. Come to explore and relax at this quite getaway.

The space
With high ceilings and a large private deck-this studio is airy and quiet. Plenty of space to relax after a day of explore the Blue Ridge Mountains, Asheville, or the French Broad River. There is only an outdoor shower, which is loved by many guests.
The loft sits above the garage.

Guest access
There is plenty of street parking. Access to the loft is by a set of outside stairs on the side of the garage.

name: Quiet Refuge Close to Downtown
description:
Recently built in 2018 and furnished apartment with everything you need to be comfortable. Quiet setting close to downtown in desirable Kenilworth neighborhood. Walking distance to Mission Hospital and perfect for temporary situations or an extended vacation.

The space
The full apartment is available to guests and a parking space is reserved for one vehicle

Guest access
The apartment is self-contained. Please talk to us if you’d like using the fire pit.

Other things to note
Our trusted friend, Amanda, cleans the apartment every Tuesday. Please remove your sheets and tidy up for her and she will clean your bathroom, use freshly cleaned bedding, dust and vacuum.

name: Azalea Room - Black Walnut Bed and Breakfast Inn
description:
This is the luxurious "lady of the house" King size bedroom.

The Azalea has west-facing windows overlooking the koi ponds, and guests in this room often take advantage of being lulled to sleep by the sounds of the pond.

Guest can enjoy the remote controlled gas fireplace in the cozy seating area.

The pink marble table tops in the room mimic the bathroom vanity, which dates back to 1899 and was hand-carved by the father of the acclaimed author Thomas Wolfe.

name: Camellia Room - Black Walnut Bed and Breakfast Inn
description: This elegant suite feels like a glamorous 18th century French boudoir with its pale blue and gold color scheme, antique velvet sofa, vintage clawfoot tub, and glittering frosted glass chandelier. The kitchenette nook is perfect for an early cup of tea or a late night mug of hot cocoa. You would never guess that this is a pet-friendly room, as our staff cleans with great attention to detail to ensure that no trace is left behind of our furry guests.

name: Dogwood Room - Black Walnut Bed and Breakfast Inn
description: This unique room has the distinction of being where Sandra Bullock stayed while filming the movie 28 Days. Our home was used as a set for this film as well! This is the turret in the house and has an antique clawfoot tub with shower conversion and a quirky little study with built in bookcase and comfortable reading chair. The Queen-sized bed area has a marvelous Gaugin-inspired nighttime sky, with burnt copper clouds and a crystal chandelier.

name: Ivy Garden - Black Walnut Bed and Breakfast Inn
description:
The Ivy Room (Bed & Breakfast) is the ultimate romantic Asheville get-away. The luxurious room has a 2-person 110 gallon Jacuzzi tub, King-sized feather bed, working fireplace, and air conditioner.

Our guests may enjoy a full three course breakfast from 8:30 - 9:30 am. Welcoming Afternoon Tea. Complimentary beverage from 5 - 6 pm.

With off street parking and easy access to downtown Asheville (0.5 mile walk to downtown) our Bed and Breakfast is a perfect place to stay in Asheville.

name: Holly Room - Black Walnut Bed and Breakfast Inn
description: This lavish second floor room is dressed in shades of ivory and gold. A plush king sized bed and a pair of French armchairs anchor the room. In the summer, open the north facing window to enjoy a tranquil view of our gardens and waterfall. In the winter, light a log in the fireplace, pull up one of the antique armchairs, and sip on a cup of hot cocoa. The small but dramatic bathroom transforms into your own private spa - with the push of a button, activate the steam shower and relax.

name: Magnolia Room - Black Walnut Bed and Breakfast Inn
description: Situated toward the pond and parking, this suite is ADA compliant. Dressed in shades of buttery yellow, burnished browns and reds with an eclectic mix of antiques and fine furnishings, The Magnolia is a delightful room with its brass chandeliers and stunning bath with large shower. This guest room offers the kitchenette with microwave, sink, mini-fridge (with ice maker) and small dining area. Facing the covered terrace is a sitting area, flat screen TV and all of the comforts of the main house.

name: Sunshine Room - Black Walnut Bed and Breakfast Inn
description: This well-appointed and comfortably furnished first-floor room is complete with a charming window seat, Queen-sized bed, and an elegant marble bath with Jacuzzi tub and shower conversion. It is equipped with individual air conditioning for perfect comfort and a working fireplace for romantic, cool weather evenings

name: Walnut Room - Black Walnut Bed and Breakfast Inn
description:
This spacious room was originally the master suite of the house and can accommodate parties of three people.

The Walnut Room allows for ample afternoon sun and views of our koi ponds and gardens.

Amasculine room in decor, it is painted a warm shade of deep burnished peach, accentuated by black, gold, and sage fabrics. A magnificent king-sized bed with Kingsdown mattress awaits guests looking to unwind after a busy day of touring Asheville.

name: Extended Stay, Bedroom with Shared Bath
description:
Nice amenities at a competitive price. I try to keep my calendar full by being your first choice and the best value in the area. I specialize in medium to long-term rentals but occasionally I have short-term availability between long-term reservations. PLEASE SCROLL THROUGH THE ENTIRE LISTING AND READ ALL DETAILS BEFORE BOOKING.

The space
Your private bedroom is in a 3-bedroom house. It has a full-size bed with a very comfortable memory foam mattress. You will be using a bathroom that's shared with the host. It's located directly across the hall from your bedroom. A third bedroom with an en suite bath is available for rent and may be occupied by another guest of the host or a renter who may share the common spaces including the living room, kitchen, dining room, deck, and yard.

My house is in a quiet, safe, walkable, neighborhood. Neighbors are friendly and can often be seen taking walks or jogging alone, with family, or with dogs. Don't be surprised i

name: Dogwood Bee Cottage
description:
Enjoy central city amenities while feeling tucked away on a mountain top. Experience all of Asheville's arts and food, downtown and plenty more to be found within a 1 mile radius of the Dogwood Bee cottage.

Be a part of the historic feel of the city in your very own 1800's cottage. Cozy and unique, the time you spend here will be part of your vacation instead of just a place to sleep!

The space
There are two main bedrooms and a fully equipped kitchen. Each of the two bedrooms has it's own door to the covered balcony overlooking the blue ridge mountains and surrounded by large trees.
The expansive yard has a fire pit and a wrap around deck to enjoy the sunrise and sunset with a cup of tea and a book.

The third bedroom is between the other two so is more of a common area option due to the need of walking through one of the other rooms. Two bathrooms, both have a shower and or a tub.

There is plenty of space to spread out insi

name: Master Suite Plus Second Bedroom
description:
Flexible space for up to 4 people. Master suite with queen bed and private bath, walk-in closet, dresser, and desk. Second bedroom with a full bed, closet, and dresser shares the bathroom across the hall with the host. I specialize in medium to long-term rentals but occasionally I have short-term availability between long-term reservations. PLEASE SCROLL THROUGH THE ENTIRE LISTING AND READ ALL DETAILS BEFORE BOOKING.

The space
The master bedroom is 150 square feet plus a walk-in closet and en suite bathroom. You can fully unpack using the closet and dresser to store your clothes and belongings. Sit at the desk to work on you laptop which can be plugged into the base of the desk lamp. A bench provides extra seating.

The smaller bedroom is just a few feet away down the hall. It's 100 square feet plus a closet. The closet and dresser provide more space for unpacking and keeping everybody's things separate. There's a second bathroom directly across the hal

name: The Bluebird Getaway 2
description:
Spacious and serene 2 bedroom house just minutes from downtown AVL. Great location! Has a large deck off a big kitchen and lush green forest behind. Feels like you are living in the trees! Near end of cul-de-sac so quiet and private, but close to everything. Biking/hiking/running trails just down the street. Large master bedroom with ensuite bath and one more bedrooms with a communal bathroom. Plenty of parking!

The space
This home is situated in a perfect location. Just 3 miles to the heart of downtown and easy access to anything and anywhere Asheville has to offer. The bustling River Arts District is only about 1.5 miles away and there are food and music venues even closer, including White Duck Taco, Salvage Station and more! Relax on the large back deck while listening to the birds and nature. There are only trees and greenery to take up the view. Or head to Richmond Hill Park just down the street for some disc golf, or a hike or bike ride. The house

name: Beautiful West Asheville Home, Live like a local
description:
I am taking special care setting the house, please reach out with any questions or concerns. We are all navigating this together.
Our 1928 West Asheville Art&Crafts home is modern and full of original features.
Located on a quiet tree-lined street half a block from Haywood Rd you can walk to it all.
Whatever part of Asheville you would like to explore our home puts you in the heart of it. Downtown Asheville, RAD, Biltmore, Grove Park Inn, Waterfall hikes all a quick couple miles.

The space
We love our home and hope you will too.
1928 charm with original features, all the modern updates and our artistic style.
The kitchen is well stocked, the bathroom has everything you should need.
Our goal is for you to arrive, make a drink in our gourmet kitchen and in typical southern fashion enjoy it relaxing on the porch while planning out your perfect day.
Did I mention our location is Epic?!

Guest access
The house

name: Private king suite off parkway
description:
Private king suite located right off the parkway, short (10 min) drive to downtown. 10 min drive to Biltmore House. Comfortable King sized Lull Mattress. Easy key code check in. Hiking trails in walking distance, with neighborhood access to mountains to sea trail. Only one mile from Shoji spa! If you're relaxing in nature or exploring downtown, this is a great place to be based in seeing all of Asheville.

The space
The suite is located below the main house with a private entrance. I will provide a personal key code for entry during your stay. There is a coffee station, mini fridge, microwave, T.V and Roku. There is not a kitchen or cooking space. There is a small table and chairs for eating meals. The bed is a comfortable king sized Lull mattress. I try to maintain a comfortable temperature in the suite but if you need an adjustment just send me a message! There's parking in the driveway, please let me know if you intend on bringing more than one vehicle. You can

name: Furnished Luxury Studio Apt 30 Day Minimum
description:
• Private w/covered porch, patio & gazebo
• Kitchen w/stove & stainless steel appliances
• Refrigerator w/icemaker
• Washer/dryer
• Saatva mattress, high end bedding
• Towels, sheets, toiletries
• Smart TV w/Netflix, Hulu, Amazon
• High-speed Wi-Fi
• Large closet w/chest of drawers
• High efficiency HVAC
• Books and games
• Fully tiled living space
• Spacious bathroom w/heater
• Areas for office set-up
• Trash/recycling service
• Off-street parking
• Prime location/heart of West Asheville

The space
New construction, contemporary decor, modern kitchen, plenty of light with four windows in main room and window in bath. Stay in Luxury while you plan your move to Asheville area. Short walk to West Asheville. All you need is clothes and a toothbrush.

Guest access
Access to entire studio apartment, fenced yard, outdoor covered deck and stone patio, storage room with

name: Walk to downtown Asheville!
description:
Safety update: CDC-approved cleaning products, masks and gloves used by housekeepers. Location, location, location! Charming, fully furnished private apartment in circa 1905 house within easy walking distance of downtown, grocery stores, coffee shops, yoga studio and more. Lovely shared patio w/ artisan-made fountain. 1 QU bed, bath w/ walk-in shower, washer/dryer. Light, bright dining room and well-functioning kitchen. Good wifi and streaming services on flat screen TV. Minimum stay 1 month.

The space
Enjoy your stay in this beautifully restored, fully-furnished apartment in a 1905 house located in the historic Chestnut Hills section of Asheville, just a few blocks from the heart of downtown. Old neighborhood with sidewalks and large old growth trees. Walk to Whole Foods, Harris Teeter and Trader Joe's, Liberty Street Cafe and the Asheville yoga center. The 800-square-foot apartment is one bed and one bath with a living room, full kitchen and sunny dining ro

name: Spacious Cottage minutes from downtown Asheville
description:
[In response to the COVID-19 (Coronavirus) outbreak we have implemented the following safety measures between each stay]

- sanitizing doorknobs, remotes, tables, handles, and other commonly touched surfaces
- all linens washed with bleach at the hottest setting
- sanitizing mop solution used on the floor]

This charming 1920s bungalow is the essence of Asheville. Located just west of town this home is minutes to some of Asheville’s best restaurants, breweries, parks, and trails.

The space
The bungalow was built during the “Roaring 20s” and retains its authentic history and charm. It was recently renovated with 21st century luxuries to offer the best of the past and present. A cozy, yet spacious layout and tasteful design make this home the perfect place to stay.

While close to town there is easy access to I-40 and I-26/240. Downtown Asheville and the Biltmore Estate are less than a 10 minute drive. The Blue Ridge Parkwa

name: Charming bungalow in West Asheville w/hottub
description:
Newer home right in the heart of West Asheville. Walking distance to the famous Biscuit Head and Sunny Point. It is conviently located 3 miles from downtown and 2 miles from the River Arts district also half mile from French Broad River. Relax on the front covered porch and melt your cares away. Bright and cheery with 2 bedrooms and 1.5 bathrooms for your restful stay. Each room has a TV and fast WiFi. Keyless entry. Enjoy the nice breezy evenings in the hot tub on a huge wrap around deck.

The space
There is space cleared out in the fridge and cabinets so that you will have amble amount space to store your takeouts and groceries.

Guest access
You have access to the entire house...kitchen,laundry, living room, two bedrooms and one and a half baths. The porch is covered and you have a double person hammock available to relax. I even have bamboo blinds if the sun is out and in your eyes! The yard is spectacular with tons of beautiful blooms

name: Walkable West Asheville Studio Apartment
description:
Private ground-level studio apartment with separate entrance in the basement of our green built West Asheville family home. Nestled by a creek in a quiet cul-de-sac with backyard trail access to park/playground. The location could hardly be more perfect: just a 10-15 minute walk to all Haywood Road has to offer, easy access to the highway and less than 4 miles to downtown - yet the neighborhood is tranquil, safe and kid-friendly.

The space
The studio is an ideal space for single travelers, couples or small families who prefer to avoid harsh chemicals and fragrances.
It is green-built and furnished with non-toxic materials, including a decadently soft California king sized organic latex mattress, down comforter and organic cotton linens.
We have a whole house water filter, a local spring water dispenser, and a Mitsubishi mini-split with HEPA filtration.
We stock the bathroom with organic shampoo, conditioner, body wash and hand soap, all the linen

name: Location & Comfort with Great Outdoor Space
description:
One-level home located in a residential neighborhood with on-site parking. Home features expanded great room with picture window, rock fireplace and gas logs; open eat-in kitchen with coffee provided; spacious bedrooms with comfy beds and large outdoor patio with fire pit and grill, landscaped, beautiful flowers in season and deck with hot tub for cool mountain evenings.

Asheville attractions and restaurants are only minutes away.

The space
This property is truly a " home away from home" and the perfect place to explore Asheville then wind down and relax. Great for couples traveling together. I live here year round and open up a limited amount of time to share with travelers coming to Asheville. This is why you will experience a very personal stay with all the comforts and warmth of home along with the privacy of having the property all to yourself. The below bullet points are features that further describe my home.

- Front door access

name: Comfy, Tranquil Tuck-Away, 10 Min to Downtown.
description:
Come stay in a relaxed, quiet, heavily wooded area in East Asheville. This Guest Suite is located in gorgeous Botany Woods, a lovely residential neighborhood that will give you an authentic feel for 'the natural life in western North Carolina.' Wildlife abounds, yet a quick 10 minute drive transports you to lively, eclectic downtown Asheville and The River Arts District. Entrance to the Blue Ridge Parkway is just 2 miles away and The Biltmore is a short 10 min drive. Fabulous location!!

The space
Guests will have a private, digitally coded, locked entrance. This sparkling clean Guest Suite is a new remodel with an emphasis on immediate comfort. All furnishings are newly purchased. A Smart tv, with Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime and Cable is included, along with strong wifi access. Guests will have their own private patio area, along with access to a unique, private, treehouse meditation space. Guests will have off street parking under a covered carport at

name: The Josephine
description:
The Josephine is a beautiful new townhome, located less than 5 miles from downtown Asheville. Our home offers a comfortable and relaxing home base for up to 8 guests.

You will love the incredible sunsets and mountain views from our deck and nearly every room of the house. Our home is conveniently located, thoughtfully decorated, absolutely spotless and exceedingly comfortable.

The space
You will enter our 3-story home on the lower level, which has a spacious foyer with bench seating and a large coat closet (or stroller closet!). Gorgeous hardwood floors run throughout the home, with exception of tile flooring in the baths. Take the stairs to the main living spaces, which features a large kitchen and dining area that opens to the relaxing living room. Our kitchen is fully equipped for all of your home cooking needs. In addition to beautiful granite counter-tops and a large farm sink, you'll find plenty of dishes, spices, a coffee maker (and coffee), an

name: Montford Rosy Cosy Guest Nest : 2 Blocks to Dtwn
description:
Welcome to our 3BR/2BA creative, eclectic, beloved home space. Nestled in walkable, historic montford neighborhood, built in 1905, featuring hardwood floors, 9 foot ceilings, beautiful light, and some say feels a bit like a treehouse because of all the leaves out our many original windows!

Coming in October 2021:
2 adult bikes + an an array of kids bikes; king size Casper in master; queen size Casper bed in 2nd BR; updated bathrooms +kitchen; 3rd BR w/full over queen bunk beds; and more !

The space
WE DELIGHT IN HOSTING! :)

Welcome to our eclectic, artsy, well loved, creative family home space! This 2nd story apartment is all yours for your visit, as we stay with friends nearby or camping! Always just a text away!

Romantic master bedroom with Casper queen size bed! Living room with pillow top queen size bed! Newly installed central AC and dedicated 2nd floor only vents + thermostat, With new filters for enhanced air filt

name: Charming House By Riverside Park - Entire House!
description:
Enjoy a tranquil stay near the river in this lovely vacation home by the French Broad River. Take a 10 minute stroll to the Riverside Park to have a scenic walk and take photos by the river. Then head to downtown and eat at the restaurants or drink at the breweries that Asheville is famous for. It's only a 10 minute drive away.

This house has a 1000 Mbps fiber connection and is suitable for multiple people to do remote work, gaming, and streaming simultaneously. We are also solar powered!

The space
This stylish house comes with 3 bedrooms on the first floor and two beds in a shared room upstairs. All beds are equipped with queen sized mattresses. The entire house has beautiful hardwood floors that brings the beautiful forest scenery to the home.

The house has a full kitchen and elegant living space

Gorgeous personally custom made office table made from solid wood floats over 2 chairs creating the perfect environment for planning

name: The Magic Bullet @Baying Hound Campground
description:
The Magic Bullet, located in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground, is a sleeping pod suspended in the air. Part tree-house, part airplane, and part pick-up truck, this spot is like no other. The floor is padded, but be sure to bring sleeping bags, pillows and possibly a sleeping pad if you like a little extra softness. The Baying Hound Campground is about 10 minutes from downtown, yet still on the edges of rural, agricultural Asheville.

The space
THE CAMPGROUND
The Baying Hound Campground is where rural Appalachia meets “keep Asheville weird.” You’ll see sleeping pods decorated by professional artists, structures made from upcycled building materials and permaculture experiments in the making. We’ve been described as “if a European hostel and an Appalachian campground had a baby.” Not quite glamping and definitely not KOA, we're happy to offer you a more social alternative to cookie-cutter lodging without breaking the bank.

name: Car Spot at The Baying Hound Campground
description:
Do you love car camping, but hate WalMart parking lots? Come stay with us! This car-camping/van-camping spot is located in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground. You'll have access to a hang-out platform perched above the campground, a community fire pit, old-school outhouse, solar shower and a sink with cold running water.

** If you're looking for a site where you can pitch a tent, check out our other listings because this one does NOT INCLUDE a tent camping spot. **

The space
The car spot is in our parking area, located on a semi-private, dead-end road that we share with two neighbors. If the vehicle you're sleeping in is larger than a van, just let us know and we'll figure out a way to accommodate you.

THE CAMPGROUND
The Baying Hound Campground is where rural Appalachia meets “keep Asheville weird.” You’ll see sleeping pods decorated by professional artists, structures made from upcycled building materials and

name: Hydrangea
description:
Newly renovated downstairs apartment. Conveniently located 10 minutes from downtown Asheville and many of it breweries. two bedrooms, bathroom, kitchen, dining, and living room. Family friendly. We have a dog in the back yard in a cage, but don’t worry he’s quite at night and he can’t get out on his own and he won’t bother people.

The space
Newly renovated downstairs apartment, with full kitchen, kitchen has oven, stove, microwave, refrigerator, toaster, coffee machine, also tea and coffee provided with creamer and sugar. Kitchen also has plates, pans, pots, electric kettle, cups, mugs, and all kinds of spices. Ramen noodles, and animal crackers are also available in the kitchen

There is a full bath with shower tub, bath includes everything you will need during your stay. Shampoo, conditioner, body wash, lotion, tooth paste, tooth brush, hairdryer, cotton swabs, and towels and wash cloths.

The bedrooms also have extra blankets and extra pil

name: In east Asheville and close to so much more!
description:
Located in east Asheville, only 12 minutes to downtown. The neighborhood is adjacent to the Blue Ridge Parkway and the Mountain to Sea Trail. Great setup for spending your days exploring Asheville and western NC, then resting up for the next day's adventure. Private bedroom and bath in a traditional ranch home. Bathroom remodeled in 2017. Bed and mattress new in 2019. You are also welcome to use the kitchen fridge/freezer and laundry room--just ask.

The space
You'll be staying in the original master bedroom (with en suite bath) of our traditional 1960s ranch home. Although the listing says two guests, there's also room for a child in a sleeping bag or baby in a portable crib in the room.

Guest access
Street parking in quiet neighborhood. If you bring a bike or motorbike, it can be stored in the garage when you're not riding.

Other things to note
COVID UPDATE
We are excited to be welcoming guests again! We are

name: Traveling professional in WNC? Cozy & convenient!
description:
Welcome to our beatiful home nestled in the Blue Ridge Mountains. I am conveniently located close to Mission Hospital, Advent Health and Pardee Hospital. I have a 30 day minimum.

Also, on your days off you’ll be minutes away from Blue Ridge Parkway and the NC Arboretum. Asheville is rich with culture and award-winning resturants. We would love for you to stay in our home while on assignment or visiting Asheville.

I have a large lab-pointer mix is very friendly (after the initial meeting) :)

The space
You’ll have a private bedroom and bathroom while having access to a fully stocked kitchen. I also have exercise equipment available for your use (treadmill, weights, bands, etc).

Guest access
You have access to your bedroom and bathroom and the shared kitchen and living room.

description:
Cozy guest suite with private entrance. 2.5 miles away from Biltmore Village and the Biltmore Estate. Several breweries nearby (Hillman, French Broad, Catawba, Highland, and Burial's Forestry Camp). 4.5 Miles to downtown Asheville. Minutes to I-40, I-240 and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
Note there is a flight of stairs to get into the suite. Front sitting room has a small bistro table to enjoy your morning coffee. We provide Nespresso coffee: American and Espresso, regular and decaf. Enjoy Roku TV. Brand new bathroom, with shower/tub combo. Bedroom with a very comfortable brand new queen size bed. 2 night tables and lamps.

Other things to note
If you are a smoker, this is not the place for you. We don’t allow any smoking (or vaping) in the suite, outside of the suite or around the property.

name: Mountain Modern; stunning luxury close to downtown Asheville! Pool, hot tub +
description:
Mountain Modern; simply stunning, modern "one-of-a-kind" home with surprising views, high-end finishes, and mere minutes to downtown & everything Asheville! Your must-stay Asheville destination! The pool, hot tub and fire pit provide the ultimate outdoor amenities, while the interior oozes true LUXURY and mountain relaxation!

Location:

Extremely close to the Biltmore Estate, the River Arts District and West Asheville with its energetic & eclectic collection of restaurants and shops!
You are app. 25 minutes to Asheville Regional airport. Bottom line; you are essentially close to "everything" in and around Asheville. The home is accessed via only paved roads.

This is bound to become your go-to vacation spot! Your must-stay Asheville destination! Sunrise Cottage is a cozy gem nestled on top of Town Mountain – close to the Blue Ridge Parkway. WOW!!!"

You are only 20 minutes to Asheville Regional airport. You are essentially close to "everything" in and around Asheville. The home is accessed via only paved roads.

description:
Mills Gap Lodge; exceptional mountain get-a-way, high-end finishes, hot tub, game room, and mere minutes to downtown & everything Asheville! Your must-stay Asheville destination! Upscale group accommodations with abounding amenities both inside & out!
Knock it out of the park, home-run vacation spot.

description:
Sweet studio with private entrance in the lower level of my home (we live upstairs). Perfect for visitors who want quiet and comfort close to all Asheville has to offer; 3 mi to Biltmore Estate, 6 mi to Downtown Asheville, 5 mi to River Arts District, 10 mi to AVL Airport and 30 mi to DuPont State Forest. Close to 40, 240 and Blue Ridge Parkway for access to hiking N, S, E or W. We have one indoor cat that does not enter the Airbnb. Come enjoy Asheville and the surrounding mountains!

Feels like you are at a retreat but close to everything Asheville has to offer. One small black/grey outdoor cat on the premises (her name is Loki) who might come visit you at your door.

description:
In the very center of thriving downtown, walking distance to all the breweries and restaurants, very quiet, this newly renovated flat is a great pick!
