The space newly renovated modern flat. Large-screen smart TV, comfortable lounging, dining, fully-equipped kitchen, great lighting, hardwood floors, ceiling fans, lofty ceilings, award-winning coffee are among the comforts of this flat.

name: Central Downtown Asheville 203
description:
WELCOME TO VISIT
In the very center of thriving downtown, walking distance to all the breweries and restaurants, very quiet, this newly renovated flat is a great pick!
The space newly renovated modern flat. Large-screen smart TV, comfortable lounging, dining, fully-equipped kitchen, great lighting, hardwood floors, ceiling fans, lofty ceilings, award-winning coffee are among the comforts of this flat.

description:
Visit one of the original homes in the Bent Creek area near Asheville N.C. This light and airy home has been in our family for 5 generations. Let us share the charm that you can only find in a good old mountain home. It is a 4 bed room 1 and 1/2 bath home set in a quiet cove.

The space
This home is comfortably furnished with a kitchen to meet your cooking needs. You can relax by the fire pit or rest on the front porch. We are located minutes from many fun, family activities. Lake Powhatan, Bent Creek Community park, mountain biking / hiking trails in Bent Creek, the N.C. Arboretum, tubing on the French Broad river and the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway. It is 17 min from downtown Asheville area where you will find breweries, restaurants and McCormick Field home of the Asheville Tourist.

Guest access
Once you enter through the back door, your keys are on the kitchen counter in a tray. You can then enter through the side deck or front door, wh

description:
Escape the hustle & bustle of downtown Asheville with a stay at this convenient 2-bed, 1-bath vacation rental home in Arden! Still, you'll only be 12 miles from the 'Land of the Sky's' breweries, restaurants, and art scene. Even closer is The Biltmore Estate, while the Nantahala National Forest's beauty lies just down the Blue Ridge Parkway, just 2 miles away. After a day of adventure, return to the comforts of home like a fully equipped kitchen along with a peaceful outdoor entertainment area!

The space
Free WiFi | Off-Street Parking | Wood-Burning Stove

Discover the year-round beauty of the Nantahala National Forest from this cozy cottage, ideal for a nuclear family or a couple!

Master Bedroom: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Full Bed

KITCHEN: Fully equipped, dishwasher, toaster, drip coffeemaker, blender

description:
Tree Top Hideaway is a seasonal screened in small space with twin sized bed, comfy Leesa mattress, small flat screen TV, towels, and a robe to wear to the hot tub and outdoor hot shower. Three walls are glassed or screened for unobstructed view. Less than 70 sq. ft. lo, and located off the dining room close to your half bath. Given the nature of what is offered and the size of the space and bed it's only recommended for single, solo guests. Men will feel most comfortable choosing Tree Top.

The space
Remember the feeling you had when a child and you created your private fort and felt safe and protected? Experience that again as an adult and still have some of the finer amenities that each of my suites offers. Every wall, save the house exterior wall is glassed or screened for unobstructed view. Hear the night sounds, the night rain on a corrugated roof, the early morning bird song cacophony, and have the sun stream into your bed at sunrise. It's a rush. Add the f

name: “ The Jewel of the Springs” An Oasis of Comfort
description:
Brand new. A two minute car ride, or a 15 minute walk to West Asheville’s bustling Haywood Road, “The Jewel of the Springs” is the perfect location for you and yours to enjoy the best of what Asheville has to offer. Step into a modern, relaxing , 1000 sq.ft. abode of style and comfort. Enjoy the spacious inner realm-designed with your pleasures in mind. Your private deck provides the perfect setting for morning coffee and evening drinks. Let your vision take in the large backyard-yours to enjoy!

The space
“The Jewel of the Springs” is a brand new, luxurious apartment that provides a retreat-like setting you will want to linger in and enjoy.

description:
Enjoy this large 3-bedroom home located in a peaceful country setting and only 3 miles (10 mins) from downtown. It is close to everything you want to do in the Asheville area, including dining, breweries, gorgeous hiking, and the Biltmore Estate only 15 minutes away. After a day of sightseeing, hiking, and adventure, this is a great place to cook dinner in the equipped large kitchen or just relax, order-in, and watch a movie. Wifi 440/20 for working from home.

The space
Our spacious house is a perfect place to call home. Gather your group in the large living room with comfortable leather couches to play games or watch a movie or just hang out.

We are foodies and love to cook, so our large kitchen is fully-equipped for cooking, with coffee, tea and spices provided, and a dining area that comfortably seats 6 and overlooks the gardens. The shower and tub are beautifully tiled, and the entire home has gorgeous hardwood floors.

You will sleep

name: Explore Asheville! Minutes to Downtown & RAD!
description:
It's Spring in Asheville!

The perfect place to explore all Asheville and WNC have to offer. Whether an outdoor adventurist to the business traveler this home fits all of your amenity and location needs. Our home offers endless warmth by way of its modern furnishings and charming decor. Spacious and stocked kitchen, dining area, airy and inviting living room, and cozy patio with grill. This is a brand new development located off the highway to anywhere, new homes currently being built!

The space
Wake up feeling rejuvenated in this quiet home featuring a private patio and help yourself to granola and yogurt, as well as a coffee while your group plans their day. Experience a mix of tranquility and trend in a mountain home with an open design perfect for all travelers from adventure seekers to corporate guests. The home is kid friendly with on-site parking available for 2 vehicles.

The home offers a dining room, living room, and fully-

name: Peaceful Garden Oasis - 3 miles to downtown!
description:
The Garden Oasis is a spacious one-bedroom country living studio located only 3 miles from downtown. It is close to everything in the Asheville area and the Biltmore estate is only 15 minutes away. Your patio opens to our flower garden and we grow 20 kinds of fruit and nuts onsite. After a day of sightseeing and adventure, this is a great place to call home, cook a meal in the fully equipped kitchen, watch a movie, enjoy some fresh fruit from the garden, or just relax and enjoy!

The space
Flowers, butterflies, and hummingbirds will welcome you to your spacious 950' one-bedroom apartment. Located in the country but conveniently only 3 miles from downtown, it is a short ride to everything you want to do in the Asheville area, wonderful dining, gorgeous hiking, and antiquing, with the Biltmore estate just 15 minutes away.

Your breakfast patio opens to our flower garden, a great place to enjoy your morning coffee. Depending upon the season, you can enjoy

name: Sol Retreat * Modern Oasis in the Heart of W.Avl *
description:
Private & peaceful downstairs suite powered by the sun. Clean, modern & spacious.
5 min walk to vibrant Haywood Rd, lined with lively restaurants, bars, shopping, & music.
Our home is tucked off a quiet street, surrounded by an oasis of greenery, flowers, & the sounds of birds.
Set up for comfort & relaxing. Enjoy a cup of locally roasted coffee in the cozy lounge or out on the patio hammocks.
Short drive over the river to downtown Avl, the Biltmore, RAD, and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
Our home has organic gardens, fruit trees and perennials. Something is in bloom most of the year.
Private entrance is through the natural stone path through the rhodos and ferns down past your own patio.

This is a Family/Kid(s) Friendly AirBnB!

Amenities include fast free wifi, comfortable bedroom with your own thermostat for the entire suite, blackout shades, queen bed with soft linens and towels, endless hot water, natural b

name: Cozy Downstairs 2 Bedroom Suite in West Asheville
description:
This cozy downstairs unit is in West Asheville, just a few minutes away from restaurants and shops on Haywood Road and 10-15 minutes from downtown Asheville. Drive the Blue Ridge Parkway, go on a hike or explore the many restaurants and breweries that Asheville has to offer!

The space
The space includes:
- tvs with Netflix access in the living area and one bedroom
- a mini-refrigerator, microwave and Keurig coffee maker
- complimentary coffee, cups, paper plates and utensils

Other things to note
There are stairs leading to the unit. My partner Matt and I live on the main level with our dog -- so the driveway is a shared space, but you will have your own private entrance.

Only one parking space is provided, and street parking is not allowed. We may be able to accommodate a second vehicle for an extra fee, please just send me a message to confirm.

name: Groovy Turtle Shell-ter

The Groovy Turtle Shell-ter is located in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground. Part truck cab, part perma-tent, this sleeping pod will keep you dry and one-with-nature at the same time - no tent necessary! The floor is padded, but be sure to bring sleeping bags, pillows and possibly a sleeping pad if you like a little extra softness. The Baying Hound Campground is about 10 minutes from downtown, yet still on the edges of rural, agricultural Asheville.

The space
THE CAMPGROUND
The Baying Hound Campground is where rural Appalachia meets “keep Asheville weird.” You’ll see sleeping pods decorated by professional artists, structures made from upcycled building materials and permaculture experiments in the making. We’ve been described as “if a European hostel and an Appalachian campground had a baby.” Not quite glamping and definitely not KOA, we're happy to offer you a more social alternative to cookie-cutter lodging without breaking the

name: *New build*Bright, Modern Studio 10 mins to dwntwn
description:
Welcome to our home! We built a private studio apartment for you to enjoy! Please note- there are NO shared air vents in this space! Just 10 minutes from downtown and popular River Arts District. This stunning property is surrounded by trees, wildlife, and sounds from the FB River. We live in the house upstairs and my in-laws live in the other apartment down below. Although your stay will be private, we're very friendly folks. We are here to help if need be, but respect your space and solitude.

The space
This 400 sq ft studio has everything you will need to be able to relax after a long day exploring in Asheville. This studio Airbnb is ideal for those that are coming in town and plan on using the space mainly to freshen up after a long hike, before dinner, and catch a good nights rest after a nice night out. description:
A quaint setting 10-15 minutes to the heart of Asheville & 10 minutes to Weaverville. This listing is for the bottom floor of the house. The first floor is not accessible and the owner lives upstairs. This space has a private entrance with your own private deck on the lower level of a two story deck. It has beautiful Mountain Views. A hidden gem to be enjoyed by all.

The space
Two bedroom/one bathroom
bottom floor space with a partial kitchen (kitchen utensils, hot plate, toaster oven, kettle, & sink) available for 1-6 rentals.

Guest access
Lower deck, parking, and full downstairs access with private entrance.

Other things to note
Asheville has a fantastic dining & art scene and great hiking nearby.

description:
Charming and newly renovated 1 bedroom/1 bathroom condo on the 3rd level of the historic King James Building. With incredible balcony views of downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Mountains, you can also walk down to the first floor to grab a coffee, pastry, or sandwich or enjoy dinner in the restaurant on the first floor.
Located in North Asheville, guests can enjoy neighborhood restaurants, yoga studios, and several shops while also enjoying the convenience of being less than 1 mile from downtown.

This traditional bedroom also offers plenty of modern amenities. The original 1889 fireplace comes equipped with gas logs that flare at the flip of a switch, so you and a companion can bask in the warm, inviting glow. An HDLCD flat screen TV with DVD is discreetly tucked away.

The space
Original Master bedroom

name: ✨ Mountain Views Minutes from Brews ✨
description:
Walk to dozens of nearby eclectic shops, eateries, cafes and pubs then relax & recharge in the comfy Casper bed.

We welcome travelers of every race and religion/non-religion. Upon arrival, you will receive a key to the house and a key to your private room. We recently installed a keyless entry pad on the front door for guest convenience.

Our hosting style is casual; We are available if needed but otherwise give guests plenty of space and privacy.

The space
During WWII, this 1915 home was redesigned for dual family living. The room you’re booking offers natural sunlight and mountain views and includes a Queen sized Casper comfort bed, low couch, desk, tv/tv stand, and shelves and closet space to unpack your bags. A newly remodeled full bath is easily accessible.

Your room is located to the left at the top of the staircase. To the right, is another guest room/Airbnb listing called “Quaint & Quirky Paris of the South”.

name: 2 bedroom 1 bath, 7 min to Downtown AVL
description:
While away your time rocking on the front porch or spend a relaxing evening in the 460 gallon 6 man hot tub next to the fire pit. You can eat at our spacious dining table for six with bench seating or enjoy our outdoor table and grill. Wind down by relaxing in our deep bathtub with big fluffy towels. At the end of day slide under our soft comfy sheets and quilts and dream the night away.

The space
While away your time rocking on the front porch or spend a relaxing evening in the 460 gallon 6 man hot tub next to the fire pit. You can eat at our spacious dining table for six with bench seating or enjoy our outdoor table and grill. Wind down by relaxing in our deep bathtub with homemade soaps and big fluffy towels. At the end of day slide under our soft comfy sheets and quilts and dream the night away.

Other things to note
We are a pet free house. NO exceptions. If you are caught with your pet you will be asked to leave no questions. If you

name: Private In-Law Suite Right off Blue Ridge Parkway
description:
Stay in this cute, Arts 'n Crafts inspired private in-law suite...only a 15-minute walk to the Blue Ridge Parkway and a 7-8 minute drive from downtown and the beautiful Biltmore Estate. The suite has a kitchen, a seating area, a bedroom with a queen bed and in-suite bathroom and a separate second half bathroom. There is also a private back porch for drinking morning coffee or star gazing at night and covered carport for parking.

The space
Tucked in on one side of the Blue Ridge Parkway (a 15-minute walk to the Mountains-to-Sea trail that runs parallel to the BRP), we have a beautiful 1 bedroom private (separate but attached to the main house) apartment available with 1 full bath and a half bath for adults only.

***New soundproofing added to walls and ceiling, January 2021***

Why choose our space?
• You can walk to the Blue Ridge Parkway and hike the Mountains-to-Sea trail.
• The apartment is exactly 6.5 miles (7-8 minutes) from

name: Arts & Craft Home Right off Blue Ridge Parkway
description:
This Arts 'n Crafts inspired retreat was created to feel peaceful, warm, cozy, and quiet. Everyone who visits comments on the perfect feel of this space. It is literally 7-8 minutes from everything, including the Blue Ridge Parkway, downtown, The Biltmore Estate, breweries, shopping and Whole Foods Market. Enjoy the front porch for morning coffee or an afternoon beverage!

The space
This Arts 'n Crafts inspired retreat was created to feel peaceful, warm, cozy, and quiet.

The master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom and a queen bed, the frame of which is made from reclaimed materials. There is also a loft space with a futon, sitting area and TV, a large great room with a wood-burning fireplace and vaulted ceilings and a modern kitchen with all the amenities needed to cook the perfect meal.

Why choose our space?
• The "feel" of the space is one of peaceful quiet and thoughtful designs. You will feel it as soon as you walk in.
• Eve

name: Purple House Downtown: Suite With Private Entrance
description:
Enjoy all that downtown Asheville has to offer, on foot. 10 minute walk to the Orange Peel music venue and countless amazing restaurants, bars, and breweries. It’s a quick stroll to more breweries than you can count on 2 hands. The space has a private entrance and deck and is separated off from the rest of the home. Includes comfortable queen memory foam bed, TV, WiFi, shower, fridge, and Keurig coffee maker. Centrally located, a short drive to the Biltmore house, Parkway, & West Asheville.

The space
The television is hooked up to basic channels with an antenna but includes an HDMI cord that you could plug your laptop into to so you can enjoy whatever streaming service you subscribe to. Recently we added a Fire Stick so if you have an Amazon account you can watch TV through that.

In the suite, there is a mini-fridge and a Keurig coffee maker with cream and sugar provided. It is a quick walk to many amazing restaurants and the French Broad Food Co-Op.<

name: Villa Rose- On 2 acres, 1 mi to Biltmore, 4 mi DT
description:
Modern, luxurious, relaxing large private one-bedroom in-law suite (1,050 sqft) with fireplace on a few beautiful acres under large trees while only being an 8-min. drive (4 miles) to the heart of Downtown Asheville, NC; 3 min. to the Biltmore Estate; 5 min. to the Blue Ridge Parkway and South Slope Breweries and Restaurants. You can bike or drive (3 min.) to breweries, coffee houses, and restaurants. Private entrance and outdoor garden nook. A unique gem, close to it all!

The space
-STAY ON A COUPLE OF PRIVATE ACRES SURROUNDED BY TREES, BIRDS, FLOWERING BUSHES, AND FRUIT TREES
- PRIVATE ENTRANCE AND 1 BEDROOM SUITE DOWNSTAIRS
- GAS FIREPLACE in living room
- LARGE LUXURIOUS MARBLE BATHROOM
-8 min. to the HEART of DOWNTOWN; 3 min. to BILTMORE VILLAGE AND BREWERIES. 5 min. to SOUTH SLOPE BREWERIES and RESTAURANTS; 5 min. to the BLUE RIDGE PARKWAY
- AMPLE PRIVATE PARKING right in front of your Airbnb
-SOUNDPROOFING INSULATION

name: Carl Sandburg Suite - 1889 WhiteGate Inn & Cottage
description: This country manor influenced set of rooms is done in a cheery yellow and includes a sleeping porch that overlooks downtown Asheville.  Get cozy in the king-size sleigh bed, surrounded by period furniture and honeyed hardwood floors.

name: Guest Cottage - 1889 WhiteGate Inn & Cottage
description:
Built as part of the original Asheville NC, estate, the Guest Cottage exudes a country charm that is as romantic and time worn as the antiques within it. Breakfast is included in the main Inn each morning or there is a full kitchen that allows guests to be on their own schedule and prepare breakfast at their leisure. Grocery stores are conveniently located near our Guest Cottage. Cuddle with one another on the sitting room couch beside the fireplace, or go for a leisurely soak in the two-person Jacuzzi hot tub that soothes beneath a fabulous piece of modern art.

In the bedroom, a king-size bed beckons beside a second fireplace.

The space
Private Porch

Pet Friendly $50 fee

Other things to note
NO Guests under 18 Y.O.

name: Walt Whitman Garden Spa Suite - 1889 WhiteGate Inn & Cottage
description:
Pamper yourself and your partner in this beautifully appointed suite in our Asheville, NC B&B where luxury, fine linens lush garden views and a lounging hot tub come together for the most romantic of getaways. The Walt Whitman Garden Spa Suite is the very essence of elegance, with its handsome king size mahogany bed, soothing blue French toile and imported Italian tile. All of it is accented by the original 1889 stonewalls at our luxury Asheville bed and breakfast.

Toast one another with champagne before slipping into the luxury spa for a soak in the two-person Jacuzzi.

The space
Shower with two heads and steam room.
fireplace in bedroom and bath

name: Maya Angelou Suite - 1889 WhiteGate Inn & Cottage
description:
this suite offers you a fresh and calming private retreat. With its wheat and dark green highlights and contemporary black furniture, this modern suite invites reading, relaxing and other soothing pursuits. Cuddle on the ebony, king-size canopy bed as you watch flames flicker in the stacked stone fireplace. Or sip some iced tea from a comfy sitting room loveseat. Then gaze at the 1889 WhiteGate Inn’s award-winning garden from your private perch on the suite’s rocking chair porch.

At the end of the day, soak in the two-person Jacuzzi and refresh yourself with a separate shower and body sprays. This suite comes equipped with a refrigerator, coffee maker and microwave along with other must-have modern amenities such as 40” HDLCD flat screen TV with DVD and wireless Internet.

name: Ralph Waldo Emerson Suite - 1889 WhiteGate Inn & Cottage
description:
The centerpiece of this elegant suite is its king size canopy bed, a replica of George Vanderbilt’s bed from the Biltmore Collection. Savor its luxurious look and feel, then kick off your shoes and crawl beneath the covers. An 18-foot vaulted ceiling soars above a stacked stone fireplace, adding elegance to this statuesque suite. Flip the switch on the gas logs and cuddle in the cozy glow with your companion. Then step outside on the suite’s rocking chair porch and take in the front row view of downtown Asheville twinkling against the backdrop of the western mountains.

This suite, with its old English feel and old world elegance, maintains all manner of modern amenities from wireless Internet to a 40” HDLCD flat screen TV with DVD player and CD player. Soak your cares away in the suite’s two-person Jacuzzi, before finishing with a separate shower with body sprays. Refreshed and reinvigorated,

name: Elizabeth Barrett Browning Suite - 1889 WhiteGate Inn & Cottage
description:
Elizabeth Barrett Browning Suite, located in the Carriage House offers you a soothing, natural retreat and is a good option when looking for a romantic Asheville hotel. Set high up in the trees, the woodsy feel is reflected in the suite’s décor, from dark taupe accents to its oak and metal furniture and pounded metal lamps. Cuddle with a companion on the king size bed, admiring its soaring canopy of wood and iron. Then turn on the gas log fireplace and bask in the glow, as you sip a glass of wine or two.

Admire the leafy greenery just beyond your window, as you relax in the bathroom’s two-person Jacuzzi and separate shower with body sprays. Then step outside on your private rocking chair porch and delight in your sweeping view of downtown Asheville and the western mountains. A private entrance lets you come and go as you please.

name: Oscar Wilde Suite - 1889 WhiteGate Inn & Cottage
description:
Built in 1905, this bungalow suite offers beautiful Asheville, NC lodging with its classic style, hardwood floors and a spacious great room. The kitchen has all of the conveniences of an upscale apartment. The living room is comfortable and cozy with a 32” flat screen TV/DVD combination. There is a stereo system with CD player and a docking station for an IPOD. The bath with the 2-person Jacuzzi tub is perfect for relaxing with a glass of wine in the evening after a day of shopping, antiquing, or sightseeing.

The space
Pet Friendly $50 fee

name: Trippy Tortoise Shell-ter
description:
The Trippy Tortoise Shell-ter is located in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground. Part truck cab, part perma-tent, this shell-ter will keep you dry and one-with-nature at the same time - no tent necessary! The floor is padded, but be sure to bring sleeping bags, pillows and possibly a sleeping pad if you like a little extra softness. The Baying Hound Campground is about 10 minutes from downtown, yet still on the edges of rural, agricultural Asheville.

The space
THE CAMPGROUND
The Baying Hound Campground is where rural Appalachia meets “keep Asheville weird.” You’ll see sleeping pods decorated by professional artists, structures made from upcycled building materials and permaculture experiments in the making. We’ve been described as “if a European hostel and an Appalachian campground had a baby.” Not quite glamping and definitely not KOA, we're happy to offer you a more social alternative to cookie-cutter lodging without breaking the b

name: Luxury Condominium in the Center of Downtown Asheville
description:
New luxury condominium in the heart of downtown Asheville. This corner unit 2 bedroom and 2 bath condo has all the premium amenities you can imagine. New appliances, bedding, furniture, and heated floors create a stunning accommodation for you and your loved ones to relax and enjoy yourself. Located on the 5th floor, this residence features a full kitchen, dining room, and living room; and enjoy mountain views while lounging on your balcony. You'll fall in love with this new condominium and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Asheville

Located in a fully staffed building, you can have all the conveniences of a hotel while still enjoying the privacy of your own vacation rental home.

The space
New luxury condominium in the heart of downtown Asheville. This corner unit 2 bedroom and 2 bath condo has all the premium amenities you can imagine. New appliances, bedding, furniture, and heated floors create a stunning accommodation for you a

name: Wooded Oasis minutes from i26 and French Broad!
description:
Our guest suite is a perfect experience for travelers to Asheville! We are just over a mile away from i26 yet our property makes you feel you’re in a wooded oasis. The French Broad river is also minutes away and a great tubing experience!

The space
We have a private entrance guest suite located beneath our home. There is a sitting area, kitchenette including a fridge and microwave a unique game room and a bedroom plus one full bath.

name: Grey River Gatherings (perfect for large groups)
description:
Very large home - perfect for your large group!

This home is in a quiet culdesac in North Asheville. The home is 8 minutes from downtown off of Riverside Drive.

The home features 5 bedrooms with 5 queen beds, 1 loft with 2 twin beds, 2 lofts & each with a full size futon and a queen size pull out couch.

It’s a spacious home with 9ft ceilings.

There is parking available for at least 3 vehicles.

This home is located at 23 Grey River Run, Asheville 28804.

name: Entire house, 6 minutes from down town!
description:
This newly built home is snuggled in between nature and downtown. Enjoy rafting on the French Broad River or hiking and biking the Blue Ridge Parkway. Plenty of breweries are close to this great location. The property is perfect for family vacations, reunions, and bachelorette gatherings.
Plenty of room as well as privacy with 2 living areas.
Enjoy sitting on the porch while barbecuing amidst the peace of the mountains.

The space
The home is new and modern and comfortable
1700 sq ft
Living areas upstairs and downstairs
Fully equipped kitchen, coffee , barbecue on the porch

Other things to note
Great house 4 minutes to downtown
Parking for 4 cars

name: The Namaste Room at River Row Flats - Unit 104 (Pet Friendly with Fee)
description:
Take a breath and relax in the Namaste Room, surrounded by a soothing azure interior with crisp white linens and fluffy textiles.

The space
Our 14 chic, spacious environmentally friendly rooms are meticulously appointed with all the luxuries of home, making your stay at River Row Flats comfortable, relaxed and personal. From lush textiles to deluxe bath products to vibrant local art adorning the walls, no detail has been overlooked!

This room offers:
One king-size bed
One queen-size pull-out sofa
Floor-to-ceiling windows and soothing interior paint colors
A full kitchen with full-sized oven and range, refrigerator and dishwasher

description:

The space

name: “Top Knot” Modern Vintage Retreat w/ Mtn Views
description:
Not your grandpa’s cabin!! Scandinavian inspired, vintage, and cozy log cabin. Views of Busbee Mountain...situated on an acre with end of road privacy…plenty of outdoor space w/ walking path. Sunny retreat is less than 10 min from downtown scenic Asheville, Biltmore, and South Slope fun! Less than 2 min from the Blue Ridge Parkway & convenient highway access from I-40. Easy driveway, (4) person max, min rental age is (25). Cabin is meticulously cleaned and disinfected for your safety!

The space
Fresh mountain air, crisp nights and warm days, natural outdoor adventures abound, Asheville city cuisine and dining experiences, convenient local breweries, plentiful shopping amenities, situated on charming road dappled with vintage log homes. If you are looking for an authentic mountain cabin stay, coupled with the city of Asheville energy, this cabin will fit both for a unique experience and location.

Other things to note
My intention is to provi

name: Long term stay house, king bed & private bathroom
description:
Within 10-15 minutes to Downtown Asheville, Asheville Art Museum, Buncombe County Civil War Memorial, Thomas Wolfe Memorial, Asheville Drum Circle, Orange Peel Social Aid and Pleasure Club, US Cellular Center, Basilica of St. Lawrence, Montford Historic District, Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Estate, Historic Biltmore Village, the Arboretum, the Outlets, The Omni Grove Park Inn, Carrier Park, Highland Brewery, River Arts District, Grove Arcade, Mission Hospital, Downtown Hendersonville.

The space
Kitchen, Patio, Living Room

name: Charming, Newly Renovated 1 bdr/1 bath in Historic King James Building Unit #9
description:
Charming and newly renovated 1 bedroom/1 bathroom condo on the 3rd level of the historic King James Building. With incredible views of downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Mountains, you can also walk down to the first floor to grab a coffee, pastry, or sandwich at the City Bakery or enjoy dinner in the restaurant on the first floor.
Located in North Asheville, guests can enjoy neighborhood restaurants, yoga studios, and several shops while also enjoying the convenience of being less than 1 mile from downtown.

name: Charming, Newly Renovated 2 bdr/2 bath in Historic King James Building Unit #5
description:
Charming and newly renovated 2 bedroom/2 bathroom condo on the 2nd level of the historic King James Building. With incredible views of downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Mountains, you can also walk down to the first floor to grab a coffee, pastry, or sandwich at the City Bakery or enjoy dinner in the restaurant on the first floor.
Located in North Asheville, guests can enjoy neighborhood restaurants, yoga studios, and several shops while also enjoying the convenience of being less than 1 mile from downtown.

Located in North Asheville, guests can enjoy neighborhood restaurants, yoga studios, and several shop

name: Zen Studio and Bamboo Garden
description:
This immaculate detached garage studio is newly renovated, with a beautiful view of Downtown Asheville from the back windows. Reclaim your zen state of mind, surrounded by a beautiful bamboo garden. Studio has a private full bathroom & kitchenette. Small dining area, smart TV (no cable) and super comfy new queen bed. Light sleepers beware, since the studio is close to the highway, the traffic noise may interrupt your sleep!

The space
I love my studio and do my best to keep it nice & clean. I am happy to provide essentials for your stay - towels, soap, shampoo, hair dryer, etc. Keurig coffee machine with plenty of coffee. Please help save the planet & turn off window A/C unit when you will be gone for the day, it only takes a few minutes to cool down upon your return. Thank you!

Uber and Lyft are available in the area and average $8-$12 to downtown Asheville (3miles away) and nearby breweries. Keycode access is provided, rental has complete privacy! <

name: Mountain/golf course view near downtown.
description:
Beautiful mountain/golf course view, in a very safe and quiet neighborhood. Only 5.4 miles from downtown, and 3.5 miles from the Biltmore. Easy access to grocery shopping and the mall. Across from the WNC Nature Center and around the corner from Highland Brewing Company. Just off the Blue Ridge Parkway and the Folk Art Center. Charming and comfortable house with large deck overlooking the golf course. Close to everything Asheville has to offer. Well-behaved Pets are welcome.

The space
Large private rooms. Access to a full kitchen and washer/dryer. Comfortable living room with large TV and wifi.

Guest access
Bedroom, Bathrooms, Kitchen, Living Room, Laundry Room, Front and Back Decks.

Other things to note
There is plenty of parking, plus a garage space available. The driveway is steep, however it is paved and very safe. It can be observed from the picture, and if needed cars can be parked at the bottom of the driveway

name: Asheville Creekside Bungalow, 12 min Downtown, Hot Tub, Creek, Dogs OK
description:
Welcome to Asheville Creekside Bungalow! Enjoy hiking & biking outdoors with minimal exposure to crowds! Relax to the sounds of the creek, Hot Tub, Fire pit, 12 min to Downtown Asheville, 5 min to French Broad River Parks, 2-bedroom bungalow w/Queen beds & TVs. Queen sleeper sofa. Comfortably sleeps 6 people. Creek-side patio, Creek access w/bench, Front & Screened porch, BBQ deck. Full kitchen, dining room, comfortable living room w/TV. Washer/dryer.

The space
We are taking extra care to disinfect your space due to COVID-19. Unique creek-side property; Deluxe Hot Tub, large covered patio for rainy-day recreational activities. You feel deep in nature, but you're only minutes from the best Asheville has to offer. Enjoy the evenings in the screened in porch or stroll across the foot bridge in front of the house. The property sits on almost half an acre so there's plenty of space to enjoy outdoors including a back deck with a table, chairs, umbrella and gas BBQ gril

name: Mountain Escape~Hike and Hot Tub Resort~Loft Suite
description:
Your Mountain Escape House is located in North Asheville's Beaverdam area. Located just 10 minutes outside of Asheville you have 2 ski resorts just 45 minutes away. Wolf Laurel and Cataloochie are WNC favorite ski stops. Hot tub and Fire pit await you after a fun day of play. Have a pet? No worries, we have a fenced in backyard! ($20.00 pet fee/per day).

The space
The bedroom is big enough for a family of 4 if the kids do not mind a queen air mattress.
The screened-in back porch has a grill. A fire ring in the back yard. Washer, Dryer, Dishwasher, Microwave, Fridge is all yours if you wish to use it. Pets are welcome with a $20.00 per day convenience fee, per pet.

Guest access
Bedroom~Kitchen~Living Room~Dining Room~Front Porch~Back Porch~Back Yard~Hot tub

name: The Glenway House "Jacuzzi Suite"
description:
The Glenway House is located in North Asheville's Beaverdam area. The area boasts a beautiful Lake and back trails to the Blue Ridge Parkway. 2 miles to Golf Course, Shopping, Starbucks, Gas, and small restaurants are about a half a mile from the course. The heart of Downtown just 3 miles from there. Grove Park Inn is a 5-minute ride. The Biltmore house is 10 minutes away.

The space
Your room is huge, 25ft by 20ft. It boasts a desktop workstation, fridge microwave and large Jacuzzi tub in the bathroom. Enjoy nature around our back yard fire pit or soak in the newly installed 6 person Hot Tub! The screened-in back porch has a grill, bar, and couches with heated space units. Feel free to prepare meals in your full kitchen. The dining room is gorgeous and the living room fireplace is loaded with wood. The Blue Ridge Parkway and walking trails are just a 7-minute ride from the house.

Guest access
Available for your use is the entire house..not

name: The Firefly
description:
Quiet and relaxing three bedroom two bath bungalow comfortably accommodates 6 people. Just 3 minutes to West Asheville and 10 minutes to downtown Asheville, come see what this little mountain city has to offer!

Come relax on the large and very private back porch and watch the fireflies light up the trees and mature gardens below.

Other things to note
There is one TV, it is in the living room. There is NO Directv/cable. There is an Apple TV available for guests to access their own netflix or other streaming applications.

name: Quiet Mountain Cottage Near Biltmore and Downtown
description:
Our Blue Ridge Mountain home is located near all the action at the edge of Pisgah and only 10 minutes to West Asheville and downtown. Enjoy solitude on the expansive deck and screened porch or have a locally crafted beer as you unwind around the fire pit or enjoy the small garden and nearly 1-acre terraced yard. We are located 5 minutes from Bent Creek Park and it’s vast mountain biking / hiking trail system-also 5 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and outlet shopping.

The space
Our favorite part of the cottage is the outdoor amenities. We have a swing, a picnic table, a garden, a small trail and a great screened in porch and open deck. Asheville nights trend cooler so relaxing on the porch is where we spend a good amount of time. Chill around the fire pit and tiny frog pond located on the upper portion of the yard. For your convenience, we provide lighters, fire sticks and some limited wood.

As a measure of safety for our guests and our pro

name: The Blue Ridge Room at River Row Flats - Room 200
description:
After a day of driving along the Parkway, come "home" to the chic yet cozy Blue Ridge Room.

The space

Parking available. Private bath.

description:

With incredible views of downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Mountains, you can also walk down to the first floor to grab a coffee, pastry, or sandwich at the City Bakery or enjoy dinner in the restaurant on the first floor.
Located in North Asheville, guests can enjoy neighborhood restaurants, yoga studios, and several shops while also enjoying the convenience of being less than 1 mile from downtown.

name: Cozy mountain getaway 15 min to downtown Asheville
description:
Welcome to our peaceful & serene home away from home in the mountains! Located about 15-20 minutes to downtown Asheville & The Biltmore Estate in a quiet, country setting. There's plenty of space in this apartment with an open floor plan and updated fixtures & furniture. Enjoy the mountain air while sitting on the front porch rocking chairs sipping some coffee or sweet tea. TV's with Netflix, K-cup coffee, variety of creamers, snacks.

The space
Newly remodeled apartment above garage. The bedroom has a queen size bed, dresser, flat screen TV with Netflix, full closet. The Living Room has two couches, one is a sleeper Sofa that pulls out to a Full bed.

Provided for you: continuous wifi throughout the space, flat screen tv's with Netflix, fresh towels & linens, hair dryer, first aid kit, coffee & creamers, toiletries including body wash, shampoo, & conditioner, mini splits for heating/cooling.

We have a large porch with two rocking chairs that

name: Avondale Ridge - 6 BR 3 full BA near DT AVL, views
description: Avondale Ridge - bordering Blue Ridge Parkway, with easy access off I-40, close to downtown Asheville.  Lovely views, especially from top level.  6 bedrooms 3 baths on three levels, each level has 2 bedrooms and a full bath for easy separation & privacy with larger groups.  Shojii Spa just down the around the corner!!

name: Trendy Cottage  w/ Firepit- Close to Everything!
description:
Stylish chic cottage with trendy and relaxing space. Enjoy your favorite local brew or visiting with friends around the outdoor firepit or on the hammock chairs on the covered porch. Perfectly located close to downtown, Biltmore, RAD, & UNCA. 1.5 miles to breweries, coffee, restaurants, & local hang-outs while offering a private retreat. Easy access to trails and only 1 mile to French Broad River. Short 5-7 min Uber ride into town.

The space
The home is a 1940's bungalow that is located in a modest area that is being revitalized. The original hardwoods have been painted and have a trendy weathered look. The place has a modern chic vibe that fits perfectly with the trendy river arts area we are so close to. The kitchen is well appointed with plenty of dishes, local beer glasses, a blender for smoothies, coffee pot, etc.. But sorry, no dishwasher. The living room has a gas-fireplace, queen size pull out sofa, and a 42-in TV with Netflix along with a charging st

name: Heavenly Tree House! 5 min to S. Asheville
description:
Rustic cabin with modern amenities in wooded mountains just outside Asheville. Surrounded by nature, the sleeping porch is reminiscent of a tree house.

Conveniently located near the Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Estate, downtown Asheville, and the Asheville Regional Airport -- all within 11 miles.

Authentic wood-fire stove.
Hot tub built into deck.
Hi-Speed Wifi, Cable TV, and Internet Roku TV's.
Golden Tee arcade game, Foosball coffee table.
Kuerig with complimentary coffee and snacks.

The space
The back sleeping porch is like being in a tree house - hidden away in the woods, while staying right next to town.

name: Cozy Asheville Mountain Home - Entire Main Floor
description:
Located less than 5 minutes from downtown Asheville and just 1 minute from I-26 Exit 24, we offer an unbeatable location, sparkling clean accommodations, 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms (with tubs), an expansive wraparound deck with vista views, outdoor grill, well-equipped kitchen, and so much more. This home has 2 separate levels. Guests access the main floor and all outdoor amenities.

The space
The property contains 2 separate units: Guests have access to the primary level including 4 dedicated parking spaces, 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms (with tubs), an expansive wraparound deck with incredible views overlooking the Blue Ridge Mountains, outdoor gas grill, full galley kitchen stocked with plenty of cooking equipment (includes coffee maker), on-site laundry, and a fully fenced back yard.

Guest access
Guests have full access to the first floor, including an expansive wraparound deck, outdoor gas grill, and fully fenced backyard. There is

name: Cozy Sanctuary, Retreat-Style Om Home
description:
Zen space in renovated 1927 home, 6 minutes away from historical downtown Asheville. I share my space with those looking for a peaceful and nurturing home experience. You're welcome to use the kitchen and to store food in the fridge. This is a vegan home, so please, no meat or dairy here.

The space
I have a gentle, nurturing, playful spirit that is pretty easy for most to be around. I welcome the LGBTQ and naturist communities that I am a part of.

name: New South Slope Townhome with Private Elevator, Mountain and City Views
description:
This new 2 BR/2 BA/2 half BA corner unit townhome is located in Downtown Asheville's popular South Slope District. It truly is one of a kind with a private elevator and private roof-top terrace where you can enjoy beautiful city views to the North and stunning Blue Ridge Mountain views to the West. Four floors of living space offer the perfect combination of privacy and comfort for your group. Less than a mile from the heart of downtown Asheville, craft breweries and award winning restaurants are moments from your door step; not to mention the famed Biltmore Estate is a mere 5 minute drive. Luxury, comfort, and convenience await you!
Security cameras, for your safety, are located at the front and back exteriors of the property. This is a residential complex; please be mindful of your neighbors and refer to the quiet hours and HOA rules listed below:
The maximum number of guests occupying this townhome can not exceed 6 people. If occupancy exceeds 6, Towns Property Management

name: 33 Carolina Lane Loft : High-Design Loft on Historic Downtown Alley
description:
Over 1,300 square-feet and two loft bedrooms, 33 Carolina Lane – a block once dedicated to agricultural industry, today a multi-cultural gathering spot – offers modern amenities and industrial design, with just the right touch of history: Curated artwork and pops of color, designer furnishings and massive flat-screen TVs, exposed ducts and lofted ceilings – all, in perfect balance with wizened walls and striking wood floors, layered with the patina of the past.

The space
Well, you’ve found it.

Welcome to the Holy Grail of Asheville travel: A 2BR loft in the heart of downtown’s shopping district, yet cloaked within the confines of a one-way alley. Quiet (for the city). Historic. Central. The very essence of Asheville’s local core.

This is everyday life, as it’s always been lived. This is Asheville life, as you want to live it.

Because, in a city of micro-neighborhoods, 33 Carolina Lane is exactly where and what you want it

name: #5 Garden Room, king bedroom at Oakland Cottage!
description:
Extra spacious room at Oakland Cottage Bed and Breakfast ! The Garden Room with king bed and extra daybed for an extra guest. Enjoy the private deck through sliding glass doors, and lots of windows to bring in the sunshine. Full healthy and hearty breakfast is served each morning in the dining room with other inn guests and is included in the price. Special diets may be accommodated with advance notice. Daily maid service is provided, unless otherwise requested.

The space
Enjoy private ensuite bath, in-room mini-fridge and microwave, in-room cable TV, complimentary WI-FI. The Garden room is on the second floor. Stairs are required to access this unit. In addition to your private room, enjoy access to all common areas of Oakland Cottage B&B - cozy up with a book by the fireplace, or in summer months, have a beverage on the front porch. There is an extra guest use "kitchenette," in addition to your in-room mini-fridge & microwave, help yourself to ice, gl

name: West Asheville Green & Clean Getaway II 30 day min
description:
Sanitation Practices follow Airbnb's Enhanced Cleaning Protocol in addition to the usual high standards of care for this private suite!

You have a private entrance, bed, bath, kitchenette and dining area along with a wonderful outdoor space with the sound of birds. Serene & walkable to many restaurants, cider house, cafes, breweries, and Carrier Park. Optimal location between W AVL and River Arts District.

The space
I follow Airbnb's Enhanced Cleaning Protocol using effective non-toxic cleansers and then disinfected with 70% + alcohol spray.

In addition to the Enhanced Clean, there is an Austin Air filter in the suite, along with a UV filter in HVAC system that both remove viruses and bacteria. Hand sanitizer and soap plus paper towels and plenty of TP (!) is available!

So about the space!

A quaint private space with all you need for your stay in Asheville! You have a living/dining room with kitchenette: microwave,

name: Celia's Cottage: 5 miles to downtown Asheville & pet friendly! - 1 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom
description:
Romantic and cozy, Celia's Cottage is the ultimate getaway for couples.

The space
Romantic and cozy, Celia's Cottage is the ultimate getaway for couples. This cottage was built by hand in 1922 and still retains the original logs both inside and out, but has been extensively remodeled to offer guests modern amenities, like WiFi, cable TV, and air conditioning.

The cottage is less than 10 minutes to downtown Asheville, where you can explore award winning restaurants, craft breweries, and stores featuring local artisans. Uber and Lyft are available to take you to downtown or other nearby attractions. Hiking on the Blue Ridge Parkway is right outside your door- only 125 ft to the start of the Mountain to Sea trail. Also convenient to the Biltmore Estate, which is an easy 10 minute drive. Chimney Rock and Lake Lure are 35 minutes south of the cottage.

Reconnect, relax, and enjoy everything the Blue Ridge Mountains and Asheville has to offer. T

name: Asheville Mtn. Retreat Cabin with Hot Tub near BRP
description:
Mountain Retreat spa in the forest with flowers, wildlife and comfort. A blend of original art, soft fabrics and nature to ease your spirit. Well lit with skylights upstairs and a feeling of comfort being with the trees throughout. Hardwood floors, classic light fixtures and an array of flavors that are pleasing to the eye and the senses. Soak in the hot tub under the stars and rock yourself into sleep on the deck with the blinking innocence of the fireflies or the sound of the creek nearby.

The space
We are in a forest with much of the wildlife you might see in the deeper forests yet we are only 5 minutes away from a major grocery store with a Starbucks and strip mall and only 15 minutes away from downtown Asheville. The Famous Blue Ridge Parkway is just 2.5 miles away. A perfect scenario for many people who want to experience nature without having to go far to have it. We also provide an assortment of teas and coffee. If you are coming in starving, let m

name: Enjoy the MOUNTAIN DEW getaway in Asheville NC
description:
Your Mountain Dew house awaits you! Snuggled in a great neighborhood close to Asheville tourism, Brevard waterfalls, Hendersonville history. Just 1/2 mile from AVL airport and 2 miles from Sierra Nevada Brewery. Explore the mountains, trek the trails, ride the rapids, tour the breweries, taste the food, watch the sunsets, or just relax on the 2 decks. The Asheville area is destination to 7+Million guests a year. We have early morning hikes, great night life, and everything in between.

The space
With 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fireplace, eat-in kitchen and 2 decks, you can be comfortable for a few days or a few weeks. We have also converted the garage into an activity room with board games, TV/Video games and whatever else we can think of to keep you entertained. Only for use when not exploring the area or relaxing in front of the fireplace.

Guest access
Don't miss the GAMEROOM. just across the front porch where you'll find plenty to

name: Hidden Creek Lodge; upscale retreat on the doorstep of Downtown Asheville; more!
description:
Stunning luxury lodge; 5 minutes from Downtown Asheville!
This is truly a "one-of-a-kind" vacation destination, tucked into Chunns Cove, and just minutes from Asheville restaurants, shopping, breweries and more. This luxuriously spacious 7-bedroom lodge affords mountain privacy, multiple spacious & partially covered decks, hot tub, fire pit & stream, while being stunningly close to a plethora of activities.
Hidden Creek Lodge has quickly become one of the most popular homes in our Yonder luxury portfolio, and it's one of the most requested … not surprising when you put a designer inspired upscale home together with lots of amenities and a perfect location, close to everything.
An amazing vacation destination!

The space
Location:
Private home located app. only 5 minutes from downtown Asheville, 25 minutes to Asheville Regional airport, 13 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway, and less than 15 minutes to the gates of Biltmore Estate. This lodge

name: Charming circa 1927 Bungalow king bedroom in WAVL
description:
Great space in West Asheville about a 5 to 7 minute drive to downtown Asheville. Quiet neighborhood, two nice dogs live on the property. Front porch and central air conditioning. No microwave, but a toaster oven is available.

The space
Bedroom, bathroom, and brief use of kitchen and dining room. No microwave.

Guest access
Bedroom, bathroom, partial use of kitchen, use of front porch.

Other things to note
The bathroom has a clawfoot tub which is great for bathing, and a basic shower/curtain that pairs well with the clawfoot tub.

name: Spend Quality Time  In  Fabulous Asheville
description:
This compact but perfectly located apartment is located in walking distance to stores, shops and hundreds of restaurants , breweries and music venues art galleries.
The apartment is one bedroom, newly renovated in a terrific neighborhood.
There is on site parking, and laundry facilities in the building. It's on the second floor and there is a large balcony for relaxing.

The space
It has a queen size bed inthe bedroom as well as a very comfortable pull out sofa bed.

Guest access
The apartmenthas a wonderful balcony for reading and relaxing. It's also lovely for dining on the patio.

name: South Slope Townhome, Private Elevator, Rooftop Terrace, City and Mtn. Views
description:
Luxury modern Townhome located in the popular South Slope area of downtown Asheville. This beautiful 4 story Townhome features a private elevator to conveniently take you to each of the 4 floors. A private garage opens to the first level inside the home and another street-level entrance to popular breweries and restaurants which are located moments away. An open kitchen, dining, living room, and half bathroom on the 2nd floor provide the perfect space to relax, visit, and enjoy meals with friends and family. 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms are located on the 3rd floor. The fourth floor is a private but open loft that is the 3rd bedroom and also consists of an additional living area with another half bathroom. It also opens up to your private roof-top terrace where you can enjoy city and mountain views.
Security cameras, for your safety, are located at the front and back exteriors of the property. This is a residential complex; please be mindful of your neighbors and refer to the quie

name: Bohemian Craftsman Cottage w/ Serene Outdoor Space
description:
Stay in this beautiful hand built home just 12 minutes from downtown.
With custom wood detail, a big picture window, and an open floor plan, this space is unlike any other! It's the perfect getaway from your normal routine, and the ideal place to relax, recharge, and rejuvenate.

The space
The house was built with attention to natural craftsmanship, detail, and quality. It's a unique space with dedicated outdoor space that's sure to make for a memorable trip.

Enjoy the full kitchen with gas range, full stove, cooking utensils and spices, coffee, tea, etc., as well as microwave.

The large bathroom features beautiful woodwork and a clawfoot tub (and self-serve laundry).

Unwind after a day's work or play at the outdoor fire pit with a nice glass of wine or hot cup of tea. Use the charcoal grill to cook outside when the weather is nice!

There are two bedrooms, both with queen beds. One bedroom is very spacious, the ot

name: Elegant Atkinson Ste In Funky/Eclectic West AVL
description:
The Atkinson suite has large bedrooms, one king and one full-size bed, mountain views, a kitchen, and room for entertaining. It has its own entrance and private from the other suite. This listing is for the Atkinson suite only.

The house has two individual/separate suites. Each unit has two bedrooms and 1 full bathroom. You can rent the Atkinson Suite or rent the whole home. Atkinson and Bennett Suites as one for eight people. Message us if interested in both so we can check availability.

The space
This elegantly designated and lovingly restored historic home, built in the 1870s, is a slice of Asheville history. Full of special touches you won't find anywhere else, it features 13ft. ceilings, arched double-doors, and beautiful crown molding. The rooms are spacious with windows just as grand as space itself.

Enjoy the mountain view from the large back porch with your morning coffee or an evening cocktail. The shared front porch has fou

name: Country Cottage Getaway - 1 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom
description:
Plan your next cozy getaway at this private cottage and feel like you're miles away in the country, all while being so close to shopping and dining in downtown Asheville.

The space
Plan your next cozy getaway at this private cottage and feel like you're miles away in the country, all while being so close to shopping and dining in downtown Asheville. Perfect for honeymooners, singles, or a small family, Country Cottage Getaway is tucked away from the lights and sounds of the city, but only 15 minutes to downtown Asheville, the Biltmore Estate, and the Asheville Outlets.

Venture out to explore the Blue Ridge Parkway or take a relaxing river ride down the French Broad with Zen Tubing- both 10 minutes from the cottage. After a day full of adventure, spend your evenings stargazing out on the porch or next to the outdoor firepit.

House Layout:
One level living- kitchenette with small refrigerator, Keurig coffee maker, and apartment size sto

name: Interlaken Chalet Vacation Rental
description:
Dog-Friendly Mountain Chalet - 3 min to downtown Asheville.

The Interlaken Chalet is charming and well-appointed. Guests will love being tucked away in the trees with such close proximity to downtown Asheville!
This Chalet has a fully-stocked kitchen with appliances, pots and pans, dishes, salt, pepper, oil, regular & decaf coffee beans, teas, soaps and paper products. We provide linens, towels and blankets.

This home has Wi-Fi, Cable TV, Blu ray player and a gas fireplace.

Guest access
The home will be yours for the duration of the rental period. There is parking for two vehicles in front of the home and guest parking a few feet away.

Internet access: The Interlaken has a modem and router and the password, (Interlaken) is also on the laminated sheet near the TV.

Other things to note
This unit allows only 2 dogs, no cats. There is a pet fee for pets accompanying you on your trip. Please let us know th

name: Historic Bennett Suite Funky/Eclectic West AVL
description:
This listing is for the Bennett suite only. The Bennett suite has large bedrooms, two full-size beds, mountain views, a kitchen, and room for entertaining. It has its own entrance and private from the other suite.


The house has two individual/separate suites. Each separate unit has two bedrooms and 1 full bathroom. You can rent the Bennett Suite or rent the whole home. Atkinson and Bennett Suites together hold eight people. Message us if interested in both so we can check availability.

The space
This gorgeous designated historic home, built in the 1870s, is a slice of Asheville's history. Full of special touches you won't find anywhere else, it features 13ft. ceilings, arched double doors, and beautiful crown molding.

The rooms are spacious with windows just as grand as space itself. Enjoy the mountain view from the large back porch with your morning coffee or an evening cocktail. The shared front porch has four rocking chairs.

name: Comfy and Convenient South Asheville Getaway
description:
Enjoy your stay in South Asheville! Only minutes from the airport and some of Asheville's finest breweries such as Sierra Nevada! Fifteen minutes to Downtown Asheville. Twenty minutes to Downtown Hendersonville. Hiking trail about a mile away. Mountain biking trails less than 10 miles away. Group and family friendly house. Early check possible upon request. Cleaning during COVID takes extra time.

Guest access
Guests do not have access to the backyard.

name: Casita Amelia/ River Arts District Asheville
description:
We are excited to share Asheville with you. Whether you want to relax and stroll through nearby neighborhoods enjoying the many Bistros, arts and crafts, and breweries or use Casita Amelia as a springboard to adventure. We have hiking, rafting, zip lining and biking just to name a few ways to enjoy nature and the great outdoors. Enjoy our simple and comfortable place while sipping a warm coffee in the morning listening to the birds sing while swinging in the hammock chair.

The space
Casita Amelia is a Green Built Home. We have a whole house water filter, hot water on demand, high speed internet, and plenty of space to feel at home.

The space is furnished with comfortable bed and sectional couch, walk barefoot over the warming carpets and enjoy the blackout bedroom curtains to have the perfect slumber while listening the different tunes provided by a sound machine.

A complementary simple breakfast is provided, consisting of gourmet coffee,

name: Updated Cottage w/ Deck – Big Parcel with Views!
description:
Retreat to the heart of Appalachia at this updated 2BR cottage affectionately called “As the Crow Flies.” Located near downtown Asheville, this cottage sits amidst forests and has picturesque mountain views and a large covered deck. Sleeps 6.

The space
Retreat to the heart of Appalachia at this updated 2BR cottage just outside of downtown Asheville. Affectionately called "As the Crow Flies," this cottage is situated amidst forests on a lush .39-acre parcel. Enjoy picturesque views of the surrounding mountains from a large covered deck. Or relax on rocking chairs while listening to the flowing waters of the nearby Bull Creek. Cathedral ceilings, wood floors, and lots of natural lighting create a refined ambience amidst a stunning natural landscape.

LIVING AREA

A gas fireplace with a commanding stone-surround sits center stage in the light and airy living area. Make some popcorn and watch a new movie on the 42” cable TV. Find seating for five

name: Asheville Pet Friendly Apartment - Woods, Trails
description:

Secluded, surrounded by Bent Creek Forest, WALKING ACCESS to hiking and biking trails, beautiful woods, wildlife!

20- downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, breweries

Private, peaceful, green!
TV in bedroom and living room, both with Roku.
Please no smoking, parties/events, extra guests, or outside noise.
Owners not responsible for guests’ belongings.
Please bring your own PILLOWS, as Covid 19 precaution. Thanks!

Long, wooded gravel drive. Perfect for evening strolls!

Small creek great for cool splashing and wading.

name: Walk to DT! Private deck, clawfoot tub & fireplace
description:
Welcome to your urban oasis! Minutes away from Asheville’s thriving downtown scene, this newly remodeled and refurbished hideaway offers a private deck and entrance, claw foot tub, gas fireplace, plush king-size bed, and more.

The space
Nestled in Asheville’s historic Montford neighborhood, this cozy hideaway encompasses the best of both worlds, offering both privacy and convenience.

You’re just a pleasant 20-minute walk from all of the best breweries and restaurants Asheville has to offer. If you’re in town to enjoy the music or art scene the River Arts District provides, you’re equally centrally located. Stroll just five minutes down the hill to arrive at the Salvage Station, and bypass the crazy parking other concert goers have to contend with.

If, on the other hand, you’re looking for a personal getaway or romantic weekend in the mountains, take advantage of the gas fireplace, claw foot tub and private deck. Bubbles and beer, complimen

description:
****NO CHILDREN BELOW AGE 12 DUE TO DEEP POND JUST OUTSIDE THE DOOR

This is the original farmhouse on our 40-acre property. Recently, we updated the inside with modern amenities, while preserving much of the original charm. The house has a pond and water feature, and is super convenient to downtown (just 6.5 miles). We have been hosts since 2012 and have lots of reviews for our other two houses on the property. We are excited to share this new space with guests!

The space
This charming farmhouse has a modern kitchen, high ceilings and plenty of comfortable seating. There is a fireplace to enjoy in the winter and fall, an outdoor fire pit, a pond with a floating pontoon boat turned dock, a water feature that makes a serene flowing water sound, a front porch with rocking chairs and a cafe table, another cafe table in the kitchen overlooking the pond, a small dining table for 4, a small yoga room, and so so so much more! description:

Surrounded by trees and charming homes, you'll love how close you are to downtown while feeling tucked away in your own cozy paradise. This master suite comes equipped with it's own entrance, sitting area, kitchenette with breakfast bar, and luxury master bath. Be rest assured, this newly remodeled suite is thoroughly & professionally cleaned & great attention is given to disinfect every surface and fixture between guests

The space
This second floor suite has been recently and completely remodeled and offers filtered water from every fixture, brand new furniture and amenities including dedicated wifi, a mini split for your heating and cooling needs as well as on demand hot water and a smart TV.

Guest access
Guests will be given a unique code to access their unit and have the entire second floor to themselves including a private porch and back entrance which only they

name: Modern, Walkable West Asheville Apartment
description:
Welcome to our beautiful, modern efficiency apartment. Approximately 500 sqft of thoughtfully designed living space including a spacious outdoor living area with firepit. Located 6 minutes from downtown in the heart of vibrant West Asheville, our space offers guests the ability to explore the city, visit renowned attractions and dine at award-winning restaurants, just like a local!

The Graham House @grahamhouse.asheville features modern decor and full amenities so you can feel right at home.

The space
Please read before booking:

Our efficiency apartment is located in the bottom level of our charming 1930s bungalow. My husband and I live full time in the top floor of the home. We work hard to make your stay as secluded feeling as possible, but you may hear occasional foot steps or a friendly bark from our 2 fur babies. Our apartment will serve as a perfect landing spot for 2 friends or a couple, as you explore all that Asheville has to offer

15 min to Airport, Ag Center, Bent Creek bike/hikeTrails & Biltmore Estate.

Contemporary furnishings, stained concrete floors with cozy area rugs, clean modern bathroom with large shower. 1 king and 1 queen beds in private rooms and a west elm double bed sleeper sofa in the living room.House is located in a quiet wooded neighborhood. Owners live above.

Guest access
Basement suite is completely private. Private outdoor space including patio, separate drive and

name: Rustic cabin 15 minutes from downtown Asheville!
description:
Nestled in Buffalo Mountain, this charming hideaway in the trees is less than 15 minutes from downtown Asheville with endless opportunity for fun, art, shopping, music, history (the Biltmore), and stellar farm to table restaurants. Enjoy nearby hiking and biking trails, tubing on the river, or taking in mountain views.

Perfect for families or couples looking to enjoy all the entertainment Asheville has to offer, or those just looking for some peace and solitude.

The space
This home is designed with detail for your comfort and relaxation, both inside and out. Sleep like a baby on comfy beds, two types of quality pillows for your comfort, and 100% cotton bedding. Never run out of hot water thanks to a tankless hot water heater!

There are three decks, one with a 6-person hot tub and a delightful 180-degree view of the surrounding forest. The second, accessible from a main floor bedroom overlooks the fenced side yard . The third at the front

name: Carpe Soli Farm—10min to downtown
description:
Private home less than 10 minute drive to Asheville. Short walk/run to blue ridge parkway and Mt. to Sea Trail.

The rental is next door to our mini-farm where we have a fish pond, chickens, bees, goats, and a large garden. There are usually baby goats in the spring. You can interact with the farm as much or as little as you like.

You can go for a run or bike ride, walk to the Folk Art Center, or take in one of the beautiful overlooks without having to drive anywhere.

The space
The backyard is very private. It has an 8ft privacy fence and lots of cedar trees. From the back porch, you can watch the goats and chickens forage and listen to the waterfall at the top of the fish pond. The basement has a ping pong table, huge TV, and is stocked with playing cards and board games

Other things to note
The cleaners and methods to clean the house are compliant with CDC guidelines.

name: Green-built studio apartment in West Asheville
description:
Our cozy studio apartment has a private entrance accessed through a shared back patio. We are located in a quiet West Asheville neighborhood and are within walking distance of cafes, restaurants, breweries & parks. The River Arts District is just across the river and Asheville's downtown is a short 5 minute drive. Carrier Park offers biking & running options, and our favorite trail system, Bent Creek is only 7 miles away. We are grateful to call Asheville home and love to share it with others!

The space
Your space is on the bottom floor of our home. As a family with 2 young children, there may be sounds of little people's footsteps throughout the day, but all should be quiet from 8pm until 7am. You will have a washer & dryer (along with eco-detergent) for your convenience as well as a mini-fridge and microwave. Organic coffee and tea are provided. We have a whole house coconut-carbon water filter so delicious water is available right out of our taps! Your pat

The space

4 miles to Downtown Asheville.
Open concept w/kitchen, dining and living room. Master on main. 2 upstairs bedrooms w/shared bathroom and loft. Enjoy the view from the 2nd story deck or patio with outdoor TV - NFL Red Zone,Cable, streaming services.

We are on a very private wooded lot in a very quiet neighborhood.

3,400 Sq Ft | Mountain Views | Fire Pit | New Furnishings & Mattresses | Super Clean

We love guests and can help with suggestions of what to do, where to go in Asheville, but we are behind locked doors so if you are private people, you won't see us at all!
