description:
We care about your safety! We are taking extra care to disinfect our space due to COVID-19.

BRAND NEW! Beautiful new apartment in East-West Asheville!

Our rental is perfect for a couple or two friends that want a fun weekend in Asheville but a quiet place to relax and unwind. 1 bdrm/1 bath, small kitchen, washer/dryer. Private entrance and huge windows - tons of natural light.

Easy walking distance to New Belgium Brewery and all that West Asheville and the River Arts district have to offer.

The space
Beautiful new apartment in East-West Asheville! This is a quiet, family-friendly neighborhood but with one of the best walking locations in Asheville. Our rental is perfect for a couple (+ a kid) or two friends that want a fun weekend in Asheville but a quiet place to relax and unwind. If you are looking to party all night or pack a bunch of people into a small unit this won't be the rental for you.

This is a completely p

name: Mountain Experience Minutes from Asheville
description:
A Mountain Experience 13 min. from downtown Asheville! On a hill in a tranquil field of wildflowers, with beautiful mountain views, farmhouse lower level 2 bed room apt: King and Queen, living room: couch & futon, 1 bathroom, W/D, full kitchen, dining room, picnic table/umbrella for the lovely outdoors, generous parking. Best of both country and city living, only 4 min. from I-40 or the Blue Ridge Pkwy, & about 9-17 min. from popular Asheville & Black Mountain destinations.

The space
Parking is up a gravel driveway, in the first pull off to the left. Walk down a gravel path to the lower level of the house. The last door on the right is the apt entrance.

The area directly outside of the apt. is your area to enjoy. Please do not enter other outdoor areas.

For health reasons, we do not allow smoking anywhere on the property.

Your front door will be unlocked via a code.

The entire AirBnB apt is private and separ

name: Casita Asheville
description:
Our new townhome has everything you need and provides a comfortable home base for up to 9 guests (Up to 5 Adults + 4 Children). You will love the incredible mountain views that can be seen from nearly every room in the house. Relax on our deck and enjoy our gorgeous 2-way fireplace, which can be viewed on the deck and in the living room! For guests with accessibility challenges, our home features an elevator.

The space
We offer parking for up to four cars, with parking for two within the garage and two in the driveway, outside of the garage. You may enter our home from the garage or the front door, and you will enter our large foyer, with elevator, coat closet, and our laundry room. Stairs lead up to the main living space, where our beautiful, light filled kitchen has everything you need to cook just about anything! Our large dining table has seating for 8 and our kitchen island has 2 bar stools. The kitchen and dining area are open to the comfortable living room

name: The Yap House
description:
Bright and cheerful house in West Asheville. Three bedrooms and two full bathrooms. Host lives in a private apartment on the ground floor. The second and thirds floors are reserved for guests with private entrance. House is a 10 minute drive to downtown Asheville and a 7 minute drive to colorful historic West Asheville. Close to many eateries and entertainment.

The space
The house is gated all around and has keyless entry and can be accessed from main road and a private road that leads to the back entrance. It is very private with tall trees.

Guest access
Guests are welcome to enjoy anywhere on property except apartmentt on ground floor.

Other things to note
We offer coffee and tea
We do not provide breakfast

name: Grove Park Carriage House w/Hot Tub 5min to DT
description:
Nestled directly beneath the historic Grove Park Inn on an iconic Asheville street, the Grove Park Carriage House is a bright open space looking up at Sunset Mountain & backing up to the GPI golf course. The new Carriage House is a stand-alone unit that sleeps 4, features clean modern finishes & private hot tub for enjoying views. Perfectly located; you are a 5 min Uber to Downtown and a beautiful walk to Grove Park Inn.
Front row seat for Grove Park Inn’s July 5th fireworks!

The space
The Carriage House is equipped with washer and dryer, coffee, tea and bathroom toiletries. A pullout couch provides additional sleeping options and both living area and bedroom have Netflix enabled TVs. A small dining table is provided that can expand for additional room. Please note the Carriage House shares the same property as our main residence and is a detached unit. The private deck on the unit offers some privacy for your comfort but if the weather is nice you might he

name: Escape to Asheville!  Entire Home, Hiking & HotTub
description:
Enjoy everything that Asheville has to offer at our centrally located home in South Asheville. Only 20 minutes from Downtown and close by to incredible hiking and waterfalls. Gather on the large covered porch or relax in the hot tub in the backyard. The home is spacious and comfortable with a contemporary & vintage feel to it.

The space
The house has an open floor plan with lots of nice outdoor spaces. It is an older, comfortable home.

Guest access
The entire home is yours to enjoy.

Other things to note
The house is located on a well traveled road. It is close by to hiking in Brevard and the Blue Ridge Parkway. We are also 15 minutes from Zen Tubing which is very popular in Asheville

name: Walkable West Asheville Vacation Rental
description:
Our newly-renovated basement suite in the heart of West Asheville is a sunny and welcoming spot for a weekend getaway! You’ll have the entire downstairs space to yourself, which includes a bedroom w/ a queen bed, a bathroom & a living room w/ a twin sofa bed. It’s a 10-minute walk to many great restaurants like Biscuit Head, Nine Mile, BimBeriBon, Sunny Point and more! The Biltmore Estate and downtown Asheville are only 3 miles away. Easy check-in with a door code. Coffee/tea provided.

The space
The Decor:
We’re fans of local Asheville artists, so we adorned the walls with some of our favorites! In the space you’ll see botanical paintings by Clare Beumer Hill and Blue Ridge Mountain photography by Travis Bordley.

Guest access
You have access to the driveway, where you can park and walk directly into the downstairs apartment. You have access to downstairs living room, bedroom and bathroom. We live in the upstairs part of the house.

name: Cozy & Close to Downtown & River Arts District
description:
Quiet and cozy room with a straight walk less than a mile to downtown. Several breweries, coffee shops, and restaurants all within one mile. Easy access to downtown and River Arts District. All of downtown Asheville within 2 miles! Cats and Dogs are welcome! A riverside greenway trail across the street is great for walking pets or biking around. Close to the Botanical Gardens. Blue Ridge Parkway only 8 miles away!

The space
A private porch entry with fridge and microwave leads to a private bedroom and a hallway to shared bathroom. Queen size bed with sitting area, TV, Video games, guitar, and lots of modern board games. Very accommodating so please mention any special requests or needs!

name: West Asheville Abode unit B
description:
Desirable West Asheville! Walk to top rated restaurants, breweries, coffee shops, bakeries, market, shopping! 3 units available. Unit B is the largest with sleeping space for 6 guests! The Big Bedroom upstairs has a queen bed and 3 twin-size beds, along with the large full bathroom. There is a twin size sofa-bed in the living room.

The space
Unit B has living room, kitchen, bathroom, and a big bedroom with queen bed, and 3 twin beds. There is a single sofa-sleeper in the living room. The spacious kitchen is off the living room on the main floor. There is plenty of off-street parking behind the house, and street parking in front of the house.

Guest access
Unit B is in the middle of the house, with access via the front door which opens right into the living room of the unit. The other 2 units in the house have doors on the sides of the house. All units have parking in the back, with a driveway along the right side of the house. Th

name: Elegant Mountain Chalet 15 Minutes to downtown AVL
description:
This chalet features a hot tub, garden dining, fenced in yard and king size beds. Look out through the windows over the trees and as far as the Blue Ridge Parkway. The morning views from the deck are breathtaking, and you may spot a fox or bear. Nestled on top of Buffalo Mountain, this hideaway is charming, romantic and relaxing. A scenic 15-minute drive from both downtown Asheville and Black Mountain, this nook is the perfect peaceful getaway.

The space
You won't be disappointed by gorgeous decor and comfort of this home. It is fully stocked, has two living rooms, and 3 porches on different levels for taking in the views! It features 2 bedrooms with king size beds and private baths. The property is surrounded by trees which creates a treehouse feel and complete privacy. The mountain that the house sits on has a direct view across the valley to a famous lookout spot on the blue ridge parkway, (you get the opposite view right from your porch)! *please see note abo

name: Herron's Hideaway in the Heart of Asheville
description:
Our 1918 Craftsman home has a simple elegance, you'll fall in love with its character. The entire 2nd floor is yours, with comfortable beds and a TV room with a fridge and coffee station. Keyless entrance from a private, spacious rocking chair front porch into a serene living room, perfect if you need a quiet workspace during your stay. Stretch out with some yoga or play a few tunes on the 1927 piano.

The space
We use eco-friendly materials and products whenever we can.

Guest access
You'll have a private guest suite, including the entire 2nd floor, the front porch and the downstairs living room. please be aware that the bathroom entrance is through queen bedroom.

Other things to note
Our place is in a quiet residential neighborhood. If you plan to party during your stay, this is not the place for you.

name: ASHEVILLE AIRPORT & SIERRA NEVADA 4 minutes away!
description: Location! Location! Location! ONE mile from the Asheville Airport and FOUR minutes to Sierra Nevada Brewing. 20 minutes to downtown Asheville and 15 minutes to The Biltmore. A short drive to the most beautiful waterfalls western NC has to offer. This home is only three years new and decorated with comfort and ease in mind. You and your family and friends will love it here. You can even WALK to Blue Ghost Brewing! Within a few blocks to restaurants and shopping.

name: AVL apartment between downtown & Biltmore
description:
Perched on top of Murray Hill, in between downtown and the River Arts District, sits this comfortable two bedroom apartment on the second floor of a 1925 craftsman home with it's own private entrance.

Update 9/15: construction of a new home will begin on the property next door to the apartment some time in November. Construction is expected to continue through March. Noise from construction is expected to be limited to business hours.

The space
Consistent with the City of Asheville short term rental rules there is no kitchen in the space but you won't need one! There is a hot water kettle, filtered drinking water and a mini fridge. We've also provided locally roasted coffees, teas and snacks. In addition, you've landed in the middle of a rich food and beverage scene with some of the region's best restaurant options within easy walking distance.

Our living room has a WiFi connected television enabled with Roku and Netflix (no local channels)

name: ~5 star Downtown Spacious Retreat at 35 Patton
description:
1800 square foot loft updated historic building in the epicenter of downtown Asheville. The loft was originally owned by one of Asheville's finest artists and retains its art gallery roots with walls of many original works. Modern updates along with cozy fireplace makes it a true oasis in a bustling city. Just outside your front or back door is live entertainment, shopping, and fine dining. Spa Theory is conveniently located in the lower level of adjacent building.

The space
Feel the heartbeat of the city from this spacious loft. Steps to fine dining, music, children's museum and more. We love our location and am sure you will too.

Guest access
Our entire condo is yours to enjoy. We visit frequently and were previously guests. We fell in love with the openess of the loft and all of the artistic twists that we chose to purchase and leave in place from previous owner.

Other things to note
The Loft at 35 Patton is i

name: Cozy, Stylish Montford Retreat
description:
We think you'll love our space. It's quirky, comfortable, and stylish. A bit like Asheville, really. This studio apartment has a private entrance and is a 10 minute walk downtown or bike ride to the River Arts District (RAD). Our clean, modern space is your perfect launch pad for brewery tours, culinary interests or explorations of all the wild beauty the local Blue Ridge has to offer. This space is below our main living space so there may be occasional noise since we have 2 young kids.

The space
Aside from all the standard amenities you'll need to jumpstart your Asheville vacation, we provide: coffee (from our favorite local roasters, Mountain Air) and a sample of local beers. We can also provide restaurant recommendations or help charting a perfect Parkway hike. This space is perfect for couples (one plush double bed) but can accommodate up to four people with a small sofa bed.

Parking: We have a small vintage green truck parked on the left side

name: Privacy by city, 3 suites, in/out hot tubs, fp
description:
The house is five minutes to the river arts district, but the back yard feels countryside. All three bedrooms have private bathrooms; two of them have double doors to the backyard/hot tub. The great room has 15’ ceilings, and an indoor/outdoor fireplace with dual double doors to the back porch. Touches like NC barn wood, a walnut slab bathroom sink and natural decor make the house cozy.

The space
This house is so fun! Its shaped like an L, so it shields all the backyard space. The outdoor hot tub is huge, and one of the several decks has an outdoor/indoor fireplace. The middle of the house has soaring cathedral ceilings, a gourmet kitchen and views of the forest.

Guest access
The only portion of the home inaccessible is one garage bay: I have a car in one bay, but you may use the other (plenty of driveway parking, too)

name: Ivy Cottage - Private, Wooded, Tranquil & Serene
description:
Fall Foliage Special! 34% off!

With this monthly rental, surround yourself with the beauty of your own private woods and gardens of this sweet and inviting home. Nestled minutes from everything, yet completely private, serene and tranquil. The perfect place to call your home. At the front gate you will hardly guess this slice of heaven awaits you! Sweet gardens, a bright sunroom, open floorplan, lofted ceilings, and doors open onto the gardens from all main rooms.

The space
Ivy Cottage is tucked away in the heart of the woods, completely private, soothingly tranquil yet moments walking distance from shopping, movies, a micro-brewery and more! In 5 minutes drive, you'll be at the illustrious Biltmore Estate, or shopping in Biltmore Village. Only 3 miles to Downtown Asheville. You can spend all of your time outside, sitting quietly in the beautiful gardens, or nestle inside with a cuppa hot something next to the wood burning stove. A serene bubb

name: The Hummingbird - 1 Block off of Downtown!
description:
Enjoy your Asheville adventure from this newly renovated 1926 Historic Montford Bungalow. The Hummingbird is 1 Block from Downtown this adorable 2 Bedroom, 3 Beds, 1 Bath house puts you within walking distance to the center of everything. 2 cozy rooms (1 KING 1 Queen, common area with 1 queen sleeper sofa, new stainless steal appliances, 60" flat screen, and a great front porch to enjoy a glass of wine and people watching.
Walking distance to downtown, Harrah’s Cherokee Center, & whole foods

The space
Newly Restored 1926 Home with brand new kitchen and furnishings but still has the old character and charm. Home has A/C and Heat!

Guest access
Guest will have private access to entire main floor of home. Guests are only allowed to enter the home through the front door. Person lives in lower level full time.

name: SUPER COOL NEW 1 BEDROOM WITH VIEWS WALK TO TOWN
description:
GREAT LOCATION.....Walk to River Arts District, Downtown Asheville, and West Ashville.

New inside and out.... 1 Bedroom Apt with own entrance and 24 foot balcony looking over River Arts District and Mountains. All utilities and cable included as well as a full washer and dryer in the apartment. Discount for monthly rental. FAST WIFI included
Desk and chair provided in bedroom

The space
NEW NEW NEW.....LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION
THIS PROPERTY IS GREEN BUILT CERTIFIED

Guest access
EVERYTHING IN APT IS PRIVATE ADN ACCESABLE

name: West Asheville Abode unit A
description:
West Asheville Abode unit A is an adorable apartment in a 3-unit house right in the heart of vibrant, hip, West Asheville! This unit has a bedroom with queen bed, bathroom, full kitchen, and living room with a brand new sleeper sofa! Walk to West Asheville’s highly rated restaurants, breweries, bakeries, coffee shops, and shopping!

The space
This house is right on the main road in West Asheville! You can walk to everything and leave you car in the spacious off-street parking behind the house. Each of the 3 units has a separate entrance and security code.

Guest access
Each of the 3 units has a separate entrance and security code. Unit A is on the front left side of the house. You will have the entire apartment, but share the front patio, back parking area and yard.

Other things to note
This house is in the heart of West Asheville! There will be street noise!

name: New luxury 2 bdr/2 bath condo located in the heart of downtown Asheville
description:
With 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, an open kitchen, dining room, living room, and balcony; this spacious residence provides the comfort and privacy of home while guests can also enjoy the convenience of having staff on hand to answer any questions and help with all guest needs. New appliances, bedding, and furniture create a stunning accommodation for you and your loved ones to relax and enjoy yourself. Upon arrival you will also find the unit fully stocked with linens and towels and all of the essentials you will need during your stay.
Located in the heart of downtown Asheville and nestled in the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains, this condo offers guests the best of both worlds. Only a moments walk to Asheville's local restaurants, breweries, shops, and galleries you are in the center of the city while also able to enjoy the mountains that surround you. You'll fall in love with this new condominium and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Asheville.

The

name: New, luxury 1 bdr/1 ba condo in heart of downtown Asheville~55 S. Market #204
description:
This new luxury condo is a spacious 1 bedroom/1 bathroom residence with an open kitchen, dining room, living room, and balcony. It provides the comfort and privacy of home while guests can also enjoy the convenience of having staff on hand to answer any questions and help with all guest needs. New appliances, bedding, and furniture create a stunning accommodation for you and your loved ones to relax and enjoy yourself. Upon arrival you will also find the unit fully stocked with linens and towels and all of the essentials you will need during your stay.
Located in the heart of downtown Asheville and nestled in the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains, this condo offers guests the best of both worlds. You'll fall in love with this new condominium and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Ashevill

name: Mountain Home Nestled in Nature, close to town
description:
Mountain Home Nestled in Nature is the perfect refuge in these uncertain times. Enjoy a drive through the picturesque Riceville Valley on your way to our quiet and cozy home. Hear the sounds of nature all around you from the lovely covered deck that overlooks the forest. Unwind to the soft whispers of the wind in the trees, the perfect setting to enjoy your morning coffee, evening drinks and for relaxing. A private and quiet retreat yet less than 10 miles from the heart of downtown Asheville.

The space
Super clean
Fully equipped kitchen
Coffee and tea station
Decorated for comfort and warmth
Premium memory foam mattresses
Smart TVs
Central air conditioning and heat
Gas fireplace
Workspace/desk
One level living
Accommodates up to 4 adults

Please no smoking or large gatherings/parties on the property as we want everyone to enjoy their stay. Also this property is not currently set up for children under

name: Serene Mountain Home Close to Town
description:
Serene Mountain Home surrounded by nature, private setting, close to town.
Comfortable home overlooking a beautiful tree line forest. If you enjoy peace and quiet, you will like it here. Easy access to hiking trails and all the urban delights of Asheville.

The space
Super clean
Fully equipped kitchen
Coffee and tea station
Decorated for comfort and warmth
Central air conditioning and heat
Premium memory foam bedding
Smart TV's
Ultra fast internet
One level living
Covered front and back porch
Accommodates up to 6 guests
Please no smoking or large gatherings/parties on the property.

Other things to note
2 night minimum stay on weekends
3 night minimum stay on holidays


We do not rent to locals.

Due to some guests suffering from pet allergies, this home is unable to accommodate pets.

Must be at least 25 years of age or older to book this pr

name: Private suite in Bent Creek/W. Asheville
description:
Basement of our home with private entrance, 1 bedroom, den with futon and 1 full bath with shower plus full refrigerator, microwave and coffee pot...
We are in a family friendly neighborhood that borders the Pisgah National Forest, NC Arboretum and Blue Ridge Parkway. This is a hiker's and mountain biker's paradise. Our home is within walking distance to the neighborhood park and hiking trails and a 5 minute drive to tubing on the French Broad River, restaurants and the Asheville Outlet Mall.

The space
Private entrance with space to store bicycles.
Kitchenette with dining table, full refrigerator, microwave and coffee pot - no stove top or kitchen sink though.
Note that the private entrance goes through our garage. Also note, we do NOT have a TV in the space but have WiFi so you can access internet. We also have cards and games in the space for your use.

Guest access
We have marked areas that are off limits, including ou

name: Charming Cottage in Historic Biltmore Village
description:
Cottage Apartment - Historic Biltmore Village

Enjoy the convenience of walking to dozens of shops and restaurants, five minute drive to downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Parkway and a short walk to the Biltmore House Estate. Experience the diversity of four seasons with warm springs, green summers, colorful falls and cool winters. The Chapman House offers a unique experience set within Historic Biltmore Village, located in the beautiful mountains of western North Carolina.

The space
This cottage has historic nature and is located within walking distance to the famous Biltmore house as well as an abundance of cute stores and shopping options that your heart could desire. The Biltmore House is 0.3 miles from our AirBNB. Below the AirBNB there is a CBD and Craft Beer shop for you to enjoy. If you are not fond of noise of any kind this may not be the spot for you. Being that we are located in the middle of the Biltmore Village, there are a ton of resta

name: Rural Retreat: Private Country Home on 20+ Acres!
description:
Enjoy a delightful private stay in the country at this expansive 3BR home affectionately named "Turkey Knob", just 15 minutes from downtown Asheville! Take in picturesque views of the surrounding woods and pastures on the 20+ acre parcel. Sleeps 8.

The space
Enjoy a private stay in the country with the convenience of urban proximity at this expansive 3BR/2BA home, located just 7 miles outside of downtown Asheville. Take in picturesque views of the surrounding woods and pastures on the 20+ acre parcel affectionately named “Turkey Knob”. Highlights include a gas fireplace, firepit, and a large front porch with plenty of seating.

LIVING AREAS

Make hot cocoa and curl up by the gas fireplace in the living area. Or kick back and enjoy a new movie on the 50” TV. Find plenty of seating with two plush sofas, two armchairs, and a rocker.

A game room, outfitted with several benches and a foosball table, is located in the garage.

K

name: West Asheville Abode unit C
description:
West Asheville Abode unit C is cute and cozy! Located in the back of the house overlooking the back yard, it is the oldest part of the house, built in 1905! It has been completely renovated, but still has a few quirks, like the slightly slanting floors! There are two twin beds in the bedroom, and another pull-out twin in the living room. With a bright and spacious bathroom, adorable kitchen and all new windows it is a perfect little cottage!

The space
West Asheville Abode is 3 units in one house, each with a separate entrance. They can be rented together or separately. Unit A is on the left if you’re facing the house, B is in the front center and has an upstairs bedroom, and C is in the back on the right.

Guest access
Each unit has its own entrance, kitchen, living room, bedroom, and bathroom. Each unit has a keypad lock and you will be given the access code on the morning of your arrival. Unit C is in the back of the house, close to

name: Private Basement Studio Apt. in East Asheville
description:
Our home is an easy 18 minute/8.5 miles to downtown Asheville, near the Blue Ridge Parkway & 20 minutes/8.1 miles to the Biltmore Estate. We are situated on 5.25 ac of land in a private rural wooded setting. Our homestead consists of chickens, Nigerian Dwarf goats, honey bees & trails to walk on with plenty of wildlife & nature. The apartment is spacious with a private bath & entrance, queen size bed, sitting & kitchen area. There is a slight walk from the driveway to the entrance of the house.

The space
2 night minimum stay. 5 day maximum. Please be aware that there is no kitchen stove/range in the studio. There is a small refrigerator, sink, microwave, a coffee maker, hot water maker, plates, mugs, utensils and paper towels. You could hear the goats in the morning (only if the screen door or window is open) when they are anxiously waiting to be fed. Otherwise a very quiet area.

Guest access
There is an electronic keyless entry to the

name: Laurel's Rest
description:
New basement studio apartment with private entry and patio. Quiet and great nature views. Full kitchen for those who cook! Just a few miles south of Asheville and conveniently located near the Asheville airport, numerous breweries (Sierra Nevada, Blue Ghost, Mills River, Sweeten Creek, Burning Blush, Hillman, French Broad, etc), restaurants, Biltmore House, Hendersonville, Brevard, Pisgah National Forest and other activities. Keyless entry for easy check-in. Designated guest parking on-site.

The space
New basement studio apartment with private entry and patio. Air handling unit (ac and heat) is separate from the main house. Quiet and great nature views. Full kitchen for those who cook! Just a few miles south of Asheville and conveniently located near the Asheville airport, numerous breweries (Sierra Nevada, Blue Ghost, Mills River, Sweeten Creek, Burning Blush, Hillman, French Broad, etc), restaurants, Biltmore House, Hendersonville, Brevard, Pisgah Natio

name: Simply Divine in West Asheville!
description:
Beautiful new contemporary. Private 1600 sq ft accommodation with all the bells and whistles – smart TVs, cable/high-speed internet, gourmet kitchen, washer/dryer and more. Relax after a busy day in two cozy outdoor venues. The treetop level deck features inviting places to sit/dine and an adjacent indoor bar area. Bring out the smart speaker for your favorite tunes or sporting events. Quiet neighborhood, large comfy beds and upscale décor promise a very special stay.

The space
Professionally-styled interior features elegant eat-in kitchen with granite, Samsung and Cuisinart appliances, and Calphalon cookware. Main level master suite with king bed, wall-mounted flat screen TV, large closet and master bath with rainfall shower. Upstairs, second bedroom with king bed, office and media room (smart TV) each with sofa beds, second full bathroom with tub, complimentary private laundry, bar area off large upstairs deck. Tankless water heater for endless hot

name: West Asheville Studio - "Touch of Provence"
description:
Located in a peaceful neighborhood, "Touch of Provence" studio is barely a 10 minutes drive to downtown Asheville.
*Only a few steps from a greenway, it is walkable to the lively center of West Asheville .
*The studio is totally independent and self-sufficient.
*Guests can also enjoy a private outdoor sitting area.
*Once inside, several lighting options allow you to choose your mood in this calming space where you can relax after a day of exploring.
*Best for couples or single guests.

The space
~Laptop friendly.
~Comfortable queen bed.
~Flat screen TV with ROKU. Netflix available.
~Parking a few steps from the entrance door.
~Freshly ground coffee, choice of French press or regular coffee maker, assorted teas and treats.
~Linens and towels are picked for its quality and natural fibers.
~Gentle, natural non scented but efficient cleaning products are used for care between guests.
~For your comfor

name: New luxury condo in heart of downtown Asheville~55 S. Market St.Condo #108
description:
This new luxury condo is a spacious 1 bedroom/1 bathroom residence with an open kitchen, dining room, living room, and balcony. It provides the comfort and privacy of home while guests can also enjoy the convenience of having staff on hand to answer any questions and help with all guest needs. New appliances, bedding, and furniture create a stunning accommodation for you and your loved ones to relax and enjoy yourself. Upon arrival you will also find the unit fully stocked with linens and towels and all of the essentials you will need during your stay.
Located in the heart of downtown Asheville and nestled in the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains, this condo offers guests the best of both worlds. Only a moments walk to Asheville's local restaurants, breweries, shops, and galleries you are in the center of the city while also able to enjoy the mountains that surround you. You'll fall in love with this new condominium and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Ashevill

name: Bluebird Getaway 1
description:
Spacious and serene house just minutes from downtown AVL. Great location! Has a large deck off a big kitchen and lush green forest behind. Feels like you are living in the trees! Near end of cul-de-sac so quiet and private, but close to everything. Biking/hiking/running trails just down the street.

The space
Super cute and cozy space with plenty of room to relax and stretch out. The view from the deck is beautiful and serene year round.

Guest access
Large master bedroom with ensuite bath, a second full guest bath, kitchen, living room, patio, and laundry are included in your use. (Two additional bedrooms will be locked off and inaccessible .)

Other things to note
Guests are required to clean up after themselves such as dishes, lite bathroom cleaning etc. This space is perfect for a couple, small family, or solo traveler just wanting to enjoy the area. This is not suitable as a party house however. There is a second

description:

name: Barrel-Aged Beer Home - Free Keg of Local AVL Beer
description:
Let's be serious, besides the tremendous amount of local art, hiking, history and music... You're here to experience Asheville's world famous beer scene! Come experience the life of a local Asheville Brewer. The Barrel-Aged Beer Home is a 2100 sqft fully craft beer inspired home, covered head to toe in artwork and regenerated brewing equipment.

The space
Located just 9 minutes from Downtown Asheville and 7 minutes from the famous West Asheville, this large home is perfect for families, revisiting friends, bachelor and bachelorettee groups, work retreats, etc...

The Craft Beer Home includes:
*Keyless entry
*Two living rooms (upstairs/downstairs
*A 55' 4K Roku TV
-Stereo with AUX chord hookup
*50+Mbs Wifi
*Four brand new king size memory foam beds
-Each bed includes 4 king size pillows and complete sheet set
*A kegerator of local Asheville craft beer
*Table Tennis Table
*Two full bathrooms

name: Carpe Soli Farm*—10min to downtown
description:
Private home less than 10min drive to Asheville. Short walk/run to Blue Ridge Parkway and Mt. to Sea Trail.

The rental is next door to our mini-farm where we have a fish pond, chickens, bees, goats, and a large garden. There are usually baby goats in the spring.

You can interact with the farm as much or as little as you like. You can go for a run or bike ride, walk to the Folk Art Center, or take in one of the beautiful overlooks on the parkway without having to get in your car.

The space
This listing is for a smaller portion of the house. You still have it all to yourselves, but you'll have access to the 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom pictured. The other bed/baths will be closed so I don’t have to charge a higher cleaning fee. If you have a larger group, check out our other listing for all 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. The house is very private. It has an 8ft privacy fence and lots of cedar trees. From the back porch, you can watch the g

name: Serene Getaway By The Heart Of AVL - Entire House!
description:
Your next Asheville vacation begins with the perfect vacation house. Amazingly convenient and Incredibly close to everything Asheville has to offer! We are 5 minutes away from the River Arts District and less than 10 minutes away from Downtown and West Asheville. We are a legal vacation rental and located right outside the edge of city limits!

Enjoy your next vacation with a beautiful full-kitchen and granite counters, spacious living, dining, and outdoor living space as well as a fire pit.

The space
This spacious two bedroom house comes with all your comfort needs. All beds are equipped with queen-sized mattresses. The entire house has beautiful hardwood floors as well as a large kitchen space complete with granite counters. Comfortable living space with a 55" TV and Netflix included.

Guest access
You will have access to the entire house.

description:
Welcome to the Overlook on Beaucatcher Mountain, a fully remodeled unit with approximately 1500 sqft overlooking downtown Asheville. The space includes 2 large bedrooms with high end queen mattresses, 2 gorgeous bathrooms with spacious showers, game room with pool table, dart board & bar area, living/den area with stone hearth & wood burning fire place, & kitchenette with mini fridge. The space is so nice & comfortable, some of our guests decide to spend more time at home versus going out.

The space
We put extra effort in our remodel and furnishing process to help ensure your stay is private & comfortable. The inside of the rental unit gets plenty of natural light from four large sliding glass windows and one glass door, all of which have privacy blinds. The entire space is decorated with art which illustrates Asheville and Western North Carolina.

Our house sits on a unique 3.5 acre lot in downtown asheville that is located approximately half way

description:
A cozy private space located just minutes from downtown Asheville and Blue Ridge Parkway. You will have your own private entrance and off the street free parking in beautiful Beverly Hills, Asheville. This is a great location in a well established neighborhood with the local public Asheville golf course. You will have an intimate deck area to relax and complete privacy at The Bears Den. Hosts live upstairs and available to provide suggestions to make your stay full of fantastic memories.

The space
Two twin beds are available and can be put together as a king or kept apart to best meet your needs. A private bathroom with shower is in room. Air conditioning window unit is available upon request as is room heater if needed. Space has 2 screened windows with pleasant breeze most of year. TV, mini Fridge, microwave and coffee maker all present in room. All basic amenities provided for your stay. Private entrance with keyless entry is located on small private patio an

Only a moments walk to Asheville's local restaurants, breweries, shops, and galleries you are in the center of the city while also able to enjoy the mountains that surround you. You'll fall in love with this new condominium and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Asheville.

Browse the unique shops in the River Arts District, brewery hop through the South Slope, or visit the world-renowned Biltmore Estate & Winery!

Pets Allowed | A/C | Screened Porch | Deck

name: **Ponds Edge Retreat • 15 mins to dntwn Asheville
description:
Park-like setting! A bright basement apartment at the edge of a creek-fed pond, where you can sit and relax, fish, listen to the birds and frogs, feed our awesome ducks, and take in the close range mountain view!

It’s a peaceful setting where you can return home from your adventures and relax, cook a meal, or Netflix and chill!

The space
If you love quiet, but also being close to the city, you will love Pond’s Edge Retreat!

It is 3.5 miles from I40 and about 15-20 minutes to downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, River Arts, shopping, and all that the Asheville area has to offer!

The garage and basement was once a bait and tackle store for the pond. In the 1950’s they held carp fishing tournaments here! There are still very large carp in the pond! You can often see them at the top of the water on a sunny day! There’s also plenty of bass! We have 4 ducks who are full of personality! Charlie, our male, and 3 females that w

name: Cozy Cabin, Spa Hot Tub! 5 min to S. Asheville
description:
Rustic cabin surrounded by nature and close to everything Asheville has to offer.
Relax and heal in our 34 Jet Spa Therapy hot tub.

Conveniently located near the Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Estate, downtown Asheville, and the Asheville Regional Airport -- all within 11 miles.

Cable TV, Ultra Hi-Speed Wifi, and Roku TV for streaming.

The space
Toddler play area with slide and climbing wall.

name: Private elevator, Roof top Terrace, New, Luxury Townhome
description:
This freshly updated townhome located in Asheville's South Slope Brewery District is the perfect place to call home for exploring downtown and beyond. World class breweries including Wicked Weed, Green Man, Burial, Hi-Wire, Bhramari, and more are all within a few blocks of your front door. The best Asheville restaurants and shops are a 15-minute or less walk away. When you've had your fill, retreat home and let the four story townhome's private elevator take you up to the second floor, where you can kick back on the Italian leather sofa while finding something to watch on the 70” TV.

On the third floor, heated bathroom floors will comfort weary feet and both bedrooms have supremely comfortable king size 14” thick memory foam mattresses to greet you when you're finally ready for bed. The top floor offers a twin daybed with trundle, perfect for families and groups to spread out to their own private sanctuaries. Once you're well rested in the morning, the fully equipped kitchen

name: Charming duplex 2 miles from downtown
description:
Lovely home 2 miles from the heart of downtown Asheville. 5 to 10 minute walk from numerous shops and restaurants of Merrimon avenue. Botanical garden and Greenway 10 minute walk away. Short 15-minute drive to the Blue Ridge parkway and numerous hikes and waterfalls.

The space
Charming artist bungalow full of natural light and plants. A warm inviting house for your stand Asheville.

Guest access
Entire home

description:
Located just ten minutes from downtown Asheville, 20 minutes to the Biltmore Estate, and a short walk to the Blue Ridge Parkway, the Woodland House is a true one of a kind mountain experience! Enjoy mountain sunsets surrounded by nature in the luxurious hot tub. Nestled in an old growth forest, this artisan built reclaimed 1853 log cabin has hand hewn timbers, hard wood floors, all the modern conveniences, plus an expansive outdoor living space. You don't want to miss this one....

Inside you find a beautiful and inviting queen bed, spacious bathroom, and plenty of natural light. There is a long descending pathway with stone steps--please see the pictures in our profile.

The space

It is stocked with a mini-fridge, microwave, coffee maker, glasses, dishes, and silverware. We also offer filtered water, award-winning locally roasted Mountain Air coffee, and snack bars. It's a quick 15 minute drive to downtown, the Biltmore estate, and Asheville Regional Airport. It's 3 minutes to the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway, the North Carolina Arboretum and river access. The neighborhood is a small, quiet, welcoming community that boasts a family friendly neighborhood park with a pump track and hiking/biking trail access into Pisgah National Forest.

The space

Guests have a short walk up a quiet tree-lined street to reach Haywood Road, the center of West Asheville, with its restaurants, bars, breweries and shops. Downtown Asheville and the up-and-coming South Slope neighborhoods are only 5 miles away. Wake up to birds chirping and wind down listening to the creek and relaxing in the back yard.

The space
The guest suite is in the lower level of our home. It includes a private entrance, queen size bed, a table for two, and a private bathroom, all separated from the main home by a locked door. Appliances available include a mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker and hot water heater. description:

You'll be enchanted by the peacefulness of country living while being barely over 5 minutes from downtown Asheville and its spectacular dining, festivals, breweries, live music and shows.

And when you're ready to explore, all Asheville has to offer is literally within minutes' drive: Downtown is 7 minutes away, the Blue Ridge Parkway is 8 minutes, and the Biltmore estate just 10 minutes.

This bright, open floorplan home is one of the earliest-constructed residences in our neighborhood and has been updated with a comfortable and welcoming mid-century modern style. The space

description:
My home is technically in Woodfin, which is 2 minutes to the Asheville borderline. But you don't have to deal with the continuous traffic of tourists or hard to find parking spots like Asheville. Surrounded by trees, this is a unique property because you feel enclosed by nature. The room is small but clean. I have spent time at Airbnb's across the globe and some of them were filthy​--it was disconcerting. I don't have any domestic animals, so if you have allergies, you are set.

The space
I am a world-class massage therapist. You can schedule a session during your stay.

Guest access
Den, kitchen, bedroom and of course the bathroom. You are free to do your laundry as well I just ask to please bring no meat/fish into my home. Dairy and eggs are okay.

Other things to note
Since my home is off the main street, it is quiet and has a restful feeling.

description:

We are centrally located in South Asheville just 10 minutes from the Asheville Airport, Blue Ridge Parkway, French Broad River, multiple hiking trails and less than 20 minutes from Downtown Asheville, the Biltmore Estate, and the River Arts District.

The space
Check in 4pm and Check out 11am. We observe quiet time from 10p - 6a. Beach towels and picnic blanket are located in the apartment.

Self contained apartment and private yard. Paved and gravel parking area.

name: East Asheville Home with Superb Mountain Views
description:
Experience the splendor of the Blue Ridge Mountain skies from your deck or front porch, just a 14 minute drive from downtown Asheville, 16 minutes to the Biltmore Estate and less than 20 minutes from Black Mountain.

The deck features views of the Mountains to Sea trail and Blue Ridge Parkway. All photos of views in this listing are taken from our back deck.

Your Blue Ridge Mountain adventure awaits, and we'd be honored to host you!

The space

LBGTQ+ friendly.
We host all walks of life here.
Welcome to Asheville!

No Smoking

hostess speaks Spanish fairly well and likes to practice. Hostess lives in house on opposite side of living room with private bath. Loves to share cooking and food if appropriate. Safe and friendly neighborhood
Security camera outside and motion sensor outside lights
tranquil property with a lot of landscape,she- shed with furniture
For relaxation there is a deluxe massage chair
Parking off the road
Has a large deck with table and chairs (except winter)
We are very close to downtown, restaurants,breweries, Biltmore house (you can walk to breweries and restaurants.

The space
You will have your own private space separate from the rest of the house.Complete with a kitchenette with a coffee maker,microwave,mini fridge/freezer,toaster oven.Comfortable queen size bed,bath with a shower. TV and Internet with Amazon prime video and Hulu
Plenty of closet space for your belongings

Guest access
The back yard as well as the back room in our home,is yours to use during your stay.

name: Mountain Escape~Hike and Hot Tub Resort~Suite 1
description:
Sit on the front porch to catch amazing sunsets. The screened in back porch is where you can catch the sunrise, relax on the couch and read a book with the sounds of nature.
Your living room with working fireplace is always warm and cozy. Dining area seats 6 comfortably.
A full kitchen is available if you need to prepare a meal or snacks, especially if you are planning to stay a while.
Your bedroom awaits with all the things needed for a good night sleep. Pet fee of $20 per pet/ per day.

The space
The Glenway House is located in North Asheville's Beaverdam area. This area boasts a beautiful Lake and back trails to the Blue ridge Parkway. This quite secluded residence is 12 minutes from downtown Asheville. Sit on the front porch to catch amazing sunsets. The screened in back porch is where you can catch the sunrise, relax on the couch and read a book with the sounds of nature. A full kitchen is available if you need to prepare a meal or snacks. Win

name: Detached Guest House, Private,Walkable W.Asheville
description:
RARE detached suite in the heart of W. Asheville ideal keeping a safe distance. Short walk to breweries, music and restaurants on Haywood Rd. Our spot is on a quiet residential street. Newly renovated with queen bedroom, full bathroom. The separate living room has a sofa that converts into a queen bed. Private deck. The space is on the 2nd floor of our detached garage, meaning private entry and no shared walls or floors for extra privacy and easy social distance safety from hosts. No Pets

The space
From our off street parking, follow the lighted path and stairs up to the second story entrance of our detached garage. A rare find in Asheville city limits, it is one of the few permitted units in a structure completely detached from our house. There are no shared walls or floors with our living spaces so you will enjoy private entry and added privacy, peace and quiet.
Enjoy your private lattice screened deck where you can relax in the shade of the surroundi

name: Downtown Asheville with Great Views & Sunsets
description:
This quaint bungalow was recently remodeled & is in a prime walk able downtown Asheville location. It has a large front porch, where you can relax on a glider couch or two rocking chairs while looking at downtown Asheville & amazing sunsets. Both bedrooms have brand new mattresses & each have two windows with black out blinds. The front living area has a mini fridge, couch, TV & two more windows. The bathroom has a full tub/shower & also has a window. Super Clean and convenient location.

The space
The Hazzard Street Hacienda is a quaint 1928 remodeled bungalow with approximately 1000 sq ft with great views of downtown Asheville and killer sunsets from the front porch. The rental includes 2 bedrooms, 1 full bathroom, a Den/living room that also serves as a kitchenette. Extra effort has been put into the remodel and furnishing process to help ensure your stay is comfortable.

There is designated parking in a upper gravel drive that will easily acco

name: Earthy & Spacious Private Bungalow
description:
One bedroom, one bath apartment located in the front of my beautifully restored 1920s bungalow in downtown Asheville

The space
My home is decorated with a mix of modern and vintage furniture, with art I've collected from friends and some I've done myself. The main rooms have vaulted ceilings, and are bright and spacious. The front porch is the perfect spot to enjoy your mornings overlooking the neighborhood street. All in all, the perfect retreat for two people.

name: Bear-a-dise Found
description:
Absolutely adorable and totally remodeled apartment overlooking the pool area of the Bear Creek RV park & Campground. This place is fairly private and perfect for two people or a family with children. You can even bring your fur baby for an additional charge. Swimming pool, playground, dog walk, and more located on the property.

The space
We have a queen bed in the bedroom and two futons to sleep 2 more people comfortably in the living room.

name: The Cozy Cottage Idyllic for Social Distancing
description:
The Cozy Cottage has gorgeous long range views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Our guests love having the illusion of seclusion just minutes away from all modern conveniences. A quiet refuge that sits on about an acre of wooded property where you can relax, regroup and plan the adventures awaiting you just minutes from the front door. The cottage has been completely updated, furnished and stocked with everything you may need for your total comfort and enjoyment. Your next retreat awaits...

The space
20 minutes to downtown Asheville. 15 minutes to Asheville Regional Airport. 10 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway. 10 minutes to grocery, gas and food.

Guest access
The entire top floor of the Cozy Cottage is yours to enjoy. (The downstairs is an unoccupied, unfinished basement that we hope to remodel next year.) Upstairs functions well as a spacious, one bedroom unit with a massive deck overlooking stunning mountain views. It is a perfect place

name: Maxwell Cottage / with Hot Tub / Mountain View
description:
Only 10 minutes from Downtown Asheville, Maxwell's location combines the quiet feeling of mountain surroundings with the closeness to the hustle and bustle of Asheville. There is easy access to our home all year long.

The cottage also has a new 6 person hot tub for your enjoyment!

Maxwell is a 1300 Sq. Ft cottage home that offers all of the updated conveniences of modern living (Keurig, flat screen tv, internet) while giving you the experience and coziness of a country style living.

Other things to note
Hot tub: If guests choose to use the hot tub, we would appreciate it if they could treat the water with a pre-measured dose of “shock” after every 2 days of use. This will help us to maintain the water quality for all of our guests.

name: Complete private suite - Sierra Nevada, Asheville
description:
Equidistant between Sierra Nevada Brewery and downtown Asheville, this is a private downstairs suite of rooms with a private entrance through the garage and a large amount of space. There is a sitting/TV area, a dining area with kitchenette, a comfortable queen bedroom and a full bathroom. Fifteen minutes from Sierra Nevada, 10 minutes to the airport, and 20 minutes to downtown Asheville, the house is in a lovely suburban setting close to dining and all that the area has to offer.

The space
Houses here are on an acre of land and you are welcome to walk the neighborhood. The suite has a refrigerator, microwave, Keurig coffeemaker, 50" television, and a lovely 4-poster queen bed.

name: Asheville Master Bedroom with Ensuite Private Bath
description:
You will enjoy your own private bedroom and private full bath in this shared West Asheville townhouse - just 2 miles from city center and 1 mile from fun and hip Haywood Rd. You can walk to the Asheville Adventure Park for an afternoon zip-lining or mountain biking, or to the Crown Plaza Resort, for tennis, golf, salt water pool, fitness center, and spa. You’ll be just 5 min from New Belgium Brewery and the colorful River Arts District. The deck is a great spot for breakfast whatever you choose!

The space
The house features dark hardwood floors throughout downstairs and brand new soft carpet upstairs. The stainless appliances are sleek and clean. The counters are gorgeous granite and provide tons of workspace if you like to cook. The deck is the best spot to enjoy breakfast or even a romantic dinner whether you cook or order out.

Guest access
Feel free to use the kitchen, half bath down stairs (in addition to your own private full bath), de

name: East Asheville Abode near Historic Downtown
description:
Entire, private apartment in quiet residential neighborhood with private entrance. Space includes private bathroom, bedroom, and living room with TV, Keurig coffeemaker, microwave, and mini-refrigerator. Street parking is free. This apartment is cleaned and sanitized according to CDC guidelines.

7 minute drive from both Downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Parkway!

The space
Guests have a private entrance with keypad entry. This apartment is located in a quiet, residential neighborhood that borders the Blue Ridge Parkway/Mountain To Sea Trail. There is access to the parkway, by foot, from the neighborhood (about a 15 minute hike from the apartment). It's a 30 minute hike to the Folk Art Center or to the Haw Creek Overlook.
Other destinations nearby include the Biltmore House (5 miles), downtown Asheville (4.5 miles), the Asheville Mall (2.5 miles), WNC Nature Center (2 miles), Highland Brewing Co. (3.6 miles), and New Belgium Brewery (4 .7 mile

name: Private apartment near Blue Ridge Parkway
description:
This private basement apartment is 620 sq. ft. and includes a living room, kitchen, bedroom & bathroom. We do live upstairs but have been told that the sound doesn’t carry, so you can enjoy the peace and quiet. Access entrance with your own private door code. There are a few steps from the parking area to the ground level entrance. A backup power generator keeps the power on all the time.
Our property is a tobacco, e-cigarettes and alcohol-free location. Pets are not permitted.

The space
The apartment has WiFi and cable TV with DVR. Bedroom has a queen size bed. Bathroom has a tub/shower combination. Kitchen has a fridge, coffee maker, microwave, electric skillet, crock-pot, dishes and coffee fixings for your use, however, with so many wonderful restaurants in the area you may find you will enjoy dining out rather than do any of your own cooking. (Please note, there is not a stove or oven)

This is a quiet location. The property does have

name: Bohemian Bungalow
description:
Quaint home located just minutes from Breweries, Aboretum, Shopping Outlet, Airport, Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Estate, and so much more. This home is here for convenience! Pets welcome!

The space
Cute home located for convenience. Fairly private area minutes to I26and I40.

name: New luxury condo in heart of downtown Asheville~55 S.Market St. #207
description:
This new luxury condo is a spacious 1 bedroom/1 bathroom residence with an open kitchen, dining room, living room, and balcony. It provides the comfort and privacy of home while guests can also enjoy the convenience of having staff on hand to answer any questions and help with all guest needs. New appliances, bedding, and furniture create a stunning accommodation for you and your loved ones to relax and enjoy yourself. Upon arrival you will also find the unit fully stocked with linens and towels and all of the essentials you will need during your stay.
Located in the heart of downtown Asheville and nestled in the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains, this condo offers guests the best of both worlds. Only a moments walk to Asheville's local restaurants, breweries, shops, and galleries you are in the center of the city while also able to enjoy the mountains that surround you. You'll fall in love with this new condominium and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Ashevill

name: Eclectic Bungalow, 5min Biltmore&10min SouthSlope
description:
PRIVATE STAY Bungalow, Biltmore Estate is a 5 minute drive. Ten minutes from the breweries at South Slope, and just a few more to Downtown. Less than 15 minutes to West Asheville and the River Arts District.

Eclectic mid-century modern design. Organic cotton sheets and towels. Wifi. TV free space. French press coffee and tea, complimentary. Access to full kitchen, living room, library, desk, boardgames.

Full size futon available. Twin bedroom. One bathroom. Flagstone patio and fireplace.

The space
1945 Bungalow with midcentury inspired interior and lots of indoor plants. Open kitchen. Small library of books. No TV. Vegetable garden, herb garden and stone patio. Handicap accessible Shower.

Guest access
Guest may access from the front and back doors. Garden space. There is off-street parking for 2-3 vehicles. Full size kitchen. Two bedrooms. Living-room. Bathroom.

Other things to note
Then reviews

name: Newly renovated charming condo in Historic King James Building #6
description:
Charming and newly renovated 1 bedroom/1 bathroom condo on the 3rd level of the historic King James Building. With incredible views of downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Mountains, you can also walk down to the first floor to grab a coffee, pastry, or sandwich at the City Bakery or enjoy dinner in the restaurant on the first floor.
Located in North Asheville, guests can enjoy neighborhood restaurants, yoga studios, and several shops while also enjoying the convenience of being less than 1 mile from downtown.

The space
Charming and newly renovated 1 bedroom/1 bathroom condo on the 3rd level of the historic King James Building. With incredible views of downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Mountains, you can also walk down to the first floor to grab a coffee, pastry, or sandwich at the City Bakery or enjoy dinner in the restaurant on the first floor.

The

name: The Burton Street Cottage, West Asheville
description:
Modern, NC Green Built urban cottage located in West Asheville within walking distance of many great restaurants and bars and less than 3 miles to downtown Asheville or the River Arts District. There are 2 designated off-street parking spaces, and the home is accessed thru a keypad with a code designated specifically for you. I will be available to answer any questions you may have or, provide suggestions for where you may wish to visit!

Guest access
Full access to the home with the exception of the 3rd floor master suite (locked with Owner items) and an entryway closet which is used for owner storage.

Other things to note
Pet friendly - Asheville is quickly becoming dog city USA and so bringing Fido is a top priority for many visitors. As such, up to 2 dogs is permitted at The Burton Street Cottage.

Smoking within the home is absolutely prohibited.

name: New, luxury 1 bdr/1 bath condo in heart of downtown Asheville~55. S. Market #107
description:
