You'll fall in love with this new condominium and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Ashevill

name: Master Room: Mountainside Private Room & Pvt. Bath
description:
Comfortable master bedroom in our mountain home sleeps two in a queen bed. We have lowest cleaning fee in town, no security deposit, and private, not shared bathroom. This room in our house is the Pisgah Room. Private bathroom not shared with anyone, porch view, and only minutes from Biltmore Estate & downtown Asheville. Only 3 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway, 2 miles off of I-26. Room also has mini-fridge, TV with Roku, & electric kettle! Great deal, don’t get stuck paying more elsewhere!

The space
This Master bedroom offers plenty of space for two people, with a queen size bed and in oversize chair for relaxing. You will have your own private bathroom with a sink, toilet, and bathtub shower. This room looks out front of our house into the surrounding forest with green views of trees and birds.

There is a microwave, a mini fridge, and an electric kettle for making instant coffee or tea. We do not provide coffee supplies or bottled water. So be sur

name: Walkable, Sunny West Asheville Studio
description:
Come make yourself at home in our bright studio apartment just a couple blocks from West Asheville’s cafés, bookstores, coffee shops, restaurants, breweries, music venues and more!

The space
The recently renovated ground-level studio apartment is open, bright and always meticulously cleaned. The studio holds inviting, contemporary and eclectic furnishings in an updated mid-century house - designed in hopes that each guest would feel the warmth of home. It has a patio with a bistro table and there is a large back yard available for use. The apartment has a separate entrance with a personalized key code for each guest. The studio is an ideal space for single travelers or couples with a soft, comfortable queen-size bed. The futon couch opens into an additional twin bed. A Pack-and-play is also available upon request. The apartment has a full bath with shower and tub, stocked with everything you'll need during your stay: quality shampoo, conditioner, body wash, loti

name: Woodfin Retreat By Riverside Park - Entire House
description:
Enjoy a private stay near the river at this gorgeous 2 bedroom house. Take the opportunity to go tubing down the French Broad River and be close to everything Asheville has to offer! Located conveniently about 10 minutes away from Downtown, River Arts District, and West Asheville all of the while maintaining the privacy of a suburban house.

This house is less than a 10 minute walk away from the upcoming Silverline Park opening this year in 2020 that runs along the French Broad River

The space
This vacation house has 2 bedrooms. All beds are equipped with queen-sized mattresses. There are two separate bathrooms with one being privately attached to the master bedroom. The house includes a very spacious kitchen complete with granite counters. Dining tables and cookware and utensils are also provided.

Guest access
You will have access to the entire house.

name: Purple butterfly home, Mtn Views private suite
description:
Studio apartment in newly built purple butterfly home (2019),
at end of quiet street.

Yours, ours and the public’s safety and health is important to us. Proof of fully vaccinated against Covid-19 required.

Close to downtown Asheville.

Walkable to trendy Biltmore Village: shops, eateries and breweries.

Short Uber to downtown.

Near Blue Ridge Parkway

Perfect couples get away

Baby equipment available

Mini fridge, coffee pot and microwave

We follow CDC cleaning guidelines

The space
Cozy studio apartment with mini fridge, microwave and coffee pot.

Following CDC hygiene guidelines.

Guest access
Downstairs of home, yard, swings, outside chairs, table and hammock. The hammock is very comfy. It is in the bedroom closet. Feel free to hang it up on the hooks under the deck. Please bring it in if it's going to rain, or when yo

name: Asheville Fresh Mountain Air
description:
Quaint stone & rock cottage (1400 sq. ft. space) conveniently located 3 miles from downtown Avl and Weaverville; close to I-26 and I-240; separate entrance to newly redecorated 2-bedroom apartment; owners live above the ground-level apartment; plenty of parking. Close to the blue ridge parkway. 30 minutes to Wolf Laurel ski resort.

The space
There is another apartment above your space; quiet hours observed after 11 pm. Guest apartment is totally refurnished full kitchen. If you want to change the temperature let us know we be glad to. The thermostat is up stair in our private space. From time to time we use the upstairs back door open and closes to outside. Don’t be alarmed you won’t see us just hear us closing and opening the door. We will never intrude on your privacy. P.S. there is a step down entering the door please be careful. Because this is a basement apartment, please expect to hear the pitter-patter of our feet and definitely hear voices and movement

name: Hidden House in the Mountains
description:
Enjoy Asheville with a mountain feel while having close proximity to downtown.

Note- This is a tobacco free property, inside and out.

The space
Come enjoy this Zen House with all the cabin feels and mountain views just 13 min from downtown Asheville! This house has been remodeled, updated, and ready to enjoy!

This private residence will be yours alone while you are here.
Self check-in

Guest access
A small utility room in the kitchen and one in the basement are locked without guest access.

Other things to note
Please be advised that pricing is set for 4 ppl
Additional guests are $30pp/night. There is outside camera monitoring, please be honest. We gauge our supplies based on the number of guests.

name: Asheville Urban Oasis at Emma
description:
Built brand new for you! We asked ourselves and our guests exactly what we would want in a vacation rental built from scratch, then we customized the Urban Oasis to make your Asheville experience as fun and memorable as possible. Amazing open floor plan, full kitchen, soundproofed rooms, large deck, private fenced yard, hot tub, fire ring and picnic area make this the perfect vacation destination only 8 minutes from downtown Asheville, 6 from the River Arts District and West Asheville.

The space
This house has a master suite with its own bath, and a second bathroom that can be accessed from the 2nd bedroom or the main room. Each room has its own heating and air unit for your comfort, and the bathrooms feature radiant heat floors that automatically turn on when the weather gets chilly. The large deck and yard with hot tub, fire ring, and picnic table are secluded by a privacy fence. Pets, kids, friends and good times are all welcome. Come enjoy our gorgeous town n

name: Our Mountain Paradise
description:
Luxurious, private, and convenient to downtown Asheville. Enjoy mountain views and privacy in a space made for entertaining while being minutes from Asheville. Lots of common space, indoor fireplace, 3 deck spaces, screened porch, outdoor firepit, and a gym with sauna. Great location for honeymooners, families, or business retreats.

The space
Kitchen fully stocked with cooking implements, dishes, and appliances. Wi-Fi, cable TV with internet capability, and Bose Bluetooth speaker in common room for music. Charcoal Grill and outdoor propane fire pit.

name: Great Location in W. Asheville,minutes to downtown
description:
I respond to booking requests usually within minutes or an hour or two max. Thanks!

Close to West Asheville and 10 minutes to downtown. Nice private basement apartment with off street parking. Great king size bed with Roku TV. Since it is a basement apartment, there is only one window, but I do have a screen door which allows light in.

The space
There are some personal items in the bedroom closet and living room, etc.

Guest access
Entire apartment.

Other things to note
Early check-in and late check-outs cannot be accommodated. It makes things difficult as far as getting the apartment cleaned in between stays. Sometimes, an hour each way is ok, but anything more is just too difficult to manage/

name: The Dogwood House + King + 4-Mls to DT Asheville
description:
Professionally Managed

Professionally Cleaned

Linens provided

3 bedroom 2.5 baths

2 King, 1 Queen, 1 twin, 1 trundle twin

5 minutes to (Super Hip) West Asheville

9 minutes to Downtown

20 minutes to the Airport

13 min's to the Biltmore Estate

Uber and Lyft friendly

Fully fenced backyard

Fast WiFi

Washer dryer.

The space
After enjoying all Asheville has to offer, put your feet up at the DogWood House and recharge, relax, read a book, watch a movie, or just sleep in. With our brand new King mattresses and high end linens you'll not regret giving yourself a great stay here!!

Guest access
You'll have access to the entire house and yard.

Other things to note
Please do not book until reading through the house rules. Thanks!!!

Parking is limited at this property so no more than 4 ca

name: CHARMING, RELAXING , GREAT LOCATION AND VIEWS
description:
Lovely downstairs 1300 square ft private area with lots of light and beautiful views. We are conveniently located less than 10 minutes to downtown, Biltmore house, Parkway and more. This 2 bedroom, 1 bath with eating area includes a refrigerator, microwave and Keurig. Coffee is provided . Have your morning coffee on the patio and take in the views.

The space
Minimum stay 2 -3 nights. No pets allowed. No smoking. Linens available upon request for additional guest that may sleep on couch.

Guest access
Guests area is downstairs only with no access to upstairs.

name: Downtown Asheville Condo w/ Patio + Amenities
description:
Whether you’re a beer drinker, a mountain hiker, or a canopy cruiser, this 1-bedroom, 1-bath condo is the perfect resting place after an adventurous day in Asheville! Located in the heart of downtown, the updated vacation rental offers a fully equipped kitchen, a community terrace with views of the hills, and a modern living space to call home during your visit. Walk to nearby restaurants and breweries, take a stroll through the North Carolina Arboretum, and snap a photo at the Biltmore Estate!

The space
Central A/C | Free Off-Street Parking | Free WiFi | 860 Sq Ft

This updated condo is a great choice for a group of friends, a couple, or a business traveler looking to be within walking distance to all the action in Asheville!

Master Bedroom: King Bed | Living Room: Queen Sleeper Sofa

OUTDOOR LIVING: Shared terrace w/ seating & views, private patio w/ seating (backs up to parking lot), shared grills, shared common area w/ kitchen

name: Stylish and Comfy Home Minutes to Downtown
description:
Tucked away on a hill in a quiet residential area is our peaceful 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom home away from home. Here you’ll find room to breathe, plenty of natural light, and just a touch of what’s familiar. We’ve made a peaceful place for you to relax, so you can focus on the next adventure. Why pile everyone into a hotel room (or two) when you can breathe the mountain air without stepping on any toes?

The space
Asheville promises stunning natural beauty, delicious local food and beverages, and a thriving arts culture. You’re going to want to take it all in, kick back, and stay awhile. Our 4 bedroom home is perfect for large groups or families who want to be close to everything, but with plenty of room for everyone.

Stay with us, and you will be just 10 mins from Asheville’s lively downtown with easy access to the Biltmore and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Our quiet retreat is ideal for shorter trips looking to add a lot of value, or long getaways with worry-f

name: Walk to downtown in Artist Home, newly remodeled!
description:
Large private newly remodeled bedroom and bath with private entry in partially finished basement. Sitting area with coffee available. Microwave and fridge. Walkable to downtown, south slope and river arts district. Dedicated off-street parking for one car. Quiet old neighborhood. I'm usually hands off but available to you if need me.

All artwork, clothing and jewelry are for sale. I go by the honor system, you can leave a check or cash when you leave or just get in touch!

The space
There are some wide but steep steps outside leading to your apartment, It is well lit.

Guest access
The down stairs has a private entry with key code, small sitting area with a coffee cart and very large bedroom. Enter through the pink door!

Other things to note
You are welcome to walk on the grass outside the fence, but it can be slippery and I recommend that you come through the gates and walk down the steps to be safe.

name: Modern Townhome by Downtown Asheville
description:
Explore Asheville and Come Home to our Modern, Comfortable & Convenient 3BR Townhome.

The space
Our SkyLoft Townhome has an open floor plan, 3 bedrooms and 2.5 baths with a large open living space on the main floor. We can sleep 6 guests comfortably. Two private balconies have picturesque views of both downtown and mountains. The interior is finished with stainless appliances, granite counter tops, and wood floors. Unique and high-end furnishings make this a comfortable and stylish home that you won't want to leave! For remote works, our home features a desk area and a printer! Off-street parking for 2 cars (1 within garage) and lots of free, on-street parking is available right outside your front door. Our home is 3 floors, with the garage in the basement, the living space on the middle floor and all bedrooms are on the top floor, along with both full baths and the laundry room. You'll love the layout and the comfortable & stylish furnishings of our home!

name: Dana's Mountain Escape of Asheville, NC
description:
Dana's Mountain Escape is a two-story home in a country setting, but only 1.5 miles from major shopping and dining. It features off-road parking, circle drive, a large yard, fire pit, picnic table, and small goldfish pond. Inside is recently renovated, with mini-split A/C & heat, laminate flooring downstairs, and hardwood upstairs. Covered front and rear porches. Fully equipped kitchen. I-26 and Asheville airport are 3 miles away.

The space
Dana's Mountain Escape is over 100 years old, but has been completely renovated. Downstairs features a kitchen, laundry, dining room, family room and a bedroom with full bath. The second floor features two bedrooms, a kid's room with roll-away bed, and full bath. The 6'5'' upstairs ceilings give it a cozy feel. The kitchen has all the utensils needed for cooking.

Guest access
You'll have the whole house to yourself, plus a spacious yard and private parking.

name: Private entrance close to BRP, RAD and West AVL
description:
Welcome! This is a newly renovated walkout basement space close to all the cool stuff here in Asheville. I have a parking space just for you with a river stone walkway to the entrance at the back of the house. I have a quiet and restful space waiting for you to recharge in after rafting down the river less than a mile away.

Covid policies - long pause between guests 48hr+and sanitizing everything including blankets and pillows. I have Lysol and hand sanitizer. Forgot your mask? I have extras.

The space
This is a studio space with mini fridge, microwave, bar with stools and coffee station. Memory foam mattress and private bath. No common or shared areas and a private entrance.

Guest access
You will get a keyless entry door code for access.

Other things to note
This is a renovated space and there is a staircase with two way locks on it at the top of the stairs like you would see in a hotel room. Your space

name: Simple comforts of home conveniently located
description:
Simple comforts of home are provided in our 1450 sq. ft. , two bedrooms, two and a half bath townhouse which is conveniently located in a quiet neighborhood, just minutes from downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Parkway. With all the amenities of home, you're sure to enjoy all that Asheville and the surrounding area has to offer.
This is a brand new listing and we are new to hosting! We are excited to launch this rental property and are eager to receive our first guests.

The space
The townhouse has two bedrooms upstairs, each furnished with a queen size bed and its own full bathroom. A half bathroom is located downstairs. Laundry Room includes a full-sized washer and dryer, laundry detergent/fabric softener, bleach, iron and ironing board.
The living room is furnished with a full size couch, love seat, recliner, a coffee table. A wall mounted TV has basic cable, Apple TV, Netflix and Hulu. Fast internet wi-fi is provided.
There is a ful

name: Mountain Air - Peace, Comfort, and Convenience!
description:
Quiet, comfortable, fully-equipped private apartment. Five minutes to Blue Ridge Parkway, 15 mins to downtown Asheville. Perfect home base for a vacation to our beautiful, fun, relaxing mountain town. Come visit and enjoy the mountain air. We are fully inclusive, pay living wages, and celebrate diversity. Se habla español.

The space
You will have a private entrance, two bedrooms - one with a Queen bed and one with two Twin XL beds that can be slid together, fully equipped kitchen, full bathroom with linens and a bidet, large TV with Roku, two recliners, couch and loveseat, rolling coffee table, picnic table and rocking chairs on the covered front porch facing the mountains, and a custom-made dining table with four swivel chairs. Enjoy the peace and quiet on your porch or sit outside and stay dry during a thunderstorm, take in a movie on the Blu-Ray player, sip coffee or cook a full dinner in the full kitchen or on the gas grill - pretty much all the comforts of h

name: Charming Cape Cod Close to it All
description: Delightful light-filled Cape Cod in pleasant, safe neighborhood close to all that Asheville has to offer. 1 Mile to the Blue Ridge Parkway and 4.8 miles to the heart of downtown ($8 Uber/Lyft). Fully updated and remodeled in 2018, this 1,600 SF 4 bedroom 2 bath home is a charming and relaxing retreat. I will personally welcome you to the home and answer any questions you may have.

name: West Asheville Chalet- newly renovated- private
description:
Charming and wonderfully private backyard chalet conveniently located in the heart of West Asheville, just a short walk to its whimsical downtown district. Absolutely brand new interior. Fully furnished and amenities, with a focus on the natural! We've painted the walls using zero VOC paint, custom crafted curtains in the windows, and we have a very comfortable, organic mattress in the bedroom. It's your own quiet, cozy haven as close as you could want to all Asheville has to offer!

The space
Currently we have a queen sized bed in the bedroom, and can add another floor mattress for parties larger than two!
A kitchenette to make coffee, tea and a continental breakfast.

Guest access
Guests can use the entire guest house including the kitchenette.

name: New luxury 1 bdr/1 bath condo heart of downtown Asheville~55 South Market #214
description:
This new luxury condo is a spacious 1 bedroom/1 bathroom residence with an open kitchen, dining room, living room, and balcony. It provides the comfort and privacy of home while guests can also enjoy the convenience of having staff on hand to answer any questions and help with all guest needs. New appliances, bedding, and furniture create a stunning accommodation for you and your loved ones to relax and enjoy yourself. Upon arrival you will also find the unit fully stocked with linens and towels and all of the essentials you will need during your stay.
Located in the heart of downtown Asheville and nestled in the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains, this condo offers guests the best of both worlds. Only a moments walk to Asheville's local restaurants, breweries, shops, and galleries you are in the center of the city while also able to enjoy the mountains that surround you. You'll fall in love with this new condominium and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Ashevill

name: Walk to hip West AVL & RAD / Good vibes / VIEW!!!
description:
Your studio includes:
-Spacious 600 sq ft top level of our house
-Private deck with downtown mountain views
-King size bed with high quality linens
-Luxury bathroom with stand-up tile shower, dual vanities, and separate toilet room
-Smart TV (no cable)
-Google Assistant
-Games & books
-Yoga mat
-Beverage station stocked with mini fridge, coffee maker, coffee & tea, filtered water, glassware, bottle opener, and local beer & snacks
-(1) Off-street parking spot (mid-size SUV or smaller)

The space
Enjoy good vibes in the Sunrise Highrise. Comfortable studio with downtown mountain views, local art, and luxurious bathroom. Optimal location between hip West Asheville and River Arts District for you to experience a plethora of food/beer/music/art, all within enjoyable walking distance or a quick lift. Top level guest studio of clean modern home in safe, well-maintained neighborhood. We welcome all!

Our home

name: The Aviary of West AVL, 3 miles from Downtown
description:
Come relax and unwind in your own peaceful and private apartment in the heart of West Asheville! We are so excited for you to come and experience all that Asheville has to offer from our second story apartment. We are located about 3 miles from downtown and walking distance to all that is happening in wonderful west Asheville.
The apartment is two bedrooms, one bathroom and features beautiful views of the blue ridge mountains. There is also outdoor space right outside of the dining room area.

The space
The true surprise is the peace and quiet you’ll experience within this centrally located apartment! And if downtown Asheville is where you’d like to spend the day, we are only 3 miles away. The famed River Arts District is an easy walk or drive of 2.5 miles, with the charm of the French Broad River flowing by. Two generous porches, one of which offers views of the Blue Ridge Mountains, are part of the charm of this two bedroom, one bathroom apartment that you

name: Luxury West AVL Apartment, 3 miles from Downtown
description:
Perfectly situated in West Asheville, our lovely apartment couples the charm of old world architecture with the modern comforts and decor of today. West Asheville, known for offering the most authentic Asheville experience, is brimming with pubs, artists, outstanding restaurants, and locally owned shops, and our 1 bedroom,king sized private apartment is the perfect home to explore it from. Gorgeous kitchen, welcoming den, and sumptuous walk in shower complete this perfect, private, apartment.

The space
The true surprise is the peace and quiet you’ll experience within this centrally located apartment! And if downtown Asheville is where you’d like to spend the day, we are only 3 miles away. The famed River Arts District is an easy walk or drive of 2.5 miles, with the charm of the French Broad River flowing by. Two generous porches, one of which offers views of the Blue Ridge Mountains, are part of the charm of this two bedroom, one bathroom apartment that you’ll b

name: Private Grove Park Suite near downtown Asheville!
description:
Located in the amazing Grove Park neighborhood right outside downtown Asheville, our 2 bedroom 1 bath basement apartment w/ private entrance is within quick walking or driving distance of both downtown (1.5 miles) and the famous Grove Park Inn (1 mile).

The space is a converted basement servants quarters with high ceilings, exposed brick and lots of original character.

Close to local restaurants like City Bakery, Bone & Broth, Jettie Rae's, Luella's BBQ and Taco Temple.

The space
This is a 1000 sq/ft walk-out, private basement apartment with two private bedrooms and a bathroom. Both bedrooms have a queen bed in them. There is also a common room with a sofa and dining table and a small kitchenette (microwave, coffee, water cooler, utensils, etc).

The large, flat back yard is open for use by guests.

This is a basement and we have kids, so there is the potential for some overhead noise. We try to stay as quiet as possible

name: 306 SW Condo Asheville - Historic Art Deco Gem!
description:
Stay in the historic SW Cafeteria Building! Built in 1929, the building is iconic art deco architecture, located in the center of downtown! The condo is spacious 1000 square feet with hard wood floors, exposed brick, and open light filled living/dining and kitchen. Highland Brewery taproom and high end food hall in commercial space on first floor and mezzanine. You can walk to everything downtown has to offer!

The space
306 SW Condo is located in one of Asheville's most treasured buildings, the S&W Cafeteria Building built in 1929 by premier art deco architect Douglas Ellington. The location is in the center of the city, with restaurants and the brewery district all within easy walking distance. This spacious condo has high end furnishings and features art work by local Asheville artists. The sofa pulls out to a very comfortable queen bed, with a memory foam mattress for extra guests.

name: Beautiful Tiny Home in our Flower Garden
description:
An elegant and well appointed tiny home with stainless steel appliances and a tiled shower, blue velvet couch and a comfy memory foam mattress up in the loft. Spacious and open with hardwood floors, this is a beautiful place for your retreat, business vacation, or sightseeing adventure.

The space
I purchased a 20” steel trailer bed and built a tiny home on top of it! Big windows and an open floor plan make this space seem bigger than it really is. The porch is a wonderful place to sit and have some morning tea as well. The tiny home is nestled in our flower garden and about 30 feet from our house. We are just outside of the city limits, about 15 minutes to downtown.

Guest access
The tiny home is all yours! You will pass through our garden to get to the tiny home, and you are welcome to explore the property, see the ducks if they are around and say hello to our dog Juniper.

Other things to note
UPDATE: we have insta

name: Private Suite Close to Biltmore and Asheville.
description:
Private suite with separate heat/air filtration system. Keyless, contactless entry.
Great location. About 1 mile to Biltmore Village and entrance to Biltmore Estate. Four miles to downtown Asheville.
Bedroom has a comfy king size bed and 55 in. tv with Netflix, Dish and other apps. Living room with 65" tv, fridge, microwave, coffee pot and lounging area with reclining couch also a pool table and darts. Patio with gas firepit and cornhole game. New in ground pool (must share w/owners.

The space
Large suite that has a private bedroom with king bed and 55 in. smart tv. Spacious living room with 65" smart tv along with a DVD player and some movies to choose from to watch. Dish, Netflix, Amazon prime apps and more. Fridge, microwave, coffee pot and lounging area with couch and pool table. Each room has it's own heat/air unit.
There are some snacks for our guests along with some games, movies, puzzle, dart game and a few books to enjoy.<

name: Wanderlust Lofts: The Sapphire, Downtown Haven
description:
The Sapphire is a 2 bedroom luxury loft in the heart of the South Slope of Downtown Asheville. (See additional listings & booking specials for Wanderlust Lofts on AirBnB & on our web site.) The Sapphire features high ceilings & expansive windows with a thoughtfully curated design inspired by the owner's love of Spain. The loft offers an unbeatable location, premium bedding, modern Italian kitchen cabinets, Fisher & Paykel appliances, Mid-century lighting, & artwork from the owner's world travels

Other things to note
If The Sapphire is booked for your travel dates, check out our other listing,
Wanderlust Lofts: The Opal
If you would like to book longer than 30 days or would like to book after August 31, please contact us!

name: Wanderlust Lofts: The Opal, Downtown Urban Retreat
description:
The Opal is 1 bedroom luxury loft in the heart of the South Slope of Downtown Asheville. (See additional listings & booking specials for Wanderlust Lofts on AirBnB and on our web site.) The Opal features high ceilings and expansive windows with a thoughtfully curated design inspired by the owner's love of Spain. The loft offers an unbeatable location, premium bedding, modern Italian kitchen cabinets, Fisher & Paykel appliances, Mid-century lighting, and artwork from the owner's world travels.

Other things to note
If The Opal is booked for your travel dates, take a look at our other loft, Wanderlust Lofts: The Sapphire
If you would like to book longer than 30 days or would like to book after August 31, please contact us!

name: The Gnome Home- a little more west, Asheville
description:
A five minute drive to fun and funky west Asheville's hip Haywood road full of restaurants, bars and local craft breweries and music venues. A 15 minute drive to downtown. This house however is slightly more in the country so more room to breathe. I have local and international art on the walls including many of my own pieces. I love the local art and music scene and would be happy to give you insider tips on where to go. You can have complete privacy or I am willing to interact/chat.

The space
You will be staying in the converted basement of my house which is ground level with windows on one side of the guest suite/apartment. I live upstairs with no children or pets and I am pretty quiet. You'll have lots of room all to yourself. You will have your own parking with 2 spaces. NO smoking or vaping of any substances inside or on the outside patio allowed. No outside guests allowed or parties. The ceilings are a little lower so if you are over six feet tall this p

name: Idyllic mountain cove farm minutes from downtown
description:
Newly constructed contemporary farmhouse in idyllic mountain cove minutes from downtown yet easy access to outdoor adventure. Situated on a former barn site and adjacent to a historic field stone silo the house affords modern amenities in a quiet picturesque blue ridge mountain cove. Ride your bike right out the door to iconic climbs, drive the Blue Ridge Parkway just 2.5 miles away, eat and drink in eclectic Asheville only to return to classic comfort and a warm fire indoors or out.

The space
Designed with the intention to optimize indoor/outdoor living. Vaulted ceilings afford natural light into the open kitchen, living, and dining areas. The upstairs master has a queen bed with additional sitting area complete with futon and on suite bath. The main downstairs bedroom has a queen bed with on suite bath with additional access via the common room. The third room is a bunk room with an upper single and lower double bed perfect for children. All rooms look

name: Hooper's Creek Retreat
description:
Simple, private and quiet entire home in lovely Hooper's Creek, NC. The home is newly remodeled and furnished with warm decor. There is big front porch with a porch swing to relax and take in the beautiful mountain views. This house can accommodate couples or the whole family comfortably! Located 30 minutes from downtown Asheville, 10 minutes from Asheville Airport and 15 minutes from Hendersonville. THIS IS A NON-SMOKING PROPERTY INSIDE

The space
There are 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms available. Each room has extra blankets for your comfort. Both bathrooms have extra towels and amenities in case you forgot anything! Please leave the Air Conditioner / Heater set between 70 & 78 degrees. The Wifi is active, and you will find the username and password in the welcome book once you have arrived on the property. The house has a fully functioning kitchen with a stove, microwave, oven and dishwasher for your convenience. Use of the washer and dryer is also

name: In-town Studio- 10 minute walk to center city
description:
Guests will enjoy this newly constructed en-suite studio space located in the heart of downtown Asheville. Just a 10 minute walk to the center city and South Slope, where you will find Asheville’s finest restaurants, breweries and entertainment. The property is a short drive to the blue ridge parkway to enjoy our many hiking trails and beautiful scenery as well as close to the famous Biltmore Estate. The neighborhood is quiet and safe, the perfect place to relax after a day of adventures.

The space
The studio is part of my home, but guests will have their own private entrance with keyless entry lock as well as a separate AC/heating unit. There is a full size bed with luxury linens, a large window allowing ample natural light during the day and black out curtains to ensure a restful night’s sleep.

There is a full size bathroom with a stand-up shower and beautiful custom slate tile. Shampoo and soap provided. Guests have a microwave as well as a mini

name: Historic Farmstead 5 min from Downtown Asheville
description:
Vacation in a 1920's farmhouse built by famed Asheville architect, Richard Sharp Smith's, daughter. Enjoy all the benefits of country living while being conveniently located within a 5 minute drive to downtown and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Decorated with antiquities to honor its' past, but recently updated with all new modern amenities. The White Smith House is a designer rental unlike any other! Enjoy modern Appalachia at its finest!!!

The space
The White Smith House is located in the original 1920's workshop of owner, Odd S. White, who was a prominent craft revival violin maker. Recently renovated, guests can enjoy their own separate entrance and isolated apartment from the rest of the property. Please note, I live in the main house above. The property is meant to be shared with guests. There is a designated patio for guests in the front entrance, and you're also welcome to use our back patio with a pond and grill.

Guest access
We let gue

name: In the country...but near Asheville!
description:
Within 7 miles of restaurants, craft breweries and shopping in downtown Asheville. Convenient to the Biltmore House, waterfalls, hiking trails & the Blue Ridge Parkway. Large comfortable home with 3 bedrooms/2 baths and space to host your family or another couple. Sit in rocking chairs on the front porch while enjoying a glass of wine and watching the evening sunset. Large kitchen and dining area are also joined by a screened in back porch-- perfect for a morning cup of coffee or breakfast.

The space
Comfortable and close to downtown Asheville...

name: Town Mountain Breeze - Top of the mountain, close to Asheville!
description:
Welcome to the top of Town Mountain!
Mountain splendor, close to downtown Asheville, and luxurious surroundings.....this is the place to create memories for a lifetime.
Town Mountain Breeze will deliver just that, and is a true breath of fresh air/
This destination has your vacation memories written all over it!

The space
Location:
Private home located in a private mountain community, at the crest of Town Mountain, just outside of downtown Asheville. App. 10 minutes outside of downtown Asheville, 30 minutes to Asheville Regional airport, 20 minutes to the gates of Biltmore Estate.

Accommodations:
(Sleeps 4) 2 bedroom, 2 full baths, 1 Half bath/Powder Rm
Occupancy Summary / Sleeps in beds: 4 Max. Occupancy: 4

Description:
Town Mountain Breeze is a comfortable mountain retreat, built for relaxation, with vaulted spaces, upscale finishes, and hard wood floors throughout. The great room, with gas fireplace,

name: Cozy Bungalow – Perfect for families!
description:
Entire house, convenient location minutes from downtown Asheville. This cozy 1920s bungalow nestled under majestic oak trees is a great kid-friendly home base for families or small groups. Watch the sunset and unwind after your day’s adventures from the treetop screen porch while your kids enjoy the slide, climbing wall and other play structures in the ¼ acre yard below. The property features a grilling area, firepit, and several decks and porches.

The space
Available technology includes high-speed Wifi, and although we do not have cable television, we do have Sling TV as well as Roku, so you can log into your Netflix and Hulu accounts to stream your favorite shows.
For those of you traveling with children, we have ample toys, activities, and games to keep them occupied, both inside and out.

Other things to note
There are 2 off-street parking spaces. Contact host directly to discuss if and how we can accommodate extra vehicles.
T

name: Beautiful Ridge Top Private basement apt, downtown
description:
Our newly remodeled spacious, very private, basement apartment with 9-foot ceilings is an enclave of peace and tranquility. Situated on a ridgetop forest-like setting with long range mountain views and absolutely no vis-à-vis with neighbors/owners, our space provides quiet privacy as well as close proximity to downtown. 1.2 miles from the heart of Asheville, a stay in our apartment allows you to enjoy our vibrant downtown, and the peace of BlueRidge Mountains. Please note that we live upstairs

The space
Features:
Large covered patio with dining for 4
Private keyless entry door
Off street parking
Sleeps 2 adults and one child
****We do have a provision for up to 2 more adults. We have a couch and a comfortable temperpedic camp cot that can be made up for guests over the 2 maximum number. The charge is $25. a night/per guest over the 2 guest max.****
Very well stocked kitchen (no oven – induction cooktop available)
Luxurious l

name: Relaxing Spacious Home  + ping pong, land, extras!
description:
Our beautiful home sits on 3 acres of terraced backyard, a creek, and a small pond - and it's in Asheville city limits. Perfect for families, a group of friends, or a romantic getaway. 5 mins to the Blue Ridge Parkway, Arboretum, and Asheville Outlets. 10 mins to Bent Creek hikes. 15 mins to the center of downtown. We live here during the week, and Airbnb mostly on the weekends to support our non-profit work with kids. Thanks for considering our place .. you'll love it here!

The space
We have a large wrap-around deck to enjoy the views. We offer a full kitchen, off street parking lot suitable for large vehicles/trailers, a luxurious bathroom with a jacuzzi bathtub, 4 hammocks, a big screen with Netflix and Amazon Prime, and Googl℮ Home with all the music you'd like.

Guest access
We like to play, so you will also have access to our large collection of board games, badminton, trampoline, slack line, climbing dome, and soccer.

name: Quiet Downtown Suite Steps Away from Downtown
description:
Spacious and cozy one bedroom suite with living space and private entry. The suite has its own quiet air conditioner/heater that is separate from the main home. It's an easy walk into downtown where you'll find great restaurants, breweries and boutique shopping only moments away. It's a short walk to coffee shops and grocery stores. Take a stroll through the Historic Montford neighborhood. Enjoy the comforts of home in a quiet neighborhood after a fun day on the town.

The space
Attached to our home is this 600 square foot apartment suite with high 10' ceilings that offers a queen size bed in a private bedroom. The suite includes your personal living area with separate bedroom. Sheets, blankets, and pillows provided. Towels, hair dryer, shampoo/conditioner, and soap provided.

Kitchenette area includes: Cuisinart single serve coffee maker with programmable timer and hot water for tea. Coffee, tea, snacks, and water available. Microwave with d

name: Broadway Loft 310: Downtown Asheville's newest gem, upscale luxury!
description:
The Broadway Lofts are downtown Asheville's newest vacation rental gem, and provide truly luxurious accommodations! Walkable to everything in downtown Asheville for the active lifestyle, with easy access via car to literally everything in the area, this will become the "go-to" spot for vacationers, tourists and anyone looking for a luxurious Asheville experience to remember. This premium top floor loft is just below the rooftop deck!
Come create your own memories!

The space
Location:
Downtown Asheville business district. Just inside the Montford neighborhood, & only 8 blocks from downtown.

Accommodations:
(Sleeps 4-5) 2 bedroom, 2 full baths
Occupancy Summary / Sleeps in beds: 4 Max. Occupancy: 5
