name: Cozy, Clean, Private West Asheville Apartment
description:
Welcome to the Yellow House! This new construction apartment is just a 2 minute walk to Haywood Road. Enjoy all that West Asheville has to offer on foot and relax in an incredibly clean and comfortable 800 square foot, 1 bedroom apartment and outside patio. We are taking extra measures to ensure that the space is extremely clean and sanitized before every guest checks in.

The space
We provide coffee and various teas for hot beverage lovers. The kitchen is outfitted with a fridge, countertop burners, microwave, toaster oven, and a coffee maker, as well as a cozy dining room table. There is NO LARGE OVEN due to city regulations. In addition to the king-sized bed, there is also a queen-sized pull-out sofa bed in the living room and an air mattress in the bedroom closet that is available for you to use. There is a tv with a DVD player and tons of DVDS in the living room (along with various books and board games), and a smart tv in the bedroom for all your streaming o

name: Spacious West Asheville suite near Haywood Ave
description:
Spacious finished basement with private entrance in West Asheville home. Enjoy a bedroom, bathroom, and living/dining room area complete with TV. There is no kitchen, but small appliances and essentials are included.

Great location! The house is in walking distance or a short drive to Haywood Avenue and all of West Asheville's offerings -- dining, shopping, cafes and bars. By car, you can get downtown or to the Biltmore estate in 10-15 minutes, to the Blue Ridge Parkway in 20 minutes.

The space
The bedroom is semi-subterranean but receives good natural light from a large bedroom window. A futon in the living room converts to a bed that could easily sleep 1 person; would be a bit cozy for 2 but it is an option.

Guest access
The entire downstairs is yours, with a bedroom, bathroom (entered from the bedroom), and living room.

Other things to note
Coffee, tea, sugar and honey are provided for guests in the suit

name: West Asheville Seclusive Studio 10 min to downtown
description:
Unique and newly renovated private studio close to everything Asheville has to offer! This one of a kind property is a stones throw away from the French Broad RIver Greenway and just a three minute drive from the eclectic and hip restaurants and shops in the heart of West Asheville. All spaces, including hot tub, sauna and expansive deck are completely private to relax and enjoy a rejuvenating getaway!

The space
Although directly in town, the space is surrounded by a beautiful wooded lot and privacy fencing that creates a sense of tranquility and seclusion. The spacious studio is tastefully decorated offering a king size bed, a comfortable sitting area, and an oversized bathroom and closet. Just across the covered deck you will find a cozy kitchenette equipped with a mini fridge, toaster oven, coffee pot, and complimentary teas and coffees to enjoy throughout your stay. Spend your time lounging around and relaxing in the hot tub or cedar sauna just steps away fro

name: New, luxury condo located in the heart of downtown Asheville~55 S.Market #209
description:
This new luxury condo is a spacious 1 bedroom/1 bathroom residence with an open kitchen, dining room, living room, and balcony. It provides the comfort and privacy of home while guests can also enjoy the convenience of having staff on hand to answer any questions and help with all guest needs. New appliances, bedding, and furniture create a stunning accommodation for you and your loved ones to relax and enjoy yourself. Upon arrival you will also find the unit fully stocked with linens and towels and all of the essentials you will need during your stay.
Located in the heart of downtown Asheville and nestled in the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains, this condo offers guests the best of both worlds. Only a moments walk to Asheville's local restaurants, breweries, shops, and galleries you are in the center of the city while also able to enjoy the mountains that surround you. You'll fall in love with this new condominium and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Ashevill

name: Landmark Mountain and City Views~Historic Patton Parker Garden Cottage #101
description:
Beautiful 2 bedroom and 2 bath townhome located off Charlotte St and moments to downtown Asheville. The Patton Parker House is an Asheville Historic Landmark; the Garden Cottage was built in 2017 to complement the house and grounds. An open and spacious layout boasts high end furnishings where guests will enjoy comfort and luxury in this historic estate. Relax with a glass of wine or local craft brew while enjoying the one of a kind city and Mountain View's from the front porch. If you're traveling with a larger group, the upstairs townhome is available for rent.

The space
This 2 bedroom and 2 bath unit is located off Charlotte St and moments to downtown Asheville. The Patton Parker House is an Asheville Historic Landmark; the Garden Cottage was built in 2017 to complement the house and grounds. An open and spacious layout boasts high end furnishings where guests will enjoy comfort and luxury in this historic estate. Relax with a glass of wine or local craft brew

name: The Loft at Deer Crossing
description:
Our new home is nestled in a beautiful area just 2 miles off of interstate 26. My husband built our barn style home to fit our piece of land. He took the wood from the property and used it to build this one-of-a-kind home. We are close to airport, Sierra Nevada Brewery, Blue Ridge Parkway, and many restaurants.
There are eight homes off of our road and the neighborhood is surrounded by a gorgeous horse farm. It is peaceful and scenic to sit on our porches after a day of hiking or sightseeing.

The space
The Loft at Deer Crossing is one of two Airbnb’s on our property. Your space is through your private front door, up the stairs to a private suite with a bathroom and morning kitchen. It is a part of our main house, but it is separated by a door that locks.

Guest access
Besides your suite, you will have access to our laundry room, a half bath, a front porch, and a fire pit. If you need to use the kitchen, it can be made available to you.

name: Asheville Mountain Cottage/Accessible
description:
The Bluebird Cottage is a newly constructed modern studio cottage located on a beautiful wooded mountain lot in the Shope Creek area of east Asheville, NC. This private home in the trees is minutes from Pisgah National Forest where hiking and biking trails are plentiful. Downtown Asheville, the Blue Ridge Parkway and Warren Wilson College are in close proximity. You get the best of Western North Carolina with a quiet mountain home close to vibrant downtown Asheville.

The space
The house features a private deck with mountain views, all new construction, new appliances and large windows for enjoying nature. The open studio floor plan and bright natural light invite you to stay in to enjoy nature or be drawn out to the deck for dining under the stars. The home is welcoming to guests who have mobility concerns. The home includes a handicap ramp for access to the home, a beautifully designed walk-in tiled shower, a wider door frame for accessing the bathroom and an

name: The River Nook✨A Tiny Refuge
description:
A bright, new, custom tiny home welcomes you for your visit to Asheville!
The River Nook is a magical refuge and starting point for all your Asheville area adventures! The careful thought and attention to detail that has been put into every aspect of this space, paired with the prime North Asheville location (within walking distance to a French Broad river park and lovely coffee shop) is sure to make this your future go-to vacation spot in the mountains.
All are welcome here:)

The space
The River Nook is a custom tiny house, built from the ground up with the needs of of guests always in mind! Wake up in the cozy sleeping loft on the cloud of a bed to the view of the surrounding forest. Make breakfast in the full kitchen stocked with local coffee, local tea, creamer, sugar, honey, and organic oatmeal for your use. Soak in the view at the bar seating and set out on your daily adventures!
The River Nook is a completely self sufficient tiny house with

name: Modern Luxury Downtown Condo 211- prime location
description:
Outstanding new 860 sq. ft. Modern Luxury Condo on quiet downtown side street next door to 5-star Foundry Hotel. Walk out the front door and you are steps away from everything downtown Asheville has to offer. High ceilings and large windows invite plenty of natural sunlight into the living room/kitchen and dining area. Condo #211 is immaculately furnished with high-end modern furniture, eclectic accents and art work from local artists (including metal work by the owner!)

The space
Condo #211 offers a king bed with luxury linens and spacious living room (includes an over-sized sectional with a full sleeper sofa featuring a unique pillow top air mattress). High ceilings and large windows invite plenty of natural sunlight into the living room/kitchen and dining area. The living room opens to a balcony/patio where you can enjoy morning coffee or evening drinks. You will be delighted with the gourmet kitchen, fully equipped with modern stainless appliances. The kitch

name: Eco-Friendly Clean Spacious Suite near Town/Trails
description:
Private, modern green built suite in North Asheville near Beaver Lake, bird watching, UNCA, Grove Park Inn, Blue Ridge Parkway and 2 miles from downtown. Queen bed, queen sofa bed, private bathroom, kitchen, yoga space, and outdoor patio. High ceilings and tons of windows let in the natural light that give a sense of calm and serenity. Peaceful property and walkable neighborhood. Driveway parking. We look forward to welcoming you to our home!

The space
This Green Craftsman was built in 2019 and is just a short drive from all that Asheville has to offer. Within 10 minutes driving distance from some of the most visited places in the city, this home will plant you in the middle of an outdoor adventure paradise. We are a very close drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway, Beaver Lake, Arboretum, and the Biltmore.

Our home has the character of a Modern Retreat in a quiet neighborhood, but with zen, relaxing comfort. There is a lovely outdoor space to hang out in

name: Modern Mountain Bungalow - 10 minutes to downtown
description:
In this colorful bungalow you’ll find new and vintage furniture and decor collected over the years, and local hand-blown glass. The open concept floor plan, screened-in front porch, and large fenced-in backyard make it easy to gather with friends and family.

The space
It was built in 1903 and was the neighborhood dance hall. My husband and I love the history and when we renovated in 2017 to open up the space and vault the ceilings, we had to showcase the original wood beam we found. You'll also notice the extra-large door frames which cover the log frame construction.

The three bedrooms are cozy but well appointed, each unique and full of color, with thoughtful touches and 60s vibes.

The galley style kitchen is stocked with everything you need for cooking and baking. It boasts a gas range, deep stainless steel sink, dishwasher, full size fridge with an ice maker and filtered water. You’ll also find a blender, an automatic drip coffee maker

name: Private Basement Suite Close to Biltmore & Dwntown
description:
Your perfect place to see and experience everything Asheville has to offer. The Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village shops < 2 miles. Downtown Asheville < 10 minutes. The famous River Arts District < 5 miles. Jump on the Blue Ridge Parkway for hiking trails and mountain views in mere minutes. Private entrance to the Basement Suite, Private driveway and covered parking. Large Master Bedroom, Second bedroom/sitting room with TV, Blu-ray, Fridge, Coffee Pot, High-Top Table and Wi-Fi. Book Today

The space
Master Bedroom has Comfy Queen Bed, dresser, vanity. luggage rack, white noise sound and closet. Second bedroom has Twin bed turned couch, TV with blu-ray player (with NETFLIX access), various DVD's, books on the area, fridge, microwave, coffee maker, high-top table with bar stools, luggage rack, white noise sound and closet. Oatmeal, snacks and coffee provided. The bathroom has walk in shower and large sink vanity. Towels and washcloths provided.

name: Little Asheville! 15 min Asheville/Hendersonville
description:
This is a newly refinished BASEMENT house, 2 bed, 2 full bath. We are an active family with two children living in the upstairs. You may hear us moving around in, mostly, muffled sounds. Typically, our days go from 7am to 9pm. Ten minutes to the airport. Centered with easy access to Asheville(20 min), Hendersonville(15 min), and Brevard(30 min). TV's in both bedrooms and living room. Wi-Fi access. Full Kitchen, King Size and Queen Size beds. Stand up showers(no bathtub). Coffee provided!

The space
The kitchen has all major appliances, and small appliances. Coffee is provided. Both baths are stand up showers only(no tubs). The basement has two parking spaces, and is a private entrance. It is about 1500 square feet. The two bedrooms are separated by the kitchen and living room offering lots of privacy. There is a large covered patio.

Guest access
You will drive directly to the basement doors with private access and parking.

name: The Studio at 217
description:
The Studio at 217 is tucked away on a quiet cul-de-sac in as-yet-to-be-discovered East Asheville. This cozy, light filled space is attached to a corner of our handmade log home, with it's own private entrance and lots of off street parking. Our property abuts Blue Ridge Parkway land, so it's a short hike on a clear trail through the woods to the Mountains-to-Sea Trail or the Parkway. The Studio is 15 mins from the Biltmore, just 12 mins from downtown, and one mile from a local grocery store.

The space
The Studio is fully private and well appointed, with everything you need for a comfortable stay in our beautiful area. If you want to eat in one night, our fully equipped kitchen has everything you need to make a meal. We provide coffee, tea, sweetners, 1/2 and 1/2, breakfast bars, fruit, and instant oatmeal for a light breakfast. Also basic cooking condiments: pepper, salt, and oil.

Guest access
The Studio is fully self-contained with it

name: The Woodfin - Chateau de Bro & Chalet de Bae
description:
THE SPACE IS ALL YOURS!

The Woodfin is a chateau de bro, chalet de bae, camp for champs, and home for the roaming adventurer. Nestled in a quiet neighborhood just a 5 to 7-minute drive from downtown, this private dream pad is the perfect hub for couples, friends, and family to explore everything Asheville has to offer. Recharge in the high-end Tempurpedic TEMPUR-Cloud® bed (with vibration settings) for an unbeatable nights sleep! Fully equipped kitchen. Professionally cleaned!

The space
DESIGN
Enjoy a minimalist aesthetic inspired by Scandinavian design with undertones of low-key surfer vibes. Crisp, white walls and large casement windows maximize light and warmth. Natural elements of wood, wool, and iron add intrigue and texture to the space. This homey abode invites you to relax and enjoy your company.

PARKING AND ENTRY
Complimentary off-street parking for two vehicles is located in front of the house. Guests enter using convenie

name: Country feel -15min to AVL and close to Pisgah
description:
Watch the sun rise over the mountains in our beautiful home! 10min drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway, and only 15 to West Asheville/20 to downtown. Nature trails nearby are great for running/biking/hiking in Pisgah.
Home is bright and clean, fully stocked kitchen and two porches to drink your morning coffee/tea!
We have 2 of the sweetest dogs on earth and one little kitten. We do keep them out of guest rooms for cleanliness/privacy. Enjoy local recommendations out or a private campfire out back!

The space
Spacious and warm even in the winter cold! Eat-in kitchen, full bathroom, and cozy living room, with record player, piano, and lots of other instruments.
Your room is the guest room closest to an entrance to the house, and you are welcome to all shared spaces as well. Elizabeth and Madeline are your hosts, and we can provide local recommendations for foods/brews/hikes/climbs in the area.

FYI- If you would like to bring your pet please

name: Trendy New-Build | Balcony | 3 Miles to Downtown
description:
Spacious and stylish, this brand-new 5BR Asheville home is just 3 miles from the buzzing heart of downtown. Tastefully furnished throughout, the home includes a bonus kitchenette/breakfast area, and a private balcony for alfresco dining. Sleeps 10.

The space
Spacious and stylish, this brand-new 5BR/3.5BA Asheville home is just 3 miles from the buzzing heart of downtown. Upscale appointments feature throughout, including a well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Highlights include a bonus kitchenette/breakfast area, and a private balcony to share meals in the sun.

LIVING AREAS

Make yourself at home in an open living area, appointed with a comfy sleeper sofa and armchair. Kick back and watch a movie on the 40” flat-screen TV.

KITCHEN & DINING

A well-equipped kitchen comes with a full suite of stainless steel appliances -- including a side-by-side refrigerator. In the mornings, enjoy coffee at the three-per

name: Asheville  Zen Cottage
description:
Peaceful Mountain Cottage over 100 years old. Sits on 1.5 acres, just north of Asheville. My grandfather built this house for my grandmother & their 9 children. It is filled with charm & nostalgia. Original hard wood floors, bead board walls & ceiling. Front porch for watching my 3 goats play, an afternoon sunset or enjoy conversation with those dear to your heart. Sit in the gazebo to enjoy a good book, beverages or watch the night sky bring out the stars for your amazement.

The space
Unplug from television & technology to reconnect with your family and all that nature has to offer around you. Relax - Recharge - Reconnect. No TV/wifi. Enjoy a simpler time. Puzzles, board games, adult coloring books & cards available for those games you remember from your younger days.

Guest access
Guest can enjoy all of the Cottage and the property (1.5 acres). There is a Gazebo and plans for a fire pit. The "Girls," "Abbey", "Bailey", & "Chloe"

name: Bright Downtown Luxury Condo #205, 865 sqft
description:
Modern high end furnishings, super comfy bed and high thread count linens and down pillows. This condo is light filled with high ceilings, and the location can not be beat! You will find eclectic art by local Asheville artists, including the owner's metal artwork
throughout the condo. Enjoy coffee in the morning or a drink in the evening on the balcony that has a view of neighboring hills. This condo is one of the few in this building that is over 800 square feet for a 1 bed 1 bath.

name: Historic Oasis next to downtown
description: Want to have an historic experience in beautiful Asheville?  Welcome to our home in Albemarle Park, a Nationally recognized Historic Neighborhood.  Built in 1913, this Tudor style home is walking distance from downtown Asheville, the Grove Park Inn as well as coffee shops and local restaurants.  Freshly updated with private entrance and driveway, enjoy relaxing  around our firepit, walking our neighborhood roads as they wind their way up the mountain or heading downtown.

name: Basement Apartment Convenient to Asheville
description:
We have a downstairs guest apartment with one bedroom and bath. There is also a living area with a futon, and a kitchenette/dining space, about 600 square feet total. We are located in Candler, minutes away from downtown Asheville, Ski Resorts, or the Blue Ridge Parkway. Highlights of our area include: Wicked Weed West, Bent Creek - an ideal spot for hiking or mountain biking, Pisgah View Ranch - soon to be a state park, and the North Carolina Arboretum. We would love to have you stay with us!

The space
Quiet and cozy, we welcome you to your private basement apartment. Located minutes from West Asheville and 10-15 minutes from the heart of downtown. Our house is convenient to the interstate, the Blue Ridge Parkway, hiking or dining. As travelers ourselves with two small kids, we try to make our space accommodating to families (a pack and play is available on request). We offer games for kids to play, motion activated nightlights, and two TV's equipped with ROKU.

name: Cozy & Charming Asheville Cabin: 5 Mi to Downtown!
description:
Head for the hills of North Carolina and stay at this 2-bedroom, 1-bath cabin while exploring the Asheville area. Located just 5 miles from the city, this vacation rental puts you in the middle of national forests, breweries, the Blueridge Parkway, and the distinct culture that Asheville is known for. Spend your day out of the house at the Biltmore Estate or touring Sierra Nevada Brewery, then return home to your cozy cabin to make a meal and enjoy a beverage as the sun sets.

The space
Washer/Dryer | Newly Remodeled | Family Friendly

Perfect for couples looking for a quick getaway or families visiting UNC Asheville, this cabin has all of the amenities that you would find in your own home while being close to Asheville’s best attractions.

Master Bedroom: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed

INDOOR LIVING: Hardwood floors, flat-screen TV w/ Roku, Bose speaker, ceiling fans, dining table, laptop-friendly workspace
KITCHEN: Well-eq

name: Bear Way to Heaven
description:
Adorable & newly remodeled SPACIOUS 1 BD/1BA located in the Asheville Bear Creek Campground & RV Park. Fairly private w/ huge back deck overlooking the mountains of WNC. Perfect for 2 people, but great if you have 2 children to put them on the futons in the LR. We do accept pets with an additional charge. Swimming pool, playground, dog walk, and much more. So close and convenient to EVERYTHING!

The space
Very large and bright 1 bedroom suite with a full bathroom, full kitchen, and plenty of space

Guest access
Guests have the whole apartment

Other things to note
We do allow dogs, (2 Max) we do have a pet fee. Always pick up after them.

name: Urban Forest Oasis less than a mile to town!
description:
Nature-lover's paradise in an urban forest oasis! Quiet, walk-able neighborhood on a dead-end street only a mile north of downtown Asheville in desirable 5-points neighborhood. Close to UNCA, restaurants, grocery, wooded walking trails, green-way, and Botanical Gardens. Easy access to I-240 and I-26. Wooded double lot brings plenty of birds to our feeders and a resident screech owl in the bird box out back!

The space
We are committed to keeping our property sanitized and safe for our guests. We carefully follow the enhanced cleaning guidelines based on recommendations from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), and we implement at least a 24-hour no-occupancy period before and after stays.

Our two-story craftsman has an open, airy main floor with 9-ft ceilings and plenty of room for gathering. The well-appointed kitchen has granite counter tops, gas stove, and live culinary herbs available for the gourmet guest. Gather around the

name: The Llama | Entire place in West Asheville
description:
An entire apartment in West Asheville with its own private entrance, deck, and parking spot. Located on a quiet street with stunning views of the mountain range and the Biltmore forest, and only minutes from Downtown Asheville, The Blue Ridge Parkway and the Biltmore House. Curated and designed for a relaxing stay near the best of what Asheville has to offer.

The space
Our space is warm and inviting, with thoughtful design and touches. The bedroom has a king size bed with a memory foam mattress, soft linen sheets, and ample closet space to nicely fit in a pack and play should you need to bring one.

The kitchenette is stocked with spices and cooking oils, a convection oven, electric kettle, slow cooker, drip coffee, and full size fridge. While there's NO range/stove, we hope the options we provide can assist in creating easy, no fuss meals.

The dining area overlooks a spacious living room with a pull out queen bed. Additional bedding can be

name: The Northside Nest
description:
It’s an old home (turn of the century) with lots of character and charm. Right on the outskirts of downtown, this fun and comfy space is sure to show you a good time.

The space
Guest may use the bathroom, bedroom, and porch

name: Views, Mins. from Downtown Asheville, Fire Pit
description:
This lovely new 3 bedroom 2 bath, open floor plan cabin is located MINUTES from The Biltmore Estate, Asheville Outlets, Blue Ridge Parkway, Bent Creek and Downtown, still has the feeling of a private wooded environment. Enjoy the view of mountains with a horse farm in the backdrop and occasional family of deer crossing the path, while sipping your coffee on the covered porch in the pristine forest location. Nicely appointed home features views, fully equipped kitchen, hi speed wi-fi and 55” tv.

The space
If you an outdoor enthusiast, you will love the hiking, mountain biking, road biking, kayaking, white water rafting, snow skiing and horseback riding just minutes from the cabin. A regular drum circle, organized by residents in Pritchard Park, is open to all and has been a popular local activity every Friday evening.

Guest access
Full access

Other things to note
There is a $75.00 pet fee for one dog, each additional

name: Sleeps 12 * 6mi to Downtown * Dogs Welcome
description:
Many beautiful upgrades have been made to this already lovely home to make it one of Asheville's premier vacation rentals for families and groups. From the moment you walk through the front door you will see that this home has been designed with fellowship and entertaining in mind. There's room to spread out with an expansive kitchen and dual living areas or take the party outside and lounge on the deck as you watch your four legged friends run around the yard or children splash in the pool.

The space
This home was setup for entertaining. With it's open floorplan and separate living areas there's space to enjoy different activities in several different areas.

Guest access
Guests are welcome to use any and all spaces within the house and on the property. This includes the laundry, lower garage, and pool, in season. The detached garage and basement utility area are not included in the rental and shall remain locked.

Other thing

name: Studio
description:
The Studio is a lofted double bed that sleeps two (requires steps). It has its own private bathroom, sink and shower. One of the three private rooms we offer, we have a communal fully equipped kitchen, dining room and living room.

The space
Sweet Peas is a boutique loft style hostel. Guests have access to shared bathrooms and showers. We have a communal fully equipped kitchen and living room area. We have free coffee & tea, wifi and laundry area.

name: 6 MIN TO DOWNTOWN ASHEVILLE % SPARKLING CLEAN
description:
7 Min Drive to Asheville Art Museum
6 Min Drive to Downtown Asheville
11 Min Drive to Biltmore

Located in the quaint Woodfin community, this beautiful, 1500 sq ft home is the perfect base for an extended staycation. It’s clean and tidy with plenty of room to unwind and every modern amenity for your comfort. Stroll along the French Broad River, hike the Appalachian Trail, or head downtown for some shopping, dining, or the Asheville arts scene.

Experience Asheville With Us & Learn More Below!

The space
Here Are A Few Kind Words From Our Past Guests:

“Very clean and comfortable! Heidi was super responsive when I sent a message that the fire alarm was chirping. They were there within about half an hour to replace the battery. Home had everything we needed to cook meals. The area was quiet, and close enough to Uber into town with no issues. Out of the hustle and bustle of downtown, but close enough to experience it each day!

name: Cozy 2.5BR 1400 sq ft triplex in historic Montford
description:
This spacious, cozy apt is located in Asheville's scenic historic district. We specialize in long term, pet friendly stays. Main level apt has 2 BR, 1BA, and a roomy office; perfect for remote working guests. Enjoy the charming front porch, back balcony, and fenced in yard. The apt is conveniently located within walking distance to eateries, park, greenway, downtown, UNCA, and botanical gardens. Come relax in this lovely home if you are relocating, or just getting away for fresh mountain air!

The space
Full disclosure, our house was built in 1925 and, over the years, has evolved into a triplex. That is, there is an apartment on the top floor that is privately accessed through the door/staircase on the left as you face the house. The main apartment (your space) is located on the main floor and is accessed through the door on the right. There is also a basement space that I use to store supplies in, and to stay at (infrequently) when I am at the house to do main

name: Private Room
description:
A private room with a double bed that sleeps two. It has a small sink and ceiling fan. It shares communal restrooms and showers with the rest of the hostel.

The space
Sweet Peas is a boutique loft style hostel. Guests have access to shared bathrooms and showers. We have a communal fully equipped kitchen and living room area. We have free coffee & tea, wifi and laundry area.

name: Charming Home Close to Everything (5mi downtown)
description:
Charming home settled right close Blue Ridge Parkway, only minutes to downtown, Asheville mall, lots of restaurants nearby, and best of all you are one turn away from entering the Blue Ridge Parkway. This home is newly furnished with top quality furniture and mattresses. Come in make yourself a cup of coffee with the keurig, or some tea, relax on the patio, watch some Netflix and make yourself feel like home.
Due to the coronavirus, we're taking extra caution to clean and disinfect the home.

The space
All brand new top quality furniture and bed bug proof mattress covers.

Guest access
The guests enjoy the entire house to themselves.

Other things to note
No smoking of any kind in or outside the home.

name: Renovated Historic Getaway Near VA Hospital+Dwtn 1
description:
1920's Arts and Crafts home in Haw Creek (East Asheville). Five minutes to downtown and a short stroll to Penny Cup Coffee, Creekside Tavern and the East Asheville Library.

Private bedroom and bath with tub on main level.

Workspace, mini fridge, and microwave provided.

The space
Homestay Permit 19-08216

Guest access
Bedrooms, bathroom, and front porch only. Kitchen and living room are off-limits to guests.

Please bring your own kitchen items to use with provided microwave and mini fridge.

If you have a love of makeup or muddy places, please bring your own towels.

Other things to note
The space is ideally suited for shorter stays, with guests out of the house most of the time sightseeing or attending conferences.

I have two hypoallergenic Siberian cats, one is social and the other one hides.

name: Private & spacious family home w/hot tub in S AVL
description:
Welcome to our peaceful & spacious home away from home in the mountains! Located about 15-20 minutes to downtown Asheville & The Biltmore Estate in a quiet, country-neighborhood setting. There's plenty of space in this 3 bedroom house plus 1 bedroom apartment. Enjoy the view from the covered front porch with comfortable seating overlooking the large, lush & green front yard. There's also a 6 person hot tub on the covered back patio. TV's with Netflix

The space
Large, newly remodeled 3 bedroom house with 2 sleeper sofas to accommodate your entire party. Here’s the sleeping arrangements....

BDRM 1: California King bed w/ small couch
BDRM 2: Queen bed
BDRM 3: Queen bed
Living Rm: 2 Sleeper Sofas w/ Full beds and a full size couch

There's also a 1 bedroom apartment above the garage to accomodate even more people (up to 4 more!). There's a queen size bed and a sleeper sofa that pulls out to a full size bed.

Provided for

name: 51-Acre Peaceful Retreat 9 Miles from Downtown
description:
Peaceful 51-acre property with grassy fields surrounded by gorgeous mountain views. Hiking trails, fire pits, camp sites, a winding creek, adjacent to federally protected land with more trails. Accommodations are relatively simple and the house is priced accordingly. Most guests enjoy the outdoors and spend time exploring the city and surrounding natural environment, but the house is also a great place to spend time. Caretakers are on the property, but you'll have the entire house to yourself.

The space
Our 3 bedroom 2 bath home accommodates up to 8 people, with 2 queen size beds and 2 sets of bunk beds. It’s fully equipped with a large kitchen, breakfast bar, dining room, yoga/meditation room, washer / dryer, back deck with grill, and lots of natural light from the large bay windows and skylights.

There’s a TV with a complimentary Netflix account as well as DVD’s. There’s also an AUX jack where you can plug in your phone or iPod to play music through

name: Quiet house, pet friendly-nofee, 3mi to Haywood Rd
description:
Quiet West Asheville neighborhood just 3 minutes to Haywood Rd and restaurants/shops/breweries. Two bedroom suite with full kitchen and bathroom, open living room and dining room. Large flat yard and plenty of parking.

10-15 minutes to Biltmore Estate.
10-15 minutes to downtown Asheville.
15 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
House is two separate living spaces with host living upstairs. Host is available if needed, but will leave guests to themselves for privacy.

Guest access
The driveway, front and back yard, and lower section of the house are open for use.

Other things to note
Pet friendly - please follow leash laws (dogs on leashes when outside of the gated area.) and use the provided pet waste bags to keep the yard clean.

name: Asheville Adventure Abode
description:
Base all of your Asheville adventures out of this modern and cozy studio. This space is part of a charming 92 year old home and has been completely renovated in the last 2 years. The exposed beams and hardwood floors will give you a sense of the history of the neighborhood while still being able to enjoy the comforts of a recently updated space. We have taken great care to make sure that every detail of this space is attended to so that you truly feel as though you are at home while traveling.

The space
Based on our own environmental beliefs and a sensitivity for potential guests preference, we have chosen to clean the space exclusively with 100% plant based non toxic cleaning supplies and we have stocked the bathroom with environmentally friendly and non toxic soap/shampoo and conditioner. All paper products in the space are 100% recycled and we leave a compost bin for our guests to use for any unwanted food waste and recycle bin.

You have access to t

name: ❉ Family Friendly  Mountain Home ❉
description:
This airbnb home has been carefully designed to include all you could need during your Asheville stay. House includes 3 queen bedrooms, bat towels, fresh linens, and shampoo, conditioner and shower gel in both bathrooms. Additionally, this home has a well stocked kitchen including fridge, range, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, and toaster.

My goal is to provide an affordable and very comfortable experience for all of my guests.

The space
This is a three bedroom family home in a wooded area. The home has recently undergone many updates, including new floors and bathrooms.

Guest access
Guests are able to access entire home. Downstairs storage is not accessible.

name: Craftsman style apartment, minutes to downtown.
description:
Enjoy morning mountain views only 1 mile from Downtown Asheville and the Biltmore estate. The home is nestled in a family friendly neighborhood walking distance to breweries and local restaurants. If you are in town to hike at the Biltmore estate, or take on our nightlife, this cozy spot is the perfect place to rest your tired feet.

The space
Cozy and eclectic basement apartment.

Guest access
Property owner lives in a separate level of the home. Guests have a private entrance and no spaces are shared with the owner.

Other things to note
There are well lit but multiple steps into the home.

name: Super Comfortable 1BR Apt - Backyard Forest
description:
Just 10 minutes from the Biltmore Estate and the airport and 20 minutes to downtown Asheville, Weston Woods is an oasis to come home to after enjoying the wonders of Western North Carolina.

Guests have a pass-coded private entrance, full kitchen (stove, microwave, fridge, sink, toaster oven, Keurig, etc. and cookware), comfy living room (Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hulu and HBOMax and a pull-out queen bed), bedroom (queen), bathroom (with bidet toilet seat), and wifi (150 mbps).

The space
***To help alleviate any fears, we want to let all future guests know we vigorously clean our place with disinfectant and we carefully wash down all areas that guests touch with Clorox wipes (e.g. remote controls, door handles, drawer handles and all surfaces throughout our place).

This is a newly-remodeled, purpose-built space. Guests have their own heating/AC unit. The bedroom is walled off from the other parts of the apartment, but the walls do not go all t

name: Bunk Bed at Sweet Peas Hostel
description:
Bunk Bed in a partially enclosed room with 8 total bunks. This room is Co-Ed. Comes with a school size locker and lock. Each bed has a desk lamp. Guests share communal restrooms and showers.

The space
Sweet Peas is a boutique loft style hostel. Guests have access to shared bathrooms and showers. We have a communal fully equipped kitchen and living room area. We have free coffee & tea, wifi and laundry area.

name: Pod at Sweet Peas Hostel
description:
Pods are located in doorless hallways off the kitchen. Either 4 or 8 Pods in a hallway, they are all co-ed. Each bed has a desk lamp and a large lockable locker. A pod is an extra long twin bed, with an acoustic curtain and built in shelving.

The space
Sweet Peas is a boutique loft style hostel. Guests have access to shared bathrooms and showers. We have a communal fully equipped kitchen and living room area. We have free coffee & tea, wifi and laundry area.

name: West Asheville Farmland
description:
Enjoy the entire house in off of Old Leicester Highway 10 mins from Asheville and in the scenic farmland. The property is super friendly to pets and we love to hear the whole family can come! The French Broad River is a short five minute drive where there are several parks and breweries. Cows moo in the backyard and fresh eggs can be delivered to the house . Owner has been a commercial river guide for 10 years and can arrange private rafting trips on the local whitewater sections.

The space
Private apartment in Asheville that sleeps between 14 people. The property backs up to a creek and a large farm

Guest access
In addition to the areas listed a creekside fire pit and hot tub are on the property.

name: Morningside Hide-Away
description:
Morningside Hide-Away
is a relaxing private space on the ground level of my home. Visitors have their own parking and entrance to a 3-room hide-away, with windows in each room.
The kitchen has a sofa, table, chairs offering a place to sit, read, prepare small meals, sip a variety of beverages, and plan your time on the town. The bedroom is quiet and the king size bed is deeply comfortable, close by is another private sitting area.
The bathroom en suite is the perfect place to bubble bath.

The space

Coffee, creamer, select foods , and a variety of other beverages will be available gratis. Kitchen TV has Roku and bedroom large scree

name: W AVL studio, dogs stay free Cozy, modern, private
description:
Very clean dog friendly ground floor/walk out basement apt in my home with a private entry, partial kitchen (no stove)
Studio is walking distance to French Broad River Park/dog park and Carrier Park. A short drive (5 min) to Biltmore Village, Biltmore estate, River arts District, or Haywood Avenue. Ten min drive to downtown Asheville. Well behaved dogs welcome with no extra fee or deposit, request they be groomed and pest free.
I follow strict COVID cleaning recommendations.

The space
Newly remodeled, clean & stylish studio space in walk out basement section of my home. It is suitable for 1-2 people. Well behaved dogs welcome, sorry, no cats. I provide a dog bed and sheets to cover couch to minimize shedding on furniture.
For your safety, the space has a dedicated Gree ductless AC/heat that supplies individual temperature comfort and safe supply of clean air separate from the rest of the house. It also has a dehumidifier mode in times of h

name: West Asheville Farmhouse on 4 Acres Close to Town
description:
Relax in a fully updated 2BR/1BA home w/ 4-acre back yard and wooded glade. 12 minutes to Biltmore Estate and downtown, 6 minutes to W AVL restaurant scene, BR Parkway and NC Arboretum. Freshly painted with new furniture as of 2020. Modern kitchen, half-covered backyard deck overlooking forest and fields. Includes a grill and a gorgeous fire pit area. Sleeps up to 6 in 3 beds plus 1 foldout couch. House has many books, maps, board games and stereo/ turntable with LP collection. Dogs allowed.

The space
Private house in West Asheville, completely updated as of January 2020, includes brand new beds and sofa. Flat screen TVs in living room and main bedroom are set up for Roku and access to guest's subscription services. Fully appointed kitchen includes fridge, stove and oven, microwave, and cookware to prepare a feast. AC and heat controls are readily available with temperature settings to your preference.

The covered deck includes comfortable wicker fur

name: Perfect location. Quiet and 5 minutes to downtown.
description:
We follow Airbnb's Covid disinfecting protocol

This charming, cozy mid-century modern home is located just 1.4 miles from downtown and minutes to the Biltmore Estate. Close to everything, centrally located and yet on a quiet mountain road with mature trees, privacy, and wildlife!

It is the perfect home base to explore Asheville. This is a unique property in the city. Enjoy a mountain escape within the heart of Asheville. We are just 10 minutes to the River Arts District and West Asheville.

The space
This 5 time Super Host awarded property has an open floor plan with a sunny kitchen and dinette. There's a comfortable living room area with large windows looking out into the trees. A door off the dinette opens right onto the deck. Sunlight comes over the mountain and into the kitchen and deck for morning coffee. There is a quiet shaded spot outside under the trees to sit on a bench with a book or meditate.

The deck overlooks the ya

description:
Historic 1904 home, restored to Bed and Breakfast since 1995. Careful attention to original ambiance, while newer touches have been added for warmth and blended renewal.

The space
This is a spacious room, with a King size bed and all the comforts you might require. The room has it's own private bath, a lockable door from the rest of the home. you will be provided a key to the room and the main entry has a coded door lock for ease of access. Come and go as you will. Please make use of the common areas of the home. We hope you will make new friends from anywhere in the world.

We really love hosting great guests and would love to have you stay!

name: Fairytale Stone Cottage
description:
Storybook stone cottage is an absolute GEM! Only a 7 minute drive to downtown. The home is loaded with charm and features like Arts & Crafts wainscoting and an 1850's antique mantle. Large yard is extremely private and features fruit trees and many unique types of flora. Three bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. Enjoy sunsets from your westward facing sunroom, a cup of morning coffee on the stone patio out front, or walk the stone path in your own private fairytale garden!

The space
The home was built in 1910 by the same mason who built the Biltmore House. It was the original estate in the area with over 9 acres of land surrounding it and it has stood the test of time. Over the last 100 years, the land around the home has been sold and neighboring homes have been built into a beautiful mountain living community.

Guest access
You will have absolute privacy and access to the entire home. There are 3 queen beds and a pull out couch with a thick que

name: Ralph’s Retreat
description:
Welcome to Ralph’s Retreat! Conveniently located 2.5 miles from Downtown Asheville//3 miles from the River Arts District//1.5 miles to UNCA, this freshly renovated 2 bedroom 1 bath apartment comes fully equipped with all essentials guests may need for a cozy getaway in the mountains.

**Check out our other listing: Rufus’ Retreat (the upper apartment)!

The space
The space is open and airy, located a short drive//walk//bike ride to downtown Asheville, the River Arts District, UNCA and West Asheville.
Asheville Community Yoga, DanceClub Asheville, Acupuncture Center of Asheville, Zillicoah Brewery, Gingers Revenge Brewery, the French Broad River and Beaver Lake are all within walking distance of Ralph’s Retreat.

Guest access
The entire lower apartment is available for guests. There is a small backyard shared with the upper apartment. Please pick up after your pets.

Please be mindful that there may be guests staying i

name: Deerhaven Hideaway; Luxurious Convenience to Biltmore Park, Asheville, and more!
description: How about the feel of mountain forested seclusion while being less than 20 minutes from downtown Asheville? Or stay in your own luxurious hideaway, yet being less than 5 minutes to the nightlife, restaurants and more in Biltmore Park Town Square? Welcome to the unique and luxurious Deerhaven Hideaway!! Deerhaven Hideaway is a true "one-of-a-kind" vacation destination, tucked in the pristine & private property surrounded by Biltmore Park, The Ramble and right outside downtown Asheville. This spacious 4 bedroom home affords mountain privacy, a wrap-a-round covered & open deck, and a truly luxurious experience while being close to a plethora of outdoor activities and everything Asheville is renowned for in every Top-10 rating. Deerhaven Hideaway has become one of the most popular homes in our Yonder luxury portfolio, and is quickly becoming one of the most requested! It is not surprising when you put a terrific home together with all the amenities it has to offer, with a one-of-a-kind loc

name: Stunning Mountain Home - Views, Hot Tub & Fire Pit
description:
Beautiful family home (over 5,000 sq. ft) 20 minutes from Asheville, in lovely neighborhood. Large bedrooms with ensuites, one with Jack and Jill & master with private sitting area & porch. Large entertaining deck with stunning mountain views, 2 large living areas with a fireplace. Lower level with separate entrance with king bed, queen sofa bed, separate kitchen and bathroom. Enjoy nights out by the fire pit or in the hot tub. Ping Pong & Bumper Pool tables and garden.

The space
• 2-Story Main House, plus an Additional Separate Lower Level Apartment, "The Rayburn Apartment"
• 4 Bedrooms in Main House: 1 King, 2 Queen & 1 Queen Sofa bed
• 3 Full Baths & 1 Half Bath in Main House
• Main Level: Bedroom One - 1 Queen Bed, attached Full Bath
• Upper Level: Bedroom Two - (Master) 1 King Bed, Full Bath with spa tub, sitting room and enclosed porch with mountain view. Bedroom three - 1 Queen Bed, attached Jack and Jill. Bedroom Four - Queen

name: Urban Forest Suite
description:
Modern master bedroom in a newly build home, this cozy private space with a private entrance is pure Asheville vibe and charm! It has a south-facing window overlooking the fenced garden, so you'll have light to enjoy all day. With high ceilings, it has a private bathroom with a luxury stone floor shower, a TV with access to streaming, and a kitchenette. Enjoy the covered porch with a local Asheville beer, before walking for a meal on Haywood Rd. 12 minute Uber ride to downtown.

The space
With a private entrance and a door code, you enter into your 330 sqft (31 m2) suite with one queen bed, a table for two, and a loveseat. The suite has its own thermostat, so you can set the temperature to your preference. The kitchenette is stocked with a coffee machine, refrigerator, and microwave, so reheating food or making a snack is easy. We provide local coffee and a few local beers. The bathroom has a double sink and a custom shower designed for a king. Just outside the en

description:
A chic getaway awaits at this 1BR condo, featuring 1200 square feet of modern living space. Stroll mere minutes to explore a plethora of culture, cuisine, and nighttime entertainment. Access a host of nearby outdoor activities and adventures. Sleeps 4.

The space
Boasting a prime West Asheville location near the Haywood Corridor and the River Arts District, a chic retreat for the ultimate downtown getaway awaits at this spacious 1BR condo. Highlights include a private balcony, two smart TVs, and 1200 square feet of modern living space.

Head out on foot to discover a host of local eateries, boutique shops, cultural venues, and nighttime entertainment options. Or hop in the car to explore a plethora of nearby outdoor activities and adventures, including hiking, biking, fishing, swimming, rafting, tubing, kayaking, ziplining, and skiing.

LIVING AREA

Unwind into vacation mode on the sleeper sofa and two armchairs in the living area. In

name: Tiny Mansion - by the woods & downtown!
description:
The Tiny Mansion is a special, open, modern sanctuary with a bright sleeping loft (you can stand up in it!), a roof deck, and a heated bathroom floor, across from a gorgeous nature trail and walkable to downtown. Built in 2016 as my haven for singing, songwriting, and voice acting... Make yourself at home! It's all yours while you're here. Piano, stereo, TV, outdoor fire pit, sweet gardens, food in cabinets and fridge, etc. Wonderful for single person or couple looking for a 1-3 month stay.

The space
I live in the house when I'm in Asheville. Some of my things are in it, but put away neatly with room for your things. You'll basically be "playing me" in this house - feel free to eat the food, use the natural toiletries, drink the coffee, lounge on the roof deck, take a bath in the heated-floor bathroom - make yourself at home. Just replace something if you use a lot of it, and let my property manager know what questions you have! Laundry is a few steps across so

description:
Cozy, comfortable house minutes from the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway, North Carolina Arboretum, the Biltmore House and the Asheville Outlets. Access mountain biking and hiking trails in Pisgah National Forest less than a quarter of a mile from the door to the trailhead! The property includes a large fenced back yard adjacent to the 22 acre Bent Creek Community park which includes a pavilion, playground, bicycle pump track, and stone grill.

The space
This home has everything you need to feel at home. Cooking in is easy with a fully outfitted kitchen that includes all of your basic cooking and baking needs. Asheville has an amazing food scene, but the convenience of preparing your own meals adds extra comfort when you are away from home.

If you are working while you are away, the house has a home office with a wi-fi connected printer you can access when you are connected to the internet.

Basic toiletries and blow dryers can be found in the bat

name: Private  but Central West Asheville in Nature
description:
Enjoy a private entrance to a 600 sq. ft. private suite with a large private outdoor space. Access to a grill, unwind in a hammock, memory foam bed with free WiFi. Walking distance to the center of hip West Asheville with it’s local shops, restaurants, grocery stores & farmer’s market on Tuesdays. Downtown and other popular outdoor destinations only a short drive. Outdoor/Indoor spots to work remotely. Discounted for longer stays. House thoroughly & non-toxically cleaned after each tenant!

*Please note that the homeowner lives on site, in a completely separate unit, and may be present during your stay.

Patio/Hammock/A/C/Memory Foam Master Bed/Free WiFi

Other things to note

description: The Atomic getaway is a newly furnished, open concept midcentury studio.  The apt is located on the ground floor featuring a private entrance, a sitting patio and off street parking.  The spacious living area has a smart tv,  a kitchenette with a mini fridge, microwave, a Keurig,  and a water cooler.  The sleeping area includes a king bed and another tv.  Conveniently  located in downtown Asheville,  the Atomic getaway is the ideal home base for exploring all destinations Asheville has to offer.

Just 3 minutes from a Happy Tummy w/ White Duck Taco! Enjoy music at AVL's Salvage Station or plays at Montford's Hazel Robinson Amphitheater!!!

The space

Guests have the entire home! :-). The Bee City Bungalow is your home away from home in Asheville while you are visiting!!!

The interior is tastefully decorated, a blend of modern and rustic, with wood and stone accents throughout and large windows. Each of the 3 bedrooms are equipped with c

This clean, upscale 6-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom house is the perfect spot for large groups visiting Asheville. This peaceful 4-house neighborhood sits on a private road, less than 9 miles from major sites like The Biltmore Estate and Downtown Asheville!

The space
Family Friendly | 3,300 Sq Ft | Newly Renovated | Sparkling Clean

This group-friendly getaway is great for remote work and school, extended family gatherings, bachelor/ bachelorette celebrations, church and business retreats, and college group reunions! If you're traveling for sightseeing in downtown Asheville or adventure in the famous Great Smoky Mountains, this is the place to be! The WiFi speed is a whopping 200 Mbps!

The space
Boasting 4,000 square feet of immaculate living space, this gorgeous 6BR/3.5BA estate occupies 0.75 beautifully landscaped acres in one of Asheville’s most distinguished communities.

description:
READ WHOLE LISTING BEFORE BOOKING

Sunny ground floor studio apartment in West Asheville. 10-15 minutes from downtown Asheville, 5-10 minutes from Haywood Road. Private entrance. Smart TV with Netflix, Hulu, Prime. Kitchenette - mini-fridge, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, kettle. No stove.

NO DRUGS OR EXCESSIVE DRINKING. NO PARTIES

Hospital, & The Blue Ridge Parkway are nearby. Downtown Asheville & Biltmore Estate are 6 miles away. Guests enjoy sunning on the big rock in the river and watching the abundant wildlife from the large decks. We respect the privacy of our guests but are available should you need guidance.

The space
Driftwood by The River 3.0 is recently renovated. This lower level duplex boasts 9 foot ceilings and ample windows giving it an open and spacious feel. Freshly tiled common areas and carpeted bedrooms give the apartment a clean and cozy ambiance. Large covered decks overlook the river and feature a gas grill, patio furniture and indirect lighting. One master suite on the river side with queen bed and private bathroom with shower. Second bedroom with queen bed. Third bedroom with full bed a

A feel-good, loving mindful space offering a great location walkable to West Asheville. One bedroom loft, one bath, kitchen with an induction stovetop, mini-fridge, coffee pot, and toaster. A little breakfast bar with 2 stools and a sitting room with a love seat that opens into a single bed. Access to our communal stone patio for outdoor relaxing and backyard trampoline for some "bring you back to your childhood" fun! Free access to loving on our super sweet cat Una and dog Shiloh.

The space
Enjoy your own private space in a great location. Super clean with great hosts happy to either give you your space or offer Asheville tips.

With two ultra-private suites, a richly detailed open-concept common area, and a New Orleans-style balcony, this newly renovated 2BR loft pairs contemporary design with a 1920s urban spirit. Located in the heart of downtown Asheville. Sleeps 4.

The space

Located in the heart of downtown Asheville, you’re within a short walk of delectable restaurants and cool cafes. Discover several craft breweries in less than 1 mile of your door.

LIVING AREAS

description:
This glorious 6BR getaway is nestled in the Cane Creek Valley of the Blue Ridge Mountains, a short drive from downtown Asheville. Three living rooms, a fireplace, a gourmet kitchen, and inviting outdoor spaces promise an enchanting retreat. Sleeps 19.

The space
This glorious 6BR/4.5BA getaway is nestled in the Cane Creek Valley of the Blue Ridge Mountains, a short drive from downtown Asheville. The Hart House features three finely furnished living rooms, a fireplace, and gourmet kitchen chefs will love. With approximately 4,500 square feet of living space and five suites, it's ideal for family gatherings and special occasions.

This secluded getaway is surrounded by 100+ acres of lush forest, horse farms, cattle ranches, and grazing meadows. From the classic front porch to the outdoor firepit, an idyllic woodland setting awaits your enjoyment.

LIVING AREAS

The open-concept family room is perfect for sharing drinks and conversation.

description:

A quiet, comfortable home in the downtown area will have you relaxed after your explorations of Asheville and the surrounding areas. The front door opens to the South Slope and you can walk to restaurants, breweries, music venues, theaters, and much more. The two (2) car garage has a keyless entry lock. Use the stairs or ride the private in house elevator to living areas.

The space
The second floor has the living room, dining room and kitchen. Games and books are provided or view your favorite show on the TV Roku system. A modern kitchen has the essentials for preparing your favorite meals. The third floor has a master bedroom with a king bed, walk-in closet, and a bath with two sink areas and a walk-in shower. Enjoy this large 3 bedroom bungalow walking distance to downtown Asheville. Close to restaurants, shops, galleries, and music, it's a perfect location for wandering downtown or jumping on the highway to explore the parkway or West Asheville. The house is very spacious with two living rooms and a dine-in kitchen, making it ideal for families or small groups. The house comes with a private parking spot and on-street parking.

The space
This classic 1920s home is spacious and charming. It boasts two large bedrooms and one smaller, two living rooms, and a large kitchen with plenty of dining area. Enjoy antique furnishings and a classic setting with all the modern amenities you need. The internet is fast, and the TV carries Netflix, Hulu, and Prime. The fully stocked kitchen is available for all your culinary needs!

Guest access
You'll have access to the whole house - bedrooms, bathroom, kitchen, living areas, and a small (unfenced) yard out

name: Paradise parkway launch pad
description:
Magnificent views with wonderful spaces in this home.

This is not a party house .

Grand Slam!
True to its name, Grand Slam hits it out of the park, and is actually located just outside of the Asheville Tourists ballpark. As such, it is right in the heart of it all in downtown Asheville, making it possible to literally walk to everything and anything downtown!
Come create special Asheville memories in the heart of it all!

The space
Location:
Private, luxury condominium located in the new, upscale Bauhaus residences in downtown Asheville. You are about 15 minutes to Asheville Regional airport, and only 5 minutes to the gates of Biltmore Estate. You are also app. 15 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, and easy access to everything in the WNC area. (1-car (compact) garage)

name: Retro Forest Cottage w/Fire Pit- Close to Downtown
description:
Retro forest cottage is nestled on 3 acres only 15 minutes from downtown Asheville and easy access to local breweries, restaurants, music venues, and outdoor activities.
We offer an opportunity to indulge in simple outdoor pleasures like listening to the birds chirp on the deck, star gazing at night, or playing music and telling stories around the campfire. All while staying close to all of Asheville's major attractions.

The space
The house is 620 sqft located on 3 acres. We also live on the land, we are a friendly couple with a friendly pup. We're always open to making new friends but also will respect your privacy.
The fire pit is communal and from time to time we have campers who will be tucked away in the forest.
This space provides you with the opportunity to meet friendly faces or enjoy the countryside privacy right from your cottage and porch.

name: Nature-lover's river view cottage, near downtown
description:
A quiet and quaint 1300-square-foot house with a spacious wrap-around deck nestled among the trees overlooking the river. A serene nature-lovers setting on the outside with cozy, colorful, clean decor and lots of light on the inside.

Two bedrooms, plus a dedicated office/writing room (with high-speed wifi - and a few free weights and yoga mat!) ...just 7 miles from downtown Asheville. Mountains-to-Sea trailhead is just minutes away, as well as dog-walks and local restaurants.

The space
• The house is filled with light...skylights in both living room and kitchen.

• Kitchen is newly remodeled and stocked with coffee, teas, a reverse osmosis filtered water system, VitaMix blender, plus all needed cooking utensils and supplies for eating at home.

• The house is cleaned and supplied with earth-friendly cleaning and paper products.

• We follow AirBnb covid guidelines for cleaning and sanitization of the entire property. T

name: Hominy Home in Asheville
description:
Stay in a fully furnished house in Asheville that backs up to the Hominy Creek greenway walking & biking trails.

The house is tucked away from the busy downtown but only a 5 minute drive to everything Asheville has to offer.

Just 5 minutes to West Asheville, Downtown Asheville, South Slope breweries, New Belgium Brewery, Bent Creek, the Blue Ridge Parkway and the River Arts District.

The space
There are 3 bedrooms with 2 queen beds, 2 twin beds and 1 and a half baths. The basement has a couch, TV and an attached laundry room.

A wrap around porch with covered back porch overlooks our fenced in yard.

If you have kids, they'll enjoy our two swings and a kids play-set in the backyard. PThe walking trails in Hominy Creek Greenway are easily accessible from the backyard.

name: Beautiful Garden Cottage Townhome, Mountain and City Views, Centrally Located
description: Beautiful, second story 2 bdr/2 bath townhome located off Charlotte St and moments to downtown Asheville. The Patton Parker House is an Asheville Historic Landmark; the Garden Cottage was built in 2017 to complement the house and grounds. An open and spacious layout boasts high end furnishings where guests will enjoy comfort and luxury in this historic estate. Relax with a glass of wine or local craft brew while enjoying the one of a kind city and Mountain view's from the large front porch. If you're traveling with a larger group, the downstairs townhome is also available to rent.

name: Private entry to cozy room minutes to downtown!
description:
Just a short 12-minute drive to downtown, this is the perfect place to rest your head during your stay in Asheville. With your own private parking space, entrance, porch, bedroom, and bathroom, you will hardly know we are here! You will also have your own kitchenette, with a mini-fridge, microwave, coffee maker and plenty of dishes. We have also included some books, games, movies and a TV for your entertainment! We love Asheville and hope you enjoy our city as much as we do!

The space
You will also have a lovely porch where you can check out our beautiful view of the mountains while you have your morning coffee!

Guest access
You will have total access of your own parking space, porch, bathroom and bedroom with private kitchenette

Other things to note
We have a beautiful view off porch!

name: Mid Century Bungalow Mins to Biltmore & Downtown
description:
Perfectly located just south of downtown, our 2 bedroom 2 bath home (sleeps 6) is ready to host your group for an amazing trip to Asheville!

Our home is located on the border of the residential Kenilworth neighborhood and the Biltmore Village neighborhood. We are half a mile from the entrance to the Biltmore Estate and the shopping of Biltmore Village. Downtown is quick drive or uber ride (< 5 minutes).

Many breweries and restaurants are within walking distance (< 1 mile)!

The space
null.

Guest access
Access is provided via a Nest smart lock. Key codes are sent before check-in.

Other things to note
The house is connected to a 1 bedroom apartment, so we appreciate guests respecting their privacy.

name: Sunflower Suite, 10 minutes to Downtown
description:
Bright and private one bedroom/one bathroom with kitchenette and dining area. Located in a quiet West Asheville neighborhood only 10 minutes to Downtown and 20 minutes to the gorgeous Blue Ridge Parkway! Just minutes away from the heart of West Asheville. Enjoy relaxing on the private deck, or out by the fire pit (wood included). This is a legal, permitted stay by City of Asheville.

The space
The space is on the first level of our home and includes a separate entrance and parking area. A sliding barn door separates the living room from the bedroom area. The living room contains a 50-inch flat screen TV with Netflix included. There is an air mattress and automatic pump located in the closet. In the bedroom, comfy memory foam on the queen bed assures a great night's sleep!

The space also features a workspace desk, bluetooth speaker, dining area, kitchenette with microwave, mini fridge/freezer and ice, toaster and water cooler. Iron and ironing board inc

name: A Stones throw from Asheville & Weaverville
description:
Hansel & Gretel rock mixed-use duplex located 3 miles from Weaverville & Asheville; convenient to I-26 & I-240. Newly decorated 2 bedroom ground level apartment with a separate entrance. Home has a galley kitchen, walk-in shower, living room area, and off-street parking. It is close to the Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore, Grove Park, breweries, tubing, Rivers Arts District and everything Asheville has to offer. Note: The owner's accounting firm is on the 2nd floor of the home open M-F 9 to 5.

The space
This home is 1375 sq ft space all ground level. It features a fully furnished galley kitchen including snacks, coffee, and tea. The bathroom has a walk-in shower. The shower only has one small lip making it easy for guests with mobility concerns. Both bedrooms have queen size beds. The living room has a 4K 42-inch screen TV. The washer and dryer are available for guest use. Off-street parking is available for up to 2 vehicles.

name: Close to Downtown, Updated 1920's Era Apartment
description:
Comfort, Beauty and Location.
Min. Monthly Rental
This 2 bedroom, 2 full bath apartment is move in ready!
All utilities, Internet, WiFi, Direct TV, soundbar and video streaming are included in the monthly rental.
In a quiet residential neighborhood, within walking distance to Starbucks, City Bakery, great restaurants, pubs and wine bars. Trader Joe's and Whole Foods are 4 blocks away. Walk to downtown!

View the house at 59arlington dot com.

Quality linens, furniture, beds for comfort.

The space
The space was decorated by an interior designer- Feng Shui consultant. The towels and linens are high quality, the kitchen is fully equipped. The space is spacious and intimate.

description:
Welcome to our modern 1 bed, 1 bath, apartment complete with kitchenette. This completely private apartment is attached to the back of our home, in the Bent Creek neighborhood. Bent Creek Forest has access to over 50 miles of trails, is minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, the NC Arboretum, boat launches to the French Broad River, and is an easy 15 minute drive to downtown Asheville. A short walk or bike ride from the apartment will lead you to endless trails. We look forward to having you!

The space
This new construction apartment offers a large one bedroom, complete with queen sized bed, a large closet, couch for lounging, a TV with Amazon Fire to conveniently stream your favorite shows or movies, full bathroom, and a kitchenette. We provide coffee, tea, honey and sugar. The kitchenette comes stocked with dishes, cups, mugs, an electric kettle, coffee pot and french press, a toaster oven large enough to bake a 10" pizza, a microwave, and an instant pot. You wi

name: Charming Cottage-Convenient and Comfortable
description:
This Cottage is nestled in the woods in a quiet neighborhood but minutes to the Biltmore House and downtown Asheville.
This newly constructed, 800 sq ft cottage has all the amenities you would expect, a well appointed kitchen, cozy bedding, delicious coffee, and large windows that allow an abundance of natural light to pour in. Perfectly rustic and modern!

The space
The cottage has a large deck with a picnic table, umbrella and patio chairs. There is a fire pit outside with some lawn chairs so bring your s'mores makings!

The layout of the cottage includes kitchen, living area, bathroom on the lower level, and 2 bedrooms upstairs.

There are also stairs leading up to the house.

name: Great Location, Duplex B, Views, River Access,Dogs
description:
This Family & Dog friendly 2 story, 1 bedroom, 1 1/2 bath duplex is in a quiet and Convenient Neighborhood. Great for 1-4 guest only. This rental has a full working kitchen, living room, King size bed, Tub/shower, Futon(full size bed), and amazing Mountain views from living room & sitting area. Outside is your own private deck. Access to the Swannanoa River. Dog Friendly but before booking please check with us for dog guidelines & give a description of dogs. There is a pet fee for them to stay.

The space
This property sits on 1 Acre, with great views from inside rental and out.

This is a duplex so you may or may not have other guest staying on the other side. Parking spaces, entrances, decks, and rental are all separate. The only thing shared is the yard, and laundry room.

The property has a trail to river front for fishing and swimming. The water comes from the reservoir so it is very clean. Trout is stocked every year. This private tr

name: Bright + Modern West Asheville Guest House
description:
Our new, custom-built West Asheville guest house is the perfect place to stay if you're looking for a serene setting with quick access to all the city has to offer. Your private studio suite has a fridge, workspace, TV, large couch, loft bed, and patio with fire pit. A 5-minute drive takes you up to Haywood Rd—the heart of West Asheville with great restaurants and breweries. Within 10 minutes you'll find downtown Asheville, The Biltmore, River Arts District, Blue Ridge Pkwy, Arboretum and more.

The space
Bright, modern, quiet, and sparkling clean. Enjoy luxury mattress and linens, bathroom with walk-in shower, seating area, TV, fridge, and outdoor space which faces lovely woods. You're right in West Asheville, within minutes of some of the city's best restaurants and breweries, although you'll feel like you're at a country retreat once you pull off the main road onto our 1/2 mile private drive. Please note that you will need to be comfortable climbing a ladder to

name: Luxurious Suite-Easy Access to Town & Mountains
description:
Relax in your comfortable and perfectly clean private one bedroom suite with separate entrance after a fun day of sight-seeing and exploring the town. You will enjoy unwinding in this newly built suite or being outside on your private patio with beautiful views of the mountains and Blue Ridge Parkway. Conveniently located only 10 minutes from downtown Asheville. Free parking and a sidewalk leads you to a separate entrance, which has keyless entry for self check-in. First booking was 6/18/21.

The space
You can unwind on either the king size bed or in the sitting area (with pull-out sofa) while watching the 42 inch on 4K TV with streaming access. There is a laptop friendly work space with high speed Wi-Fi available. The large bathroom has a heated floor and spacious shower with multiple shower heads and built-in shower seat. You have control of thermostat for control of heating and A/C.

Guest access
Park at the top right side of the house.

name: New Downtown Townhome with Private Elevator, Rooftop Terrace, Mountain Views
description:
New construction luxury townhome located in downtown Asheville. This 3 story end unit townhome is located in Building #2 of the brand new Bauhaus South Slope development. A moments walk to the popular South Slope district of downtown, right beside Asheville's minor league baseball field, and just several blocks to the heart of downtown Asheville you will be in one of the most desirable locations in town. The home has a private garage that will fit 2 compact cars, private elevator for your convenience, and a large rooftop terrace outfitted with a grill, fire pit, and plenty of comfortable seating to take in the mountain and city and views. Equipped with high-end furnishings and finishes, floor to ceiling windows, linens, stocked kitchen, and a staff that is available 24 hours, you'll enjoy the comfort and privacy of a vacation rental while receiving the service you would experience at a luxury hotel.

The space
New construction luxury townhome located in downtown A

name: Luxurious and Walkable West Asheville
description:
We would love to welcome you to our newly built home in West Asheville. The bedroom is designed to give you the best nights sleep possible. Tempur-Pedic memory foam mattress, blackout shades, separate climate control, and white noise machine should leave you fully rested to take on all that Asheville has to offer. The bathroom has a full glass rain shower and tub for cleaning up after a day hiking or exploring. Walk-able to Biscuit Head, Sunny Point Cafe, Zia, and other West Asheville staples!

The space
This is a private room and private bathroom in our home. You will enter the front door and go up the stairs to the end of the hallway to reach your private space. It is a shared house, but does provide as much privacy as possible as our bedroom/bathroom/common space is on the first floor. We would love to welcome you to Asheville and give you recommendations for your time here.

description:
Nestled in a quite neighborhood in Asheville NC. This studio space is 2 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway and 3 miles from the center of down town. Asheville. A simple studio space with a modern vibe above the garage of a brand new modern farmhouse.

The space
The owner is a photographer and so the space was designed as a photography studio. It's very open, clean and simple with natural light flooding in from every angle and skylights. The studio is powered by solar power and located on a spacious property with 2 acres of grass. There's a little creek, garden and even a chicken coop.

description:
The space
Perfectly located house in Kenilworth with fenced in back yard while facing a big park and woods. We have three super nice lovable dogs that will be kept out of your way if need be. 1 mile from downtown and The Biltmore House.

Access to living room, shared full bathroom, private half bath, and kitchen.

Other things to note

description:
This legal rental is just a short walk to downtown (.8 miles). This well appointed carriage house is nestled in a beautiful historic residential neighborhood on the grounds of the 1899 Wright Inn and Carriage House.

The space
This quaint carriage house was built in 1899 and is decorated in a farmhouse/country style.

The carriage house boasts 2 bedrooms on the second floor and has queen beds and a full bathroom, the first floor bedroom has a full sized bed and a full bathroom.

The living room has plenty of seating for your group to socialize. The kitchen is full kitchen and will allow you to be able to make some meals and dine in the dining room that has enough seating for 6.

Guest access
You will have access to a private patio equipped with a table and chairs. The parking lot will accommodate 2 cars from the carriage house.

description:
Good vibes abound in cozy West Asheville cottage near New Belgium Brewery, Haywood Rd and downtown.
Fully equipped home with high speed internet, large screened TVs, FULL KITCHEN, blue tooth speakers, all new furniture only 5 minutes or less to all of the downtown sites! House is very private in a small, quiet neighborhood.
Two levels easily accommodates 4-5 people. Enjoy coffee or beer on the screened porch or around the fire pit.

The space
PLEASE NOTE -

description:

description:
In the HEART of West Asheville, Walk Anywhere! Very sunny 2 bed 2 bath, STEPS away from cafes, shopping, dive bars, breweries, and coffee shops. The greenway is just a few blocks away for running/biking/walking along the river and on the way to Asheville’s best attractions. name: Asheville Town Cabin
description:
Mountain Privacy with Proximity to Downtown! Discover the desirable Town Mountain community with a stay at Asheville Town Cabin, where the privacy and tranquility of the woods is only minutes away from downtown's many restaurants and shops. Enjoy a round of golf or spa services at the Omni Grove Park Inn, just 2.5 miles from Asheville Town Cabin. This might very well be the perfect Asheville vacation rental, offering convenience, seasonal mountain views, a rec room, and a hot tub! The Master Bedroom has a spectacular mountain view!

Contemporary mountain cabin features at Asheville Town Cabin include hardwood flooring throughout, soaring cathedral ceilings, and a covered wrap-around deck. A free-standing gas stove gives the large open living and kitchen area a cozy feeling that encourages conversation and relaxation. Make your best home-cooked meals in the fully equipped kitchen, and rest assured there's plenty of seating with both a dining table and a breakfast bar.
<

name: The Haven.  Have it all...luxury/comfort/location
description:
Enjoy Asheville while staying in a charming historic 95 year old home in close in Montford, walking distance to downtown. Light and airy suite with private entrance, luxury modern furnishings, off street parking, large living room area and adjoining dining nook*, access to deck and lovely large yard (also shared with two energetic but friendly dogs), and a host who is always ready to help out when needed.

The space
Must love dogs! I have two sweet rescue pups that you will probably hear pitter-pattering on the floor above. You're also likely to encounter them in the yard too, so don't be surprised to find a nose pressed to the door hoping for an invitation to join you inside (the answer is NO! the apartment is a dog-free zone). If you want a bit more low key stay we can work out a schedule so you won't have to bump into them. I've also got a few birds that sometimes may give a yell, but as birds go they're pretty quiet most of the time. The outdoor bir
