description:
Amazing space with the best views of Downtown Asheville. Located in the very exclusive North Asheville Neighborhood overlooking the Omni grove Park Inn and Golf Course. Large open Space in brand new home . Private deck and small yard area below . Plenty of living space, 50" smart TV, wifi, Queen bed with crisp clean linens , Pool Table & Ping pong , Counter area with Refrigerator and coffee maker at your disposal. High end Italian Banske tile bathroom.

The space
.Limited Parking . Stairs to unit. One large suite with Queen pillowtop Bed, and futon.Large Deck with incredible views Of Downtown Asheville ,The Blue Ridge mountains and the Omni Grove park Inn. This is a peacefull and quiet getaway surrounded by nature but minutes from Downtown Asheville.

Guest access
private access to entire floor , large deck and small yard area

Other things to note
The house is located on the side of a mountain so parking in limi

description:
Gorgeous, newly built luxury apartment in the heart of West Asheville. 5 minute walk to Biscuit Head, Sunny Point Cafe, and all that the up and coming Haywood Road strip has to offer visitors. Less than 10 minute drive to the center of downtown, the Blue Ridge Parkway and hundreds of miles of trails. Both city living and the great outdoors are at your fingertips with this dream vacation rental.

name: Artist’s Mtn. Retreat: 6 Mi to Downtown Asheville!
description:
Stop dreaming about the Blue Ridge Mountains and start exploring them at this Asheville apartment! Located just 5.5 miles away from downtown and 2.6 miles from the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway, this 2-bedroom, 1-bath vacation rental gives you easy access to the charming history and natural beauty of North Carolina. Take a quick Uber downtown for some premier brewery hopping, or stay at home to birdwatch through the wall-to-wall windows while dinner cooks in the full kitchen.

The space
Central Location | Pet Friendly | Wireless Internet

Nestled in the Appalachian Mountains, this apartment provides seclusion while still accessible to downtown Asheville and is perfect for couples and families seeking a secluded weekend retreat.

Master Bedroom: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed

INDOOR LIVING: Hand-blown glass details, wall-to-wall windows w/ forest views, flat-screen cable TV
KITCHEN: Fully equipped w/ cooking basics, 4-person br

name: Velvet Underground Asheville unique music inspired
description:
My intention is in keeping with the year the house was built 1967 and incorporating music. There is a turntable and a selection of noteworthy records. Last house on the road in a quaint quiet neighborhood (think Brady Bunch)

The space
Private entrance with plenty of street parking

Guest access
Beautiful level yard area with room for kids to run around while you sit and take in the Mountain View’s.

Other things to note

Extra linens/pillows for couch inside the couch.
Extra linens for any reason in hall drawers.
Feel free to walk around in the backyard.
We do have black bears on occasion so be aware. They are after trash not you and should be left alone.

name: Historic & Artistic Apt + Private Parking & Patio "Cobalt Corner" at  130 Biltmore Ave
description:
Journey into the Asheville art world. Cloak yourself in the greatest of downtown. Sleep surrounded by the city’s history and architectural heritage circa 1905.

This is Asheville legacy, a private downtown haven, the art gallery you can live in. This is your 1BR/1BA, 825 SF retreat with a private patio (an additional 300 SF), free private parking, and your very own goldfish pond.

This is an architectural gem of original stone walls, seamless indoor/outdoor living, & modern designer details.

The space
Cobalt Corner is your happy place. Quiet (especially for the city). Historic. Central. And the very essence of old Asheville, made new for modern travelers.

Welcome!

HIGHLIGHTS (more details, below)

•• Unbeatable Downtown Location ••
→ Don’t come all the way to Asheville, only to stay on the outskirts! Cobalt Corner is located in south downtown, within view (closest intersection) of the Orange

description:
Find mountain serenity at this spacious 4BR getaway, located on a half-acre just 15 minutes from the culture and cuisine of Asheville. Relax on the deck or easily access hiking and biking trails, swimming, fishing, rafting, tubing, and kayaking. Sleeps 11.

The space
Featuring a private primary suite and a game room, this 4BR/2BA home is an ideal mountain retreat. Freshly updated, your retreat features all-new flooring and paint as well as a brand-new deck offering privacy. Appalachian serenity awaits on a half-acre lot amidst gorgeous greenery. Your rental is situated just 15 minutes from the thriving culture and cuisine of Asheville and Black Mountain.

Delight in a plethora of nearby outdoor adventures and activities with beautiful hiking (within a 5-minute drive) near Warren Wilson College and the Pisgah National Forest.

LIVING AREA

Unwind into vacation mode in the plush living area, featuring a remote-controlled gas fireplace a

name: Convenient & Quiet With Gazebo & Seasonal Hot Tub
description:
A very Convenient and Comfortable home with Seasonal Hot Tub has everything you need for a relaxing stay in the Mountains. Located Close to I26, I40, Downtown, AVL Airport, Spectacular Blue Ridge Parkway, NC Arboretum, Hiking & Biking, Restaurants, Biltmore House and Outlet Mall. Our home is ideally located to everything in Asheville with quiet Country Setting. Partially handicapped assessable with a ramp. There is plenty of outdoor space to enjoy quiet evenings and Fresh Mountain Air Mornings.

The space
Our home includes a seasonal hot tub & Gazebo. Located in a quiet country setting for relaxing or cooking out. A large yard area for small trailer parking for Motorcycle enthusiasts to enjoy beautiful, spectacular day drives in and around the Blue Ridge Mountains. A closed in front porch to relax in morning and evening. A fully equipped home for all your needs.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire home. Hot Tub Is Seasonal Octo

name: Albemarle Inn Bed & Breakfast
description:
Enjoy gracious hospitality & Southern comfort in Asheville, North Carolina. An 11 room classic turn-of- the-century mansion, the Albemarle Inn sits in a quiet neighborhood, yet is located just minutes from artsy & Foodtopia downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate & the majestic Blue Ridge Mountains.
All guestrooms have private bath, some with old fashioned claw foot tubs & some with modern walk-in showers.
Continental Breakfast Buffet, along with daily Entrees, are served in our cheery sunporch.

The space
The common areas: Parlor, Veranda, Dining Rooms and gardens are available for guests to relax and enjoy.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Asheville Town Mountain Hideaway 'Bear Pause'
description:
This fabulous home features 4BD/3BA with mountain views and seclusion, all the amenities you could ask for and is less than 7 minutes to the heart of Downtown Asheville! Convenience is the definition when it comes to vacationing in the mountains! You are literally minutes to Downtown Asheville, the Asheville brewery scene, the historic Biltmore Estate, shopping, hiking, mountain biking, the Blue Ridge Parkway, Hendersonville, and so much more.

The space
Close and convenient to downtown Asheville. Minutes to breweries, Blu Ridge Parkway, restaurants, shopping and so much more . Please note~driveway is not equipped for more than 3 vehicles.

Guest access
The whole house is available

Other things to note
Please note : there are bears in the neighborhood. Please do NOT leave food outside or your cars unlocked. They will find a way to get in.
Also, there are at least 6 speed bumps on the road to get to the house. Plea

name: Minutes from West Asheville, private and cozy
description:
A mere stones throw from West Asheville and downtown Asheville. Private yet close to all the action Asheville has to offer. Minutes from hiking and biking. Minutes from Shopping, Minutes from breweries. All amenities of comfort. Smart TV, High Speed internet, Tankless hot water heater, hot tub and fire pit.

The space
Close enough to explore......far enough to relax!!!! UBER is easy and cheap to town!
Minutes from West Asheville and River Arts District. Access to the greenway 1/2 mile away.
When you stay with us you will feel like you are far away from everything. But in reality everything you could possibly want to do is just around the corner.
We are close to everything Asheville has to offer—Biltmore House, hiking, biking, shopping, tubing, running, the arts....the list is endless. Eclectic and funky West Asheville is minutes away offering a great collection of eateries, galleries and shops. Downtown Asheville is just minutes beyond that with a d

name: *Comfy Smart Condo|10 mins to DT & Biltmore*
description:
All the amenities and luxuries of home while being ideally located to the best of Asheville! Make yourself at home with convenient features including 50" TVs in the living room and bedrooms, a fully-stocked kitchen, charger stations, blackout curtains, sound machines, smart locks, Amazon Echo, and books and games for your whole group!

The space
Make yourself at home in this 2 bedroom upstairs condo that sleeps 6. There are two bedrooms and two full bathrooms. The master bedroom includes a king bed, an en suite bathroom, a 50" smart TV, and blackout curtains. The 2nd bedroom has a King bed, a 50" smart TV, and plenty of extra amenities to make it a great stay. A full-sized sofa bed is available with linens for use as well.

This condo is the perfect place for your Asheville adventure! It is conveniently located 10 minutes to Downtown Asheville and The Biltmore House! Getting around town with Uber or Lyft is very reasonable, starting around $8.

name: Sophie's Retreat - In town - Pets - Mountain Views
description:
Located on Sunset Mountain overlooking Asheville. Convenient to downtown (1.3 miles), Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore House, great hiking, shopping, eating and pubs.
Sunset Mountain is a peaceful, quiet, scenic neighborhood with cool nights and pleasant days. It has always been a desired location for it's convenience, elevation and beauty. Wildlife abound, views amazing and sunsets fabulous.
Come see for yourself why it's the perfect place to spend a peaceful quiet and tranquility vacation.

The space
Located on Sunset Mountain overlooking Asheville. Convenient to downtown (1.3 miles), Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore House, great hiking, shopping, eating and pubs.

description:
Cozy single level home 1 mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway & only 7 mins to downtown Asheville! Set back from the main road on 10 acres, you'll have privacy & plenty of room to play outside. Three total bedrooms with a King, Queen & single/bunk bed combo (rated for adults up to 200lbs) share one full bath, fully equipped kitchen & living/dining area. Tons of parking, self-check in at your convenience, pets allowed with notice. Near VA Hospital, Folk Art Center, Warren Wilson College & Exit 55.

The space
Updated ranch style home on privately owned 10 acre property in quiet East Asheville neighborhood. You'll have access to the entire living space - Master bedroom with king sized bed, guest room with queen sized bed and third bedroom with 2 single beds and a lofted bunk (ok for adults up to 200 lbs). Pets allowed!

All contact surfaces throughly cleaned between guests with anti-bacterial and anti-viral products. This includes door handles, light switches,

name: Cozy Mountain Retreat -  Views, Fire Pit & Hot Tub
description:
Awesome, large apartment with beautiful views, amazing natural light and incredible outdoor spaces including hot tub and fire pit table. A true place for total relaxation and stress relief. All of this is close to the airport, shopping and downtown.

The space
This one bedroom mountain retreat is the entire lower level walkout of our home. It offers a large open floor plan of 1,600 square feet, with a full kitchen, bathroom, living room and study nook. It has a separate entrance and is very private. There is a very large deck that has beautiful views with Southern exposure facing multiple mountain ranges. To fully enjoy the view, soak in the hot tub or relax by the fire pit table with your favorite glass of wine. Ping Pong table, Bumper Pool table and lots of games are also available for your entertainment. The property is an acre with a lovely garden area below for great privacy.

Accommodations:
(Sleeps 4) 1 bedroom (king bed), 1 full bath

description:

The space

Perfect view of the clay courts. 1200 sq feet. Convenient to amenities, downtown and outdoors! 1 mile to Blue Ridge Parkway and Mountain-to-Sea Trail. 5 miles from NC Arboretum. 4 miles to Biltmore. GREAT new kitchen and interior. Comfortable! Nice deck overlooking courts.

The space
***Healthcare and other essential service folks, please message me for best pricing***

description:
Newly constructed guesthouse on the doorstep of Bent Creek Experimental Forest. Enjoy hikes and biking from the house! The Blue Ridge Parkway, NC Arboretum, shopping at the outlets, and floats on the French Broad River are a moments drive away. Enjoy the full kitchen, smart t.v. with Roku, and in-house stacked laundry unit. Plus, a high efficiency mini-split heat pump will keep the temperature just right. Finally, the place is yours...no shared walls or footsteps knocking overhead. Enjoy!

The space
Entire upstairs of detached garage building. The garage area is not accessible, however we, the homeowners next door, do not park in the garage so you will not hear the garage door going up and down. We do access the garage via a side entry door on occasion to grab tools, bikes, etc.

Guest access
Upstairs apartment, the garage below is homeowner’s storage.

Smart TV with Netflix, WIFI, Work space/table and 2 chairs, coffee maker, filtered water, fridge and microwave. Outdoor table and chairs. Sidewalk to Haywood road.

Private entrance with keyless digital keypad. Follow stepping stones to right side of house to access your suite.

Pisgah forest offers breathtaking views. You can cruise along the Blue Ridge parkway and venture closer via hike or mountain bike ride.

Homestay Permit 19-08216

I have two hypoallergenic Siberian cats, one is social and the other one hides.

Love the provided bathrobes for slipping to the shared bathroom, just down the hall, or hot tub, located on the main level side porch. Inhale the fresh mountain air!

We have some self serve breakfast options and snacks available. Great for travelers who intend to be out exploring most of the day.

You’ll love our location! We are just 7.5 miles from downtown Asheville in a country setting with gorgeous Mountain View’s off the back deck and from the hot tub. Not only is your room spacious, you’ll have over 1000 square feet of deck space to spread out on and enjoy. Our guests love doing morning yoga on the back porch or watching the birds and humming birds enjoy the feeders, just off the front porch. This listing really is all about the birds and the bees and being able to

description:
*Covid-19 update: We hire a cleaning service who specializes in cleaning in accordance with CDC guidelines after each guest.

This home is in the Biltmore Terrace neighborhood. Close to all in Asheville.

Private home, access to all it has to offer. 4 queen beds in 3 bedrooms and a pull-out sofa. 2 full baths and a 1/2 bath.

name: Howie's Hideout
description:
Simple, non conformist Asheville Eclectic!

The space
This house is completely renovated from top to bottom providing all things needed for your stay! Walking through this house is like walking through an art exhibit full of local art! Beginning with a 1939 print of a Smokey Mountains National Park Map to photos of local street art. There are so many built in beautiful ascents throughout the house to enjoy. The vintage metal kitchen, built in custom stained glass, upcycled stunning wood details everywhere! This house is truly a work of art! We would love for you to come, stay and play here at our house in Asheville!!!
There are two Smart TVs' in the house that have basic Roku channels, HBO Go and Showtime, one in the upstairs living area and one in the downstairs living area. The one downstairs has a DVD player so bring your favorite DVD's (for you or the kiddos) or rent them at Orbitz on Haywood Rd!

The house amazing mountain views, sunrise

name: Gobble & Gruff Farm Stay & Play in Asheville
description:
Farm Studio apartment on six beautiful acres, two miles from Warren Wilson College, ten miles to Asheville. It's the perfect place for a pair or young family of three or four to spend a unique and affordable time in Asheville. Feed the chickens, hike the property, jump in the nearby Swannanoa River swimming hole. Make a quick stop in to see your Warren Wilson College student (2 minute drive or 15 min bike ride). Hike nearby Shope Creek trails....all the while only 10 minutes from downtown AVL.

The space
Just one mile off the Blue Ridge Parkway, this cozy space has lovely farm views, a kitchenette (micro, toaster, small refrigerator, bar sink, silverware, plates, glasses and mugs for four), full bath with shower. There's a crib mattress available to use on the floor, as well as a love seat that folds flat to a single bed (perfect for a small person or child). There's wifi and a TV, as well as a small table and two chairs for eating breakfast or working.

name: #6 Magnolia Room at Oakland Cottage
description:
Centrally located in town, 1.5 mile south of downtown center, 1 mile north of Biltmore Estate entrance & Biltmore Village, 1/2 mile to River Arts District and "South Slope," w numerous tasting rooms & Breweries. Blue Ridge Parkway National Park with access to trails & the great outdoors just a few miles away.

The space
Enjoy a private room with private full bath & hearty breakfast served each morning in the dining room. Many common areas indoor & out to expand your space. Local tickets to various events (Biltmore Estate, Trolley Tour) available, inquire, avoid lines & have ready for your arrival.

name: New South Slope Townhome, Private Elevator, Rooftop Terrace, City and Mtn. Views
description:
This new 2 BR/2 BA/2 half BA townhome is located in Downtown Asheville's popular South Slope District. It truly is one of a kind with a private elevator and private roof-top terrace where you can enjoy beautiful city and mountain views to the North Four floors of living space offer the perfect combination of privacy and comfort for your group. Less than a mile from the heart of downtown Asheville, craft breweries and award winning restaurants are moments from your door step; not to mention the famed Biltmore Estate is a mere 5 minute drive. Luxury, comfort, and convenience await you!
Security cameras, for your safety, are located at the front and back exteriors of the property. This is a residential complex; please be mindful of your neighbors and refer to the quiet hours and HOA rules listed below:
The maximum number of guests occupying this townhome can not exceed 6 people. If occupancy exceeds 6, Towns Property Management, Inc reserves the right to evict guests.
No

Beautiful brand-new construction Modern Green Built/Energy Star home in the Shiloh neighboorhood of Asheville. Minutes from everything Asheville has to offer including 4 breweries, fine dining, casual dining, bars, upscale shopping in Biltmore Village, The Biltmore House and Antler Hill Winery within 4 minutes driving time. (You could walk if you wanted, about 1-1.5 miles) Easy access to and from the interstate to get to outdoor excursions on the Parkway or Pisgah National Forest.

Gues

name: Cabin of the Pines with Hot Tub
description:
Nature lovers dream house. Welcome to this custom uber-clean and private eco-home. If you want to see animals, dark skies and listen to sounds of nature, this is the place. Asheville is an incredible area to live. We are 3 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway, which has tremendous views and hiking access, not to mention the Folk Art Center right here in the valley. There are too many restaurants and breweries to even recommend them anymore.

The space
650 square foot eco cabin.
Private ozonated hot tub.
2 bedroom, 1 bathroom with shower.
Full kitchen with island and big windows.
Master with King bed, teak dresser, in-wall speakers and private deck access.
2nd bedroom with Queen bed and walk-in closet.
Washer/Dryer room.
In-wall sound w/ Bluetooth Amp. No TV.
Medium (+/- 30 lbs) Friendly, well-behaved dogs will be welcome for additional fee ($10/day). Dog door and dog fence area.

Guest access

name: Incredible family home with amazing views!
description:
Beautiful family home with amazing views and very private (over 3,500 square feet) 20 minutes from downtown Asheville, in lovely neighborhood. Large bedrooms with ensuites, one with Jack and Jill & master with private sitting area, fireplace & porch. Large entertaining deck with stunning mountain views, 2 large living areas with a fireplace.

The space

• 4 Bedrooms: 1 King, 2 Queen & 1 Queen sofa bed
• 3 Full Baths & 1 Half Bath
• Main Level: Bedroom One - 1 Queen Bed, attached Full Bath
• Upper Level: Bedroom Two - (Master) 1 King Bed, Full Bath with 2 person spa tub, sitting room and enclosed porch with mountain view. Bedroom three - 1 Queen Bed, attached Jack and Jill. Bedroom Four - Queen Sofa bed, attached Jack and Jill
Additions - Huge entertaining deck with covered porch and BBQ grill

Guest access
Entire home except basement apartment which has separate entrance. Property on an acre.

name: West Asheville Town Home for simple living
description:
A 2 bedroom, two story duplex condo in the heart of W Asheville. It is fully outfitted for extended stays. Grocery store, breweries and cafes all are within an easy walk. Downtown and River Arts District are about 2-3 miles, an easy drive, uber, or take the bus from a stop less than a block away. Avoid the bustle of downtown and enjoy the local feel of W Asheville. Great access to all the river and mountain adventures Western North Carolina has to offer. 30 day minimum required by local law.

The space
970 sqft of living space with fully outfitted kitchen, open dining/living area and 2 bedrooms upstairs with a Jack and Jill bathroom to share. The half bath is downstairs. You can also enjoy sitting outside on the porch. There are 2 parking spots assigned to the unit for your use.

Guest access

Bring your kids for a family vacation or just yourselves for a quiet getaway. Come stay with us and feel like you are home.

Savor a fresh cup of organic coffee or tea when you wake up from a restful night's sleep, after you step out of your luxurious shower wrapped in an oversized, organic Turkish cotton towel. Walkable to numerous cafes, restaurants, and pubs in downtown West Asheville, and only a 10-minute drive to downtown.

description:
Want to stay close to downtown Asheville and not break the bank? We're not fancy, but if you've got a tent and want to get a feel for Appalachia then you're in the right place. You will have access to a surprisingly clean outhouse and sink. The campground is tucked away in a neighborhood less than 10 minutes away from downtown Asheville. Tent sites are located in a private, 2-acre wooded valley. There are NO linens, towels or pillows provided. Please read on for more details!

The space
Your Campsite
Site #6 has a footprint of about 20 x 13.5 feet and is located near the community fire pit.

Please just one tent per site and one car per reservation. Additional parking spots available at a fee - just ask!

name: The Flying Gogoplata @ The Baying Hound Campground
description:
The Flying Gogoplata, located in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground, is a tree-house-like sleeping pod suspended 10 feet in the air on stilts. There’s a small, padded twin bed-sized platform for either a small couple or single person. Be sure to bring sleeping bags and pillows (and maybe a sleeping pad if you like it extra soft). The Baying Hound Campground is about 10 minutes from downtown, yet still on the edges of rural, agricultural Asheville.

The space
The Flying Gogoplata
This tree-house like sleeping pod is perfect for the solo traveler or cozy couples. Please note that the bed area is only about 6 feet long and 3.25 feet wide. The staircase is steep, so please take care while going up and down.

Welcome, hammock campers! We are easily one of the closest, and cheapest, camping options when it comes to staying in Asheville. Only 8-12 minutes by car from downtown Asheville, we are a friendly, family-run outfit. The camping spots are in a small, private, green valley, and you’ll feel like you’re "out in the sticks" even though you're actually super close to all the breweries and parks that make Asheville what it is. This site accommodates up to two hammocks - bring your own! :)

The space
You can set up your hammock or a tent in this site! Please just one tent per site and one car per reservation. Additional parking spots available at a fee - just ask!

THE CAMPGROUND

description:
Location With Views!
Close to Downtown, Biltmore Estate, Pisgah National Forest, & Outlets.
Farm House Decor, dining table seats 6, comfortable reclining leather furniture, luxurious bedding, 55" tv with DTV, Hi-speed internet, fully equipped kitchen, hi-capacity washer and dryer in laundry room, and the best part is the covered front porch, with rockers to enjoy the serenity of the mountains, the deer frolicing through the woods, and the horses running through the pristine lush pasture.

description:
Location With Views!
New property. This lovely open floor plan, 3 bedroom 2 bath home is located minutes from Biltmore Estate, Asheville Outlets, Blue Ridge Parkway and Down Town but still has the feeling of a private wooded environment . Enjoy the more than occasional deer crossing in a pristine forest location close to everything Asheville has to offer. Nicely appointed home features covered porch, hi speed wi-fi and 55” tv. You will love this place.

Pet Fee 75.00, 25.00 for second dog.

name: Secluded Escape Near Downtown & Biltmore Fun
description:
Situated just outside the city, this 3BR home offers quiet privacy near central attractions. Enjoy excellent access to downtown, Biltmore Village, and a plethora of outdoor adventures. Highlights at home include a covered patio and a game room. Sleeps 7.

The space
Experience the best of quiet privacy and in-town fun at this 3BR/2BA home. The ideal location is just a short drive from downtown Asheville and charming streets of Biltmore Village. Outdoor adventures abound near your rental on the edge of the city. Venture out for hiking, zip-lining, or winter skiing.

This one-story home has been beautifully updated with hickory floors, a modern kitchen, and upscale furnishings. Two living areas invite you to relax inside, while two large patios and a sprawling yard promise alfresco fun.

LIVING AREA

The main living area is furnished with a plush love seat and a sofa that converts to a sleeper. Stream favorite shows on the 65” smart TV.

description:
Whether you're staying for a week or an entire season, enjoy sweeping mountain views from a luxury condo in the heart of downtown Asheville with all the comforts of home, including a full modern kitchen, washer & dryer, and comfortable king bed. Pick up dinner from the building's top-notch restaurant, Bargello, and enjoy delectable craft cocktails at District 42, our in-house bar. Centrally located on Pack Square, shops, restaurants, and breweries abound. Short and long-term rentals available.

Unit 1001 is a dog-friendly property. An Arras Residences contact will be in touch with you within 72 hours of acceptance of your reservation to collect the non-refundable $150 pet fee.

name: Butterfly Cottage, Riceville
description:
Elegant, efficient space focused on the natural world. Lots of conveniences to make living here simple. It qualifies as a tiny house with rooms including all the native growth around and a lovely view of Bull Creek. Books available to enhance understanding of local history.
Off street dedicated parking. Private outdoor and patio space in the works!

The space
The whole property makes this house unique. You will share 3.5 acres of native landscaping with a primitive path to the top of the hill where buildings are nestled. In front of the house is a Certified Butterfly Garden. To the left is an orchard, all over the property specimen native trees and wildflowers...look is constantly changing.

Guest access
Patio area in front of French doors adds another Room to your space. It is currently evolving. There will be two chairs in the private space and a small firepit. To watch the sun rise and enjoy the cool of the evening.
<

name: Modern Cabin Retreat
description:
This space was designed with love and care and the hope that all who stay here feel relaxed and connected to nature. Since this is for longer term stays, we expect we'll get to know one another a bit but are by no means pushy or nosy. We live "next door" on the same property with our 4-yr-old and 2-yr-old sons who are often in the back yard but are not allowed to go onto the porch or in the general vicinity of the cabin when there are guests. Common fire pit between the cabin and our house.

The space
The bedroom has no door and is an open air space lofted above the kitchen. There is a reading nook with a twin mattress and a very comfortable sleeper sofa downstairs. Space is available for 30 minimum, 90 day maximum.

name: Private Guest Suite in Heart of West Asheville
description:
Private Guest Suite on quiet neighborhood street in the heart of West Asheville just 2 miles from downtown Asheville. Walk to the local restaurants and shops of downtown West Asheville or walk, bike, uber, or drive to the bustling center of Downtown Asheville.

The space
Guests will have access to the guest suite which includes a studio style layout with queen bed, couch, minifridge, microwave, coffee, tea, bathroom, and clothing rack. Guests will also have access to the back porch and back yard which boasts tons of green space, seating areas, and a fire pit to meet all of your outdoor and relaxation needs. Guests will have access to these areas via a private entrance and will be locked off from the remainder of the home. Guests will be provided parking under the car port in the back of the house.

name: Walkable West Asheville—Newly remodeled
description:
Newly renovated 2 bedroom/ 2 bathroom only a 7 min WALK to Biscuit Head and favorite Haywood Rd restaurants, bars and breweries (6 min drive to downtown)! Inspired by the lush mountain vegetation of the area, this thoughtfully designed space brings the outdoors in for a uniquely Asheville stay. Amenities include private outdoor space w/ sectional and string lights, kitchenette (coffee, fridge, microwave), washer/ dryer, 2 off-street parking spaces, keyless entry, fiber wifi and chromecast tvs.

The space
Modern, Asheville- inspired décor makes for a wonderful place to relax and recharge from of your local adventures while enhancing your visit to the mountains. The space is perfect for 2 couples or a group of friends looking for a weekend getaway (or even a small bachelorette- the Asheville wall makes for great photos)!

Other things to note
Please Note:
There are approx. 6 boulder steps without a handrail that you will need to climb to a

description:

Private queen room with ensuite bath. Homemade breakfast at 9am. Quiet street with free parking and great location. Walk to downtown, just 3 miles to Biltmore, and convenient to interstates and Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
Beautiful restored 5 guest room B&B with over 1 acre of secluded gardens. Welcome to Pinecrest Bed & Breakfast!

Your accommodations include premium queen mattress with luxurious linens by Comphy Company. Located on the second floor in the rear of the house. Our signature robes hang in the closet and the bathroom is fully equipped with Turkish towels, soap, shampoo, and hair dryer. Flat screen TV in room with cable and loveseat for comfortable seating. All of the furnishings are antique and reflect the era of the house.

description:
Blue Bird Cottage is our newest Airbnb. Nestled in Reeves Cove just outside Asheville city limits. Less than 20 minutes to downtown Asheville or Biltmore Estate this is a uber friendly location. Hiking trails about 1 mile away.

Relax and take in the mountain views from our relaxing hot tub or covered porch as well as living room & Master.

Need more space? Rent together with one of our other on site Airbnb's.

The space
The house has two bedrooms and two full bathrooms. Fully stocked kitchen for those who like to stay in a cook their meals. Gas grill and hot tub.

Open main living area with electric fireplace and smart tv. Take in the lovely mountain views from either our covered porch or large open deck.

All this less than 20 minutes to the heart of downtown Asheville and the Biltmore Estate.

The Master Bedroom has a brand new king size bed with memory foam mattress. Bathroom is all custom tiled with floor heater, which is perfect for those colder Asheville months. The kitchen is brand new with stainless steel appliances. 65 in. TV in living room with super

description:
Pristine, brand new and completely private, this over-sized loft studio was just completed in May, 2020. Be among the first to experience your own designer sanctuary nestled among the mature trees and rolling hills of AVL's premier neighborhood. Secluded, quiet and serene, but just minutes to downtown, it is the perfect Asheville escape. World class hiking, walk to Beaver Lake, minutes from the Biltmore, Grove Park Inn and famous breweries. Luxury truly meets nature and it's ALL BRAND NEW!

The space

description:
Swim in the private pool May to mid-October; soak in the hot tub year round! Relax in tastefully decorated lower-level guest quarters in a serene mountain setting 9 miles from Asheville. Minutes to the airport, it's the perfect base camp from which to explore the Biltmore, Blue Ridge Parkway, hiking, waterfalls, NC Arboretum, and local restaurants. Enjoy complimentary coffee bar and s'mores by the fire pit; play games in the 1-acre yard; watch free premium TV channels on 3 TVs; free internet.

Our 850 sq. ft. guest quarters has a spacious living/dining area and kitchenette outfitted with dishwasher, counter-height fridge, microwave, large electric griddle, InstaPot Duo Novo, CrockPot, electric skillet, and a complimentary Keurig coffee/tea bar with K-cups, tea bags, creamer, sweetner, and cocoa for the kids.

A private entrance, bedroom, luxury bathroom, and covered patio with a fire pit and outdoor chairs, it’s so much better than a hotel room! Listen to the sounds of the creek babbling in the backyard from your bedroom window.

Featuring a large inground swimming pool, you'll love your time here! The Biltmore House is 3 miles away, and the Blue Ridge Parkway is 2 miles away.

description:
This is the main house on our property. It has two bedrooms (one king, one queen) and one full bathroom with a tub/shower combo.
The kitchen and living room is spacious and open.
The neighborhood is quiet because we are actually not in the city limits although everything is less than ten minutes away.
There are multiple outdoor areas that are shared by all property pals- huge front porch, picnic area and grill, back patio, fire pit, hammock and swing, and of course the fenced in yard.

The space
The house sits up on the property which makes the front porch quite lovely. There is a carport where you can park your vehicle. The yard is completely fenced in when the gate is shut which makes our home a favorite of all dogs! Downtown Asheville, the RAD, and West Asheville are all 5-10 minutes away.

Use The Lodge at Asheville West as your base station to explore everything that makes Asheville a destination.

For your conveniences, the cabin has a fully stocked kitchen, gas fireplace, 3 new flat screen T.V.’s, Wi-Fi Internet, private hot tub, a gas grill and a FENCED IN YARD.

Enjoy all that Asheville has to offer from this lush and peaceful mountain valley setting just 10 minutes from downtown. The natural beauty of the surrounding mountains will calm your mind and restore your soul.

The space

Sweet Haus Cottage is so cozy and sweet, a perfect choice for a low key "staycation". Asheville is known for its artistic spirit and culture. We tried to capture that energy through the finishes, artwork and furniture pieces that we salvaged, repurposed and refinished for your comfort. Feel like hiking, great, travel short distances to see the most beautiful waterfalls around the state.

The space

Now Celia's Retreat features four bedrooms and three, beautiful full baths with granite and tile. This home as all of the comforts of home, while still retaining that rustic mountain charm.

The grounds are simply spectacular with a large backyard with beautiful plants and landscaping. There's a fenced in yard with over an acre for your pet to roam and explore. This apartment is street level but under our chiropractic office which opens at 8:30AM weekdays only, so please be aware that you will hear footsteps on weekday mornings. The office is closed weekends and evenings.

Pet Friendly | Mountain Views | 2,763 Sq Ft

name: Le Chateau D'Arce @ The Baying Hound Campground
description:
Le Chateau D'Arce, located in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground, is a sleeping pod suspended in the air. Part tree-house, part medieval castle, and part pick-up truck, this spot is like no other. The floor is padded, but be sure to bring sleeping bags, pillows and possibly a sleeping pad if you like a little extra softness. The Baying Hound Campground is about 10 minutes from downtown, yet still on the edges of rural, agricultural Asheville.

The space
THE CAMPGROUND
The Baying Hound Campground is where rural Appalachia meets “keep Asheville weird.” You’ll see sleeping pods decorated by professional artists, structures made from upcycled building materials and permaculture experiments in the making. We’ve been described as “if a European hostel and an Appalachian campground had a baby.” Not quite glamping and definitely not KOA, we're happy to offer you a more social alternative to cookie-cutter lodging without breaking the bank.

Very comfortable accommodations, clean and quiet, with easy walking access to all downtown Asheville has to offer, including dozens of bars, restaurants and breweries, as well as the Harrah's Asheville Event Center (formerly Cellular Center).

name: Close to downtown in the historic district.
description:
We offer a convenience to downtown with beautifully appointed rooms. Breakfast is a 2 course meal all homemade from scratch. For more pictures, go to wrightinn.com.

The space
The grand suite is equipped with a sitting area, a private entrance, a king size bed, dining room with a mini fridge stocked with water, soda and oj, and an working gas fireplace. The bathroom has a port window that was gifted from George Vanderbilt and has a tub/shower.

Guest access
You will have access to the front porch, parlor, foyer that has a sitting area and the dining room. Fresh cookies, coffee, tea, soda, water and snacks are available at all time.

Other things to note
We are very COVID aware and keep the house and room extremely clean and sanitized.

name: Private Getaway in Asheville
description:
This recently remodeled room is a perfect place to hideaway. The room has a private entrance and dining area as well as an beautiful queen-sized bed, fireplace, coffee station with refrigerator and microwave. The luxurious bathroom has a two-person jetted tub for the ultimate getaway experience.

The space
This newly remodeled room offers a private entrance and dining area as well as a beautiful stone wall and exposed brick. It has an antique queen size bed, antique chairs for 2, a coffee station with a kcup machine, selection of teas, hot chocolate, as well as a personal refrigerator with water, sodas, oj and creamer. Snacks and cookies are also in the room. This room also has a microwave.

Guest access
You will have access to the front porch, parlor, foyer that has a sitting area and the dining room. Fresh cookies, coffee, tea, soda, water and snacks are available at all time.

This newly remodeled room boasts a grand king-sized bed, sitting area and beautiful bathroom with walk-in shower.

This newly remodeled room has a grand king bed with fine linens, a sitting area for two, 32" wall mounted TV, dresser and a beautiful large bathroom with a walk-in shower.

name: Private guest suite, walk to Biltmore village!
description:
Revel in the Ashevillian lifestyle at this tranquil, private, COZY guest suite. Walk (~1 mile) to Historic Biltmore Village to discover an array of breweries, restaurants, and shops. The suite is a part of a renovated and cherished century-old family home. Enter your small eclectic suite via your private porch with mountain views. Relax inside the bright and comfy bedroom complete with a kitchenette. Adjoining the bedroom is your private, newly remodeled bathroom. This has everything you need!

The space
You can expect a cozy but spotless Airbnb with all the amenities of home. Extra pillows, blankets, sheets, toiletries will all be available. Enjoy coffee each morning from your private deck.

A quick drive to everything Asheville:
~3 minutes to Biltmore Village
~5 minutes to Mission Hospital
~7 minutes to Downtown
~8 minutes to the River Arts District
~12 minutes to the "local's downtown" West Asheville

Guest acce

name: Beautiful home mountain views 10 minutes from DT
description:
Come experience our warm and welcoming hospitality in the beautiful mountains of Asheville, just 10 minutes from downtown yet, a world away. We are 17 time super-hosts and our beautiful home is clean, comfortable and well appointed. The bedrooms are very large with private bath, great beds, walk in closets and lots of room to relax and enjoy. Come share a glass of wine on our deck with mountain views or make friends with one of our 3 lovable boxers!

The space
We live in a small private neighborhood with only 22 beautiful houses and are surrounded by trees. The neighborhood is extremely safe and walkable, as we know all of our neighbors. The house has tons of space but is comfortable and welcoming. Sit by the fireplace and join us for wine or check out the mountain views from our deck.
Only one vehicle per stay is allowed.

name: The Sienna Room,mountain views 10 minutes from ASH
description:
Come stay with us in our beautiful new home just 10 minutes from downtown. Mountain views, great outdoor decks, large private bedrooms with private baths, great beds, and extra living room upstairs for your use. Share a glass of wine by the fire or enjoy a good read in a cozy nook. We have it all for you to enjoy. Great safe, walkable neighborhood surrounded by trees. Meet our 3 lovable goofy boxer dogs as well!
licensed massage therapist, massages available for booking by guests on site.

The space
Only one vehicle per room per stay is allowed!
Guests have access to whole house except master bedroom and bath!

Guest access
Gym
Laundry
Kitchen
Decks
Yard
Neighborhood

name: Views, Mins. from Downtown Asheville, Firepit
description:
Brand new cabin located minutes from Asheville

The space
Location With Views!
Close to Downtown, Biltmore Estate, Pisgah National Forest, & Outlets
Farm House Decor, dining table that seats 6, comfortable reclining leather furniture in the living room, luxurious bedding, 55" tv with DTV, Hi-speed internet, fully equipped kitchen, hi-capacity washer and dryer in laundry room, and the best part is the covered front porch, with rockers to enjoy the serenity of the mountains, the deer frolicing through the woods, and the horses running through the pristine lush pasture.

Guest access
The entire cabin is available to our guests.

Other things to note
The cabin # is 122
Pet fee 75.00, second dog 25.00

name: Private room in cozy mountain home - close to DT
description:
Newly renovated bedroom and bathroom with private entrance in a picturesque mountain home, centrally located, and minutes away from downtown, south slope, Biltmore Village, and numerous grocery stores. Wicked weed is a 7 minute drive, and the Biltmore is about 10. You can easily access the Blue Ridge Parkway in 10 minutes. Whole Foods, Ingles, and countless restaurants are all less than 10 minutes away as well. The room features private parking, king sized bed, and personal mini fridge.

The space
My sister and I live in the attached home with our dog, Perseus (registered ESA). There are two private entrances into your room, but your unit will be closed off from the remainder of the house. This gives you as much privacy as you'd like, though we will be close by for any questions or concerns. The room has a mini fridge, Pur filter, closet, king sized bed, and personal full bathroom with walk-in shower. Additionally, there is a fenced in yard that is attached direct

name: King on First Floor with Breakfast in Asheville
description:
Indulge in an authentic b&b experience with amenities. Be a guest at our 1905 inn, located in historic Montford, 1 mile from downtown Asheville and near UNC-Asheville. Private first floor king room with ensuite bathroom with walk-in shower. Homemade breakfast at 9am. Quiet street with free parking and great location. Walk to downtown, just 3 miles to Biltmore, and convenient to interstates and Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
Beautiful restored 5 guest room B&B with over 1 acre of secluded gardens. Welcome to Pinecrest Bed & Breakfast!

The Grace Suite offers elegant accommodations on the first floor with gas fireplace (seasonal) and hardwood floors. Your accommodations include premium king mattress with luxurious linens by Comphy Company. Our signature robes hang in the bathroom which is fully equipped with Turkish towels, soap, shampoo, and hair dryer. Flat screen TV in room with cable, sofa and chair for reading.

name: Victoria's Cottage in the Paris of the South
description:
Located on the side of peaceful Pisgah mountains away from city conglomeration, Victoria's Cottage makes the perfect place for a small getaway. It is also only minutes away from the city giving you the freedom to explore some of Asheville's most popular locations.
A full modern kitchen, a full bathroom with freestanding bathtub, shaver, washer and dryer, well designed bedroom with a touch of Paris, and a TV with Wi-Fi, NETFLIX. A parking space, reserved for one vehicle.
See you soon!

The space
Cozy, roomy and well furnished, this large apartment is perfect for a single person or for a couple looking to explore Hendersonville, Asheville or the surrounding WNC Mountains. You can cook your own meals in the new full kitchen or eat at one of the local West Asheville restaurants.
A parking space is reserved for one vehicle.

name: New Construction West Asheville Cottage 3BR/2.5BA
description:
Cozy up in our new construction cottage! Enjoy unparalleled access to the city's offerings while falling asleep in a quiet, wooded neighborhood. Relax on the covered porch and back patio morning and evening, or stretch your legs in the open-concept main level. You're only minutes away from downtown, Biltmore Estate, and all of Asheville's most popular attractions.

The space
This house was built with the guest experience in mind. Comfort and style abound to calm the weary traveller. We're obsessive about cleanliness and making sure you have everything you need! We hope that it shows from the first moment you walk in the house. From the fixtures, to the bedding, the linens, to the lighting–– our aim is to delight.

Guest access
The place is all yours! Just please be respectful to the neighbors.

name: New Entire Guest Suite - In Town Mountain Views
description:
Entire guest suite with private entrance and deck with mountain views. Located in the historic Grove Park- Sunset neighborhood of North Asheville. Just a 5 minute walk from the Omni Grove Park Inn, 5 min drive from downtown Asheville, 12 min drive from Biltmore Estate, and 16 min drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
Our house is nestled comfortably on a hill overlooking the mountains. The guest room is in the back of the house with a private entrance. The guest room has a queen size bed, table and two chairs for dining or working, Wi-Fi access included, mini fridge, and Keurig coffee maker. Coffee and tea are provided. En suite full bath with shower where you will find complimentary shampoo, conditioner and bath soap.

The entire spacious deck with patio furniture and dining table are yours to enjoy the mountain views and gorgeous sunsets. A firepit area and fire wood are also available for your use. We are located on a quiet street and parki

description:
just step out the window door to the private balcony for 2 overlooking the beautiful grounds.

name: Mountain Bike and Family Fun Zone in Bent Creek!
description:
Great house in the best family/mountain biking neighborhood in Asheville. Head to the park 300 yards down the hill to play the pumptrack, let the kids rage on the swings and climbing features, and have a beer with the locals. Continue into the Bent Creek trail network and around 90 miles of high quality beginner/intermediate riding and a few excellent advanced trails. 5 Minutes to Blue Ridge Parkway, NC Arboretum and French broad river. 15 minutes to Biltmore or to the heart of Asheville.

The space
This lovely, lived-in house with a large fenced yard (good dogs welcome to stay) is located in one of the best areas of Asheville for family fun.

**Please be aware that the cell service is terrible here**
We have high speed wifi through cable internet that you can connect to (and use wifi calling, which is what we do), but calling over the cell network on most carriers is not reliable at the house.

name: BeasPlace, Near the Scenic Blue Ridge Parkway
description:
Located in East Asheville approx 2 miles from the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway, Folk Art Center, Mtn to Sea Trail, Restaurants, I-40 & grocery stores. Only 5.5 miles or 11 minutes to downtown Asheville and 7 miles to the Biltmore House & Gardens.
Visit Charles Owen Park (5 miles) walk around 2 lakes & beside the Swannanoa River with nice Mtn views. Lake Tomahawk (10 mi. away) walk around the lake with gorgeous views of the 7 Sisters Mtn range, picnic tables, tennis. Highland Brewing 4 miles

The space
Ranch style house with 3 bedrooms (2 furnished bedrooms & one unfurnished with desk) one bath (shower & tub) full kitchen, dining room & living room all in a quiet safe neighborhood. Located close to restaurants, grocery stores, etc.

Guest access
You have access to all of the house. The Basement is limited to just washer / dryer & trash bin access. We still have two cars and other personal items in there. There are a couple of lawn cha

name: Brand new cottage minutes from downtown Asheville
description:
Come relax in this brand new cottage with tasteful Mid-Century Modern decor, a covered front porch, and festive back patio. The cottage is a perfect home base for exploring the Asheville area. Located in West Asheville, it is a quick drive to downtown, the Biltmore Estate, the Blue Ridge Parkway, and many other restaurants, shops, breweries, and attractions. At the end of a day of exploring, kick back and enjoy the home's Hi-speed internet, 55" Roku TV, and fully equipped kitchen.

The space
In response to covid-19 we have heightened our cleaning protocol to follow the Airbnb guidelines. The whole house including all surfaces will be cleaned and then disinfected.

The house is easily accessed from Interstate 40. It is less than a 10 minute drive to downtown Asheville and the Biltmore Estate, and less than 15 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway. The rental is for the entire house; your hosts, Hannah and Thomas, live locally and are available to answer quest

This cabin can be rented by itself to sleep 6 or combine it with the cabin next door to house a group of 12. Come relax and enjoy everything Asheville has to offer in this charming home. You are also only minutes from Downtown Asheville, Biltmore, Blue Ridge Parkway, golfing, hiking, and skiing! Highspeed wifi Internet, cable TV and a washer/dryer are included. There is ample parking for 5 cars with the two units are rented together.

description:
Experience the excitement of downtown Asheville while staying in a peaceful neighborhood away from all the hustle and bustle in Arden. This 3-bedroom, 1.5-bathroom vacation rental house is perfectly suited for families or groups of friends. During your time here, hike the many trails through the Pisgah National Forest, tour the Biltmore Estate, attend a concert at one of the music venues, or try local brews at nearby breweries. A fully equipped kitchen and fire pit will be awaiting your return.

The space
New Patio & Gazebo | Step-Free Access | River & Snow Tubes Provided | 1,700 Sq Ft

Situated in a quiet setting, this family-friendly property offers a basketball court and other fun amenities to make your stay memorable.

Master Bedroom: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Twin/Full Bunk Bed | Bedroom 3: Full Bed, Twin Bed

name: West Asheville Getaway close to town and private.
description:
We invite you to stay in part of our duplex which includes a private entrance to a two bedroom, two bathroom home. This location allows you to take a short 5 mile drive to downtown Asheville to enjoy fine dining, local breweries, and shopping; or stay in and relax by the outdoor fire pit with a cup of coffee and one of our local Asheville books. Well-behaved dogs are welcome with a $30 pet fee. No cats are allowed.

The space
When entering the property, you walk into the living room with a full sofa, love seat, and a flat screen TV which includes youtube tv. The kitchen has everything you need to cook a full meal if you choose too or just enjoy a cup of coffee. There is one primary bedroom with a Queen size bed, Flat screen tv, closet, chest-of-drawers, and the primary bathroom with stand up shower. The second bedroom also has a Queen size bed, closet space, and a dresser. The second bathroom is just off the hallway. We also have a full size washer and dryer for y

name: Private Guest Suite in South Asheville
description:
Private Guest Suite in our walk out basement (we live upstairs with 3 dogs). Private driveway, park by the street or pull down to the suite. Private entrance with a password protected lock box.

This addition was just completed in June 2020 and everything is brand new. Full size bathroom with custom shower tub. Kitchen is complete with fridge, convection microwave, 2 burner stovetop and coffee maker.

Queen size bed with a closet to store your items. Two seater couch.

TV has a firestick to watch any streaming app you have. Watch from the two seater couch or bed.

Two person bar area to eat breakfast or get some work done.

Gas BBQ Grill available for use.

description:
Welcome! Enjoy your stay at the lovely Stowaway! Conveniently located in W. Asheville and just a short drive to some of Asheville's best restaurants, downtown shopping, entertainment, etc. Contact-free booking, very clean and warm atmosphere, off-street parking. We look forward to having you!

Very relaxing studio space. King bed with top of the line linens, smart t.v., Keurig coffee machine with refrigerator and microwave. Breakfast nook 💙 Daily local newspaper 💙 Free wifi 💙 Private Pool that can be rented hourly through the Swimply App (no access without Swimply reservation & signed waiver)

Come be our guest at the Rigsby House! We are conveniently located 3.2 miles from Downtown Asheville. 650 sq feet of living space made comfortable for our guest to enjoy.

The space
This newly built one bedroom and one bath apartment has a fully functional kitchen that makes extended stays convenient. Our guest will have a private entrance with parking only a few feet from the apartment door. Unlimited wifi access with password provided. Cable TV is also provided.

name: Hidden Acres Apartment
description:
Great apartment for visiting the mountains. We are located within 10 minutes of downtown and west Asheville. Two miles from the Asheville outlets. This apartment is located under a primary residence of two people. With private entrance and all amenities. Access to use the land for pets or walking.

The land

description:
A cute West Asheville house in the center of it all! Walking distance from famous Biscuit Head and historic Haywood Road with all the shops and restaurants. A quiet and safe neighborhood to walk around, bike to the river and green way or bike downtown! It is a 10 minute drive to Bent Creek, the Biltmore house, and the Blue Ridge Parkway! A fenced in yard for your furry friend, a front porch to enjoy your morning coffee and a wonderful kitchen if you get tired of eating out!

The space
A one bedroom, one bath house! Cozy and cute! Has a drive way, a carport, and fenced in yard. The location absolutely cannot be beat! Hang out in the carport in the rain on the comfy couch or at the dining table. Chef up some yummy meals with brand new appliances. Enjoy all the hiking and outdoors you can handle within a short drive.

Guest access

description:
Beautiful Queen Anne Victorian bed and breakfast nestled in a quiet area of Asheville's historic district, Montford. Just 10 minutes from Biltmore and .8 miles to the heart of Asheville.

The full gourmet breakfast is something to talk about.

This room is on the 3rd floor and accessed from a narrow staircase that used to be the servant's quarters.

description:
Lovely quiet home between Asheville and Hendersonville, NC. Private 2 acre setting on small lake. New deck & spa/hot tub. 15 minutes to Biltmore Estate, Blue Ridge Parkway. 2 separate bedrooms with private baths, TVs, plus two single sofa beds and a full sleeper sofa in spacious living room. Screened porch with workout equipment. Big yard, and hiking trails on property for your pets. You'll love the cozy feel, but in a spacious living area. Shopping and restaurants within a mile. Ample parking.

The space
The house is on a private road and hidden from most neighbors. Wooded backyard with creek as well as open flat grassy area for play. Outdoor games available. Entertaining outside is easy with the grill just outside the kitchen door with table and chairs.

Guest access

name: 1920s Bungalow next to river, 8 min drive to AVL
description:
This is a safe, friendly, and convenient neighborhood located about 8 minutes from the heart of downtown Asheville! Directly across from the house is The Mill at Riverside, complete with local artists' studios and High Five Coffee Shop. Adjacent to the Mill is Woodfin Riverside Park, located directly on the French Broad River with waterside benches, running trails, and pet-friendly paths. Enjoy water activities such as floating, paddle boarding, kayaking, and fishing during the warmer months.

The space
This 1920s bungalow retains its original charm with hardwood floors and natural light,and has an updated kitchen and bathroom. The house has been outfitted with everything you need for an easy, comfortable stay.

*Relax in this dwelling knowing it's a CLEAN, cozy, stylish, and private residence with central air/heat, wi-fi, Flat Screen TV and work station.

*Need to bring your relaxation to the next level? Take a bubble bath in the spacious CL

name: One BR studio Minutes to dwtn and W. Asheville
description:
This is a one bedroom studio with it's own private entrance. The space is listed for 2 adults but could accommodate a couple with one or two kids as well. Your own bathroom is newly constructed with a lovely shower for you to enjoy after your day's adventures. We are conveniently located 7 minutes to downtown or West Asheville, and 15 minutes to the River Arts District. Enjoy the Blue Ridge parkway & mountains, rivers, hiking, kayaking, fall leaf season and many local breweries.

The space
Located in a residential area on a cul de sac street.

Guest access
You will have your own space with a den, bathroom and separate private bedroom. The den has a fold out futon for an additional adult or for adults with kids. The television set is a smart tv so you can view your own Netflix or Amazon video.

name: Chic guest suite, Walk to Biltmore Village
description:
Unwind in this freshly renovated and plant-filled suite right in the center of East Asheville. Walk to restaurants, shops, and breweries of Biltmore village. Being just one mile from the Biltmore, and two miles of downtown, you are never more than a few minutes to all Asheville has to offer. This suite was designed for two guests with a comfy queen bed, kitchenette, sitting area, and a squeaky clean private bathroom.

The space
Embrace the Ashevillian lifestyle. Coffee, tea, luxurious linens, and an attentive hostess are always provided.

Guest access
Guests have access to the suite in the front of my home and the deck next to the door.

name: Peaceful Mountain Retreat in Asheville
description:
Private entrance one bedroom suite with kitchenette set-up for breakfast and snacks surrounded by the beautiful forests of Asheville. The property is nearly adjacent to the Blue Ridge Parkway. While we don’t have a direct trail built yet, there is a trailhead to the Mountain to Sea Trail less than two miles from the property. While it feels like you have escaped to a remote mountain retreat, downtown Asheville is just a 15 minute ride away and quaint Black Mountain is just under 20 minutes away.

The space
This listing is a private one bedroom suite on the first floor of our home with its own separate entrance. You have the entire floor to yourself. There is a spacious bedroom with a queen-size bed and a memory foam mattress. The other room contains a high-quality sleeper sofa, eating table, and a small kitchenette set-up that is perfect for breakfast and snacks. It contains a keurig-type coffee maker with re-usable pods provided, mini-fridge, toaster, microwave,

description:
This adorably decorated shabby chic cottage is nestled in a quiet neighborhood within walking distance to New Belgium Brewing and Green way, Taco Billy and The French Broad River. Bike or walk across the bridge to charming River Arts District. Perfect for travelers looking to enjoy a serene garden cottage while having easy access to all the city has to offer. Foxglove Cottage boasts a large fenced in yard, outdoor fire pit, gas grill, hand built pizza oven and brand new front porch.

The space
Foxglove Cottage is fully stocked with everything you need to feel at home including high speed internet, cable, linens and towels, and plentiful cooking supplies. Please note that as this is a 30 day rental, the cottage will be stocked with enough breakfast goodies and household products for the first few days of your stay, but guests are responsible for procuring these items for the remainder of the month. name: Curated Boutique Flat
description:
Curated with local artists and boutique selections. Walking distance to Carrier Park and East West Asheville shops and restaurants. Tube the River, bike to RAD, fine dine, or sleep in after a hike!

The space
Beautiful amenities and decor. Private entrance and patio. In the heart of East West Asheville. Walk or bike to Carrier Park, RAD, or Owl Bakery.

Guest access
Private entry to your one bedroom, one bath flat.

Other things to note
Your space is on the first floor of our home. The entrance is private. You will likely see and hear us around the property. We live with our three children on the second and third floors.

name: Scenic Asheville Escape Near Blue Ridge Parkway!
description:
Treat yourself to a glorious getaway while staying at this updated 3-bed, 1.5-bath home in popular North Asheville! Nestled in a quiet area a stone’s throw from the Blue Ridge Parkway, this vacation rental compliments it’s easy access to the area’s natural attractions with equally short drives to city-favorites like Wicked Weed Brewing and The Biltmore Estate. After long days of exploration, you’ll enjoy returning home, making your own meals, and curling up with a movie on the TV.

The space
Pet-Friendly | 1,050 Sq Ft | Spacious Yard

When looking for a scenic yet well-equipped getaway with easy access to the area’s top attractions, this vacation rental checks all the boxes as a perfect home-base for city dwellers or outdoor enthusiasts alike!

Master Bedroom: King Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3: 2 Twin Beds

INDOOR LIVING: Updated interior, natural light, hardwood floors, Smart TV, electric fireplace, book collection, ceiling

name: COZY COTTAGE | MODERN AMENITIES | PET-FRIENDLY
description:
4 min drive to Asheville Airport
7 min drive to Sierra Nevada Brewing Company
20 min drive to Downtown Asheville

This cozy one-bedroom cottage is tucked in a tree-lined cul-de-sac in a picturesque neighborhood. It features an open-concept floor plan, locally inspired decor, and ultra-modern appliances for your convenience. Relax and enjoy the outdoor views from your private deck or take a short drive downtown for more sightseeing.

Experience Fletcher With Us & Learn More Below!

$45 pet fee

The space
Here Are A Few Kind Words From Our Past Guests:

“One of the cleanest, coziest, and well-thought-out stays we’ve had! Amazing hosts, thoughtful touches (good coffee, nice towels/bedding, local recommendations). We would love to stay here anytime we are in the Asheville area. 10/10!”- Anna

name: West Asheville Hideaway Suite
description:
Newly renovated basement suite with private entrance, private back patio, King bed, pull out queen size sofa bed with memory foam mattress, living room area and smart TV, kitchenette, full bathroom, and plenty of natural light. Located on a cul-de-sac just 5 minutes from the center of West Asheville and 12 minutes from downtown Asheville. This bright, spacious, and clean suite is comfortable and stocked with everything you need to enjoy your stay.

The space
With a private entrance, door code, and outdoor sensor lighting, you are welcome to come and go as you please. The memory-foam king sized bed is nestled in a cozy nook with custom art. A half wall provides privacy between the sleeping area and living room/TV area, where a pull out sofa offers additional sleeping space (queen size). The HD TV is set up for you to access all your streaming options.

The kitchenette offers everything you need for a short visit including a mini-fridge, coffeemaker, te

name: Two block walk to downtown
description:
Ground floor apartment in a restored 1915 house in an historic neighborhood . Five minute walk to downtown, Whole foods grocery, Reed creek greenway. Private entrance and porch on back side of house. A rustic cabin in back is a bonus space.

The space
There is a new gas log stove in the main room. The apartment is on the ground floor on a steepish hill and is primarily above grade. The back porch is 5 feet off the ground.

Guest access
guests have exclusive access to the cabin and the whole of the backyard

name: WALK DOWNTOWN: Beautiful private room in eco home
description:
Please read details before booking! Our shared homestay is a 2.5 block walk to the popular South Slope + 5 blocks to downtown. Everything under 'Neighborhood' below is walking distance. You've found a beautiful gem here with handcrafted gardens + courtyard. This spacious bedroom is 1 of 4 & has a mountain view, queen bed, desk, plenty of floor space & closet. Bathrooms + all commons are shared. COVID: Please minimize use of the common areas. Use hand sanitizer. Wear a mask. We sanitize daily!

The space
ALL COMMONS ARE SHARED. YOU ARE RENTING 1 OF 4 ROOMS, NOT THE WHOLE HOUSE.

NATURALLY CONNECTED: We live in one of the most bio-diverse temperate rainforests on the planet, ie: this area is teeming with life....including insect life. While our home is cleaned & vacuumed weekly, if you prefer 100% air-tight hotel environments, please do *not* book with us. name: Bohemian Paradise Nestled in the Trees
description:
Welcome to your bohemian paradise nestled in the treetops of desirable Kenilworth neighborhood! *Please note this is a 30 day rental. * This 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home is full of warmth and light. It boasts a large fenced-in backyard, 2 porches, a spacious living and dining room, fully equipped kitchen, brick fireplace, comfortable beds and lots of good energy. The trees surrounding this home give it a remote, treehouse feel yet you are minutes away from downtown Asheville and Biltmore village.

The space
This home is entirely yours, you have access to the front and back yards, porches and the entire interior of the home. Enjoy lounging in the cozy living room next to the brick fireplace or soak up golden hour on the back porch. There is a gas grill and 4 seat table on the porch for al fresco dining. The front yard is home to blueberry bushes and a fig tree. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need for home cooking. The back bathroom hosts a new washe

name: The Cozy Cove. Private Guest Suite
description:
Quiet, private, clean, comfortable, bedroom suite in a chill but slightly quirky neighborhood in West Asheville, with convenient off street parking. Private entry, private bath, walk in closet, queen bed, breakfast nook, sleeper sofa, and a generously appointed kitchen cart. Covid conscious enhanced cleaning protocols are implemented between each guest stay. Social distancing is expected in all common areas.

The space
Convenient digital entry lock with deadbolt for added security, free and fast WiFi, home roasted organic coffee with a variety of coffee paraphernalia, microwave, refrigerator, and toaster oven. Also, there's a walk in closet with ample hanging space. Whether you're here to stacay, vacay, connect with family or friends, or strictly for business, this space is thoughtfully designed to fit your needs.
