name: Heavens View-of the Beautiful Asheville Mountains
description:
Peaceful bonus room apartment available for a restful getaway. Great views of the North Carolina Blue Ridge mountains and downtown Asheville. The entertainment options are endless. Downtown Asheville with all its local restaurants, iconic attractions, and musical venues are only 5 minutes away. The famous Biltmore House is a 15 minute drive or you could hike one of the many trials near the Blue Ridge Parkway. The comfortable accommodations include a Japanese style bathroom.

The space
Your space includes a window seat and table with beautiful views of Mount Pisgah and a seating area to enjoy your morning coffee. You'll have your own microwave and mini fridge for snacks and a cold drink.

Guest access
Guests will have their own entrance into a breezeway that leads to a sweet get away featuring some of the best views in Western North Carolina. The private room has a sitting area with a view downtown Asheville and window seat complete with

name: Lost Fox Sheep Farm at Bent Creek
description:
Enjoy this peaceful pasture and feel a million miles away while only being 4 Miles to trail heads in Bent Creek, 2 miles to the Bent Creek river park and access (you can borrow my Kayaks or tubes) and 2 miles to the Blue Ridge parkway and Arboretum. 10 Miles to downtown Asheville. This is a great location for hikes and mountain biking. This is a lower unit so there is some amount of sounds that could come from the upper unit but you should find this to be a relaxing get away overall.

The space
This has private parking, private entrance and everything that you should need for a stay in the area. There is a spring in the back pasture and you are always welcome to explore, the sheep love to be pet if you kneel down and let them come to you (they also like bread and crackers). The biking/hiking trails right down the road are so vast that you would not be able to go on every combination.

name: 2 BEDROOM   about a mile from middle of downtown!
description:
Our apt is only a mile from the middle of downtown. Many people just drive and park for the day or evening in a parking garage for $5 to $10 and walk all around. Also, some take a taxi or Uber for a few bucks and do the same. You can walk to downtown from the in the daytime.
Spacious 1000 square feet Eclectic two bedroom including King Bed in the one bedroom and a Queen Bed in the 2nd bedroom. There is a custom tile shower.

The space
Enjoying downtown Asheville. . Lots of pillows for a comfortable, laid-back experience! The entire apt. is decorated with area art, books, and unique furnishings candles, , natural soap available for you to wind down after a great day sightseeing, hiking or
There is a 45”inch TV with DVD in the living room with a fold out memory foam mattress and a table with seating for 4. Some movies are provided and we have full cable in the home and very high speed wireless WIFI. An electric fireplace keeps you toasty while yo

name: Walk to Downtown! 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bathroom Home.
description:
House in the Montford neighborhood, just a 15-minute walk to downtown Asheville. Open floor plan, high ceilings, 1,500+ sq ft with lots of light. Modern mountain feel with a beautiful wood burning fireplace and tasteful original art works. The kitchen is fully equipped (all large and small appliances), washer/dryer, and three TVs throughout. This home is perfect for families or anyone wanting a spacious, private, and comfortable getaway in Asheville, NC. Walk to restaurants!

The space
This craftsman home was built in 2010. High ceilings and large windows - it is bright, airy, and open. Includes a large front porch, a back deck overlooking a lush green canopy, and a Juliette balcony off of the master suite.

Note, the basement apartment is used occasionally by the owners. The owners use a separate entrance at the back of the house. There are no common areas or shared surfaces.

COVID: We have implemented the cleaning protocol set by our county

name: Hop, Skip, Jump Studio★2 Min Walk to Hip West AVL!
description:
New construction, furnished with modern sensibilities and full of art. This private guest suite is attached to our main home, but for your convenience is accessible through a private exterior entrance. Enjoy this beautiful, tree-lined street while being a 2 minute walk away from thriving Haywood Road, filled with restaurants, cafes, music venues, breweries, shopping and more. Adjacent suite available to travel "together but separate", found on Airbnb as "Stone's Throw."

The space
We hope you find our studio equal parts spotless and cozy. The studio is equipped with a brand new, comfy Tuft and Needle queen size bed, a SmartTV, and a kitchenette complete with fridge, microwave, coffee maker, & electric kettle. We provide local coffee and a variety of tea. You are welcome to use the backyard space - we have a firepit, grill, and covered porch.

While we hope you love the space, we hope you'll also love being a 2 minute walk from West Asheville's thrivi

name: Canvas Tent #1 @BayingHoundCampground
description:
This canvas tent is in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground. You’ll get a queen-size bed (with sheets & pillows) and 2 chairs in your tent. Take a look at the surroundings because this isn’t a spot for light sleepers or folks craving seclusion. Great for the social camper who doesn’t want to lug around camping gear! You've got prime access to our indoor bathroom and outdoor solar shower, plus access to a fire pit that’s shared only with other canvas tent campers.

The space
CANVAS TENT
This is our newest addition to the Baying Hound Campground and it's still in the experimental mode. Is it glamping? Nope. Is it a sweet camping set up? You bet. Is it one of the closest-to-downtown, most wallet-friendly options in Asheville that captures that "Asheville" flavor? Heck yeah.

THE CAMPGROUND
The Baying Hound Campground is where rural Appalachia meets “keep Asheville weird.” You’ll see sleeping pods decorated by professional ar

name: *NEW* Cozy Smart Condo|10 mins to DT & Biltmore
description:
All the amenities and luxuries of home while being ideally located to the best of Asheville! Make yourself at home with convenient features including 50" TVs in the living room and master bedroom, a fully-stocked kitchen, charger stations, blackout curtains, sound machines, smart locks, Amazon Echo, and books and games for your whole group!

The space
Make yourself at home in this 2 bedroom downstairs condo that sleeps 6. There are two bedrooms and two full bathrooms. The Master bedroom includes an en suite bathroom, a 50" smart TV, and blackout curtains. The 2nd bedroom has 1 king beds, a smart TV, and plenty of extra amenities to make it a great stay. A full-sized sofa bed is available with linens for use as well.

Guest access
Guests access the home using an electronic keypad with the code sent to you beforehand. There's no need to worry about keys!

Guests have access to the whole home, including 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, li

name: Amazing Townhouse Min to Downtown Asheville
description:
Welcome to our little townhouse! We've recently updated the space with traveling in mind! We are about 10 minutes to downtown Asheville, 15 minutes to the Biltmore Estate, 5 minutes to French Broad River Parks.

With 1 King bed, 1 queen bed, 1 full size sleeper sofa, we can comfortably sleep 6 people. Living room is inviting with plenty of seating. Full kitchen for cooking meals, dining room table, stacked washer & dryer.

0411

Guest access
Entire downstairs townhouse with the exception of the owner’s closet. This door will be locked.

Other things to note
Your stay will be in the downstairs portion. We also rent out the upstairs portion as a short term rental. Each unit has a separate entrance and parking spaces.

Please keep noise to a minimum between 10pm and 8 am (inside and outside).

Limit of 2 vehicles per reservation. There are clearly marked parking spaces for this rental.

Dogs are

name: Royal Cottage Mtn Views, Decks & Close to DT AVL
description:
Royal Cottage offers you long-range mountain views, an abundance of privacy, solitude, and room to relax and rejuvenate. The home has three bedrooms, an open living room/kitchen/dining room floor plan, and an eat-in kitchen. It has a lovely wrap around deck that is partially covered so you can enjoy the warm days and cool mountain nights as well as an upper deck, all within minutes of world-class hiking, mountain biking, the Biltmore Estate, many breweries, and very close to downtown Asheville.

The space
This is perfect mountain getaway. It provides a private and rejuvenating retreat while also being close to Biltmore Village and Downtown Asheville.

Prepare a whole meal in modern kitchen with mountain views or take advantage of the take out services provided by some the best local restaurants in the area.

Relax with the whole group on the back porch and soak in the healing energy of Blue Ridge Mountains. Then wind down with the whole gro

name: Pura Vida: Eco-Modern, Cozy and Central Location
description:
Nestled in a residential neighborhood lined with gardens and between the River Arts District and eclectic West Asheville, this modern studio has a private entrance, one bedroom and a full bath. Enjoy the kitchenette with coffee and granola to start your day. Walk to trendy Haywood St. or wander along the beautiful, new greenway on the French Broad River, then grab a beer at one of the many nearby local breweries. This is the perfect spot from which to launch your Asheville adventure with style!

The space
The name of the studio is the Pura Vida suite, after living in Costa Rica, and experiencing the simple, natural lifestyle there, we wanted to bring the "pure life" notion with us to Asheville.

The suite is modern and located on the ground level of a net zero, family home with exceptional details. Natural light abounds in the space and you are surrounded outside by the maple tree out your door. You have an outdoor, cozy seating area and a dedicated pa

name: Snookspace - Covered Campsite & Mountain Sanctuary
description:
Seeking an idyllic sanctuary to spend quality time with a small group? Love camping but desire a few extra comforts? Nestled in the mountains 15 mins from downtown Asheville, our open-air pavilion will provide you with everything you need for a restful and comfortable outdoor retreat. Set up a tent on the lawn, or enjoy a comfortable hammock chair or lounger. Roast marshmallows and grill over the fire pit. Play lawn games or practice yoga while enjoying beautiful woodland views. Read on!

The space
The Snookspace provides all the beauty of camping in the mountains with some extra comforts - electricity, rain barrel sink/shower, and a tidy outdoor WC. We provide a number of items for your use & configuration - two hammock chairs, two inflatable loungers, Adirondack chairs, camping chairs, an inflatable air mattress, a few camping mats and sleeping bags, & two yoga mats. Plus a copper fire pit with grill top and outdoor games - Connect4, bags, Jenga, and bocci

name: Laurel View Cottage: Asheville destination with views, hot tub, and more!
description:
Laurel View Cottage is a great little vacation gem, tucked up in the Royal Pines neighborhood, and literally right outside downtown Asheville on the southside. This nice little 3 bedroom cottage affords mountain privacy, a virtual wrap-a-round deck, amazing views of the mountains, and hot tub while being close to everything Asheville, and a plethora of outdoor activities. Laurel View Cottage is destined to become a sought-after vacation destination, and is quickly becoming one of the most requested.

The space
Location:
Private home located on the southside of Asheville, close to Biltmore Park & just under 20 minutes to downtown Asheville. You are 15 minutes to Asheville Regional airport, and app. 15 minutes to the gates of Biltmore Estate. You have relatively easy access to just about everything in the area.

Accommodations:
3 bedroom, 3 full baths
Occupancy Summary / Sleeps in beds: 6 Max. Occupancy: 8

name: Cozy & Convenient Studio Near Biltmore w/ King Bed
description:
Freshly remodeled lower level suite located 1 mile from The Biltmore Estate, 3 miles from Downtown Asheville, & 4.5 miles from hip West Asheville. Our property is located on a quiet cul-de-sac within walking distance of shops, restaurants, & multiple breweries. Perfect for couples or friends!

Due to Covid-19, we are taking extra care to disinfect all surfaces between reservations and have set a 24-hour vacancy in between bookings to ensure the safety of our guests.

The space
Pull up into our extra-large driveway and enjoy no-contact self-check-in via your keyless private entrance. Our lower level studio is clean, bright, and cozy featuring modern design.

Kick back and relax on the new king size bed or "Netflix and chill" with a 50" flatscreen. Our cushy loveseat and spacious work/dining area will suit all of your needs.

We also offer access to a record player with a well-curated library of tunes to get you prepped for your AVL adv

name: Cabin with beautiful mountain views.
description:
Great place for 2 to 4 adults. Beautiful mountain views. Cabin is close to restaurants, shopping, Biltmore House and Blue Ridge Parkway. We are 1 1/2 hours from Gatlinburg, Dollywood and Pigeon Forge Tennessee. We are 1 hour from Cataloochee or Wolf Laurel ski resorts. We are 15 minutes from Asheville Airport. Biking and Hiking trails or tubing down the French Broad River within a 10 minute drive from cabin . We are not equipped for children or pets at this time.

The space
Nice living and kitchen, dining area together. Bedrooms are large with nice closets and lightning. Bathroom is easy to get to from either room.
Large covered porch with beautiful mountain views.

Guest access
Parking is easy and the neighborhood is quiet and peaceful

name: SEPTEMBER DISCOUNT at Magnolia Cottage.. book now
description:
Peace and tranquility as well as adventure await you at Magnolia Cottage just outside of Asheville.

WORK FROM HOME/VACATION? Best of both worlds is right here.

Our family would like to welcome you to enjoy your stay on our mini farm...horses, goats, ducks, chickens, and, yes, (in season) blueberries, vine ripe tomatoes (no pesticides) and maybe even a few fresh eggs if our girls cooperate. Our 6 acres offers a country atmosphere with all the conveniences you need less than 2 miles away.

The space
The home has 2 bedrooms, 2 full baths. Master bath has garden tub and separate walk-in shower. Kitchen is fully equipped including coffee bar. The huge covered deck is a great place to have coffee in the mornings or just relax after a long day of sightseeing or adventure. Enjoy the incredible, breathtaking views of the sun setting over the Great Smoky Mountains and enjoy the ambiance of the gas fire pit on cool evenings. The magnificent mag

name: Candler Home 10min from Asheville
description: Welcome to our Town House! Its in a new community still being developed. Only 10 minutes from Downtown Asheville and 15 minutes from the Biltmore house.  The Town home has everything you need for your comfort. All Bedrooms on the second floor and laundry room. 70 inch TV in the Living-room , 52 in TV in the Master bed, and a 42 in TV in the 3rd bedroom. Brand New Comfy Beds.There is space for 2 car parking , 1 in the garage and one on the driveway.

name: Malvern Hills Hideaway
description:
A sanctuary tucked away in a great location. Private lower level duplex with lots of amenities. The home opens up to a large, beautiful wooded yard perfect for games, grilling, a fire pit, nature watching, or enjoying a cup of coffee on the deck atop a small pond. 2 minute drive to West Asheville, 10 minutes to downtown and just a short walk to Malvern Park for tennis or swimming. The perfect location to experience all Asheville has to offer while still enjoying a quiet getaway.

The space
Newly updated cozy space. Plenty of space to relax including a bistro set over a pond, swinging chairs, rockers, and a fire pit.

Open up the curtains in the bedrooms and enjoy nature without getting out of bed. Mobile TV cart with a flat screen so you can watch TV while you're cooking or enjoy a movie night under the stars.

This is a great spot for a couple, small family, or group of friends.

You will hear running water and some footsteps f

name: Hidden Acres Guest House w/ Hot Tub
description: Home is located in West Asheville close to restaurants and breweries.  Lots of Hiking and waterfalls.

name: West Asheville Dream Location!
description:
A cute little West Asheville house in the center of it all! Walking distance from famous Biscuit Head and historic Haywood Road with all the shops and restaurants. A quiet and safe neighborhood to walk around, bike to the river and green way or bike downtown! It is a 10 minute drive to Bent Creek, the Biltmore house, and the Blue Ridge Parkway! A fenced in yard for your furry friend, a front porch to enjoy your morning coffee and a wonderful kitchen if you get tired of eating out.

The space
A cute two bedroom, one bath space with all the necessities you need to travel!

Guest access
You are allowed in all the listed space!

Other things to note
I have a driveway for off street parking but street parking is free and available

name: New Mountain Home! Yard for Dogs, 10 m to Downtown
description:
Looking for a place with the calm and quiet of a mountain cabin, yet 3.5 miles from downtown? Our house rests in a quiet mountain neighborhood on 1.3 acres of forest with views of the French Broad River and plenty of space to play and explore! Take a walk out the door down to the old barrel road next to the Om Sanctuary, from where you might spot the noon train. Upon your return, cool off with a drink on the balcony as deer, turkey vultures, and the occasional bear meander through the yard.

The space
NOTE: The Mountain Home also has a basement flat that is rented separately to other guests, that may or may not be rented at the same time. You will not share any part of the home, nor will you share an air filtration system. Both levels are completely separate; the only shared area is the yard and fire pit.

The front yard and back yards are connected and mostly fenced (75%) with only the back portion open to the the mountain and wildlife preserve.

name: Perfect for four in east Asheville.
description:
Located in east Asheville, only 12 minutes to downtown. The neighborhood is adjacent to the Blue Ridge Parkway and the Mountain to Sea Trail. Great setup for spending your days exploring Asheville and western NC, then resting up for the next day's adventure. Private bedrooms and baths in a traditional ranch home. Bathroom 1 remodeled 2017. Bedroom 1 bed and mattress new 2019. Bathroom 2 updated 2020. Bedroom 2 mattress new 2020. You are welcome to use the kitchen and laundry room--just ask.

The space
You'll be staying in the original master bedroom (with en suite bath) and a second bedroom and bath of our traditional 1960s ranch home. Although the listing says four guests, there's also room for a child in a sleeping bag or baby in a portable crib in the larger room (bedroom 1).

Other things to note
COVID UPDATE
We are excited to be welcoming guests again! We are requesting that all guests have proof of vaccination 14 days before arri

name: Modern Asheville Sanctuary on Elk Mountain!
description:
Eager for a peaceful getaway in a serene setting conveniently located to town? This Asheville vacation home, located on Elk Mountain, surely will not disappoint. It’s a mere 10 minutes from downtown, moments from the famed Grove Park Inn & Spa, and a short drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Not only does the property feature a master bedroom and en-suite bathroom on the main level, but it also boasts 3 other bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, a gym, pool table, and more!

The space
Step-Free Access | 4,612 Sq Ft | Ideal Location

For travelers seeking a luxurious getaway, this Asheville home spares nothing when it comes to amenities or comfort with breathtaking surroundings to match!

Master Bedroom: King Bed | Bedroom 2: King Bed | Bedroom 3: Queen Bed | Bedroom 4: 2 Twin Beds | Game Room: Sleeper Sofa

INDOOR LIVING: Air conditioning, jetted bathtub, central heating, 3 Smart TVs w/ cable, Netflix, Amazon Prime, en-suite bathrooms, fireplace,

name: "ARTISH" ... VERY Modern, Zen, Five Star Apartment
description:
You will be staying in a peaceful, quiet and light filled one bedroom 475 sf apartment with loads of amenities in West Asheville. A super convenient location with only 4.4 miles to the center of Downtown Asheville and the River Arts!
APARTMENT FEATURES: kitchen, LR w/Mod Fireplace, glass enclosed walk-in shower, W/D, large bedroom w/vaulted ceiling, Queen bed, dresser, large closet, inspiring office space, WiFi, pvt fenced courtyard w/seating, pvt parking & a sweet walking neighborhood.

The space
Artistic and well furnished, this apartment was newly built in fall of '20 with a keen eye towards Mid-Century Modern. Whether on vacation or working remotely, we have designed this apartment to embrace your needs. You control the heat/AC with the touch of a button on the remote. The office, featuring working desk, chair, bookshelves, music, artwork and lounging chair is light filled and inspiring!
Relax after a long day or have your morning coffee in t

name: Chickadees Cottage
description:
Centrally located in western North Carolina. Close to many major attractions in the Asheville area. Including the Asheville airport, SierraNevada, wnc arboretum, access to the blue ridge parkway, Pisgah forest, bent creek, Biltmore, Hendersonville and downtown Asheville. Yet you will feel far from it all.
The cottage is set back in the landscape with fields, forest and a small creek on the property. You can watch the birds and if you’re lucky you will spot wildlife visiting the property.

The space
The cottage is decorated to feel cozy and romantic. It is kid and pet friendly.

Throughout the space you will find art and pottery made by artists nearby. In fact, your closest neighbor is a pottery/art studio. Guests are welcome to stop in anytime to watch a master potter create on his wheel.

We strive to create a home away from home for our guests.

Other things to note
We do ask that you disclose your fury friend(s) a

name: Awesome Asheville Short Stay House Guest Rooms
description:
Beautiful Home! COVID-safe, licensed, short-term rental in Southeast Asheville. ASHEVILLE HOMESTAY/SHORT STAY PERMIT # 20-04424). Ideal for leaf watchers, mountain bikers (can use garage), hikers, etc.

1 or 2 Bedrooms/1 bath. Gorgeous hillside house in quiet wooded sloping neightborhood. Off Sweeten Creek Road, in lovely Ballantree subdivision. Furnished. Pets negotiable with deposit.

The space
Until Sept 24 would work well for 2 individuals, 1 couple or 2 couples (2 King sized guest rooms). After that it will be just one guest room/King bed. Travelling health professionals, or folks awaiting new home might enjoy a longer stay! Just 2.5 miles to Blue Ridge Parkway and about 5 miles to downtown Asheville.

Quickfold table available to set up workstation for tele-workers.

Guests will have their own entrance and space. For COVID and privacy purposes, virtually no interaction with host unless mutually planned.

Guest

name: Charming, Newly Renovated Cabin with Hot Tub
description:
This charming and newly renovated cabin is the perfect mountain getaway. Situated on half an acre in a quiet neighborhood, enjoy the seclusion and privacy of the surrounding woods. You are also only a moment's drive to the conveniences Arden has to offer and a short 10-minute drive to downtown Asheville.
Newly renovated with all the modern upgrades guests can also relax under the stars in the jacuzzi or sitting around the fire pit. A bonus level boasts a foosball table for additional entertainment.

name: New! Mountain Flat with Dog Yard, 10m to Downtown!
description:
Looking for a place with the calm and quiet of a mountain cabin, yet 3.5 miles from downtown? Our house rests in a quiet mountain neighborhood on 1.3 acres of forest with views of the French Broad River and plenty of space to play and explore! Take a walk out the door down to the old barrel road next to the Om Sanctuary, from where you might spot the noon train. Upon your return, cool off with a drink on the patio as deer, turkey vultures, and the occasional bear meander through the yard.

The space
NOTE: The Mountain Flat also has a separate upstairs that is rented separately to other guests, and may or may not be rented at the same time. You will not share any part of the home, nor will you share an air filtration system. The only shared part is the yard, fire pit and dog pen. When there are people staying upstairs, you will hear footsteps mainly in the kitchen and dining area.

The front yard and back yards are connected and mostly fenced (75%)

name: Downtown central-cottage LT
description:
30 days minimum requested!
Or $1900 per month/pay in person
Central located between Biltmore Estate and downtown,less than 1 mile (15 minutes to walk)to these locations :
Biltmore Village,Orange peel,River art district,MissionHospital,McCormick Field ,all restaurants ,wicked weed.
Biscuits Head is just down the corner,all shops,breweries....
This cute cottage is behind our house and just remodeled,very quiet,private with secluded back yard,have your own patio with fence,self check in.

The space
Is perfect for those looking to explore Asheville downtown and Biltmore house.
modern,clean,safe,very quiet neighborhood with central air and heat....
* Pets friendly,but there is a flat fee,$100 for one,$250 for two per month please let me know we prefer pay via PayPal,Zelle and Venmo

Entire cottage,very private.
Full kitchen,grill on patio ,coffee maker(it is Keurig,please bring K -cups )

description:
30 days minimum requested

If you are looking to be in the heart of downtown,our house is the perfect place for you,Walk to restaurants and breweries,right around the corner from White labs kitchen &Tap.
It is 102 Year-old,lots of charming with view of downtown from front porch,historic character,but updated recently,new furnitures except the dining room table and bathtub.new gas furnace and AC.
walk to the best downtown within 5 mins,no Uber or taxi needed

The space
1250 sqft house with its simple to get the most out of your trip by staying in the heart of it all. Walk to the Bountiful Cities Edible Gardens, with walking trails leading to a pedestrian bridge taking you into downtown
3 blocks from interstate,walking distance to hundreds of top line of restaurants,boutiques,art galleries,music venues,breweries...
5 minutes walk to these places
White labs kitchen &Tap
McCormick field

name: Asheville Modern Guest Suite, Biltmore Village
description:
Enjoy this private lower level open-floor-plan studio with its own private entrance, bathroom, and parking. Conveniently located in a trending (but still quiet) East Asheville neighborhood near Biltmore Village, Blue Ridge Parkway and just a 5 minute drive to downtown.

The space
This 400 sq foot space has everything you will need to be able to relax after a long day exploring Asheville.

The room includes a queen size bed, microwave, coffee maker and coffee (including creamer, both dairy and non-dairy), hot shot for tea, fridge, kitchen table for two, couch, air conditioning, heating, remote controlled fan, smart tv, filtered water, white noise machine, laptop friendly workspace, clothing rack, dresser, ironing board, and iron.

The bathroom has a great shower with an adjustable shower head and plenty of cubby space for your essentials. We provide shampoo, conditioner and body soap for your convenience, as well as a hair dryer.

The

name: Cozy & Convenient
description:
Private small quaint home for two. Ideally located to everything you want to see or do in Asheville. A well stocked very clean home with all the enmities you need while you enjoy a relaxing stay in the Blue Ridge Mountains A Great Covered front porch that is ideal to sit and relax and enjoy nature & beauty. Just a mile to the famous Blue Ridge Parkway Entrance and N.C. Arboretum. Close to shopping ,Restaurants and Downtown Asheville. Minutes to I26, I240, & I40 and the Famous Biltmore House.

The space
Private Driveway leading to covered parking. Handicapped ramp leading to the entrance of the home, wide doorways. Cozy front porch for relaxing and reading a good book. Small private shared deck with table and chairs for eating out. You have full private access during your stay. Very tasteful decor with a Zen feel. Fully stocked kitchen if you feel like cooking. Very Private and quiet neighborhood with 2 Airbnb’s. Nice yard.

name: Stylish Mountain Retreat: 2 Suites, Near Asheville
description:
A masterpiece of style and design, a dreamy Blue Ridge getaway awaits at this gorgeous 3BR home. Enjoy dazzling mountain views and custom furnishings throughout. Easily access outdoor activities, as well as culture and cuisine in Asheville. Sleeps 12.

The space
Perched hillside and boasting dazzling mountain views, a dreamy Blue Ridge getaway awaits at this gorgeous, custom 3BR/3BA home. A masterpiece of style and design, highlights include two suites, an enchanting Great Room, a covered deck, and a gourmet kitchen.

Offering an amazing central locale, convenient to everything, Biltmore Estate and Biltmore Village, downtown Asheville, the airport, Sierra Nevada, downtown Hendersonville, and Black Mountain, Chimney Rock and Lake Lure, the Blue Ridge Parkway, Pisgah National Forest Preserve, and Dupont State Park. Outdoor activities, shopping, cuisine, and culture abound.

LIVING AREA

Unwind into vacation mode on a large sectional and

name: Spacious West Asheville Suite
description:
Our private basement guest suite is perfect for your weekend getaway to Asheville. If you’re looking for something close to the city but secluded, then this is your spot. You’ll find a bedroom with a queen bed, bathroom & living space with a mini-fridge, microwave, Keurig coffee maker, a TV with a Roku & Wifi. A 5-min drive takes you to the heart of West Asheville, the heart of downtown, or the River Arts District - take your pick! Check us on the socials for more photos @spaciouswavl

The space
The entrance is around the back of the house, you'll have to traverse our grass front and side yard to enter. You can always find plenty of parking on the street in front of our house. The private entrance is located at the downstairs patio, under the deck. You'll enter into the spacious, yet cozy living space! As a note, we're sorry to say, there is not a sink in the kitchen area, per the City of Asheville's regulations. But we do keep a water pitcher in the fridg

description:
Looking for a place with the calm and quiet of a mountain cabin, yet 3.5 miles from downtown? Our house rests in a quiet mountain neighborhood on 1.3 acres of forest with views of the French Broad River and plenty of space to play and explore! Take a walk out the door down to the old barrel road next to the Om Sanctuary, from where you might spot the noon train. Upon your return, cool off with a drink on the balcony as deer, turkey vultures, and the occasional bear meander through the yard.

The space

The front yard and back yards are connected and mostly fenced (75%) with only the back portion open to the the mountain and wildlife preserve. There is a separate fully fenced area 40 ft x 13 ft for dogs with a gate at each end. The front yard is outfitted with an additional gate.
The upstairs and downstairs living rooms each have a c

Driveway/double garage. comfortable home for staying or as a base traveling. Something for everyone!

The space
The whole property with the basement and garage are there fore the guests

Guest access
The guest has access to the whole house. The guest has access to the garage.

Other things to note
We do subscribe to a noise monitoring service NoiseAware.

name: Asheville Home with the best location!
description:
Enjoy your trip to Asheville with a stay at this lovely house! Located just 5 minutes from downtown Asheville, 5 minutes from access to the Blue Ridge Parkway, 5 minutes from Highland Brewery, and 5 minutes from trails, this is the best location you could ask for!

This house offers 2 bedrooms with queen size beds, 2 bathrooms, a spacious living room, dining room and kitchen. As well as lovely outdoor dining space and fire pit! It is in a quiet neighborhood with easy street parking.

The space
Dogs are allowed in the front yard! The house has 2 dogs that live here currently, so please, dog-friendly dogs only.

This house has amazing sunrise views in the winter time, and a perfect back deck to sip on coffee while you plan your day!

description:
Sleeping in the trees is the best way to describe this comfy cozy little treehouse. Only 15 minutes from downtown AVL, this new addition to Odd Bits Hemp Farm is a unique way to stay. Welcome!

It's a tiny house in the trees. It's your childhood treehouse taken to the next level. Cross the hanging bridge to a weekend in the trees, 15 minutes to downtown, 7 minutes to West Asheville and all there is, 1 hour or less to waterfalls, welcome to West Asheville... Glamping at its finest.

The space
Small studio type apartment/tiny house in the trees, with a futon sofa bed downstairs and a full sized bed in the loft. Kitchenette for basic meals, has small fridge, toaster, hotplates, kettle...the sink has running cold water.

Has heat and air conditioning, compost toilet and small sink with running water. The outdoor hot water shower is across the bridge.

If you're afraid of heights, this may not be your favorite place, unless you're here to

name: Luxury suite minutes from AVL/Biltmore, Blueridge
description:
New suite (built in 2020) located in the Western North Carolina mountains, 8.7 miles from Asheville center, 4 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway and within 7 miles of grocery stores, restaurants, etc. Suite is very spacious with sitting area attached to separate bedroom. Ample seating including new high end comfy sofa sleeper. Many windows in both rooms to look out over the mountains. Includes Wi-fi, towels, linens, toiletries, Keurig, microwave and refrigerator. Well-behaved dogs welcome.

The space
10 minutes from Interstate 40, exit 44

Guest access
Private bedroom, living room and bathroom

Other things to note
No smoking on premises. No littering. Please be respectful of our environment

Downstairs apartment at end of dead in road, with private parking, paved walkway to french doors of apartment, french glass doors have blinds inside glass. Apartment includes electricity, wifi, cable, water and trash pick up. This private road is off of Averys' Creek road, which is near Long Shoals Rd, Airport Road and 15 minutes to downtown Asheville,near the Biltmore House or 15 minutes to Hendersonville, NC and 5 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
Backyard directly outside apartment

Parking & paved walkway directly to downstairs apartment entrance

Smoking not allowed inside apartment, outside apartment smoking is permitted

description:
Fully rehabbed retro-hip, colorful and comfortable caravan home, 15 mins to downtown Asheville and River Arts District, 3 mins drive to Bent Creek Forest. Quiet wooded setting w/private parking, small front deck and good-sized fenced-in yard for visiting dogs. 2 bedrooms/1 bath, large open-plan living room and kitchen. Strong WIFI and TV with Roku. Full kitchen, lots of space to lounge around in large living room. (We can't bring ourselves to call it a mobile home, it hasn't moved in 50 yrs!)

The space
This is a sweet spot in the woods and it's been a pleasure to 'save' this old Caravan mobile home and turn it into a comfortable getaway for people and their dogs. It's in a quiet setting with only 5 other units spread out over 4 acres! If you have any questions, feel free to ask ahead of time before making a booking. We've owned the property for close to 5 yrs now and we love it there.

Guest access
Easy, self-entry combination lock on fro

5☆ 1960's dressed up mtn cottage just 1.2 miles from downtown on Beaucatcher Mtn. Located above the mountain tunnel heading into downtown, our home is a stand alone 2 br+ office and is a part of AVL travel history as one of the original Swiss Chalets from the 60s. So close but don't be surprised if you see a bear or two "up on the hill".

* 3rd bedroom is set up as an office
* Snug parking for two vehicles
* $7 Uber to downtown

Brought to you by Suites on Front - NC's Own!

Well laid out home on the mountain above AVL. Comfortable furnishings, deck, grill, 1960s builtins, outdoor space, and so close to everything but a world away on Beaucatcher Mountain!

100 percent of

The space

There is only one parking spot available.

The walking path to the apartment is made of stone with a down slope. We would not recommended our rental for someone with a walking handicap. We also like to warn people it would not be possible to roll a large suitcase very easily.

The pool is surrounded by an 8-foot fence; children cannot open the gate, which also contains an alarm. The two bedrooms -which share a private bathroom - are in the private upstairs unit. Great for families with kids; convenient for walking to shops and restaurants on Haywood Rd & the River Arts District.

The space
The home is on a quarter acre and includes a grassy front yard and a back yard with a swing set, back deck, and in-ground pool. The door in the kitchen leads out to the pool and back yard. Another kitchen doorway leads to the large sunny dining room. The front door opens to a large living room, which is adjacent to the dining room, and stairwell to the bedrooms. The bedrooms and bathroom are at the top of the stairs. Guests have access to all of these rooms wi

Location, Location, Location! This home sits perfectly between city and nature being 5 minutes to downtown and the parkways entrance. It is in a quiet friendly neighborhood. With great WiFi it is also great for working travelers. We have visits from black bears, hawks, foxes, & turkeys often. The owner has taken great care to make the place feel like home. With the charms of the vintage Jukebox and video arcade games for fun.

The space

Refrigerator with freezer and ice/water dispenser, dishwasher and coffee cart with coffee and tea selections. The dining area has a beautiful blue ridge mountain mural that can also be seen from the living area. The living area has an L s

All fenced in for your pooch, pergola, fire pit, garden waterfall and fun time shed gives you even more space to enjoy your stay. Parking, wifi/cable and no pet fees.

Breathe in the mountain air from your balcony and enjoy a glass of wine while you observe the bustling city below. Markets, shops, bars, restaurants, breweries and the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway await your arrival.

The space

Our lofts feature fourteen foot ceilings, repurposed flooring, and lots of exposed brick and terra-cotta original to the building. description:
Modern, new, and clean private 1 bdrm, 1 bath suite with your own entrance, back porch, kitchen (full size fridge, range, sink, coffee setup), walk in-closet, sleeper sofa, HDTV, washer/dryer, lots of light.

15 minutes to downtown AVL. 5 mins to the Blue Ridge Pkwy/Folk Art Center, JBL soccer complex and Warren Wilson College. 5 minute walk to a secluded beach on Swannanoa River. Breweries, hiking and biking trails close too!

We'd love to welcome you to AVL and share some of what we love.

Brand new everything. Full kitchen, HDTV with Fire Stick, Laundry, a huge closet that can easily fit a pack and play ;) Quiet neighborhood with trails close by, easy access to the Blue Ridge Parkway and Folk Art Center, JBL Soccer complex, Warren Wilson College all 5 minutes away in quiet subdivison. Able to provide recommendations and guidance for biking, hiking and rafting if needed.

*** If you can not provide proof of vaccination,

For entertainment the Living Room has a 55" flat screen 4K TV and the bedroom has 32" wall mounted television. Both televisions offer YouTube TV with over 60 channels including HGTV, ESPN, TCM, Networks and so much more. We also offer Netflix, Amazon Prime and Chrome Cast.

There is a large wrap around porch with ceiling fans for comfort on hot days that flows into an open deck. The driveway to the home is paved with parking directly in front of the home. The kitchen appliances are GE Adora Series, the washer and dryer are LG and there is wifi and a S

One mile from UNCA.

description:

Our house is located just two blocks from the epicenter of Haywood Road where all the action is. We offer a newly renovated basement creating a cute and cozy space for you to enjoy your stay and take in all that Asheville has to offer.

The space
The space is completely private including it's own entrance with a covered porch and outside seating. The space has all the comforts of home and plenty of room to stretch out. Its the perfect size for two people or a small family. The main bedroom has a cozy queen size mattress, and the living room has a full size pull out couch with a memory foam mattress. When the pull out bed is not in use, you will have a small living room with a TV for you to relax and a dining

name: Wooded Studio and Deck! Close to Biltmore
description:
This cozy space is the entire bottom floor and deck of a three story home in a family neighborhood. While this apartment is private, you should know that a family lives above you.

The newly finished downstairs apartment is warm and inviting. Relax on the deck or warm up next to the wood stove. The deck provides a private entrance, Summer treehouse vibes, and winter views. Enjoy an afternoon walk to local breweries and shopping, or a quick drive or Uber ride to Downtown.

The space
This studio is listed by me, Lucy, who lives above this cute studio! My cohosts are Lindsey and Phillip, the owners of this home, who you'll be communicating with!

We are excited to share part of our home with so many new friends. This cozy and private apartment is the perfect combo of tucked away and close to everything. Enjoy the neighborhood vibe as you sit on the deck in a forest of trees. This quiet road is home to families who love their neighborhood. Kid

description:
"Out of the Blue" Sanctuary, tucked away at the end of a street, is the hidden gem of West Asheville. Less than 5 minutes to West Asheville's vibrant Haywood Street or bustling Patton Ave. and 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. This . Furnished with modern elegance, the house boasts all the comforts of home. An expansive deck off the back of the home allows for the perfect gathering place, complete with a fire pit and seating.

The space
This home is entirely dedicated to guest space, with four bedrooms and two full baths. The master bedroom boasts a king bed and 50 inch Samsung Crystal UHD. There is a full bath with soaking tub, walk-in shower with rain overhead, and walk-in closet. There are two additional queen bedrooms with 43 inch Samsung Crystal UHD tvs, as well as a fourth bedroom with twin trundle beds and a nice office space. A second bathroom has a water closet with shower/tub combo, as well as double vanity sinks. Plant-based, naturally derived

name: Modern Suite - Entire Ground Floor
Private Pet-friendly Home and Backyard
description:
Enjoy the convenience of Asheville without the noise.

You will have plenty of space to recharge between adventures in the entire upper level and peaceful backyard of this home.

Set back from the road, you’ll have maximum privacy in this space. Cozy up with a book in the bay window or gather with friends around the kitchen island and open concept dining room.

Every window features a natural view. After a day of fun in town or on trails, crack one open by the fire pit with friends and family.

The space
Your space includes the entire main level of the house and the backyard.

The basement level and garage are private areas as the owner lives on the property with her two indoor cats.

But I’m friendly if you need anything! 🙂

Guest access
Guests have access to everything on the main level and front and backyards. I have a washer and dryer and will do your laundry by request, but there is no w

name: Cozy and peaceful house in a great location
description:
Cozy, peaceful, and private house in a great location in popular West Asheville. Convenient and close to everything. Amazing food, breweries, nightlife, and grocery. 15 minutes to downtown and Biltmore Estate.
The property features a huge backyard with lots of fruit trees, a swing set for the kids, super fast wi-fi, laundry, a desk work space in the living room and one in the bedroom, board games, cornhole, and a fire pit with utensils to make s’mores/hot dogs!

description:
Remember when the Platters recorded "Remember When" in 1956? What a perfect name for this cottage! Built in 1947, Remember When Cottage has been completely renovated and decorated in 40's and 50's style. Go to youtube and type in "Remember When Cottage Asheville" for a 10-minute walk-through. It's a comfy, cozy hideaway. One of our guests said it brought back a flood of memories of visiting his Grandma's house when he was a boy. Why not take a walk down memory lane?

The space
Note: In light of the current COVID19 crisis, you should know that we do our own cleaning and are very concerned about the risk of COVID. We take care of all the cleaning and maintenance ourselves. You won't be able to find any viruses hanging around this house!

Remember When Cottage may look like a house from the 40's or 50's , and it was in fact built in 1947, but don't be fooled! It's been completely renovated, with new floors throughout, a new heat pump with electric

name: Country Charm Nestled Minutes From Downtown
description:
Enjoy everything Asheville has to offer in this newly renovated brick ranch in a private country cove. 5 minutes from the historic River Arts District and 10 minutes from downtown Asheville or the Biltmore House. Start your day enjoying coffee while relaxing on the covered porch in a rocking chair.

The space
Our home is completely furnished with a beautiful brick fireplace with gas logs. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen including a full refrigerator, mircrowave, toaster, blender, crockpot, tea kettle and stove. All linens and towels are provided. Hairdryers in both bathrooms with soap, shampoo and conditioner. We strive to provide our guest with al the amenities of home. We hope you will feel welcome and truly experience our true southern hospitality.

Guest access
Guest have access to the entire house with the exception of the basement and one closet inside the house.

Other things to note
We love animals and your four-l

description: AVL Bear Haven is nestled perfectly on the city's mountain ridge. It is only 3 miles down the mountain ridge to Downtown Asheville, 5.3 miles to Biltmore Estates and only 4 miles up the ridge to the Blue Ridge Parkway. Enjoy the tastefully designed unit with huge front deck and of course views of the mountains and lots of fresh air. You may see a bear, or two, occasionally so please be careful and do not feed bears! You will not be disappointed! Self Check-in, two parking spaces.

name: ❤Mins away from everything❤Spacious eff apt❤
description: Come relax and enjoy in this peaceful, cozy 2 room efficiency apartment that has everything you need for your visit to Asheville.  It's 5 minutes away from the hip West Asheville scene, where you can enjoy shopping, restaurants and breweries. Only 10 minutes away from downtown Asheville, the hiking and biking trails of Bent Creek, the WNC Arboretum, the Biltmore House, and the blue ridge parkway.

name: NEW! Asheville Family House w/ Wraparound Deck!
description:
Sitting less than 10 miles from downtown Asheville, this family home is an ideal getaway for exploring the natural beauty and charm of North Carolina's Blue Ridge Mountains. Explore the grand Biltmore estate which sits only 9 miles away from your front door. Or take a hike on a nearby trail before heading into town to grab a pint at the Asheville Brewing Company. Back at home, relax and enjoy the 3-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom vacation rental's bright living space, kitchen, and wraparound deck!

The space
Wraparound Deck | 2,050 Sq Ft | Free WiFi

Boasting a bright living space and an ideal location near Asheville’s attractions and hiking areas, this vacation rental invites guests to experience life in the Blue Ridge Mountains.

Master Bedroom: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3: Twin/Full Bunk Bed | Living Room: Queen Sleeper Sofa

INDOOR LIVING: Leather sofa, foosball table, dining room, hardwood floor
KITCHEN: Fully equippe

name: Private n cozy little room
description:
This is a small and cozy room with a queen size bed, with a private entrance and a parking area. The door to the main house stays locked and there is no access from either side. Close to Biltmore park, the highway and 15 min from downtown Asheville. Great location and a great room for a couple. We would love to have you!

The space
This room includes a queen size bed, coffee maker, refrigerator, a full private bathroom and a smart TV

Guest access
There is a patio table and chairs by the entrance of the room that guests are welcome to use.

Other things to note
You’ll get a access code before check in to the private room and free WiFi

name: «Demi Sous-Sol Ensoleillé», 3 Rm/2.5 Bath for four
description:
One Block from the River Arts District and Central to all of Asheville's Best Attractions.

Spacious new construction Apartment Suite, with Private Entrance, in a centrally located, convenient and friendly Residential Neighborhood. There are Two Bedrooms, each with en suite Bathroom and queen-size beds. Plus huge Parlour with Kitchenette, Dining Area and Gas Fireplace. Comfortable, Quiet and follows COVID-19 sanitation protocols. Great for Escape "Staycations" or "Work from Anywhere".

The space
• “Vacation Escape to the Mountains” or “Work from Anywhere” visits with maximum privacy, convenience, and comfort.
• Top-Quality accommodations created during new construction (2019)
• Wheelchair Accessible
• Two Oversized Bedrooms with large South-facing windows
• Queen Sized Beds
• En Suite Bathroom, with heated floors, and Oversized Shower for each Bedroom
• Ample comfortable seating in each Bedroom
• Office Desks with Se

name: The Farmhouse at Wolfehaven
description:
Newly renovated 1925 farmhouse. Very private with easy access to all of Asheville’s best attractions and owners readily available for advice. We are 5 minutes to NC Arboretum, 5 minutes to Blue Ridge Parkway, 5 minutes to Bent Creek and miles of bike trails, 5 minutes to Asheville Outlets, 10 minutes to downtown Asheville, 15 minutes to Biltmore Estate, and 15 minutes from the Asheville airport. Hiking and Bike trails on property and a short drive to WNC’s best ski resorts. Come to the Mtn’s

The space
You’re tucked away in the middle of a 255 acre farm with Mtn’s and miles of trails for hiking and biking right out the back door.

Guest access
Private parking

Other things to note
If you will be arriving late, we offer a grocery buying service for breakfast items. Both a Keurig and a standard drip coffee maker are provided, as well as a tea kettle with a full selection of teas.

name: Private Elevator and Roof-top Patio, Four Story Townhome Downtown Asheville
description:
Beautiful four-story townhome located in the popular South Slope district of downtown Asheville. You will not want to miss staying in this luxury home that is equipped with a private elevator for convenient access to all floors and a roof-top patio that boasts mountain and city views.
You'll step right outside your front door to local breweries, restaurants, and spas while also conveniently located to the Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway.
Security cameras, for your safety, are located at the front and back exteriors of the property. This is a residential complex; please be mindful of your neighbors and refer to the quiet hours and HOA rules listed below:
The maximum number of guests occupying this townhome can not exceed 6 people. If occupancy exceeds 6, Towns Property Management, Inc reserves the right to evict guests.
No house parties are permitted in the home and there is a strict 10:00 PM noise ordinance. Violation of any property rules listed above

name: Walk to breweries, restaurants & music venues
description:
The house is right off the heart of Haywood rd. There are 8 breweries in the area, several coffee shops, bakeries and music venues within a few minutes walk. Numerous amazing local restaurants and bars to walk to as well.

The space
There is a nice front porch with a private entrance to a bedroom (queen size bed) with a full bathroom. A kitchenette with a mini refrigerator/freezer, microwave, and coffee maker, two bar stools to use at the overhanging counter and a chair with a back is available if requested.

Keyless entry for self check in.

Other things to note
Plenty of free parking on the street in front of the house.

There is a laundromat right across the street on Haywood rd should you need it.

name: Peace & Tranquility  in the Mountains of Asheville
description:
Nestled in the Appalachia and Blue Ridge Mountains this cabin is a perfect get away. Peaceful, tranquil, plenty of hiking. Like you’re a 100 miles from nowhere but only 8 miles from downtown.This cabin is unique, it is offered to Military members free upon returning home as they need time to destress and reconnect.
When not enjoyed by Veterans, Air B&B fees are 100% invested in this 501(c)(3) Non-profit.
A wonderful opportunity to enjoy everything Asheville has to offer and help our Veterans.

The space
Newly built Cabin, sits among five acres at a dead end road. Property is surrounded by 300 acres of pristine forest.
Massive hiking and open space. Two fire pits, picnic table, flowing streams, wildlife and fruit trees.
We have intentionally left out internet and television.
Cell service is usually available.
Three miles from grocery shopping. Fifteen minutes from Downtown Asheville and Downtown Black Mountain.
What we love

name: New tiny house in the heart of West Asheville
description:
Our tiny house was newly constructed in the spring of 2020 and is located in the heart of West Asheville. Just a short five minute walk to all the action on Haywood road and quick drive to all the beautiful hikes and attractions Western NC has to offer.

You will have one dedicated off-street parking spot (ample street parking near by for additional guests).

The space
A beautifully crafted home with vaulted ceilings make this tiny home feel extra spacious.  

When you're ready to take a break from all the hiking and brewery hopping come and take a nap on your sofa that pulls out to a full size bed (great for two kids or a couple that likes to keep it REAL cozy) or sit back and keep up with all of your favorite shows and movies on Netflix or Amazon Prime.

Ready for a snack? Your inviting kitchen is only a few steps away! A small but functional kitchen great for making simple meals and even better for heating up leftovers from the ma

name: Private Entry Guest Suite in Beautiful Asheville
description: This studio is has its own private entrance and private bath on the first floor of our home. It has a queen size bed, coffee/tea bar with fridge/freezer and microwave. Included Wifi, At&t TV, 1 off street parking spot in a quiet walkable neighborhood. It is very close to Biltmore Village, the Blue Ridge Parkway, and downtown Asheville.

name: Forest Edge Family Escape
description:
Escape urban madness and refresh your mind and body on the edge of the forest. This house is great for family and friends to enjoy Bent Creek Experimental Forest, the Blue Ridge Parkway, Lake Powhatan, the NC Arboretum, Bent Creek River Park and so much more!

Also a short drive to Asheville sights, eats and breweries. Walking distance to neighborhood trails for a run, bike ride or splash in the creek.

The listing is set for 6 ppl with a requested max of 4 adults/2 kids; infants also welcome.

The space
The house is a 3-story structure, the main and upper levels are accessible to guests. The basement and garage are locked and restricted to owners only.

On the main floor are located the dining room, kitchen, den/sitting area. The covered front porch has an outdoor table and chairs, and rocking chairs to watch the comings and goings in the neighborhood. Finally, from this floor there is access to the back deck with grill and the back

name: East Asheville Private 800 Sq. Ft Room Studio like
description:
800 Sq. feet of Private space just minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, Downtown Asheville, or 15 minutes to the luxurious Biltmore Estates.
Private entrance, your own bathroom & shower. Queen size bed and two trundle beds; sleep 6 adults or a family of 6. Excellent hiking trails, scenic vistas, amazing local restaurants and many breweries to enjoy a night out on the town or enjoy a night in and watch your favorite shows on the 42" flat screen TV. Motorcycle Friendly! And pet friendly!

The space
This space has a 700 Sq. ft bedroom with TV and dining table. Private bathroom and mud room. Plenty of closet space and a private entrance.

Other things to note
MOTORCYCLE FRIENDLY.

name: Vista View-Cozy & Relaxing Get-Away Home-Candler
description:
Well-loved quaint family home! Spacious front and back yard with comfortable back porch to relax and enjoy yourself. Family-friendly neighborhood conveniently located close to numerous Asheville tourist destinations. Wifi and live-stream tv are available in the home.

The space
This is an older styled home with a cozy cottage feel. It is clean and organized.
The kitchen and bath have been recently renovated. The house is one level and has a basement access from the kitchen. The washer and dryer are located in the unfinished basement area. You will need to be able to walk up and down stairs if laundry access is a need during your stay. If you are searching for value, this is your house of choice! The home is not a fancy establishment but hosts provide excellent communication and offer all the basics you'll need and have extra special guest touches, too!

Guest access
Guests have private use of home. There will be no one else occupyi

name: Like new!  Modern farmhouse, just 4 miles to town!
description:
Modern farmhouse cottage built in 2016. Private yet just 4 miles to downtown Asheville (2 miles to Biltmore Estate). Our 5-star vacation home has been in operation since 2016 - we've had it listed with VRBO/HomeAway - property #926417. While we are relatively new with AirBnB please search our property number at vrbo.com to see reviews from the past 4+ years. We are grateful for the hundreds of guests who have enjoyed staying with us thus far, and look forward to many more for years to come!

The space
Open floor plan, super comfortable mattresses/sheets, quality furniture and all of the accessories to make your stay easy and enjoyable. Spend time in the living room with gas fireplace or the game room in the upper level (50" TV, free Netflix) . Or, if you prefer the outdoors, enjoy the fenced back yard with patio and a fire pit surrounded by boulders & landscaping.

Guest access
entire house accessible for guests

name: Unique & Cozy Arden Cabin, 6 Mi to Blue Ridge Pkwy
description:
Hike, bike, and golf, or simply enjoy a leisurely vacation filled with dining, shopping, and scenic drives when you stay at this cozy Arden vacation rental. Centrally located near Asheville, this 1-bed, 1-bath cabin invites you to enjoy the sights and sounds of downtown Asheville, take a scenic drive along the Blue Ridge Parkway, or kick back at the local breweries, all within a short drive. When you're not out and about, enjoy beautiful afternoons on the lounge chairs by the fire pit.

The space
Prime Location | Free WiFi | Outdoor Seating

With splendid views of the surrounding forest, and a fantastic location near the area's finest attractions, this cabin is the perfect place for your next romantic getaway!

Lofted Bedroom: Queen Bed (via stairs)

OUTDOOR LIVING: Fire pit, charcoal grill, seating
KITCHEN: Well-equipped, cooking basics, coffee maker, hotplate, toaster oven, bar-sized sink, mini fridge
MAIN FEATURES: Smart

this studio have shower toilet sink a full closet, microwave, two burner stove and five draws chest. private and gated is small jewel.

new and very clean studio.

can used the grill outside also a nice table with umbrella, very nice and peaceful.

description:
Come for a mountain getaway in our newly constructed two bedroom cabin less than 10 minutes from downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Enjoy a rustic mountain experience with the comforts of all new appliances, a fully-equipped kitchen, and a large flatscreen TV with Roku.

The location is tucked away in a peaceful, wooded cove where you will likely spot a wide variety of wildlife. After a day of exploring all Asheville has to offer, Homestead Hideaway is the perfect place to unwind!

description:
Private 1 bedroom basement apartment w/ kitchenette, bath, laundry & private entrance. Centrally located 1 block from shopping and restaurants on Haywood Rd. 1 Queen bed in bedroom, 1 Queen Sofa Bed in Living room. This is a humble dwelling for travelers on a budget not a luxury apartment. We are offering safe & clean accommodations for quiet & respectful travelers. We live upstairs w/ 2 dogs & we are generally quiet but sound carries so please note before booking. Safe & merry travels!

The space
Private one bedroom basement apartment with 1 queen bed in bedroom and 1 queen sofa bed in living room.

Strong Wifi.

Kitchenette with refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, electric kettle, dishes, silverware, towels.

Private bath with whirlpool tub.

Onsite parking in driveway.

Private entrance and furnished back porch area.

Laundry on-site.

Fast Wifi
Plenty of Privacy
Parking In Front of the House
Welcome Basket
Can receive a discount of all services at my private hair studio downtown. WorthySalon.com

Bypass all the tourists traps by letting me help you with your trip to Asheville! I know all the best restaurants, bars, breweries, hiking, waterfalls, and fun things to do in town.

I’m happy to answer any and all questions!

The space
You have your cozy private bedroom and bathroom right next to the living room.

In your room you’ll find complimentary breakfast items, a mini fridge for your convenience, an essential oil diffuser, tea, coffee, and a welcome basket. Feel free to take anything from the welcome basket.

Behind the house, there is a pond that is peaceful to walk around or just sit by. It is tucked away and hardly ever has

name: Private+Clean Apartment in the Heart of West AVL
description:
Newly renovated private basement apartment with living room and private bathroom in the heart of West Asheville. Enjoy plenty of sunlight through garden-level windows and relax with a coffee or local craft beer on your private screened in porch. Five minute walk to Haywood road with some of Asheville's best restaurants, bars, coffee shops, boutiques, salons, yoga studios and so much more. Short drive to downtown, art galleries, and all the beauty of the Blue Ridge Mountains.

The space
Enjoy this brand new basement apartment with plenty of space to spread out. Your private entrance leads through a private patio to the bedroom with a comfortable queen sized bed. The large living room features simple, modern furnishings including a seating corner, a 40" Smart TV and desk. Your private bathroom has a double vanity and large bathtub ideal for soaking after a hike. You can easily reheat a meal, make coffee, or do laundry in the well-appointed kitchenette/laundry room.

name: Rustic Mt. Cove Farmhouse Minutes From Downtown
description: 30 DAY STAY MIN: Spacious yet welcoming 1875 farmhouse on 6 acres, the original homestead in a spectacularly scenic and quiet Appalachian cove 15 min from downtown Asheville and the Blue Ridge Pkwy (no highway driving).  Excellent gravel and road biking out your door, large field for frolicking, watching fireflies, or star gazing.  Frequent visits by deer, black bear, turkeys and bunnies. Nature, history, charm, peace and quiet so close to adventure! More photos coming!  (will discuss 6-12 mos)

name: The Fieldtop
description:
Welcome to our retreat, nestled in the Garden of Arden. Convenient to the Blue Ridge Parkway, Asheville Regional Airport, Sierra Nevada Brewery, and downtown Asheville, you’ll be in the heart of everything.

You can start your day off sipping coffee in a bright sunroom or the evening in a relaxing bath located in a spa-inspired master suite.

Here, you’ll find a homey, welcoming atmosphere ready to be enjoyed.

The space
A two-story craftsman filled with light, comfort and beautiful upgrades .

You’ll have 2 separate porches you are welcome to use, a spa bathroom, a large master suite, a guest room and another full bath in addition to the sun-filled living room, kitchen with concrete counters and dining room.

The kitchen features all the comforts of home, including a stove, refrigerator, dishwasher and microwave.

Guest access
You’ll have the full home, deck and porch. The unit over the garage is

name: Mid-Century Modern Retreat, off Blue Ridge Parkway
description:
Mid-Century Modern Hideaway preserved and renovated by local Asheville artist, Grace C. Bomer. Enjoy new modern amenities mixed with classic decor. The property borders the Blue Ridge Parkway with access to the Mountains-to-Sea Trail, yet only a short ride to downtown, groceries and more. A spring-fed pond sits on the 4.8 acre property and empties into a creek which provides an idyllic nature setting. Enjoy the pond for morning coffee or sipping local craft beers or wine in the evening.

The space
The house and property borders the Blue Ridge Parkway just outside city limits with access to the Mountains-to-Sea Trail and a 7-8 minute Uber/Lyft ride to downtown, The Biltmore Estate, shopping and Whole Foods Market.

The spring-fed pond and the connected creek provide a calm outdoor setting, perfect for morning relaxation or an evening beverage, especially after a day of hiking or other outdoor activities or after exploring Asheville and the surroundi

description:
Welcome to Highland Hideaway! Charming secluded mountain home, centrally located in Asheville: 7 min to downtown, 6 min to Biltmore, 5 min to Blue Ridge Parkway.

Space to spread out & relax. 2,300sq ft. 4 large bedrooms, 2 full baths, covered porch with rocking chairs and views, firepit, xlarge gourmet kitchen & 3 home office workspaces.

Other amenities: keyless entry, fiber internet, efficient washer/dryer, 55in TV, sound bar, PC monitors and large soaking tub, dual sinks in master

The space
We love this home because it gives you the feeling of being surrounded by nature with modern amenities and cozy touches to truly relax. A rare find to be tucked away while being minutes to all the food, breweries, art and outdoor activities Asheville has to offer. We hope you enjoy it as much as we do!

Guest access
You will have access to the entire home

Other things to note
You’ll find outdoor chairs and

name: Peaceful Mountainous views, Quaint & Perfect!
description:
Enjoy your stay in our craftsman home located minutes away from the many Asheville attractions. Experience Downtown entertainment, local restaurants, the Biltmore Estate and Blue Ridge Parkway just to name a few! Our downstairs private living area, with a separate entrance, has been recently renovated. It is a perfect space to relax and spend time away from your normal routine in a peaceful setting with a beautiful mountain view. My husband and I welcome you to Asheville!
No locals please.

name: Topsy's Trailer, Fast WiFi Close DT AVL, Sm Dog Ok
description:
Topsy's Trailer is located in Arden, which is only 15-20 minutes to downtown Asheville. Great location to take advantage of the breweries, hiking trails, the Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore Estate, and close for take-out services offered by local restaurants.

It has been fully renovated with hardwood floors, comfy beds, fast/reliable WiFi, streaming TVs, Weber gas grill, two covered decks, easy flat roads access (no 4WD needed), plenty of parking. A small dog is ok ($25/night fee will apply).

The space
Stay here and truly soak in the southern mountain charm of Western North Carolina. Relax in the large sectional American-made sofa and enjoy the fabulous eclectic furniture.

Prepare a whole meal in the kitchen or take advantage of the many take-out services from local restaurants that have made Asheville a nationwide hotspot. Soak in the food culture inside or on one of the two covered decks. Then relax in the new queen-sized beds that have a

description:
Independent apartment in Candler, NC about 10-20 minutes to downtown Asheville, River Arts District, Biltmore Village, Biltmore Park, Parkway, Haywood Rd.
Located in the well-established Woodside Hill neighborhood, the house was finished in 2020. Apt. features open spaces in the living room and dining area, a bedroom with access to the bathroom, granite countertops, new kitchen appliances, and an independent laundry room with a washer and dryer.

Steep driveway, guests can park on the street.

Guest access
Self Check-In

Other things to note
The apartment is next to a highway (I-40) and traffic noise should be expected.

Smoking is not allowed inside the premises.

Although pets are allowed on the property, they are not allowed in the guest's beds.

name: AVL Round House - only 6 miles West of downtown
description:
This adorable round house sits on the West side of Asheville in a quiet neighborhood just on the outskirts of town. Convenient to I40, just 17 min from the airport, 13 min (6 miles) to downtown, 15 min to Biltmore, 15 min to UNCA, 17 min to the arboretum and 10 min to happening Haywood Rd.

Clean, comfortable and stylishly funky with all new beds and mattresses, wifi, roku TV, a lovely porch for sitting and even small fire pit in back. There is also enough parking for 3 or 4 cars off street.

Guest access
The entire house, deck and yard is yours to enjoy for the duration of your stay.

Other things to note
The toilet is very low!
You can control the temperature with the remote controls - which are mounted on the wall of each room. Please don't use the baseboard heat. Thanks!

description:
Nestled in the heart of downtown Asheville, this 4800sf condo offers a ton of open space, and a large private rooftop, that is great for entertainment.

Heart pine floors and high ceilings make for a true loft experience.

Full industrial kitchen with 5 burner stove, provides you with all your cooking needs.

Huge master bathroom with old-school tub, under two skylights, and oversized shower.

A total of 4 different ultra modern luxury seating areas.

65" Vizio TV

The space
Our central downtown Asheville location gives you access to everything within easy walking distance. Restaurants, breweries, events and shopping are all close by. The space is gracious and roomy, with great views and all the amenities you will need during your stay.

Cable TV as well as Netflix, Hulu etc. is available on the smart Vizio TV in living room. You will have to login to your own streaming accounts though.

Brand n

name: Minutes away from downtown, Pisgah National Forest
description:
Recently remodeled, never before listed home close to the bent creek area. Just minutes from Bent Creek experimental forest, the Asheville Outlets, 35 minutes to DuPont state forest, 15-20 minutes to downtown, 1 mile from entrance to blue ridge parkway!

The house is in a very quiet and safe neighborhood. Easy access from either I-26 or I-40. It has 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, living room, kitchen with all essentials, and air hockey table. Parking for approximately 4 cars. Easy keypad entry.

The space
Open floor plan home with well stocked kitchen, newer appliances, high speed internet, TV’s in two of the bedrooms and living room, and enclosed patio on the side of the home that can be used to store or work on mountain bikes. Also laundry room with supplies provided.

Guest access
Guest are free to access any area of the home. We do not have our supply cabinets locked in the laundry room but we prefer that guest use only the bedding and t

name: Rustic-Yet-Cozy Cabin w/ Patio, 12Mi to Asheville!
description:
Have the ultimate North Carolina getaway at this inviting 2-bed, 2-bath Arden cabin - perfect for a small family or couples' retreat! Tucked away in the Blue Ridge Mountains but only 12 miles from the hustle and bustle, this vacation rental provides the luxury of both privacy and convenience. Whether you're seeking an art-inspired getaway in Asheville, sight-seeing exploration at the Biltmore Estate, or outdoor excitement in the Pisgah Forest, you're sure to find your desired adventure here!

The space
Pet Friendly | Outdoor Entertainment Space | Free WiFi

Master Bedroom: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed

OUTDOOR LIVING: Screened-in porch w/ seating, patio w/ dining table & gas grill, fire pit w/ seating, on-site creek
KITCHEN: Fully equipped w/ cooking basics, knife

description:
The apartment is on the second floor of a quirky old building that has been recently updated in the heart of downtown Asheville. You have your own private deck with great views.
Spacious bedroom and separate living/kitchen area that is fully stocked.

Parking pass included, walk to everything downtown and the south slope have to offer. Easy access to Patton Avenue and the river arts district is just a few minutes drive.

description:
Close to everything Asheville - restaurants in walking distance, near the parkway for biking, hiking, minutes to Biltmore House, Grove Park, downtown. The home has 360 degree beautiful views & relaxing porch w/ firepit. This home is spacious with screened porch with views in the front & large back porch & yard with room to relax. It is modern and sparkling clean. Asheville has so much to do so we hope you will enjoy your time out and about and coming back for a relaxing evening.

The space
There is a full kitchen to cook meals and washer/dryer to do laundry if needed. There is a 2 full bathrooms. Private entrance and porches. The garage and apartment are ours, sometimes we are there, sometimes we have guests. The house and huge yard is for you. The only shared area is the parking area but designated parking for your and your guests. It is a great place to enjoy family times or reconnecting with friends! Our cleaning specialist has cleaned all the details of the

name: Farmhouse charm minutes from downtown or parkway
description:
Newly remodeled modern farmhouse surrounded by nature and mountain views. Guests will enjoy the illusion of secluded country just minutes from everything exciting Asheville has to offer. Only 8 minutes from Biltmore Village & downtown Asheville easily enjoy a great meal, visit a local brewery, stroll or shop. Cute + comfortable... updated and furnished with all the essentials to make your stay as delightful as possible so that you can relax + regroup and plan your Asheville area adventures.

The space
1800 square feet of farmhouse charm on private farm property. Enjoy gorgeous mountain sunrises and sunsets from the large picture window in the living room or front porch. Bright and airy open concept living space includes: a sectional couch, 2 accent chairs, dining room table seating 6 and island seating for 4. Cozy/quiet additional room off the kitchen perfect for reading, relaxing or work (if you must). Large patio with table and seating for 4 off the front of

name: Elkhorn Cabin | Idyllic Retreat | Sauna, Ping-Pong
description:
Perched mountainside and boasting a private sauna, game room, and inspiring views, find your idyllic Appalachian escape at Elkhorn Cabin, a gorgeous Craftsman 2BR (plus loft) getaway. Asheville and a host of outdoor activities are minutes away. Sleeps 9.

The space
A masterpiece of style and design, an idyllic Appalachian retreat awaits at Elkhorn Cabin -- a gorgeous Craftsman 2BR/2.5BA (plus loft) getaway. The welcoming interior features warm wood paneling, a staircase handcrafted from mountain laurel, slate tile, and beautiful oriental rugs.

Highlights include a game room, a private sauna, high-end furnishings throughout, and inspiring views from multiple decks.

Located above the Blue Ridge Parkway, enjoy easy access to the culture and cuisine of Asheville as well as a plethora of nearby outdoor adventures.

LIVING AREA

Vaulted ceilings and skylights flood the Great Room with natural light. A love seat, rocker, and armc

name: Stone Carriage House in Historic Grove Park
description:
Welcome to the Stone Carriage House located in Asheville's desirable historical Grove Park neighborhood. Stone Carriage House features one bedroom and one bath with wood flooring throughout and a calm color palette. Less than a 10 minute drive to the heart of Asheville and all it has to offer. Less than 5 minute drive to the Grove Park Inn where you can enjoy the stunning sunsets that Asheville is known for. Walkable neighborhood with beautiful homes and gardens.

The space
Stone Carriage House is located behind our beautiful historical Colonial Revival home built in 1927. Views from the carriage house are a beautifully landscaped garden that includes a private outdoor space with a table and chairs for you to enjoy breakfast or a glass of wine in the evening.

Guest access
Entire 2nd floor of Stone Carriage House including kitchen, bedroom, living room, reading nook, entryway and full bath.

Other things to note
We loo

description:
Room with queen bed and private bathroom in quiet home. Close to downtown, River arts district and West Asheville (1-2 miles). Access to shared kitchen, coffee maker, cooking utensils, dishes.
Great wrap around porch for outside dinners or sitting on warm summer nights.
Must be ok with the cats and dog who live in the house :)

It's a calm peaceful place, not a late night party house 😛

Eco friendly cleaning products used, low fragrance home. Hypoallergenic mattress.

Host is fully vaccinated.

The space
Bedroom, private bathroom, shared kitchen, shared living room
