Access to private bathroom, kitchen, living room, porch.

Other things to note
Basic toiletries provided- toothpaste, shower gel/soap, shampoo/conditioner, feminine products, lotions- all natural and cruelty free.

name: Mountain Views, Close to Downtown, Biltmore & More
description:
Mountain views, 10 minutes from Downtown & West Asheville! 1 bedroom with a queen bed & an airy bathroom attached. The living area will constantly remind you you're in the mountains with a nice East facing mountain view & interior style inspired by the green, blue & earthy landscapes the beautiful Appalachian region abundantly offers. A peaceful koi pond, heated/AC sunroom, kitchenette, desk space for remote working & a large private backyard in East Asheville neighborhood, Beverly Hills.

The space
The Bear Pause is meant to help you feel fully immersed in an Asheville setting. With lots of locally purchased furniture, a lush outdoor area with multiple sitting spaces, and a four seasons sunroom facing East with a mountain view, you'll find no shortage of areas to take a moment for yourself or to kickback with loved ones comfortably. 1 bedroom with a queen bed, a couch that folds into a full, and an air-mattress make this an affordable option for a group or family

name: Cozy Private Bed and Bath in Central Location
description:
A simple and cozy spot in a perfect location... minutes away from the parkway and Biltmore Forest! Numerous places for a quick bite, grocery stores, restaurants, and more nearby. Private Bedroom and Bathroom! The room offers a comfortable bed with a three inch mattress topper and a tv with streaming capabilities including Netflix, Hulu, prime, hbo max, etc.

The space
A simple and cozy spot in a perfect location... minutes away from the parkway and Biltmore Forest! Numerous places for a quick bite, grocery stores, restaurants, and more nearby. Private Bedroom and Bathroom! The room offers a comfortable bed with a three inch mattress topper and a tv with streaming capabilities including Netflix, Hulu, prime, hbo max, etc.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire apartment except for my bedroom and bathroom

name: New Bright Entire APT - Walking Dist to Hip WASHV
description:
Step in through your own private entrance, secured with a keyless pad to our newly renovated, playful light-filled and private first floor apartment located in the heart of vibrant West Asheville and walking distance to great restaurants, breweries, yoga, coffee shops and music venues.

We are currently strictly following the CDC's guideline for cleaning!

The space
The apartment includes your own controlled A/C and heat, fast internet and free wifi, Apple TV; master bedroom with a comfortable tempur-pedic topper queen bed and large closet; and a full private, two door bathroom for private access for additional parties staying on the comfortable full-sized pull-out bed (tempur-pedic mattress) located in the living room.

Enjoy a spacious open living room, dining and kitchen area, with a generous kitchenette stocked with a full set of dishes, silverware, glassware, wine glasses, electric tea pot, Keurig coffee pot, microwave, toaster, mini fri

name: Quiet Mountain View
description:
This one level home is located in East Asheville in a quiet development with a lot of trees and a mountain view on a secluded lot. You will be two miles from one of the top rated VA hospitals in the U.S., two miles from the Asheville Mall, and approximately four miles from downtown Asheville. The Blue Ridge Parkway entrance is three miles away.

The space
I have two bedrooms and one bath available for guests. Relax, work, or watch TV in your room....you will have plenty of privacy. Or, move to the front porch for a relaxing mountain view. Microwave, refrigerator, and coffee pot is available. The full kitchen is available for long term guests. Coffee, tea, bottled water and snacks will be available for you.

name: Convenient West Asheville Cozily Remodeled Rancher
description:
Looking for a place to rest your head after a long days hike, bike or paddle while keeping you 5 minutes from the excitement and luxuries of downtown Asheville, look no further. With easy access to downtown you are no more than a stones throw away from great dining and fantastic breweries, should you choose not to use the houses fully equipped kitchen. Easy access to the highway from a tucked away location means that you won't have to spend much time making your way to any nearby WNC attraction.

The space
Having been recently remodeled the interior holds some of the charms of the original Rancher style while including more modern aspects. Enjoy a recently remodeled kitchen, living room, dining room, bedrooms and bathrooms while having a nice outside patio to enjoy an evening beer on while taking in fresh mountain air. The remodel also included adding fans that operate via remote control, smart locks for both entrances and the home is heated/cooled via a nest ther

name: Garden Flat Minutes to Downtown & Biltmore Estate
description:
Welcome to our garden apartment. 6 mi from downtown and Biltmore Estate. This sweet abode is below our other property (also listed on Air Bnb) The Grape Escape. Our apartment is brand new, built to accommodate 2 people. It is intended for a couple traveling together. Our space has a kitchen with Breville Convection Oven, microwave and two burner instant hot stove. No dishwasher or oven. King size bed in sleeping space with full bath. Contemporary living with traditional touches.

The space
Our apartment is sleek and elegant. Open concept with sleeping space in the back with full bath. Yummy king size bed with 100% cotton sheets and lots of pillows. This space is intended to accommodate couples. Its a perfect little escape for 2.
Downtown is 6 miles away as is Biltmore Village. There is a fantastic Italian restaurant (Piazza) less than a mile from us. Grocery and drug store less just around the corner. Please be aware people may be above you! You may hea

name: Private house!!! 12min Downtown, firepit, WiFi W/D
description:
* Entire home is yours to enjoy!
* Hosts and housecleaner are vaccinated - professionally cleaned between each guest
* 3 bed, 1 bath on 1/4 acre
* full kitchen, open and bright living area
* Fenced back yard
* Central heat and air
* 12 minutes from downtown Asheville and 15 minutes to UNCA
* Roku TV, Netflix, WiFi high speed internet
* Washer and Dryer
* Private parking, garage, paved roads and easy drive
* Quiet residential neighborhood
* Basement has office space
* Tree swing!

The space
Your comfort is so important to us! Our housecleaner has given permission to share that she is fully vaccinated against Covid, as are we. Our home is professionally cleaned between guests and meets top AirBNB recommendations with extra sanitization!

We respond promptly to texts and phone calls, and you will have complete use of the home. No parties are allowed. We provide WiFi, Roku TV, and a guest Netflix

name: Star Light on Beaucatcher Mountain
description:
Private Suite Surrounded by 50 Acres of Woods Less than 1 Mile from Downtown Asheville! - Handcrafted King bed with full-sized pull-out sleeper. Private keyed entrance, TV, microwave, toaster, fridge, coffee & snacks. Unwind in our secluded wooded backyard and trails. Patio & outdoor seating - space to enjoy a cup of coffee or glass of wine and soak in the mountain air. Easy 15 minute walk (or 5 min. drive) to downtown Asheville, less than 1 hr to skiing and 20 min to the airport.

The space
Asheville Home Builders Association 2020 "Innovative Home of the Year", designed by the owners. Private suite feels like you are in a treehouse! Large living area with coffee and wine bar, washer/dryer and walk-in closet. Wonderful setting for a walkable, romantic weekend or plenty of room to bring the family. Great for Escape "Staycations" or "Work from Anywhere". Commercial-grade HVAC air purifier that kills/removes viruses, bacteria, mold & allergens.

Guest a

name: Shrimp Shack @ Baying Hound Campground
description:
The Shrimp Shack is located in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground. We snazzed up a regular old shed with a pop-out sleeping pod, added padding, a custom paint job and VOILA! You've got a one-of-a-kind, tent-less camping experience! The sleeping section is padded for your comfort, but be sure to bring sleeping bags and pillows. The campground is about 10 minutes from downtown, yet still on the edges of rural, agricultural Asheville.

The space
The Shrimp Shack is our newest addition to the campground! We have some finishing touches to put on it, but if you don't mind the rustic feel, then it'll do the trick! No need to hassle with a tent!


THE CAMPGROUND
The Baying Hound Campground is where rural Appalachia meets “keep Asheville weird.” You’ll see sleeping pods decorated by professional artists, structures made from upcycled building materials and permaculture experiments in the making. We’ve been described as “if a Eur

name: Busbee Mountain Vista with Hot Tub and Game Room
description:
This freshly-remodeled peaceful mountaintop cabin has stunning views from the large, wrap-around deck and is only 15 minutes from the heart of downtown Asheville and the Biltmore House. Relax in the hot tub on the spacious deck, chill in the cozy living room with wall-to-wall windows looking out at the mountains, hang out in the heated game shed out back or in the fenced yard with your furry friend. There's plenty of room for everyone to enjoy this incredible setting just minutes from Asheville.

The space
This cabin is in a well-spaced wooded mountaintop neighborhood, providing a feeling of seclusion and tranquility. **PLEASE NOTE: the road to this mountaintop is very steep and winding, and parking/turning around is tricky. Please watch our video on best parking practices, and be aware that more than 3 cars will be a major challenge.

Once inside the house, there are two cozy bedrooms upstairs, each with its own heat pump for climate control. There is a

name: Cute little apt walking distance to downtown avl
description:
This is an adorable (and tiny) one bedroom apartment in historic Montford. The space is 455 square feet and has everything you need to feel right at home. The apartment has a futon couch, television with access to most streaming services, a claw foot tub with super hot water (be careful), a cozy queen sized bed, and a breakfast nook in the kitchen. The space is within walking distance to most things in downtown Asheville (less than 20 minutes to the farthest part of downtown)

The space
The apartment is less than a 5 minute walk to High Five coffee, and is extremely walkable to most of downtown Asheville- the furthest point from the apartment is the south slope and that is about a 20 minute walk (5ish minute Uber). Super close to everything and far enough from downtown so you don’t have all of the city noise.

Guest access
The unit has a patio with furniture that guests are welcome to (just please no smoking). All the rooms in the house are f

name: Eagles Wing Lodge | Game Room & Epic Sunset Views
description:
Boasting inspiring sunset views, a game room with ping-pong and foosball, and lavish furnishings throughout, escape to the Appalachians at Eagles Wing Lodge, a masterfully designed 3BR + loft retreat. Get to activities and Asheville in minutes. Sleeps 10.

The space
Retreat to the Appalachians at Eagles Wing Lodge, a luxe 3BR/3.5BA (plus loft) getaway boasting dazzling sunset views from inside and out, a game room with ping-pong and foosball, and nearly 3,000 square feet of lavish living space. Additional highlights include a gourmet kitchen, a firepit, and hiking trails just off the property.

This rental is close to outdoor adventures as well as the culture and cuisine of downtown Asheville, all while offering a private, picturesque escape.

LIVING AREA

Socialize around the gas fireplace in the living area, classically appointed with a sofa and three armchairs.

Enjoy a book in the den, featuring seating for four.

name: *Newly Listed* Downtown Asheville!
description:
Newly listed!

Located right downtown in Asheville, this one bedroom, 2 bathroom condo is perfect for a weekend get away or business trip. Enjoy all downtown Asheville has to offer within walking distance to many shops and restaurants!

This Condo has all the amenities you will need for your stay as well as an espresso machine as an added bonus.

name: The "Maple House" + King + 10 Mins to DT Asheville
description:
Soft textures and clean lines define this modern newly renovated home offered by Shanti Mountain Properties. Fully stocked and well thought out this "Cozy Chic" home offers a clean and refreshing get away from the outside world while only being a short hop to fine eats, drinks, and night life of Asheville NC!

The space
This Newly renovated mid century home is perfectly nestled in a safe neighborhood just 10 minutes from downtown Asheville proper, 8 minutes from super hip West Asheville and 19 minutes to the blue ridge parkway!!. Enjoy a fire inside or out at the pit with our provided fire wood. Snuggle in with our rustic chic decor and watch a movie in bed or adventure over to the Biltmore house only 16 minutes away!! Classiness, comfort and warmth abound.

Guest access
You'll have access to the entire house and fenced in yard. There is a small greenhouse on the property.

Other things to note
Please make sure you read

name: Bent Creek Retreat Mountain Biking & dog friendly
description:
Located in Bent Creek, Asheville's best kept secret. Ride/hike right from the house to miles of single track in Bent Creek Experimental forest. Paddle or float the French Broad river past the Biltmore Estate with river access 1 mile away. Enjoy the Blueridge Parkway and the Arboretum, for your ultimate hiking, biking or sightseeing adventures, only minutes away. Head downtown after a long day of adventure, it's a 15 minute drive or Lyft ride and only 10 minutes away from the Airport.

The space
Enjoy the private lower level suite of our ranch home. We are a family of 4 with 3 dogs so there will be some normal day to day noise upstairs. You will have 1 off street parking spot in our safe cul-de-sac neighborhood. Unwind on the covered deck and you may see a bear or deer passing through our lower yard. The covered deck has plenty of room to store bikes and air out gear. Enjoy hiking/biking Bent Creek trail access without having to get in your car. Snuggle up next

name: Walkable, yet peaceful in the heart of West AVL
description:
Sharp Quarters is the perfect space for your Asheville getaway! It's a 10 minute walk to many restaurants (Walk, Taco Billy, OWL bakery, Pizza Mind) and breweries (New Belgium and Archetype Brewing!). Visitors have their own parking space and outdoor patio. The Tempur-pedic mattress on our king-size bed offers maximum comfort. We can also add a Pack-N-Play or toddler bed for the little one(s). The neighborhood is perfectly peaceful and safe, yet accessible to all things Asheville!

The space
This studio apartment space has everything you need for a quick weekend away or a long stay in Asheville!

We are located in a friendly, safe West Asheville neighborhood. The space is cozy, private and comfortable. It features a king-size bed, love seat, kitchenette, full bathroom, and 50-inch Sony Smart TV.

If you can bring yourself to get out of the king-size, memory foam bed in the morning, you will have so much to explore. Walk to New Belgium in 10 m

name: Woodfin Cottage
description:
Private and close to downtown!
Enjoy quick access to downtown Asheville (2 miles/8 minutes) while being nestled in the trees at Woodfin Cottage. This tastefully decorated cottage accommodates up to 4 guests comfortably with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Enjoy morning coffee or evening sunsets by the gas firepit on the deck. Adding to your stay is a well-equipped kitchen, gas grill, Wi-Fi and 2 smart TVs.

**Close proximity to DT does come with noise from traffic

Minimum age of booking guest is 25

Guest access
Guest are welcome to access all parts of the property.

Other things to note
Property is only available to immediate guest.
Minimum age of booking guest is 25.

name: "In the Treetops"  10 minutes from downtown
description:
Our home is nestled in the middle of 3 wooded acres. With an open floor plan and loads of windows you feel like you're in a spacious treehouse, yet you're only 10 minutes from downtown. Ideal for large groups or a multiple family get away with 4 beds and 3 baths "In the Treetops" can host up to 11 guest. Explore Asheville or spend some time exploring our 3 acres and cooking in our accommodating kitchen.

The space
The space flows from den to kitchen connected by a bar that seats 6. Also open to the kitchen is the dining room and living room.

Guest access
Guest have access to the entire house

name: Luxury Condominium in the Center of Downtown Asheville
description: New luxury condominium in the heart of downtown Asheville. This 2 bedroom and 2 bath unit has all the premium amenities you can imagine. New appliances, bedding, and furniture create a stunning accommodation for you and your loved ones to relax and enjoy yourself. Located on the 4th floor, this residence features a full kitchen, dining room, living room, and balcony. You'll fall in love with this new condominium and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Asheville.

name: Private Apartment, Walk to Downtown
description:
Lovely, private, fully stocked 1 Bedroom apartment. 10 minute Walk to Downtown Asheville. Enjoy the vibrancy of Asheville steps away from this apartment and come “home” to a quiet restful space (please keep it that way).

We Don’t allow pets and also NO smoking, inside or outside of the unit (health reasons for both). Thank you for understanding.

We offer your own parking spot. We are two blocks away from Trader Joe’s & Harris Teeter, so you can easily get your favorite supplies upon arrival.

name: East Asheville Neighborhood Charm
description:
Beverly Hills Charm is a quiet, relaxing space in the basement of a private home in the lovely "Beverly Hills" area of East Asheville. With its own private entrance, the apartment boasts lots of natural light through double windows in living area and a single window in the bedroom as well as an airy feel with high ceilings - not your typical "basement apartment"! Snack/beverage bar area gives you the chance to sip your favorite beverage as you plan your Asheville adventures.

The space
The basement apartment is accessed from the back of the home, following the driveway down to the gate just past the garage door. There is a seating area outside the entryway with a table and Adirondack chairs where you can sit and listen to the quiet of the neighborhood, occasionally hearing sounds from our neighborhood flock of wild turkeys. The "refreshment bar" inside in the living area has a Keurig coffee maker with a variety of coffees and teas, a small fridge stocked with wa

name: Comfortable Asheville Retreat - Entire House!
description:
Nestled incredibly close to everything Asheville has to offer! We are 5 minutes away from the River Arts District and less than 10 minutes away from Downtown and West Asheville. Start your vacation here in Asheville comfortably with access to an entire house and all basic amenities provided. This is a legal vacation rental and located right outside the edge of city limits!

The space
This spacious two bedroom house comes with all your comfort needs. All beds are equipped with queen-sized mattresses. The entire house has beautiful hardwood floors as well as a large kitchen space complete with granite counters. Comfortable living space with a 55" TV and Netflix included.

Guest access
You will have access to the entire house.

name: South Asheville Getaway
description:
Beautiful 1920s updated house tucked away on a private drive in South Asheville (Arden). Feel as though you're in the mountain woods but just a few minutes from everything Asheville. 15 min to Biltmore village & house, 18 min to downtown Asheville, 20 min to Brevard with all of the waterfalls and hiking, 25 min to quaint downtown Hendersonville, less than 10 min to Sierra Nevada, Mills River, & Boldrock breweries. Close to great restaurants or have a night grilling & a bonfire

The space
We are using Asheville Cleaning co. for all cleaning to ensure the safest possible stay for all of our guests. Please see all protocols taken via website.

ashevillecleaningcompany.com

name: Long term rental: Hip, cute, bright + cheery home
description:
Hip, cute, bright and cheery: 5 minutes from downtown Asheville. Walk to UNCA, Greenway, botanical gardens, parks and local restaurants. Secluded setting @ end of private driveway. Small dogs ok for additional monthly fee and damage deposit. All rentals less than 90 nights subject to 13% state and county accommodations tax. High speed internet available. Washer and dryer in unit.

The space
Loft style open floor plan has exposed wood beams, cooks kitchen, living room, dining area and half bath. Large rear deck is a private oasis with eating and seating. Office space on second floor landing. Two bedrooms with queen beds share a full Jack and Jill bath.

Guest access
Entire home

description:
This 5BR (plus two lofts) rental is comprised of two adjacent luxury cabins -- Elkhorn Cabin & Eagles Wing Lodge. Find hiking trails and the Shoji Spa just down the street. Venture 6.5 miles to downtown Asheville. Sleeps 19.

The space
Located 300 yards above the Blue Ridge Parkway, this well-appointed 5BR (plus two lofts) rental is comprised of two modern log cabins, located next door to one another.

Find hiking trails and the Shoji Spa just down the street, or venture 6.5 miles to downtown Asheville.

ELKHORN CABIN

A 2BR/2.5BA (plus loft) home that sleeps nine guests.

The three-story interior features beautiful oriental rugs and a staircase handcrafted from mountain laurel. Highlights include soaring vaulted ceilings and a private redwood sauna (with optional steam functions).

A unique and roomy layout provides flexible sleeping space, with the game room occupying the entire lower level and an open loft situa

name: Unique Downtown Studio
description:
The studio is in a an older but updated building in the heart of downtown Asheville great walkable location. Spacious living and kitchen areas with a full bathroom with a walk in shower.

The kitchen has all you need to cook a meal and a nice dining table for two.

Parking included, walk to everything in downtown or hop in your car for easy access to West Asheville and the River Arts District.

name: Centrally located private home. 5 min I-26 Airport
description:
Welcome to the mountains! This private rental is a central location between Asheville, Blue Ridge Parkway, Asheville airport, and Hendersonville. It is an end unit townhouse in a quiet neighborhood, with 2 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, and a pull-out sofa bed. The unit is recently renovated and goes through extensive cleaning and sanitizing between every quest who occupies it. The unit is located 2.2 miles from the airport (7 min) and 11 miles from downtown Asheville (20 min).

The space
Entire newly renovated spacious townhouse with privacy and comfort. It has 2 bedrooms with 2 baths located upstairs and a new pullout sofa downstairs in the living room. There is a gas fireplace in the living room for cold evenings, and space on the back porch for warmer nights. The kitchen has enough equipment to prepare a home-cooked meal and a dining table that seats up to six. Full-size washer and dryer are available to use as well.

Guest access
The entrance

name: Tranquility Base Suite. Clean, Comfy, & Private
description:
Brand new, sparkling clean guest suite. comfortable, private, quiet, and perfectly located to access all that Asheville has to offer. I even provide home roasted coffee beans to enjoy during your stay, and some to take home, as well.

The space
Private, stylish suite with vaulted ceilings, custom artisan furniture, lots of books, and a variety of coffee options with home roasted beans and Bustello for the espresso machine.

Guest access
Guests have access to the suite, on-site parking, and share the front porch with the host.

name: Relax at Home and Walk to Downtown
description:
Nice and quiet space for a perfect Asheville Pad.

Everything Included!! Live at walking distance to Downtown Asheville and UNCA. Brand new, 1 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom Loft Style Apartment. Washer and Dryer. Harris Teeter and Trader Joe's only blocks away. This is part of a duplex we live in. Non smokers only please. Parking available for 1 (ONE) compact or sedan vehicle.

Other things to note
*** At least during this COVID-19 Pandemic.
This is a space to be enjoyed by the guests mostly. If you plan to have a couple of friends over for a quiet dinner bringing the number of people inside this apartment to 4 at most while your dinner party lasts, that is OK.

More than 4 people at a time will not be acceptable at this time under any circumstance. So if you like to have friends over while you're staying with us, this is NOT the place for you.

name: Trendy and Spacious Apartment on Chicken Alley
description:
Trendy and spacious apartment in the heart of downtown Asheville, NC. Located on Chicken Alley, guests are steps away from restaurants, breweries, art galleries and bars. Attractions like the Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway are only a 10 minute drive away.

It is a bright and airy ground floor apartment, with parking located on-site, and self check-in with a keypad. There is a king bed, queen bed, and queen sized pull out sofa, all new and very comfortable.

name: Historic Montford 10-minute walk from the AVL Buzz
description:
Savor the buzz of downtown Asheville in just a 10 minute walk from this ground level, newly constructed apartment suite with private entrance in this quiet National Historic neighborhood. Flooded with natural light, all new furnishings include, a dinning/living area, large separate bedroom with king-size Casper mattress, and outside sitting area off the living room. Everything you need for take-out dinning is provided. Enjoy the large smart-TV and high speed internet access.

The space
We have created a relaxing and uncluttered hygge [ˈh(y)o͞oɡə, ˈho͝oɡə] atmosphere for your enjoyment. The blend of colors, textures, art work, decorative accents, and accessories, were thoughtfully curated by an Asheville artist. Green views steam through large windows throughout. We hope that you find everything that you need for your stay including mini fridge, microwave, cutlery, dinnerware, coffeemaker, tea kettle, coffee, and tea. Your host is always available living in the at

name: Luxury Townhome, Private Elevator, Roof Top Terrace, Stunning City & Mtn. Views
description:
Luxury Townhome located in the popular South Slope area of downtown Asheville. This beautiful 4 story Townhome features a private elevator to conveniently take you to each of the 4 floors. A private garage opens to the first level inside the home and another street-level entrance provides moments access to popular breweries, restaurants, shopping, and spas. An open kitchen, dining and living room on the 2nd floor provide the perfect space to relax, visit, and enjoy meals with friends and family. 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms are located on the 3rd floor. The fourth floor leads you to an open yet private loft that provides an additional living area and access to the stunning private rooftop terrace where you can take in the beautiful city and mountain views.
The Biltmore Estate, Biltmore Village, and Blue Ridge Parkway are all quickly and easily accessible. Enjoy the privacy and spaciousness of this townhome while also being able to gather together with your group and enjoy all that

name: Asheville Tumbleweed Tiny on the Farm
description: Tumbleweed Design's tiny house located in the middle of a working horse farm, this well lit and professionally built tiny house on wheels is waiting to host your getaway to Asheville.  Featuring a king bed, endless hot water, charcoal and propane grills, overlooking pasture, and the convenience and relaxation of a hot tub all located less than 15 minutes to downtown Asheville.

name: NEW! Blue Ridge Mtn Home Base w/ Fire Pit & Grill!
description:
Feel right at home in the Blue Ridge Mountains, thanks to this well-appointed 4-bed, 2-bath vacation rental! Featuring a peaceful location in a Fletcher neighborhood, this inviting property gives way to adventurous days of hiking and sightseeing and quiet evenings cuddled by the fire pit. Nearby attractions include the Biltmore Estate, Asheville's art galleries and music scene, and the Blue Ridge Parkway! There's never a dull moment at this home, the perfect place for a North Carolina retreat.

The space
Outdoor Entertainment Space | 1,950 Sq Ft | 1.5 Miles to Asheville Regional Airport

Rest easy knowing that all of the comforts of home are at your disposal while vacationing at this welcoming home, perfect for the outdoor enthusiast, music lover, and art aficionado!

Master Bedroom: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Full Bed | Bedroom 3: Queen Bed | Bedroom 4: 2 Twin Beds

OUTDOOR LIVING: Deck w/ gas fire pit & gas grill, outdoor dining table,

name: Private Stay on Blue Ridge Pkwy!
description:
Private duplex jut minutes from downtown Asheville and The Blue Ridge Parkway! Book as a 2BD and save on fees! Find us on Houfy - Listing #19165.

The space
A private and quiet beautiful guest home just off the Blue Ridge Parkway! Get the best of both worlds being just minutes away from all the action in Asheville or getting into nature with hiking trails and waterfalls in the Blue Ridge Mountains. All just outside the door!

Our listing is also available as a 2BD. Check us out on Houfy to save on fees! Listing #19165
Also on Airbnb/rooms/46794068

Hang out in the sun drenched living room and listen to records on the portable turntable and enjoy a cup of fresh brewed coffee or tea outside when you wake

name: Three Bedroom Home on Quiet Street near Asheville
description:
Sunny, light filled home on a quiet dead end street. Eat in kitchen opens to a large back deck. The spacious master bedroom features a king sized bed, jetted tub, and custom shower. Two additional bedrooms feature a queen and full size bed. A second full bath is on the second floor and a half bath on the main level. The main level features a large, open living area with a 65" tv and Wi-Fi throughout the house.

Guest access
No access to master closet, garage, or basement.

name: The Blue Door
description:
Located just north of Asheville. Five miles to downtown or a short trip to the Blue Ridge Parkway and a plethora of outdoor activities. Also, located just down the road from the Beautiful French Broad river and its many walking and biking paths.
This new construction cottage comes fully furnished with natural wood through out. Complete with full kitchen and whirlpool tub. Guests can relax after a full day on the back deck with large skies and breathtaking sunset views.

The space
The Blue Door is a place for families and friends to unwind after a day of playing around Asheville or the mountains. Super close to downtown (5 miles), and an easy to drive to the parkway (20 minutes) make it ideal for an out of town visitor to explore all of what the area has to offer.
This cozy cottage is perfect for a couple to getaway. The private bedroom has a queen size latex mattress that is super comfy, and the window looks out to a western view with spectacular

name: Grand Cozy Cottage
description:
Newly furnished modern 4 bedroom 2.5 baths. Comfortably sleeps a total of 7 guest. Parking available for 3 cars. Check-in at your convenience any time after 3pm with our smart lock key pad. We provide Netflix and Disney+ on all three TVs for your convenience.

The space

Pour yourself a glass of Biltmore Riesling (provided by a local winery) and unwind as you sit on our cozy couch. Here you can sit and plan the days adventure with the pamphlets we provide. You will find these adventure filled pamphlets at your reach on the center coffee table.
Our 3 rooms are designed to be as uncomplicated as possible, with crispy clean linins, open-light filled spaces and a calming color pallet to help you decompress after a long flight and get ready for a fun filled night. Step through the spacious dining room and through the sliding

name: Full house or separate rooms close airport/downton
description:
5 min off the AVL airport.
Full house or separate rooms for rent!
Townhome is new construction. All bedrooms and furniture are brand new.
It is conveniently located in South Asheville/Arden. Close to the best hikes. Breweries and downtown are only 20 min away.
Safe neighborhood and great to walk around.
Due to HOA restrictions, only bookings of 6 months days or more are allowed. Send me a message to work out pricing or other details as needed.

The space
Brand new townhome with brand new furniture and COVID responsible. I sanitize everything before and after each guest. There are many and a variety of lysol products at home that you can also use during your stay. I make sure we have enough handsanitizer and all purpose cleaning sort of sprays. There is a smart tv in the room now as well as a minifridge. I have NETFLIX and Disney's plus accounts for you to use while you stay here.

Guest access
All the house is for y

description:
This studio is a bright, lower floor apartment with clean finishes and space to sleep 4 comfortably after a night of exploring all that Haywood Road has to offer. The space is a 2 minute walk from local breweries and coffee shops in a sweet quiet neighborhood only a 10 minute drive from downtown Asheville, 11 min to the Biltmore, and 20 min to the airport. Furniture is clean and new, there is excellent wifi, a roku TV, and a private entrance.

The space
The space is clean, functional, and cozy. There is 1 queen bed with a new mattress and 1 futon that folds out to a full size bed that is quite comfortable. There is a full size refrigerator and a gas range. (Oven and stove) A coffee maker with sugar and cream is provided (though you likely won't need it with so many coffee shops on your door step).


There is a private entrance to the apartment. The entrance from outside enters into a small laundry/utility room which leads to your air bnb front d

name: Dolly the Retro Camper
description:
Dolly is a 1968 retro camper trailer that has been restored to meet the needs of our visiting guests. Located close to Asheville, Hendersonville, Brevard (home to waterfalls and mountain bike trails), the Asheville airport, Biltmore Estate and all the best breweries, restaurants and shops that WNC has to offer!

The space
Dolly may be tiny, but she has a lot to offer! One double bed comfortably sleeps two adults. The pull-out bunk bed can fit one person (weight limit of 100lbs) and the dinette also transforms into a small double bed (suitable for one adult or 2 small children).

The kitchenette offers coffee and tea essentials, breakfast items, a large mini-fridge (with freezer) and a toaster oven. The original oven has been kept intact for the beauty it adds but it is not for guest use. There is a sink for rinsing dishes or brushing teeth (drinking water is provided).

The outside patio is perfect for sharing a glass of wine or drinking

name: Mountain Oaks Cabin
description:
Mountain Oaks Cabin is a Dog-Friendly Property - we love our furry friends! If you'll be bringing your dog(s) with you, use the "Personal Message" box when making your reservation to tell us how many and their weight. A Vacation Planner from Carolina Mornings Vacation Rentals will contact you within 72 hours of acceptance of your booking to collect the pet fee.

Easy Access to Asheville! Picture-perfect mountain views await you at Mountain Oaks Cabin, a modern three-bedroom log home located in a quiet neighborhood just east of town.

You'll appreciate the convenience of being able to cook your own meals in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen and eat-in while on vacation. Cozy up by the two-story stone hearth and wood-burning fireplace in the living room and watch movies on the flat-screen TV with satellite service.

Take advantage of the mountain weather and enjoy the gas grill and outdoor dining area on the wrap-around deck. After a long day of advent

name: Quiet idyllic riverside bungalow near Asheville
description:
Perched on the river's edge, surrounded by trees and rhododendron, this quaint 2000 sq ft bungalow is a nature lover's sanctuary only 7 miles from downtown Asheville. A minimalist urban-boho vibe with OMG river views plus a well-equipped kitchen for stay-at-home meals, high-speed wifi, a work-from-home office/writing space (and bubbling falls just beneath the window), a TV room, and a "let's-never-leave-here" riverfront screened in porch.

The space
This is a brand new listing, and I just opened up the summer months now that my first guests are raving via text during their stay.

It's a special house for a special guest. From the commitment to provide and use only earth-friendly products to the little extras for work-from-home'rs..like circle lights (because Zoom), a laptop riser and the Eero trio for no-fail wifi signal... this house is part mindful retreat space, part work-when-you-have-to, and part nature-paradise. All within 7 miles of downtown an

name: Spacious Updated Home, Large Yard, Hot Tub, Fireplace in beautiful WNC mountains
description: Newly renovated 3 bedroom/2 bathroom home nestled in the beautiful mountains of WNC. Conveniently located 15 minutes from downtown Asheville and the Biltmore Estate and13 miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway. A large fenced in back yard offers plenty of room for children and pets to enjoy. Guests can relax in front of the fireplace indoors and the hot tub outside. This is the perfect mountain getaway for a family or group that wishes to enjoy the peacefulness of being outside of the city while also only a short drive from the restaurants, shopping, breweries, and galleries of downtown Asheville and Biltmore Village.

name: Weekender Cabin 3 Miles from Downtown Asheville
description:
Brand new cabin located 3 miles from downtown Asheville, the Weekender is a perfect home base to enjoy all the area has to offer. Cozy cabin in a beautiful wooded setting, fabulous king size adjustable bed, spacious covered porch to relax and enjoy the outdoors, firepit with complimentary fire wood, gas grill with side burner, microwave, fridge, and complimentary coffee, tea and snacks. We are a short distance from the Blue Ridge Parkway (9 miles away), and Biltmore (6 miles).

The space
New cabin, super clean with beautiful wooded landscape. Watch wild turkeys and sheep graze and enjoy the sunset on the spacious covered porch. After a day of hiking or sight seeing, relax by the firepit or watch your favorite shows on Netflix and Amazon.

If you like to bike there is an excellent greenway that starts a couple of miles away. You can park near New Belgium brewery and bike along the French Broad River to Carrier Park and Hominy Creek greenway for a fl

name: N Asheville “Bearadise” 10 min to downtown
description:
Welcome to "Bearadise"! This listing is for the upstairs unit. We are about 10 minutes to downtown Asheville, 15 min to the Biltmore Estate, 5 min to French Broad River Parks.

With 1 King bed, 1 queen bed, & 1 full size sleeper sofa, we can comfortably sleep 6 people. Living room is inviting with plenty of seating and fireplace for ambiance. Full kitchen for cooking meals, dining room table, small patio

The space
This listing is for the upstairs unit of the townhouse. The downstairs is also rented out for short term renters but you can rent both if you need the space to spread out for a larger group! Please message me for more details.

Guest access
The entire upstairs townhouse with the exception of the stairwell which will be locked.

Other things to note
Your stay will be in the upstairs portion. We also rent the downstairs portion as a short term rental. Each unit has their own parking spaces and separat

name: Historic DT pet-friendly suite w/hot tub & views!
description:
Enjoy all that Asheville has to offer in a private apartment in our 1880 Victorian home. Period details & all the amenities in a part of Asheville's history. Beautiful mountain & city views, private deck. Quick stroll to Charlotte Street, a leisurely walk to downtown. Close to groceries & Blue Ridge Parkway. Relax in the hot tub or feel nostalgic with some original Nintendo! Kitchenette has microwave, minifridge, toaster oven, & coffee maker. Let us help you stay like a local.

The space
Our space is cozy, historic Asheville with all the comforts of today. Brand new sofa with queen memory foam sleeper! Three original fireplaces, even one in the bathroom. Beautiful glass enclosed shower and exposed brick. Warm, original hardwood floors and high ceilings. Large yard with mature trees and landscaping makes the property feel like a private mountain oasis in the city. Pack & Play available on request!

Guest access
Private entrance and deck, livi

name: ♥ King Bed-3 Miles to AVL Downtown -Simply Squared
description:
Simply Squared is a bright and modern duplex apartment that is fully equipped for long term stays and short term stays. 10 min to downtown Asheville, 5 min to popular Haywood Rd in West Asheville. Also very close to many restaurants and grocery stores.
Apt is 785 Sq Ft with 2 Bedrooms and 1 bathroom

It has everything needed:
★Fully equipped kitchen
★Wi-Fi - over 200 mbps
★Desk
★Cable TV
★YouTube Premium
★Washer and Dryer
★Grill
★Patio Furniture
★Board Games
★Coffee
★Separate AC/Heating system

The space
We kept this apartment very simple and fairly modern. This is a duplex and we live in the other unit. You may hear us a little but we try to stay quiet. The backyard is shared but we don't get out there much, so you will pretty much have it to yourself.
This is a full apartment with cable TV, High Speed Internet, Washer & Dryer, fully equipped kitchen, Grill, and all new furniture. That's o

name: Asheville Cottage on the Loop
description:
This cozy mountain getaway - 5 miles from downtown Asheville, Biltmore Village, and North Carolina’s epic Mountain-to-Sea Trail out the back door - this cottage just had a custom makeover this winter and now available! This cozy spot has all new kitchen, appliances, bathrooms, bedrooms, landscaping, fenced in yard with a fire pit and ping pong table in the basement.

The space
This private, convenient getaway has it all - close to trails and nature, downtown restaurants, shops, and breweries, and minutes from interstates and Blue Ridge Parkway.

Guest access
The whole house.

Other things to note
Coffee and Tea selections provided.

name: New build, luxury condo downtown Asheville, mountain views
description: Modern luxury awaits you in this stunning new build condo in downtown Asheville. Two Master Bedrooms with their own private balcony provide incredible south-facing views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Located on Biltmore Ave in downtown you are central to all that Asheville has to offer; shopping, restaurants, breweries, galleries, an outdoor concert and restaurant venue. Also, just a short drive to the Biltmore Estate or the Blue Ridge Parkway the location is one that is hard to beat. Convenience, luxury, comfort, and an always-available staff provide our guests with the privacy of a fully equipped condo while also keeping you in contact with local staff to assist with any needs or questions you may have.

name: New, luxury corner unit condo downtown Asheville, stunning mountain views
description: Modern luxury awaits you in this stunning new build condo in downtown Asheville. This is a Corner Unit Condo with two Master Bedrooms. Your own private full length balcony provides incredible southwest-facing views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Located on Biltmore Ave in downtown you are central to all that Asheville has to offer; shopping, restaurants, breweries, galleries, an outdoor concert and restaurant venue. description:

Your own private wrap-around balcony provides incredible southwest-facing views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Located on Biltmore Ave in downtown you are central to all that Asheville has to offer; shopping, restaurants, breweries, galleries, an outdoor concert and restaurant venue. name: West House Asheville
description:
Our remodeled mobile home is just minutes away from Patton Avenue and all of West Asheville has to offer. It is conveniently located minutes from the interstate. This entire space is available with Wi-fi connection, local cable, and whatever you may need to feel right at home.

The rode leading to our place and our driveway is gravel so we recommend driving slowly but it is accessible in all car types.

We hope that you'll consider letting us host you for your next Asheville stay.

name: A bit of seclusion in the city
description:
Welcome to our bit of seclusion in the city. Our spacious and lovely West Asheville home is located just 7 minutes from the heart of downtown Asheville and its bustling restaurants, breweries and coffee shops, and 15 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway. Tucked away on a little known drive surrounded by trees and foliage, and with 70 feet of wrap-around deck overlooking the beautiful Crown Plaza Golf Course, you will forget you are in the city.

The space
Our spacious home offers 2,000 square feet of updated living space perfect for your gathering of friends or family. Quick access to downtown Asheville, the River Arts District and West Asheville.
- Base rate includes occupancy for up to 6 guests. Guests beyond the included 6, incur an additional fee of $50/guest per night., with a total allowed occupancy of 8 guests. No more than 8 guests are permitted.
-Equipped with two living rooms with ample and comfortable seating and two new 60/55” smart TVs
-

name: Asheville bungalow close to town
description:
This 4 bd/3 bath bungalow is only 10 minutes to beautiful downtown Asheville, 10 minutes from the historic Biltmore Estate, or 10 minutes to local mountain biking in Bent Creek.
There is plenty of room to sleep up to 10 guests with 2 back decks with a grill and plenty of room to relax and enjoy the mountain air!
Inside you’ll find modern/ rustic furnishings and all of the amenities that you will want or need for your stay. Welcome Home!!

The space
Enjoy access to the entire house and yard!

name: Blue Ridge Digs
description:
Private duplex jut minutes from downtown Asheville and The Blue Ridge Parkway!

The space
A private and quiet beautiful guest home just off the Blue Ridge Parkway! Get the best of both worlds being just minutes away from all the action of the City or getting into nature with hiking trails and waterfalls in the Blue Ridge Mountains. All just outside the door!

The rental offers a 2 bedroom, 1 full bathroom with WiFi and a private entrance. One bedroom features a very comfortable queen size mattress and the other bedroom is equipped with a memory foam double size mattress. Hang in the sun drenched living room and listen to records on the portable turntable and enjoy a cup of fresh brewed coffee or tea outside on the patio when you wake up in the morning. There is also a microwave and minifridge for your needs.

We're looking forward to hosting you!

*please note: pets approved on a case by case basis, we ask a $100 non refundable pet

name: The Suite Life in Oakley Mountain Home
description:
This is our modern, cozy basement suite. It has one parking space, private entrance, yard space & a lovely newly built bathroom. It has everything you need for a relaxing stay in Asheville! We stock the space with snacks & local beer for you!

Sleeping arrangements: there is one queen size bed & a large sectional sofa that could fit up to 2 people.

We are in a quiet neighborhood, about 15 minutes from most popular things in Asheville! We're also near a great hiking trail (MST).

The space
Our space is a newly renovated and decorated basement suite. It's modern and cozy with vintage touches. You'll find a comfy bed and big sectional sofa to relax on during your stay. There's a small dining table with chairs for your meals. The kitchenette is stocked with essentials for preparing simple meals. (*There is no oven or kitchen sink*) Mini fridge has a few local beers & waters for you. Coffee, creamers and tea are provided. The bathroom has a big, ro

name: Modern Bungalow - Minutes to Downtown
description:
Welcome home!

This modern bungalow has been completely updated and furnished with quality and style in mind. Everything you need for a long vacation, retreat or work assignment. Conveniently located less than a mile from Biltmore Village and The Biltmore Estate, and minutes to Downtown Asheville - all while maintaining a peaceful setting on a dead end street with a spacious back yard, fire pit and expansive back deck for entertaining.

The space
The entire home has been recently remodeled and designer furnished, including brand new appliances, decor and amenities.

name: West AVL, private entrance, private bathroom!
description:
Located in West Asheville!
5 minutes from Haywood Rd, River Arts District and New Belgium Brewing.
10 minutes from Downtown and Carrier Park and Richmond Hill Park (Disc Golf, biking and hiking).
20 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and Bent Creek Experimantal Forest (mountain biking)

Private entrance to a cozy room with bathroom. Queen size bed, Space heater for extra heat, TV, Keurig coffee pot, microwave, dinnerware for 2, and mini fridge.

The space
A cozy spot, tucked quietly on Crest Mountain, while only being a few minutes to downtown.

name: Charming, Cozy Cabin with Everything You Need.
description:
A charming and cozy one bedroom cabin with a small loft. Cabin includes small kitchen/dining area and a queen sleeper sofa.

Located in beautiful western North Carolina. Conveniently located 20 minutes from Asheville and the beautiful Biltmore House. Cabin is located in an RV Resort with a 2.5 acre lake for fishing, paddle boats and feeding our ducks. Laundry room on premises and a seasonal pool.

Other things to note
Once you are approved, please message us your email and full mailing address for our system. We will email you a confirmation after we enter you into our system.

name: Comfy Cozy Cottage (peloton and office included)
description:
The cutest renovated 1940's bungalow, with a huge fenced in yard. And it's only a five minute walk to Haywood Road where you'll find some of Asheville's best restaurants, cafes and bars. Because the lot is big with lots of trees you'll have plenty of privacy to feel right at home. Long term guests will enjoy a light filled office with adjustable standing desk. As well as a workout area, which has a peloton bike, small weights and yoga area. You're going to love it.

Guest access
You have access to the entire property. Including the driveway so you don't have to park on the street!

name: Spacious, private house minutes to West Asheville!
description:
Want a private, mountain-like setting only minutes from Asheville's hustle and bustle? This is your destination! This spacious, full one-bedroom one-bathroom is loaded with character. Nestled on a private half-acre hillside, you can enjoy hilltop views with your coffee while listening to the songbirds. A ten minute drive brings you to all West Asheville has to offer and you're only a few miles from downtown.

The space
This is a unique and stylish first-floor unit, recently renovated, offering way more floor space than a typical guesthouse in Asheville - nearly 1100 square feet! Enjoy a large bedroom with views of trees and hilltops and large closet, a separate dining room off the main living area, and a separate living area and full kitchen. This unit has its own entrance. You'll have access to the shared washer and dryer (shared with either myself or another guest) - no other neighbors. You'll also have access to the garden. Off-street parking in driveway (one v

name: Studio #2 / Modern Design / 8 mins to DWTN AVL
description:
Only 8 mins. drive to downtown & 5 mins. drive to Biltmore Estate, this sleek and modern studio apartment in a quiet residential neighborhood is a comfortable, stylish oasis and home base for exploring all of Asheville. Artfully appointed and all brand new!

The space
Efficiently designed studio space with many architectural details and all original fine art. 12' x 34 (400 sq ft) European aesthetics and compact design with microwave, electric tea kettle, coffee pot and fridge in closet. Television, WiFi and Bluetooth speaker provided.

Guest access
There is a locked fire door between rental space and main house. Completely autonomous and private studio unit with it's own entrance.

Other things to note
Close to all the breweries and attractions in South Slope, the Biltmore Village, River Arts District and East Asheville. Also only 2 minutes to The Blue Ridge Parkway which has beautiful vistas and hikes no matter the sea

name: Laurel Hill Farmhouse, Asheville, NC
description:
Brand New Hot Tub is up and running!

This home is a newly built farmhouse and is clean, comfortable, and has all of the amenities needed for you to enjoy the comforts of an HGTV style home. It’s beautifully furnished with a real farmhouse feel. It is one level living and has a bright and open floorplan with great gathering spaces. For some fresh air, you can relax on the patio with the dining set and gas grill. At night you can enjoy the ambiance of the party lights or gather around the firepit in the ample yard space.

In the home, the master bedroom has a king-sized bed with a private full bathroom and a large amazing walk-in shower that will pamper you after a long hike or enjoying some of the breweries. The second bedroom has a queen-sized bed for two and a shared bathroom with a bonus room, which has another queen-sized bed and an additional bunk bed. The home has plenty of room to sleep up to 8 people.

The location is great. It is appro

name: Views, Luxurious, Magical,Organic,10 Min. Downtown
description:
Views, Luxurious, Magical, Modern, Organic, Mountain Retreat
This luxuriously appointed Private House sits on 1 acre of forest land 5 miles from downtown Asheville 1 mile to the Blue Ridge Parkway
Breathtaking views and sunrises at 3500 ft.
You will be surrounded by the sounds of nature, the relaxing sound of the waterfall as it cascades over the rocks into the large fish pond. In the evening it's illuminated w/floating solar lights.
Sit back Relax/ Reflect on what really matters..

The space
With a list of features including:
* Full Gourmet kitchen with incredible views of the mountains from every angle, Stainless Steel Meile European appliances, Commercial size Viking refrigerator, steam oven, warming drawers, double dishwasher,• Earth friendly counter tops - Kitchen is fully stocked with utensils, stainless-steel pots and pans and everything needed for that Chef or just someone that loves to cook
* Covered Outdoor Veranda- fe

name: Brooklyn Style Loft in Downtown Asheville
description:
Historic downtown loft located in the heart of Asheville! Feel the history of this 1920's building with brand new sink, gas stove, and refrigerator. Parking located on-site, and self check-in with a keypad

With world class restaurants at your fingertips, and more than a dozen local breweries within walking distance, this cozy modern, Brooklyn style loft provides a unique Asheville experience.

Attractions like the Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway are only a 10 minute drive away.

Other things to note
Se habla espanol
Nous parlons francais

name: New Luxury Condo, Downtown Asheville with Mountain Views
description: Modern luxury awaits you in this stunning new build condo in downtown Asheville. Equipped with two Master Bedrooms; each has an EnSuite Bathroom and a private balcony. Each balcony provides incredible southwest-facing views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Located on Biltmore Ave in downtown you are central to all that Asheville has to offer; shopping, restaurants, breweries, galleries, an outdoor concert and restaurant venue. Also, just a short drive to the Biltmore Estate or the Blue Ridge Parkway the location is one that is hard to beat. description:
Updated home in Biltmore South, less than one mile to the Biltmore house and 5 minutes from downtown. This 3/2 is tucked away on a dead end cul-de-sac, away from all the traffic but still close to everything! It has lofted deck space in the backyard for your morning coffee as well as a large lower deck with a fire pit, which opens up to the basement that has been converted into a finished theater room complete with a 125" projector and surround sound!

The space
This home is completely furnished and ready to go with linens, essential kitchen/bath items, etc. There are three TV's (two of the bedrooms and the living room) that have HDMI cables ready for a device to be connected for streaming! The projector screen connects directly to Hulu and Netflix, and can also be wirelessly screen mirrored or connected to a laptop with the HDMI cable.

The home has a split floor plan with the master bed/bath on the south side of the house, with two guest rooms and

name: Cozy Home Away From Home
description:
Freshly remodeled cozy home features all brand new furniture, 2 bedrooms with queen beds and 1 full size comfortable sofa bed. Enjoy organic bed sheets, Tempur-Pedic comforter for a great night of sleep. Hang out on the brand new outdoor covered patio with lights and comfy furniture.
Only a few minutes away to the Airport, shopping, and dining.
Plenty of parking and flat backyard.
All essentials you need at your disposal. Lots of thought and love put into this home. Come escape away with us.

name: Lofts at Woolworth in downtown Asheville NC! #208
description:
Eight uniquely renovated, loft style apartments are now available in the historic Woolworth building. Lofts at Woolworth are located in the heart of downtown and have been crafted using a mix of industrial and luxurious touches, including top of the line cabinetry and appliances. Breathe in the mountain air from your balcony and enjoy a glass of wine while you observe the bustling city below. Markets, shops, bars, restaurants, breweries and the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway await your arrival.

The space
Our New York style lofts are located on the second floor of the Woolworth building with easy stair access. We are a unique property offering guests personal assistance and are available to take luggage to your loft in our freight elevator upon arrival and departure. Our lofts feature fourteen foot ceilings, repurposed flooring, and lots of exposed brick and terra-cotta original to the building. "Walk the walk," downstairs in the Woolworth Art Gallery, and enjoy our

name: The Funky Bungalow-5.7 miles to Downtown Asheville
description: This completely updated, funky bungalow is only 5.7 miles to downtown Asheville and only 4 miles to the boho West Asheville neighborhood with its great shops, bars and restaurants (don't miss it for its local vibe!). Blue Ridge Parkway only 11 miles away.   Huge kitchen with lots of seating.  Patio right off of the kitchen.  Driveway fits 4 cars.  Keurig coffee.  Self check-in with keyless doors. Fast internet. If you are looking for a funky place to stay close to everything - this is it!

name: Walk to the Asheville River Arts District!
description:
Spectacular new home with a unique combination of location, amenities, and a cliff-top view of the French Broad, River Arts District, Downtown Asheville, and mountains beyond! (view partially blocked by trees in warmer months)

Very spacious 4 bedroom home on 3 levels, but all of the "basics" are available on the walk-in main level with no stair climbing required to access master suite, kitchen, dining area, main living room, and huge back deck.

🤯Due to local regulations, min stay 30 days.

The space
The home is very up-to-date, having been built only 5 years ago, and features wonderful Craftsman-style architectural details. The master suite, great room, main deck, stunning covered porch and kitchen are all on the walk-in level, with no stairs (just one small step up) from the driveway into the home and out to the porch.

Bedrooms #2 and #3 along with an alcove with a desk for remote work are on the upper level, accessed via a beaut

name: Cottage Guest Suite
description:
Entire Lower level of quaint cottage within 2 miles of downtown. This 2 bedroom has a private entrance is the lower level of a 2 bedroom home. Guests have the entire lower level and washer / dryer to themselves.

Owner lives above with a dog so for those of you looking for a quiet mountain getaway, this might not be the place for you. For those of you who want a quaint spot near town to use as a home base while exploring the city, this one is for you!

The space
Lower level of a home, boasts two bedrooms, w/d area, coffee area and smaller living room with TV and of course, a quaint little back porch over looking the fenced in yard.

Guest access
Code box for key - self entry, no contact with residents.
