name: Casa Negra - Monthly rental only
description: Brand new modern home in a walkable West Asheville Neighborhood. Two levels, off street parking, one private bedroom space with queen size bed, a full bathrooms, TV, full kitchen with dishwasher, gas range, a full size refrigerator, all dishes and pots pans, utensils,  coffee maker, toaster etc. iron. Private deck and gorgeous view of a small urban forest.

name: 2 bedrooms private house near downtown Asheville
description: This is a private unit located 5 minutes driving to downtown Asheville.  There are many great choices of restaurants, boutique shops  and Asheville must visit places. They are all within convenience driving distance.

name: Luxury living
description:
Gated community

The space
Includes pots and pans, Plates , cups , silverware , wine glasses. Soap shampoo and conditioner. Toilet paper towels , wash clause. Bed covers and sheet covers.

Guest access
Gym Gate code

Other things to note
Gate code and House key

name: Big Red
description:
Soak up the modern and vintage charge of this beautifully made tiny house on our busy farm in serene Asheville. Next to greenhouses and located on our multi acre farm, we welcome you to enjoy a different pace while still conveniently located to downtown and west Asheville.

The space
Large tiny house with full shower, hot water, and a flush toilet with king bed in the loft, high speed internet, hot tub, patio area, hammock, and managed by locals come enjoy this unique farm experience!

Guest access
the hot tub is for gusets of this tiny house only, you'll have access to the tiny house and hammock and you're welcome to walk around. please don't feed the horses and keep your dogs on a leash at all times.

Other things to note
there is a horse liability law in NC where you waive all liability to eco tourism and equine activities, please be advised

name: Lofts at Woolworth in downtown Asheville NC! #203
description:
Eight uniquely renovated, loft style apartments are now available in the historic Woolworth building. Lofts at Woolworth are located in the heart of downtown and have been crafted using a mix of industrial and luxurious touches, including top of the line cabinetry and appliances. Enjoy the city and mountain views from your living space while enjoying a glass of wine. Markets, shops, bars, restaurants, breweries and the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway await your arrival.

The space
Our New York style lofts are located on the second floor of the Woolworth building with easy stair access. We are a unique property offering guests personal assistance and are available to take luggage to your loft in our freight elevator upon arrival and departure. Our lofts feature fourteen foot ceilings, repurposed flooring, and lots of exposed brick and terra-cotta original to the building. "Walk the walk," downstairs in the Woolworth Art Gallery, and enjoy our old fashioned Soda Fount

name: Cozy and convenient
description: Cute craftsman style home, in quiet neighborhood.  Homestay with access to living room, kitchen, dining room, laundry, 2 bedrooms (one with large sitting room).   Ten minute or less drive to Biltmore house, downtown, or trendy west Asheville.

name: The Nauhaus
description:
Beautifully furnished house with a mother-in-law suite with all bills paid. This is a quaint and timeless eco-friendly house made of hemp called the Nauhaus located in West Asheville. It was designed as a model for urban sustainability and is located in a quiet neighborhood. The passive solar design and 16-inch thick hempcrete walls help the house stay cool in the summer and warm in the winter. It also features a living roof, brick floor and walls made from clay from the building site.

The space
The house is 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and is fully furnished. The upstairs includes a full kitchen/dining/living area and master bedroom/bathroom and a loft. Downstairs there is a kitchenette, living area, two bedrooms, one bathroom, and a laundry room. One of the bedrooms and kitchenette can be closed off from the other areas and be used as a separate living space with its own entrance.

Guest access
The house is location combines the best of n

name: Lofts at Woolworth in downtown Asheville NC! #202
description:
Eight uniquely renovated, loft style apartments are now available in the historic Woolworth building. Lofts at Woolworth are located in the heart of downtown and have been crafted using a mix of industrial and luxurious touches, including top of the line cabinetry and appliances. Enjoy the city and mountain views from your living space while enjoying a glass of wine. Markets, shops, bars, restaurants, breweries and the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway await your arrival.

The space
Our New York style lofts are located on the second floor of the Woolworth building with easy stair access. We are a unique property offering guests personal assistance and are available to take luggage to your loft in our freight elevator upon arrival and departure. Our lofts feature fourteen foot ceilings, repurposed flooring, and lots of exposed brick and terra-cotta original to the building. "Walk the walk," downstairs in the Woolworth Art Gallery, and enjoy our old fashioned Soda Founta

name: City and Mountain Views await you in this Luxury Downtown condo
description: Modern luxury awaits you in this stunning new build condo in downtown Asheville. This is a north-facing condo where you can enjoy incredible mountain and city views. French doors from the living room and kitchen open to a large balcony that creates even more open space to relax and unwind. Located on Biltmore Ave in downtown you are central to all that Asheville has to offer; shopping, restaurants, breweries, galleries, an outdoor concert and restaurant venue. Also, just a short drive to the Biltmore Estate or the Blue Ridge Parkway the location is one that is hard to beat. Convenience, luxury, comfort, and an always-available staff provide our guests with the privacy of a fully equipped condo while also keeping you in contact with our knowledgable local staff to assist with any needs or questions you may have.

name: #8 Rose Room - OaklandCottage B&B
description:
Charming Rose Room 8 with Double bed - full private bath, in-room cable TV, coffee maker, bathrobes. Quaint & cute, on the second floor of Oakland Cottage B&B, circa 1910.

Full & hearty breakfast served each morning; enjoy shared guest spaces in the living room by the fireplace or on the front porch. Meet the chickens out back!

OaklandCottage B&B is wonderfully located in Asheville, NC, 1 mile south of the historic Downtown Square, 1 mile north of the entrance to the Biltmore Estate.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Shelley's Asheville Getaway
description:
Luxurious downtown Asheville destination!
Shelley's Asheville Getaway is exactly what it portends to provide the discerning traveler; a luxury accommodation, amidst the heart of downtown Asheville, beckoning you to come "getaway" from the stress of your everyday life, and instead create the dream trip of a lifetime.
The condo is located in a newly constructed, state of the art, stylish & eclectic downtown mid-rise, with privacy and security. Guests can literally walk to almost everything and enjoy downtown Asheville without ever getting back in the car.
Come create memories at this special escape in the cradle of downtown Asheville, nestled in the Blue Ridge mountains!

The space
Location:
Downtown Asheville, just 2.5 blocks from the center of downtown/Pack Square. Walkable to everything downtown Asheville, and even Biltmore Village & easy access to the world famous Biltmore Estate (must drive to enter). Less than 20 minutes to the Asheville

name: Great affordable 2 bedroom/2 bath  in Asheville
description:
New Listing on the Swannanoa River in Asheville. Super convenient location, 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. Enjoy a full 2 bedroom, 2 bath apartment unit with outdoor patio on the Swannanoa River. This is a pet friendly unit with plenty of outdoor space to walk your dogs- on a leash of course! The first bedroom bedroom has a queen bed and the second bedroom has two twin beds. Good sized kitchen that has dishwasher, microwave, stove, refrigerator and washer/dryer for laundry.

The space
Two bedroom, 2 full bath unit private apartment

Guest access
This is an entire apartment with your own entrance. It is not a shared space

name: 3 BR Asheville Home-Mt Bike & Hike w/Trail access!
description:
Location, Location, Location! Bent Creek House is just minutes from everything Asheville has to offer. Pisgah National Forest trail access & Bent Creek mountain bike trails are less than 1/10 of a mile from the front door! French Broad River access, the AVL Arboretum and the Blue Ridge Parkway are less than 2 miles away! The house is ideally situated less than 9 miles to downtown Asheville, AVL Airport, or the Biltmore Estate. This cozy house offers everything you need for the perfect vacation!

The space
Bent Creek House is located in the quiet, family friendly, Bent Creek neighborhood. Throughout the house you will find new beds and premium bedding. Two renovated bathrooms and new living room furniture add to the overall comfort and enjoyment during your stay. Plenty of comfortable living space on the main level, and additionally, a spacious den with ample seating, card table and board games, and an office space are provided on the lower level. A full sized

name: Private Home in Asheville Near French Broad River
description:
Located just minutes from the French Broad River + Downtown Asheville! Whether you're working from home, spending an adventure week on the River or enjoying the restaurants + hiking that Asheville has to offer, this home is comfortable + convenient! Enjoy the open floor plan of the main living, dining + kitchen area. This home is complete Smart TV's, wireless internet, full-sized washer + dryer as well as a game room with pool table, card table + lots of storage for bikes and kayaks!

The space
Enjoy the gas fireplace in the cozy living room open to the kitchen + dining room. Lots of outdoor space as well with a deck off the dining room and a large yard. This home sleeps 9 people. 2, King beds, 1 Queen bed and a bunk bed with a trundle (sleeps 3). Two owner's retreats on separate levels offers lots of space + privacy.

Guest access
Entire home.

Other things to note
We provide toilet paper and paper towels

name: Centrally Located Private Abode!
description:
Come relax in our newly renovated private, clean, downstairs lower level duplex unit.

We are minutes away from the Biltmore Estate, downtown Asheville, the Blue Ridge Parkway and Mission Hospital. Centrally located to Asheville's renown restaurant and brewery scene.

The space
Boho comfort awaits after a day hike in the Pisgah Forest, a downtown shopping spree, or a Biltmore tour!

Bedrooms have new memory foam mattress!
Accommodations include Roku entertainment suite , boardgames and books. Full laundry room to wash your clothes after a hike! Private entrance, private Wi-Fi and private outdoor patio.

No Indoor Smoking
Sorry, No Pets

Other things to note
House Rules:
• No smoking - $200 penalty fee for odor/stain removal
• No pets
• No parties or events
• We would prefer shoes not be worn into the bedrooms
• Dispose trash in the gray garbage bin
• Dispose recyclables -

name: The Bluebird (Tiny House, 5 mins to downtown AVL)
description:
We want you to love visiting West Asheville as much as we love living here! Our tiny house is ideal for duos and solo travelers in search of a uniquely Asheville experience.

• Newly constructed in 2020
• Walkable to Haywood Road (coffee shops, restaurants, breweries)
• Short drive (under 5 min) to River Arts District and Downtown AVL
• Close to hiking and all Blue Ridge Mountains have to offer
• Quiet, friendly neighborhood.
• Private but central to the places you want to be!

The space
We built our tiny home ourselves, and we are proud of the many, sunlit windows, unique loft area, handmade ceramic sink, spiral staircase and more.

Guest access
The tiny home has its own little deck, patio and lawn space that is private and for guests.

name: Kimono Cottage-homestyle Zen in West Asheville
description:
The Kimono Cottage is a bright second-floor 2BR private suite w/private entrance. The newly-constructed contemporary space features Japanese textiles and books. Tucked away off a quiet street in popular funky and artsy West Asheville, just 1/2 mile walk to the neighborhood's excellent restaurants, music venues, breweries, and shops. Quick access to Downtown, River Arts District, Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
What to expect:

A taste of Japan when you visit Asheville! Clean and contemporary modern aesthetic combined with books, art and textiles from the owner's own collection. Furnishings have been chosen to create a comfortable yet uncluttered experience. The suite has two spacious bedrooms, a small living room and bath as well as kitchenette. Amenities include coffee, tea, mineral water, fridge, two TVs w/Netflix & Prime streaming, wifi, dining table, and off-street parking.

Keeping with Japanese tradition, the guest

name: 30 days+ Walking Distance to Downtown & Biltmore
description:
30 day minimum rental per city of Asheville requirements. Next door to Mission Hospital, which is super convenient. 1.5 mile walk to Downtown Asheville via Biltmore Ave, and 1/2 mile walk to Biltmore Village. Townhouse style condo with both bedrooms and bathroom upstairs. Really cute, functional kitchen. Updated bathroom with subway tile is classic. A few stairs to walk up to unit porch. New central air conditioner Summer 2020 and efficient gas furnace. Lease agreement also required.

The space
Such an awesome location, easy to walk, bike or drive to downtown Asheville by 1.5 miles.

Guest access
Guests use entire condo and can hang out in the back and side yard. End unit offers more privacy.

Other things to note
A North Carolina Lease is required by our property manager so each tenant and roommate will be required to sign it. It’s a standard form from the real estate commission that we use.

name: Little Creek Bridge
description:
Single dwelling new home where you will have your own floor with a private entrance and living space. Located in a quaint neighborhood walking distance to West Asheville. The large bedroom hosts a king size bed with a memory foam mattress and ample closet space. Spacious warm and inviting living area has a table that seats four accompanied with a leather couch and flat screen tv. Nicely landscaped outside area with a small creek and newly built walking bridge great for your vacay pics.

The space
Brand new private area that was designed with a relaxing stay in mind. Enjoy the birds and wildlife that stroll through the backyard including deer and turkey's. Stroll along the bridge over the creek for a unique photo experience.

Guest access
Private floor with private entrance.

Other things to note
Our house sits on a steep hill so access to your rental is down outdoor stone steps.

name: Beautifully simple private suite 1 mi to downtown
description:
Our one bedroom 400 sq ft apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood just 1 mile from downtown Asheville. Guests have a private entrance. Enjoy the large outdoor patio space when not exploring. We are within walking distance to downtown (about a 10 min walk) to a variety of restaurants, bars and shopping. We are also a quick drive up to the Blue Ridge Parkway where one can enjoy hiking and cycling. Please be aware that this space does not have a television.

The space
Our place is walking distance to Whole Foods, Trader Joe's and Harris Teeter. we are about a 10 min walk to town where you can find a variety of restaurants, bars and breweries and shopping.
Enjoy the beautiful private patio where you are surrounded by large trees. Here you can sit and watch our hens or just enjoy the peace and quiet

name: Asheville Tackle Box Tiny House
description:
Small Cabin on five acres. New listing for 2021. If your looking for a great place to stay that is extra clean the tackle box tiny home is the place for you to stay! Pets are welcome.

The space
This is a new Tiny house built in 2021 it has everything you would need for a week or a weekend. The location is facing Asheville's beautiful mountains this location has lots of green grass and wooded area for walking your dog.

name: Rocky's House (< 1 mi to UNCA "Bulldogs")
description:
Private 1 BR home, with a sofa-daybed in the MBR in addition to the Queen Bed. Fine for 2 couples, but ideal for a couple with 2 kids max. The home has hardwood flooring throughout with Carpet in the BR. Stainless steel, modern and well decorated and kept. Located less than a mile from UNCA and Riverside Dr (bars, restaurants and venues); less than 5 min to downtown Asheville and 10 min to the parkway. W/D; DW and outdoor space.

The space
Open floor plan with lots of light. The MBed doesn't have a door and is a large open space, as well. There's a large walk in closet with a W/D, located in the bedroom. While we welcome children, it's not ideal for infants or toddlers. There is another unit attached, so screaming children usually create complaints that neither of us want to deal with, so please book accordingly.

Guest access
Park to the right to avoid blocking the driveway to the other unit on the other side of the structure.

name: Color Me on the Trail: Mountain views, expansive deck and more!
description:
Stunning!!!
Color Me on the Trail...this contemporary Asheville mountain retreat, nestled in the Blue Ridge Mountains, on the south side of downtown Asheville, offers a relaxing and invigorating escape. Impeccably decorated with both an eclectic urban feel, and a taste of the mountains, this gem will have you coming back again & again. You immediately feel at home and relaxed, like you were meant to be here. This hidden mountain gem sits on an oasis with mountain views, in a private development, and offers both privacy while also affording nearby access to all that WNC has to offer. The owners have spared no expense to outfit, upfit and amenitize this vacation home to create the ultimate vacation get-a-way experience. Come escape to your own Blue Ridge destination experience at Color Me on the Trail!

The space
Location:
Asheville, North Carolina. Just south from downtown Asheville. The home is relatively close to downtown Asheville, app. 15 minutes o

name: Feel at Home - Less than 10mins to Downtown AVL!
description:
Entire home within 10 minutes of downtown Asheville! Experience all the dining, breweries, and hiking this beautiful mountain town has to offer - all within easy reach of an Uber. Feel at home in this bright and airy space, decorated with a little eclectic Asheville flair.

Feel good staying in a home powered by clean solar energy, and cleaned (to COVID-19 standards) with eco-friendly products. Plenty of parking, accessible Wi-Fi, and smart TVs and speakers!

The space
There are Chromecast's on each TV, as well as a Google speaker in the kitchen area. A big, comfortable couch to lounge on after a long day of exploring!

Guest access
You will have access to the entire home, including laundry room.

name: The Hide Out Camper
description:
It’s a brand new 2021, 30’ camper with a slide out and full hook ups. You have a flat lawn area in the sun and shade trees all to yourself with a fire pit and outdoor seating area to enjoy. We’re located only 5 min. from the Asheville airport, and right in the middle between Asheville and Hendersonville, taking 20 min. to get to either downtown. You can enjoy many of the nearby forests: Bent Creek and Mills River are 15 min. away, Pisgah and DuPont are 30 min. away. It’s such a fun experience!

The space
It’s nicely landscaped and right off of a paved, low traffic, residential road that is nice for taking a walk or run, with or without the kids on bikes:)

Guest access
Back yard area

Other things to note
The camper cannot be taken anywhere. The property is made for it to stay put for guests.

name: Mountain Modern Haven ~ Luxury Green Studio
description:
Located in the quiet Malvern Hills neighborhood of popular West Asheville, Malvern Hills Haven is a luxury studio apartment with a private entrance and patio. The studio is a peaceful spa-like getaway, just a short drive to all the fun of West Asheville’s vibrant Haywood Road, downtown Asheville and close to Biltmore and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Make your vacation eco-friendly by staying in this sweet solar-powered studio. We strive to provide a welcome retreat for guests of all backgrounds.

The space
The 500 square foot studio apartment features clean lines and modern design with 9 foot ceilings and great sunlight from oversized windows during daytime and blackout shades for peaceful sleep.

Your sleeping area has a king-size Tuft and Needle mattress and a closet for clothes storage. The full private bathroom has a spa-like feel with a walk-in shower with custom tile surround, marble topped vanity and Ginger Lily Farms natural toiletries.

name: Best location in Downtown Asheville.  Ideal for 2.  Private room & bath.
description:
Best location in Asheville - where downtown meets the Blue Ridge Mountains on the horizon! 250 yards from 3 grocery stores. This basement studio apartment features a completely private entrance & exit, modern amenities, a flat-screen TV, and more. Downtime can be spent in luxury on the furnished rooftop deck overlooking sweeping city views. When it's time to explore outside this vacation rental, drive on Blue Ridge Parkway or visit Pisgah Forest to quiet your mind after wandering busy streets.

The space
This is a 345 square foot studio apartment with a queen-sized Murphy bed, full bathroom, and a kitchenette.

Guest access
You'll have exclusive use of the entire studio apartment and non-exclusive use of the beautiful rooftop observation deck.

Other things to note
We are one of the few vacation rentals that allow dogs. There is a dog fee of $75.00 that must be paid prior to arrival. We allow one 20-pound dog without

name: 3 BR home w/hot tub and screened-in porch
description:
Just 10 minutes from the Biltmore Estate and the airport and 20 minutes to downtown Asheville, Weston House is an oasis to come home to after enjoying the wonders of Western North Carolina. Soak in our hot tub after a full day exploring.

Fully stocked kitchen, comfy living room (Netflix, Hulu, HBO and Amazon Prime), 3 bedrooms (King and two full), 2 bathrooms (bidet toilet seats), and Internet (up to 1 gig speed).

Close to Blue Ridge Parkway & NC Arboretum.

The space
Guests have access to the outdoor deck, fire pit, and salt-water hot tub as well as a screened-in porch.

If you are coming into town for business or you just enjoy high-speed Internet access, we have you covered. Up to 1-gig download speed.

Other things to note
-No house parties.
-Please do not wear or use heavily scented products.
-We are a smoke-free/vaping-free property.
-No loud noise after 9:30 pm on the outside of the pr

name: *BRAND NEW* Cozy Tiny Cottage. 20mins to downtown!
description:
Woodfield Cottage is brand new construction that has an open floor plan with full kitchen, one bed, one bathroom, screened in porch with hot tub, pellet grill and everything you need for a relaxing retreat. You will have the entire place all to yourself. Woodfield Cottage rests at the end of a cul-de-sac in a quiet neighborhood and is in a perfect location to all the great things Asheville has to offer. Just 8 mins from the Asheville Regional Airport and a 20 min drive to downtown Asheville.

The space
Your 480 sqft space includes a queen size bed, full kitchen, living room with electric fireplace, 55" smart tv with Sling tv for cable, eating nook/ work space, spacious bathroom with fully tiled shower, heated towel rack, lighted LED mirror. Your private covered porch is perfect for catching some fresh air or watching your favorite game/show on a 43" smart tv.
Woodfield Cottage is surrounded by mature trees and rests at the end of a cul-de-sac on its own pri

name: Town Mountain, Stunning Views, Newly Renovated, Moments to Parkway and Downtown, Two Master Bdrms.
description: This spectacular 5 bedroom, 3.5 bathroom home is set in the exclusive Town Mountain area of Asheville and just completed a major renovation. Located just minutes from downtown Asheville and the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway, the home features beautiful long range views, two master suites, with ensuite bathrooms, and two separate living areas. This gorgeous retreat offers the best of both worlds -a secluded mountain getaway right in the heart of all downtown Asheville has to offer. With plenty of space to spread out, this 3,500 s/f home is the perfect vacation destination for family and friends and awaits your enjoyment!

name: Peaceful Sanctuary Above Artisan Bakery
description:
Our cozy little sanctuary is tucked away in a rural setting, only 15 minutes to downtown Asheville. Surrounded by trees, songbirds will awaken you. We are all-inclusive and love to welcome people of all walks of life. Our house is next to the apartment, so we are available when needed and we are also great at respecting your space. Below the apartment, Nathan bakes his yummy sourdough bread that he sells locally several days per week. If you're tortured by the smell, buy a loaf!

The space
The apartment is furnished with 2 comfy queen beds and a cozy living room couch. The bathroom is spacious with a bathtub and shower. The kitchenette is well-stocked with everything you need for cooking simple meals. Specifically, there is a large-sized mini fridge, toaster oven, 2 burner electric cooktop, microwave, coffee pot with filters, tea pot, and plenty of cookware, dish ware, and utensils. The kitchen is quite small, so I wouldn't recommend planning anything extensive. I

name: Sunny Boho-Chic West Asheville Guest Retreat!
description:
Unwind in your private guest suite after a day of touring beautiful Asheville and the mountains. This new home (finished Dec '20) is picture perfect. Enjoy lots of natural light, a private patio and entrance, beautiful bathroom, large yet cozy bedroom, and stylish living space with a modest kitchenette (not for cooking) and dining area. Located in a peaceful cul-de-sac just a short walk from the heart of West Asheville and all of its wonderful restaurants, coffee shops, and boutiques.

The space
Private guest suite with separate entrance

Private patio with outdoor seating

Spacious yet cozy bedroom with queen bed and luxury mattress

Adorable living area with Roku tv, Bose speaker, mini fridge, and coffee station

Community garden, trails and fire pit

Pet friendly (woof only please!) for one time $50 extra cleaning fee (per dog). Up to two dogs only. Please inquire if there are more than two dogs before booki

name: Blue Ridge Magic: Artist's Hideaway (Brand New)
description:
New listing: Blue Ridge Magic named for our painting, by local artist. This modern, artist hideaway, 1 BR/1BA, 1,000 sq ft. apartment is located near the River Arts District. Walking distance to New Belguim, the Greenway, breweries, restaurants, & artist galleries. We are 1.5 miles from downtown Asheville and downtown W. Asheville. Enjoy your morning coffee or nightcap on one of two private patios.
Private entrance, high speed WiFi, full kitchen.
Great place to work remotely!!!

The space
This modern apartment is furnished with new West Elm furniture and some of the art is by local artists. Blue Ridge Magic is by Pat Barratt and our woodwork was done by Kevin Hughes.
We will include coffee and tea and a couple of pantry breakfast items to get you started.
We have hosted Airbnbs for years and are very experienced. We have stocked the kitchen with items that allow you to cook just about any meal. Although, with all of the great resta

name: Close to Biltmore and Downtown Asheville
description:
This place is located 5 minutes from The Biltmore house, 2 minutes from Biltmore Village, 5 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, and 10 minutes from downtown Asheville. Can easily get Uber/Lyft rides within minutes. Easy access to stores, restaurants, and delivery services.

The space
This is an 820 square foot space that has a separate private entrance with parking. There is an outdoor patio that looks into a wooded yard. There is grill with outdoor lounge. The listed space is in the basement of our home but noise should be minimum (just contact host if there is an issue).There is a large living room area with 2 sofas (1 pulls out into a bed). There is a small kitchenette that includes a refrigerator/ freezer, microwave, coffee maker, table for 4, and essential dishes. The bedroom has 1 king size bed. There is a full bathroom with closet and hangers. There are 2 TVs (one in the living room and one in the bedroom) with fire sticks. The space is heated but can fee

name: "Albergue" Home base for exploring Asheville & WNC
description:
Our home is in charming Montford just north of downtown Asheville. Our lower level private guest suite has its own entry to come and go as you please, while we live above. It has a queen bed, lounge space (w/ fold out double sofa), Wifi & TV, table w/ chairs, and counter area with fridge, microwave, coffee and toaster. We expect you'll spend most your time exploring, and as locals, we offer tips for the outdoors, food, activities, and other unique local favorites. We are covid vaccinated.

The space
Apart from the privacy of the full bathroom, the entire suite is an open floor plan, where different sections serve the purposes of sleeping, lounging, eating and TV watching (with local channels, Netflix, Prime and Hulu streaming). It is ideal for a couple on the Queen bed, but the foldout sofa sleeps an additional two on a Double sized mattress. An infant pack-n-play is available upon request. The windows look out on our wooded backyard, where songbirds greet t

name: Mimosa  Cabin In the Heart of Asheville
description:
*Monthly stays only*

This is a rare opportunity to stay in a Cozy Log Cabin neighborhood, conveniently in town without being in the noisy downtown. Mimosa Cabin is a quaint studio set-up with a queen size bed and gas fireplace. The screened in porch adds additional space and has a lovely porch swing to sip your coffee on.

The space
This unique cabin features skylights throughout and even has tree cut outs beside the fireplace. It's rustic vibe leaves you feeling cozy and comfortable! The screened in porch adds additional space to relax in and has a private feel to it.

Guest access
You will have access to all of the cabin. There is a picnic table in the back that is shared with the neighboring cabin.

Other things to note
Fireplace switch is at upper left side of fireplace mantle
Trash day is Thursday with recycling every other week.
Mailbox is at the end of Azalea St./meets spruce, to the rig

name: Lofts at Woolworth in downtown Asheville NC! #201
description:
Eight uniquely renovated, loft style apartments are now available in the historic Woolworth building. Lofts at Woolworth are located in the heart of downtown and have been crafted using a mix of industrial and luxurious touches, including top of the line cabinetry and appliances. Enjoy the city and mountain views from your living space while enjoying a glass of wine. Markets, shops, bars, restaurants, breweries and the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway await your arrival.

The space
Our New York style lofts are located on the second floor of the Woolworth building with easy stair access. We are a unique property offering guests personal assistance and are available to take luggage to your loft in our freight elevator upon arrival and departure. Our lofts feature fourteen foot ceilings, repurposed flooring, and lots of exposed brick and terra-cotta original to the building. "Walk the walk," downstairs in the Woolworth Art Gallery, and enjoy our old fashioned Soda Fount

name: 35 Carolina Lane Loft :Elegant + Edgy  Loft downtown on Historic Alley
description:
Secreted into the heart of the city – an industrial 2-bedroom loft, cloaked within the confines of a one-way alley, long known only to the real Asheville. A block once devoted to agriculture, today ensconced within the multicultural vibe of downtown. A modern-yet-historic, industrial-while-inviting, convenient-but-secluded (as cities go) kind of place.

The space
This is 35 Carolina Lane. This is a historic and quintessential Asheville loft: Two bedrooms. One bathroom. And heaps of history: A aged brick façade. Wizened wood floors. An antique clawfoot tub. Stone underfoot. Heavy old doors. All those oh-the-stories-we-could-tell details you crave.

This is 35 Carolina Lane. This is a thoroughly updated industrial loft, modernized for today’s traveler: Professional design. Combed concrete walls. Custom artwork. Bold colors. Partitioned walls. Modern appliances. A fully equipped kitchen. Both heat and air-conditioning. A dedicated washer/dryer. All those

name: Luxury condo downtown...In the heart of AVL Fun!!
description:
Luxury condominium in the heart of downtown Asheville. Stay steps away from restaurants, breweries, shopping, art and more. A new 2 bedroom, 2 bath condo that has the refined features of luxury.

Beautiful fixtures and amenities in an amazing location make this a phenomenal place from which you can explore all Asheville has to offer. Located on the 3rd floor, this residence features a full kitchen, living room, balcony and much more. You'll love your time in Asheville at this beautiful condo.

The space
This condo is located in a secured building that is only accessible with the lobby and parking garage access codes; you will receive these upon booking confirmation. The elevator opens to the garage and lobby for convenient access from your vacation rental. There is ONE dedicated parking spot for this condo; any additional vehicles must park elsewhere (no exceptions). Information for additional parking is listed below.

There is a private pay

name: *NEW LISTING* Downtown Asheville on your doorstep
description:
Conveniently located steps to downtown, this historic bungalow provides everything you need for an extended stay in Asheville. Guests have access to two bedrooms, two full baths, kitchen, laundry, outdoor space, and long-range views of Mt. Pisgah. Free off-street parking allows you to walk anywhere downtown or to the River Arts District and leave the car behind.

The space
The bungalow is simple and clean to ensure your stay is enjoyable. Climate controlled crawl space is completely encapsulated and equipped with a dehumidifier to ensure those with allergies will remain healthy and comfortable.

Guest access
Please note, the front of the home is securely sectioned off for (seldom used) office space. Need a little more room? Just ask and we can more than likely open it up for you. Additional space includes extra living/office area and additional bedroom with queen-sized air mattress. You will also have access in and out of the front doo

name: Lofts at Woolworth in downtown Asheville NC! #206
description:
Eight uniquely renovated, loft style apartments are now available in the historic Woolworth building. Lofts at Woolworth are located in the heart of downtown and have been crafted using a mix of industrial and luxurious touches, including top of the line cabinetry and appliances. Markets, shops, bars, restaurants, breweries and the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway await your arrival.

This home was built in the 1920s and it shows unique character. There are areas of low ceiling height and a few small uneven steps to negotiate. We live upstairs with our husky and the hardwood floors may creak at times - we will do our best to be quiet! :)

name: Spacious Apartment in Vibrant West Asheville
description:
Located in trendy West Asheville, one block from the French Broad River. Walking distance to New Belgium, as well as, other local restaurants, breweries, and coffee shops.
This space is the lower level of our home built in 2013. The space is 900 sqft. It has its own entrance and back patio as well as a separate hot water heater from the rest of the home. Each room has its own mini split unit for a/c and heat.
The kitchenette has a coffee maker, fridge, microwave, hot plate, and Instapot.

The space
This space is walkable to West Asheville and The River Arts District. It is a brief drive or Uber to downtown.

name: One bedroom tree house
description: Private one bedroom in a serene seting.

name: Minutes to Everything Newly Renovated
description:
Included for your convenience:
Washer Dryer
WiFi
Smart TV in every room
Parking Room for 4 vehicles
Desk
Patio
Grill
Fully stocked kitchen

The space
Picture your vacation drive just minutes off the interstate to a quiet neighborhood as you arrive at Mountain Escape. As you pull in, you’ll notice a simple garden with blooming flowers and small walkway to the home. There’s a good chance you’ll see Peter and his hunny bunny Lola in the front yard eating clover in the late afternoon.

As you enter this clutter free clean space you’ll notice a little welcome gift on the living room coffee table. Decide on which of the three rooms you’ll stay in. Blue and calm King Kong with an ensuite. Bright and airy Misfit room with a queen bed and sunrise facing. Or the cooler Platinum room with a platform queen bed on the shady side of the home for those who like to sleep in. All rooms have luxury linens, dressers, ceiling fans a

name: Amazing downtown luxury condo in the heart of downtown Asheville
description:
With 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, an open kitchen, dining room and large living room; this spacious residence provides the comfort and privacy of home while guests can also enjoy the convenience of having staff on hand to answer any questions and help with all guest needs. New appliances, bedding, and furniture create a stunning accommodation for you and your loved ones to relax and enjoy yourself. Upon arrival you will also find the unit fully stocked with linens and towels and all of the essentials you will need during your stay.
Located in the heart of downtown Asheville and nestled in the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains, this condo offers guests the best of both worlds. Only a moments walk to Asheville's local restaurants, breweries, shops, and galleries you are in the center of the city while also able to enjoy the mountains that surround you. You'll fall in love with this new condominium and it will become your frequent place of lodging while in Asheville.

name: NEW: Complete Comfort + Views + Pool + Location!
description:
Enjoy an extended stay in this excellent Asheville location! Have the best of both worlds: picturesque peace & quiet, and a world of fun only 5-minutes drive into the heart of downtown AVL.

This condo offers:
- Ground-floor, one-level living
- 2 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms
- A deck spanning the rear side of the entire condo
- Two assigned parking spaces directly in front

Fully furnished and outfitted with everything you need for a long-term stay.

*Book 30+ nights = 30% discount *

The space
Step from the entry hall into a bright living space that features an expansive view of the mountains and downtown Asheville. You'll want to enjoy your morning coffee, midday lunch, happy hour beverages, and post-dinner cocktails on the covered deck. In the warm weather, open sliding doors from every room to let the outdoors in!

THE BED/SLEEPING SITUATION: The Primary bedroom has a King bed, the 2nd bedr

name: Mountain Modern- Blue Ridge Parkway luxury cabin
description:
Nordic meets North Carolina! Our brand new Scandinavian-inspired cabin is bordered by the Blue Ridge Parkway, walking distance to the Mountains-to-Sea trail and less than 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. Private, yet conveniently located for access to all the hiking, biking, brewpub and culinary adventures that Asheville has to offer. Enjoy the luxury amenities of the cabin and the peaceful surroundings of our great outdoors. Bring your bikes too! Newly installed bike shed to store your toys!

The space
Our light-filled, modern designed cabin has a fully equipped kitchen, luxury bedding, and a full size washer and dryer. The bunk room has X-long memory foam mattresses to comfortably accommodate adults or kids. Both bedrooms have ample closet storage space and bedside lighting for cozying up with a good book when you're ready to call it a day! Even your bikes have a home here- brand new outdoor bike shed for parking your toys!

name: Luxe Loft; Pet Friendly; 3mi River Arts Dist.
description:
*NEW* Surrounded by a bamboo forest just outside of Asheville, our private, luxe loft-style home has high ceilings and ample natural light that fills the space all hours of the day. Professionally designed for comfort and style you might not want to leave! If you do, you're just 10 minutes from the heart of Asheville's River Arts District or UNCA. This location is also close to a ton of outdoor activities such as rafting and floating the French Broad River. Whoever you are, you are welcome here!

The space
This private home is tucked away just outside of Asheville in the Woodfin area making for a quiet and relaxing respite but just 10 minutes to the heart of the River Arts District - home to award-winning restaurants, breweries, an urban winery, the greenway along the French Broad River, and tons of artist studios.

The two bedrooms boast cozy amenities. The downstairs bedroom has a queen size Avocado mattress. The upstairs loft bedroom, with an open vie

Sunny spacious studio downtown. Gourgeous walkin shower.

name: Rural feel in the heart of walkable West Asheville
description:
Sleek homestay in the heart of West Asheville. Walk to Haywood Road with ease from this lovely homestay located just a couple of blocks down the road from Biscuit Head. This room affords remarkable privacy as well as ease of access to all that Asheville has to offer. Situated on a unique urban homestead that boasts lots of green space, walking trails and a small creek just outside your door. The hosts do live onsite and are available to help you with your Asheville experience.

The space
Set up like a nice hotel suite, you'll find everything you need in terms of hotel amenities such as a microwave, fridge, coffee bar, dishware and utensils.
A clean and quiet space hidden in the middle of West Asheville. The hosts are super knowledgeable about the surrounding area, activities, and attractions. Just ask.

Guest access
This is a private suite. You'll enjoy private access to your space.

name: Asheville Mountain Alchemy: Truly spectacular luxury lodge
description:
Location, location, location!
Timeless and true, and the saying certainly applies to Asheville Mountain Alchemy. You will experience total serenity and peace in this woods-like setting amidst the panoramic views of the Majestic Blue Ridge Mountains, while being minutes to downtown Asheville .This home is perfect for family gatherings, a friends retreat or just a calming respite in the Mountains.
A very special luxury destination, unique in its accoutrements and location, highlighting the splendor of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Welcome to the tranquility that comes from "elevation", calming and majestic, with access to the areas most sought after activities; restaurants, breweries, fishing, whitewater rafting and so much more.
Come create your own year-round mountain memories.

The space
Location:
This private luxury mountain home is located just outside downtown Asheville, atop Town Mountain, in an exclusive and private neighborhood, with views

description:

Mountain River Alchemy is a modern and eclectic vacation destination for the discerning traveler. You will experience the vibe that is Asheville, while being able to return form a day of enjoying all the local fare, and relaxing amidst the panoramic views of the majestic Blue Ridge Mountains, overlooking the French Broad RIver, while being mere minutes to downtown Asheville. This home is perfect for family gatherings, a friends retreat or just a calming respite while exploring our downtown or the awe-inspiring mountains.
A very special luxury destination, unique in its accoutrements and location, highlighting the splendor of the Blue Ridge.

Everyone wants views, but close to all that Asheville has to offer, well here you go: 3,000 ft. elevation, absolutely stunning mountain views, & all only 3 miles from downtown Asheville!!
Timeless, peaceful, invigorating & special; all of these describe Mountain Vista Alchemy. You will experience total serenity and peace in this woods-like setting amidst the panoramic views of the majestic Blue Ridge Mountains, while being mere minutes to downtown Asheville .This home is perfect for family gatherings, a friends retreat or just a calming respite in the Mountains.

name: River Bus in the Mountains
description: Unique converted bus with hot water, a hot tub, shower, flush toilet, high speed internet, deck space, and located in a small community in a flex district of Asheville just outside city limits and less than 5 minutes to downtown, this unique experience is a great joy for guests trying to experience that bus life.  No you can't drive the bus, lol.  We try to provide accurate descriptions for this space, but keep in mind it's a bus and it may not be the stay for you.

name: Asheville Urban Mountain Retreat views hot tub
description:
Beautiful home up a steep concrete driveway in Asheville with mile long year round mountain views, king beds, high speed internet, a hot tub, and in a convenient location, this large urban retreat is great for large groups who enjoy breathtaking views with the convenience to all that Asheville has to offer.

The space
0 minutes agoDetails
The house comes with professional management that is focused on our guest experience.

The home features a large kitchen, formal dining room, master on main with balcony and additional master bedroom on the top floor with a private balcony, a large garage converted into a game/lounge room, 6 total bedrooms and two pull out sofas, this home is great for folks who want to have an urban getaway with our mountain charm.
We prefer to not rent to smokers or people who will not respect our property and community.
Dogs are allowed with approval and a pet fee paid after booking through Airbnb resolution cent

name: Cottage on a Mini Urban Farmstead in West AVL
description:
NEW listing: Bright and airy upstairs apartment in a West Asheville home. 2BR/1BA, 750 sq ft. House built in the 1930s sits on a large lot with a screened porch, vegetable gardens, edible landscaping and a flock of chickens. Short drive to restaurants, RAD, Biltmore, downtown, Blue Ridge Parkway and easy highway access.

On site parking and self check-in.

Come relax is this sweet farm cottage!

name: Off grid tiny living on the farm in Asheville!
description:
Welcome to the off grid tiny house on the farm. Don't worry, it's not very off grid with it's flush toilet, hot water in the shower, wifi, and the hot tub! This is our smallest tiny house and is best suited for folks seeking the unique tiny house experience. This tiny house was built by someone who went to a local university and we're excited to continue to share the unique experience of staying here on our multi acre urban farm.

The space
We prefer to not rent to smokers and we ask that folks who stay here help minimize their waste and their environmental impact along with helping us recycle your food and other waste. This is a real flush toilet, don't worry there. Please only flush human waste and toilet paper in the toilet as it will break the toilet if anything else goes in there. We allow one dog per stay with an additional pet fee that can be paid through airbnb after you book.

This space is a little more rugged than our other tiny homes, i

name: cozy + convenient bungalow with coffee bar!
description:
Visit our cozy bungalow conveniently located minutes from the beautiful Blue Ridge Parkway! Enjoy the privacy and natural landscape, while being just 15 minutes from Downtown Asheville. Boasting a plethora of craft beer breweries, hiking trails and rafting for outdoor enthusiasts and the awe-inspiring Biltmore Estate for historical sightseeing buffs, Asheville has a little something for everyone. We hope to see y'all soon!
Our rental has a strict NO PET policy.
Thank you for understanding.

The space
Our guest home is detached from the main house (connected only by porch/decking) and includes its own private drive, covered parking area and ramp access into the front entry. Enjoy relaxing on the covered front porch or put your feet up in one of our plush recliners! The rental is stocked with various flavors of Starbucks coffee and creamers, as well as herbal and hot teas, for our guests to enjoy. Two televisions, high speed internet and complimentary Ne

name: Tucked away tiny house on the farm in Asheville
description:
Tiny house experience behind our horse stables and farms tucked away in a private spot on the farm for your tiny house living dreams! Featuring an efficient hot tub, hot water, real flush toilet, high speed internet, hammock, picnic table and grill, and all located fifteen minutes to downtown Asheville on our urban farm featuring Zach the barn cat, several equines, chickens, and more.

The space
We prefer not to rent to smokers or those who will otherwise harm the environment. We ask our guests to be mindful of their waste and help us recycle as much as possible and help us properly dispose of the food waste (hey the chickens love vegetable scraps)

This is the secret tiny house on the farm, tucked away in a private spot on the farm with amazing views. It's located behind our soon to be hydroponic gardening arena with a great yard space and privacy.

For an extra pet fee well behaved dogs are always welcome on the property as long as you pr

name: Original Tiny house on the farm with a hot tub
description:
Tiny house attached to our stables, this tiny house has served thousands of guests over the last several years and we're pleased to continue to allow our esteemed guests to experience this home on our urban farm located fifteen minutes to downtown Asheville and less than ten minutes to the ever popular Haywood Rd corridor in Asheville, this farm is in Asheville and is close to many amenities. This has limitations, so please keep that in mind if you're not familiar with tiny house living.

The space
We prefer not to rent to smokers and we expect our guests to not litter and also help recycle their food and other waste. This tiny home comes with a real flush toilet, but you can't put anything in there unless it's human waste or toilet paper or it will clog and we will be in a pickle.

Well behaved dogs are always welcome with approval and a pet fee paid through airbnb after you book.

This tiny home is located on our urban farm with other ren

name: Cedarwood Getaway | Mountain Views & Luxe Interior
description:
Nestled in the hills just 10 minutes from downtown, this lovely 3BR home presents mountain views from the spacious deck, a smart TV in every bedroom, and wood floors throughout. The Blue Ridge Parkway Visitor Center is 7 minutes away. Sleeps 6.

The space
Nestled just 7 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway Visitor Center, this lovely 3BR/2BA home presents stunning mountain views throughout as well as a spacious deck with alfresco dining. Highlights include smart TVs in every room, wood floors, and luxe finishes.

This conveniently located home is only 10 minutes from both the Biltmore Estate and downtown Asheville.

LIVING AREA

Detailed with picture windows that showcase mountain views, the open-concept living area features a sectional and a smart TV.

KITCHEN & DINING

The immaculate kitchen is appointed with a full suite of stainless steel appliances, stone countertops, and ample cookware.

name: Walkable West Asheville Studio
description:
A newly remodeled studio apartment in vibrant West Asheville. The studio includes its own private entrance, parking space, and personal outdoor patio with streaming lights to enjoy the mountain air. Our apartment is the perfect landing spot for two to three friends or a couple. The apartment is furnished with midcentury modern furniture which includes local art, records, and maps for you to kick-back or explore.

**please note our airbnb description says walkable West Asheville - not Downtown 😎

The space
Our studio apartment is in the basement of our home through a private entrance in the backyard. A private patio sits outside the space for enjoying the weather day and night. We have fenced in the patio to provide a sense of privacy. Upon entering the space you will see a custom wood bar with a singular barstool where one can enjoy coffee or open up a laptop. The bar area is complete with materials for making coffee and/or tea. We also have a refrige

name: The Lil’ Blue Mountain Magic Hut
description:
The Blue Hut is a newly renovated, newly furnished mountain home surrounded by trees. We are located just an 8 minute drive to downtown Asheville.

The space
The space is relaxing, yet invigorating. Clean, streamlined for efficiency, but far from soulless.

All soaps and detergents are non toxic. All linens and towels are 100% cotton.

Please read and be aware of house rules prior to booking. Thank you! ♥️

name: Modest home in a convenient location in Asheville
description:
Modest home in a convenient location directly behind a high rated tire shop and service center within bicycling distance to the River Arts District, this is a taste of the Emma Rd neighborhood, one of Asheville's oldest. This is a clean home with some quirks because it's older. We've done some updates and it comes with our obsession with our guests experience. If you need something more high end or private, this might not be the best option.

The space
We prefer to not rent to smokers. We don't allow parties, and guests who don't abide by Airbnb's code of conduct will be asked to not book. Please treat our home with respect and we will do our best to make sure we exceed your expecations.

There is noise from the street, and it's not uncommon for locals to walk to work on Emma road in front of the home, but you still have your piece of privacy here and with the convenient location to downtown, this house is great for folks who are booking for the con

name: NEW! Bright Asheville Retreat w/ Hot Tub & Decks!
description:
Leave the city behind for the mountains of Asheville when you retreat to this 5-bedroom, 3-bath vacation rental! This 2-story getaway boasts multiple outdoor seating areas overlooking the Blue Ridge Mountains, a hot tub, and a game room; there’s something for everyone! The house is under 10 miles from the Biltmore Estate and downtown Asheville so you can easily fill your days with city and historical sights. With Blue Ridge Parkway nearby, you’ll also find outdoor fun within easy reach.

The space
3,000 Sq Ft | Fire Pit | Game Room | Keyless Entry | Private Hot Tub

Blissful mountain living awaits at this serene hilltop retreat where you can unwind with loved ones between Asheville day trips and mountain adventure!

Bedroom 1: King Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3: Queen Bed | Bedroom 4: Queen Bed | Bedroom 5: Twin/Full Bunk Bed

name: Private Lake Paradise for you and your pet!
description:
Hi Everyone!
I have just moved into this amazing lake home right in Asheville! The lake house has a fully fenced backyard for your dog with a seperate private entrance to your lower level suite. I reside above but you will have complete privacy during your stay!

I am very proud to have been an Airbnb superhost for 16 quarters straight with my last home and I hope that you will see that attention to detail and hospitality in my new home as well.

I look forward to your stay!

name: Cozy Space, Convenient Location!
description: A perfect get-away spot for an Asheville vacation! Located minutes from the Asheville airport, our comfortable guest suite (with a full kitchen) is the perfect place to serve as home base for all that Western North Carolina has to offer. You will be 15 minutes to downtown, easy access to the Blue Ridge Parkway for hikes and sight seeing, close to numerous breweries, restaurants, and shops. Kick back after a fun day and make yourself at home in a quiet neighborhood.

name: West Asheville Suite
description:
The master bedroom and bathroom in this quaint West Asheville 3 minute drive to Haywood Rd and a quick drive to downtown and the River Arts District, this space has it's own entrance, nothing is shared except one wall. Guest of this space will have their own hot tub, internet, king bed, couch, smart TV with wifi access, and in a convenient location.

The space
There is a microwave, coffee maker, and mini fridge. If you need a super private space or something with a full kitchen, this isn't the space for you. Your patronage supports a local tenant who lives in the house full time. The spaces are not shared.

We allow pets with approval and a pet fee paid through Airbnb after booking.

We prefer to not rent to smokers.

name: Asheville's Forsythia House!
description:
The Forsythia House is nestled at the end of a quiet private road with a number of other houses on it. It's 3 minutes to the nearest big grocery store, 5 minutes to West Asheville, 10 minutes to downtown Asheville, and 10 minutes to the Biltmore Estate.

Asheville is a great town for foodies! Come check out our amazing restaurants and breweries. Don't shy away from the food trucks! We've got a tremendous variety! See our online guidebook for more recommendations.

The space
This is a new listing, but I'm an old Superhost with my other Airbnb, 415 Red Gate. Rent with confidence!

Forsythia House was built in 1960, but the inside has been completely renovated make the space comfortable for vacation or work travel. The full kitchen allows for extended stays and the separate dining area off the kitchen can double as a work area. The bedrooms are both furnished with sumptuous, king-sized beds, all on one floor with no stairs in the house. Good Wi-Fi

name: Simple and clean historic gem Asheville
description:
Simple and convenient two bed one bath house located less than 5 minutes to downtown Asheville or west Asheville and the river arts district. The home features high speed internet, an updated kitchen and custom shower. There are neighbors on all sides of this home and the convenience comes with access to a busy street. For a more secluded getaway check out our other listings. This is a classic Asheville pre war era home.

The space
We prefer to not Rent to smokers or other people who will disrespect our property. We don't allow parties. Well behaved dogs are allowed with pet fee paid through airbnb after booking.

This is a simple home in a spot good for small groups and couples.

Guest access
This listing is for the entire private home. This is not a shared space. There is another rental close by on a separate part of the property.

name: Mountain views, king beds, hot tub in Asheville
description:
Views of Spivey Mountain in this low traffic neighborhood in Asheville await your family or group of people who enjoy king beds, a hot tub, and great outdoor living space. There are neighbors in all directions but its still private where it counts. There's an RV rental in a different part of the property with nothing shared. This house is a quick 15 minute drive to downtown or west Asheville and many amenities are close by such as grocery shopping.

The space
There are two other rentals on the property in totally separate areas of the yard that don't have access to the house, a converted bus and a tiny home. They have their own hot tubs and living spaces and do not have access to the house and most of the front yard. This house has a great outdoor living space with a hot tub and in a great convenient location to all that Asheville has to offer. We prefer to not rent to smokers or people who will break the house rules such as people who have loud parties. We allow

name: The Adventure Ranch Basement Suite Hot Tub
description:
Asheville is amazing! Whatever your interests are, Asheville probably has you covered and more! Hiking, breweries, amazing restaurants.

The space
The apartment is located in a quiet and very safe residential neighborhood, located 10 mins from downtown Asheville and 5 mins to the Biltmore. You will have your own private entrance to our newly renovated basement apartment with your own driveway that can accommodate 2 cars or an R.V. and a car. Our suite has one bedroom and one bathroom, as well as a large comfortable lounging area where you'll find a Smart TV, coffee maker, microwave, W.i.f.i., dishwasher,refrigerator, and ice maker . We have an outdoor deck with a grill, a climbing wall, and a huge garden.

Guest access
The whole basement and anywhere in the yard is fine also. We have a deck that is shared.

Other things to note
Sorry no cats

name: Urban Asheville 4 bedrooms and hot tub
description:
Single level home in Asheville with 4 bedrooms and two bathrooms and hot tub located less than 3 minutes to the Biltmore Estate and about 7 minutes to downtown Asheville, this space is great for small groups and families who are visiting Asheville. The home has updated bathrooms and vaulted ceilings and is deceptively large from the outside appearance. The street has some traffic throughout the day and there are neighbors on all sides of the property. This is an urban retreat.

The space
We prefer to not rent to smokers. Well behaved dogs can be approved with a pet fee paid after you book through airbnb. This is a cute home with some quirks and guests will book for the convenient location. We have supplemental window unit air conditioners in the summer months.

A hot tub is located on the side deck. Other airbnbs and neighbors are around also. This is not a shared space.

name: Spacious suburban Asheville with hot tub
description:
Spacious home in an established neighborhood less than ten minutes to the Biltmore estate, this house features simple updates along with modest appliances., 5 beds and several pull put sofas, wrap around decks, hot tub, high speed internet and professional management by a local hospitality company.

The space
We prefer to not rent to smokers. Guests will be expected to respect the home as well as the neighborhood. Dogs are allowed with approval and a pet fee paid through airbnb after booking.

This is a great home for families or groups looking to stay in a low traffic neighborhood in Asheville.

name: *Camping with horses* in Asheville!  HOT TUB
description:
Asheville Glamping at its finest, on our urban farm with horses! One of three glamping experiences on the farm less than 15 minutes to downtown, this tent has it's own assigned bathroom in the barn, just a 300 ft walk up the hill You might want to bring an umbrella or rubber boots as is this is in the middle of the horse pasture. Horses will enter the campsite and love to be fed sliced apples and carrots. This rental is not pet friendly as your dog may get hurt by the donkey.

The space
The largest tent on the farm, camp 2, has a king bed, hot tub, grill, outdoor cooler, picnic table, some lawn chairs, and a coffee maker. Please only plug in one appliance at a time. Please shower before using the hot tub. Camp 2 is assigned to bathroom 2 on the deck in the barn. We no longer have a shared kitchen here. Please park near the rusty manure spreader and do not go downhill in your car. This is a camping experience with some added amenities. If you're expecting

name: Pasture Glamping in Asheville, horses and hot tub!
description:
Glamping in our urban farm in Asheville, NC just a quick 15 minute drive to downtown or west Asheville, this farm and horse experience is one of a kind! The horses like carrots and sliced apples. You will get dirty entering the pasture, please bring rubber boots and an umbrella just in case. Renters beware: It will be just as hot or cold outside as it is in the tent.There is hot water in your bathroom at the barn. Guests are expected to pack out what they pack in, including all garbage.

The space
Camp 1 glamping tent on the farm, camp 2, has a queen bed ,grill, picnic table, and some lawn chairs and a hot tub that isn't shared by other guests. Everyone has their own assigned hot tub and bathroom. Power is limited, enough to charge a phone and does not have heat. Camp 2 is assigned to bathroom 2 on the deck in the barn. You must park near the camp 1 sign and enter the pasture through the human gate. The blue horse gate on the south fence line be used to acces

description:
Entire house 2 bed/1.5 baths, 1700 sf eco-friendly. Newly constructed near French Broad River, River Arts District and Downtown Asheville . Includes beautiful fenced in outdoor space with fire pit, patio seating, hammocks, a greenhouse.

Just minutes away from everything in Asheville - a quick 5 min drive to downtown Asheville via Riverside Drive, or a short 3 minute walk down to Riverside Park, this is the perfect place to get away to be near downtown and also have safety, peace and privacy.

The space
“Had a great time. A quick drive to the center of Asheville, but far enough to be away from the hustle and bustle. Pictures online do not do justice. It was much nicer. Very eco friendly.”
-Mike C.

This special home was green built in 2018. It’s roughly 1700 ft.² 2 bedroom 1 1/2 baths. Beautiful side yard that’s fenced in with lots of privacy, a front deck and a top master bedroom balcony deck.

name: North Asheville Home with Mountain Views
description:
Enjoy this private, basement apartment in my quiet North Asheville home. 4.5 miles to Downtown Asheville, the Montford Neighborhood, and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Kitchenette features coffee maker, mini fridge, toaster oven, and microwave. Accessibility features include level entry, 36" doors, adjustable bed, grab bars in bathroom, low-barrier shower, roll-under sinks, and hand-held shower attachment. Great mountain views and the occasional bear sighting!

Other things to note
You have the entire walk-out basement level with separate entrance. I live upstairs on the main floor and there is a locking door between levels.

name: 1950s CHALET ABOVE DOWNTOWN -$6 Uber to all!
description:
☆ Vintage and nostalgic tiny home set on the mountain above downtown. Our 1950's Swiss Chalet is just a mile or so from downtown and a $6 Uber down the hill from Beaucatcher Mtn.

The Geneva Cottage offers a deck off of the bedroom, a king bed, comfortable LR, well stocked and efficient kitchen and small bathroom.

Pets generally are tough but can be possible and ALL petsdo need to be pre-approved. The Pet Fee is $50 and we do ask that you cover furniture and vacuum prior to leaving.

name: The Happy Bluebird - AVL’s BEST Nest!
description:
Welcome to Asheville's Happy Bluebird Home!!! A Completely Updated, Artsy, Executive Monthly 4BR/2BA North Asheville Rental! Close to Beaver Lake Trail, the Bird Sanctuary & only 10 minutes UBER to downtown Asheville! If you want to be a part of what's happening in AVL, yet have privacy...this is the place!!! HOP on over...to AVL's SAVORY Cecilia’s Restaurant just 5 minutes away or ENJOY a breakfast pastry from Geraldine’s Bakery! Live Music at AVL’s Salvage Station, breweries & MORE!

The space
Book today and be the the EARLY BIRD! You could be the FIRST to enjoy the BRAND NEW stainless kitchen appliances, granite countertops, NEW hardwood floors and large covered front porch with close Mountain Views! Excellent high speed Wifi provided.. Off street parking for 2-3 cars (first driveway on the right). In the wintertime you will need 4-wheel drive due to possible snow on the small hill. Onsite spacious laundry. Quiet, nestled in the tree’s neighborhoo

name: Eyes of the world, phamily friendly, local color!
description:
Welcome to Asheville! Our home is located a short 5 minute drive from downtown, breweries, the French Broad river, and many local music and outdoor venues and events. I am also fully vaccinated.

We are quirky and colorful. We love meeting new people from around the world. Our house is a shared space with you. You have a private kitchenette, bedroom and living room. The bathroom downstairs is private for you to use, it is located in the hallway next to your suite.

The space
You will open the wooden gate to find a fun, colorful, eclectic surprise. Listen to the birds sing. Bring a guitar, drum, or flute and sit around the fire pit. Your private entrance takes you into a cute livingroom/kitchenette. The couch pulls out into a wonderfully comfortable double bed, and the bedroom is a quiet and tranquil space.

Guest access
Please park in the front of the house. Enter through the wooden gate down the driveway.

Ot

name: New Construction minutes to W. Asheville/Downtown
description:
Contemporary newly constructed Asheville home minutes from eclectic W. Asheville. 30 Day min. Short drive to breweries, restaurants/shops as well as access to many outdoor adventures! Queen master suite w/ full bath & walk-in closet. Double & twin bedrooms with roomy closets. Stocked kitchen, granite counters, S/S appliances, reclining leather sofa, washer/dryer, desk work area, covered front porch, enclosed side deck, 2 car driveway. Large windows - lots of natural light, Wifi & Netflix.

The space
There is a very large walk in crawl space if you have the need to store a bike, etc. Message owner if you need access to crawl space. 30 day min. booking. If you book for more than one month, Airbnb sets it up so that you can pay for one month at a time.

Guest access
5 min. to Downtown, 3 min. to West Asheville and 15 min. to Blue Ridge Parkway/Pisgah Mts. Short walking distance to public transportation - ART bus
fare is only $1

name: Downtown Asheville and Mountain Views
description:
Welcome to my beautiful home next to Downtown Asheville. My house is located on Beaucatcher Mountain overlooking downtown Asheville. It is a short half mile walk to all the restaurants, breweries and galleries in Downtown Asheville. Plus the Biltmore Estate, grocery stores, the Asheville Mall and numerous other shopping options are all within 2.5 miles of my house. You will not be disappointed with my house and amazing location.

The space
This one bedroom and one bath house is perfect for guests looking to be extremely close to downtown but who still want the benefits of a yard and easy parking access. My house features 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom, with an open kitchen and spacious den. There is a small front porch where you can sit and relax while watching the sunset or checking out downtown Asheville. There are multiple windows throughout the house which let in plenty of light when wanted - all windows have pull down blinds. The queen size bed is extremely

name: New Build Art-Deco Condo | Walkable Locale
description:
Nestled in the brand-new Biltmore community, this luxurious 1BR condo presents a prime locale within walking distance to the best of downtown. Combining art deco with modern touches, this gem has an expansive balcony and an immaculate interior. Sleeps 4.

The space
Situated in the South Slope district in the brand-new 145 Biltmore Avenue building, this 1BR condo provides a prime locale within walking distance to all downtown has to offer. A fusion of art deco and modern luxury, the immaculate interior has two smart TVs and all-new furnishings.

Featuring the largest outdoor balconies in the city, this rental also offers alfresco dining, in-unit laundry, and reserved garage parking.

LIVING AREA

The open-concept living area is fitted with a smart TV and a sleeper sofa.

KITCHEN & DINING

A full suite of stainless steel appliances and stone countertops gleam in the pristine kitchen.

When it’s time
