name: Avondale of Asheville: new, eclectic Asheville destination.
description:
Avondale of Asheville.
Tucked just off the historic & iconic Blue Ridge Parkway, and just outside downtown Asheville, this newly constructed gem welcomes travelers to our mountains.
Carefully planned, designed and built with vacationers in mind, Avondale of Asheville provides comfort, location and amenities to make any stay in Asheville memorable. Easy access to I-40, the Blue Ridge Parkway and more, makes for quick and simple travel to any and all attractions, restaurants, breweries, hiking and so much more; basically everything our Blue Ridge Mountains have to offer our beloved tourists.
Come create special memories, experience new vistas, explore and cultivate lasting visions that will last a lifetime!

A new Hot Tub will be installed beginning of June 2021!

The space
Location:
This private home is located just outside downtown Asheville, with easy access to the Biltmore Estate, Asheville and all local area attractions. An easy

name: Summit Cottage-Downtown Asheville; 30-day Rental or longer/ Biltmore Village
description:
“Come stay at the Summit”……..Come experience Biltmore Village!
30-day or longer "Executive Rental". Perfect for travelling Dr's, business stays or relocation!

The space
Location:
Private cottage located in Biltmore Village, 5 minute walk into the shops of the Village, 5 minute drive to downtown Asheville, & 15 minutes to Asheville Regional airport.

Accommodations:
(Sleeps 4-6) 2 bedroom, 2 full baths
Occupancy Summary / Sleeps in beds: 4 Max. Occupancy: 6

Description:
Summit Cottage is a fully renovated and updated gem that affords comfort, convenience, and much more to those wanting to experience downtown Asheville! This contemporary 2 bedroom retreat is in the heart of Biltmore Village in Asheville, NC, nestled in the Blue Ridge Mountains, and offers a relaxing & invigorating escape. Impeccably decorated with an eclectic urban feel along with a taste of the mountains; with tons of space to spread out & relax.

name: Firefly Farmhouse -A cozy retreat/romantic getaway
description:
You'll enjoy relaxing in the porch swing as the evening shadows deepen, sipping a glass of wine and watching the horses graze. Private retreat close to all the area attractions. The Blue Ridge Parkway, the Biltmore House, hiking trails, brewery tours and shopping are close at hand. A getaway complete with washer/dryer, full kitchen with a fully equipped coffee/tea bar. Parking is free and close at hand. No cable but a smart TV with internet to enjoy your favorite subscription channels.

The space
This guest house is a stand alone cottage located on our property. On this property is a RV site as well. It is next door to the cottage. We will on a rare occasion have an RV parked there.This cottage consists of a open plan downstairs with a living area and small island with 2 bar stools, small kitchen area and a well equipped tea/coffee bar. Upstairs is a bedroom and bath, with a queen bed; a bath with tub and shower.

Beside the cottage is our own home oc

name: Desirable North Asheville
description:
Beautiful ground floor private studio apartment in the mountains. You will have your own private entrance and living space. King size bed, futon couch that opens to a double bed. Full kitchen, WiFi, beautiful view among the trees.
2.5 miles to the Blue Ridge Parkway and hiking trails. 6 miles to downtown Asheville. 24 hr. Ingles, Starbucks, Fresh Market and several restaurants close by.

The space
Guest have private entrance and private use of the entire apartment

Other things to note
We have visiting bear, please no food left in your car or outside. Smoking is permitted outside only

name: Denise’s cottage
description:
New listing - Bookings begin July 29th - hope to be a super host with 5 star ratings.

Make yourself at home in this delightful cottage, tastefully furnished, comfortable bedding, in a quiet neighborhood minutes from all the activities of Asheville life and surrounding area.

Wake up to the sound of birds chirping, enjoy your coffee or tea on the front porch and watch a new day dawn. Kick back and relax with your evening cocktail on the patio and experience the ending of another day.

The space
Make yourself at home in this 2 bedroom upstairs cottage that sleeps four people. One full bathroom upstairs (Tub/Shower) and one full bathroom downstairs (Tub/Shower).

The master bedroom includes a king size bed with full wall closet and hangers. The second bedroom has a full size bed with shared closet.

Luxurious sheets, comforters and towels to sooth away an active day into a beautiful relaxing night's sleep.

name: HitchHiker RV in Resort w/ Pool Near AVL Airport
description:
Welcome to the HitchHiker! A 38 foot 5th wheel RV with all the amenities of a tiny house! Located only minutes from Asheville Airport in the Rutledge Lake RV Resort, you'll enjoy amenities like a heated pool (Open Memorial day to Labor Day), kayaks, fishing, Rec Room for the kids and more!

Full kitchen with fridge, stove, and over 400 square feet gives you room to enjoy. Washer/Dryer combo in Full bath with shower. Queen bed + queen sofa pull out. Wood burning fire pit for smores by the creek!

The space
A private bedroom in the front sleeps 2 with a comfy queen mattress. You also have a full bathroom with shower, hot water, toilet, sink and mirror. Very roomy for an RV!

You also have a living room with a couch that turns into a pull-out queen sofa that can sleep 2 more, table and chairs, desk for working, and two reclines to enjoy the electric fireplace and smart Tv with Netflix included! We've also added some board games for you to enjoy.

name: Historic 5Points Duplex Stroll Downtown w/ parking
description: A house with two beautiful light-filled, well-appointed apartments located up and downstairs in a historic home in the heart of thriving Five Points neighborhood; connecting downtown, the Greenway, UNC Asheville, and beloved Montford.

name: Starnes Cove Cabin hot tub + sauna in Asheville
description: Cabin in Asheville that involves driving through a car parts storage center and a mobile home park, about 15 minutes to downtown Asheville located in the Starnes Cove area, this lovingly restored cabin features a sauna, hot tub, king beds, wifi, and kitchen with all the amenities to be a home away from home and a creek running through the middle of the property.

name: Tucked away sanctuary in Asheville HOT TUB + SAUNA
description:
Tucked away abode in Asheville in a convenient location to downtown and West Asheville, this home features a custom sauna, hot tub, privacy, full kitchen, king bed, internet, and my dedication to providing a quality experience to our guests.

The space
Please don't book the property if you intend to break my house rules. We don't allow smoking, parties, unapproved pets, or anyone who won't respect the house. I want you to have fun and enjoy Asheville! Approved dogs are allowed with a 40 dollar pet fee paid through Airbnb after booking.

The house is great for couples or solo travelers looking for a house in a great tucked away spot in Asheville.

name: Lofts of Asheville with a touch of elegance
description: 5minutes to downtown Asheville and Biltmore Estate.1000 sq ft new construction apartment in multiuse complex.Woodfloors,m granite counter tops,stainless appliances,washer and dryer, High speed internet.Close to greenways,biking,hiking,Breweries.

name: New Stylish Upscale Condo in Downtown Asheville
description:
Enjoy your stay at our stylish and new downtown condo which includes 1 bedroom/1 bath. Elegant and modern touches throughout include a velvet chesterfield sofa, local Asheville Art, and Pac-man Icade featuring favorite games from the '80s including Centipede, Galaga, Frogger, and many more! The bedroom includes a comfy king-size bed and a large walk-in shower. This beautiful space is within walking distance to everything Asheville has to offer and a short drive to Biltmore Estates and Village.

The space
Our condo is new, and we personalized the space switching out many of the standard features such as the doorknobs, kitchen hardware, and chandelier. There's a pullout queen sofa, and our total space is about 570 sqft. It can accommodate 4 guests, however, it's best suited for 2-3 people.

Guest access
Keypad access. One parking spot is included with the Condo. If you have more than one vehicle there are several nearby parking garages.

name: Relaxing home away from home minutes from downtown
description:
Relax and enjoy the sights and sounds of nature in our newly renovated home located only 7 miles from downtown Asheville. Located in a quiet country setting this house comes with plenty of amenities. This house features a relaxing dining area or laptop friendly workspace with a bay window, a screened in sunroom, a large front and backyard for games or just watching the deer that frequently pass through. A great place to relax after a busy day in town or hiking in our beautiful mountains.

The space
The large open yard, screened in porch, bay window and outdoor grilling area lets you enjoy the interesting and every changing weather in Asheville. The fully equipped kitchen, laundry room and many other amenities provides you with a home away from home experience.

Guest access
Whole house.

Other things to note
Cornhole game on site for your enjoyment.

name: Whole Renovated Home Minutes to Downtown Asheville
description:
Spacious and freshly renovated entire home, only 10 minutes to Downtown Asheville! Huge kitchen, open living spaces, and a large back yard with deck make this home the perfect getaway for large and small groups. Just two miles from Biltmore village, this location gives convenient access to everything in the city in the setting of a peaceful neighborhood.

The space
An entire home just minutes from everything Asheville has to offer. One king bedroom has an en-suite large soaking tub and separate shower. The second full bathroom is located near the center of the home. The second bedroom also has a king sized bed, while a third bedroom has two queen sized beds. There are two queen sized pull-out sofas, which are surprisingly comfortable. All furnishings are brand new!

Guest access
Guests should feel free to use the entire property. The front and back yard are both sizable, with the backyard being fully fenced.

name: The Butler's Quarters at the Mystery Mansion
description:
Live like a local, just 1.5 blocks from the heart of West Asheville. Your private entry suite is the former Butler's Quarters of our 106 year old Mystery Mansion. But don't let the name fool you, this unique stay is artistic, fancy & over the top fun. Whether you're coming to Asheville for a wedding, nature, breweries, or the Biltmore, our comfortable suite will surely make your visit even more memorable. Enjoy complete privacy with off-street parking, well-lit pathway, outdoor seating, & entry.

The space
Our home is 106 years old, and is wonderful & whimsical. So not only will you have a safe & comfortable stay, but a truly unique & magical experience as well.

You will have a designated off-street parking space in our large driveway. From there you will have your own private, well-lit path that leads you to the private side yard with patio seating, and entry to your suite.

Upon entry, you are greeted by the beautiful, former butler’s serv

name: Small Place in Paradise
description:
This property is very private has its own parking and entrance. It is located 15-20 minutes in any direction to waterfalls, hiking and biking trails. Also same distance to Downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, Grove Park, Pisgah View Ranch, Outlet Mall and Asheville Mall.
Free Coffee
Provide Towels

The space
Parking and Private entrance . Large Living Rm 3 recliners. Large bedroom with TV. Additional Futon in Closet for additional . Private Hot Tub on Back Deck.

Guest access
Park and in drive have own spot and stairs to a private entrance.

Other things to note
We have 2 Large German Shepard dogs they are very friendly and in own area cannot access guests area .

name: Tiny House in West Asheville w/hot tub
description:
This genuine tiny home on wheels has a queen bed, kitchenette with sink and small appliances, full bathroom with flush toilet, hot tub, high speed Internet, heat/AC and a full local staff of cleaners, maintenance, and customer service ready to help you have a pleasant stay in Asheville. There are other rentals at the end of this short neighborhood. If you need something secluded this may not be the best option, but the location is convenient!

The space
No parties, no smoking, pets are approved and a pet fee can be paid through Airbnb after booking.

If you don't want to experience a tiny house, please book another one of our rentals. Tiny homes have serious amenity limitations such as having to climb up a ladder to get to bed and the space is tiny! The hot tub is not shared with anyone else and is only used for guests of this tiny house.

This is in a great location about 12 minutes to downtown Asheville while being in West Asheville les

name: Mountain House with Creek close to Everything!
description:
This Newly constructed cabin is located in a private wooded setting only 10 min. from downtown Asheville, 5 min from the Blue Ridge Parkway. Relax on the back porch or take stroll down the Creekside firepit. Convenient to all that Asheville has to offer. The cabin is beautifully furnished and well equipped with everything you need to enjoy a peaceful weekend getaway or extended stay.

The space
The Home is located 10 minutes from downtown Asheville, 5 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway and is a nice private wooded setting.

Guest access
There is a shared trail to the creek with another adjacent cabin located on the property.

Other things to note
We promote the house as a three bedroom that sleeps 6. There are trundle beds that roll out from under the twins that can sleep two additional guests. Enough linens and towels are provided for up to 8 guests.

name: Luxury Chalet w/King Bds + Hot Tub + 15 min to AVL
description:
This chalet features a hot tub, garden dining, fenced in yard and king size beds. Look out through the windows over the trees and as far as the Blue Ridge Parkway. The morning views from the deck are breathtaking, and you may spot a fox or bear. Nestled on top of Buffalo Mountain, this hideaway is charming, romantic and relaxing. A scenic 15-minute drive from both downtown Asheville and Black Mountain, this nook is the perfect peaceful getaway.

The space
You won't be disappointed by gorgeous decor and comfort of this home. It is fully stocked, has two living rooms, and 3 porches on different levels for taking in the views! It features 2 bedrooms with king size beds and private baths. The property is surrounded by trees which creates a treehouse feel and complete privacy. The mountain that the house sits on has a direct view across the valley to a famous lookout spot on the blue ridge parkway, (you get the opposite view right from your porch)! *Please see note abo

name: Downtown Luxury with 3 Bedrooms & Private Elevator
description:
Modern luxury townhouse with private elevator to access all 4 floors. Roof top deck for perfect mornings and afternoons. Fully equipped kitchen, luxury linens, bathrobes and towels. 1 car garage & 1 car separate parking space. Easy walk to downtown, South Slope & great restaurants & breweries. This unit features 3 bedrooms with 3 full baths & a 1/2 bath. King Master & two guest rooms with queen beds in each. This unit is not suitable for small children or toddlers due to the many stair cases.

The space
This modern contemporary light and bright townhome has everything you need for a great friends getaway or family retreat. Large living spaces and outdoor rooftop terrace for fun social gatherings.

Guest access
Parking onsite and easy access to downtown on foot.

name: Upstairs Cottage, Heart of West Asheville
description: Newly renovated upstairs cottage space right in the heart of funky-fabulous West Asheville. Walking distance to restaurants, bars, shops, and grocery stores. Stone's throw from the River Arts Districts, Carrier Park Bike Path, and just ten minutes (max) from downtown Asheville. Hop on HWY 26 and you're on the Blue Ridge Parkway in ten minutes!

name: Easy Breezy in walkable West Asheville
description:
Welcome to West Asheville! Walkable to West Asheville’s best restaurants, bars and shops and a quick drive to amazing hikes and scenic drives that make the Blue Ridge Mountains so popular. Quiet street, cozy home, lots of space and an outdoor patio all your own!

The space
You'll be staying in my downstairs apartment which has lots of windows for natural light, 2 bedrooms (queen beds), a full bath (shower only) with washer and dryer, kitchenette and living room with comfy seating (+ full size sofa bed). The entire space is for your enjoyment. The apartment includes a TV with a firestick. Sign in to any of the apps to watch all the things. Just out the back door is a covered patio with a bistro table and 2 Adirondack chairs for your use.

Guest access
You have access to the entire apartment, with a separate entrance and an outdoor patio for your use. Parking is limited to 2 cars. I reserve the driveway for your cars, so please reserve the gra

name: Luxury Asheville Mountain Retreat w City Amenities
description:
Experience a peaceful mountain retreat close to all of the amenities! This 3 bed/2 bath home features an open concept living room w. gas fireplace, covered front porch, screened back porch, bbq, firepit, and large fenced lawn for a quiet and luxurious stay only 3 miles to the Biltmore Estate, Blue Ridge Parkway, breweries, restaurants, shops, and grocery stores. Downtown Asheville is less than 5 miles away. This rental is only available for 30+ day stays with additional discounts for 2+ months.

The space
This modern home has all of the high end amenities with a cozy feel. The private office can be set up as a third bedroom. Option available to rent a car for the duration of your stay.

Guest access
You will have the entire space privately.

Other things to note
We only allow well behaved dogs - no cats please. A $100 pet fee will be added to the booking to cover additional cleaning costs.

name: Long Grass View: modern, eclectic and stunning!
description:
Modern, eclectic and stunning; welcome to Long Grass View!
A mindfully curated modern new construction, nestled in the Riceville Valley just outside of downtown Asheville. This contemporary mountain home affords stunning views and the feel of being lost amidst the Blue Ridge Mountains, while also being very close to both downtown Asheville and Black Mountain. Sleek lines and luxury touches are balanced with the natural surroundings and the calming of effect that is inherent in our beloved mountains. Long Grass View beckons you to come experience the Smokies, and everything WNC has to offer travelers and tourists alike.
Come create blissful and amazing memories at Long Grass View.

The space
Location:
Private home located in the Riceville Valley mountain community of Asheville. 10-15 minutes east of downtown Asheville, app. 30 minutes to Asheville Regional airport, & 15 minutes to the gates of Biltmore Estate. The home affords year round access

name: Keys to Happiness Studio
description:
UNBELIEVABLE location for this beautiful, brand new open-concept suite nestled in a small, quiet, wooded neighborhood in city limits with gardens, water feature and trails. Location is everything with this place!! Located steps away from the Mountains to Sea Trail, 5 minutes to the Biltmore House, Blue Ridge Parkway, and downtown Asheville only 7 minutes away, you'll be close to everything--Historic Biltmore Village, Breweries, Eateries, Art Galleries, Ashevillle Airport, I-40 and much more.

The space
Brand new, second floor, open-concept studio offers a King bed and Queen memory foam sleeper in this cozy 900 sq ft zen space equipped with everything you need! Flooded with light and love, "Keys to Happiness" AirBnB offers a surprise design element of a piano soundboard built into the wall and "piano parts art" adorning the space. Peace and tranquility abound in this peaceful sanctuary with a water feature, gardens, wooded hiking trails and outdoor relaxation a

name: The Westside Rancher: *Cozy *Countryside Retreat*
description:
The Westside Rancher is a single story ranch style home beautifully designed for you to experience Asheville like a local. This home is tucked away in the secluded countryside of West Asheville. You will be surrounded by lush landscape, blooming cherry tress, and bustling wildlife. This 3 bed 2 bath home has been remodeled with love and is a perfect home base to explore all that Asheville has to offer.

The space
Whether you are visiting to relax, unwind, explore, or adventure experiencing comfort is key. You can enjoy our newly built outdoor deck while barbequing with a view of the large grass area perfect for a game of corn hole, eating around the table under the shade of an umbrella, and sitting around the fire feature under café lights in the evening with friends, family, and loved ones. Inside you will find well-appointed bedrooms as you sink into our comfortable beds after a long day of exploring Asheville’s beautiful nature, storage space for personal item

name: West Asheville Mountain Bus with Hot tub
description: Beautiful Bus with all the luxuries of home. This unique Bus is close to downtown Asheville.  This bus offers a private hot tub and fire pit.

name: Welcome to Wind Horse Farm
description:
Welcome to Wind Horse Farm! We are located on a 6 acre farm 10 minutes from downtown Asheville and 5 minutes from West Asheville. We are a working farm with chickens, bee hives, and horses. We run an equine assisted learning program as well.
We are only hosting adults no children at this time. If scheduling a week or two in advance massage therapy and or acupuncture can be scheduled in the comfort of your studio. Appointments available through fivebranchesacupuncture.com.

The space
Enjoy our beautiful newly built studio cottage with a kitchen, mini fridge, full bathroom, queen size Murphy bed (that folds up into the wall when not in use), WIFI, cups/ plates and utensils and a continental breakfast with our farm fresh eggs, coffee, juice.

Guest access
There is space for parking next to your cottage

Other things to note
We will provide a remote control or gait code to open and close the gate to enter the propert

name: Quiet Bent Creek Bungalow - 1 mile from Parkway
description:
Relax & restore in this private Bent Creek bungalow on over an acre of land & gorgeous wooded views. Perfect central location! Within 1 mile of: the NC Arboretum, Blue Ridge Parkway, Bent Creek hiking & mountain biking trails, Asheville Outlets, French Broad River put-in, and 1-26. A short 9 miles to The Biltmore Estate & Biltmore Village for boutique shopping & local eats. 6 miles to trendy West Asheville for some of the best local hotspots. Enjoy our two large porches for a night of grilling!

The space
Charming boho bungalow with enough greenery throughout the home for all the fellow plant lovers! Beautiful open concept living and dining space. Washer and dryer and large fully-stocked kitchen including complementary tea and coffee. Both mattresses are hybrid memory foams for your comfort! Two large porches for grilling and enjoying the crisp mountain air. Over an acre of green space for outdoor games & plenty of play space for the kiddos. Have fun playing corn

name: Light and bright West Asheville
description: Welcome to West Asheville! Enjoy our quiet guest suite minutes from popular west Asheville and downtown.  The suite includes a private entrance, queen bed, tv and wifi, dining area with mini-fridge and coffee maker, a spacious renovated bathroom, and off-street parking. We are located 1.5 miles from West Asheville's happening Haywood Road, 3 miles from the vibrant River Arts District and 3.5 miles from delightful downtown Asheville.

name: West Asheville Airstream with Hot Tub
description: Airstream in West Asheville next to other rentals with a little privacy, the hot tub is not shared and this is a camper so be prepared for amenity limitations. We try our best to accomodate our guests but if you don't want the Airstream experience this isn't for you. We have a king bed, internet, hot tub that is not shared and our customer service team on call, we also offer in house delivery services for extra.

name: Hillside Hideaway
description:
The space
If you want to experience Western North Carolina in style, look no further than Hillside Hideaway, a contemporary mountain home with breathtaking views from every room in the house. Located just north of Downtown Asheville in an upscale neighborhood, Hillside Hideaway offers quiet seclusion and privacy while still being close to town. Floor-to-ceiling windows in the spacious open concept living and dining areas warm the mood. In the evening, the fully equipped kitchen makes cooking dinner a delight, while the living area's gas fireplace provides a cozy backdrop for relaxing with friends and family. Two comfortable owner-on-main suites separated by the living area provide privacy from the two lower level bedrooms. Enjoy year-round, unobstructed mountain views from the deck, which is partially covered for lounging no matter the weather. Wildlife is abundant on this mountainside, including hawks, deer, rabbits, and even the occasional bear. Refresh your energy level

name: Woodsy Hideaway near Downtown, Parkway, Biltmore
description:
Brand new airy & private guest suite in a woodsy location with private gravel driveway/parking tucked away at our Kenilworth home near downtown Asheville. Private entrance with attached patio and outdoor seating as well as a new private bathroom.

The space
Bright and airy suite has a private key code entrance, queen bed, double bed in loft via ladder, new private bathroom, small desk, open air closet with iron and board, sitting area with sofa, and coffee table for lounging or eating leftovers; complete kitchenette with coffee, electric kettle, mini-fridge/freezer, toaster and microwave; outdoor patio with cafe lights and seating, room for bike storage inside as well

Other things to note
The new bathroom is a small efficient use of space. Please note the photos for size & space in the bathroom.

Driveway and parking are gravel and only 2 cars allowed max.

The loft bed and ladder are at your own risk. Please note th

name: Cozy Comfy and Cute Asheville Tiny with HOT TUB
description:
Cute, cozy, and comfy tiny house in West Asheville, this rental is located at the end of a small neighborhood of other rentals about 15 minutes to downtown Asheville, in West Asheville less than 5 minutes to Haywood Road and the River Arts District. This rental comes with our commitment to exceeding our guests expectations and if you're not looking for a tiny house experience this may not be for you.

The space
Dogs are allowed with approval and a pet fee paid through airbnb after booking. We prefer to not rent to smokers. We expect our guests to treat our property with respect. The hot tub is private for this rental only and the other rentals on the property have their own tubs that are not shared.

This is at the end of a small neighborhood with other rentals within 100 feet. Everyone has parking and the guests who book this space do so for the tiny house experience in Asheville with the quick drive into downtown, with grocery shopping at Ingles market

name: New Luxury Condo, Downtown Asheville with Mountain Views
description:
Stunning east city views, amazing outdoor space, and gorgeous contemporary design in this new-build, sunny and walkable condo in downtown Asheville. This 3rd floor two-bedroom features 2 Queen bedrooms, each with private baths, and a queen sleeper sofa. Access the private, 50-ft wide terrace from the living room in the condo via floor-to-ceiling glass sliding doors. Wake up to peaceful mountain mist and coffee as you plan your day in Asheville. After enjoying what the town and surroundings have to offer, continue your vacation by relaxing in the condo with local art, and a fully-stocked kitchen. You can even catch the mountain sunrise while relaxing in the living room. The unit also provides 1 garage parking space. No detail has been overlooked!
Located on Biltmore Ave in downtown you are central to all that Asheville has to offer: shopping, restaurants, breweries, galleries, and live music venues. One block to Wicked Weed, two blocks to Curate. The Biltmore Estate and the Blue R

name: Mountain Cottage Getaway
description:
Beautiful mountain cottage! Amazing outdoor space, and gorgeous design. This 2nd floor t1 bedroom-bedroom features a queen master, with private baths, and a queen sleeper sofa. Access the private, 20-ft wide terrace from the living room. Wake up to peaceful mountain mist and coffee as you plan your day in Asheville. After enjoying what the town and surroundings have to offer, continue your vacation by relaxing in the cottage with a fully-stocked kitchen, and comfortable seating on the terrace! You can even catch the mountain sunset while relaxing in the living room and watching the 55” tv. The unit also provides 1 parking space near the entrance of the cottage.
Located on Town Mountain Rd, you are central to all that Asheville has to offer: shopping, restaurants, breweries, galleries, and live music venues. The Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway are also just a short drive away--this location is hard to beat.

name: Beautiful home in quiet neighborhood!
description:
Beautiful home in Arden, NC. 10 minutes from Biltmore Estate, 20 minutes to downtown Asheville. Close to hiking and all outdoor activities! I live in a quiet neighborhood right in the culdesac.

The space
Cozy home, lots of plants, a tranquil little getaway. I do have a 3rd bedroom with a single bed, but that is my daughters room and I’d like to keep that off limits. I live here full time and only offering my home for a brief time! Please treat it as you would your own.

name: Hilltop getaway in the heart of West Asheville
description:
Welcome to Holly Street Hill-top, the coolest handcrafted home in the heart of West Asheville. Located mere minutes from all the popular locations of the surrounding Asheville area, get ready to relax with all the cozy comforts of home, or go out and explore what the town has to offer. Featuring 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, entertainment room, and 2 scenic porches.

The space
Each room in the home is unique and offers a personalized touch with exceptional comforts. The funky living room has a large Smart TV for all your entertainment needs. An intimate dining area adjoins the kitchen where you can enjoy your coffee with the best morning light! Each bedroom has its own full bathroom. The second story is expansive, complete with a king bed, Smart TV, walk-in closet, huge shower with dual shower heads, office desk and a reading nook.

name: Charming Asheville Studio Escape
description:
Our studio is a newly furnished, modern rustic open concept suite with its own private entry in North Asheville. Located in the ground floor of our 1 acre property, the private 700 sq ft studio is provided with ample parking on the property. The space has a living area with a couch and coffee table, a sleeping area with queen size bed and TV, a dining area with coffee bar, mini fridge and microwave for simple meals and breakfast, and your own private full bathroom. Free Wi-Fi is also provided.

The space
You will enjoy your stay in this spacious 700 sq ft private studio apartment with its own entrance, private bathroom and outdoor space. It has a 9 ft ceiling, ceiling fan and decorated in a modern rustic style. You will find everything you need in terms of hotel amenities such as a fridge, coffee bar, utensils, linens and toiletries. Perfect for either vacation or business trips, and your base for exploring surrounding area, activities and attractions.

name: Colonial Revival in Grove Park
description:
Newly remodeled 1917 three-story extended stay has everything for the discerning guest. Large windows let in plenty of light. Hardwood floors throughout. Its graceful lines and intricate details evoke the craftsmanship of a golden era. Modern kitchen with stainless appliances, stone counters, custom cabinets, and oversized island bring all of today's comforts.

Minimum one month stay, please.

The space
Master on main floor has en-suite full bath with tub and separate shower. Living room leads to large deck with outdoor dining. Main dining room leads into modern kitchen. Convenient half bath.

Upstairs there are three bedrooms and two full baths, as well as a sunroom with a workstation and pullout queen. Big laundry room with side-by-side washer-dryer.

Downstairs there's an additional bedroom and full bath. Huge, serene backyard.

Guest access
Grove Park is hands down the nicest neighborhood in Asheville. Walk

name: Tiny Blue Home overlooking Mountains near downtown
description:
Perched on the top of a hill overlooking the Blue Ridge Mountains &Hidden Flower Tiny Farm. A perfect pocket of peace! Feels a million miles away, yet you are only 5 miles to downtown & 4 miles to the parkway. Equipped w/ kitchenette, compost toilet, hot shower, comfy queen bed & gorgeous views. Big picturesque windows & doors overlooking the mountains. Huge double doors opening up to a private deck and mountain stream. Perfect for yoga & relaxing~ Small, Simple, Sweet, Stress-free, Sustainable

The space
This light and airy shipping container is mostly off-grid and great for eco-friendly thinking guests, who will treat this home with love and care. Walkout on the deck and enjoy stunning views, stargazing & lots of wildlife. Enjoy yoga in the morning on the deck next to the mountain stream. Take the weekend and UNPLUG with a great book!

The tiny house has a kitchenette with a mini-fridge, toaster oven, french press coffee maker, cooktop, and all your

name: "BRAND NEW" Retreat in 1898 Montford Victorian!
description:
Beautifully curated studio apartment located in the heart of the Historic Montford area with all the modern conveniences. Featuring a queen bed and a kitchenette with a coffeemaker, toaster oven, microwave, and fridge. Living room with comfortable seating, access to wifi, Netflix, and Amazon. Enjoy a glass of wine on your private patio. Walk to "All Day Darling" for coffee or "Nine Mile" for a Caribbean dinner. A mile from Asheville downtown, Botanical gardens, and breweries. Parking available

The space
This is a completely private apartment, with its own entrance from the back Patio.
The spiral staircase you see in the pictures connects it to the main house with a door that is always locked. There is no access from this door to or from the main house.
For your convenience, please refer to the guidebook for some suggestions that might make your stay in Asheville more fun. ( It can be found under the location map )

We are located half-mil

name: Asheville Farm Stay Yellow Door Suite with Hot Tub
description: Cozy nestled private suite on the farm with horses, chickens and private hot tub.

name: Hidden South AVL Hideaway, close to everything!
description:
Welcome to our mountain home! Get a taste of the true southern experience by traveling down our private gravel road to your perfect home away from home.

Our property feels very secluded and removed from the hustle and bustle of Asheville- but is just a short drive from everything you will need while visiting. We are located 2 miles from the airport, less than a mile to Walmart, and just minutes from many local breweries and shopping plazas that include a large number of restaurants and stores.

The space
Enjoy your own private space including three cozy bedrooms; bathroom; spacious living room with 50" TV, WiFi and Netflix; string-lit deck with a dining set; large backyard; and a kitchenette including a dining table, water cooler, microwave, mini fridge, toaster oven, and coffee maker.

Other things to note
Kitchenette area does not include an oven or sink. There is a water cooler provided for fresh drinking water.

name: Asheville - Sierra Nevada Exit
description:
The comforts of a cozy updated urban home nestled in a safe quiet neighborhood for a retreat feeling in Asheville suburbia.


This house is convenient to all that Asheville has to offer :
-Located just off the Sierra Nevada exit, approximately a $14 Uber ride away.
-12 minutes from Biltmore / Downtown Asheville.
-Around the corner from A/R workshop Arden - great for a girls weekend!
-Breweries / Wineries
-Apple Orchards
-Blue Ridge Parkway
-Hiking and Mountain Biking Trails
-Waterfalls: Sliding Rock, Turtle Back, Looking Glass, etc.
-French Broad River - tubing, kayaking, fishing
-Lake Lure
-Appalachian Trail
-Numerous opportunities for shopping, arts, music, scenic drives and culinary delights
Updated kitchen and baths in 2019 - All new furniture and bedding.


The living room has an open beam ceiling with comfortable couches - turn on the fireplace and chill.

name: Advantageous AVL Home Convenient to Mtns & City
description: Welcome to the Advantageous Asheville Home!  We are on half an acre of quiet peaceful land. Our four bedrooms are spacious and comfortable. The adorable living space is open and allows for a comfortable space to hang out. The kitchen is fully functional and provides a great place to prepare food. We are 15 minutes or less to downtown, the parkway, the mall, and wonderful restaurants. Fiber Optic WiFi is provided for stable internet with smart TVs in the living room and the master bedroom.

name: Modern Farmhouse Retreat Renovated from the 1930’s
description:
Southern Living Interior Designer (My mother) helped with all of the decor and interior touches to this beautiful home. 7 Minutes to downtown! 2 minutes to Ingles and Starbucks! And a view of the mountains with no neighbors adjacent to the property.

The space
Exposed original 1930’s chimney, beautiful custom artwork throughout. Temperpedic pillows on all of the beds, Eddie Bauer blankets, and Amazon Firestick TVs in the house.

Guest access
Free Driveway parking. Fire pit access

name: Brand New Contemporary Home Perfect for Long Term
description:
Located just steps from New Belgium Brewing, the French Broad River and the walkable River Arts District, come and enjoy a brand new construction home built in 2021.

You will relax in a furnished bedroom with memory foam mattress and private bathroom with a shower and tub to yourself! You will have access to the full house.

Restaurants and breweries are plentiful in walking distance such as Wedge Brewing, Smoky Park Supper Club, White Duck Taco, Ultra Coffee Bar and Hole Doughnuts !

The space
The house is brand new and very contemporary. There is a large back deck with a propane grill that you are welcome to use. Lounging by the gas fireplace is always a great way to spend the morning and maybe even pick up the guitar to strum a tune!

Guest access
There is parking for 2 cars in the driveway and plenty of walkable options in the neighborhood for food and breweries.

name: NEW Inventive Asheville Container Home
description:
Come relax with friends and family and explore Asheville from this imaginative shipping container home. This uniquely modern dwelling is sure to inspire a sense of wonder and adventure while providing all the comforts of home. A short five minute drive will land you in the heart of all that Asheville has to offer.

The space
This container built home was designed to feel open and airy and give travelers the sense that they could be anywhere in the world. Custom built-in beds adorn each container and handmade ceramic lighting gives a warm touch.

name: NEW! ‘Oakley Cottage’ - 4 Mi to Blue Ridge Parkway
description:
Escape to the Blue Ridge Mountains and book a stay at the charming 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom vacation rental in Asheville! Take advantage of nearby outdoor attractions and spend your days hiking through the Chimney Rock State Park, shredding the slopes at the Wolf Ridge Ski Resort, or exploring the Blue Ridge Parkway. After, head downtown and enjoy a locally-brewed craft beer. Finish the night back at this cozy cottage relaxing on the private deck with your furry friend by your side!

The space
Free WiFi (50 Mbps) | Dog Friendly w/ Fee | Keyless Entry

Boasting all the essential comforts, this conveniently located cottage is the perfect home base for small families or a group of friends looking to get outdoors and explore the beauty of Asheville!

Bedroom 1: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed

KITCHEN: Fully equipped, cooking basics, drip coffee maker, toaster, knife set, dishware & flatware
MAIN FEATURES: Smart TV w/ cable, 4-perso

name: Azalea Cottage, BOHO chic escape.
description:
Azalea Cottage Retreat has excellent reviews and rates. The place to stay if you want to be near all Asheville has to offer!!
This sweet cottage is newly renovated with 1 bedroom, 1 bath and an open concept eat-in kitchen & living room. The bedroom has a comfy queen-sized bed, the kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need to prepare a large meal or a small snack, the bathroom has a washer/dryer and outside is private paved parking right in front.

name: Style Abounds in this Asheville Charmer
description:
Relax in luxe comfort in our renovated 1965 traditional charmer. Our space boast a fun and quirky style that is Instagram worthy and will be sure to make your vacation memorable. This 2,700 square foot space, boasts two separate living spaces, pool table, fireplace, wifi, and gourmet kitchen. Our neighborhood has access right into the Pisgah Forest and is minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway, French Broad River, and 15 minutes to Downtown. Spend your next vacation in style and comfort!

The space
Our beautiful abode is unique and lovely with a working fireplace, a separate attached mother-in-law space and a gourmet kitchen. Our home has the unique advantage of being close to everything. From shopping less than a mile down the road to access to the French Broad River and the Parkway only two miles away.

Guest access
You have access to the entirety of the home with the exception of the garages and the attic.

Other things to note

name: Bent Creek Beauty featuring a Backyard Pool Oasis
description:
Enjoy the sights and sounds of nature at our newly renovated home in Bent Creek. Moments from the Blue Ridge Parkway and the Arboretum. This 3/2 features a private backyard with an amazing pool area to keep everyone entertained. It will comfortably fit 8 guests. Relax poolside after mountain biking in the neighborhood, hiking on the Parkway, floating down the French Broad River, sightseeing at the Biltmore, or enjoying downtown Asheville restaurants and breweries downtown.

Other things to note
Pool is not heated. We keep it open as long as weather allows which is typically the first week or two in September.

name: New Luxury Condo, Downtown Asheville
description:
Stunning east city views, amazing outdoor space, and gorgeous contemporary design in this new-build, sunny and walkable condo in downtown Asheville. This 3rd floor two-bedroom features 1 King & 1 Queen bedrooms, each with private baths, and a queen sleeper sofa. Access the private, 50-ft wide terrace from the living room in the condo via floor-to-ceiling glass sliding doors. Wake up to peaceful mountain mist and coffee as you plan your day in Asheville. After enjoying what the town and surroundings have to offer, continue your vacation by relaxing in the condo with local art, and a fully-stocked kitchen. You can even catch the mountain sunrise while relaxing in the living room. The unit also provides 1 garage parking space. No detail has been overlooked!
Located on Biltmore Ave in downtown you are central to all that Asheville has to offer: shopping, restaurants, breweries, galleries, and live music venues. One block to Wicked Weed, two blocks to Curate. The Biltmore Estate and t

name: Dogwood Cottage - Perfect couples escape
description: This sweet cottage is newly renovated with 1 bedroom, 1 bath and an open concept eat-in kitchen & living room. The bedroom has a comfy queen-sized bed, the kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need to prepare a large meal or a small snack, the bathroom has a washer/dryer and outside is private parking right beside the unit.

name: Spacious Mountain-View Retreat | Private Hot Tub
description:
Nestled on a gorgeous property with a manicured lawn, this 4BR retreat features a pristine interior with two living areas and a bonus kitchenette with a bar. Take in mountain views from the spacious deck and enjoy soaks in the hot tub. Sleeps 10.

The space
Nestled on a gorgeous property with a manicured lawn, this 4BR/3BA home presents a huge mountain-view deck and a private patio with a large hot tub. An entertainer's dream, the immaculate interior features two living areas -- the lower-level game room features direct access to the hot tub!

This home was newly renovated and completely re-furnished in April 2021.

LIVING AREA

The main-level offers a large living room, kitchen, and dining area, as well as three bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a huge front deck.

Kick back on the plush furniture and watch shows on the smart TV, equipped with cable.

The lower-level game room provides a smart TV with cable, a breakfa

name: "Eastern Sky" - Deck & Mountain Views"
description:
"Welcome to our wonderful home with year round Mountain Views! Our two-level, one bedroom offers a comfortable getaway in a quiet neighborhood conveniently located to shopping and dining. Only minutes to Asheville, and Blue Ridge Parkway. We offer high-speed WIFI, cable, and access to streaming channels via Roku TVs. Plus a well-equipped kitchen for stay-at-home meals. The ultimate place to start your Asheville adventures with lots of extras to make you feel at home!"

The space
"Upstairs offers large bedroom with a king size bed, 2 large closets, desk/work space with amazing 2nd level spectacular views, and full size bath. Living area opens to comfortable wrap-a-round deck for relaxing and grilling. You will experience quite peaceful living with lots of wildlife"

Other things to note
House located at end of street. Very quite and private.

name: New Camper/ Trailer 5 min from Downtown Asheville
description: Come be our guest at the Rigsby house! We are conveniently located 3.2 miles from Downtown Asheville. This is a Small comfortable living space for our guests to enjoy.

name: 5 bdrm historic home, 1 mi to downtown Asheville
description:
The Lion and the Rose is a Bed and Breakfast. It is a romantic pink lady historic home with lush grounds in the heart of Asheville NC's Montford Historic District.

**This listing is for those interested in renting the entire inn and would like the house for just their party.

Steve and Karen are the innkeepers that live on the premises. We can provide daily breakfast but we can also allow you to have your privacy. The choice is yours :)

The space
The Lion and the Rose has two parlors, a large dining room, a large wraparound porch, backyard fire pit, and certified wildlife gardens.

name: Private suite with hot tub on urban farm.
description:
This beautiful private room with hot tub is located in a convenient location five minutes from the airport, ten minutes from the Biltmore estate and fifteen minutes from downtown Asheville. Whether you aim to see the town or hit the trails this location allows you to return from your day, take a cleansing hot shower and slip into the luxurious therapeutic hot tub. The property is a small urban farm and spa, so feel free to take in the flowers, produce and permaculture plots around the property!

Other things to note
Please be aware that a "private room" rental on airbnb does not mean the rest of the house will not be in use. It is my home and to expect me to not be here while you rent the private suite is unreasonable and unrealistic.

name: 2 Bedroom Quiet Urban Oasis; Mid-Century Charm
description:
Come stay in the beautiful Beverly Hills neighborhood! Located across from the 17th fairway of the historic Municipal Golf Course, it is one of the most walkable neighborhoods in Asheville. This spacious 2 bedroom mid-century home is an urban oasis. Sip your coffee amongst the trees and birds on the screened-in deck. There is a well-appointed kitchen should you choose to stay in after exploring the amazing restaurants of Asheville. Quiet neighborhood feel, minutes from the action of downtown.

The space
Enjoy the entire, separate upper level! I live downstairs with my sweet dog, Scout. She is a black lab mix and can be “chatty” sometimes so if you’re here during the day, you may hear occasional barking. She’s a great sleeper so you can count on a quiet night. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or concerns. The backyard is a shared space, Scout loves to sniff and play back there. There is a stairwell that connects the top of the house

name: Multiple Room Rental for Groups of 4-11 People
description:
The entire second floor can be reserved if you are looking for 6-7 rooms. 4 rooms have queen beds and 3 rooms are singles. There are two bathrooms located on the hallway that are shared by all the rooms. This listing is excellent for families and groups that are traveling together. You may have to book well ahead. Contact us for help reserving the floor for your group. There is also one additional new room on the first floor with a queen bed and its own bathroom that can be booked separately.

The space
This is an old hotel from Asheville's early days. It has been updated and re-furnished to modern standards. Note that your group will share the two bathrooms on the second floor. The individual rooms are booking ahead for several months. To reserve the entire floor, please plan well ahead. To see all of the rooms we have, go to this page at (airbnb.com)/users/7625694/listings?user_id=7625694&s=50

Guest access
Asheville's downtown area is vi

name: Vintage inspired haven!
description:
Located in a quiet family neighborhood, walking distance to restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries of West Asheville and just a short drive to downtown Asheville. Very close to the French Broad River Greenway!

Sunny and spacious, with a large sunny deck and a shade porch as well.

Off-street parking, gas stove, and ping-pong table

name: Treehouse-like Hideaway, Walkable West Asheville
description:
Welcome to our upper-level, private entrance guest room. This cozy, clean furnished bedroom and full bath also has a beautiful large, private deck opening up to a tree-house like backdrop of summertime woods. With off-road parking for guests, we are walking distance to Haywood Rd's local restaurants, breweries and shops, while also a greenway bike ride from River Arts District many studio art spaces. It's our goal to be wonderful hosts and share a place we've called home for over 2 decades.

The space
This space offers a comfy queen size bed with with a mini-kitchen island complete with small fridge, microwave, toaster/griddle and coffee (locally roasted) and tea kettle. There is a walk-in closet with ample room for staycay, vacay or to connect with family. Also Covid19 conscious cleaning protocols are implemented between each guest. The vaulted ceiling and spacious deck invite you to either curl up to enjoy natural light or just have a sweet spot to come home to

name: NEW! Mountain Refuge w/ View, 12 Mi to Asheville!
description:
Looking for a place ideally located to all the adventure Asheville has to offer? Nine Peaks Asheville is the perfect vacation rental for couples, families with older children, and reunions. This property features the ability to rent the 5-bedroom house as a whole or choose between the 2-bedroom first floor or the 2-bedroom basement, which includes a third private bedroom space above the garage with access to the game room. Book today to enjoy views of nine mountain peaks on the private decks!

The space
4,600 Sq Ft | Hiking Trail On-Site (< Half Mile Away) | Spacious Deck w/ Lounge Chairs | 2,000 Sq Ft of Porch Space

Find both space for gathering and room to breathe at 'Nine Peaks Asheville,' fit for outdoorsy families, couples' retreats, and friend groups seeking a mountain refuge!

Bedroom 1: King Bed | Bedroom 2: King Bed | Bedroom 3 (Above the Garage): King Bed | Bedroom 4: King Bed | Bedroom 5: King Bed | Additional Sleeping: 2 Queen Slee

name: Grove Park Inn area Paris of the South guest suite
description:
Located in the historic Grove Park neighborhood on one of the most beautiful streets of Asheville, our cottage is 3 blocks from the Grove Park inn, parks & restaurants. Live like a local with your 900 sq feet guest suite on the first level of our house with your private patio entrance. Beside your entrance, the English cut flower garden is yours to enjoy. 2.5 miles to the center of downtown Asheville. The mountains are waiting for you.

The space
You will enjoy your own private patio entrance with over 900 sq feet of guest living in the lower level of the house with natural lighting from french doors and bedroom windows.


The Paris themed suite is a wonderful place to relax after a day of exploring. Amenities include a stocked under-counter refrigerator and beautiful den with a large framed map wall featuring the layout of Paris in the 1600’s.

Asheville has been called “The Paris of the South” with Biltmore Estate, a thriving art scen

name: Private bedroom and bathroom close to downtown.
description: An apartment of 1302 square feet.  No stairs.  Enter on first level and apartment is in rear and becomes second floor.  Parking communal parking lot.  Within 1/2 mile is Patton Avenue, which is the main street through Asheville, which will get you anywhere you want to go.  I have Internet, WIFI and two TV's.  There are so much to see in Asheville, it will make your head spin.  Biltmore House or one of 50 breweries.  The Blue Ridge Mountains or kayaking in French Broad River.

name: East Asheville, Close To Parkway And Near Downtown
description:
A completely remodeled 5 bedroom home in East Asheville (6 miles from Downtown). The space offers, 3 bedrooms, two baths, a full kitchen and living room with a TV on the main level. The master suite is beautifully decorated with a king sized bed, a his and hers closet, TV, and private bathroom. As you head downstairs you will find a second full kitchen and family room with Smart TV perfect for family movies or the big game! The lower level has 2 bedrooms, a full bath and laundry room.

The space
Guests have full access to the entire home and yard. (At this time the garage is not available for guests to use until updates are completed). There is ample off street parking in the driveway and a cozy shaded deck off the front of the home. The neighborhood is very quiet and peaceful with very friendly neighbors.

Guest access
Guests have access to the full home and yard.

name: "Our Place!" Private Guest Suite
description:
“Our Place!" Buncombe County NC, on a Private Road just a couple of miles from I-26, the NC Arboretum, French Broad River, Bent Creek, Blue Ridge Parkway, Breweries, River Arts District, Biltmore Park, Art Galleries, Etc.! Downtown Asheville, Hendersonville & Brevard are a short drive away. After a full day of adventures, enjoy the outdoor fire ring, the birds, the blooms, & the breeze! Lighted on site private parking area/private entrance. Pets welcome w/a $20 flat fee! (2 dog maximum) NO T.V.

The space
Guest suite on a Private Rd. with convenient dedicated and lighted onsite parking and private entrance. Beautifully landscaped grounds with clean lighted pathways, comfortable outdoor seating & fire ring. Additional table & chairs on the covered porch perfect for morning coffee or an evening meal! Queen size bed/sofa bed with upper bunk. Full bath and convenient kitchenette complete with microwave/toaster/fridge/coffee maker and stocked complimentary breakfast it

name: 5 Walnut Suites #201
description:
5 Walnut Suites are located above one of downtown Asheville's favorite haunts, 5 Walnut Wine Bar, an intimate bar featuring an array of wines and local beers. Beyond it’s menu, this bar is also known for friendly bartenders, prime people watching from one of their coveted window seats, and live music.

The space
5 Walnut Suite #201 boasts high ceilings and large windows bathing the space in natural light while exposed brick and wood floors add to the warm environment. Cook meals in a full kitchen with custom island then retire to the seating area featuring a dual coffee/game table to play a couple rounds of chess or backgammon. Other amenities include cozy king size bed, spacious bathroom with shower and bath, plus large walk-in closet with utilities.

name: Nature at your door, Asheville 17 min away
description:
Experience the magic of our home in the mountains, walking distance to Biltmore Lake and 17 minute drive to downtown Asheville' s charming art galleries, architecture, and excellent restaurants.It is perfect for the family vacation. Walk 7 minutes to the lake, playground, basket ball/ tennis courts or hiking trails. Have access to kayak, fishing, swimming or paddle boarding on the the lake. Sandy beach is perfect for a swim. Enjoy Yoga, TV room, office, screened porch, al fresco dining & birds!

The space
Visit the famous Biltmore Estate. The North Carolina Arboretum is 10 minutes from the house! Restaurants, Outlet Shopping and the Blue Ridge Parkway are all within 10 minutes of our house. Local grocery and other amenities 5 minutes drive.
Our home is spacious and comfortable and we trust you will enjoy the possibilities of being in nature while close to the city!

name: RV Deluxe
description:
2018Jayco 25.5REOK, 30' fifth wheel with two push outs and full hookup, parked in a lot, with nearby access to downtown Asheville, and a short distance to surrounding recreational opportunities of Bent Creek, Mills River, Pisgah and DuPont Forests.

The space
Full Kitchen amenities, secure parking just out the door. This is deluxe, compact, trailer life. It has all the amenities and provides a functional opportunity to explore the area.

name: Lg Studio Apt (29 nights required)  Dtwn Asheville
description:
Lovely getaway! Newly remodeled, spacious (1000sq ft), private studio/garden apartment in a lovely old (1905) home in downtown Asheville. Ten foot ceilings, lots of windows and decks, private locked gate and entry to backyard garden area adjacent to the apartment entrance. Off street parking in front of private entrance. Walk to downtown restaurants, breweries and the River Arts District. 4 min drive to hospital 6 min drive to Biltmore Estate. Private outside hot tub.

The space
Beautiful newly added on studio apartment. I built it for my adult children to visit because my upstairs rooms are always booked due to excellent location. Well over budget I decided to rent it and they can catch it in the off times:)

Guest access
Walking or biking is great. Everything is close. Walking distance to downtown restaurants, breweries and the River Arts District. City bus stop two houses down. The bus runs to the airport and other areas downtown. The

name: Biltmore Village Getaway
description: Spacious, newly renovated, historic Biltmore Village condo is perfect for your Asheville and WNC getaway. Located in the heart of Biltmore Village, guests can walk to any one of the many local restaurants, galleries, and boutiques. It's just feet's away from the entrance to the famed Biltmore Estate, a short ride into downtown Asheville or the River Arts District, and conveniently off of the interstate with easy access to the Blue Ridge parkway. This large 2 bedroom and 2 bathroom has a Queen sleeper and queen Murphy Bed allowing 8 people to sleep comfortably.

name: NEW! Mt. Retreat: 3BR House Close to the Biltmore!
description:
Welcome to your mountain retreat! This charming 3BD/2BA house with scenic views of mountain tops is minutes away from downtown Asheville, historic Biltmore Estates, and many other outdoor attractions. The beautiful and comfy furnishings make this home ideal for families or individuals to unwind. It is the perfect location for people who are traveling to relax and appreciate nature or who want to explore the bustling city of Asheville.

The space
This 3BR/2BA will be yours to enjoy! The nicely furnished single-family house can comfortably accommodate up to 6 guests. Read more about each space and included amenities below:

LIVING SPACE
• Cozy couches
• Smart TV with ROKU (no cable, must log in to streaming services)

KITCHEN AND DINING
• Full-sized refrigerator
• Oven, stove
• Coffee maker
• Basic cooking ware, utensils, and dishware

MASTER BEDROOM
• Plush queen-sized mattress
• Clean linens pro

name: 2 Bedroom 1 Bath + RIVER ARTS DISTRICT + Parking
description:
Treat yourself to a mini vacation in this cozy 2-bedroom home, located in west Asheville, only 1.9 miles from the popular River Arts District and 2.4 miles from Downtown Asheville. Flat screen TVs in the Living room and Master bedroom, Netflix, and a covered patio with outdoor string lights! It’s definitely a vibe. Also, quick & easy access to the Famous Biltmore Estate, Interstate 40 and Smokey Parkway.

The space
This home is super cozy and located in the heart of West Asheville. Live like a local!

description: Quiet peaceful country setting, 15 minute drive from downtown Asheville . We grow organic vegetables , medicinal erbs and flowers year round. You'd stay in a safari tent that is large enough to  comfortably fit two queen size mattresses ( 16 foot round  ) It is safe, secluded, with a cross breeze and a breath taking mountain view

name: Heart of the city ideal location, walk anywhere.
description:
Nestled in the heart of downtown Asheville, this condo offers the best location for exploring the city. Restaurants, shopping, breweries are all within an easy walk.

The building has just undergone a complete renovation. The main floor of the building is now home to Highland Brewing, Bun Intended Street Thai Food, Peace Love Taco, Farm Dogs, Buxton Hall Chicken Shack, The Hop Ice Cream, and the Times Coffee Bar. You will not need to travel far to eat amazing food. Bun Intended is my favorite.

The space
Relax in style. Enjoy our big screen TV with cable or our king-sized bed.
We provide you with fresh linens, towels, Nexus shampoo and conditioner, Aveeno body wash. In the kitchen, we stock organic coffee, creamer, and sugar for you.

Guest access
We do not have a dedicated parking spot but there is a city parking deck behind the building. I will send you detailed parking instructions and check-in instructions once a reservati

description:
Welcome to Casa Pine Tops! Enjoy all the comforts of home in our secluded getaway perched overlooking rolling hills, just 8 miles from downtown Asheville.

Start each day with beautiful sunrise views over the mountains from the east-facing porch. Casa Pine Tops is perfect for gatherings with a large open living & kitchen area, back deck with BBQ and fire-pit, plus a spacious downstairs game room. Rest easy on a memory foam mattress in every bedroom.

The space
Upon arrival, step into the spacious living room with 65” smart TV, record player, bluetooth speakers and ample seating for your entire party. The modern and updated kitchen includes dishwasher, double door refrigerator with filtered water and ice machine, plenty of counter space, bar seating and is fully equipped with cooking essentials. The dining table seats 8, next to french doors which open to our back deck with grill, table, chairs and lounge.

All three bedrooms are located on the

description: From the drive you will see stone pillars surrounding the wrap around front porch. Inside, this adorable cottage is completely updated with 1 bedroom, 1 bath, a spacious eat-in kitchen & living room. The living room has a comfy couch with chaise and a 49" HDTV. The bedroom is spacious w/ a comfy king sized bed. The covered wrap around front porch has an outside dining set to relax with a drink after a day of sightseeing complete wit 2 comfy chairs to lounge with coffee or a glass of wine.

description:
Enjoy your retreat at the Highland Traveler Cottage! We’re located in South Asheville’s Arden community, about 20 minutes from downtown. But you don’t even have to wander that far for adventure & entertainment. We’re about 10 minutes from mountain biking at Bent Creek Park, a trip down the river at Zen Tubing, hiking on the Blue Ridge Parkway & shopping at Biltmore Town Square. Feel like a lazy day at home? Relax on our back deck or enjoy the large fire pit & our spacious, nicely landscaped lot.

Guest access
Guests have full access to the main floor and an unfinished basement.

Other things to note
Please note that we require 3 days advance notice for bookings.

description:
Only available for June. And now July!

Come spend some time in this sweet and stylish Carolina Blue house while the owner is away tromping the globe!

It sits on the West side of Asheville in a quiet neighborhood just on the outskirts of town. Convenient to I40, downtown, and outdoor activities.

Just 17 minutes from the airport, 13 minutes (6 miles) to downtown, 15 minutes to Biltmore, 15 minutes to UNCA and 10 minutes to happening Haywood Rd.

The space
Sleeps up to 6 with 2 queen sized beds plus a single daybed and a trifold memory foam floor mattress.

I provide plenty of fresh sheets, towels, blankets, and pillows. As well as coffee, tea and cabinet staples.

For your convenience, you will be able to check yourself in and have access to the full sized washer and dryer, plus a Roku TV in the living room for streaming.

Every time, I will make up the 2 queen sized beds with fresh linens. If you will

name: Cozy Bear Hideaway - South Asheville Retreat
description:
Located in the South Asheville area, the Cozy Bear Hideaway is a 700 sq. ft. bright and airy retreat with 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom. Every inch of this newly renovated basement space was designed with your comfort in mind. Equipped with a small kitchenette, desk area, coffee bar, cozy beds, and ample storage. Each bedroom and the living room have their own smart TV. Conveniently located 9 mins from the AVL airport, 18 mins from downtown Asheville, and 20 mins from downtown Hendersonville.

Other things to note
We live on the first floor above the basement, so you may hear some footsteps (or pawsteps) from time to time.

The heating and air is shared with the upstairs where we live. There are no thermostat controls in the unit. We try to keep it as comfortable as possible. There are fans in each bedroom and there are also space heaters provided in each bedroom and the living room.

We also have a dog upstairs who occasionally barks when he hea

name: The heart of West Asheville.
description:
Brand new home in the heart of west Asheville.

The space
Brand new home in the heart of west Asheville. Sunny point for breakfast, tastee Diner for breakfast, battle cat for coffee, Westville bakery for coffee and pastries, Westville pub for a bar food or drinks, the Admiral for fancy stuff, the hop ice cream, the universal joint for burgers and such, 9 Mile for curry and Jamaican food and, Rocky’s Hot Chicken fried chicken, and the oyster House for food and beer.

Guest access
The whole house and balcony.

name: Cozy South Asheville Home in Quiet Neighborhood
description:
This South Asheville neighbor is called Royal Pines and is known for its lush vegetation and abundant trees. Plenty of quiet time in the neighborhood to relax, yet within 10 minutes drive you find yourself in the hustle and bustle of Asheville! Plenty of good grocery stores nearby, this location is truly hard to beat.

The space
Warm and inviting single family home, perfect for a family or small group getaway! Brand new appliances in the kitchen and all beds and furniture are also brand new. Beautiful outside space with a fire pit and a great location close to all that Asheville has to offer. Enjoy!!

description:
Cozy get away in the historic Montford neighborhood. Walk to 1.5 miles to downtown, UNCA, botanical gardens. Very convenient to River Arts District and West Asheville is a short drive away. Enjoy private lower level suite of home with private back deck with gas fire pit. Guests receive remote check-in instructions to use phone as key, or can have secure pass-code entrance. No physical key. Open area studio consisting of queen bed, sitting area w futon, kitchenette, and a private bathroom.

The space
Private lower level of home with separate entrance and convent phone enabled “August Lock” access, or keypad entry w secure code. No physical keys. Space has elevated private, covered deck with gas fire pit and a private patio with chaise chairs for relaxing.

Kitchenette with generous fridge, coffee maker and microwave. Bathroom with shower and tub. 55” flatscreen Smart TV and guest WIFI.

Single cup “pod” coffee maker provided.

description:
Cozy mountain retreat, nestled on a beautifully landscaped wooded 1.5 acre lot. Situated 2 miles from the entrance of the Blue Ridge Pkwy, and within 5 miles of Asheville city life. This mountain home has everything you need to enjoy your stay. Recently updated master suite, new carpet upstairs bedrooms. Fully stocked kitchen, eat in breakfast nook w/ Norwegian gas fire place. Wood burning fireplace in family room and large wrap around porch complete with gas grill and hot tub!

The space
F

description:
The Black Bear Bungalow is Airbnb as it was meant to be. A cute little house in the foothills of the Blue Ridge Parkway that is well loved and lived in. The Black Bear Bungalow is home to the owners when they aren't traveling, but when they are it's your home away from home to explore mother nature at its finest. Located less than 10 minutes from downtown Asheville with access to the Mountain-to-Sea trail less than quarter of a mile away.

The space
The Black Bear Bungalow is a cozy 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom house. The front bedroom called the Honey Hollow room is equipped with a brand-new queen bed, closet with hangers and space heater/fan and Wi-Fi connected TV with all your favorite apps. The middle bedroom called the Wanderer has two separate twin beds, closet with hangers and space heater/ fan and Wi-Fi connected TV as well. The master bedroom is in the back of the house away from the hustle and bustle of the common areas. It has a brand-new queen bed, bench and

name: Private apartment in South Asheville
description: Recently remodled one bedroom lockoff apartment in walk out lower level with private entrance and parking.  Full kitchen, Washer/dryer, hot tub, pool table and ping-pong.  Beautiful wooded lot with amazing landscape 15 min south of downtown Asheville, 20 min to Hendersonville.  World class mountain biking, fishing, hiking, white water rafting all within striking distance.  10 min drive to the Blue Ridge Pkwy, 15 min to Bent Creek, 25 min to Pisgah Forest, 35 min to Dupont forest.

description:
Enjoy the convenience of being just 2.5 miles from both the heart of downtown and West Asheville while delighting in the suburban comforts of a fenced in backyard, garden beds, morning birdsong, evening crickets and spring peepers, and salt water swimming pool access.

The space
Whole house

Guest access
Whole house

Other things to note
We have a fenced in yard and accept dogs but ask that guests strictly keep them off the furniture. Unfortunately we cannot accept cats due to severe allergies in the family. Thanks for understanding!

description:
This is the downstairs of a brand new green built duplex, on the future Woodfin greenway which will connect with the French Broad River recreational area. It can accommodate up to 4 guests. There is 1 bedroom with a queen size bed and a queen size murphy bed in the living area that can be made private with a room divider curtain. We are right off of 19/23 and Interstate 26, 5 minutes to downtown Asheville and 5 minutes to Weaverville.

Guest access
there is a large parking area at the rear of the building

description:
Our second story apartment features huge windows that let in the breeze, the sunshine, and the mountain air! Nestled in a quiet neighborhood and set back from the road, our apartment is very peaceful and secure. Enjoy a huge king size bed, a large living room with queen size pull-out couch, a full kitchen, and a full bathroom. All of this less than 10 minutes from Downtown Asheville!

The space
Our apartment was specifically crafted with out of town guests in mind. This 800 square foot space sits atop our detached garage and is adjacent to our year round home. Built in 2017 this apartment features everything we like to have when we travel: a full kitchen, private onsite laundry, a king size bed, big windows that open (don't you hate staying in hotels where the windows don't open!). We live in a tight knit neighborhood so there are other homes close by. That said, we are set back from the street and the apartment has a very private feel. Private, keypad entrance wi

description:
Our home has been completely renovated to be a serene getaway in the mountains just minutes from downtown, west Asheville and the Biltmore.

Tucked away in an intimate country setting our home features 3 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms. The open layout is perfect for gathering with friends and family. The kitchen is fully equipped and the living area includes lounge spaces.

We have fast and secure WIFI along with comfortable desk spaces. Need to relax? Enjoy Netflix, HBO, and Prime video channels.

The space
Location:

Located just 15 minutes from the Biltmore Estate (largest mansion in America) and West Asheville - known for local shops, yummy eateries, breweries, music venues and coffee shops.

Just 20 minutes to downtown Asheville - lots of shopping, restaurants, and a true Asheville-style drum circle every Friday night.

Greet the morning with sounds of roosters in the distance, and birdsongs throughout the day.

description:
Blue Cottage west feels like a remote cabin but is a short 10 minute drive to the heart of West Asheville/Haywood Rd., and 15 minutes to Downtown.

The home has a wrap around deck and large yard with fire pit for enjoying the surrounding nature.

Inside, you'll feel that cozy, "lived-in" kind of vibe with a wood burning fireplace and a large kitchen with stainless steel appliances and all the kitchen tools necessary to make this place feel like home.

The space
Depending on the route you take to arrive at Blue Cottage West, you may pass through very diverse and safe neighborhoods consisting of locals, farmers, trailer parks, or small family owned businesses.

Upon arriving at the Blue Cottage you will enter the home through the living room, which has a large sofa and loveseat - perfect for lounging after a long day of exploring all that Asheville has to offer. The living room hosts a decorative wood burning fireplace, large smart TV

description: Luxury suite with hot tub located on the farm.  This unique space is private and serene.  Horses, chickens and donkeys right outside your window.

description:

Our home is in its own little cove surrounded by lush greenery, trees, and wildlife and sits on 1.5+ acres. Our little mountain oasis has all you need for a 5-star vacation and just 15 mins from downtown Asheville. Our home is a safe space where all are welcome!

The space
The studio suite features a brand new memory foam king bed, kitchenette which has a mini-fridge, microwave, and coffee maker, full en-suite bathroom, flat-screen TV and mountain views! Enjoy your morning coffee on the private deck and listen to the birds chirp. Take a dip in the hot tub and soak under the evening stars. Have a meal surrounded by the trees on the outdoor deck, or sit by the fire-pit. Make sure to watch for regular evening firefly shows in the summer! description:

This tiny home is located in a gated private compound & has many conveniences in anticipation of your stay such as a private entrance, wifi, TV w/ chromecast, shampoo, conditioner, toothpaste, ac & heat, pots & pans for the chefs at heart. If you want to reconnect with nature, there is a hiking trail that is a whopping 2 minute drive from this home. Don't believe me? Rent it & see for yourself!

Bedroom furniture has hidden drawers above normal drawers for valuable items. But not lockable.

First-aid kit in cabinet above refrigerator.

Coffee table is a lift-top for work space. A

name: Clean & cozy basement apartment in West Asheville
description:
Located near the heart of West Asheville, we would absolutely love to host you and your guest in our clean and cozy basement apartment! We’re an enjoyable ten minute walk (or one minute drive) to Haywood Road, which is famous for its many eateries, cafes and boutiques.

The space
Though smack in the middle of Asheville, our house backs right up to a wonderfully-natural setting; an undeveloped gulley of sorts that feels like its own forest. Need a bit of nature in your life? Check out the view from your kitchen window and enjoy the sights and sounds of swaying trees, or step outside on the deck and get an even better view.

The kitchenette features a microwave, coffee maker, mini fridge and toaster oven. There is *no* stove or oven due to some rather silly restrictions they place on AirBNBS in Asheville-proper, but with this being the foodie haven that it is, you won’t have any issue staying full in this city.

Important note: We are a family

description:

Over 80 acres of wooded walking trails just a few blocks from the front door. The botanical gardens and Saturday Farmers Market are just a few blocks away.

Wake up to an incredible view of Pisgah Mountain.

BE ADVISED: We as host are not responsible for animals damaging your vehicles during your stay. Please use the fire ring or pit at your own risk. (Watch children, make sure fire is out, and DO NOT add any fire accelerant!) this is done at your own risk.
