name: Cozy Asheville Treehouse Chalet 1 Mi to Downtown
description:
Less than 1 mile from central downtown Asheville yet high up in the trees on Beaucatcher Mountain, this cozy vacation chalet is exactly where you want to be . If you wish to leave your car, it's just a few minutes and few dollars via Uber to downtown with all it's attractions, food and entertainment. Relax in our 1BR chalet complete with open air porch and all the comforts of home. This lovely, private space is a great base to explore everything the NC mountains have to offer!

The space
You'll love this cozy little chalet which lives a lot larger than its size. All the comforts of home in a small package! Enjoy the mountain air on the wraparound porch. Its a perfect spot to relax with a cup of coffee or a glass of wine. Inside we have internet, a TV in the living room and bedroom and a fully equipped kitchen. During colder months, there's a gas fireplace to warm up by.

Guest access
Parking is tight, but right near the chalet. It's a

name: Beautiful South Slope Townhome with Private Elevator and EV Charger
description:
Stunning southside city views, amazing outdoor space, and gorgeous contemporary design in this new-build, sunny and walkable condo in downtown south slope Asheville. This 3-bedroom features 2 king bedrooms, and the 3rd bedroom has a bunk- bed with full size beds in each bunk. Wake up to peaceful mountain mist and coffee as you plan your day in Asheville. After enjoying what the town and surroundings have to offer, continue your vacation by relaxing in the townhome with private elevator, and a fully-stocked kitchen. You can even catch the mountain sunrise while relaxing in the living room. The unit also provides 1 garage parking space and 1 dedicated parking space behind the townhome. The garage features a high powered electric vehicle charger (for Tesla or any other car - type SAE J1772). No detail has been overlooked!
Located in the South Slope Brewery District and walkable to shopping, restaurants, breweries, galleries, and live music venues. The Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ri

name: Natural Beauty*Privacy*Close to all Attractions
description:
Enjoy a wonderful home base in Asheville.
The furnished suite includes a large bedroom, full bath, spacious living room, kitchenette, and a private furnished deck. Living space is all on one level...no steps to maneuver from parking to entry.
You will be in a peaceful, pleasant, area surrounded by natural beauty and still only minutes from downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, many attractions, and lots of outdoor fun.
Need a second bedroom/office? See http://airbnb.com/h/2brjustright .

The space
The bright and spacious one-bedroom suite of rooms is available only to you. It has its own deck that looks out onto seven acres of woodland. Your space is very private with it’s own separate entrance and parking space. It is within easy range of all the activities of Asheville and also a great place to rest, get some work done, or just hang out to enjoy the peace and quiet.

Guest access
The common elements of the community (pool

name: Gusty Winds 17
description:
The entire house is yours! Enjoy your Asheville getaway, just 10 minutes from Downtown Asheville, and 8 minutes from entrance to the Biltmore House.
You will get plenty of peace and quiet, off of the main road with top notch landscaping and a large deck with a gas grill. Fully stocked kitchen, TVs in all bedrooms. Wi-fi, Spectrum service for TVs. Alarm service for fire and police.
Unfortunately we cannot allow pets. One of the hosts is highly allergic to pet hair and dander.

The space
Single level home has a wide open floor plan, combining the kitchen, living room and dining room. There are steps leading up the front door, and a few coming off the back deck. Comfortable beds, large closets, and washer and dryer.

Guest access
Private gravel road with 2 other homes. Concrete pad parking for 3-4 cars.

Other things to note
Location is in the Oakley neighborhood, which is on the east side of Asheville.

name: Asheville Farm Stay Red Door with Hot Tub
description: This one bedroom suite is located on a farm with serene views with your own personal hot tub.  Relax in this cozy home with the views of horses and chickens, just outside your bay window. Soak in the hot tub surrounded by horses.

name: NEW! Hidden Gem - 8 mins to downtown Asheville
description: Quiet 3 bedroom, 2 bath home close to everything Asheville but tucked away in nature to give you privacy and a chance to experience the abundance of birds and nature.

name: Canvas Tent #2 @Baying Hound Campground
description:
This canvas tent is in the quirky and uniquely “Asheville” Baying Hound Campground. You’ll get a queen-size bed (with sheets & pillows) and 2 chairs in your tent. Take a look at the surroundings because this isn’t a spot for light sleepers or folks craving seclusion. Great for the social camper who doesn’t want to lug around camping gear! You've got prime access to our indoor bathroom and outdoor solar shower, plus access to a fire pit that’s shared only with other canvas tent campers.

The space
CANVAS TENT
This is our newest addition to the Baying Hound Campground and it's still in the experimental mode. Is it glamping? Nope. Is it a sweet camping set up? You bet. Is it one of the closest-to-downtown, most wallet-friendly options in Asheville that captures that "Asheville" flavor? Heck yeah.

THE CAMPGROUND
The Baying Hound Campground is where rural Appalachia meets “keep Asheville weird.” You’ll see sleeping pods decorated by professional ar

name: NEW! Picturesque Arden Home - 4 Mi to Lake Julian!
description:
Just south of Asheville, on the cusp of Pisgah National Forest, this cozy and rustic vacation rental is the ideal home base for your outdoor adventures! Escape for the day to the shores of Lake Julian, take a tour of the famous Biltmore Estate, or take a trip into Asheville for shopping, dining, and sightseeing. Bring the family and enjoy the spacious fenced yard, fire pit, and amazing forest views from the private deck! This 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom house is your new home-away-from-home!

The space
1,148 Sq Ft | Surrounding Forest Views | 14 Miles to Downtown Asheville

Whether you want to tour all the breweries in Asheville or simply explore the forest with family and friends, this lovely vacation home will be waiting for you at the end of the day!

Bedroom 1: King Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3: Queen Bed

OUTDOOR LIVING: Deck, balcony, fire pit, outdoor seating, fenced yard
INDOOR LIVING: Smart TVs w/ cable/satellite, fi

name: Nell's House - 2 Bedroom. Minutes from downtown.
description:
Residential home allows easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base. Two miles to the center of downtown Asheville. Five miles to Biltmore Estate entrance. Cab/Lyft allows for visits to downtown for shops, music, art, breweries, festivals, not to mention the multitude of great restaurants! Day trips for hiking, biking, waterfalls, or soaking up the scenery of the Blue Ridge Parkway are made simple with highway access around the corner.

The space
Ranch home in residential neighborhood.

Guest access
Driveway parking easily accommodates 2 vehicles

Other things to note
Make yourself at home in the living room and kitchen.

name: !!Spectacular Views, Modern Luxury, 5min to DwnTwn
description:
RELAX & REJUVENATE!
Gorgeous Luxury Retreat for 2 ppl or a family/group
*SPACIOUS modern gem nestled in nature, overlooks treetops
*LOCATION
- 5 min to Downtown
- 5 min to Grove Park Inn
- 10 min or less to River Arts District, Biltmore & best breweries/restaurants

*3rd room/office w twin bed + mat
*Dramatic views
*Ridge trails from front door
*STUNNING Shangri-La Suite w/ plush king bed will delight you!
*Huge deck: yoga, sunbathe, gather, sip, refresh

Longer stay? DM for Spcl rates!

The space
You and your loved ones are invited to a luxurious stay in beautiful Asheville where you can relax and create precious memories.
From world-class food to glorious waterfall hikes to micro-breweries, it’s a joy to guide you to all the best this area has to offer.

We love beauty!
We are excited to share our unique home with you, especially the oversized master suite with its s

name: Modern and stylish space, walk to W AVL!
description:
A leisurely, 10-minute walk to Haywood Road or a 5-minute easy walk to Patton Ave, this cozy, modern space is perfect to serve as your base for Asheville-area adventures. An Amazon Fire TV, king-sized bed, Keurig, toaster oven, fridge, microwave, dishes, and more make this your perfect short-term landing!

The space
The space is private and cozy with new, comfortable, modern, and stylish furniture and decorations. The couch folds out into a sleepable futon. We also offer an elevated queen air mattress, which fits in the living room area.

Take a relaxing bath or shower in the tiled tub. With an instant hot water heater, you'll never run out of hot water!

The bedroom's king bed is comfortable, firm, and supportive with several pillow options. A custom table and beautiful side-lamp let you relax into the evening. There are extra pillows and blankets in the bedroom closet.

All windows have black-out curtains. The heating/air-condition

name: Tranquil & Teal West Asheville home
description:
Looking for a peaceful retreat after exploring Asheville? Look no further! This house is set back from the road and it’s surrounded by trees. Every window and greets you with greenery. Only five minutes from walk or West Asheville and 10 minutes from downtown but feels further away.Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway.

The space
The whole place and yard is yours to explore and unwind. A great home base, conveniently located to all parts of Asheville

Guest access
The place and yard is all yours

name: Sweet Bungalow With Cozy Cabana
description:
Perfect mix of tucked away with easy access to everything. Come stay at our 2 bedroom bungalow and cozy outdoor patio experience with a sunset cabana and grill. A stones throw from Asheville's Rocky's Hot Chicken Shack and 12 Bones Smokehouse South, 10 minutes to the airport, 15 minutes to Biltmore Village, 20 minutes to downtown, 20 minutes to River Arts District. Great parking. A peaceful retreat after a day in the city, an outing on the trails, or seeing the sites. We can't wait to host!

The space
Red brick home, livable outdoor patio space with grill, 2 bedrooms (queen & twin trundle) with dressers, closets, hangars, large living area with 7 foot couch and table for 4, 1 full bath, full kitchen amenities, washer and dryer, ironing board/iron, hair dryer, smart TV, sound bar, printer, spacious backyard, hammock and parking.

Guest access
Quiet residential neighborhood with uncovered parking for 3 cars. Single family home. No shared spaces

name: NEW! - Private getaway near the Biltmore Estate
description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally located walk out basement stay in the charming neighborhood of Oakley in Asheville.

Less than 5 mins to the Biltmore Estate and historic Biltmore Village, 7 mins to downtown Asheville, and 7 mins to the River Arts District.

Close to amazing breweries, shopping, and restaurants.

The suite is private. Y’all may see/hear us and our dogs/cat coming and going. Feel free to say hi or just keep on doing your thing!

Safe space. All are welcome!

The space
Entire walk out basement suite with living area, two bedrooms, and bathroom. Smart TVs with access to streaming services.

Guests will have access to Keurig coffee maker, mini fridge, and microwave.

Enjoy a cup of coffee on a cozy outdoor patio space with table and chairs!

Other things to note
You may see/hear some construction noise in the neighborhood Monday-Friday between 8am-5pm.

name: Sweet Bungalow 8 Minutes from Downtown Asheville
description:
Brand new on Airbnb! Beautiful 2 bedroom, 2 1/2 bathroom newly renovated Bungalow 8 minutes to downtown Asheville and popular River Arts District. Modern furnishings and decor with 55” spectrum cable TV in living room and cool electric fireplace. Gorgeous and spacious kitchen is fully equipped for the chefs in your group! 1st bedroom has king bed with private bathroom with walk-in shower and a private deck. 2nd bedroom has new queen bed and private bathroom with tub/shower combo.

The space
Cute, cozy and comfortable bungalow so close to everything Asheville and surrounding areas - Downtown and Southslope Asheville, River Arts District, Biltmore Estate and sweet small town Weaverville. Plenty of attention to detail in the house and loaded with conveniences. Smart TVs with Cable with local channels and HBO in Living Room and both Bedrooms. Chargers for your phone and personal devices in every bedroom and living room. Multiple porch sitting areas and n

name: The Lions Den  Garden Apartment
description:
Location...Location...Location...

The Lions Den and Garden Apartment at 2,500 ft. elevation faces East and provides uninterrupted long range views of Sunset Mountain, home of the famous Grove Park Inn and the Blue Ridge Mountains.
If you are fond of sunrises, then plan to have your coffee and enjoy spectacular sunrises without leaving the Lions Den or your apartment.
The outdoor courtyard is a perfect place to experience "Sky City" at night.

The space
Apartment was completed May of 2021.
Kitchen is 10 x10. It has a pass through window to the outside courtyard/patio. A door connects it to the living area.

Living area is approximately 500 sq. ft. It includes a dining nook & living room with computer work area. Large windows provide lots of natural light. Glass french doors open onto the courtyard and the Lions Den. The sleeping area is separated from the living room with 2 sets of double wood louvered doo

name: *sweet little cottage on the north side
description:
Welcome to Woodfin! Our home is conveniently located on the north side of Asheville-- just a hop and a skip to the River Arts district, the Blue Ridge Parkway, Beaver Lake, and downtown Asheville. Avery's park is a short walk, and the Craggy Mountain RR Line is just down the road. Our neighborhood is warm and welcoming, and so is our pet-friendly home, which was built as one of Woodfin's local mill houses in the 1920's. You'll find a clean, restful vibe with a lot of love in the walls.

The space
Our back yard is fenced, with a dog ramp for access from the back deck. There's a chicken coop on the property--no chickens, though--they flew the coop a long time ago! The master bedroom has an attached bath/shower, and the second bedroom has twin beds. The main bathroom features a claw-foot tub. The floor plan for the main part of the home is open with a flow between the family room, dining room, kitchen, and mudroom. The flooring is hardwood and tile, and t

name: Stunning Gem in the Heart of Asheville
description: In the heart of the historic Montford neighborhood, this picturesque detached carriage house is tucked away behind our 1897 Queen Anne Victorian home, previously operating as the Bed of Roses Bed & Breakfast. Make yourself at home with your own private entrance, private parking, fast WiFi, a 50" TV w/ Netflix and Disney+, and full use of our serene outdoor garden, complete with hammock and comfy patio furniture. Perfect for couples or solo travelers. A mere 10 min walk to downtown Asheville.

name: The Urban Cottage - Chic West Asheville Home
description:
Bright, private 1 bd/1 ba home set in highly desirable W. Asheville, minutes walk to Haywood Rd restaurants & breweries. This modern, cozy cottage features open plan living space, areas for eating, working & relaxing. Kitchen is fully equipped & includes dishwasher, microwave etc. Enjoy Smart TV, Wifi, A/C, private porch, Washer and drier. Secluded backyard edged with trees plus a fire pit feels far away from the city but infact whatever you need is right on your doorstep- literally.

The space
The Urban Cottage is newly built, spotlessly clean and filled with conveniences to make your stay easy and comfortable. The space is open plan with separate areas for cooking, dining, working and relaxing. There is a separate bedroom with a luxourious queen bed with plenty of pillows, closet and dresser for your clothes and storage. The kitchen is equipped with everything you need to prepare food at home: dishes, wine glasses, pots &pans, coffee machine, microwave, fridge

name: Spacious Modern Getaway 10 Minutes From Downtown!
description: Welcome to your next Asheville vacation getaway! This beautiful modern getaway is located in West Asheville and is close to everything Asheville has to offer. Located less than 10 minutes away from Downtown and the River Arts District makes it convenient for you to visit our famous breweries, and local restaurants. This house is within 15 minutes of virtually everything Asheville has to offer. We look forward to hosting a comfortable stay for you here in Asheville

name: Highland Hideaway
description:
The space
Discover urban serenity with a stay at Highland Hideaway, a gorgeous contemporary home where mountains, comfort, and convenience come together! Highland Hideaway is situated on a two-acre wooded oasis in a central location just east of downtown Asheville - close enough to have food delivered or to call an Uber for a night out. You'll discover a quiet mountainside community in Chunns Cove with easy access to the interstate and city amenities. The kitchen is fully equipped for homestyle cooking, and the separate dining room offers a place to sit down and enjoy time with friends and family. Take advantage of the excellent mountain weather with a long sit on the front deck, where special glass balusters on the railing allow for a better view! For a sound night's sleep there are three bedrooms on the upper level, all with vaulted ceilings, including the spacious main suite. This vacation rental home is pet-friendly - even the family dog will be begging to come back to

name: Beautiful South Slope Townhome with Private Elevator
description:
Stunning southside city views, amazing outdoor space, and gorgeous contemporary design in this new-build, sunny and walkable condo in downtown south slope Asheville. This 3-bedroom townhome features 3 king bedrooms.
​​​​​​​ Wake up to peaceful mountain mist and coffee as you plan your day in Asheville. After enjoying what the town and surroundings have to offer, continue your vacation by relaxing in the townhome with private elevator, and a fully-stocked kitchen. You can even catch the mountain sunrise while relaxing in the living room. The unit also provides 1 garage parking space and 1 dedicated parking space behind the townhome. No detail has been overlooked!
Located in the South Slope Brewery District and walkable to shopping, restaurants, breweries, galleries, and live music venues. The Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway are also just a short drive away--this location is hard to beat. Convenience, luxury, comfort, and an always-available staff provide our guests

name: Family-friendly poolside mountain home
description:
Easy living awaits. Relax with the whole family (pets too!) at this 5-bedroom home nestled in the mountains of east Asheville. Have fun in the huge 38-ft, heated-saltwater pool complete with water slide and diving board. Lounge on the patio, enjoy a meal from the deck or go hiking right outside your door. When you are ready to venture out, downtown Asheville is less than 10 miles away. Super family friendly: swing set, deck slide & lots of yard. Private master bedroom and bath on 2nd level.

The space
This 3 level home has 5 bedrooms. The main bedroom with en suite bath is on the top floor on it's own. The main floor has two bedrooms, a full kitchen, dining area, living room and laundry room. The lower level is a finished walkout basement complete with living and dining area, 2 bedrooms and another full kitchen.

Pool closes for the season on October 1st.

There are 4 private entrances: the front door, a side door by the driveway, a side door

name: *NEW*Creekside Vista|15min to DT&Biltmore|Sleeps4
description:
A comfortable and convenient townhouse with easy access to West Asheville, Downtown Asheville, River Arts District, and so much more! Bring the family and explore Asheville like a local.

The space
You’ve planned an Asheville weekend filled with scenic hikes, incredible eats, and the world’s greatest brewery hop, but have you thought about where you’re going to kick back and relax after all that hustle?

Take a vacation from your vacation at our quiet home just 10 minutes from busy downtown, Biltmore Estate, and West Asheville. Why deal with cramped hotel rooms or haul up all that camping gear when you can find a spot that feels just like home? Our home comfortably sleeps 4 with several private rooms that offer plenty of space to unwind. Clean linens are always provided.

Guest access
You will have the townhouse all to yourself to relax and enjoy Asheville! There are 2 bedrooms each equipped with a queen bed, nightstands, dress

name: East Asheville Cottage -Mountain View
description:
New home hosted by experienced Airbnb hosts. Custom home has hardwood and tile floors, granite counter tops, all new appliances. Enjoy all the area has to offer like Blue Ridge Parkway & Folk Arts Center(5 min)Biltmore Estate(10 min) downtown Asheville (10 min). Take a hike, explore history, gawk at breathtaking scenery, savor fine meals and beverages, then relax on one of our three covered porches to plan your next day in Asheville.

The space
Newly constructed (2021) home in rural area. Home has hardwood floors granite counter tops, new appliances. Bedroom linens are Egyptian cotton. Master bath has sunrise shower. Enjoy birdwatching and seeing other wild life from one of three porches.

Guest access
Relax in the spacious great room with vaulted ceilings or on any one of three covered porches - Front porch boasts south-facing view of Swannanoa mountain range; side porch has fireplace and hammock; back porch near guest room faces wooded

name: The Red Maple Getaway
description:
The Red Maple Getaway; your Asheville escape from the everyday grind, with immersion into the calming reality of life in the mountains!
A fully renovated and updated mountain home, set amidst the splendor for the surrounding Blue Ridge Mountains, while also being extremely close to Asheville, and convenient to everything this wonderful tourist area offers. The home affords privacy and views of a mountaintop in the distance.
Whether you intend to simply relax, get out and experience mountain biking, hiking trails, whitewater kayaking, or just sampling some of the famous Asheville area breweries; you will find everything you are looking for and more at The Red Maple Getaway.
Come create your own experiences and memories for family and friends to last a lifetime!

The space
The Red Maple Getaway; your Asheville escape from the everyday grind, with immersion into the calming reality of life in the mountains!
A fully renovated and updated mountai

name: Trails End Retreat in Asheville
description:
Come experience the feel of a majestically cozy, modern and contemporary mountain home, and soak in the true high-end luxury and grandeur that is Trails End Retreat.
Set privately at the end of a wooded street, directly bordering the Pisgah National Forest; Trails End Retreat offers a truly spectacular and unique Blue Ridge Mountain vacation experience. This modern home offers extraordinary, upscale craftsmanship, unique amenities, and custom details epitomizing relaxed luxury and majestic nature, highlighted by the backdrop of the French Broad River, Bent Creek, a virtual wooded estate engulfed by the Pisgah National Forest; all creating your own private paradise.

The space
Come experience the feel of a majestically cozy, modern and contemporary mountain home, and soak in the true high-end luxury and grandeur that is Trails End Retreat.
Set privately at the end of a wooded street, directly bordering the Pisgah National Forest; Trails End Retreat offers

name: Beautiful and Convenient Townhome
description: Beautiful, Clean and Convenient new listing in Fletcher.  2 Bedroom 1.5 bath duplex unit is located very conveniently between Asheville and Hendersonville so you can experience the best that both communities has to offer; music, arts and crafts, hiking, fishing, great restaurants & craft breweries, also a short drive from the Asheville Regional airport.  At the end of each day, you can grill out and relax on the back porch or prepare your family's favorites in the well equipped Kitchen.

description:
We live in a bustling neighborhood by River Arts District with a brand new GreenWay! Walk or easy drive to coffee, pizza, tacos, donuts, beer, and river access! Our home is above New Belgium Brewery, 1.5mi from downtown, 8m drive to Biltmore, 10m drive to Grove Park Inn.

Your space is completely private. Enjoy a private entrance to your studio suite with living room, dining area, bedroom, bathroom, and deck.

The space
All brand new, open floor plan with new Tempurpedic Mattress, large bathroom, and modern decor.

Our neighbors are all amazing and friendly, we ask that you show them the same great respect they have always shown us.

Guest access
Parking for 1 Guest Car in our driveway (shared with us, but we can fit your car).

Free Street Parking is available on the opposite side of the street only- do not
park on on our side of the street.

There are steps to get to your private entrance,

name: Entire,elegant home 10 minutes to AvL, Biltmore
description:
Have fun with the whole family at this stylish place.

The space
House contains 3 floors and tons of privacy. The entire property is included in the rental fee. The second or main floor includes a living room with a gas fireplace, dining area, kitchen, half bath and balcony. The first floor includes a large suite, private bathroom and dedicated work space. The 3rd floor includes three bedrooms, including master suite with private bath. A jack and Jill bathroom connects the additional two bedrooms. Laundry is located on the third floor for convenience. Large back yard and patio area. Enclosed fence for pups is located on the side of the house with access from both the front porch and the backyard and patio.

Guest access
All

name: River Arts District "Treehouse" (monthly)
description:
Need a place for a month or more? Why stay at an expensive and small hotel room?!

Location, location, location! This green-certified, 3-story house is on a quiet street with little traffic but within a short walk to downtown Asheville, the River Arts District, and the French Broad river greenway. 6 mins drive to Mission Hospital and 8 mins to UNCA. Eat, drink, shop, and explore all within a short walk!

The space
1100sqft, green certified, smart lighting with Phillips Hue, Roku for Netflix/Hulu/Prime/etc. Fiber internet with 360mbps up/down and robust WiFi which covers the entire property. The upper loft bedroom has TONS of natural light, especially with the barn doors open. The lower bedroom works great as an office (with adjustable height desk) or an additional bedroom (using the futon). The hammock chair and wisteria-covered swinging bench in the back yard make for nice spots to watch the fireflies in summer. The back porch dining table is a great s

name: West Asheville Peaceful Oasis w/ Private Entrance
description:
Peacefully tucked away near West Asheville. After a day of exploring all Asheville has to offer, kick back and relax at our quiet suite. Come and go as you please with the private entrance. Enjoy the intimate, lighted deck, luxury king bed, movie projector, and coffee + amenities. You will be less than 10 min from the heart of super hip West Asheville and less than 15 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway and Downtown.
Note: one dog is allowed for no extra fee.

The space
We've included all the amenities we'd want to see for our perfect Asheville getaway, including:
*Private entrance
*King size bed
*Private deck with small grill
*Movie projector with Roku (Hulu, Netflix, Prime Video) and DVDs... and of course popcorn!
*Coffee + instant oatmeal
*Mini fridge, microwave, toaster oven
*Walk in shower + toiletries

Our Space is best suited for 1-2 travelers, however we have a convertible chair that pulls out into a twin bed

name: Modern home w/mountain views (4 miles to downtown)
description:
Relax and unwind with the whole family or friends in our new modern home nestled in the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Sit out on the spacious deck to watch the sunset and view the gorgeous mountains, or sit by the fire pit and enjoy the sounds of the birds and sometimes turkeys. Within walking distance of Reynolds Village, which is filled with delicious restaurants and unique shops, while just minutes drive to downtown Asheville (6 minutes).

The space
Located in highly sought after Reynolds Mountain. Our house is equipped with the latest modern features, a fully stocked kitchen and lots of natural sunlight! Granite countertops, all new stainless steel appliances and large island accentuate the fully equipped gourmet kitchen.

name: Your excitement starts here. Time to Play.
description:
Fresh air and open spaces. Having a North Carolina adventure is just naturally amazing. Quiet cul- de-sac just 5 minutes from airport. Easy access to hiking, canoeing, sightseeing, biking or just enjoying nature. Entrance to Blue Ridge Parkway just 15 minutes away. Convenient to both Asheville and Hendersonville for shopping and entertainment. The perfect get away. Sorry no pets!

The space
Two very large upstairs bedrooms and one shared bath. One has queen size bed the other a twin bed.

Guest access
Parking to the right side of the home in front of two car garage. Additional parking pad beside driveway.

name: Cozy private room in River Arts District
description:
A clean little room located in the heart of the River Arts District. Perfect for a place to crash after a day of exploring the city or catching a show at the Orange Peel.

5 minute drive to Downtown, 2 minutes to West Asheville, and 10 minutes to the Biltmore.

Walk 5 minutes to trendy coffee shops, restaurants, and bars in the River Arts district and 15 minutes to the breweries and shops in South Slope district.

The space
This is for a private room and private bathroom in my home. I live and work here but also keep to myself, so the frequency and length of our interactions are totally up to you. I am vaccinated against COVID-19 and am happy to wear a mask when we interact.

House amenities
- keypad with unique code for contactless check-in / no key to lose!
- free off-street parking
- a smart tv with streaming services (sometimes it rains )
- fresh, filtered water to fill your water bottle
- a printed

name: BearsDenAVL, modern 3 bed/2 bath in Asheville
description:
Modern cottage nestled on 2 acres in the heart of Asheville. Hang out or hide out, you're just minutes from town in this newly renovated 3 bed 2 full bath with an attached garage for parking your car or storing your adventure gear. Modern updates make it easy to relax after you ride your bike up to the Blue Ridge Parkway or work from home from a built-in office nook. The extended deck invites you to enjoy coffee in the woods and a fire pit inspires nights of story telling and s'mores.

The space
Nestled in the woods, tell stories around the fire pit, dangle your toes off the hammock chair or kick back with a book and read on the deck. There are lots of little spots waiting for you to seek them out at BearsDenAVL.

name: Hot Tub in West Asheville-by River Arts District
description: Welcome to our place! We are a 5-minute walk to huge Carrier Park and close to River Arts District.  Easy access to all of the wonderful things West AVL has to offer! 10-minute drive to downtown. Room comes equipped with a queen bed, desk, chair, TV, Keurig, tea kettle, microwave, mini fridge, toaster, and best of all, a HOT TUB right outside your door! You will have access to a huge private screened in porch that allows for private entry in and out of your space. Also, we are fully vaccinated.

name: Riverside Ranch
description:
Enjoy this spacious, open home with hot tub located 10 miles from the iconic Biltmore Estate, 4 miles from Asheville Regional Airport, and minutes to Downtown Asheville! Glenn Bridge River Park is steps away for your water adventures!

The space
Enjoy this spacious, open home located 10 miles from the iconic Biltmore Estate, 4 miles from Asheville Regional Airport, and minutes to Downtown Asheville! Glenn Bridge River Park is just steps away for your water adventures! Afterwards, relax in the hot tub on the serene wrap around deck or enjoy the evening air in front of the fire pit.

Riverside Ranch is also only minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and access to all the wonders and trails of our beautiful mountains. Whether you prefer zipline adventures, kayaking, mountain biking, hiking or just enjoying downtown, this location has it all.
Find out why Asheville is named Beer City USA with our many breweries and award winning restaurants. This hom

name: MODERN KING SUITE/TWO BEDROOM/ 10MINS TO ASHEVILLE
description:
For those looking to be centrally located to all that Asheville offers with the arboretum, shows and events, the Biltmore, breweries, Pigisah National Forrest, and downtown Hendersonville and Asheville, this beautifully designed two bedroom apartment will serve as a relaxing home base. Enjoy all the apartment amenities which include pool, exercise room, game room, and kayak and bike rentals. You will not be dissapointed in your choice staying in this quiet third floor apartment.

The space
The entire apartment is for guest use. The pool and gym are available with the card key

name: Green Garden Getaway
description:
5-Star Sanitary Deep Clean. Contemporay and stylish garden level apartment against mountain backdrop, and clear night skies 9 miles east of downtown Asheville. My green-built home is well appointed, with great attention to detail. It's perfect for a couple or individual seeking a bucolic getaway.
This sweet little unit is the ground floor, with convenient dedicated parking at the entrance in the front of the unit. There is another home above, where I live with my 2 amazing dogs. I love to host!

The space
Custom green built apartment with all the details you can expect from this 4 year Super Host. You won't want to leave.

Guest access
The front yard and pond area are open for use, as well as the Cantina with grill just 100 feet away. Host lives upstairs and I will be as scarce as possible while guests are in this garden level unit.
Backyard is private.

name: Cheerful 4-bedroom residential home with POOL
description:
Stay-Swim-Soak-Sleep. Have fun with the whole family at this stylish place located in Fletcher, North Carolina, in the foothills of the legendary Blue Ridge Mountains. Centrally located to both Asheville and Hendersonville, this spacious 4-bedroom, 2-bath vacation rental features amenities like a full kitchen, 65” smart TV, Sonos soundbar, free WiFi, indoor gas fireplace, private in-ground swimming POOL, fully fenced-in backyard, and outdoor gas grill – perfect for summer night barbeques.

The space
OUTDOOR LIVING:
Swim in the private, solar-heated pool. Soak up the sun or read a book in one of the loungers on the patio. Enjoy a summer, family barbeque using the outdoor grill. Escape into a tranquil, backyard oasis – fully fenced-in (6ft privacy fence), beautifully-landscaped backyard.
- Private, in-ground swimming pool
- Patio lounge chairs
- Outdoor gas grill
- Pool accessories (noodles, floats)
- Pool towels

**** POOL**

name: Valley Creek Getaway
description:
Come enjoy Asheville at Valley Creek Getaway. Conveniently located minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and only 10 minutes from downtown Asheville. Tucked away in the woods. Enjoy feeling remote when you are so close to town.

Valley Creek Getaway is tucked away off the Blue Ridge Parkway. Easy access to I-40, I-240, and the Blue Ridge Parkway. Discover all that Asheville has to offer hiking, amazing scenery, downtown Asheville, the Biltmore Estate, and much more.

The space
Quiet and serene mountain getaway. Right off of the blue ridge parkway. Close to many unique and fun local restaurants and breweries. Minutes from hiking trails and sights of the mountains!

Guest access

Dishwasher
Refrigerator
Dishes, pots, pans, utensils

name: Renovated Condo in Charming Asheville Neighborhood Close to Everything
description:
Charming 1 bedroom/1 bathroom condo on the 2nd level above the Chop Shop. Just a few steps away to grab a coffee, pastry, or sandwich at the City Bakery, and have dinner at the swanky Bone & Broth Restaurant. The center of town is less than a mile away, easy walk or 2 min uber/Lyft ride to all of downtown restaurants and shops.
Located in North Asheville, right off Historic Charlotte street, in the Historic King James Building.

name: Historic Charlotte Street Condo
description:
Charming 2 bedroom/1 bathroom condo with both bedrooms having King Beds, on the 3rd level above the Chop Shop. Just a few steps away to grab a coffee, pastry, or sandwich at the City Bakery, and have dinner at the swanky Bone & Broth Restaurant. The center of town is less than a mile away, easy walk or 2 min uber/Lyft ride to all of downtown restaurants and shops.
Located in North Asheville, right off Historic Charlotte street, in the Historic King James Building.

name: Cozy cottage surrounded by trees. Pet friendly!
description:
Pet friendly, 1,200 sq ft cottage surrounded by trees and situated on a private, tree-lined neighborhood road. Recharge on the covered front deck with porch swing and large rear deck with gas BBQ. Large 3/4 acre lot provides great privacy. Close to everything. Three minutes to Blue Ridge Parkway, four minutes to Ingles grocery store, and eleven minutes to Downtown. Large parking area for up to 3 cars. Fast wifi makes it easy to work while visiting. We are pet-friendly with only a $75 pet fee.

The space
The 3rd bedroom is set up as an office and reading room for some extra privacy and quiet. The living room TV is a 50" Vizio smart TV for access to your favorite streaming services. The large rear deck has seating for five and gas BBQ for your cooking enjoyment.

Other things to note
We are a pet-friendly property and we don't have any restrictions on the size of the dogs you bring. All we ask is that your puppy dogs are well behaved and don'

name: Charming Montford Oasis, 5 Min. Walk to Downtown
description: Private suite perfectly situated just blocks from downtown in a quiet, historic Montford home. Thoughtful details create a cozy getaway, including original artwork and hand-painted furniture, cotton linens & comfy bed. Enjoy the well-appointed en-suite bath and bright dining nook. A mini fridge, electric kettle, coffee maker, toaster oven & kitchenware are provided, along with coffee, tea & snacks. NO kitchen, but a short walk to dozens of amazing restaurants. Guest wing with private entrance.

name: Modern Blue Ridge Retreat
description:
Our newly constructed home is 2 mins to the French Broad River for paddling & cycling, 8 mins to local breweries & the River Arts District, & 10 mins to the hearts of downtown Asheville & Weaverville. A prime location to see & do everything! Located on a quiet, cul-de-sac, you will have all the amenities available for a comfortable & rejuvenating stay. Bring your sports gear (& appetite for fantastic food & local microbrews) & take in everything our area has to offer in comfort and style!

The space
Built in 2020 this contemporary home features new everything!! Managed professionally by Superhosts with years of experience and roots in the local community you will have staff ready to help in all areas from cleaning and maintenance to suggestions for where to eat and what to see! Outside security cameras in use.

name: Sunny Montford Retreat; Walk to Downtown Asheville
description:
Enjoy all that Asheville has to offer in a private, impeccably clean one bedroom lower level oasis in Historic Montford. With a leisurely stroll to Downtown Asheville, you'll have a comfortable home-away-from-home all to yourselves, while in a prime location to sample some of Asheville's favorite pastimes.

The space
We follow all CDC cleaning and sanitizing guidelines. All bedding, including blankets and duvet covers/quilts are washed after every guest.

The private ground level one bedroom apartment is stylish, sunny and meticulously cleaned, with a minimalist design to make you feel right at home. Walk-able to all of Downtown Asheville, and just a short drive to the River Arts District, West Asheville and the BIltmore Estate.

Fenced in yard and patio for our furry guests! For pet policy and pet fee, please read, "other details to note" .

The apartment is an ideal space for single travelers, couples and families. The bedroom boa

name: Cozy Bungalow Minutes From Downtown Asheville
description: Indulge in the comfort and tranquility of this cozy 2-bedroom home, located in northern Asheville, less than 10 minutes to Downtown Asheville and less than a mile to Woodfin Riverside Park. Relax in this recently renovated Bungalow with all the comforts as your own home.

name: Walk to Downtown; Great outdoor living space
description: Located in a walkable downtown neighborhood on a quiet street surrounded by forested mountains. The best of both worlds!

name: Beautiful Elk Mountain retreat in Asheville.
description:
Beautiful 5 bedroom retreat just 4 minutes from vibrant downtown Asheville. Less than one mile to Beaver Lake and the accompanying bird sanctuary. Quiet spot with plentiful parking and nearby to grocery stores and local restaurants. Newly designed and furnished stylish unit with a secret bedroom and an abundance of natural light. Large covered porch for dining or simply enjoying time with friends and family. A short distance from several popular hiking trails and the Biltmore house.

The space
This uniquely designed space includes a secret loft bed, spacious bathrooms and bedrooms, a furnished outdoor dining area, and includes lots of parking making it the perfect place to stay while visiting Asheville, NC. This is a private apartment that is a part of a larger building. Guests will have the entire apartment to themselves accessed via a private porch entrance.

Guest access
Guests have access to the space through their own private porch and

name: Healing Room for Women~ Temple of the Sacred Heart
description:
Welcome to the Temple of the Sacred Heart. This home is a sanctuary for rest, renewal and recoding. Green-built home with a wrap around porch and beautiful garden space to create quiet moments of reflection. Private bedroom and guest bathroom with bath/shower. 6 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, and a 1 minute walk to a community yoga studio offering indoor and outdoor classes. Secluded yet only 2 miles to Downtown Asheville.

The space
A temple for remembering the sacred. New, green built home with honey toned hardwood floors and all new appliances. Large glass doors that provide abundant natural light lead to the wraparound deck overlooking the private landscaped garden. Downstairs also features a healing room with a massage table for guests to receive optional bodywork and energy work during their stay. Take a stroll around the gorgeous landscaped backyard or stop under one of the hand built stone seats to write, rest and reflect. This home is a sacred place

description:
Our home is three houses away from New Belgium brewery in West Asheville/River Arts District. You'll find yourself within walking distance to several breweries, restaurants, music venues, local shops, art galleries and the new biking & walking greenway.

A newly constructed home in 2021, the Airbnb apartment has a private entrance and guests have full access to their own kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, porch and living area with basic amenities provided.

We welcome guests from all backgrounds!

The space
Pete and Kat built the home in 2020/2021 and reside in the two levels above the Airbnb apartment. The Airbnb space is accessed from the steps at the mailbox and guests will enjoy a private entrance accessed by door code. Guests have the entire apartment to themselves: private porch, bedroom, bathroom, kitchenette, dining area and living room with TV.

The kitchenette has a fridge, microwave, Nespresso coffee maker, Berkey water filter an

name: The Little House on Beaucatcher
description: Private Custom Home Surrounded by 50 Acres of Woods Less than 1 Mile from Downtown Asheville! - Bedroom w/ queen bed and plenty of closet space. Living room has Smart TV and full-sized pull-out sleeper. Fully equipped kitchen for longer stays. Unwind on the deck in the wooded backyard while enjoying a cup of coffee or glass of wine and soak in the mountain air. Easy 15 minute walk on the local trails (or 5 min. drive) to downtown Asheville, less than 1 hr to skiing and 20 min to the airport.

description:
Welcome to Ashevilleshire Cottage. Fantastic West AVL convenient location - Easy access to the best that Asheville has to offer. Five mins to Haywood Rd, 10 mins to DT AVL, 15 to Blue Ridge Parkway, 15 mins to Biltmore, 15 mins to hiking/biking trails, dozens of breweries/wineries within mins. Covered front porch, private back deck w/grill, open floor plan, 2020 construction, dog accepted, 3BR/2BA, fast WiFi, smart TVs, private and in Asheville! House is on a main road so some traffic noise.

The space
This is a brand new house as well as a brand new vacation rental. The owners were unfortunately transferred but want to keep their beautiful Asheville home. We are listing it now but will have professional photographs up very soon. We wanted to make it available to everyone asap.

The home is located in eclectic West Asheville only minutes from Haywood Road, the River Arts District, New Belgium Brewery, One World Brewing West, Archetype Brewing, Wedge

description:
Nestled on 0.77 private, wooded acres, this 2,778-square-foot 4BR home is 15 minutes from downtown Asheville. Highlights include cathedral ceilings, designer furnishings, and a pool table. A Koi pond and waterfall add tranquility outdoors. Sleeps 10.

The space
This beautiful 4BR/3BA home offers the best of both worlds -- a secluded location nestled on 0.77 wooded acres, yet only 15 minutes from the excitement of downtown Asheville.

Artistic decor features throughout this stylish 2,778 square-foot home, where cathedral ceilings and antique heart pine floors take center stage. Play a round of billiards, then step outside to the back deck where a waterfall and Koi pond add ambience.

LIVING AREA

Cathedral ceilings soar in the stylish living room -- enjoy the warmth of the fireplace while you stream a movie on the smart TV.

Map out plans for the day in the office. The game room is outfitted with a queen sleeper sofa, a pool

name: Newly Remodeled Cheerful  Home Centrally Located
description: Centrally-located  Cheerful mountain home located in the heart of Asheville.  Just a few short minutes to Downtown Asheville, Biltmore House, BlueRidge Parkway, French Broad River, Grove Park Inn, Grocery stores, and all the wonderful things that Asheville has to offer. It can sleep up to 5 and has a huge yard for outdoor activities with plenty parking. Come experience Asheville's awesome local food scene, shopping and abundant outdoor activities such as hiking, kayaking, tubing, parks, and more

Five minutes to UNC and the tennis courts. Your location is right around the corner from the Greenway and walking/biking trails. The famous Grove Park Inn is only 5 minutes away.

Guest access
You will have your own one-car garage to park in. We also have a bike and ping pong table for your enjoyment.

Other things to

name: Private Floor in Creekside Farmland
description:
Enjoy privacy and convience in this large upstairs rental. 15 minutes to downtown and close to hiking and water spots.

name: Private Bedroom in Creekside Home
description: Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space.

name: Exceptional view home of Asheville!
description: Enjoy a one-of-a-kind, two-bedroom mountain lodge getaway with sweeping views of the Blue Ridge Mountains & downtown Asheville. Enjoy high ceilings, open floor plan, wood burning fireplace, porch, large deck & expansive outdoor spaces for grilling, relaxing and reading. Peaceful (inside & out), private, with the perfect balance of feeling far from everything and tucked away into the mountainside greenery, but only a short drive from bustling downtown Asheville and all its adventures.

PET FRIENDLY UNIT!

name: Modern Asheville Townhome W. Ash I Two King Beds
description: This brand new beautifully designed townhome is all new construction, with the highest selections of fixtures and finishes. Walk to a downtown street with coffee shops, art and bike shops, and one of the best biscuit bakeries in the state! (Lines form out the door). You will be able to relax for your extended stay as this is built for longer term guests. We have two king beds with a ton of open space for spreading out and making yourself feel at home. You are close to all attractions AVL offers.

description:
Enjoy the perfect Asheville Vacation Retreat, only 3 miles to Downtown Asheville with restaurants & breweries, stores & entertainment! This 3 bedroom 2 bath home sleeps 8 comfortably with themed rooms decorated by local artisans. Soak in the hot tub, BBQ a delicious meal on the covered back deck, sit next to the fireplace on cold nights, play some board games, watch a movie, and enjoy coffee on the covered front porch. Fully equipped kitchen with dining table for 6 and breakfast nook for 2.

UPSTAIRS:

-bedroom with queen size bed
-bedroom with queen size bed

DOWNSTAIRS:

-living room with queen size sleeper sofa

Car is best but Uber & Lyft are readily available if you'd rather get a ride instead of trying to find parking downtown.

name: Blue Sky Manor
description:
The space
Blue Sky Manor welcomes you to Asheville in style! Conveniently located just south of Downtown Asheville, and only 2 miles to shopping and restaurants, this home is truly an elegant escape for all seasons with a hot tub and mountain views. Tons of natural light, gracious living spaces, and top-of-the-line furnishings define this luxurious 5,500-square-foot estate. Prepare to be "wow"-ed by the main living area's vaulted ceilings and contemporary decor. Three gas fireplaces on the main level add a cozy charm to the home. The fully equipped, spacious kitchen is sure to please even the most discerning guest, and there's three indoor dining tables, allowing plenty of seats. Make plans for a cookout with a gas grill and two outdoor dining tables on the spacious upper deck. Evenings at Blue Sky Manor take on a special ambiance - warm up by the stone-stacked, smokeless fire pit on the patio and then soak in the bubbly hot tub on the lower deck. The lower level living ar

name: THE HOWELL HOUSE A  newly remodeled farmhouse
description:
This is a NON-SMOKING house.

Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway located approximately 8 miles from downtown Asheville, NC. Relax in the rocking chairs on the porch & at night listen to the frogs.


Attractions nearby are the Biltmore House, Grove Park Inn, lots of local & cultural foods downtown, many local breweries, cycling routes, ski resorts nearby, hiking on the Blue Ridge Parkway and many gorgeous Mountain View’s.

We have WiFi, smart TV with tv and movie apps.

The space
Newly remodeled farmhouse located approximately 8 miles from downtown Asheville. Located in quiet rural area west of Asheville.

Guest access
Guests can access yard behind house and both sides of house.

Other things to note
Please do not leave dirty dishes in the sink when you leave.

If you use the outdoor grill. Please please. Clean it to your best ability for the next guest to use!<

name: ***The Lucky Duck 🦆  Relax • Fish • Enjoy
description:
You are going to feel like a LUCKY DUCK when you arrive at this property in a semi secluded neighborhood only 15 mins to downtown. INCLUDES a separate basement apartment with full kitchen and bathroom! So, bring your parents, adult children, or friends who would like to have their own space! And if you love fishing, don't forget your gear, catch and release is highly encouraged. If you don't like fishing, but enjoy nature, you can feed Charlie and his Angels (our ducks) and take in the views!

The space
This property is perfect for families who enjoy spending time outside! We have lots of outdoor seating options with 2 decks a covered patio, and a covered pavilion by the pond. Firepit. Fishing. Cornhole.

The main level of this home is a 2 bedroom 2 bath that will accommodate 6 people including the pull out sofa.

The basement is a completely separate 1 bedroom 1 bath apartment with a full kitchen and bathroom, living room, office space, a

name: Natural Remedy | Private Location, Gas Grill, Patio & Sweeping Mountain Views - 5 Bedroom, 3.5 Bathroom
description:
Offering solace from the hustle & bustle of everyday life with its picturesque setting in the country, year-round mountain views & wonderful amenities, this charming farmhouse just 15 minutes from AVL’s city center is bound to cure your worries & cares!

The space
Nestled in the pastoral countryside, this historic farmhouse, constructed in 1875, offers a much needed escape from the fast-paced routines that characterize your normal everyday life. Marrying old world charm with contemporary style, the interior embraces retro touches like the wood paneling and original hardwood flooring and complements them with boho bedding, distressed rugs, and milk white wainscoting on the ceiling. The spacious and chic interior promises comfort and convenience without sacrificing Appalachian charm. In the morning, embrace the sweet and slow way of country living by sleeping in and leisurely wandering out onto the covered front porch to sip your morning coffee in the rocking chairs

name: *Suite Caroline - only 15 mins to dntwn Asheville
description:
Suite Caroline is perfect for families and friends who want to enjoy a spacious place to return to after your Asheville adventures! With a large deck, gas grill, fishing pond, and close range mountain views, you may want to schedule days to just stay in and enjoy!

** This property is multi-unit. There is a basement apartment that is also a vacation rental for a max of 2 people. So the pond/pavilion and cornhole/yard areas are shared with other guests.

The space
It is 3.5 miles from I40 and about 15-20 minutes to downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, River Arts, shopping, and all that the Asheville area has to offer!

The garage and basement was once a bait and tackle store for the pond. In the 1950’s they held carp fishing tournaments here! There are still very large carp in the pond! You can often see them at the top of the water on a sunny day! There’s also plenty of bass! You are more than welcome to fish with your own gear, as long

name: Asheville Nest in Historic, Charming Kenilworth
description:
This gorgeous house is located in the heart of Asheville, walking distance to Biltmore village and downtown AVL. The neighborhood is so peaceful and sweet, filled with historic homes, trees, walking paths and friendly people. The decor in the house is a collection of local art and eclectic furniture curated by designer Meg Heathman. The beds and sofas are very comfy. Enjoy lounging on the front porch with your morning coffee or the side porch for alfresco dining under the trees.

The space
There are two bonus rooms in the house for you to enjoy. One is a cozy reading nook with a loveseat and lots of natural light, the other is a quiet office space.
The comfy living room has a large flat screen TV for entertainment. The kitchen is well stocked with everything you need for at home cooking! This house comfortably sleeps 4 guests. If you have children traveling with you, feel free to bring a futon or inflatable mattress to set up in the reading nook or office spa

name: Forest-View Retreat | Deck | 10 Mins to Downtown
description:
This 2BR house is set on over an acre of land and offers the ideal wooded retreat. Highlights include an upgraded interior, a gleaming kitchen, and a deck with alfresco dining. Enjoy serene forest views, or head 10 minutes to downtown Asheville. Sleeps 8.

The space
Set just northwest of downtown Asheville, this 2BR house is nestled on more than an acre of wooded land. Highlights include a fully upgraded interior, a gleaming kitchen, and a covered deck with serene forest views. Savor a crisp drink on the covered back deck.

Convenient to both Weaverville and Asheville, you can explore both in a short drive.

LIVING AREA

Get cozy in the main living room while streaming your favorite shows on the smart TV.

The second living room is surrounded by two walls of windows, letting in plenty of natural light. With a desk, cozy furnishings, and forest views, this space is a welcoming retreat.

KITCHEN & DINING

W

name: Private Bedroom and Bath in Trendy West Asheville
description:
You will enjoy your own private bedroom and private full bath in this shared West Asheville townhouse - just 2 miles from city center and 1 mile from fun and hip Haywood Rd. You can walk to the Asheville Adventure Park for an afternoon zip-lining or mountain biking, or to the Crown Plaza Resort, for tennis, golf, salt water pool, fitness center, and spa. You’ll be just 5 min from New Belgium Brewery and the colorful River Arts District. The deck is a great spot for breakfast whatever you choose!

The space
The house features dark hardwood floors throughout downstairs and brand new soft carpet upstairs. The stainless appliances are sleek and clean. The counters are gorgeous granite and provide tons of workspace if you like to cook. The deck is the best spot to enjoy breakfast or even a romantic dinner whether you cook or order out.

name: 🏔 Quiet, Mountain Cottage in East Asheville ⛰
description:
Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway. Quiet, beautifully furnished rental in East Asheville. Walk to Shoji Spa or the Mountains to Sea trail, or take a short drive to downtown Asheville. Quick access to tons of hiking trails. Highland Brewery and other breweries close-by.

Hardwood floors throughout the main living area, carpeted bedrooms, ensuite master bath, wonderful rocking chair front porch, large backyard with fire pit and storage shed. Flexible on length of stay.

The space
The mountain cottage is a two bedroom fully furnished abode with a dedicated work space if you need to check-in at the office. The quiet living room hosts a fire place, and the fully fenced backyard yard serves an outdoor retreat with Adirondack chairs and a fire pit. Feel free to relax and take in the sunset on the rocking chairs or swing on the front porch.

Guest access
Guests can access the entire property. The mountain 🏔 cottage has a g

name: Peaceful Cottage tucked away in Asheville
description:
Come relax in a quiet and peaceful cottage tucked away in Asheville! Two minutes from the Biltmore House, five minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway and 10 minutes from downtown AVL and the River Arts District. Come with your partner and enjoy a king sized bed and suite or bring your family of four to a safe and private home with room to play outside! The cottage is a separate building and I live right next door. Kick your feet up after a day of exploring and relax in my peaceful spot of the city!

Guest access
Cottage, cottage side garden, parking area and driveway.

name: Blue Ridge getaway
description:
Relax with the whole family at this peaceful lower-level apartment. If you're lucky you may see a friendly visit from a curious bear!

The space
Virtually zero man-made noise and surrounded by nature. Your apartment and dedicated entrance faces a green open area and the forest. Sit and enjoy the sound of the wind through the trees. In late fall and winter you can enjoy a view of the mountains. Take a stroll through the forest on a short trail that begins in front of your door! Enjoy the fire pit (wood provided) and BBQ (charcoal provided) and dinner on the outdoor picnic table. Or, sit in the hammock under the trees and watch hummingbirds and fireflies.

name: Hilltop Hideaway - 2 Bed, 1 Bath Pet Friendly!
description:
Recently renovated, comfy retreat is perfect getaway for anyone looking to travel, do business, or visit love ones in Asheville. Only a short drive to attractions such as the Blue Ridge Parkway, downtown Asheville, the Biltmore Estates, and North Carolina Arboretum. We are pet-friendly and we prioritize cleanliness, especially during the global pandemic to ensure the safety of our guests

The space
Ground floor unit accessible from the driveway, this two bed, one bath unit is a great stay for Asheville travelers. This unit comes equipped with a kitchenette that opens into a living room. There are two bedrooms with queen beds and one full bath, one futon, plasma screen TV in living room and bedrooms (wifi capable only), wifi, and dining area. Stocked kitchen with pots and pans, cutlery, plates, bowls, coffee machine, and more. The property has three other units. All rocking chairs and gas grills are for your use, and the others staying on the property.

Out of respect for our cleaning crew, please do not request late check-out or early check-in. We offer same day bookings and they require the entire cleaning window.

- Memorable Mountain view with large backyard
- Close to Biltmore Park & French Broad River - tubing, kayaking, fishing

description:
The space is one of peaceful, quiet and thoughtful design.  You will feel it as soon as you walk in.

The space

The suite bonus has 3 rooms. This is not a studio, every room does have a door with a lock. Plenty of space to stretch. .if you like to wake up to the sun. grab a cup of coffee and enjoy your yoga.

Private bedroom.

name: Privacy*Natural Beauty*Close to all attractions
description:
Enjoy a wonderful home base in Asheville.
The furnished suite includes two large bedrooms, desk in second room, full bath, spacious living room, kitchenette, and a private furnished deck. Living space is all on one level...no steps to maneuver from parking to entry.
You will be in a peaceful, pleasant, area surrounded by natural beauty only minutes from downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, many attractions, and lots of outdoor fun.
Don’t need 2 bedrooms? https://www.airbnb.com/h/itsjustright

The space
The bright and spacious suite of rooms with second bedroom/office is available only to you. It has its own deck that looks out onto seven acres of woodland. Your space is very private with it’s own separate entrance and parking space. It is within easy range of all the activities of Asheville and also a great place to rest, get some work done, or just hang out to enjoy the peace and quiet.

Guest access
The common elements

name: Farm Stay Main Suite w/hot tub and sauna
description: This modern, cute, house is a split house, on a farm, divided into 4 rentals.  Each rental has  its own private entrance, own parking space, no shared space and is securely locked between each entrance. This cute main suite has your own personal hot tub and sauna room and an amazing bath tub.  You can relax in the bathtub, with amazing views of the farm.  While relaxing in your own personal hot tub right outside your main deck, you can experience the beautiful scenery of our farm and horses.

name: About the View | Hot Tub, Gas Grill, Deck & Year Round Mountain Views! - 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bathroom
description:
Living up to its namesake, About the View is a pristine mountain home just 10 minutes from downtown Asheville that offers stunning year round views along with a luxurious hot tub, a deck, a screened-in porch with TV, and a gas grill!

The space
Upon entering this polished and newly-constructed home, you’ll be greeted by the spacious living area that reveals gorgeous glimpses of the Blue Ridge Mountains just outside. The bright and open floor plan highlights the modern and colorful details that lend this home its cohesive and refined style. From the powder blue leather couch to the gold and carmine accents sprinkled throughout the living room and kitchen, this pristine home offers a clean and contemporary atmosphere that will instantly relax you and transport you to a vacation state of mind. In the morning, wander out onto the cozy screened-in porch to enjoy the cool mountain breeze on your face while sipping your coffee before heading inside to work on creative pr

name: A three bedroom gem in heart of downtown Asheville
description:
looking to vacation in Asheville? Considering moving to this wonderful city? Search no more! Our welcoming family friendly, pet friendly home in the central yet quiet location is close to EVERYTHING! With an oversized porch, a welcoming deck and a fully fenced in back yard, mountain views yet a walking distance to everything downtown Asheville has to offer; stores, coffee shops and restaurants, all just around the corner. Short drive to the most beautiful hiking trails, lakes and mountains.

The space
Our home is right downtown yet in a residential quiet part of it. It is full of trees and gardens and is quiet and enjoyable. Our house offers Outdoor seating, fire pit,a working fireplace outdoor rocking chairs a hammock and plenty of outdoor space for you to use. One of the bedroomsAlso offers a nice set up for a home office if needed.Our home is friendly two pets and kids over two years old. We have plenty of toys games and books available.Please let us know if

name: Cozy Mountain Cabin Close to Downtown!
description:
Get ready to relax in this cozy cabin in a quiet wooded neighborhood less than six miles to the heart of downtown Asheville! Enjoy privacy, quiet and solitude in your spacious guest suite. In room coffee, mini fridge, microwave and guest essentials all provided.
You'll find this central location ideal for excursions in all directions. Minutes to downtown restaurants and breweries, the Blue Ridge Parkway, West Asheville, the River Arts District and more. Sorry, no pets.

The space
Enter your guest suite from your private upstairs balcony complete with a sitting area where you can enjoy the peaceful sounds of the forest. Once inside you'll find a large private room with en suite bath, all decked out with a mountain vibe. Parking is just steps away from your private entrance. Enhanced cleaning protocols ensure your area has been made ready to the highest standards.

Guest access
Park in the dedicated guest spot in front of residence

name: Peaceful 4 Bedroom Home on 2 acres Close to Town
description:
Forget your worries and enjoy the feeling of home minutes from town. Book your next Asheville trip in this 4 Bedroom, 3.5 bath with bonus room nestled on 2 acres of wooded land with ample parking. House also includes a stone fountain, fireplace, wrap around porches, laundry, reliable WIFI, super clean on a quiet flag lot, with a nice leisurely stroll on a wooded loop in the back for you to enjoy! Located close to the Blue Ridge Parkway, groceries, restaurants and just 7 minutes to downtown!

The space
Enjoy multiple seated areas indoors and outdoors. Fully equipped kitchen - including stand mixer, all utensils and cooking supplies. Enjoy free Kangen Alkaline Ionized Water for increased health. Walk through the woods and enjoy the quiet. Enjoy sunsets from the fire pit on the back porch.

Guest access
There is plenty of off street parking and it's just a hop, skip and jump to restaurants, and minutes from downtown.

name: Montford Bungalow
description:
You'll be staying in the heart of Montford's historic neighborhood with the lovely weirdness of downtown Asheville, less than a mile away. There, you will find the Drumming circle, great restaurants, many breweries, pottery studios, boutique shopping, glass blowing, street buskers and art galleries.

The space
About this space: A newly renovated private apartment with separate entrance. Located just across the street from one of Asheville’s favorite restaurants. Situated next door to the restaurant is Montford Convenience Store & Deli. Heading down the street you’ll pass several more yummy restaurants. In less than a mile you’ll be surrounded by art galleries, breweries, boutique shopping, street buskers, restaurants & Friday night’s drumming circle in funky downtown Asheville. We know you’ll love our city as much as we do!

This lovely 700 sq. ft studio apartment sleeps 5 people comfortably. Three in the main studio and another two in a complet

name: Adorable 1 bedroom with private bathroom and patio
description:
Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway located minutes from the airport, downtown Asheville and Hendersonville.
The decor has a vintage feel that reflects the charming character of Asheville.
You will have a private entrance with a patio area and enjoy the beautiful wooded surroundings.
The room is very comfortable and clean AND there is no cleaning fee! We follow the COVID cleaning protocol for your safety and well being

Guest access
Your parking space is adjacent to the walkway to your private entrance.
The area is hilly so be prepared when walking around the neighborhood
There is a beautiful park a short drive away which is great for walking.

name: Secluded Pet Friendly suite near AVL. Come escape!
description:
Relax at this fun getaway in a gated, wooded community. Queen sleeps two. Kitchenette with coffee/tea. Bathroom w/tub. Non working fireplace. WiFi, TV for Netflix etc. Just minutes to the Asheville airport, stores, breweries, restaurants + more. Funky Downtown Asheville, Historic Hendersonville + BlueRidge Pkwy are a short car ride away. Pet friendly but please bring your crate if pet needs to be left alone. Use of back patio too. Fire pit in back yard and small grill in carport are available.

The space
Home is located in a gated community on dead end street with private entrance into guest suite. It has a comfy queen bed, easy chair, dresser and closet. Fun furnishing with room to sit and work or relax and have a cocktail. Kitchenette includes microwave, mini fridge, drip coffee maker and more. Roku TV and WiFi make your time spent inside pleasant. Bathroom has a full size tub. Outside you can enjoy a wooded yard, relax on our covered patio with furniture an

name: Sallie Lee Cottage
description:
Welcome to the Sallie Lee Cottage! We hope you will enjoy your stay in Asheville in this charmingly renovated Historic Montford Cottage!
The Sallie Lee Cottage is amongst the oldest homes in Asheville and is believed to have been built around 1883. This amazing Cottage has been well preserved and restored to her former glory.
Located less than 1 mile from downtown Asheville!

The space
Proud to be a Victorian, the Sallie Lee Cottage is an exquisite example of the architectural wonders of the late 1800s. Around 1880, Sallie Lee built a stick-style Victorian cottage on Ashland Avenue. In doing this, she became the first woman to own a home in Western North Carolina. The cornerstone of this beautiful home centers around the exterior architectural displays of lines, angles, and ornate grids. Furthermore, the interior is equally exceptional, centering around its unique triangular fireplace; which results a distinct Latin cross floor plan.

The home

name: East West with a View
description:
We would like you to enjoy our home as much as we do. Modern and somewhat minimalistic, there is a view from almost every room. We have chosen to omit curtains and blinds in most rooms. If you like to rise with the sun, this house is for you. The sunrises are spectacular!

There are numerous breweries, restaurants and art galleries within walking distance.

Due to city ordinances this house is only available for 28 days or longer.

name: Stylish Loft in West Asheville
description:
Experience what it's like to live like an Asheville local in this spacious, uniquely decorated loft. Located at Beacham's Curve in West Asheville, You'll be within walking distance to some of the best shops, bars, and restaurants the neighborhood has to offer. You'll also be just a quick drive to the River Arts District and downtown, making this spot the perfect landing pad for your trip.

The space
The loft boasts high ceilings and large windows in the living room, adding gorgeous natural light to the space. You'll enjoy cooking meals in the kitchen, or simply hanging out on the comfy sectional as you take in the views of Haywood Rd. Amenities include a comfortable queen size bed, spacious bathroom with shower, a large walk-in closet, and washer and dryer. There is ample off street parking, with a designated spot for you to use during your stay.

name: Sweet West Asheville Bungalow
description:
Welcome to our West Asheville bungalow! This beautifully quirky 1920's home has been renovated to make a stylish dwelling that comfortably sleep 4. There are 2 bedrooms, a full bathroom with a spa rain dual shower, a loaded kitchen and dining room, a cozy lounging room with a smart tv, a large covered porch with a gas grill, and a fenced in front yard. All this respite in West Asheville and less than 10 min. to downtown and the River Arts District. Come see what Asheville has to offer!

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire house, the front porch, the front yard, and the driveway. We ask that you do not access the back yard, the back entrance, or the garage as it is our work space and not prepped for guests.

name: NEW private boho apartment in walkable & hip W.AVL
description:
BRAND NEW private guest suite in central West Asheville, only 10 minute walk from all that Haywood Road has to offer. Tastefully decorated, with lots of upgrades throughout. Located on a dead end street with off street parking and a separate entrance for a private, relaxing experience.

Private, large fenced-in backyard includes high quality artificial turf making it the perfect getaway for you and your pups!

This property fully complies with Airbnb's COVID-19 cleaning protocol.

The space
King bed, walk in shower, gas fireplace, Smart TV, and kitchenette with microwave, coffee maker, and mini fridge.

Guest access
The entire downstairs apartment and backyard are all yours!

name: Clean Cute Asheville Home Away from Home
description:
In the Oakley neighborhood, this home is within 5 mins of everything you need in Asheville.

Guest access
Guest bedroom upstairs, guest room, front porch, back porch. ☺️ Keeping common clean due to COVID high risk potential. 😷

name: Lots of space, huge backyard, games, more!
description:
Our beautiful home sits on 3 acres of terraced backyard, a creek, and a small pond - and it's in Asheville city limits. Perfect for families or a group of friends. 5 mins to the Blue Ridge Parkway, Arboretum, and Asheville Outlets. 10 mins to Bent Creek hikes. 15 mins to the center of downtown. We live here during the week, and Airbnb mostly on the weekends to support our non-profit work with kids. Thanks for considering our place .. you'll love it here!

The space
We have a large wrap-around deck to enjoy the views. We offer a full kitchen, off street parking lot suitable for large vehicles/trailers, a luxurious bathroom with a jacuzzi bathtub, 2 separate living rooms, a second kitchen, 4 hammocks, a big screen with Netflix and Amazon Prime, and Googl℮ Home with all the music you'd like.

Guest access
We like to play, so you will also have access to our large collection of board games, ping pong table, badminton, trampoline, slack line, cli

name: Easy Suite - 1 mile from DT & the Biltmore Estate
description:
Welcome to Easy Suite. A peaceful and centrally-located space, this unit has its own entrance, a highly-reviewed comfortable bed, private bathroom, microwave, mini fridge, and laundry nook. The smart TV offers access to Hulu and Netflix, with fast internet. The neighborhood is very safe with sidewalks and a park across the street. The convenient location allows for affordable Uber rides to and from downtown and the Biltmore Estate. We also have bikes, paddle boards, and a canoe for rent.

The space
A glass, french door entrance with black out curtains opens up to a large bedroom with a queen-sized Tuft and Needle mattress. There is a mini duel-zone fridge and freezer, a microwave, and keurig with coffee and tea kpods. If you’re interested in eating a meal or focusing on work, there’s a high top table with stools. There is a mounted smart TV with internet access, a bathroom with a walk-in shower, and a washer and dryer nook. There is also central ac. We allow up to

name: Grandmamas Cottage - Convenient location minutes from Blue Ridge Parkway, Biltmore, Shopping, and more!
description: Convenient 2 bedroom cottage, walking distance to Asheville Outlets, dining and more. Just 5 minute drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway and the NC Arboretum,  15 minutes to downtown Asheville and The Biltmore Estate.  After a day of exploring the beauty of Western North Carolina come home and relax by the fire or snuggle up and enjoy the 60 inch TV with multiple streaming services, wifi and cable. Both bedrooms have queen beds, smart tvs and cable. There is a sleeper sofa and fully stocked kitchen.

name: Tranquil-Nest AVL
description:
The space
Treat yourself to a stay at Tranquil Nest AVL, a peaceful oasis with unbeatable convenience! Step inside to discover the renovation that has transformed this home into a contemporary sanctuary with multiple gathering spaces and gorgeous decor. Driving into the private community of Glen Arden Estates, located just south of downtown Asheville, you'll find a secluded neighborhood with desirable homes on wooded lots. Tranquil Nest AVL features a woodstove in the living room, perfect for cool nights when good company and the warmth of a wood fire will melt away all your worries. A lower level living area with a TV and gas fireplace gives your group an extra gathering room. This elegant home also boasts a modern, gourmet kitchen that is suitable even for the most discerning chef, featuring soapstone countertops, Fisher & Paykel stainless steel appliances, double ovens, a wine cooler, and custom Mission-style oak cabinetry. The outdoor dining table on the covered deck

Walk to RAD & Breweries- on 1 acre private land
description: Enjoy the privacy of a acre lot but the walkability of the city! Private horseshoe drive with plenty of parking. Perfect for kids, working from home, and entertaining. Amazing screened in porch overlooks yard lined with trees. Spot the bunnies and wild turkey and her six babies running around the yard. Home includes 5 bedrooms (only 3 with beds) plus an office.
