name: 8min DWTN AVL Beautiful Home Unit A-2 bdrms+2baths
Mountain Vibes is a welcoming 2- bedroom apartment
description: We're in the heart of East West Asheville, just 2 blocks from  happening Beacham's Curve (Archetype Brewing, Pizza Mind, Owl Bakery) in a friendly neighborhood with a park a block away. Super short drive to New Belgium Brewing, the River Arts District and downtown Asheville!! You will have this first floor apartment all to yourself, we reside on the 2nd floor separated by a stairwell and 2 locked doors, so you won't even see us. Off street parking for 1 vehicle plus street parking for more.

name: Retro Teal Bus on Farm w/Hot Tub
description: Beautiful farm scenery, modern updated retro bus.  This updated bus features a cozy queen bed, a small sitting area with tv, eat in area, refrigerator, microwave, full bathroom, personal hot tub and outside picnic area.  Enjoy the peaceful views of the horses and farm, as you relax in the hot tub

name: Wildwood Cabin beside the Creek
description:
Take a break and unwind at this peaceful oasis. Enjoy the sights and sounds of nature while relaxing by the gas fire-pit. Nestled in the woods however very convenient to everything ! Location Location ! Minutes to Asheville airport , Sierra Neveda Brewery ,Fletcher Park,Hiking ,biking restaurants and more ! Centrally located between Asheville ,Hendersonville and Pisgah National Forest ! WNC Agriculture center 1/2 mile away!
Perfect for two however can accommodate up to 5.
Diana

The space
Loft one bedroom with new adjustable King bed. The Custom barn door divides the bedroom and office space. Office space has a desk and double chair which folds into a single bed.
Two full bathrooms upstairs and half bath downstairs . Not ideal for young children or people who are unable to climb stairs easily. Downstairs is a queen sofa bed . Perfect for two guests however will accommodate five .

Guest access
Access to the creek. S

name: Charming Downtown 2nd Floor Unit
description:
Private 1 bedroom apartment on the second floor of a historic building. This is a walk up so no elevator is available.
Great location very easily walkable to everything downtown Asheville has to offer. Also, a very short walk to the south slope.
Eat-in kitchen with full size appliances. Pots/pans and basic cooking utensils included.
Bedroom is spacious with a queen sized bed and walk-in closet, TV.
Full bathroom with large tub. Shampoo, conditioner, soap and all linens included.

name: Asheville Abound
description:
This is a split-level home that sits upon a hill surrounded by trees! There are two living rooms and two laundry rooms. The living room downstairs has theater seating for four people. There is a gas fireplace downstairs that is seasonal from October - March. A fire pit is available outside all year!
The home is surrounded by trees and very quiet. Shopping and eateries are only 1.5 miles away.

The space
The whole house except the garage is available to guest.

Guest access
There is enough parking for four cars. The neighborhood consist of only 12 homes.

name: Pet friendly walk to anywhere in West Asheville
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.

name: 1925 Charming House in Historic Montford.
description:
This is a 30 Day minimum rental only! Quaint 2 story House walking distance to downtown in a great neighborhood. This 2 story 1272 sq. ft. house was built by Horace and Barbara Seeley in 1925. Located within walking distance to downtown Asheville, Whole Foods, Trader Joes, Harris Teeter, Grove Arcade, restaurants and coffee shops. It's located on a quiet street with off street parking. Stroll around beautiful historic Montford or access the Greenway for a walk or run.

The space
Landscaped front and back yards with a dining room that opens up to a private enclosed courtyard where you can eat and lounge.The second floor has 2 bedrooms and a bath with a walk in shower. Also a sun room with a futon sofa can be used for relaxing or exercising. The house is cozy and comfortable, equipped with everything you need. Kitchen has all new appliances with a sunny breakfast nook. Living room has a gas stove for warmth and ambiance.
The water is filtered with a whole house

name: Historic Charlotte Street Condo
description:
Charming 1 bedroom/1 bathroom condo on the 2nd level above the Chop Shop. Just a few steps away to grab a coffee, pastry, or sandwich at the City Bakery, and have dinner at the swanky Bone & Broth Restaurant. The center of town is less than a mile away, easy walk or 2 min uber/Lyft ride to all of downtown restaurants and shops.
Located in North Asheville, right off Historic Charlotte street, in the Historic King James Building.

name: Historic Charlotte Street Condo
description:
Charming 2 bedroom/1 bathroom condo with both bedrooms having King Beds, on the 3rd level above the Chop Shop. Just a few steps away to grab a coffee, pastry, or sandwich at the City Bakery, and have dinner at the swanky Bone & Broth Restaurant. The center of town is less than a mile away, easy walk or 2 min uber/Lyft ride to all of downtown restaurants and shops.
Located in North Asheville, right off Historic Charlotte street, in the Historic King James Building.

name: Fabulous Loft in the Heart of Downtown
description:
This wonderful loft features beautiful hardwood floors, high exposed ceilings, and a professionally designed interior to create a bright and relaxing space. 

Located in the heart of Asheville's lively and vibrant culture, the home offers the best location in the city.  You'll be steps from award-winning restaurants, first rate shopping, world-class breweries, parks, and more.  

The home has been fully remodeled and updated with a large, kitchen, designer fireplace, 2 private bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, and plenty of space to gather with friends and family.

Staying in downtown Asheville provides easy access to all local attractions, including the Biltmore Estate, Blue Ridge Parkway, Pisgah National Forest, and some of the best hiking trails and outdoor activities in North America.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire loft.

name: Fabulous 3 bedroom home near all Asheville offers!
description:
Close to everything Asheville and surrounding areas have to offer. Easy access to I-40, the Blue Ridge Parkway the Biltmore Estate, and the many restaurants, breweries and activities Asheville is known for. Fully stocked with everything you need and more. Grill and propane firepit are provided with the screened in porch, extended deck and lovely fenced in yard.

**Please note this home must be reserved in month intervals only*

name: Monthly rental, Lovely Montford Home
description: Monthly Rental Only!  $3500. per month.  Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located home.  Built in 1925 and updated in 2015 you enjoy the Montford experience of Historic Asheville.  Walk to restaurants, parks and UNC-A.

name: A Quaint Cheerful House with an Antique Flare
description: A Great Place to Enjoy a time away! Just 10 miles from the Biltmore House in Asheville, NC.  Many many sites to Enjoy all year long in the surrounding areas!

name: TEE-TINY on Farm with HOT TUB
description: This extremely small, tea cup , itty bitty tiny home is an experience to remember.  Enjoy this cozy space while relaxing in your personal hot tub, while soaking up the beautiful farm scenery. Enjoy the younique wood details.  Please keep in mind, this space is extra, extra small and requires climbing a ladder for sleeping in the queen size bed.  This tiny home is super small with all of the tiny luxuries of home.

name: Hidden Flower Tiny Farm
description:
Nestled in one the picturesque valleys in Asheville NC overlooking the Blue Ridge Mountains. Enjoy the peace and quiet of the tiny farm all the while only 5 miles to downtown and 4 miles to the parkway. With 3 tiny houses available and a yurt; it is the perfect location for folks traveling together that still want personal space. Each eco lodge has its own sleeping area, kitchenette, hot shower, composting toilet, dining space, outdoor seating area and fire pit. small, simple, sweet, sustainable

The space
We welcome eco tourist putting sustainability first. Each space has its own unique charm. The tiny blue house is built from a shipping container, the red tiny house has a lofted bed and is VERY tiny, the round yurt is very calming, and the tiny green house has all the artistic Charm! We also offer tiny events here at the barn overlooking the mountain backdrop.

name: Biltmore Village Gem
description: This spacious, newly renovated, historic Biltmore Village condo is perfect for your Asheville and WNC getaway. Located in the heart of Biltmore Village guests can walk to any one of the many local restaurants, galleries, and boutiques. It is also located a moment away from the entrance to the famed Biltmore Estate, a short ride into downtown Asheville or the River Arts District, and conveniently off of the interstate with easy access to the Blue Ridge parkway. This large 2 bedroom and 2 bathroom condo features a trundle bed and sleeper sofa.

name: Relax and Rejuvenate in Sleepy Gap Cottage
description:
The Cottage at Sleepy Gap is a great home base for adventurers and romance seekers alike. The house is nestled in the forest so you can soak up your "nature fix" while staying only 10-20 minutes from many of Asheville’s popular attractions. Organic, white interiors showcase exposed beams, wood-framed windows, natural floors, and rustic accents. Start to unwind as you drive up the gravel road lined with trees. A 4WD vehicle will provide easiest access to the Cottage on the hill.

The space
While away from it all, you can still enjoy modern conveniences such as high speed internet and central heat and air, and rest assured of your comfort in the new king sized bed and drink pure filtered water. Snuggle up in the daybed overlooking the tree canopy and read your favorite book. Explore the path into the woods to the yoga and meditation platform perched by a moss covered boulder. We have paid attention to every detail to make this a dreamy getaway for a romantic escap

name: Welcome to Asheville!
description: Welcome to this sweet Asheville brand new home so close to many things you will enjoy. Dining at Cracker Barrel, Starbucks and new plaza nearby as well as easy drive to I-40 hwy. Only 6 miles to downtown and so much more.

name: West Asheville Mid-Century Modern Bungalow
description:
Private, quiet and comfortable home conveniently located in West Asheville near restaurants and bars, yet secluded up a country gravel road.
Convenient for a couple or 2 couples with a fold out sofa for a second bed.

The space
Master bedroom, kitchen, living room, bathroom and den/2nd bedroom

Other things to note
Please note, the refrigerator need an extra push to close properly. Use caution when walking on the back patio deck steps. Use caution when using the hammocks

name: Spacious, comfy private floor/entrance, billiards
description:
A unique place located in the wonderful and funky West Asheville. You are a short drive from all that Asheville has to offer. Open floor plan, spacious private area, separate access, pool table, private deck, and card/game room. Two easily operated piston driven murphy beds are supremely comfortable and allow for more area to entertain! A small kitchenette with complementary Keurig cups and snacks to start your adventure. Welcome to Asheville!

The space
The space is private for the guests on a separate floor, but the floor plan is open. There is a room divider for the master bedroom. Note this is urban living and has some street noise. Complementary ear plugs provided in case it becomes an issue.

Guest access
This rental has keypad entry, private lower level entrance, private floor. There are steps and is not wheelchair accessible.

Other things to note
A cornhole set can be provided upon request for play in the front

name: House in the Bamboo Forest
description:
Super clean, elegant, spacious, peaceful, furnished house. 3 BD, 1.5 Bath, laundry, garden tub, expansive decks, fire-pit, vibrant permaculture gardens. Hidden down a long driveway, easy off-street parking for 3 vehicles.

Central to highways, 240, 40, and 26 (13 minutes to downtown, 15 min to Biltmore, 10 min to W. Asheville, 15 min to Blue Ridge Pkwy.)

Quiet, clean, eco/green, low-chemical environment in a bamboo forest. Comfortable and relaxing home while you're in Asheville. LGBTQ friendly.

The space
Large great room with open floor plan connecting kitchen, dining room, and living room. Bedrooms are off the main area. 270 sf master bedroom with a queen sized bed. One bedroom with queen. One bedroom with full. Large full bathroom with garden tub, two sinks, shower and toilet area. Half bath with toilet and sink as well as washer and dryer.

name: 3 Bedroom 2 Bath 1450 sf House in South Asheville
description: Located in a quiet neighborhood of single family homes at the south border of Asheville, this 3 bedroom 2 bath ranch house with large decks and spacious back yard is convenient to most Asheville attractions.  Nearby are the Biltmore House, 13 mi., downtown Asheville, 14 mi., and Biltmore Park 2.8 mi. with shopping, restaurants, and entertainment.  The Blue Ridge Parkway and French Broad River tubing are 3 miles away.  Enjoy a back yard barbecue, the fire pit, or find an adventure in Asheville.

name: LUXURY MODERN KING SUITE-2B/2B-8MINS TO ASHEVILLE
description:
Stock photos included - custom design photos coming in Sept. Book now for early bird specials!

This modern centrally located 2/2 apartment is located in Arden, NC just a short drive from all that Asheville attracts. The beautiful mountains and outdoor adventures, cute downtown, and the Biltmore Estate.

name: Amazing Town Mountain Getaway
description:
Beautiful mountain cottage! Amazing outdoor space, and gorgeous design. This 2 bedroom home features a king master and King second bedroom, with full and half bath, and a queen sleeper sofa. Access the private, 30-ft wide terrace from the living room. Wake up to peaceful mountain mist and coffee as you plan your day in Asheville. After enjoying what the town and surroundings have to offer, continue your vacation by relaxing in the cottage with a fully-stocked kitchen, and comfortable seating on the terrace! You can even catch the mountain sunset while relaxing in the living room and watching the 60” tv. The unit also provides 2 parking space near the entrance of the cottage.
Located on Town Mountain Rd, you are central to all that Asheville has to offer: shopping, restaurants, breweries, galleries, and live music venues. The Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway are also just a short drive away--this location is hard to beat.

description:

You will have the best of both worlds - Enjoy privacy and nature while being just minutes to downtown Asheville.

The space
Bright and comfortable! 2 bedrooms, each with a Queen bed, plus a bonus room with a fold down couch. Plenty of space for 4 guests! The full kitchen has cookware provided. Enjoy dining inside or outside on the large back deck with seasonal long range mountain views. Gas grill included.

Guest access

description:

The space

description:
Welcome to my brand new, private, custom built, in-law studio for monthly bookings. The suite is attached to my personal home with no access between (with a firewall for sound and safety). Huge windows allow for views of the surrounding trees and lots of natural light. There is a fully equipped kitchen and a back deck to enjoy the ravine and wildlife (bears and bunnies) through the woods. It is located 4 miles from downtown in a lovely neighborhood a mile from the Blue Ridge Parkway.

The space
I designed the space for tiny living with attention to functionality and charm. Located in the less congested east Asheville area, it's a 5 minute walk to the new library, Pennycup coffee shop, Creekside Taphouse, and cute little park in the trees where I walk my 10 pound terrier mix. There is a farmer's market on the corner on Fridays. There is a tiny house on the property that I rent out for short trips and guests have always been lovely and quiet, looking for a place t

Located in Haw Creek, in convenient East Asheville. We are 5 minutes from downtown or the Blue Ridge Parkway. This private guest suite is in a quiet neighborhood surrounded by trees and wildlife. It is a newly renovated space with its own private entrance, deck, and hot tub.

The space
Our space was designed for couples and business travelers. The guest suite has a private entrance with off street parking. It is newly-renovated and offers a queen sized bed and allows you to easily regulate your preferred temperature with newly installed mini split heating and cooling system.

Breakfast area with a mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, teas/ local coffee, and light snacks. Plates, cups, mugs, and cutlery are provided. *Due to city restrictions, an oven is prohibited.*

The deck is a private space for the guest suite and leads down to a newly installed hot tub.

We follow CDC cleaning/sanitizing guidelines. All bedding, including blan

description:
Cozy home convenient to west asheville with great restaurants and Bent Creek area. Plenty of parking and friendly neighborhood with small fenced side yard. No ramps or wheelchair access.

The space
Close to I-40 and I-26, with a short drive to anywhere and walking distance to west Asheville. One acre lot, big enough for a vollyball or backyard football game, or to relax and enjoy the scenery.

Guest access

Welcome to my home! The listing is for a private room in a 2-bedroom house located walking distance from the West Ashveille bars and restaurants.

This is a private bedroom with a shared bath. You will have access to the kitchen and a shared living room as well.

Other things to note
I work from home so I will be in meetings at times from 9-5 pm. Otherwise, I'm pretty quiet and friendly!

I also have a dog who is very friendly with people.

7 bedrooms, 5 full baths,

description:
Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway. This property offers excellent year round mountain views. Within minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway and less than 10 minutes from the Biltmore Estate and downtown Asheville.
Come enjoy the mountain air and explore the wonderful town of Asheville while staying in a unique craftsman style cottage that was remodeled in 2020.
Enjoy the peacefulness that this cottage offers and the wonderful views while sitting on the front porch.

Our home is new construction amidst a historic, urban neighborhood. Get the best of both worlds: experience unique culture on a street bursting with character while enjoying the comforts of a new home.

The space

Your bedroom comes equipped with an amazingly comfortable king bed, a love seat, smart TV, a dedicated work space, small kitchenette, closet, small dresser, and patio for your private use.

We live onsite with our 4 children and people-loving dog so we may see each other and interact a little, but we will do o

Industrial modern 1-bedroom downstairs efficiency, conveniently located in West Asheville. Sleeps four; one Tempur-pedic mattress, one pull-out couch. Shops, bars and amazing restaurants are within a short walking distance. Izzy's Coffee Shop, Leo's House of Thirst, Up-Country Brewery and the Odditorium within a 5 minute walk. Downtown Asheville 7-minutes by car. Bent Creek, Arboretum and Blue Ridge Parkway 15-minute drive.

The space
The space is the downstairs of a bungalow house. I live upstairs and you will have the entire downstairs to yourself with a private entrance.

Guest access

Other things to note
There is a fire pit in the back yard. You are welcome to have a fire there, let me know a

description:

*Please note there is no living room, a small kitchenette, and the top floor of the house is occupied by another tenant. This quirky unit is walking distance to the local bars and restaurants on Haywood Road and but it surrounded by a lush garden.

Guests are welcome to complimentary firewood, coffee & fast Wifi.

Guest access

Other things to note
We are very pet friendly! I will add an extra $50 cleaning and damage fee to the booking. Please let me know if you plan on bringing a pet.

Fully remodeled contemporary ranch home in quiet Bent Creek neighborhood. Light-filled living space with fireplace, local art, and fully equipped kitchen. French doors lead to a large rear patio with BBQ grill and outdoor dining as well as a spacious backyard with fire pit. Includes locking storage for bikes. Just minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway, Bent Creek Trails, French Broad River, Lake Powhatan & the NC Arboretum. Plus only 9 miles from everything that downtown Asheville has to offer!

The space
LIVING ROOM

Our open-plan space is the perfect place to gather with friends and family. Relax around the cozy fireplace in the evening. Curl up and watch a movie on our large screen smart TV. Or play board and card games together.

We have:
- An easy and safe vented gas log fireplace
- Books about Asheville and western North Carolina
- Guidebooks & maps for hiking and mountain biking
- Board & card games for all ages

description:
5 Walnut Suites are located above one of downtown Asheville's favorite haunts, 5 Walnut Wine Bar, an intimate bar featuring an array of wines and local beers. Beyond it’s menu, this bar is also known for friendly bartenders, prime people watching from one of their coveted window seats, and live music.

The space

Enjoy the convenience of a full kitchen, take a load off in our comfy reading area, or conveniently drop off your boxed up food or shopping haul (from one of the many incredible surrounding restaurants or boutiques) and get back out there. Other amenities include cozy queen size bed, full bathroom with shower and bath, plus large closet for hanging clothes.

description:

The upstairs apartment features one bedroom, one bath, an eat-in kitchen, and a small living room. Glorious wood craftsmanship throughout.

It's across the courtyard from our home and houses our office and studio on the main floor.

The space
The eat-in kitchen has a microwave, toaster, double burner hot plate, coffee makers ( regular and French press) , tea kettle , blender and all the cookware and utensils you would need.

The bedroom has a comfy queen bed, quality linens and closet and dresser for belongings. A small desk and chair if you need to work and plenty of electrical outlets for computers, phones , etc. Lamps on each side of the bed are provided for reading.

description:

One block away from here is Haywood Road with lots of great shops, restaurants and drinking holes, all within walking distance. You're also within 10 minutes of the wonderful studios in the River Arts District and a few minutes more from downtown Asheville. There is a bus stop at the intersection of Belmont and Haywood that has easy connections to both. THIS HOME IS AVAILABLE ONLY FOR 30+ DAY STAYS.
The home opens up to a comfortably furnished living room equipped with a flat screen TV which offers streaming options, so relax and enjoy your favorite streaming channels. The stylish dining room is connected to the well equipped kitchen, so enjoying your morning beverage or preparing meals together will be a breeze. Perfectly situated to access all of WNC's natural and cultural destinations. Enjoy the charms of yesteryear with high ceilings, wood floors, butcher block counters, and the spacious claw foot tub. This home has a master suite, another full bathroom, and large walk in closets to accommodate a variety of needs.

Enjoy the charms of yesteryear with high ceilings, wood floors, butcher block counters, and the spacious claw foot tub.

description:

Situated on 4 acres just minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, this 3-bedroom, 2-bath home is the perfect getaway to unplug and reset. Take in the fresh air while exploring the on-site trails, then head to a local brewery for a refreshing beverage. When you’re not trekking around downtown Asheville, retreat to the patio and relax around the koi pond. As the sun sets, enjoy a light show from the fireflies!

The space
Fire Pit | Walking Paths On-Site | Space for Tent Camping | Free WiFi

From the moment you arrive, your nature-loving friends and family are sure to love this home’s tranquil setting and proximity to abounding attractions and outdoor recreation!

Bedroom 1: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Full Bed | Bedroom 3: Twin Daybed w/ Twin Trundle

OUTDOOR LIVING: Furnished patio, furnished porch, deck, restaurant-grade propane heater (propane not provid

name: BRAND NEW! Ultra-Luxurious House in the heart of Asheville
description:
In the heart of Asheville, this beautifully decorated ultra-luxurious home with plush beds, high-end stainless steel appliances, and brand new hot tub, is fully stocked with everything you need for a fun and amazing getaway with friends or family. This house is perfect for large family reunions/vacations, bachelor or bachelorette parties, corporate retreats as well as for wedding accommodations.

description: Two-level unit with windows facing Broadway Street, a cozy gas fireplace in the living room, and a large living/dining area. It sleeps 4 people in 2 bedrooms (both with King beds), both with en-suite bathrooms with showers. One of the two bedrooms/bathrooms is on an upstairs mezzanine level. The main level bathroom has a roll-in shower. Kitchen and laundry appliances are ADA-compliant. Center island has 4 barstools and large custom dining table seats 6.

description: Single-level “flat” corner unit. It sleeps 4 people with 2 bedrooms (1 King and 1 Queen) and 2 bathrooms (both with showers, one en-suite with King bedroom, and one directly across hall from Queen bedroom). Center island has 4 barstools and dining table seats 6.

name: Elevation Lofts Boutique Hotel- Unit 306

Sleeping for 8, 2 full bathrooms, ready to eat kitchen, 2 lounging areas, desk work stations and an outdoor patio invite you to retreat with your friends or family. Guest access
Parking for two vehicles.

With a 10 min walk to Haywood road, you'll be close to everything that West Asheville has to offer including live music venues, bars, cafe's, and restaurants.

This family home has a fire pit, grill, picnic tables, and an outdoor hot tub beautifully situated on our 1.6 acre lot in the heart of West Asheville.

Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, living room with a 55" OLED TV with access to Netflix and Amazon Prime.

Have some of your group stay in our 22ft Airstream Bambi 2017 parked right outside

name: Cozy 3-bedroom cottage 15 mins from downtown AVL
description:
Easy access to all the outdoor activities, restaurants, and breweries of Asheville- just 15 minutes from downtown!
Staying in? Grab a plush blanket and have a picnic in the grassy backyard. Finish off your serene day around the crackling fire pit and enjoy the starry skies just outside of the city.
Ready for adventure? Enjoy a cup of coffee on the tucked in back porch before your day exploring town or on the Blue Ridge Parkway.
This is the perfect place to call home during your mountain getaway.

name: Your clean and comfy space awaits.
description:
Your family and friends will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located home. Minutes to downtown Asheville, River Arts, Haywood Road, breweries, restaurants, outlets, shopping, the Blue Ridge Parkway, and the Biltmore Estate. The perfect location for travel nurses, corporate stays, or those needing something short term until you locate your forever place.

The space
The home was built in 1972. We pride ourselves on providing a clean and sanitary space. Most of the furnishings are new. We have two bedrooms with queen beds and the third bedroom has a twin. Our homes must feel, look and smell clean.

Guest access
The home is on a major road (New Leicester Hwy). Asheville Rapid Transit (ART) stops in front of the house 7 days a week. It is 5 miles from Downtown center, Mission Hospital, and about 6 miles from the Biltmore Estate entrance. You can be at the French Broad River in about 10 minutes.

Other thin

name: Astonishing South Slope Townhome with Rooftop Terrace
description:
Stunning southside city views, amazing outdoor space, and gorgeous contemporary design in this new-build, sunny and walkable condo in downtown south slope Asheville. This 3-bedroom features 3 king bedrooms, and 3.5 bathrooms. Wake up to peaceful mountain mist and coffee as you plan your day in Asheville. After enjoying what the town and surroundings have to offer, continue your vacation by relaxing in the townhome with private elevator, and a fully-stocked kitchen. You can even catch the mountain sunrise while relaxing in the living room. The unit also provides 2 car on site garage. No detail has been overlooked!
Located in the South Slope Brewery District and walkable to shopping, restaurants, breweries, galleries, and live music venues. The Biltmore Estate and the Blue Ridge Parkway are also just a short drive away--this location is hard to beat. This 3-bedroom features 3 king bedrooms, and 3.5 bathrooms. Wake up to peaceful mountain mist and coffee as you plan your day in Asheville. name: Modern Asheville Bungalow w/ Fire Pit
description:
Enjoy this stylish apartment in the heart of Asheville. Why drive when you can walk! Walking distance from the best breweries, restaurants and downtown shopping. Biltmore Estates is only 5 miles away. The apartment is fully stocked with everything you’ll need to feel at home.

The space
Entire downstairs apartment + outside fire pit.

Street parking available.

Guest access
You have access to the apartment and backyard fire pit area

name: Firefly Cove Guesthouse
description:
Step away from it all and relax in this newly renovated guesthouse. Only 10-15 minutes from everything Asheville has to offer, this property is the perfect, peaceful setting for couples or small families. Enjoy a stress-free, first morning with local bread and eggs from our chickens. A full kitchen with new appliances and everything you need to cook elaborate meals, an open living area with huge windows looking out at trees and gardens, all make this the perfect sanctuary.

The space
This guesthouse is on a beautiful piece of property set off the road, making it feel very secluded and peaceful. Our family lives in the main house but the guesthouse has its own parking, entrance, back patio and outside space so it’s likely you won’t even know we’re there.

Guest access
For families with children, we have a side yard with a swing set, climbing wall, climbing dome and trampoline that we love to share.

name: West Asheville Basement Suite Asheville, NC
description:
This basement suite has everything you need for a convenient stay in W. Asheville, NC. This is a semi finished basement that has a ton of charm and all the amenities. You will be in walking distance to so many cool spots on Haywood Rd! Downtown is 2 miles away! The entrance to this suite has a stone patio that you can sit back and relax. We do have cats, they won't be with you, please reserve with this knowledge. This is a perfect place for a couples or friend's getaway!
Permit #21-06490

Guest access
Guests have private access to the entire downstairs of the house. There is a small side yard that guest are welcome to use. There is parking space for guests to have two cars.

name: 2B/1B Rare Private Suite Retreat✨Sweet Location!✨
description:
Welcome friends & fellow travelers! This listing is for the entire upstairs of my 1915 home. Enjoy more privacy and feel more secure while traveling. Come and go easily with keyless entry. I’m biased but we do have THE BEST location. 😁

With advance notice, we can pick up your family/group at the airport.

I’m also happy to coordinate special on-site events & experiences such as CBD spa time, cheese & wine, dessert bar, massage, Nia, chart readings, food tours, celebratory gift baskets, etc.

The space
Walk to dozens of nearby eclectic shops, eateries, cafes and pubs then relax & recharge in your own private suite.

We welcome travelers of every race and religion/non-religion. Our hosting style is casual; We are available if needed but otherwise give guests plenty of space. U

Lately guests have been loving time spent on the front porch. The front room can be available for use certain hours as well. You reach your rooms by

name: Charming Asheville Farmhouse Mtn vws/20m to dwntwn
description:
This charming Asheville farmhouse is the perfect escape! Relax and enjoy mountain views and gorgeous outdoor areas in this picturesque countryside setting. Just a short 20 min drive to downtown or the famous Omni Grove Park Inn Spa and Golf Course , 15 min to the historic Biltmore Village and just 30 min to Asheville Regional Airport. This is the perfect location to be close to all the great things Asheville has to offer while being tucked away in your own little slice of Heaven! Come and enjoy.

The space
You will feel like you are in the country while still being very close to all that Asheville has to offer. No steep driveways to worry about. Easy access and great accommodations. Your group can spread out and relax. This 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom home has enough space indoors as well as outdoors for everyone to enjoy! The inviting front porch is a lovely place to sit and enjoy a cup of coffee and take in the mountain views and rolling valley. The enclosed back porc

name: Bent Creek Complete Apartment
description:
Peaceful and fully furnished Bent Creek apartment - in the woods and close to town!

Right next to Bent Creek Forest and the NC Arboretum, this well-appointed apartment's location is perfect to leave the house on-foot or on two wheels and access some of the Asheville area's most beautiful nature trails.

2 minutes to the Blue Ridge Parkway, 10 minutes to West Asheville's Haywood Road, 15 minutes to Downtown Asheville and 0 minutes to Western North Carolina Paradise!

The space
The space is a complete studio apartment, with a separated and dedicated (doorless) bedroom, full bathroom with shower, full kitchen with large fridge, four burners, large oven, and all basic go-to appointments. There is also a small outdoor covered gravel porch with a bench swing and a table and chairs, where guests can enjoy the garden views.

Guest access
Parking is easy in the driveway right in the front of the house. Walk down the path to the r

name: Magnificent S&W Building Condo In The Heart of Downtown Asheville
description:
Stunning South city views, amazing outdoor space, and gorgeous contemporary design in this Historic S&W Art- Deco building, sunny and walkable condo in downtown Asheville. This 4th floor two-bedroom features a large living room, 1 king bedrooms, 1 Queen bedroom, each with private baths. Access the private, 50-ft wide terrace from the second upstairs living room in the condo via floor-to-ceiling glass sliding doors. Wake up to peaceful mountain mist and coffee as you plan your day in Asheville. After enjoying what the town and surroundings have to offer, continue your vacation by relaxing in the condo with local art, and a fully-stocked kitchen. You can even catch the mountain sunrise while relaxing in the living room. The unit also provides no garage parking space but there are several paid city garages near by. Once you book you will receive the links to these garages.
Located on Patton Ave in downtown you are central to all that Asheville has to offer: shopping, restaurants,

name: Newly Listed! Mountain Lover's Paradise in Candler, NC - PET FRIENDLY - Fire pit/BBQ - Mountain View
description:
Secluded and stylish MOUNTAIN HOME just outside Asheville, NC...less than 1 mile from Asheville city limits! With all the amenities you could ask for, this 4 bedroom / 2 bath home is the perfect choice for your next MOUNTAIN GETAWAY! Open floor plan, high-end laminate plank flooring, natural wood floors and recessed lighting throughout. Spacious kitchen with stainless-steel appliances and an island that seats three! Covered back screened porch with dining table / chairs for you to enjoy your next meal outdoors. Located just under 10 minutes from Asheville where you will find many venues for dining, shopping and adventure. Enjoy a day of hiking, biking, swimming, fishing or tubing! If you’re looking for an adrenaline pumping adventure, take a drive over to the Nanatahala River Gorge where you’ll be able to experience white water rafting, kayaking, and even zip lining!

This newly updated home features rustic-modern furnishings, stainless steel appliances, two Queen-size beds,

name: Solar Powered Bus ~ Tiny Home ~ River View Oasis
description:
Escape from the hustle and bustle of life in this renovated city bus, now an off-grid tiny home, just 10 minutes from downtown Asheville. Perched high on a hill overlooking the French Broad River, the outdoor space provides ample opportunities for reconnecting to nature, relaxing in a hammock, and sitting by a fire. A short walk from the river; water-sport lovers - bring your boats and fishing gear. Watch the sunrise over the river each morning and breath in that fresh mountain air!

The space
This bus converted to tiny home has one full sized bed and two small bunks (4 feet long) designed for small children, along with a couch that converts into an additional bed for an older child or adult. The bathroom has a full shower with hot water, vanity sink, and self-contained compost toilet. The kitchen is fully equipped with a refrigerator/freezer, stove top, oven, farm-house sink, and ample counter and drawer space for all essential kitchen ware. Open up the sid

name: Hot Tub! Walk to Downtown Asheville. Modern Decor.
description: Experience the Best of Downtown Asheville with Sweeping Sunset, Skyline and Mountain Views. Within a 7-min walk to downtown you'll find amazing restaurants, breweries and galleries. Or just relax on the outdoor patio in the hot tub and enjoy the fresh mountain air! This executive rental has a dedicated office & wellness room for the working traveler, a chef's kitchen with gas stove, great natural light and the perfect floor plan for two couples to have plenty of privacy. Close to it All!

name: $1.9M LUXURY 5 BDRM HOUSE W/ HOT TUB
description:
Rare opportunity to live in and experience this award winning, exclusive luxury home.

This home is truly a special private oasis, with quick access to downtown shopping, breweries, and restaurants. The Blue Ridge Parkway, Grove Park Inn area, and many outdoor activities are found just steps outside your front door.

Custom three car garage that connects to the main home.

The space
There are many astounding, creative features found in this special 5-bedroom, 4.5 bath home throughout its 4100 square feet. Some highlights include the custom-built steel and wood floating staircase, Geothermal HVAC system, lifetime white oak siding with corten rustwall panel accents, 7.5kW solar array, Energy Star and Green Built Certified, and large bifold doors connecting indoor and outdoor living spaces. There are wonderful sunset views from the porches and observation deck. The outdoor area features a large yard with hot tub that is both private and rare so cl

name: Quiet neighborhood, 3br home, near WNC AG center
description:
Quiet neighborhood 3 bedroom home, with outdoor patio and fire pit. Screened porch and peaceful setting perfect for relaxing in a home away from home. Enjoy the indoor fireplace, and short drive to town.

The space
There are 3 bedrooms, the master bedroom on the main level has a queen size bed comfortable for two people with a private bathroom.
The second bedroom is located upstairs with a queen sized bed.
The third bedroom is upstairs with two adult twin beds. The second and third bedrooms share the upstairs bathroom.

There are 2 indoor entertainment areas, the upstairs T.V loft as well as the downstairs living area with easy to use indoor gas fireplace.

The dining table can seat 6 adults, the kitchen is fully equipped with everything you should need for your stay. If you have any special needs or requests please message me directly.

The outdoor fire pit and screened in porch are perfect for morning coffee or even

description:

name: Mountain views, hot tub, 5 minutes to downtown!
description:
This newer home is perfect for your Asheville getaway. Beautifully furnished, modern and spacious with a brand new Bull Frog hot tub on the deck overlooking the mountains. Wake up to coffee on one of three decks watching the sunrise. Walk at Beaver Lake and stop by Fresh Market for groceries just 4 minutes away or drive to downtown in 5 minutes for breweries, shopping and all that Asheville has to offer!

The space
This home is three years old and is in excellent condition. Hardwood floors throughout, modern but cozy with local artwork and furnishings. The front deck is covered and the back deck is not. It has a hot tub and comfortable West Elm deck furniture. There is a tiny home on site that is a work in progress and is currently being used as a shed but the deck is all yours for additional lounging. The backyard is fully fenced. This is a great place for a couple, a family or two couples or a group of friends. The neighborhood is quiet and you are only 5 minute

name: Adorable guesthouse near the French Broad!
description: Relaxing guest house in desirable Asheville, NC! This house gives you plenty of space to unwind - whether you're on the deck, in the back yard, or hiking in the neighborhood trails! Just 4 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, the NC Arboretum, and the French Broad River! Also located in the desirable Bent Creek neighborhood, so you can ride straight to the infamous Bent Creek mountain-biking trails. Two bedrooms, three bathrooms, one reading/study room, and one play room for the little ones!

name: Sunset Retreat | Hideaway 15mins to Biltmore & DT
description: Pets are welcome! There is a $75 pet fee per pet for a maximum of two. A comfortable and convenient home with easy access to Downtown Asheville, Biltmore Estate, River Arts District, and so much more! Bring the family and explore Asheville like a local. You’ve planned an Asheville weekend filled with scenic hikes, incredible eats, and the world’s greatest brewery hop, but have you thought about where you’re going to kick back and relax after all that hustle?

name: Spacious West Asheville chalet
description:
Come relax in our 4 bedroom home, completed in July 2018. It's conveniently nestled across from Carrier Park with river access. Boasting sweeping, panoramic views of the mountains, Historic Biltmore Estate and the French Broad River. Perfect for a family vacation or a getaway. Enjoy an easy stroll to Asheville Adventure Park where you can rent tubes and kayaks for a ride on the river. 10min drive to downtown Asheville, the house is a wonderful retreat furnished in a contemporary decor.

The space
Sleeps up to 14 people. There are three king beds, four twin beds set up in bunk bed fashion, one pull out full-size couch and one inflatable queen size air bed. Golden slumbers ensured with top of the line Saatva mattresses in each bed. Unique headboards are from Desert Metal Design. Wood finishes from local NC hardwoods. There are three large screen smart Tv's with Netflix , DirecTV, HBO and an audiophile grade stereo. Contemporary art on each floor from notable artist

name: South Asheville Adventure Basecamp
description:
Enjoy staying in a peaceful, safe neighborhood without compromising on location. This private basement rental is 5 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway, 10 minutes to the extensive mountain bike trails of Bent Creek, 10 minutes to Sierra Nevada and 20 minutes from the arts and breweries of downtown Asheville. This is the perfect basecamp for a well rounded Asheville adventure.

The space
Guests have a private entrance with a keypad, as well as their own full bathroom. The room has a kitchenette complete with Keurig, mini fridge, microwave and basic paper goods. You will have plenty of space for adventure gear with your own walk in closet and space for hanging two bikes in the shared garage space.

The exterior of the house is undergoing some hardscaping, but should not interfere with your stay.

Though it is a full bathroom, the shower is narrow

name: Private, spa-quality home with fire pit
description:
This is a fully renovated, private, three-room Suite. It includes a separate entrance, a bright living room with kitchenette, a spa-quality en suite bathroom with soaker tub, large shower, and dual vanity, plus a roomy master bedroom with ample closet space.

The space
You'll be just 14 minutes from Downtown, and 12 minutes from River Arts District - but you'll feel worlds away. The house is located near the end of a quiet street, in a wooded, natural setting. There is high-speed internet; a smart TV with Hulu and Netflix; a Keurig coffee maker, a microwave, a toaster oven, and a mini refrigerator. Dishes, coffee mugs, and a stocked coffee station are provided. There is also an electric fireplace heater to keep you cozy on chilly nights.
